1a1(rgyud 'bum): (na) @#/ ! /gsang sngags rgyud 'bum gyi skor bzhugs so/ /
1a2(rgyud 'bum): (黃) 秘密經第十二部
1b1(rgyud 'bum): @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ bo d+hi gar+b+he driSh+Na lak+Sha d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ byang chub kyi snying po'i
1b2(rgyud 'bum): rgyan 'bum gyi gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
1b3(rgyud 'bum): oM na mo b+ha ga ba te bi bu la ba da na kAny+tsa nota k+Ship+ta/ pra b+hA sa ke tu mUr+d+ha ne/ ta thA ga tA ya/ a te
1b4(rgyud 'bum): samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ na mo b+ha ga ba te shAkya mu na ye/ ta thA ga tA ya/ a te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/
1b5(rgyud 'bum): bo d+hi bo d+hi/ bo d+ha ni bo d+ha ni/ sarba ta thA ga ta go tsa re/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ ha ra ha ra/ pra ha ra pra ha ra/ ma hA bo d+hi tsi
1b6(rgyud 'bum): t+ta d+hA re/ tsu lu tsu lu/ sha ta ra smi sany+tso di te/ sarba ta thA ga tA/ bi Shik+te/ gu Ni gu Na ba te/ sarba bud d+ha gu NA
1b7(rgyud 'bum): ba b+hA se/ mi li mi li/ ga ga na ta le/ pra tiSh+Thi te/ sarba ta thA ga ta a di Sh+Thi te/ na b+ha sta le/ sha ma sha ma/
1b8(rgyud 'bum): pra sha me pra sha me/ sarba pA paM pra sha ma ne/ sarba pA paM bi sho d+ha ni/ hu lu hu lu/ ma hA bo d+hi mArga sa~M pra tiSh+Thi te/
2a1(rgyud 'bum): sarba ta thA ga ta su pra tiSh+Thi te shud d+hi swA hA/ mu kha man+t+ra/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta byA ba lo ki te/ dza ya dza ya swA hA/ snying po'o/ oM hu lu hu lu/ dza ya mu khe swA hA/ u pa hr-i da ya~M/ oM badzra A yu She swA hA/
2a2(rgyud 'bum): dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'a~M/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis gzungs 'di bris te/ mchod rten byas la mchod rten
2a3(rgyud 'bum): de'i nang du gzungs 'di bcug na/ des mchod rten gcig byas na 'bum byas par 'gyur ro/ /lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal
2a4(rgyud 'bum): mtshan dang / ba dan la sogs pas kyang mchod par 'gyur te/ mchod rten 'ba' zhig mchod pa ma yin gyi/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang / chos dkon mchog dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog rnams la'ang
2a5(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa'i yo byad de dag gis mchod par 'gyur ro/ /dga' bo ngas mdo 'di bshad pa ni bsod nams zhan pa dang / ma dad pa dang / lta ba log pa dang / the tshom za ba dang / mtshams med pa byed pa dang / tshe thung
2a6(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / mtshams med par 'gro ba'i sems can de lta bu dag gi phyir gzungs 'di bshad do/ /dga' bo phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe
2a7(rgyud 'bum): khyim na gnas pa dang / dge slong las phal cher gzungs 'di mi klog pa dang / mchod par mi byed pa rnams ji ltar khyim pa rnams sdug bsngal bar bshad pa de bzhin du rab tu byung ba rnams kyang sdug
2a8(rgyud 'bum): bsngal bar 'gyur ro/ /de ste de bzhin du sangs rgyas mchod cing 'di las nyan pas mchod rten gcig byas na chos kyis brgyan pa brgyad khri bzhi stong rnams kyang mchod par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang bsod nams
2b1(rgyud 'bum): kyi phung po dpag tu med par 'gyur ro/ /sdong pos brgyan pa bklags shing kha ton du byas par 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor du yang zhugs par 'gyur ro/ /
2b2(rgyud 'bum): byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan 'bum las btus pa 'bum gyi gzungs rdzogs s+ho// // @#/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
2b3(rgyud 'bum): rnam par snang mdzad 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de la mchod rten gcig btab na bye ba btab par 'gyur pa'i sngags dang / /cho ga ni 'jim pa la sogs pa yo byad thaMd la sngags 'di lan nyi shu
2b4(rgyud 'bum): rtsa gcig bzlas par bya'o/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te bai ro tsa na pra b+ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ /a ra ha te sa myak+sa~M bud d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sU k+Sha me sU k+Sha me sa me sa ma ye/ shAn te dAn te a sa mA ro pe a nA
2b5(rgyud 'bum): la~M be/ ta ra la~M be/ ya sho ba ti/ ma hA te dzo ni ra ku le nirbA Ne/ sarba bud d+ha a d+hi Sh+Tha na swA hA/ a d+hi Sh+Thi ste swA hA/ tsai t+ya 'debs pa'i 'jim pa'am/ sngags bris pa'i tshe lan bdun du gdab pa'i
2b6(rgyud 'bum): sngags la/ na maH sa man+ta bud+d+hA nA~M/ oM badzra A yu She swA hA/ 'bi 'bi'i sngags la/ oM badzo d+b+ha bA ya swA hA/ tsai t+ya phor bu'i nang dang / sa tsha'i nang du phye ma gdab pa'am/ 'bru mar byug pa'i sngags
2b7(rgyud 'bum): la/ oM a ra dze bi ra dze swA hA/ phyag rgya'am/ sngags gzhug pa'i sngags la/ oM d+harma d+hA tu gar+b+he swA hA/ tsai t+ya phor bur 'bi 'bi bzhugs pa'i sngags la/ oM badzra d+hA tu gar+b+he swA hA/ tho bas rdeg cing
2b8(rgyud 'bum): gdab pa'i sngags la/ oM badzra mung+ga ra a ko Ta ya hU~M phaT swA hA/ tsai t+ya phur bu nas phyi rang byung ba'i sngags la/ oM d+harma ra te swA hA/ 'khor lo dang / dbu zhu gsol ba'i sngags la/ oM b+h+ra ma Na ye swA hA/
3a1(rgyud 'bum): tsai t+ya'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa'i sngags la/ oM su pra tiSh+Tha ta badzre swA hA/ cho ga de ltar byas na tsai t+ya gcig btab pas bye ba btab par 'gyur ro/ /thams cad du skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/
3a2(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor byas pa'i lag pa 'jim pa can gyis gang na bar bskus na n+da mdze'i rnam pa bcwa brgyad la sogs pa thams cad ma lus par zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /mchod rten gcig btab na bye ba btab par 'gyur
3a3(rgyud 'bum): ba'i gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sarba ta thA ga ta a d+hiSh+ThA na hr-i da ya gu h+ya d+hA tu ka raN+Da nA ma d+hA ra NI ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa
3a4(rgyud 'bum): thaMd kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi snying po gsang ba ring bsrel gyi za ma tog ces bya ba'i gzungs theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di
3a5(rgyud 'bum): skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga d+hA na dri ma med pa'i kun dga' ra ba dang rin po che sna bdun gyi rdzing na byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun
3a6(rgyud 'bum): chen po dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa bye ba mang po rnams dang / yul
3a7(rgyud 'bum): gyi mi 'bum phrag du ma rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du byas nas thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ /de nas 'khor gyi nang de na bram ze chen po shing sA la chen po lta bu mkhas pa/ mdzangs pa/
3a8(rgyud 'bum): gsal ba yid gzhungs pa/ mthong na dga' ba/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su bzung ba/ dri med legs snang zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de yang gcig tu dkon mchog gsum la dad cing gus
3b1(rgyud 'bum): la phyag byed pa'i dge ba'i bsams pa dang ldan pa/ zhib mo brtags pa/ sems can thams cad dang dge ba'i don la brtson pa/ nor che ba/ longs spyod che ba/ phyug pa/ rdzas mang ba/
3b2(rgyud 'bum): yo byad phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /de nas bram ze chen po dri med legs snang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas yang bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la
3b3(rgyud 'bum): me tog dang / bdug pas mngon par mchod do/ /na bza' rin 'bum ri ba yang gsol/ bcom ldan 'das la mu tig gi do shal 'bum ri ba yang gsol nas zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/
3b4(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das sras tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa/ bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod la spyan 'dren na
3b5(rgyud 'bum): de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang bar mdzad par ci gnang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze chen po dri med legs snang gis spyan drangs par thugs su chud nas cang mi gsung bar gyur pas gnang ngo / /
3b6(rgyud 'bum): de nas bram ze chen po dri med legs snang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas des rings pa rings par rang gi khyim du song ste/ de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das pa dang / zhal zas dang / yo byad
3b7(rgyud 'bum): dang / zhal zas ro brgya pa/ mang po bshams nas bkod pa chen pos bkra shis kyi gzhal med khang dang / gzhal med khang chen po sna tshogs dang / me tog dang / bdug pa khyer te/ 'khor
3b8(rgyud 'bum): mang po dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la dus la bab par gsol to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la bram ze chen po dri med legs snang gis
4a1(rgyud 'bum): 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di ni gshegs pa'i dus lags te/ bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa'i dus kyi tshod la bab na bdag la gnang bar mdzad par ci
4a2(rgyud 'bum): gnang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze chen po dri med legs snang dbugs phyung nas nyid kyi 'khor la gzigs te bka' stsal pa/ 'khor ji ltar lhags pa thams cad deng don chen po mdzad par 'gyur gyis
4a3(rgyud 'bum): tshur sheg / de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan de las bzhengs nas/ bcom ldan 'das gdan de las bzhengs ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi sku las 'od zer tha dad pa sna tshogs byung ste/ 'od zer gyi snang ba des phyogs
4a4(rgyud 'bum): bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad snang bar byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la yang dag par bskul te/ gzigs nas gshegs par shes so/ /de nas bram ze chen po dri med legs snang gis
4a5(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa dang / bkur sti chen pos mchod cing bcom ldan 'das kyi gshegs shul mdzes pa cher byas so/ /'khor mang po dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang /
4a6(rgyud 'bum): lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / dbang phyug chen po dang /
4a7(rgyud 'bum): sred med kyi bu dang / rgyal po chen po bzhis kyang gshegs shul mdzes par byas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dang ha cang mi ring ba'i lam gyi bar gyi nang zhig na skyed mos
4a8(rgyud 'bum): tshal bde byed ces bya ba zhig yod do/ /skyed mos tshal de'i nang na mchod rten rnying pa chen po zhig yod de/ zhig pa/ tsher mas gang ba rtswa dang / shing dang / gyo mos kun tu gang ba phyag dar
4b1(rgyud 'bum): gyi phung po lta bu zhig yod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de'i drung du gshegs pa dang / mchod rten rnying pa phyag dar gyi phung po lta bu de yang kun nas 'bar zhing 'od zer 'bar ba kha dog
4b2(rgyud 'bum): sna tshogs pa dag byung ngo / /phyag dar dang gyo mo'i phung po de las kyang legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa legs so legs so/ /deng ni
4b3(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa'i ltas bzang po'o/ /bram ze chen po de bzhin gshegs pa spyan drangs pa na yang khyod legs so/ /deng khyod la don chen po mdzad par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
4b4(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pas mchod rten rnying pa phyag dar gyi phung po lta bu de la yan lag lngas phyag mdzad nas lan gsum bskor ba mdzad nas/ nyid kyi sku las na bza' gsil nas
4b5(rgyud 'bum): mchod rten rnying pa phyag dar gyi phung po lta bu de la gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mchi ma byung ba chen po phyung bas bshums pa mdzad nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa bstan to/ /'dzum pa
4b6(rgyud 'bum): bstan pa des phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad lag mthil na bzhugs pa bzhin du mthong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang 'od zer bkye ste/ mchod rten
4b7(rgyud 'bum): rnying pa'i phung po chen po der zhugs so/ /de nas 'khor mang po 'dus pa de dag ya mtshan chen por gyur cing yid ches te 'khod par gyur to/ /de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje lus
4b8(rgyud 'bum): ni 'dar/ snying ni 'gul/ rdo rje ni gsor zhing rings pa rings par bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di
5a1(rgyud 'bum): skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bshums pa'i snga ltas chen po gda' ba gang gis na bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan mchi mas gang bar bstan pa'i snga ltas gda' ba bcom
5a2(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das ci lags/ ci'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'di'i nang du zhu ba 'di skabs dbye bar ci gnang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
5a3(rgyud 'bum): to/ /lag na rdo rje ring bsrel gyi phung po de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba til gyi gang bu snyed thams cad kyi snying po'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i mchod rten gyi chos kyi rnam
5a4(rgyud 'bum): grangs yod de/ lag na rdo rje chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang na gnas pa der/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba til gyi gang bu snyed gnas shing de bzhin gshegs pa khar yas khar yas
5a5(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba snyed kyi sku gdung ring bsrel rnams gnas so/ /chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong gnas so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba til gyi gang bu snyed dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i gtsug tor dang /
5a6(rgyud 'bum): spyi bo yang de bzhin du gnas so/ /lag na rdo rje gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gnas pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten du lung bstan to/ /lag na rdo rje chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni 'di ltar phan
5a7(rgyud 'bum): yon che zhing mthu che ba yin no/ /lag na rdo rje chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni phan yon che ba yin no/ /lag na rdo rje chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni bkra shis thams cad rdzogs par byed pa yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
5a8(rgyud 'bum): las 'khor mang po 'dus pa de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral la/ de nas nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral lo/ /kha cig gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i
5b1(rgyud 'bum): 'bras bu thob bo/ /kha cig gis ni dgra bcom pa nyid thob bo/ /kha cig gis ni rang byang chub kyi 'bras bu'o/ /kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/ /kha cig gis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/ /
5b2(rgyud 'bum): kha cig gis ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa la gnas so/ /kha cig gis ni byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob bo/ /kha cig gis ni sa dang po'o/ /kha cig gis ni sa gnyis pa'o/ /kha cig gis ni sa gsum pa'o/ /
5b3(rgyud 'bum): kha cig gis ni sa bzhi pa'o/ /kha cig gis ni sa lnga pa'o/ /kha cig gis ni sa drug pa'o/ /kha cig gis ni sa bdun pa'o/ /kha cig gis ni sa brgyad pa'o/ /kha cig gis ni sa dgu pa'o/ /kha cig gis ni sa
5b4(rgyud 'bum): bcu pa la gnas par gyur to/ /kha cig gis ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs so/ /bram ze chen po de yang mngon par shes pa lnga thob cing dri ma dang bral ba dang / ser sna dang / phrag dog dang bral bar gyur to/ /gnod
5b5(rgyud 'bum): sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes cho 'phrul chen po 'di lta bu mthong nas ngo mtshar dang rmad du byung ba chen por gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs kyi mtshan thos pas kyang
5b6(rgyud 'bum): phan yon gyi yon tan gyis brgyan pa 'di lta bu thob na/ bcom ldan 'das gang gi slad du phu dud dang / bkur sti shin tu mang po bgyid par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ bcom ldan 'das de bsod nams kyi phung po ji lta bu yang mthong bar 'gyur/
5b7(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje nyon cig /rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la las chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dri bar byed na/ lag na
5b8(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje des de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig til gyi gang bu snyed dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang ldan par 'gyur zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyis rjes su bzung
6a1(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur ro/ /gang zhig klog par byed pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa'i mdo sde rnams bcang bar 'gyur ro/ /gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu 'dzin pa de dag
6a2(rgyud 'bum): phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig til gyi gang bu snyed dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang / phyogs re re'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gzung bar
6a3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur zhing / nyin gcig bzhin gzigs par 'gyur ro/ /gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod pa byed pa dang / khong du chud par byed pa dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / me tog phreng rgyud dang / byug pa dang /
6a4(rgyud 'bum): na bza' dang / lhab lhub dang / rgyan gyis mchod pa byed pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma des phyogs bcu dang / phyogs re re'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig
6a5(rgyud 'bum): til gyi gang bu snyed dgu bcu rtsa dgu la lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / me tog phreng rgyud dang / byug pa dang / na bza' dang / lhab lhub dang / rgyan gyis mchod par 'gyur ro/ /phyogs re re'i de bzhin
6a6(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa la de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa'i sprin rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i ri rab chen po tsam gyi phung po'i yon tan byung ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang /
6a7(rgyud 'bum): lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa de rnams dang / sems can gyi tshogs chen po de rnams kyang ya mtshan du gyur nas gcig la gcig 'di skad du mchod rten rnying pa phyag
6a8(rgyud 'bum): dar dang / gyo mo'i phung po de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs nas 'di ni rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen po ston pas mthu che ba yin no zhes zer ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po
6b1(rgyud 'bum): lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di sus phyag dar gyi phung por bgyis pa las rin po che'i mchod rten du gda' bar bgyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje
6b2(rgyud 'bum): 'di phyag dar gyi phung po ma yin gyi 'di ni rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i rin po che'i mchod rten chen po yin no/ /lag na rdo rje 'on kyang sems can rnams kyi las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa ston pas nub par gyur
6b3(rgyud 'bum): gyi/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi snying po'i mchod rten rnams ni 'jig pa'am/ 'gyes par mi 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje'i snying po'i sku ji ltar 'gyes par 'gyur/
6b4(rgyud 'bum): 'on kyang sems can rnams kyi las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin par snang ba las kyang nub par gyur to/ /lag na rdo rje gzhan yang phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe/ sdig pa kun tu spyod pa dang / sdig pa can dang / dmyal ba la gzhol
6b5(rgyud 'bum): ba shin tu tshabs cher 'byung bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas ma yin/ chos ma yin/ dge 'dun tshol ba ma yin zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba dag kyang bskyed par mi byed de rgyu de dang / rkyen des dam pa'i chos nub bo/ /lag na rdo rje de'i
6b6(rgyud 'bum): phyir nga'i mig gnyis mchi mas gang la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang mchi ma byung ngo / /dam pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu ni nub par 'gyur gyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten ni ma gtogs te/ de la de bzhin gshegs
6b7(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bris te mchod rten gyi nang du 'jog
6b8(rgyud 'bum): na dge ba'i rtsa ba ci zhig skye bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bris te mchod rten gyi nang du bzhag pa de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i snying po ring bsrel gyi mchod
7a1(rgyud 'bum): rten du 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzungs kyi snying po gsang bas byin gyis brlabs pa'i mchod rten du 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa til gyi gang bu snyed dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i mchod rten
7a2(rgyud 'bum): du 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor dang / spyan gyi mchod rten du byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ /gang zhig sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan nam/ mchod rten thams cad kyi nang du 'jog par byed na
7a3(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ /'khor lo'i phreng ba dang / dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bar sbrel ba dang bcas pa dang / bkra shis dang / char kab
7a4(rgyud 'bum): kyi gzugs dang / dril bur bcas pa rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i mthu dang byin gyis brlabs dang / bden pa dang /
7a5(rgyud 'bum): dam tshig gis byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ /sems can gang dag mchod rten de la phu dud dang / bsti stang byed pa de dag nges par phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
7a6(rgyud 'bum): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /phyag 'tshal ba gcig dang / bskor ba byed pa gcig gis mnar med pa thug pa la sogs pa rnams las yongs su thar bar 'gyur zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
7a7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ /gnas gang na mchod rten nam gzugs brnyan 'di lta bu gnas pa'i sa phyogs de yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ /phyogs der klu mi srun pas kyang mi tshugs
7a8(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ sad dang ser bas kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur/ gnas der srog chags mi srun pa'am gdug pas kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur/ gcan gzan gyis kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur/ bya mi srun pa dang / ne tso dang / ri skegs dang / byi ba dang /
7b1(rgyud 'bum): sre mo dang / sha sbrang dang / sbrang bu dang / bye ba dang / sbrang ma mchu gsum pa dang / mchu rings dang / rta bla'i 'jigs pa'ang mi 'byung bar 'gyur/ sbrul gdug pas kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/ /phyogs der yams kyi nad dang / nad 'go ba
7b2(rgyud 'bum): dang / 'khrug pa'ang mi 'byung bar 'gyur/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / yi dags dang / 'dre dang / brjed byed kyi 'jigs pa yang mi 'byung bar 'gyur/ gdon thams cad kyis kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur/ rims thams cad kyis
7b3(rgyud 'bum): kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur/ nad thams cad dang / 'bras dang / phol mig dang / lhog pa dang / mtshan bar rdol ba dang / rkang shu dang / g.yan pa dang / mdzes kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur zhing mchod rten de mthong ba tsam gyis thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /phyogs
7b4(rgyud 'bum): der ba lang gi nad dang / phyugs nad dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas rnam pa mang po gzhan dag gi nad dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i nad kyis kyang nam yang tshugs par mi 'gyur ro/ /dus ma yin par 'chi bas kyang dus ma yin
7b5(rgyud 'bum): par 'chi bar mi 'gyur/ dug gis ma yin/ mtshon gyis ma yin zhing me dang / chus kyang nam yang mi tshugs par 'gyur/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi 'jigs pas ma yin/ lo nyes kyi 'jigs pas kyang nam yang mi
7b6(rgyud 'bum): tshugs par 'gyur/ rgyal po chen po'i dmag gis 'jigs pa yang mi 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi'ang rtag tu rgyun mi chad par srung bar 'gyur ro/ /sa phyogs der srung bar byed/ yongs su skyong bar byed do/ /
7b7(rgyud 'bum): gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad po de dag kyang rtag tu rgyun mi chad par srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed pa byed par 'gyur ro/ /rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / mjug rings chen
7b8(rgyud 'bum): po'ang nyin mtshan mthun par byed par 'gyur ro/ /klu'i rgyal po thams cad kyang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mdangs mi 'phrog cing legs pa kho nar char gyi rgyun 'bebs par 'gyur ro/ /lha thams cad kyang mchod rten chen po de la phyag 'tshal ba dang /
8a1(rgyud 'bum): bkur sti bya ba dang / mchod pa bya ba'i phyir gnas sum cu rtsa gnyis nas dus gsum du 'ong ngo / /yul na gnas pa thams cad kyang mchod rten dang / gzugs brnyan de'i drung du dus gsum du 'ong ngo / /
8a2(rgyud 'bum): stod par byed/ skor ba byed par 'gyur ro/ /lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin kyang lha'i bu mo dang / lha'i tshogs rnams dang lhan cig rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mchod rten nam/ gzugs brnyan de'i drung du nyin mtshan dus gsum
8a3(rgyud 'bum): du 'ong ste/ phyag 'tshal ba dang / mchod pa la 'ong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang rtag par dgongs pa dang / byin gyi rlob par 'gyur ro/ /mchod rten dang / gzugs brnyan ji lta ji lta bu las byed pa'i sa'i 'am/ rdo'i
8a4(rgyud 'bum): 'am/ shing gi'am/ dngul gyi'am/ gser gyi'am/ zangs kyir byed pa dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang bris te/ de'i nang du bzhag na bzhag ma thag tsam gyis rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin
8a5(rgyud 'bum): du byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ /'phang dang / them skas dang / kha ran dang / 'khor lo'i phreng ba dang / bkra shis dang / gdugs dang / dril bu 'phyang ba dang / ba dan dang / dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdun
8a6(rgyud 'bum): gyi rang bzhin du 'gyur ro/ /phyogs bzhi kun na yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan gnas par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i
8a7(rgyud 'bum): mchod rten rin po che dang / sku gdung gi snying po'i mchod rten dang / mchod gnas su 'gyur ro/ /sku gzugs dang / mchod rten de 'og min gyi gnas kyi lhas kyang yongs su bskyang ba dang / mchod pas yongs su
8a8(rgyud 'bum): gzung bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yon tan gyi khyad par 'di lta bur 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
8b1(rgyud 'bum): bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs kyis snying po gsang ba ring bsrel gyi za ma tog gi phyag rgya'i gzungs yin te/ lag na rdo rje des na mthu 'di ni yon tan
8b2(rgyud 'bum): gyi khyad par 'di lta bur byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin no/ /rdo rje 'dzin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i za ma tog gi phyag rgya'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs
8b3(rgyud 'bum): bshad par ci gnang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje nyon cig de bzhin gshegs pa 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba dang / gang dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i
8b4(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni gsum ste/ chos kyi sku dang / longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang / de bzhin du sprul pa'i sku ste/ dus gsum pa thams cad kyi ring bsrel gyi za ma tog
8b5(rgyud 'bum): gi phyag rgya'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs yin no/ /na ma s+t+rai ya d+h+wi kA nA~M/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga tA nA~M/ u0f00 b+hu bi b+ha bAn ba re ba tsa Tau/ tsu lu tsu lu/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga tA/ d+hA tu d+ha re/ pad+ma ga / dza ya ba re/
8b6(rgyud 'bum): a tsa le/ sma ra ta thA ga ta/ d+har+m+ma tsakra/ pra brta na/ badzra bo d+hi maN+Da a baM kA ra/ a baM krI te/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta/ a d+hi te/ bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/ bo d+ha ni bo d+ha ni/ bud+h+ya bud+d+h+ya/ sa~M bo d+ha ni
8b7(rgyud 'bum): sa~M bo d+ha ya/ tsa la tsa la/ tsa lan+tu sar+b+ba A ba ra NA ni/ sarba pA pa~M bi ga te/ hu ru hu ru/ sar+b+ba sho ka bi ga te/ sarba ta thA ga ta hrI da ya/ badzri Ni/ sam+b+ha ba sam+b+ha ba/ sarba ta thA ga ta gu h+ye/
8b8(rgyud 'bum): b+hA ra Ni mu dre/ bud d+he/ su bud d+he/ sarba ta thA ga ta a d+hi te/ d+hA tu ga swA hA/ sa ma ya a d+hi te swA hA/ sarba ta thA ga ta hrI da ya/ d+hA tu mu dre swA hA/ su pra ti ta stU pe ta thA ga ta a d+hi te/ hU~M hU~M swA hA/
9a1(rgyud 'bum): u0f00 sarba ta thA ga ta uSh+NI Sha d+hA tu mu drA Ni sarba ta thA ga ta d+harma d+hA tu bi b+hU Shi ta a d+hi te hu ru hu ru/ hU~M hU~M swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ring bsrel gyi za ma tog gi phyag rgya'i gzungs 'di bshad ma
9a2(rgyud 'bum): thag tu phyogs bcu dang / phyogs re re kun nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig til gyi gang bu snyed dgu bcu rtsa dgu gshegs nas/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la shAkya thub pas sems can thams cad kyi don du 'dzam
9a3(rgyud 'bum): bu'i gling du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu'i chos kyi gter bzhag pa dang / ring bsrel gyi snying po'i mchod rten byin gyis brlabs pa legs so/ /legs so zhes bya ba byin no/ /'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig
9a4(rgyud 'bum): dang / byin gyis brlabs pa yin no/ /gang na ring bsrel gyi phyag rgya'i gzungs 'di ston par byed dam/ mchod rten gyi nang du 'jog gam/ gzugs brnyan gyi nang du 'jog par byed pa der/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang
9a5(rgyud 'bum): gcig tu rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par rjes su 'brang zhing bzhugs par 'gyur ro/ /thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ /de nas gzungs bshad pa dang / ji tsam na mchod rten rnying
9a6(rgyud 'bum): pa phyag dar gyi phung po lta bu de rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi mchod rten du mngon par 'phags shing 'phang dang / legs par rnam par 'byes pa dang / 'khor lo'i phreng ba dang / bkra shis dang bcas par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das dgyes
9a7(rgyud 'bum): nas de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po de dag dang / lha dang /
9a8(rgyud 'bum): mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yi rangs te mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi snying po gsang ba'i ring bsrel gyi za ma tog ces bya ba'i
9b1(rgyud 'bum): gzungs theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ / //paN Di ta bid+yA ka ra pra b+ha wa dang / lo ts+tsha ba tsangs de ben+d+ra rak+Shi tas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ yang zhus te/ / @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya bai shA lI pra be sha ma hA sU tra/
9b2(rgyud 'bum): bod skad du/ 'phags pa yangs pa'i grong khyer du 'jug pa'i mdo chen po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das 'dam bu'i khrod na gzings
9b3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i 'dug gnas na bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo yangs pa'i grong khyer ga la ba der 'dong ngo / /btsun pa de ltar bgyi'o zhes gsol nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'
9b4(rgyud 'bum): bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das yul brI dzir yul rgyu zhing gshegs te/ yangs pa'i grong khyer du byon nas yangs pa'i grong khyer gyi a mra srung ba'i tshal na bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa
9b5(rgyud 'bum): kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo yangs pa'i grong khyer du song la phyin nas sgo'i them pa la rkang pa zhog ste/ gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag dang / tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smros shig /bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/
9b6(rgyud 'bum): bi sa ra ta/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal to/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dgongs pa/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsams pa/ dgra bcom pa thams cad kyis bsams pa/ slob pa thams cad kyis bsams
9b7(rgyud 'bum): pa/ nyan thos thams cad kyis bsams pa/ bden pa'i tshig dang ldan pa thams cad kyis bsams pa/ chos kyis bsams pa/ tshangs pas bsams pa/ tshangs pa so sos bsams pa/ 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gis bsams pa/ dbang pos bsams pa/
9b8(rgyud 'bum): lhas bsams pa/ lha ma yin gyi dbang pos bsams pa/ lha ma yin gyi mngag gzhug pas bsams pa/ 'byung po thams cad kyis bsams pa/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba
10a1(rgyud 'bum): can gyis bka' stsal to/ /muny+tsa ta/ muny+tsa ta/ muny+tsa ta/ muny+tsa ta/ ma 'dug cig /yams kyi nad rnam par zhi bar gyur cig /nirgats+tsha ta/ nirgats+tsha ta/ nirgats+tsha ta/ nirgats+tsha ta/ sangs rgyas lha chen po lha'i yang lha/ lha'i bla ma/
10a2(rgyud 'bum): gshegs shing / dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnaMs dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang / skye dgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa rnaMs dang / 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po dag kyang 'ong / lha 'bum phrag du ma dag dang / lha ma
10a3(rgyud 'bum): yin gyi dbang po rnaMs dang / lha ma yin 'bum phrag du ma dag kyang 'ong / bac+do~Ms la mngon par dad pa'i 'byung po 'bum phrag du ma dag kyang sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir 'ongs te/ khyed rnaMs la gnod pa chen po byed par 'gyur
10a4(rgyud 'bum): du 'ong gis/ nirgats+tsha ta/ nirgats+tsha ta/ nirgats+tsha ta/ nirgats+tsha ta/ myur du byer cig /khyed cag las gang dag sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa de dag ni phung bar gyur cig /gang dag byams pa'i sems dang ldan zhing nyes par mi 'dod
10a5(rgyud 'bum): la srung bar 'jug par 'dod pa de dag ni 'khod cig / lus la yang 'jug par gyis shig /sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal pa/ su mu su mu/ su mu su mu/ su mu/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu
10a6(rgyud 'bum): ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru
10a7(rgyud 'bum): mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu rU ri ti/ ri ri ri ri ri ri/ rI rI rI rI rI rI/ ti mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri ti/ ha si mi ri/ mI rI ti/ mi ti/ si sI/ si mI/ ka~M ka ra/ ka ra ka ta/ ka~M ka ra/
10a8(rgyud 'bum): ka~M ka tsa/ ka~M ka rA/ ka~M ka rA/ ka~M ka rA/ ka~M ka rA/ ka~M ka rA/ ka~M ka rA/ ka~M ka rA/ ka~M ka rA/ ka~M ka rA/ ka~M ka rA/ ka~M ka rA/ ka~M ka rA/ ka~M ka ro tI ti/ ku ri sha~M ka~M ka ra/ ka~M ka ri she/ ri ri ri ri ri ri/ ti re te phu swA/ ri pu ri pu/ ri pu ri pu/ ri pu ri pu/
10b1(rgyud 'bum): ri pu/ nA thA nA nA thA tha/ ri pu/ ri pu/ nA thA tha/ nirgats+tsha ta/ ri pu/ ri pu/ nirgats+tsha ta/ pa yA tha/ ri pU/ ri pU/ pa lA ya ta/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can/ sems can thams cad la phan par lhag par dgongs pa dang
10b2(rgyud 'bum): ldan pa/ byams pa la gnas pa/ thugs rje dang ldan pa/ dga' ba la gnas pa/ btang snyoms la gnas pa gshegs kyis k+Shi phran nirgats+tsha ta swA hA/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi mchog dang / chos nyid kyis
10b3(rgyud 'bum): lha thams cad dang / 'byung po thams cad la bka' stsal ba'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni grub pa'o/ /tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag ni grub pa'o/ /gang la ser sna rnam chags pa/ /rnam bcom dri ma med mdzad cing / /
10b4(rgyud 'bum): thugs zhi gnod pa mi mnga' des/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /'dren pa gang zhig 'gro ba rnams/ /thar pa'i lam du 'dzud mdzad cing / /chos rnams thams cad ston pa des/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad
10b5(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ /ston pa rgyug pa rnams kyi rten/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /gang gis bde ba mnga' mdzad des/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /skyob pa gang zhig byams pa yi/ /thugs kyis 'gro ba
10b6(rgyud 'bum): 'di dag kun/ /bu gcig bzhin du rtag bskyangs te/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /gang zhig 'khor bar 'khor ba yi/ /sems can kun gyi rten gyur cing / /gling dang dpung gnyen gyur pa des/ /khyed la
10b7(rgyud 'bum): bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /gang zhig chos kun mngon sum gyur/ /gtsang zhing bslu ba mi mnga' la/ /gsung gtsang gtsang mar mdzad pa des/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /dpa' bo chen po
10b8(rgyud 'bum): gang skyes pa/ /phun sum tshogs don 'byor gyur cing / /don grub tshogs kyang grub pa des/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /gang zhig skyes pas sa rnams ni/ /nags tshal bcas pa rab g.yos shing / /sems can thams cad rab dga' des/ /
11a1(rgyud 'bum): khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /byang chub snying por gshegs pa na/ /sa dag rnam drug g.yos gyur cing / /bdud yid mi bder gyur pa des/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /chos kyi 'khor lo
11a2(rgyud 'bum): bskor ba na/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnam gsung ba/ /thub pa'i snyan pa gang byung des/ /khyed la bde legs byed par 'gyur/ /yid 'phrog gang gis mu stegs byed/ /thams cad chos kyis pham mdzad cing / /tshogs kun
11a3(rgyud 'bum): dbang du mdzad pa des/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas khyed la bde legs mdzad/ /brgya byin lhar bcas bde legs dang / /'byung po kun gyi bde legs ni/ /khyed la rtag tu sbyin gyur cig /
11a4(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas bsod nams mthu dag dang / /lha rnams kyis ni bsams pa yis/ /khyed rnams don 'dod gang yin pa/ /don de di ring grub gyur cig /rkang gnyis khyed cag bde legs shog /rkang bzhi khyed cag bde legs
11a5(rgyud 'bum): shog / khyed cag lam 'gro bde legs shog /phyir 'ong dag kyang bde legs shog /nyin mo bde legs mtshan bde legs/ /nyi ma'i gung la'ang bde legs shing / /khyed cag kun tu bde legs shog /khyed cag sdig
11a6(rgyud 'bum): par ma gyur cig / sangs rgyas lha rnams stong dag gis/ /yongs su bskor te gshegs mdzad kyis/ /sdang sems ldan pa rnams byer cig /snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams 'khod/ /sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / /
11a7(rgyud 'bum): dgra bcom slob pa'i bden tshig gis/ /'jig rten mi phan byed pa rnams/ /grong khyer 'dir ni gtong gyur cig /sems can kun dang srog chags kun/ /'byung po kun dang khyed cag kun/ /bde ba 'ba' zhig ldan gyur cig /
11a8(rgyud 'bum): thams cad nad rnams med par shog /kun gyis bzang rnams mthong gyur cig /gang yang sdig par ma gyur cig /'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lhags gyur te/ /sa dang bar snang dag la gnas pa rnams/ /skye dgu rnams la rtag tu byams byed shog /
11b1(rgyud 'bum): nyin dang mtshan du chos kyang spyod gyur cig /de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos btsun pa de ltar bgyi'o zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas yangs pa'i grong khyer du song
11b2(rgyud 'bum): ste/ sgo'i them pa la rkang pa bzhag nas gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag dang / tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang smras so/ /bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba
11b3(rgyud 'bum): can gyis bka' stsal to/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dgongs pa/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsams pa/ dgra bcom pa thams cad kyis bsams pa/ slob pa thams cad kyis bsams pa/ nyan thos thams cad kyis bsams pa/ bden pa'i tshig dang
11b4(rgyud 'bum): ldan pa thams cad kyis bsams pa/ chos kyis bsams pa/ tshangs pas bsams pa/ tshangs pa so sos bsams pa/ 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gis bsams pa/ dbang pos bsams pa/ lhas bsams pa/ lha ma yin gyi dbang pos bsams pa/ lha ma yin thams cad kyis bsams pa/ lha ma
11b5(rgyud 'bum): yin gyi mngag gzhug pas bsams pa/ 'byung po thams cad kyis bsams pa/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal to/ /muny+tsa ta/ muny+tsa
11b6(rgyud 'bum): ta/ muny+tsa ta/ muny+tsa ta/ ma 'dug shig /yams kyi nad thams cad zhi bar gyur cig /nirgats+tsha ta/ nirgats+tsha ta/ nirgats+tsha ta/ nirgats+tsha ta/ sangs rgyas lha chen po lha'i yang lha/ lha'i bla ma gshegs shing / dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang /
11b7(rgyud 'bum): tshangs pa dang bcas pa rnams dang / dbang bdag dang bcas pa rnams dang / skye dgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa rnams dang / 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po dag kyang 'ong / lha stong phrag du ma dag dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams dang / lha ma yin stong phrag du
11b8(rgyud 'bum): ma dag kyang 'ong / bcom ldan 'das la mngon par dad pa'i 'byung po brgya stong mang po dag kyang sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir 'ongs te/ de dag khyed la gnod pa chen po byed par 'gyur gyis/ nirgats+tsha ta/ nirgats+tsha ta/ nirgats+tsha ta/ nirgats+tsha ta/ myur du byer cig /
12a1(rgyud 'bum): khyed cag las gang dag sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa de dag ni phung bar gyur cig /gang dag byams pa'i sems dang ldan zhing nyes par mi 'dod la srung bar 'jug par 'dod pa de dag ni 'khod cig /lus la
12a2(rgyud 'bum): yang 'jug par gyis shig / sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal pa/ su mu/ su mu/ su mu/ su mu/ su mu/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/
12a3(rgyud 'bum): mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/
12a4(rgyud 'bum): mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu rU ri ti/ ri ri ri ri/ ri ri/ rI rI rI rI/ rI rI ti/ mi ri mi ri/ mi ri mi ri/ mi ri mi ri/ mi ri mi rI ti/ ha si mi mi rI ti/ sI si mi/ ka~M ka rA/ ka ra ka ta/ ka ra ka ra ka ra/ ka tsa/ ka~M ka rA/ ka~M ka rA/ ka~M ka rA/ ka~M ka
12a5(rgyud 'bum): rA/ ka~M ka rA/ ka~M ka rA/ ka~M ka rA/ ka~M ka rA/ ka~M ka rA/ ka~M ka rA/ ka~M ka rA/ ka~M ka rA/ ka~M ka rA/ ka~M ka ro tI ti ku ri sho ka~M ka rA/ ka~M ka rI she/ ri ri ri ri/ ri ri rI/ ta ra te pu swA/ ri pu/ ri pu/ ri pu/ ri pu/ ri pu/ ri pu/ ri pu/ ri pu/ nA thA/
12a6(rgyud 'bum): nA nA thA thA/ ri pu ri pu/ na thA thA/ nirgats+tsha ta/ ri pu ri pu/ nirgats+tsha ta/ pa la yA tra/ ri pu ri pu/ pa la yA tra/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can sems can thams cad la phan par lhag par dgongs pa dang ldan pa/
12a7(rgyud 'bum): byams pa la gnas pa/ thugs rje dang ldan pa/ dga' ba la gnas pa/ btang snyoms la gnas pa/ gshegs kyis k+Shi phran nirgats+tsha ta swA hA/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi mchog dang / chos nyid kyis lha
12a8(rgyud 'bum): thams cad dang / 'byung po thams cad la bka' stsal pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni grub pa'o/ /tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag ni grub pa'o/ /gang la ser sna rnam chags pa/ /rnam bcom dri ma med mdzad cing / /
12b1(rgyud 'bum): thugs zhi gnod pa mi mnga' des/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /'dren pa gang zhig 'gro ba rnams/ /thar pa'i lam du 'dzud mdzad cing / /chos rnams thams cad ston pa des/ /
12b2(rgyud 'bum): khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /ston pa rgyug pa rnams kyi rten/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /gang gis bde ba mnga' mdzad des/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /
12b3(rgyud 'bum): skyob pa gang zhig byams pa yi/ /thugs kyis 'gro ba 'di dag kun/ /bu gcig bzhin du rtag bskyangs des/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /gang zhig 'khor bar 'khor ba
12b4(rgyud 'bum): yi/ /sems can kun gyi rten gyur cing / /gling dang dpung gnyen gyur pa des/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /gang zhig chos kun mngon sum gyur/ /gtsang zhing bslu ba mi mnga'
12b5(rgyud 'bum): la/ /gsung gtsang gtsang mar mdzad pa des/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /dpa' bo chen po gang skyes pas/ /phun sum tshogs don 'byor gyur cing / /don grub tshogs kyang grub pa
12b6(rgyud 'bum): des/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /gang zhig skyes pas sa rnams ni/ /nags tshal bcas par rab g.yos shing / /sems can thams cad rab dga' des/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /
12b7(rgyud 'bum): byang chub snying por gang zhig gis/ /sa dag rnam drug g.yos gyur cing / /bdud yid mi bder gyur pa des/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba na/ /'phags pa'i
12b8(rgyud 'bum): bden pa rnam gsung ba/ /thub pa'i snyan pa gang byung des/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /yid 'phrog gang gis mu stegs byed/ /thams cad chos kyis pham mdzad cing / /tshogs kun dbang du
13a1(rgyud 'bum): mdzad pa des/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas khyed la bde legs mdzad/ /brgya byin lhar bcas bde legs dang / /'byung po kun gyi bde legs ni/ /
13a2(rgyud 'bum): khyed la rtag tu sbyin gyur cig /sangs rgyas bsod nams mthu dag dang / /lha rnams kyis ni bsams pa yis/ /khyed kyi don 'dod gang yin pa/ /don de de ring grub gyur cig / rkang gnyis
13a3(rgyud 'bum): khyed cag bde legs shog / rkang bzhi khyed cag bde legs shog /khyed cag lam 'gro bde legs shog /phyir ldog dag kyang bde legs shog /nyin mo bde legs mtshan bde legs/ /
13a4(rgyud 'bum): nyi ma'i gung la'ang bde legs shing / /khyed cag kun du bde legs shog /khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cig /sangs rgyas lha rnams stong dag gis/ /yongs su bskor te gshegs mdzad kyis/ /
13a5(rgyud 'bum): sdang sems ldan pa rnams byer cig /snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams 'khod/ /sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / /dgra bcom slob pa'i bden tshig gis/ /'jig rten mi phan byed pa rnams/ /
13a6(rgyud 'bum): grong khyer 'dir ni gtong gyur cig /sems can kun dang srog chags kun/ /'byung po kun dang khyed cag kun/ /bde ba 'ba' zhig ldan gyur cig /thams cad nad rnams med par shog /kun gyis bzang
13a7(rgyud 'bum): rnams mthong gyur cig / gang yang sdig par ma gyur cig /'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lhags gyur cing / /sa dang bar snang dag la gnas pa rnams/ /skye dgu rnams la rtag tu byams byed shog /
13a8(rgyud 'bum): nyin dang mtshan du chos kyang spyod gyur cig /'phags pa yangs pa'i grong khyer du 'jug pa'i mdo rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan
13b1(rgyud 'bum): la phab pa/ zhus dag / @#/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ mu ni mu ni ma hA mu na ye swA hA/ lan cig bzlas
13b2(rgyud 'bum): brjod byas na bskal pa bye ba brgya phrag brgyad khri'i bar du sdig pa byas pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa shAkya thub pa'i snying po'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// //
13b3(rgyud 'bum): dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'phags pa rnam par snang mdzad 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
13b4(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ ka la ka la/ ki li ki li/ bi ri bi ri/ hu ru hu ru/ bai ro tsa na rasmi sany+tso di te A gats+tsha/
13b5(rgyud 'bum): Ar+ya A kA sha gar+b+ha ma hA kA ru Ni kA pU ra ya ha shA na/ d+hA ra ya bu bish+tsa ya na/ tsa ra tsa ra/ tsi ri tsi ri swA hA/ bton pas 'grub ste/ mtshon cha dang / me dang / chu dang / dug dang / dug sbyar ma dang /
13b6(rgyud 'bum): byad stems rnams kyis mi tshugs so/ /rgyal po dang / chom rkun la sogs pa thams cad kyis glags mi rnyed do/ /gang du bris te bzhag pa der yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'go ba'i nad thams cad mi
13b7(rgyud 'bum): 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// //
13b8(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thaMd la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal ba'i bla mas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bac+do~Ms rgyal ba'i bla ma'i
14a1(rgyud 'bum): gzungs sngags kyi gzhi 'di gang gis bzung bas chos thams cad bzung ba dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /mi khom pa brgyad las 'das par 'gyur ro/ /tshe rabs thams cad du yang gnod
14a2(rgyud 'bum): sbyin de la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar byed la de la nad thams cad kyis 'jigs pa med do/ /s+yAd+ya the daM/ bu bu/ dza yot+ta ra/ bo d+ha ni bo d+ha ni/ saM bo d+ha ni/
14a3(rgyud 'bum): ma hA saM bo d+ha ni/ a d+hi sam+bo d+ha ni/ ha la ha la ha la/ hi li hi li hi li/ hu lu hu lu hu lu/ sarba bud+d+ha/ d+harmA ba bo d+hi ni/ s+phu Ta s+phu Ta s+phu Ta ni/ sarba pA pa ni/ bud+d+ha/
14a4(rgyud 'bum): a d+hiSh+ThA ni na swA hA/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rgyal ba'i bla ma'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// // @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sarba karma A ba ra Na bi sho d+ha ni nA ma d+hA rA NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags
14a5(rgyud 'bum): pa las kyi sgrib pa thaMd rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ bac+do~Ms mi 'khrugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ oM ka~M ka ni ka~M` ka ni/ ro tsa ni ro tsa ni/ tro Ta ni tro Ta ni/
14a6(rgyud 'bum): trA sa ni trA sa ni/ pra ti ha na pra ti ha na/ sarba karma pa ra~M pa rA Ni me swAhA/ gzungs sngags 'di'i cho ga ni/ 'di yin te/ rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na/ las gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad
14a7(rgyud 'bum): rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /dus gsum du bzlas brjod byas na/ mtshams med pa lnga yang byang bar 'gyur ro/ /lan gcig bzlas brjod byas na/ ltas ngan pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / bkra mi
14a8(rgyud 'bum): shis pa rnams med par 'gyur ro/ /lus la 'chang ngam/ glegs bam la bris nas mgul du thogs te 'chang na/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba rnams gtan du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /
14b1(rgyud 'bum): gang zhig snying rjes non te ri dwags dang / bya dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa rnams kyang rung ste 'chi ba'i rna khung du brjod na/ de ngan song du 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/ /yang na shi ste dus las 'das na shi 'phos
14b2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i ming nas smos te de'i phyir byams pa dang snying rjes lan brgya'am/ stong ngam/ 'bum brjod na/ sems can de sems can dmyal bar skyes su zin kyang de'i mod la thar par 'gyur ro/ /sa'am/ til lam/
14b3(rgyud 'bum): yungs kar ram/ chu gang yang rung ba la bzlas brjod byas te shi ba'i lus la gtor ram/ khrus byas nas de'i 'og tu bsregs pa'am/ yang na mchod rten gyi nang du bcug ste bzhag la/ rig sngags kyang bris
14b4(rgyud 'bum): nas mgo la btags na/ de ngan song du skyes pa yang zhag bdun gyis gdon mi za bar thar te bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ba'am/ yang na rang gi smon lam gyi dbang gis skye bar 'gyur ro/ /
14b5(rgyud 'bum): gang zhig zla ba nya ba'i tshe khrus byas la gtsang mar byas te dus gsum du gos brje zhing kha zas mi za ba'am/ yang na kha zas dkar bag bza' zhing / sku gdung dang ldan pa'i mchod rten bskor bzhin du gang gi ming
14b6(rgyud 'bum): dang ldan pas lan 'bum bzlas brjod byas na/ de ngan song nas thar te gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i ris su skyes nas sgrub pa po'i thad du 'ongs te mchod par byed cing lus kyang ston la/ legs so zhes bya ba yang byin nas
14b7(rgyud 'bum): lan gsum bskor ba byas te mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i ming bris la gzungs sngags bzlas brjod byed cing mchod rten 'bum byas la/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan la sogs pas legs
14b8(rgyud 'bum): par mchod nas rgya mtsho chen po dang / yang na chu klung du btang na/ des sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa nas thar par 'gyur ro/ /yang na de ltar mchod pa byas nas mjug tu lam gyi bzhi mdor mchod rten chen
15a1(rgyud 'bum): po byas te gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan la sogs pas legs par mchod la/ 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la yang mchod ston gsol nas yon yang phul te legs par
15a2(rgyud 'bum): mchod nas che ge mo zhig gi dge ba'i rtsa bar gyur cig / 'di kho nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye bar gyur cig / ces kyang shes par byas na/ de kho na bzhin du skyes nas lus kyang ston cing legs
15a3(rgyud 'bum): so zhes bya ba yang byin nas mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /mtshams med pa lnga byed byed pa'am/ dam pa'i chos spong ba'am/ 'phags pa la skur pa btab pa yang rung ste 'chi gar rtsig pa la gzungs sngags
15a4(rgyud 'bum): 'di bris pa mthong na yang de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad zad par 'gyur na/ 'don pa dang / bzlas brjod byas pa lta ci smos/ de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid byon nas 'di skad du rigs kyi bu tshur nga'i gan du shog ces kyang
15a5(rgyud 'bum): gsung bar 'gyuro/ /'phags pa las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// // sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge 'dun la phyag
15a6(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ de rnams la phyag 'tshal nas rig pa 'di 'dzin gyis/ /rig pa 'di bdag
15a7(rgyud 'bum): la grub par gyur cig tad+ya thA/ ha na ha na sA ni/ na pa sA ni/ dz+wa la dz+wa la ne/ tsa la tsa la ne/ purba yo ga ma nu smar phaT/ ma hA ha ta ya swA hA/ gang gi rigs pa 'di bklags pa de tshe rabs brgya stong du skye
15a8(rgyud 'bum): ba dran par 'gyur ro/ /'di nas shi phos nas kyang bde ldan kyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /bde ldan gyi snying po rdzogs s+ho// // @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya bud+d+ha hr-i da ya nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/
15b1(rgyud 'bum): 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgya mtsho'i
15b2(rgyud 'bum): 'gram gyi skyed mos tshal na sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul gyi shing ljon pa kun nas seng ge'i khri la bzhugs te/ lha'i 'khor gyis kun nas bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te chos ston to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang
15b3(rgyud 'bum): phyug chen po dka' thub bzang po la sogs pa gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams la bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad do/ /de bzhin gsheg+sa
15b4(rgyud 'bum): pa phyi ma'i dus na/ 'khor bzhi bsdu ba dang / rjes su gzung ba dang / kun tu rjes su gzung ba dang / khyad par du 'gro bar bya ba dang / don thams cad dang / chos thams cad dang ldan pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /
15b5(rgyud 'bum): theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams rnam pa thams cad du khyad par thob par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs ston to/ /'chang ngo / /
15b6(rgyud 'bum): de khyed kyi zung la da ltar dang nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas phyi ma'i dus na theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i 'khor rnam pa bzhi rnams la ston cig /shod cig /yal bar mi dor bar nges
15b7(rgyud 'bum): par bstan par bya/ bsgrag par bya'o/ /ji tsam du phongs par gyur pa rnams dang / sgrib pa dang ldan pa rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung bskyang zhing nges par bstan par bya/ bsgrag par
15b8(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bgyi ste/ de bzhin gshegs pas ji skad bka' stsal pa de bzhin du 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' bzhin 'di nan tan gyis yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/ /
16a1(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs gang zhe na/ tad+ya thA/ a ma le/ nirma le/ sarba A kA ra aR+tha pa ri
16a2(rgyud 'bum): prAp+te/ a sa man+ta sarba ku na A kA re t+r+ya d+h+wa/ a sa~M ga a nA brI te/ sa man+ta da sha di sha /pa ri pUr+Na dz+nyA ne/ sarba a saM ga daR+sha na prAp+te/ sarba d+harma ma bi sha ta pa ri pUr+Ne/ sarba A kA ra/ a sa~M ga sa ma
16a3(rgyud 'bum): n+wi te/ sa man+ta a pra ti ha ta dze t+r+ya d+h+wa da sha su/ di k+Shu pa ri prAp+ta ar+the/ shAn+ta/ pra shAn+ta/ u pa shAn+ta/ sa ma shAn+ta/ bi mo k+Sha a nu prAp+te/ su pra ti bud+d+hA d+harma d+hA tu/ a t+yan+ta su ni sri te/ sarba A kA ra ni
16a4(rgyud 'bum): sa sa rA Na/ a na ba she Sha pA rang+ga te/ bi pra muk+ta/ a saM yo ga /bi pra yo gas+thi te d+harma te/ ga ga na sa ma/ pra krI ti pa ri shud+d+ha/ nirma le/ a sa man+ta/ t+r+ya d+h+wa a nu ga ta/ su prAp+te pUrbAn+ta/ a pa ran+ta/
16a5(rgyud 'bum): ma d+h+ya t+r+ya d+h+wa sa man+ta a nu prAp+te/ a na ba she Sha/ pa ri dz+nyA pra ha na/ b+ha ba na/ sa k+ShAd kri ya pa ra ma pa rang+ga te/ ya thA bA di ta thA kA ri/ sarba A kA ra sam pan+ne/ sarba A kA ra ma hA/ mai tri ma hA ka ru NA/ sarba A kA rA
16a6(rgyud 'bum): sa ma sa gra ha a nu prA p+te/ lha'i bu dag 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs te/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i 'khor bzhi po las rigs kyi bu'am/
16a7(rgyud 'bum): rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis lus la thogs sam/ legs par kha ton du byas te 'dzin pa des dman pa'i sems su mi bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa ji lta ba bzhin du de dag gi spyi gtsug gi
16a8(rgyud 'bum): steng gi mtshams su gnas par 'gyur ro/ /kha cig ni nges par sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /kha cig ni thos par 'gyur/ kha cig ni chos ston par 'gyur/ kha cig ni gzungs mi brjed
16b1(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ slob pa lam la gnas pa rnams ni lam gyi rgyun mi 'chad cing chos ston pa rgyun mi 'chad par 'gyur/ kun tu 'dzin pa mi brjed par yang 'gyur/ skye ba gcig gis thogs pa
16b2(rgyud 'bum): grub par 'gyur/ de dag dang ldan na thos pa rgya mtsho thams cad kyi gzungs thob par 'gyur/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ba nas sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa sgrib pa med pa dang /
16b3(rgyud 'bum): yongs su rdzogs pa'i bar du rjes su thob par 'gyur ro/ /khyed kyis tshe 'di la nga'i bstan pa'i dgongs pa khong du chud par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag la yang nges par
16b4(rgyud 'bum): bstan par bya zhing bsgrag par bya'o/ /yal bar mi 'dor/ phyi bshol mi bya/ brjed par mi bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi
16b5(rgyud 'bum): snying po zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di slad ma'i dus na 'khor bzhi rnams la phyi bshol ma mchis pa dang / mi bskyud par bstan par bgyi/ bshad par bgyi'o/ /
16b6(rgyud 'bum): rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag la yang nges par bstan par bgyi zhing bsgrag par bgyi'o/ /de na de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' lung dang mthun par 'gyur/ bdag cag gis
16b7(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung bar 'gyur/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag la yang don chen po dang phan pa'i dngos po chen por 'gyur lags so/ /
16b8(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag de'i phyir ji skad smras pa de bzhin gyis shig /'di ni khyed la rjes su bstan pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/
17a1(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug chen po dka' thub bzang po la sogs pa gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon
17a2(rgyud 'bum): par bstod do/ /'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes
17a3(rgyud 'bum): sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa/ / @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya bud d+ha hr-i da ya nA ma d+hA ra NI d+harma bi par+yA ya/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa
17a4(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/
17a5(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul chos kyi dbye/ dgon pa rin po che bkod pa'i 'khor gyi khyams/ ye shes kyi rnam par dpyad pa/ sngon gyi sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ sems can
17a6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyis mngon par bstod pa/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i gnas/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su spyod pa kun nas 'od kyi khang bzangs kyi dbus na byang chub sems
17a7(rgyud 'bum): dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams tha dad pa nas lung bstan pa/ thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams tha dad pa nas 'dus pa/ thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi rgyal po'i
17a8(rgyud 'bum): sras/ thams cad kyang gzungs dang ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs thob pa sha stag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas thabs cig tu bzhugs te chos ston to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems
17b1(rgyud 'bum): dpa'i 'khor rgya chen po la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / lha dang mi'i skye bo phal po che'i don dang / phan pa
17b2(rgyud 'bum): dang / bde ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis gsungs pa sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs yod do/ /rigs kyi
17b3(rgyud 'bum): bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ngam/ 'dzin tam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag
17b4(rgyud 'bum): par rab tu ston tam/ dad dam/ lhag pa'i bsams pas mos par byed na/ de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur/ chos thams cad 'dzin pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/
17b5(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa la lta ba dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ chos nyan pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ dge 'dun la rim gro byed
17b6(rgyud 'bum): pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ bskal pa stong du 'khor ba'i srid pa'i rgya mtsho phyir bsnyil bar 'gyur/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du tshe rabs dran
17b7(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ de la 'byung po'i tshogs thams cad bsrung bar 'gyur/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang /
17b8(rgyud 'bum): dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa thams cad dga' bar 'gyur/ de'i lus la nad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur/ pha rol gyi gnod pas 'chi ba'i dus
18a1(rgyud 'bum): byed par mi 'gyur/ chad pa spang ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / dug gzhil bas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ de la bdud sdig can gyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur/ bdud kyi ris
18a2(rgyud 'bum): kyi lha rnams kyis skabs rnyed par mi 'gyur te/ gang du yid la byas pa der bdud kyi ris kyi lha de dag thams cad skrag cing dngangs la dngangs par 'gyur zhing phyogs bcur 'bros par 'gyur ro/ /de la 'di dag
18a3(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas kyi tshig go/ sangs rgyas kyi tshig chen po'o/ /sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i tshig chen po'o/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshig go/ de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd kyi tshig yin no/ /
18a4(rgyud 'bum): tad+ya thA/ bu d+d+he/ su bu d+d+he/ ma hA bu d+d+he/ i ha bu d+d+he/ tad tra bu d+d+he/ bu d+he/ bu d+he/ bu d+he/ bu d+he/ ma ti/ bu d+he/ sarba bud d+ha/ a nu ma te/ sarba bud+d+ha/ a nu dz+nyA na te/ bud+h+ha/ bud+d+h+ha/ bud+h+ha/ bud+d+ha/
18a5(rgyud 'bum): bud+d+ha/ bud+d+ha/ bud+d+ha/ bud+d+h+ha/ bud+d+ha/ bud+d+ha/ sangs rgyas kyi yul mtha' yas te/ chos bstan pa yang mtha' yas mod kyi/ gcig tu yid la bya ba ni mdor na chos sgom pa'o/ /gzungs 'di
18a6(rgyud 'bum): ni sems can rnams la thugs brtse ba'i phyir sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa ste/ chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya yin no/ /tad+ya thA/ shud+d+he/ su shud+d+he/ su shud+d+he/ shod+d+ha ni/ sang shod+d+ha ni/ sang+shod+d+ha ni/ nirma le
18a7(rgyud 'bum): ma la a ba ga te/ ga te sa mA ti tran+ti/ kra me sa ma sa re/ sa rA sa ra pa ri a sho ke/ bi sho ka /sho ka sha ma ni/ shAn+te/ a nu pa shAn+te/ pra shAn+te/ a ba b+hA se/ sarba pu N+ye pa ri ma ti te/ sarba d+d+harma pra ti
18a8(rgyud 'bum): man+ti te/ ha ra ha ra/ ma la hA ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ sa~M tsa ra/ tsa la tsa la/ sa~M tsa la/ ta la ta la/ ma ta la/ sa ma ta la/ ri Ne ri Ne/ su ri Ne/ sa ma ri Ne/ ri Ne ma ti lo ka d+ha rai/ lo ka d+ha re Ne/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ Da ra Da ra/ ro d+ha ro d+ha/
18b1(rgyud 'bum): ma hA bi dza ya/ bA hi ni/ ha na ha na/ sarba d+d+he/ hri phre shi/ tra si/ sarba dz+nyA pa the/ sarba dz+nyA pA ra mi te/ ma hA pra ti b+hA na sa~M b+hAn+ne/ sa man+ta/ A lo ke bud+d+he/ bi Sha ya/ bud+d+ha/ pra ti maN+Di te/ b+ha ga ba te/ sa ra
18b2(rgyud 'bum): sa ra/ pra sa ra pra sa ra/ bi sa ra bi sa ra/ pra sa ra sarba sho ka a pa ga te swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi snying po'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad ma thag tu ri dang gnas su bcas pa
18b3(rgyud 'bum): dang / tshal rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sa yang g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun du rab tu g.yos so/ /rgya mtsho chen po yang 'khrugs/
18b4(rgyud 'bum): rab tu 'khrugs/ kun tu rab tu 'khrugs so/ /ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyang ldeg cing 'gul to/ /bdud kyi gnas thams cad kyang skrag nas/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams dang / bdud sdig can rnams
18b5(rgyud 'bum): shin tu sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde bar gyur nas nyam thag go/ sems can gang dag sa chen po g.yos par mthong ba de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
18b6(rgyud 'bum): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes ched du brjod pa lan gsum ched du brjod do/ /lha gang dag sangs rgyas la
18b7(rgyud 'bum): mngon par dad pa de dag gis lha'i me tog man dA ra ba dang / man dA ra ba chen pos bcom ldan 'das la gtor/ mngon par gtor nas/ gang dag sangs rgyas la skyabs su dong ba de dag thams cad rab tu dga' ba skyes so/ /
18b8(rgyud 'bum): de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ shAkya seng ge yang dag rdzogs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas skyob pas skad cig yud gang la/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ni snying po yi/ /gzungs 'di dag ni rab tu bshad pa yi/ /skad cig yud der sa
19a1(rgyud 'bum): yang rnam drug g.yos/ /rgya mtsho 'khrugs shing bdud kyi gnas kun kyang / /rab tu g.yos nas bdud kyi ris rnams kyi/ /lha dag rab tu dngangs shing 'khrugs par 'gyur/ /bdud yid
19a2(rgyud 'bum): mi bde sdug bsngal mya ngan non/ /de tshe lha rnams ngo mtshar rab thos nas/ 'jig rten mgon la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ /nam mkhar gnas nas me tog man dA 'thor/ /gang dag sangs rgyas mngon dang
19a3(rgyud 'bum): gzhan rnams kyi/ /se mo do dang do shal spos rnams dang / phye ma dag dang byug pa gos rnams dang / /rgyan dang dpung rgyan dag kyang rab tu 'bul/ /brgyad po 'di dag ni de'i yon tan gyi phan yon gyi rgyan
19a4(rgyud 'bum): du 'gyur ba'o/ /brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa'i rgyan dang / thos pa thams cad yongs su tshol bas mi ngoms pa'i rgyan dang / chos zab mo rnam par nges pa
19a5(rgyud 'bum): rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i rgyan dang / sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin par shes pa'i rgyan dang / ji ltar thos pa dang ji ltar khong du chud pa'i chos rnams la tshul bzhin so sor
19a6(rgyud 'bum): rtog cing dpyod pa'i rgyan dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i rgyan dang / rgyan de yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis thabs la mkhas pa'i
19a7(rgyud 'bum): rgyan dang / gzungs thob pa'i rgyan te/ brgyad po de dag ni de'i yon tan gyi phan yon gyi rgyan du 'gyur ro/ /gzungs 'di rtag par rgyun du yid la bya'o/ /sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o/ /
19a8(rgyud 'bum): gzungs kyi gzhi 'di dag rnams yid la byas na las kyi sgrib pa thams cad yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro/ /pad+ma rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang thob bo/ /nad thams cad dang / na ba thams cad la lag pas byab par
19b1(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ /bzlas brjod kyang dpag tu med par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang /
19b2(rgyud 'bum): lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs
19b3(rgyud 'bum): kyi chos kyi rnam grangs rdzogs so/ / //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar chad kyis kyang
19b4(rgyud 'bum): bcos nas gtan la phab pa/ / @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sarba bud+d+ha ang+ga ba ti nA ma d+hA ra N-I/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sang+yas thaMd kyi yan lag dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/
19b5(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung chen po'i 'gram na 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dang thabs cig
19b6(rgyud 'bum): tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam thos kyi bu la sogs pa rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rgyal po chen po dag skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams la 'jigs
19b7(rgyud 'bum): pa chen po bzhi po 'di dag 'byung ngo / /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rga ba dang / na ba dang / rgud pa dang / 'chi ba'o/ /de la yang 'jigs pa chen po gcig ste/ 'di ltar 'chi bdag gi 'jigs pa chen po
19b8(rgyud 'bum): ste/ brtsam pa med pa/ gnyen po med pa/ rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang ba'o/ /rgyal po chen po dag de la 'jigs pa chen po gcig po de'i gnyen po ngas 'dir brjod par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
20a1(rgyud 'bum): la rgyal po chen po bzhis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gang gi slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis srog rab tu stsal bas/ skye dgu rjes su bzung ba 'di ni deng
20a2(rgyud 'bum): bdag cag gi rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das shar phyogs su thugs mngon du phyogs te bzhugs nas/ se gol gyi sgras de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bskul te/ 'di skad ces de bzhin gshegs
20a3(rgyud 'bum): p a dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang su dag sems can rnams la thugs brtse ba'i slad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de dag bdag
20a4(rgyud 'bum): gi grogs mdzod cig / des na bdag cag 'dir sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs nas sems can thams cad kyi dus ma yin par 'chi ba rab tu bzlog par bgyi'o/ /sngon ma bskor ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo
20a5(rgyud 'bum): gnyis pa yang bskor bar bgyi'o zhes gsungs so/ /de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / steng dang / 'og gi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bskul te/ 'di skad ces de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
20a6(rgyud 'bum): p ar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang su dag sems can rnams la thugs brtse ba'i don du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de dag bdag gis
20a7(rgyud 'bum): grogs mdzod cig ces gsung ngo / /de bzhin du phyogs mtshams rnams su yang 'di skad ces gang gi phyir 'di dag tshe dang / stobs dang / kha dog dang ldan pa yongs su 'grub cing dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs
20a8(rgyud 'bum): pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur bar sangs rgyas thams cad bdag gi grogs mdzod cig ces gsung ngo / /de nas phyogs bcu'i sa'i khams ji snyed sangs rgyas kyi spyan la snang bar gyur pa de snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi
20b1(rgyud 'bum): khams dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis til gyi gang bu bzhin du gang ste/ de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i grogs mdzad par zhal gyis bzhes nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad 'di skad ces
20b2(rgyud 'bum): gsung ngo / /tad+ya thA/ tsa lA tsa lA tsa le/ bi na ti/ swa sti ki/ tsakra/ ang+ga ti/ pra sha man+tu/ sarba ro ga a na tre/ ku na Te ma hA ku na Te/ tsa re tsa re re/ he ma gi ri/ he ma gau ri/ he ma ni shun+ti/ he ma si si/ kau ra be kau ra ba be/ he ku
20b3(rgyud 'bum): ra re/ ku ra re/ ku ma ti/ bi Sha sa ma Ne/ shi Sh+ya bi/ tsa le tsa le/ bi tsa le/ mA bi lam+ba/ hu mu hu mu swA hA/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po ji snyed pa thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang nye bar 'dug nas de dag gis smras
20b4(rgyud 'bum): pa/ hUM hUM si si swA hA/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang
20b5(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /dus ma lags par 'gum pa las bzlog par bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ shwe te shwe te/ le li li/ 'phags skyes pos kyang smras pa/ mA tang+ge mA tang+ge/
20b6(rgyud 'bum): mA tang+gi ni/ shU mA shU mu/ yul 'khor srung gis kyang smras pa/ tsa re tsa re re swA hA/ mig mi bzang gis kyang smras pa/ ba lam+pi pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rgyal po chen po dag gang la la zhig sangs rgyas
20b7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyis gzigs pa'i rig sngags 'di nyin re la lan re 'don na rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de ngan song gsum du 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/ /
20b8(rgyud 'bum): 'dis sems can thams cad kyi srog la phan btags par 'gyur ro/ /gang zhig sems can thams cad kyi don du nyin gcig bzhin du tshig tu 'don pa dang / gang yang 'di klog pa de la dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa med do/ /
21a1(rgyud 'bum): de'i lus la nad ngan pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /chus 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /mes ma yin/ mtshon gyis ma yin/ dug gis ma yin/ lce 'bab pas ma yin no/ /gang na rgyal
21a2(rgyud 'bum): ba'i bu dag rig sngags 'don pa'i sa phyogs de sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dgongs par rig par bya'o/ /yi ger 'dri'am/ /yi ger 'drir 'jug pa des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la
21a3(rgyud 'bum): rim gror bya ba thams cad kyis bsti stang byas par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can rnams la rim gro byed pa ni sangs rgyas la rim gro byed pa yin no zhes de bzhin gshegs pa rnams gsung ba'i phyir ro/ /su zhig gis 'di
21a4(rgyud 'bum): bris nas yan lag la btags na de'i yan lag thams cad bsrung bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang /
21a5(rgyud 'bum): dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yan lag dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// //rgya gar gyi
21a6(rgyud 'bum): mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa/ / @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya dwI da sha bud+d+ha ka~M nA ma ma hA yA
21a7(rgyud 'bum): na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sangs rgyas bcu gnyis pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal
21a8(rgyud 'bum): po'i khab na bya rgod phung po'i ri la dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' ma pham pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' khri nyis stong gi
21b1(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang yang thabs cig go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di
21b2(rgyud 'bum): nas shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brjod du med pa bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mu tig can zhes bya ba yod de/
21b3(rgyud 'bum): de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nam mkha'i dpal dri med rdul sel rab mdzes yon tan gyi tog gi 'od me tog pad+ma bai dUr+ya'i 'od zer rin po che'i gzugs lta bu
21b4(rgyud 'bum): ' i sku dang ldan pa spos mchog dam pas mchod pa sku rnam par spras shing legs par brgyan pa gtsug tor gyi gtsug nas nyi ma'i 'od zer dpag med zla 'od smon lam gyis brgyan pa rab sprul bkod pa chen po chos kyi dbyings
21b5(rgyud 'bum): las mngon 'phags chags med rin chen rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/ /su rgyal ba de'i mtshan 'dzin pa de bskal pa chen po 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi bskal
21b6(rgyud 'bum): par 'khor ba las ldog go/ des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dra ba med ces bya ba lung bstan te/ de de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nam mkha'i dpal dri
21b7(rgyud 'bum): m ed rdul sel rab mdzes yon tan gyi tog gi 'od me tog pad+ma bai dUr+ya'i 'od zer rin po che'i gzugs lta bu'i sku dang ldan pa spos mchog dam pas mchod pa sku rnam par spras shing legs par brgyan pa gtsug
21b8(rgyud 'bum): t or gyi gtsug nas nyi ma'i 'od zer dpag med zla 'od smon lam gyis brgyan pa rab sprul bkod pa chen po chos kyi dbyings las mngon 'phags chags med rin chen rgyal po de yongs su mya ngan las 'das
22a1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i dam pa'i chos nub ma thag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
22a2(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas
22a3(rgyud 'bum): b com ldan 'das chu lha gzhon nu nyi ma'i sgron ma zla ba'i me tog pad+ma gser sdug nam mkha' lta bu'i sku ldan rnam par snang mdzad 'od zer rab brgyan thogs med 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor phyogs bcur 'od
22a4(rgyud 'bum): zer rab 'byin 'jig rten khams kun snang byed tog gi rgyal mtshan rgyal po zhes bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /shar phyogs de nyid kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
22a5(rgyud 'bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bkod pa thams cad dri med 'od ces bya ba'i mtshan yang gzung ngo / /tshig 'don to/ /phyag bya'o/ /lho phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
22a6(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spobs pa'i rgyan la dgongs pa zhes bya ba'i mtshan yang gzung ngo / /yid la bya'o/ /nub phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dri med zla ba'i tog gi rgyal po grags ldan zhes bya
22a7(rgyud 'bum): ba'i mtshan yang gzung ngo / /phyag bya'o/ /byang phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa me tog gi bkod pa snang bar mdzad pa zhes bya ba'i mtshan yang gzung ngo / /phyag bya'o/ /shar lho'i phyogs mtshams
22a8(rgyud 'bum): kyi de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mdzad ces bya ba'i mtshan yang gzung ngo / /phyag kyang bya'o/ /lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mchog gi tog grags ldan zhes bya ba'i mtshan yang gzung
22b1(rgyud 'bum): ngo / /phyag bya'o/ /nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs med rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba'i mtshan yang gzung ngo / /phyag bya'o/ /byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi de
22b2(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs bral bag tsha mi mnga' spu zing mi byed ces bya ba'i mtshan yang gzung ngo / /phyag bya'o/ /'og gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge bsgyings pa'i mid pa zhes bya ba'i
22b3(rgyud 'bum): mtshan yang gzung ngo / /phyag bya'o/ /steng gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa gser 'od gzi brjid 'jigs bral rgyal po zhes bya ba'i mtshan yang gzung ngo / /phyag bya'o/ /byams pa dad pa'i rigs
22b4(rgyud 'bum): kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcu gnyis po 'di dag gi mtshan brjod la nyi ma bcur sdig pa thams cad kyi nyes pa bshags par bya/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la rjes su yi rang bar bya/
22b5(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas thams cad la bskul ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad la gsol ba gdab pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad chos kyi dbyings su yongs su bsngo bas yongs su bsngo bar bya'o/ /'on kyang sdig
22b6(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad zad par 'gyur ro/ /las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par byang bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i 'og tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / mi 'jigs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / mtshan phun sum
22b7(rgyud 'bum): tshogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun phun sum tshogs pa dang / gzungs phun sum tshogs pa yang 'thob bo/ /ting nge 'dzin phun sum tshogs pa yang 'thob bo/ /bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin sangs rgyas
22b8(rgyud 'bum): kyi zhing yongs su dag pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen phun sum tshogs pa'ang myur du yongs su 'dzin to/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las nyams par mi 'gyur zhing
23a1(rgyud 'bum): yongs su nyams par yang mi 'gyur ro/ /'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe na'ang kun du mdzes pa dang / de'i longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa dang / rigs phun sum tshogs pa dang / skye ba phun sum tshogs
23a2(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / rus phun sum tshogs pa dang / gzugs phun sum tshogs pa dang / ris 'dra ba'i skye bo'i 'khor phun sum tshogs pa'ang yongs su 'dzin to/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gang dang gang du
23a3(rgyud 'bum): skyes pa yi/ /tshe rabs tshe rabs thams cad du/ /mthong na dga' zhing dga' byed dang / /'od byed pa dang mthu chen dang / /'byor pa chen por 'gyur ba yin/ /gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di rnams kyang
23a4(rgyud 'bum): brjod par bya'o/ /tad+ya thA/ a khe ma khe sa man+ta mu khe/ sau ti yuk+te/ ni ruk+te pra b+he/ sa ma yo ge/ tsit+ta tsit+te/ a khe ma khe/ pa da ne/ bi brte/ sa man+ta gu Ni/ sat+yA ra me/ yuk+te pra yuk+te/ hi li mi li/ ma sa le/ A na le/
23a5(rgyud 'bum): tsa me/ a tsi ti/ tso tse/ a ra he/ ba hu ts+tshe/ mA yu gra he/ he ma ba ti/ dz+yo ti ba ti/ d+harma tsi te/ ts+yuta pang ke a bi k+Sha pe ra d+h+rI k+Sha me/ skan+d+ha bi b+hak+te/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
23a6(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di rnams grub par gyur cig /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gzungs 'di dag ni bzung byas na/ /phyogs bcu dag na gang bzhugs pa'i/ /bye ba
23a7(rgyud 'bum): drug cu'i drang srong rnams/ /de dag de la dgongs par 'gyur/ /skye ba dag ni kun du yang / /dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnyed par 'gyur/ /chung zad dge ba gang yin pa/ /don rnams thams cad 'byor par 'gyur/ /pad+ma'i snying por
23a8(rgyud 'bum): bzhugs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni mngon sum mthong / /gzungs 'di dag ni 'dzin byed pa/ /mkhas pa dpal ldan rdzus te skye/ /dran dang blo gros rtogs pa dang / /mos pa shes rab rab tu 'phel/ /thos pa thams cad 'dzin par
23b1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ /thos pa thams cad 'dzin mi nyams/ /'jig rten mgon po 'di dag gi/ /mtshan rnams su zhig rjod byed pa/ /ngan 'gro thams cad spangs nas ni/ /bzang 'gror myur du 'gro bar 'gyur/ /ting nge 'dzin
23b2(rgyud 'bum): dang gzungs kyi mchog / de dag de la mngon par 'gyur/ /byang chub rab tu de 'tshang rgya/ /zhing ni bye ba phrag stong dag /gser gyis bkang ste sbyin byin pas/ /gang zhig de bzhin gshegs rnams kyi/ /
23b3(rgyud 'bum): mtshan rnams 'dzin par byed pa yi/ /bsod nams phung po de ches mang / /rtag tu tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/ /byang chub spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ /mi khom thams cad rnam spangs te/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba rab
23b4(rgyud 'bum): mdzes rnyed/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mnyes par byed/ /dad pa bla na med pa 'thob/ /sangs rgyas rnams la rab dad cing / /mchod pa dam pa byed par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba mnyes byed de/ /
