23b5(rgyud 'bum): mthong nas ston la rab tu dad/ /'jig rten sgron ma mthong nas ni/ /mchod pa bzang po byed par 'gyur/ /mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa/ /bskal pa bye ba grangs med du/ /'khor ba rnam par
23b6(rgyud 'bum): spangs nas su/ /byang chub myur du 'tshang yang rgya/ /nyin zhag bdun du tshang bar ni/ /mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed na/ /gang gis 'dren rnams mthong 'gyur ba'i/ /rgya chen mig ni sbyangs par 'gyur/ /
23b7(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten mgon po de dag gi/ /mtshan rnams mi gang 'dzin byed pa/ /skye ba gang dang gar skye bar/ /de ni phyag bya'i 'os su 'gyur/ /mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa/ /bskal pa bye ba bsam yas su/ /
23b8(rgyud 'bum): bkur sti ma yin thob mi 'gyur/ /'jig rten dag na grags pa 'thob/ /mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa/ /de la bskal pa du mar ni/ /lha rnams bsti stang byed par 'gyur/ /byang chub myur du 'tshang yang rgya/ /
24a1(rgyud 'bum): mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa/ /mos med shes rab 'chal mi 'gyur/ /g.yo dang sgyu ni rnam par spangs/ /rtag tu sangs rgyas rnams kyang mthong / /mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa/ /lha dang dri za
24a2(rgyud 'bum): klu dbang dang / /mkha' lding lha min gsang ba pa/ /rtag tu de la srung bar byed/ /gzugs dang mtshan ni phun sum tshogs/ /nor chen khyim du skye bar 'gyur/ /sems can kun la sbyin par byed/ /dpa' zhing gtong phod
24a3(rgyud 'bum): ser sna med/ /bskal pa bye ba brgya mang por/ /lha yi tsan+dan dmar po dang / /shin tu dri zhim spos kun gyi/ /spos ngad de yi kha nas 'byung / /mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa/ /bskal pa bye bar sgra skad ni/
24a4(rgyud 'bum): tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang ldan par 'gyur/ /rtag tu chos rgyal tshul dang ldan/ /mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa/ /rin chen sna bdun pad+ma'i 'dab/ /bye ba stong phrag mang yod las/ /'byor chen de skye lha
24a5(rgyud 'bum): gzugs ldan/ /mtshan rnams 'di dag su 'dzin pa/ /de ni pha ma spun sdug dang / /skye bo dag gi tshogs rnams dang / /'bral bar 'gyur ba mi mthong ngo / /drang srong chen po rnams kyi mtshan/ /bud med kyis ni
24a6(rgyud 'bum): gzung byas na/ /bud med lus la ma chags nas/ /skyes pa blo gros ldan par 'gyur/ /mi yi lus ni thob gyur nas/ /bla med byang chub thob 'gyur te/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor nas/ /'dod pa ji bzhin
24a7(rgyud 'bum): mya ngan 'da'/ /mtshan rnams 'di dag su 'dzin pa/ /de yi lus la mtshon dang ni/ /dug dang me dang rgyal po dang / /g.yon can rnams kyis mi tshugs so/ /mtshan rnams 'di dag su 'dzin pa/ /de yi sems
24a8(rgyud 'bum): la nam yang ni/ /dpung dang bzhon par bcas pa yi/ /bdud kyis glags rnyed mi 'gyur ro/ /'di dag gi ni mtshan gyi rnams/ /mi gang 'dzin par byed pa de/ /zhing ni bye ba bsam yas par/ /nam mkha' las
24b1(rgyud 'bum): ni 'gro bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa rnams mchod nas/ /'jigs pa med par zhu ba zhu/ /de dag de yi bsam mkhyen nas/ /rgyal ba de dag lung ston 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas mgon po de dag las/ /lung bstan pa
24b2(rgyud 'bum): pa ni thob gyur nas/ /de ni shin tu yi rangs te/ /rgyal ba'i bstan la the tsom med/ /mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa/ /'jig rten mgon po rnams las ni/ /zab mo'i chos ni thos 'gyur te/ /thos nas thams cad 'dzin par 'gyur/ /
24b3(rgyud 'bum): de nas pha rol phyin pa dang / /mi 'jigs pa dang stobs rnams dang / /mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po rnams/ /ma lus par ni rdzogs par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas de dag rnams kyi ni/ /gang gi zhing du 'dod gyur pa/ /der ni bla med yang dag rdzogs/ /byang
24b4(rgyud 'bum): chub rtogs nas 'tshang rgyar 'gyur/ /skyes pa 'am ni bud med gang / /mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin pa yi/ /yon tan 'di dang gzhan dag kyang / /sangs rgyas bskal par rgyun du gsung / /bag yod ldan par gyur nas ni/ /yon tan phun sum 'di
24b5(rgyud 'bum): thos nas/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas grags ldan pa/ /de dag mtshan rnams 'dzin par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas 'di dag dpal snying po/ /sprin gyi rgyal po mi yi mchog /'jig rten mgon po 'di dag gi/ /mtshan ni bskal par gang nyan
24b6(rgyud 'bum): dang / /gang dag 'di rnams mtshan nyan cing / /thos nas gus par byed 'gyur ba/ /de dang de dag shes rab che/ /rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog tu 'gyur/ /drang srong chen po de dag gi/ /'di 'dra'i mtshan dag thos gyur nas/ /bag yod ldan
24b7(rgyud 'bum): zhing mkhas gyur la/ /shes rab ldan pa su mi 'dzin/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / dge slong de dag dang /
24b8(rgyud 'bum): thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa sangs rgyas bcu gnyis pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs
25a1(rgyud 'bum): s+ho/ / //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa/ / @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sap+ta
25a2(rgyud 'bum): bud d+ha ka~M nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sangs rgyas bdun pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/
25a3(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das ti se'i ri'i rtse mo lha'i gnas na drang srong gi spyod pa dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
25a4(rgyud 'bum): dpa' chen po byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po dang / kun tu bzang po dang / mtha' yas me tog dang / kun nas me tog dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig gis
25a5(rgyud 'bum): thogs pa sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ri'i rtse mo'i nags khrod de nyid na dge slong zhig 'byung pos zin nas brdol zhing gcer bu gos med pa lag pa sgreng ste ngu zhing 'dug pa gzigs so/ /
25a6(rgyud 'bum): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying pos bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di
25a7(rgyud 'bum): skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i dkyil na kyi hud ces sgra 'byin pa 'di dang / dge slong gcer bu gos ma mchis la lag pa bstod pa cig shos 'di yang su zhig lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems
25a8(rgyud 'bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /nam mkha'i snying po 'di ni nad kyis btab pa yin no/ /cig shos 'di yang nad kyis btab pa yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
25b1(rgyud 'bum): la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa dang / 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i rig sngags bcom ldan 'das kyis
25b2(rgyud 'bum): bstan du gsol/ bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas sprul pa mdzad de/ de nas nam mkha' la de bzhin gshegs pa drug byung ngo / /bdun pa ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya
25b3(rgyud 'bum): thub pa'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang
25b4(rgyud 'bum): sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /na mo bud d+hA ya/ na mo d+harmA ya/ na maHsa~M g+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ u0f00 ha la ha la/ hi la hi lA ya/ na mo dza ga na mi tsa nA ya/ na mo na maHswA hA/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs
25b5(rgyud 'bum): kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /nam mkha'i snying po gang la la zhig rig sngags 'di 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed na/
25b6(rgyud 'bum): de'i lus la mtshon gyis mi tshugs/ chu dang me'i sdug bsngal ba'i nad kyis 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /dus ma yin pa'i 'chi bas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /de dug zos kyang zas
25b7(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du 'gyur ro/ /zas dang skom la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te zos na pha rol gyi gnod pa mi 'byung ngo / /nad thams cad kyis btab par mi 'gyur ro/ /ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /
25b8(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi gzugs mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /mtshon btab pa'i rna bar bzlas brjod byas la sna ma'i mar sbyin no/ /mdze dang skrangs nad kyis btab pa rnams la sna ma'i mar dang / ut+pa la sngon po dang /
26a1(rgyud 'bum): shu ti dang / nye'u shing pa rnams bsres pa'i mar byin na nad thams cad sos par 'gyur ro/ /las thams cad la yang sbyar bar bya'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug tor can steng gi nam mkha'
26a2(rgyud 'bum): la bzhugs te/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /na mo bud d+hA ya/ na mo d+harmA ya/ na maHsa~M g+hA
26a3(rgyud 'bum): ya/ pa tsa pa tsa pa tsA ya pa tsA ya/ sarba b+hu tA nA~M/ tsin+tA ya/ kI lA ya/ ba ra bid+yA nA~M swA hA/ nam mkha'i snying po sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / bsgom nyes pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa
26a4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad bzlog pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba dgag pa'i phyir sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas gsungs shing ngas kyang da ltar bshad pa'i snying po 'di zung shig nam mkha'i snying po gang la la
26a5(rgyud 'bum): zhig nga'i snying po 'di nyin lan gsum yid la byed na/ de la pha rol gyi gnod pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam na de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /
26a6(rgyud 'bum): gshis ngan du 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro/ /'di nas shi 'phos nas de bzhin gshegs pa dang phrad par 'gyur zhing mnyes par byed par 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'di'i cho ga gzhan ni nad thams cad la skud pas bcing bar bya'o/ /
26a7(rgyud 'bum): 'dus pa las gyur pa la sna ma'i mar la bzlas brjod byas te sbyin no/ /chus phyogs bcing bar bya'o/ /skud pas bdag bsrung ngo / /byis pa rnams kyi gdon dag la skud pa sngon po gdags so/ /mtshon
26a8(rgyud 'bum): btab pa'i rna bar lan bdun bzlas brjod bya'o/ /gzhan dag la yang rang gi blos sbyar bar bya'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyob steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i
26b1(rgyud 'bum): don dang nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /na mo bud d+hA ya/ na mo d+harmA ya/ na maHsa~M g+hA ya/ u0f00 ka la ka la/
26b2(rgyud 'bum): ki li ki li/ ku lu ku lu/ ku lod sA d+ha nA nA~M/ ku ru sarba gra hA NA~M swA hA/ nam mkha'i snying po gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni bskal pa bzang po'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang /
26b3(rgyud 'bum): da ltar byung ba thams cad kyis gsungs shing ngas kyang da ltar bshad pa ste/ nam mkha'i snying po khyod kyis gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag zung shig /gang la la zhig 'dzin tam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed na
26b4(rgyud 'bum): de'i lus la mtshon gyis mi tshugs/ dug gis mi tshugs/ dbyig dug gis mi tshugs/ rims nad kyis mi 'debs shing / chu dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang / gshis ngan du 'chi bar mi
26b5(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur te/ sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa rnams ni ma gtogs so/ /dge slong ngam dge slong ma'am dge bsnyen nam / dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig nang par langs nas mgo bkrus te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar lan brgya
26b6(rgyud 'bum): rtsa brgyad brjod na/ de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro/ /de la sems can sdang ba gang dag rgyal po rnams thog mar smra bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad de'i dbang du 'gyur ro/ /'jigs pa thams cad kyi nang du yid
26b7(rgyud 'bum): la bya'o/ /'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad du skud pa dkar po gdags so/ /mig nad la shing 'o ma can las skud pa byas te rna ba la gdags so/ /dmag rengs par byed par 'dod pas zho dang /
26b8(rgyud 'bum): sbrang rtsi la btags pa'i 'bras yos la lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o/ /rA dzA nA~M rA dzA mA tram+bA ba shI ka ro tu kA me na/ 'o ma can gyi shing gi sbar shing gis me bus la bsreg bya til dag lan stong sbyin sreg bya'o/ /
27a1(rgyud 'bum): bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi sgrib pa thams cad dang / sdig pa sbyang zhing dpal chen po dang / nor gyi phung po chen po bsgrub par 'dod na 'o ma can gyi shing gi sbar shing gis me bus la bsreg bya til
27a2(rgyud 'bum): dag lan stong sbyin sreg bya'o/ /sdig pa ji snyed pa thams cad sbyang bar 'dod pa dang / rig sngags thams cad 'grub par 'dod pa dang / bdag bkru bar 'dod pas shu ti dang / na la dang / khre dang / shi ri sha dang / rgya spos dang / gur gum
27a3(rgyud 'bum): dang / gla sgang dang / in dra ba ru na dang / byang chub kyi shing dang / a mra'i mgo thogs dang / 'di rnams kyis bkru bar bya ste/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bya zhing bum pa sar pa bzhag ste/ zla ba nya la
27a4(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyi spyan sngar snying pos lan stong rtsa brgyad bsngags la khrus bya'o/ /dug mi gdug par byed par 'dod pas sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar seng ldeng gi thur ma ba'i lci bar smyugs pa brgya rtsa brgyad ming
27a5(rgyud 'bum): nas smos te sbyin sreg byas na dug mi gdug par 'gyur ro/ /gdon dang / srung ba dang / 'byung po la sogs pa'i las thams cad la yang sbyar bar byas na bde bar gnas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa log par
27a6(rgyud 'bum): dad sel steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /na mo bud d+hA ya/ na mo
27a7(rgyud 'bum): d+harmA ya/ na maHsa~M g+hA ya/ na maHkra ku ts+tshan+dA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ a ra ha te sa~M myak+sa~M bud d+hA ya/ u0f00 ka Ta ka Ta/ ka Tha ka Tha/ ki Ti ki Ti/ ki Thi ki Thi/ ki TA pa ya na maHswA hA/ nam mkha'i snying po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
27a8(rgyud 'bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas log par dad sel ces bya ba gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gis gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba'i snying po 'di khyod kyis zung shig / blangs shing bzung ste kun chub par
27b1(rgyud 'bum): byas na phyi ma'i tshe dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dag de'i tshe dkon mchog gsum la dad pa rnyed nas khrus byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dag gis mchod pa
27b2(rgyud 'bum): byas nas gsang sngags 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod 'byor par 'gyur te/ tshe rabs bdun du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/ /lha rnams kyi nang du lha'i che ba nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ /yang na mi rnams kyi nang du 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur
27b3(rgyud 'bum): ro/ /yang na cho ga bzhin du bsgrubs na de mir skye ba tha ma thob par 'gyur te/ 'di nas shi 'phos nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe 'di la yang rtag tu brjod na nad thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /thos pa 'dzin
27b4(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ /zas dang skom gyi rnam pa la lan bdun sngags te zos 'thung na nad thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /ji ste skom zhu bar 'dod na bza' thams cad la lan stong rtsa brgyad kyis bkru bar bya'o/ /lhog rgal bcad na zangs
27b5(rgyud 'bum): khab kyis bya'o/ /'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / bcings pa thams cad las thar bar bya na lan bdun bzlas brjod byed na rtag tu nor yang 'phel bar 'gyur/ bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad las kyang thar bar 'gyur ro/ /ci ste de bzhin
27b6(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa mthong bar 'dod na des phyogs gtsang mar 'jig rten gyi 'khor sar dkyil 'khor bskus la a ga rus bdugs te/ lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/ de'i drung du sngas shar phyogs su
27b7(rgyud 'bum): bstan te nyal na de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /yid la ci snos pa de thams cad ston to/ /tshe'am stobs sam/ pham rgyal thams cad kyang ston to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gser thub steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/
27b8(rgyud 'bum): sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir/ gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /na mo bud d+hA ya/ na mo d+harmA ya/ na maHsa~M g+hA ya/ na maHka na ka mu
28a1(rgyud 'bum): na ye/ ta thA ga tA ya/ a ra ha te sa~M myak+sa~M bud d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ u0f00 sa ra sa ra/ sa ra sa ra/ si ri si ri/ si ri si ri/ si rA ya/ d+ha ma d+ha ma/ d+ha ma d+ha ma/ d+hu ma d+hu ma/ d+hu ma d+hu mA ya na mo na maHka na ka mu na ye/ ta thA ga tA ya/
28a2(rgyud 'bum): a ra ha te sa~M myak+sa~M bud d+he swA hA/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gser thub kyis byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /nam mkha'i snying po gang la la zhig snying po 'di 'dzin
28a3(rgyud 'bum): cing rtag tu bzlas brjod byed pa de la mtshon gyis 'jigs pa mi 'byung / me dang / chu dang / lce 'bab pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ dug thams cad kyang zas dang 'dra bar thub par 'gyur/ dus ma yin
28a4(rgyud 'bum): par 'chi bas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ gshis ngan du 'chi bar mi 'gyur/ tshe ring bar 'gyur/ longs spyod che bar 'gyur/ rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa dang phrad par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs
28a5(rgyud 'bum): pas byin gyis brlab par 'gyur ro/ /dus gsum du bzlas brjod byas na sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro/ /ji ste pha rol nad las thar bar byed par 'dod na ci nus su gtor ma gtong zhing pog gam/ a ku
28a6(rgyud 'bum): ru'i bdug pas bdugs la bza' thams cad la khrus bya'o/ /mdze dang / skrangs nad dang / mchin skran la shu dag 'jam po btags la sbrang rtsi dang bsres te/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lan stong rtsa brgyad bsngags la
28a7(rgyud 'bum): bskus na mdze nad thams cad sos par 'gyur ro/ /zhag bzhi pa la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar sna ma'i me tog gi phreng ba la lan stong rtsa brgyad bsngags te mi'i mgo la bcing na zhag bzhi pa'i rims sos par 'gyur ro/ /
28a8(rgyud 'bum): mtshon btab pa'i rna bar bzlas brjod byas na/ brjed byed las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /lus srul pos zin pa rnams la sangs rgyas la phul ba'i me tog gis bdug go/ de la sogs pa'i las rnams byed de/ las thams cad pa zhes bya'o/ /
28b1(rgyud 'bum): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag
28b2(rgyud 'bum): bka' stsal to/ /na mo bud d+hA ya/ na mo d+harmA ya/ na maHsa~M g+hA ya/ u0f00 ha ra ha ra/ ha ra ha ra/ ha ha ha/ na maHkA sh+ya pA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ a ra ha te/ sa~M myak+sa~M bud d+hA ya/ sid d+h+yan+tu man+t+ra pA da swA hA/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung
28b3(rgyud 'bum): gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /nam mkha'i snying po snying po 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed dag gis gsungs pa
28b4(rgyud 'bum): ste/ nam mkha'i snying po khyod kyis kyang snying po 'di zung shig kun chub par gyis shig / gang la la zhig 'dzin tam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ nyin mo'am/ mtshan mo lan gsum gsum bzlas brjod byas na mdor na rmi lam
28b5(rgyud 'bum): na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyang byang bar 'gyur te/ sngon gyi las ni ma gtogs so/ /las thams cad la yang sbyar bar bya'o/ /mdze dang / sha gar la sogs pa la sangs rgyas la
28b6(rgyud 'bum): phul ba'i me tog la sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar lan stong rtsa brgyad bsngags te/ bklags shing bkrus na sos par 'gyur ro/ /klad pa na ba la sangs rgyas la phul ba'i me tog sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar bzhag ste/ sangs rgyas
28b7(rgyud 'bum): kyi spyan sngar lan bdun bzlas brjod bya'o/ /thams cad du yang sbyar bar bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don gyi phyir rig sngags 'di dag
28b8(rgyud 'bum): bka' stsal to/ /na mo bud d+hA ya/ na mo d+harmA ya/ na maHsa~M g+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ g+hu me g+hu me/ ma hA g+hu me/ ta le ta le/ ma hA ta le/ tsa le tsa le/ ma hA tsa le/ d+hu re d+hu re/ ma hA d+hu re/ ti ri ti ri/ ma hA ti ri/ ki li ki li/ ma hA ki li/
29a1(rgyud 'bum): tsu ru tsu ru/ ma hA tsu ru/ mi li mi li/ ma hA mi li/ ti li ti li/ ma hA ti li/ d+hu me d+hu me/ ma hA d+hu me/ tsa le tsa le/ ma hA tsa le/ khi ri khi ri/ ma hA khi ri/ tsi li tsi li/ ma hA tsi li swA hA/ de nas bac+do~Ms de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa
29a2(rgyud 'bum): bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /nam mkha'i snying po klad pa'i nad bsal na mtshon dang lag mthil gyis bya'o/ /sprin bzlog na shing ka ra bI ra'i lcug mas
29a3(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ /dug sbyong na chus bya'o/ /las gzhan rnams kyang bya'o/ /khrus kyi cho gas sbyar bar bya'o/ /cho ga thams cad kyis thams cad du sbyar bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
29a4(rgyud 'bum): dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa sangs rgyas bdun pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs s+ho// // @/ /rgya gar skad du/ b+ha ga bAn
29a5(rgyud 'bum): a mi tA bA d+hA ra Ni man tra/ bod skad du/ bcom ldan 'das snang ba mtha' yas kyi gzungs sngags/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snang ba mtha' yas
29a6(rgyud 'bum): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ a mi te/ a mi tod+b+ha be/ a mi ta sa~M b+ha be/ a mi ta bi krAn+ta kA re/ a mi ta ga ga na kIR+ti ka re sarba kle sha k+Sha ya~M ka ri swA hA/ gzungs 'di'i yon tan ni bskal pa brgya stong du bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib
29a7(rgyud 'bum): pa yang 'di lan gsum bzlas brjod byas na sgrib pa de rnams zad par 'gyur ro/ /lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas na rtsa ba bzhi'i ltung ba'ang yongs su byang bar gyur te/ sangs rgyas stong la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun
29a8(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das snang ba mtha' yas rjes su dran pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ ma hI du hi ke swA hA/ lus la nad byung ba dang / nad khong skams su gyur kyang rung ste/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig
29b1(rgyud 'bum): bsngags te/ bsil yab kyis de la g.yabs na nad med par 'gyur ro/ /gzungs sngags de gsungs ma thag tu 'khor thams cad yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /bcom ldan
29b2(rgyud 'bum): 'das snang ba mtha' yas kyi gzungs rdzogs s+ho/ / // bcom ldan 'das snang ba mtha' yas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ a mi te/
29b3(rgyud 'bum): a mi tod+b+ha be/ a mi ta sa~M b+ha be a mi ta bi krAn+ta gA mi nI/ ga ga na kIR+ti ka re/ sarba kle sha k+Sha yang ka ri swA hA/ gzungs 'di'i yon tan ni bskal pa brgya stong du bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa'ang lan gsum bzlas pa
29b4(rgyud 'bum): byas na de rnams zad par rig par bya'o/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bzlas pa byas na/ rtsa ba bzhi'i ltung ba'ang sdig pa yongs su byang bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas stong la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun par yang
29b5(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ /snang ba mtha' yas rjes su dran pa rdzogs s+ho// // zla ba'i 'od de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/
29b6(rgyud 'bum): tsa n+d+re tsa n+d+re/ su tsan+d+ra/ ma ti tsan+d+ra tsan+d+ra ki ra Na/ si ri si ri/ bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+Thi ta/ ki li ki li/ /d+harma a d+hiSh+Thi te/ ki li ki li/ sa~M g+hA a d+hiSh+Thi te swA hA/ rigs kyi bu'am
29b7(rgyud 'bum): rigs kyis bu mo gang gis rtag tu nang par langs te/ zla ba'i 'od de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan dran par byed pa de ni bskal pa bzhi khrir tshe rabs dran par 'gyur te/ de ni ngan song du ltung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /zla ba'i 'od kyi
29b8(rgyud 'bum): mtshan rjes su dran pas yon tan de rnams thob par 'gyur ro/ /zla ba'i 'od kyi mtshan rjes su dran pa rdzogs s+ho// // na maH sarba ta thA ga ta hri da ya/ a nu ga te u0f00 ku ru~M gi ni swA hA/ 'di lan
30a1(rgyud 'bum): gcig bzlas pas kyang bskal pa 'bum phrag brgyad stong du bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa yang zad par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa spyi'i snying po rjes su dran pa rdzogs s+ho// //
30a2(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /na mo rat+na shi khi ne/ ta thA ga tA ya/ a te samyak+sa~M bud d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ rat+ne rat+na shi khi ne swA hA/ 'chi ba'i tshe dran na ngan song kun las
30a3(rgyud 'bum): rnam par grol bar 'gyur/ 'chi 'phos nas kyang sum cu rtsa gsum gnas kyi lhar skye'o/ /sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyi mtshan rjes su dran pa rdzogs s+ho// // @#/ /rgya gar skad du/
30a4(rgyud 'bum): Ar+ya bi ma la nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus
30a5(rgyud 'bum): gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rnam par dag pa la bka' stsal pa/ blo gros rnam
30a6(rgyud 'bum): par dag pa tshul khrims yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go/ blo gros rnam par dag pa ting nge 'dzin yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go/ blo gros rnam par dag pa bzod pa yongs su
30a7(rgyud 'bum): dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go/ blo gros rnam par dag pa phan pa'i dngos po yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go/ blo gros rnam par dag pa byams pa yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs
30a8(rgyud 'bum): pa yongs su dag go/ blo gros rnam par dag pa snying rje yongs su dag pa dang / dga' ba yongs su dag pa dang / btang snyoms yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go/ blo gros rnam par dag pa rnam par grol ba yongs su dag
30b1(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go/ blo gros rnam par dag pa stobs yongs su dag pa dang / mi 'jigs pa yongs su dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos
30b2(rgyud 'bum): yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go/ blo gros rnam par dag pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go/ blo gros rnam par dag pa de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa
30b3(rgyud 'bum): yongs su dag pa la su zhig me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan la sogs pa dang / rol mo'i sgra dang / byug pa rnams kyis bsti stang du byed pa de'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i mtha' rtogs par
30b4(rgyud 'bum): mi nus te/ de'i mtha' ni theg pa gsum po las theg pa gang yang rung bas mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar thug pa ma gtogs par bsod nams kyi phung po de phyi ma'i mthar yang zad par mi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
30b5(rgyud 'bum): blo gros rnam par dag pa ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi tshad med pa de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa la yon phul ba yang tshad med do/ /mtha' yas so/ /bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /
30b6(rgyud 'bum): mtshungs pa med do/ /grangs med do/ /dpag gis mi lang ngo / /brjod du med do/ /blo gros rnam par dag pa su zhig de bzhin gshegs pa da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa la bsti stang du byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / ri mor
30b7(rgyud 'bum): byed pa dang / mchod pa dang / rjed pa dang / phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la su zhig de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam la bsti stang byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / ri mor
30b8(rgyud 'bum): byed pa dang / mchod pa dang / rjed pa dang / yang dag par sems nye bar bzhag ste/ byang chub tu gzhol ba'i sems bskyed pas phyag 'tshal ba dang / phyag byed pa dang / bsti stang byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / ri mor byed pa dang / mchod pa
31a1(rgyud 'bum): dang / rjed pa dang / gsol ba dang / bsngags pa dang / skor ba byed pa des phan yon lngar shes par bya ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / rtogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / ngo tsha shes shing
31a2(rgyud 'bum): khrel yod pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / myur du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'gyur ba dang / mthong nas kyang dad pa skyed par 'gyur ba ste/ phan yon lnga po de dag tu shes par bya'o/ /de nas gzhan yang
31a3(rgyud 'bum): chos bzhir shes par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i tshig so sor 'dzin pa dang / de dag kyang ji skad bstan pa bzhin du bsgrub pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nye bar 'gyur ba
31a4(rgyud 'bum): dang / myur du sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par skye bar 'gyur ba ste/ chos bzhi po de dag yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /blo gros rnam par dag pa byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na bdud dam bdud kyi ris kyi
31a5(rgyud 'bum): lha'i bu rnams kyis mi rdzi bar 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ rigs che ba dang / btsas ma thag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yid la byed pa dang / phyi ma'i dus na dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa dang / rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
31a6(rgyud 'bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis byin gyis brlab par 'gyur ba ste/ blo gros rnam par dag pa byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na bdud dam bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis mi rdzi
31a7(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur ro/ /blo gros rnam par dag pa byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten mthong nas dad pa skyed de/ pus mo gnyis ka'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas phyag 'tshal te/
31a8(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis sku legs par brgyan pa de ci 'dra bar bdag kyang de 'dra ba'i lus thob par gyur cig ces de ltar mos pa bskyed na/ blo gros rnam par dag pa bsod nams kyi phung po
31b1(rgyud 'bum): de'i mtha' brjod par mi nus te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gnas pa'i phyir ro/ /bsod nams kyi phung po de ni rgyal po nyid dam/ brgya byin nyid dam/ tshangs pa nyid dam/ nyan thos nyid dam/ rang sangs rgyas
31b2(rgyud 'bum): nyid dam/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid kyis kyang zad par byar mi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ blo gros rnam par dag pa rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo des bsod nams kyi phung po bsam gyis mi khyab
31b3(rgyud 'bum): pa yongs su bzung ba yin te/ blo gros rnam par dag pa 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa grong khyer du 'jug gam/ gtsug lag khang

35a3(rgyud 'bum): swA hA/ ho me d+harme/ d+harmA tsan+tA ye swA hA/ d+ha re b+hi d+ha re/ ka la bing ka ru tA yai swA hA/ shAn+te/ kAn+ne/ ni rbA pa N+ye swA hA/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ bi du ru d+hi ye swA hA/ bi ma la pra tsun+dA yai swA hA/ a ba lo ki ta/ bi lo ki tA ya swA hA/ A dz+nyA na bi d+ha ma n+yai swA
