35b2(rgyud 'bum): ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ sarbA pa ra Na bi b+hi n+yai swA hA/ d+hA tu bi ka ra N+yai swA hA/ me g+ha bi Ta me swA hA/ a pa rA dzi ta kA yai swA hA/ ba la dad n+yai swA hA/ bo d+h+yang da da n+yai swA hA/ karma nir+b+ha bi ta kA yai swA hA/ e kA rA mA yai swA hA/ yo ga tsA rA yai
35b3(rgyud 'bum): swA hA/ sarba bud d+ha b+hi Shik+tA yai swA hA/ bra pa ku tA yai swA hA/ sarba d+harmA b+hi Shik+tA yai swA hA/ sarba bud d+ha b+hi Shik+tA yai swA hA/ e ka shring gA yai swA hA/ a shring gA yai swA hA/ b+hU tA yai swA hA/ a sa~M b+hU tA yai swA hA/ sarba duHkho pra sha ma n+yai swA hA/
35b4(rgyud 'bum): zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ tsan+d+ra pra b+he/ su pra b+he/ pra b+hA ka re/ pra b+hod+ga te/ pra b+hod+ga te/ pra b+ha ba ti/ pra b+ha ba ti/ d+harma bi shu/ karmA bi shud d+hi r+b+ha ba tu me swA hA/ tshe brjod gang la la zhig rig sngags 'dis nyin zhag
35b5(rgyud 'bum): bdun du nyin lan bdun mtshan lan bdun du byab pa byas na/ des las kyi sgrib pa ma lus par rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /dge slong bdun la zan sbyin no/ /me las me spel bar bya'o/ /mtshan mo mar me thogs te mchod rten la bsti
35b6(rgyud 'bum): stang du byas la bskor bar bya'o/ /dam pa'i chos bri ba dang bklag pa la brtson par bya'o/ /gal te yams kyi nad cher byung na khyim nas khyim dang / grong nas grong dang / grong khyer nas grong khyer du gan d+ha ra sa'i bdug pa dang gtor
35b7(rgyud 'bum): ma dang / lha bshos kyis mchod par bya'o/ /nad pa gang yin pa des kyang cho ga 'di bzhin byas na de myur du nad las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas dge slong tshe brjod la 'di skad ces smras so/ /dge slong
35b8(rgyud 'bum): rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin tam/ klog gam/ yi ger 'dri'am/ yi ger 'drir 'jug gam/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston na de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
36a1(rgyud 'bum): byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ /yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas dge slong tshe brjod la 'di skad ces smras so/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ci nas skye bo thams cad kyi rna lam du grag par 'gyur bar yul nas
36a2(rgyud 'bum): yul dang / grong khyer nas grong khyer dang / grong nas grong du bskur bar bya'o/ /yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas dge slong tshe brjod la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe brjod rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las
36a3(rgyud 'bum): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lan gcig bklags na de bdag nyid thar bar 'gyur ro/ /sus lan gnyis bklags na de bu dang chung ma dang lhan cig thar bar 'gyur ro/ /sus lan gsum bklags na de rtsa lag gi tshogs kyi skye bo
36a4(rgyud 'bum): dang bcas te thar bar 'gyur ro/ /sus lan bzhi bklags na/ de yul 'khor thams cad kyang thar bar 'gyur ro/ /sus lan lnga bklags na/ de nye 'khor gyi rgyal po dang bcas pa thar bar 'gyur ro/ /yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ dge
36a5(rgyud 'bum): slong tshe brjod la 'di skad ces smras so/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di myur du yul gzhan dag tu bskur bar bya ste/ der yang yon tan 'di dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe brjod gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos la mi 'dzin tam/ mi klog
36a6(rgyud 'bum): gam/ yi ger mi 'dri'am/ yi ger 'drir mi 'jug gam/ kun chub par mi byed dam/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu mi ston tam/ yul gzhan du mi 'byin tam/ sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te mi nyan
36a7(rgyud 'bum): tam/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su mi sngo na mtshams med pa lnga byed pa rnams kyi 'gro ba ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar mngon par 'grub ste/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis smad pa'o/ /
36a8(rgyud 'bum): yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas dge slong tshe brjod la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe brjod su zhig 'di tshad mar mi byed pa de ni ngas thog ma nyid du dad par byas pa ma yin no/ /'di ltar 'dzam bu gling pa'i sems can
36b1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad bde bar 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir/ nga ri'i rgyal po ri rab la song ste/ lha dang / dri za rnams la rjes su bstan pa dang mthun par sbyar bar bya ba'i phyir nan tan bya'o/ /de skad ces smras nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de nyid
36b2(rgyud 'bum): du mi snang bar gyur to/ /dge slong tshe brjod kyis kyang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas smras pa la mngon par bstod de bzung nas song ngo / /'phags pa khyad par can zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// //
36b3(rgyud 'bum): rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa/ / @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya
36b4(rgyud 'bum): aSh+Ta maN+Da la ka nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dkyil 'khor brgyad pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag
36b5(rgyud 'bum): gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ri gru 'dzin na/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas na/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang thabs cig tu
36b6(rgyud 'bum): bzhugs te/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen snying po zla ba snang ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur nas 'dug pa de stan las langs nas chos gos
36b7(rgyud 'bum): phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga la sa la btsugs nas/ bac+do~Ms ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bac+do~Ms la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan
36b8(rgyud 'bum): pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na bac+do~Ms de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang /
37a1(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen snying po zla ba snang ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rin chen snying po zla ba snang ba khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig
37a2(rgyud 'bum): dang / ngas dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen snying po zla ba snang bas bcom ldan 'das la 'di
37a3(rgyud 'bum): skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig dkyil 'khor brgyad pa bgyid par 'tshal na des ji ltar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod skye bo mang po
37a4(rgyud 'bum): la shin tu phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / dus gsum du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi mtshungs pa med pa'i ye shes sgrub pa'i phyir rigs kyi bu khyod spobs pa skyes pa ni bzang ste/ legs so legs so/ /
37a5(rgyud 'bum): rigs kyi bu de'i phyir snying po gang brjod pa tsam gyis mtshams med pa lnga 'byang zhing dngos grub thams cad kyang thob par 'gyur ba byang chub sems dpa' brgyad kyi snying po nyon cig /u0f00 ma hA hU~M ma hA bI ra swA hA/ snying po 'dis ni dbus
37a6(rgyud 'bum): kyi bcom ldan 'das mchod do/ /u0f00 hrI hU~M pad+ma pri ya swA hA/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po'o/ /u0f00 mai hA rA Na swA hA/ byams pa'i snying po'o/ /u0f00 A kA sha gar+d+hA ya swA hA/ nam mkha'i snying po'i snying po'o/ /
37a7(rgyud 'bum): u0f00 swA hri rA ya dz+wa swA hA/ kun tu bzang po'i snying po'o/ /u0f00 ku ru b+han ra ha swA hA/ lag na rdo rje'i snying po'o/ /u0f00 shrI a~M ra~M ga swA hA/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i snying po'o/ /u0f00 ni swA raM b+ha swA hA/ sgrib pa tha
37a8(rgyud 'bum): ms cad rnam par sel ba'i snying po'o/ /u0f00 k+Shi ti ha rA dzA swA hA/ sa'i snying po'i snying po'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' brgyad kyi snying po de bzhin gshegs pa dang ldan pa 'di rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la
37b1(rgyud 'bum): zhig gis dkyil 'khor gyi mdun du lan cig brjod na de'i don thams cad 'grub par 'gyur te/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /
37b2(rgyud 'bum): bac+do~Ms kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa dkyil
37b3(rgyud 'bum): 'khor brgyad pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs s+ho/ / //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar
37b4(rgyud 'bum): chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa/ / @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya alpa a k+Sha ra pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ge nyung
37b5(rgyud 'bum): ngu zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bac+do~Ms rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod phung
37b6(rgyud 'bum): po'i ri la dge slong khri nyis stong lnga brgya'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang /
37b7(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten skyong ba la sogs pa lha bye ba khrag khrig 'bum gyis yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te/ dpal gyi snying po'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
37b8(rgyud 'bum): po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bac+do~Ms ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud
38a1(rgyud 'bum): nas/ 'dzum mul te/ /bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ge nyung ngu la bsod nams che ba/ gang thos pa tsam gyis sems can thams cad
38a2(rgyud 'bum): kyi las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ba dang / byang chub la nges par gzhol bar 'gyur ba dang / gang dag sngags sgrub par brtson pa de dag bgegs ma mchis par gsang sngags 'grub par 'gyur
38a3(rgyud 'bum): ba bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu khyod yun ring por sems can
38a4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad la phan pa'i phyir brtson pa legs so legs so/ /de'i phyir rigs kyi bu legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ge nyung ngu la bsod nams che ba gang thos pa
38a5(rgyud 'bum): tsam gyis sems can thams cad kyi las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ba dang / byang chub la nges par gzhol bar 'gyur ba dang / gang dag gsang sngags sgrub par brtson pa de dag bgegs med par sngags 'grub
38a6(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ba ngas khyod la bshad do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /sems can thams cad la sman pa'i slad
38a7(rgyud 'bum): du bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe sems can thams cad dgrol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /mnyam par bzhag pa des smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu'i phrag nas 'od zer
38a8(rgyud 'bum): 'bum phrag du ma byung ste/ 'od zer de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad khyab par gyur to/ /sems can gang dag 'od zer des reg pa sems can dmyal ba pa yan chad sems can de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang
38b1(rgyud 'bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyang rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung du lha'i tsan+dan gyi phye ma'i char yang
38b2(rgyud 'bum): phab po/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gsungs pa 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpas mnyam pa'i sems dang byams pa'i sems dang byas pa gzo ba dang /
38b3(rgyud 'bum): sdig pa thams cad dang bral ba'i sems su bya'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po 'di yang gdon par bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
38b4(rgyud 'bum): shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ u0f00 mu ne mu ne ma hA mu na ye swA hA/ ngas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rnyed pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo/ /sangs rgyas
38b5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyang 'di las byung ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa chen po las khyod kyis 'di nyid thob pas de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mchog tu gyur to/ /khyod de
38b6(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od zer kun nas 'phags pa dpal brtsegs rgyal po zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes sangs rgyas nyid du lung yang bstan to/ /gang dag
38b7(rgyud 'bum): khyod kyi ming nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher ston pa dang / glegs bam du bris nas mchod pa byed pa de dag thams cad ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro/ /tad+ya thA/
38b8(rgyud 'bum): dza ya dza ya/ pad+mA b+he/ a ba me sa ra sa ra Ni/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ de ba tA nu pA la ne/ bud+d+ha ut+ta ra Ni pU ra ya b+ha ga ba ti/ sarbA sha ma sha ma sarba satwA nA~M/ sarba karmA ba ra Na bi sho d+ha ya/ bud+d+ha a
39a1(rgyud 'bum): d+hiSh+ThA ne na swA hA/ don dam par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad bskyed pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i yum 'phral du sdig pa 'phrog pa/ byang chub sbyin par
39a2(rgyud 'bum): byed pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ bskal pa bye ba brgyar yang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis phan yon brjod par mi nus so/ /'di bklags pas dkyil 'khor thams cad du dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro/ /gsang sngags
39a3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyang mngon du 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das
39a4(rgyud 'bum): ci'i slad du 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ thabs sla ba'i phyir te/ sems can gang dag spro ba chung ba de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa
39a5(rgyud 'bum): dang / klog pa dang / yi ge 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir 'jug pa de dag thams cad thabs sla bas byang chub la gzhol bar 'gyur te/ de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/ /de skad ces
39a6(rgyud 'bum): bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis ji tsam du sems can thams cad la sman pa dang / sems can
39a7(rgyud 'bum): bsod nams chung ngu rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang / bde ba'i slad du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bka' stsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to/ /bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems
39a8(rgyud 'bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/
39b1(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ge nyung ngu zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs s+ho// // @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ b+ha ga ba tI pradz+nyA pA
39b2(rgyud 'bum): ra mi tA hr-i da ya/ bod skad du/ bac+doMs ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po/ ba~M po gcig go/ bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/
39b3(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya rgod phung po'i ri la/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das zab mo snang ba zhes bya ba'i
39b4(rgyud 'bum): chos kyi rnam grangs kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab
39b5(rgyud 'bum): mo spyod pa nyid la rnam par lta zhing / phung po lnga po de dag la yang rang bzhin gyis stong par rnam par lta'o/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
39b6(rgyud 'bum): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo spyod pa spyad par 'dod pa des ji ltar bslab par bya/ de skad ces smras pa
39b7(rgyud 'bum): dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang
39b8(rgyud 'bum): la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo spyod pa spyad par 'dod pa des 'di ltar rnam par blta bar bya ste/ phung po lnga po de dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong par rnam par yang dag par rjes su blta'o/ /gzugs stong pa'o/ /
40a1(rgyud 'bum): stong pa nyid gzugs so/ /gzugs las stong pa nyid gzhan ma yin/ stong pa nyid las kyang gzugs gzhan ma yin no/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa
40a2(rgyud 'bum): rnams stong pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu de lta bas na chos thams cad stong pa nyid de/ mtshan nyid med pa/ ma skyes pa/ ma 'gags pa/ dri ma med pa/ dri ma dang bral ba med pa/ bri ba med pa/ gang ba med pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu de lta
40a3(rgyud 'bum): bas na stong pa nyid la gzugs med/ tshor ba med/ 'du shes med/ 'du byed rnams med/ rnam par shes pa med/ mig med/ rna ba med/ sna med/ lce med/ lus med/ yid med/ gzugs med/ sgra med/ dri med/
40a4(rgyud 'bum): ro med/ reg bya med/ chos med do/ /mig gi khams med pa nas yid kyi khams med/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du yang med do/ /ma rig pa med/ ma rig pa zad pa med pa nas rga shi med/ rga shi zad
40a5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i bar du yang med do/ /sdug bsngal ba dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam med/ ye shes med/ thob pa med/ ma thob pa yang med do/ /shA ri'i bu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' rnams
40a6(rgyud 'bum): thob pa med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten cing gnas te/ sems la sgrib pa med pas skrag pa med de/ phyin ci log las shin tu 'das nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar phyin to/ /dus gsum
40a7(rgyud 'bum): du rnam par bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /de lta bas na shes
40a8(rgyud 'bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngags/ rig pa chen po'i sngags/ bla na med pa'i sngags/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sngags/ sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i sngags/ mi brdzun pas na
40b1(rgyud 'bum): bden par shes par bya ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngags smras pa/ tad+ya thA/ ga te ga te pA ra ga te/ pA ra saM ga te/ bo d+hi swA hA/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
40b2(rgyud 'bum): pos de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo la bslab par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras
40b3(rgyud 'bum): gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin nas/ legs so legs so/ /rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no/ /rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te/ ji ltar khyod kyis bstan pa de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol
40b4(rgyud 'bum): tu phyin pa zab mo la spyad par bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang rjes su yi rang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
40b5(rgyud 'bum): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /
40b6(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs s+ho// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi ma la mi tra dang / lo ts+tsha ba dge slong rin chen sdes bsgyur cing / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba dge
40b7(rgyud 'bum): slong nam mkha' la sogs pas zhus te gtan pa'o/ /dpal bsam yas lhun gyis grub pa'i gtsug lag gi dge rgyas bye ma gling gi rtsig ngos la bris pa dang zhu dag legs par bgyis so/ / @#/ /rgya gar skad du/
40b8(rgyud 'bum): bud+d+ha b+ha ga wAn aSh+Ta sha ta nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ sangs rgyas bac+do~Ms kyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa'i gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/ tha~Md mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bac+do~Ms snying rje'i tsan dan
41a1(rgyud 'bum): dri zhim po'i spos kyis byugs pa'i sku/ zhabs pad+ma lha dang lha ma yin gyi nor bu'i cod pan gyis gtugs pa/ rang byung sel mdzad bla ma 'jig rten thams cad la phan par mdzad pa/ ston
41a2(rgyud 'bum): pa de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa nyes pa dang bral ba/ zhi ba'i bdag nyid can/ gzugs mdzes pa/ mtshan gsal ba'i gzi brjid can/ sku dpe byad kyis brgyan pa/ yon tan thams cad yang dag par rdzogs
41a3(rgyud 'bum): pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /pad+ma rgyas pa ltar zhal bzhad de/ tshems dkar zhing snyoms la thags bzang bas rab tu rgyas shing snang la nor bu dri ma med pa ltar 'od gsal zhing mdzes te/ spa zhing gsal ba
41a4(rgyud 'bum): nyi ma 'od zer stong 'bar ba mang po'i 'od snang ba'i dkyil 'khor zil gyis gnon pa/ thub pa'i mchog stobs bcu dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'dud do/ /rab tu 'dud do/ /bstod do/ /u0f00 b+ho hU~M hU~M hU~M/
41a5(rgyud 'bum): A A/ hI hI/ shi ba shi ba/ shAn+ti shAn+ti/ sha ma sha ma/ sha mA pa ya/ ta thA ga tA nu ga ta/ swa b+hA ba/ a b+hA ba/ sa mut+tA ya/ a sa ma ba la/ a bI ra la ba la/ a mi tA ba la/ a ti ba la/ hU~M g+hu~M g+hu~M/ / d+h+ro d+h+ro/
41a6(rgyud 'bum): b+h+rau b+h+rau/ b+he du b+he du/ hI hI/ b+ha ga bAn+ta ka /su ra ta b+ho ga ma hA shAn+ti ka ra/ pA pi kalpi Sha nA sha ka swA hA/ de nas dpe byad mtshan gsal bas/ /yan lag thams cad rab brgyan cing / /nyi ma bzhin du gsal ba po/ /'bar ba'i
41a7(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor rgyan mnga' ba/ /grags shing dri ma rab spangs la/ /dri med skyon bral chos kyi blo/ /khyab bdag chen po stobs bcur ldan/ /rdul bral dpal dang ldan pa po/ /rin chen sa gzhi chen po la/ pho brang rtse mo
41a8(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje'i rtse/ /rgyal ba'i sras rnams gnas gyur pa/ /nor bu du ma rab 'phro zhing / /'od zer dri med gsal bkod pa'i/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor pho brang na/ /thub pa'i longs spyod sa gzhi la/ /seng ge'i khri chen yangs la bzhugs/ /
41b1(rgyud 'bum): nor bu dbyig gi sa gzhi dang / /khri chen rab spa de nyid la/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes chen gyis/ /phun sum tshogs pa rgyan bkod lta/ /thub pa me zla nor bu'i 'od/ /nyi zer non pa'i 'od ldan pa/ /bde blag shin tu bkra shis
41b2(rgyud 'bum): tshul/ /'od gsal skyil mo krung bcas nas/ /sku 'od 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor can/ /'od gsal rgyas pas thub dbang gi/ /dri med 'od zer bkye ba ni/ /mi g.yo rdo rje can zhes bya/ /dkyil 'khor chen por zhugs
41b3(rgyud 'bum): pa yi/ /rdo rje can dag rab 'dul ba/ /gang yin de kun dag byas nas/ /dkyil 'khor dri med skor bar byed/ /ngan song dam tshig dri ma kun/ /legs par shin tu dag byas nas/ /srid gsum dkyil 'khor rgya che la/ /rnam pa du mar
41b4(rgyud 'bum): 'od gsal ba/ /'gro dang mi 'gro ma lus pa/ /bskor nas bde chen rdo rje can/ /rdo rje ral gri thogs pa de/ /cod pan ma g.yos nang du zhugs/ /de nas 'jigs pa'i sgra skad kyis/ /'gengs shing mig ni glog ltar 'gyu/ /
41b5(rgyud 'bum): rig sngags hU~M zhes sgrogs pa po/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed 'jigs byed pa/ /bzhin mdzes 'dzum gyis rnam par brgyan/ /sdig med mig rtsa rgod gyur cing / /stan las langs te phyag 'tshal nas/ /legs par mchod byas smras
41b6(rgyud 'bum): pa ni/ /kye ma skye ba'i phyogs 'joms shing / /bskal pa du ma'i dri ma sel/ /rig sngags yon tan sgrub byed pa/ /thub mchog rnams kyis rab tu gsungs/ /de gzigs dge ba du ma brnyes/ /sangs rgyas blo gros rgyas par gyur/ /
41b7(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' blo gros che/ /bskal pa gcig tu spyod pas kyang / /rgyud mar sangs rgyas kun 'byung zhing / /spyod pa du ma 'byung ba yi/ /yon tan brgya yi spos ldan 'di/ /thos pa spro bar mi nus so/ /longs spyod rgya mtsho chen po can/ /
41b8(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems mchog dkyil 'khor du/ /rgyal mchog rnams kyis dbang bskur ba'i/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i chos can ldan/ /'di thos sangs rgyas spyod pa yis/ /sems can kun gyi sdig pa rnams/ /ma lus rab tu bsal nas ni/ /blo chen dri ma med par 'gyur/ /zhi zhing dag byed
42a1(rgyud 'bum): bkra shis la/ /rdul med brgyan te zhi bar byed/ /dge zhing mya ngan thams cad sel/ /sdug bsngal thams cad nges par 'joms/ /dbang byed gsang sngags dam pa ste/ /sa stengs sdig pa thams cad sel/ /
42a2(rgyud 'bum): ma smad 'bras bu nges par sbyin/ /bstan pa yin te sdang ba 'dul/ /nyes pa byas pa sel ba yin/ /gzungs 'di gang gis thos gyur des/ /sangs rgyas rnyed par dka' ba yang / /ring por mi thogs thob par 'gyur/ /sgrib pa
42a3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad rab zhi zhing / /khyab bdag nyon mongs kun sel ba/ /gang zhig nyon mongs zhi byed pa'i/ /gzungs 'di 'chang bar byed pa yis/ /kun tu bzang po nyid dang ni/ /lag na rdo rje nyid kyang 'thob/ /rig sngags 'chang gi bdag po
42a4(rgyud 'bum): yang / /'di thos pas ni thob par 'gyur/ /'jig rten kun na lham me ba/ /bcom ldan rnam par snang mdzad kyang / /dkyil 'khor dam pa gting med pa/ /'di ni ji srid ma gsan par/ /rab zhi nyon mongs 'dul ba yi/ /
42a5(rgyud 'bum): rang byung go 'phang ma brnyes te/ /rnam par dag phyir gsan gyur nas/ /gsan ma thag tu rnam par dag /de phyir phun sum tshogs pa dang / /legs par 'dod pas brjod par bya/ /gzhan gyis mi thub gzungs gsan
42a6(rgyud 'bum): nas/ /thub pa kun gyis gang brnyes pa/ /'khor ba 'dir ni nam du yang / /bdud kyi las dang 'khrug med dang / /mya ngan med cing 'thab med pa/ /gzungs la gnas pas thob par 'gyur/ gnas kyi dam pa thob nas kyang / /
42a7(rgyud 'bum): thub pa dri ma med pa'i blo/ /gzigs pa bzang rnams gar gshegs pa'i/ /bzang 'gro der ni 'gro bar 'gyur/ /legs pa 'dod pa rnams kyis ni/ /tshig gi mdo 'di mnyan par gyis/ /nyon mongs zad par bya ba la/ /rgyal ba'i
42a8(rgyud 'bum): gsungs pa'i gzungs 'di mchog / sdig pa byed cing dge la sdang / /sdig pa'i rang bzhin rab 'jungs pa/ /gang gis thos nas de spang ba/ /nga yis mngon sum 'byor bar 'gyur/ /sdig pa gzhan yang mi bya zhing / /snga ma rnams kyang bshags par bya/ /
42b1(rgyud 'bum): gzungs mchog 'di yi mthu stobs kyis/ /sdig pa thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur/ /tshe rabs gzhan ni stong dag dang / /tshe rabs bye ba phrag brgyar yang / /sdig pa mi dge gang byas pa/ /dag 'gyur 'di la the tsom med/ /
42b2(rgyud 'bum): yar gyi ngo yi tshes brgyad dang / /de bzhin tshes ni bcwa lnga la/ /bsnyen gnas legs par lhur blangs la/ /cho ga bzhin du sangs rgyas mchod/ /de nas rmongs pa med par yang / /nyon mongs dgra ni rab 'joms shing / /
42b3(rgyud 'bum): shin tu thub dka' dpe med pa/ /nyes pa zlog pa'i gzungs brjod na/ /thub pa'i zhal gyi zla ba'i 'od/ /'bar ba nges par mthong bar 'gyur/ /de nas tshogs rnams rdzogs pa yi/ /rgyal ba'i sras po nyid du
42b4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ /'od dpag med la mnga' ba yi/ /yon tan mtha' yas rab brgyan pa/ /bskal pa bye ba stong du yang / /mtha' mi rtogs pa thob par 'gyur/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin gyi tshig /dkyil 'khor dag na gnas rnams kyis/ /thos
42b5(rgyud 'bum): nas rgyan rnams sna tshogs pa/ /bcom ldan 'das la 'bul bar byed/ /rdo rje ral gri la sogs pa/ /lha bdag gsal ba thams cad dang / /ri bo ti se ri rab la/ /gnas pa'i rig sngags 'chang rnams dang / /de bzhin dkyil 'khor chen po na/ /
42b6(rgyud 'bum): 'khod pa'i rig sngags 'chang rnams dang / /ma la ya yi ri bo la/ /gnas shing rgyan 'bar thogs rnams dang / /khyab 'jug lha chen la sogs pa/ /lha yi bdag po rnams dang ni/ /lag na rdo rje la sogs pa/ /byang chub sems dpa'
42b7(rgyud 'bum): stobs chen rnams/ /nor bu'i dpung rgyan rna cha dang / /rgyan rnams rab tu g.yo ba'i lus/ /rab tu bskyod de langs nas ni/ /sdig bral mnga' bdag rgyal ba la/ /phyag 'tshal thal mo sbyar byas nas/ /kun gyis sa yi dbang
42b8(rgyud 'bum): phyug po/ /thub mchog dam pa de la ni/ /mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dag gis bstod/ /mnyam nyid chos de de bzhin nyid/ /shin tu rtogs pa lam me ba/ /dul ba brtan pa dri ma sel/ /dri ma med pa skyon bral ba/ /thub pa sangs rgyas shin tu zhi/ /
43a1(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten mgon po skye dgu'i bdag /de bzhin gshegs pa nyon mongs thul/ /de bzhin rgyal ba rdul bsal ba/ /ston pa ston mdzad brtan pa ste/ /sdig pa med pa rdul dang bral/ /'jig rten mgon po snang mdzad
43a2(rgyud 'bum): pa/ /dag pa zhi ba zas gtsang sras/ /nyon mongs rab bcom phan 'dogs pa/ /ston pa po ste dri ma sel/ /spyod tshul dri med tshul bzang ba/ /zab pa rnam par gnon pa brtan/ /btsan po thugs brtse rnam par rgyal/ /mgon po de
43a3(rgyud 'bum): bzhin mgon mdzad pa/ /zhi ba'i bdag nyid zhe sdang bral/ /bcings pa las grol nges par grol/ /'jig rten kun mchog 'khra ba'i sa/ /bdag gir mi 'dzin dri ma med/ /nyon mongs sel ba dpal dang ldan/ /dpa' mdzad de bzhin
43a4(rgyud 'bum): phan pa mdzad/ /mnyam pa med pa dpe med pa/ /khyab bdag nyon mongs las rnams spong / /khengs pa med pa dman pa med/ /mnyam pa de bzhin mi mnyam mnyam/ /snang ba brnyes pa snang byed med/ /'jig rten snang mdzad sdig
43a5(rgyud 'bum): med pa/ /sgrib pa thams cad spangs pa ste/ /'jig rten kun la phan par brtson/ /dpa' bo zhi ba zhi mdzad pa/ /nyon mongs dgra rnams zad par mdzad/ /mnga' bdag thabs mkhyen thabs che ba/ /sems can kun gyi 'khra sa
43a6(rgyud 'bum): lags/ /don yod rnyed dka' blo dang ldan/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor thub par dka'/ /skyob pa 'jigs sel tshangs pa ste/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas chos 'dzin pa/ /dpa' bo chen po 'jigs pa med/ /gzugs bzang mtshan rnams
43a7(rgyud 'bum): gsal ba ste/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan mnga' ba/ /chos kyi longs spyod rgya mtsho lags/ /dpe byad bzang po bkod pa yis/ /spras pa'i bdag nyid ya mtshan ston/ /dka' ba med pa'i ston pa po/ /de bzhin des pa bde sbyin pa/ /mthu can
43a8(rgyud 'bum): yangs pa rgya che ba/ /bdud bzhi'i stobs rnams sel mdzad pa/ /brtson chen spro ba che ba ste/ /dgyes pa chen po stobs po che/ /mthu brnyes brtan pa chen po ste/ /gnas ldan dbang gis dar ba lags/ /gsal ba gsung ldan dpe med pa/ /
43b1(rgyud 'bum): dge ba stong pa nyid kyis rgyal/ /rab tu zhi ba mun pa med/ /blo gros chen po chos 'dzin pa/ /phun sum tshogs ldan sa chen brnyes/ /'dod pa rnams ni 'dul mdzad pa/ /dpal mdzad dpal mnga' dpal dang ldan/ /dpal gyi longs
43b2(rgyud 'bum): spyod shin tu rgyas/ /bcom ldan legs bsgos bsgo bar mdzad/ /gsung ldan bkra shis rgyal ba'i gnas/ /mnyam nyid mnyam pa nyid mkhyen pa/ /mnyam pa nyid kyi mtshan dpag med/ /rab tu dgyes la longs spyod gsal/ /gzhi bcas
43b3(rgyud 'bum): sems pa mnyam pa lags/ /blo dag blo ldan dri ma spangs/ /gnas chen brtan par ldan pa ste/ /rgyas par longs spyod dri ma med/ /thub pa thugs rje'i rgyan mnga' ba/ /skal ba bzang po 'jigs pa'i skyabs/ /de bzhin 'jigs med nyon mongs sel/ /
43b4(rgyud 'bum): dri med skyon bral longs spyod can/ /sna tshogs 'od ldan dkyil 'khor mdzes/ /sku bzang dge ba'i rim pa mchog /thugs rje'i 'od ldan 'od bzang ba/ /mi gnas longs spyod dam pa lags/ /chos kyi rgyu ste yon tan gnas/ /rjed 'os
43b5(rgyud 'bum): mchog gnas longs spyod che/ /nam mkha' mtshan te rnam dag blo/ /rin chen gzugs 'dra bkra shis pa/ /khyu mchog che spyan ba rdzi ma/ /rgyal ba skyon bsal shes rab can/ /shes rab thabs dang ldan pa ste/ /'jig rten mi dge
43b6(rgyud 'bum): kun las 'das/ /dag par longs spyod brtan pa can/ /sa dang stobs dang ye shes bzod/ /pha rol phyin pa kun la mnga'/ /ting 'dzin mnyam par longs spyod pa/ /rnam thar sgo la mngon sum pa/ /gtong ba sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam/ /
43b7(rgyud 'bum): chos chen bde bar 'char ba lags/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i yul las 'das/ /spyod yul sgrib pa mi mnga' ba/ /byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po rgyal/ /dam pa'i don te tshul che ba/ /shes bya'i yul rnams mtha' dag la/ /sgrib pa med par
43b8(rgyud 'bum): 'char ba brnyes/ /rigs chen mthun par skyes pa ste/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge ba'i gnas/ /khyad par brnyes pa mnyam nyid brnyes/ /mi mnyam sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam/ /don chen shin tu mthar phyin pa/ /
44a1(rgyud 'bum): nyon mongs bral ba thub par dka'/ /dge sbyong sdig pa sbyong mdzad pa/ /gnod pa med par bde bar 'byin/ /blo rgya che ba thams cad mkhyen/ /thos pa'i mtshon cha ma lus gsan/ /dkon pa bde ba thob 'gyur ba/ /mnyam
44a2(rgyud 'bum): pa khyad par yul dang ldan/ /'jig rten thams cad dar mdzad mgon/ /zhi gnas mtshon cha thub par dka'/ /bsam gyis mi khyab bsam yas yul/ /dpe med pa ste dper bya ba/ /'od bzang rab dgyes dpal dang ldan/ /legs gsung
44a3(rgyud 'bum): blo yi stobs kyis 'byung / /mkhas pa zhal bzang bde sbyin pa/ /rab dgyes 'das pa'i spyod yul can/ /gsung ba chen po ye shes che/ /gnas chen bkra shis chen po ste/ /mchod par gyur pa yul las 'das/ /bya ba'i mtshan
44a4(rgyud 'bum): nyid med pa po/ /sangs rgyas yul du skyes pa ste/ /shes bya'i spyod yul rgya che ba/ /kun mkhyen longs spyod 'bras bu can/ /'jig rten dbang 'das spyod yul ba/ kun mkhyen yul gyi snang ba ste/ /thabs mnga' phun sum tshogs
44a5(rgyud 'bum): ldan pa/ /rdzu 'phrul rol pa'i thabs dang ldan/ /chos kyi gar thabs ston pa po/ /rab ston yon tan sgyur mdzad pa/ /spyod pa ma lus 'dul bar mdzad/ /yongs su rdzogs pa rnam par dag /sangs rgyas spyod yul rnam sangs rgyas/ /
44a6(rgyud 'bum): bgegs byed ma legs byed pa bcom/ /bdud kyi dregs pa sel bar mdzad/ /g.yul ngor rnam par rgyal ba brnyes/ /dpa' bo chen po pham med stobs/ /theg pa chen po'i shing rta bcibs/ /blo chen brgal bar dka' ba yi/ /nyon mongs rgya mtsho'i
44a7(rgyud 'bum): pha rol gshegs/ /theg pa chen po'i tshul la gnas/ /theg pa mchog la longs spyod pa/ /nyan thos 'das pa'i spyod yul can/ /rang rgyal las kyang 'das pa ste/ /sangs rgyas sa yi 'bras bur gnas/ /gong nas gong du khyad par mkhyen/ /
44a8(rgyud 'bum): khyod ni nam mkha'i gnas na bzhugs/ /bde 'byung sa dang zhing rnams kyi/ /mtsho chen dag la longs par spyod/ /sangs rgyas dbang po rgyas pa la/ /mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bstod nas/ /de la lha sogs tshogs rnams kyis/ /phyag byas
44b1(rgyud 'bum): mgo smad phyogs gcig 'khod/ /de nas dkyil 'khor chen po na/ /gnas pa ma lus chem mer 'khod/ /thod du rdo rje'i thod 'ching ba/ /langs nas cod pan rab tu g.yos/ /dkyil 'khor mthon po thams cad du/ /skad ber chen pos
44b2(rgyud 'bum): yongs bkang nas/ /nor bu'i rgyan ni rnam g.yo zhing / /ha ha grags pa'i sgra sgrogs te/ /kye ma sangs rgyas yon tan che/ /bskal pa grangs med gsum bsags pa/ /byang chub sems sogs mchog rnams kyis/ /mtshan brgya rtsa
44b3(rgyud 'bum): brgyad legs par brjod/ /kye ma rnyed dang bde 'byung ba/ /mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad thos nas kyang / /gang zhig klog cing rgyal la bstod/ /'bras bu chen po 'grub par 'gyur/ /mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags bcas pa/ /bcom ldan 'das drung brjod
44b4(rgyud 'bum): na ni/ /sgrib dang kun nas nyon mongs dang / /sdig pa thams cad dag pa 'thob/ /mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad mchog bton na/ /sgrib pa kun las nges grol zhing / /nyon mongs mtha' dag rnam par spong / /shes rab chen po nyid du 'gyur/ /
44b5(rgyud 'bum): de ni longs spyod chen po dang / /bde ba las kyang nyams mi 'gyur/ /de ni tshe rabs thams cad du/ /blo ldan tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/ /de nas rdo rje'i thod 'ching ba/ /yon tan mtha' yas sras de la/ /bcom ldan bdud las rgyal
44b6(rgyud 'bum): ba yis/ /mngon sum gzigs nas bka' stsal pa/ /rgyal ba'i sa 'di zhi ba ste/ /nga rgyal la sogs nyon mongs 'joms/ /'jig rten bde ba kun las 'das/ /de bzhin gshegs bde mngon du phyogs/ /gzhan
44b7(rgyud 'bum): gyis mi tshugs gzungs dang ni/ /mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad nyan byed pa/ /de dag rnam dag bdag nyid de/ /sems can kun la bde 'dod pa/ /lan cig thos pa tsam gyis kyang / /de dag sa chen 'bras bur gnas/ /ring por
44b8(rgyud 'bum): mi thogs dga' 'gyur na/ /'chang sogs lta la ci zhig smos/ /de phyir rtag tu rab bsgrims la/ /gtan du bde ba 'dod pa yis/ /yon tan rgya mtsho ldan pa'i gzungs/ /mnyan par bya zhing bcang bar bya/ /gang zhig
45a1(rgyud 'bum): nang par langs nas brjod/ /bdag nyid kyis kyang bton na ni/ /de yi don kun 'grub 'gyur la/ /gnod pa dang yang phrad mi 'gyur/ /'di ni yon tan kun gyi snod/ /dge ba phun sum tshogs sbyin pa/ /kun mkhyen
45a2(rgyud 'bum): bla med 'bras bu'i mchog / bde 'byung thob par byed pa yin/ /'bras bu 'byor pa ci yang rung / /thob par mi 'gyur dogs pa med/ /kun mkhyen go 'phang thob gyur nas/ /dpe med gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur/ /de ni dge zhing
45a3(rgyud 'bum): 'bras bur ldan/ /sangs rgyas sa yi 'bras bu sbyin/ /yid du 'ong zhing yon tan ldan/ /snying rje dri ma med sbyin pa/ 'di ni mnyam pa nyid kyi mdo/ /'jig rten kun nas dga' ba ste/ /'jig rten kun gyi bde ba 'byung / /'di dang
45a4(rgyud 'bum): 'dra ba gang yang med/ /ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs s+ho// //'jam dpal rtsa ba'i rgyud bzhugs/ /
45a5(rgyud 'bum): @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya many+dzu shrI m+'u la tan tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i rgyud/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
45a6(rgyud 'bum): 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das gnas gtsang ma'i steng gi nam mkha'i dkyil na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa 'khor gyi tshogs so so
45a7(rgyud 'bum): tha dad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba/ so sor rab tu gnas pa dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams la bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu
45a8(rgyud 'bum): dag khyed cag nyon cig / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i cho 'phrul gyi spyod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bye
45b1(rgyud 'bum): brag dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho ba/ tshe dang nad med pa dang dbang phyug dang / yid la bsam
45b2(rgyud 'bum): pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i sngags kyi gzhi dag sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir bshad par bya ste/ de shin du legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang / ngas bshad par bya'o/ /de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris
45b3(rgyud 'bum): kyi lha'i bu de dag gis thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes gsol te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par dang / sa chen po thob par bya ba dang / rdo rje'i gdan gnon
45b4(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / bdud gdul ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi nges par 'byung ba dang / lha rnams dang mi rnams su skye bar bya ba dang / sdug bsngal dang / dbul ba dang /
45b5(rgyud 'bum): nad thams cad zhi bar byed pa/ longs spyod kyis phyug pa 'dren par byed pa/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sngags kyi spyod pas phongs par mi byed pa/ re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de bzhin gshegs
45b6(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyi gsung 'bras bu med par byed pa ma yin pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byams pa'i thugs dang / phan pa'i thugs dang bdag dang sems can thams cad la thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung nas bcom ldan 'das de bshad du gsol/
45b7(rgyud 'bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams dang gnas gtsang ma'i gnas la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs nas/ dag pa'i yul la 'od rnam par spros te/ yul rnam par 'jigs pa zhes bya
45b8(rgyud 'bum): ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu mdzod spu nas me tog kun tu skyes pa zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par bskul ba zhes bya ba'i 'od phyung ste/
46a1(rgyud 'bum): 'od bye ba khrag khrig phrag brgya stong du ma'i 'khor gyis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su song nas/ byang shar gyi phyogs
46a2(rgyud 'bum): su brgya stong gi gang gA'i klung gi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das nas/ me tog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams su rjes su zhugs te/ gang na me tog kun du skyes pa'i rgyal po'i dbang po zhes bya ba'i de bzhin
46a3(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa bzhugs par ro/ /der yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spyod pa dang ldan pa rnams dang lhan cig gnas par gyur
46a4(rgyud 'bum): to/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'od zer gyi snang ba de mthong nas/ bzhin cung zad 'dzum pa dang ldan par gyur nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs de dag la smras pa/ rgyal ba'i sras dag 'od 'di
46a5(rgyud 'bum): ni nga la yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir 'ongs pa yin gyis/ khyed cag g.yeng ba med par gyis shig ces smras so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
46a6(rgyud 'bum): pa mig mi 'dzums shing kha bye bas/ 'od gang na ba de logs su mngon du bltas nas 'dug go/ de nas bskul ba'i 'od des me tog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba chen pos snang bar
46a7(rgyud 'bum): byas te/ me tog kun du skyes pa rgyal po'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i spyi bor nub par gyur to/ /
46a8(rgyud 'bum): de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te/ bac+do~Ms me tog kun du yang dag par skyes pa rgyal po'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa la lan gsu~M bskor ba byas te/ spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/
46b1(rgyud 'bum): pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das me tog kun du skyes pa rgyal po'i dbang po la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
46b2(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bdag la dgongs te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la blta ba dang phyag bya ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / sngags thams cad kyi spyod pa dang / sgrub thabs dang / dkyil
46b3(rgyud 'bum): 'khor dang / cho ga dang / gsang ba dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / cho ga'i ngo bo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs dang / gsang ba dang / phyag rgya dang / dbang bskur ba bstan pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa
46b4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nas mchi bar 'tshal lo/ /de skad ces bcom ldan 'das me tog kun du skyes pa rgyal po'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol pa dang / 'jam
46b5(rgyud 'bum): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ting nge 'dzin gang la snyoms par zhugs pa na/ phyogs bzhi mtha' yas mu med pa steng dang 'og dang thad ka thams cad dang ldan pa'i phyogs sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis yang dag
46b6(rgyud 'bum): par gang bar gyur to/ /'jig rten gyi khams de dang bcom ldan 'das dang bcas pas/ rgyal ba'i sras legs so legs so/ /'di lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par la snyoms par zhugs pa ni/ nyan thos dang rang
46b7(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang mi nus/ byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa la zhugs pa dang / sa bcu la gnas pa dag gis kyang snyoms par zhugs par mi nus so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das me tog kun du yang dag par
46b8(rgyud 'bum): skyes pa rgyal po'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams dang lhan cig tu yang dag par bgros te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di'i snying po mchog tu gsang ba/
47a1(rgyud 'bum): don thams cad sgrub pa'i snying po gsungs pa ni yi ge gcig pa zhes bya ba mchog tu gsang ba/ sems can thams cad kyi las thams cad byed pa sngags kyi spyod pa khyad par can bzang po yang
47a2(rgyud 'bum): sgrub par byed pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das me tog yang dag par skyes pa rgyal po'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa yud tsam zhig cang mi gsung bar gyur te/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi
47a3(rgyud 'bum): spyan gyis gzigs te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la yang yang dag par dgongs nas/ byams pa'i thugs kyis sngags gsungs so/ /na maHsarba bud+d+hA nA~M aM maM/ 'di ni 'jam dpal gyi snying po
47a4(rgyud 'bum): mchog yin te las thams cad byed pa'o/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas/ dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa lag pa bskum pa las brkyang ba dang / brkyang ba las bskum
47a5(rgyud 'bum): pa'am sel gol gtogs pa tsam mam / mig 'byed 'dzums tsam la rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyi shugs blo ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs
47a6(rgyud 'bum): te/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su chas te slar 'khod nas/ steng gi nam mkha'i dkyil na nor bu rin po che rab tu gnas pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams gnas su 'dug ste/ gnas gtsang ma'i gnas de
47a7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad 'od chen po'i snang bas gsal bar byas te/ 'od kyi rin po ches rab tu brgyan cing gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa snyoms par zhugs
47a8(rgyud 'bum): ma thag tu rin po che rnam pa tha dad pa du ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa dang / rin po che'i gdugs dang dpag tshad brgya stong phrag du ma rgya che ba'i lha'i gos dang / dar mang po'i tshogs kyis nye bar mdzes par byas pa'i
47b1(rgyud 'bum): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig /'on kyang nga'i bkas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la gnod pa nyung ngam/ nyam
47b2(rgyud 'bum): nga ba chung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes zhu bar bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das me tog yang dag par skyes pa rgyal po'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa
47b3(rgyud 'bum): la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /gzhan yang gzhon nu gang gA'i klung brgya stong gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis khyod kyi sngags kyi spyod pa
47b4(rgyud 'bum): dang / dkyil 'khor dang cho ga zhib mo dang gsang ba dang / dbang bskur ba dang phyag rgya'i tshogs dang cho ga dang sbyin sreg dang / bzlas pa dang brtul zhugs bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa sems can thams
47b5(rgyud 'bum): cad dga' bar byed pa/ 'od rin po che'i tshogs kyis rab 'byam 'das pa dang da ltar byung ba dang ma 'ongs pa'i shes pa rgyal po'i dbang phyug lung ston par byed pa/ sngags bzla ba yul gyi mthar 'gro
47b6(rgyud 'bum): bar byed pa mi snang bar byed pa dang / dus dang dam tshig rab 'byam gyi tshogs thams cad dang / 'jig rten pa ma lus pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang 'phags
47b7(rgyud 'bum): pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi nges par 'byung ba'i spyod pa mthar thug pa gsungs pa dang / gsung ba dang / gsung bar 'gyur ba yin te/ de ltar rjes su yi rang ba nyid de/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
47b8(rgyud 'bum): pa de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig / shAkya thub pa'i spyan sngar mngon sum du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos par 'gyur te/ khyod kyang ston par 'gyur ro/ /'dir yang gsungs pa/ na maHsarba ta thA ga tA nA~M/
48a1(rgyud 'bum): a tsin t+ya a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nA~M/ u0f00 sma ra sma ra a pra ti ha ta shA sa na ku mA ra rU pa ha ri Na/ u0f00 hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ 'di ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rtsa ba'i sngags so/ /de bzhin gshegs p
48a2(rgyud 'bum): a thams cad kyi snying po ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs la/ gsung zhing gsung bar 'gyur la/ khyod kyang mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su song nas/ dbye ba dang rnam par dbye ba rgya cher ston par 'gyur
48a3(rgyud 'bum): te/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa zhes bya bas kyang las thams cad byed pa 'di rjes su gnang bar 'gyur ro/ /'dir snying po mchog tu gyur pa ni/ u0f00 bA kye daM na maH/ 'dir nye ba'i snying po ni bA kye hU~M/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur
48a4(rgyud 'bum): gyur pa bcom ldan 'das me tog yang dag par skyes pa rgyal po'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pas gnang nas/ bkod pa thams cad kyi rgyan byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang rgyu mthun pa/ byang chub kyi snying po thob pa zhes bya ba'i
48a5(rgyud 'bum): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir lha'i me tog rnam par bkod pa dang / rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dang phreng ba'i tshogs dang / rin po che'i dril bu'i dra bas 'brel pa snyan pa'i
48a6(rgyud 'bum): sgra sgrogs pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa thob par byed pa/ lha'i dri dang byug pa dang phreng ba dang phye ma'i char 'bab par mngon par sprul to/ /de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis byang
48a7(rgyud 'bum): chub sems dpa'i ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i cho 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa mthong nas/ ba spu ldang zhing gnas g.yo ba mthong nas snying 'dar zhing dngangs te/ ci bdag cag gi 'byor pa nyams par ma gyur tam zhes phan
48a8(rgyud 'bum): tshun du rings par 'gro zhing skad mthon pos smra ba rtsom par byed de/ 'di skad du bcom ldan 'das yongs su bskyab tu gsol/ shAkya thub pa yongs su bskyab tu gsol zhes gsol to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan
48b1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i 'khor rnams la bka' stsal pa/ grogs po dag ma 'jigs shig ma 'jigs shig /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di ni me tog yang dag
48b2(rgyud 'bum): par skyes pa'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa de'i spyan snga nas nga la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / don chen po'i spyod pa dang sngags kyi tshig dang / rgya che zhing rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi tshig ston
48b3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i phyir 'ongs pa yin no/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ mig mi 'dzums par bcom ldan 'das la blta zhing zhabs gnyis la btud de/ tshig 'bru 'di dag gis
48b4(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa/ skyes bu bskyed pa khyod phyag 'tshal/ /skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skyes bu gtso bo khyod phyag 'tshal/ /spyod pa thams cad don sgrub pa/ /skyes bu seng ge khyod phyag 'tshal/ /phung
48b5(rgyud 'bum): khrol thams cad zlog byed pa/ /dpa' bo chen po khyod phyag 'tshal/ /ngan 'gro thams cad 'jig byed pa/ /skyes bu pad dkar khyod phyag 'tshal/ /kun nas bsod nams dri ldan pa/ /skyes bu pad+ma khyod phyag 'tshal/ /srid gsum
48b6(rgyud 'bum): 'dam ni rnam dag byed/ /rnam grol khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sdug bsngal ma lus rnam grol byed/ /zhi gyur khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thams cad ldan pa legs 'dul byed/ /thams cad grub pa khyod phyag 'tshal/ /sngags kyi spyod pa'i don
48b7(rgyud 'bum): sgrub byed/ /bkra shis khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bkra shis kun gyi bkra shis pa/ /sangs rgyas kun la khyod phyag 'tshal/ /chos kun rnam par rtogs mdzad pa/ /chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid spros pa med pa'i ngo bo la yang dag par
48b8(rgyud 'bum): rjes su zhugs shing ston par byed pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /shes pa dang shes bya'i dngos po thams cad dang / 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas dang / theg pa gsum gyi lam dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam la
49a1(rgyud 'bum): 'jog par byed pa dang / gnas par byed pa thams cad mkhyen pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo zhes tshig 'bru 'di dag brjod pa'i bstod pa'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon sum du bstod nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das
49a2(rgyud 'bum): 'di nas gang gA'i klung brgya phrag stong gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das nas/ byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams na me tog yang dag par skyes pa zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mchis te/ de na me tog
49a3(rgyud 'bum): d ang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gang du bcom ldan 'das me tog yang dag par skyes pa dbang po'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa
49a4(rgyud 'bum): bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa de chos ston te/ thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa yongs
49a5(rgyud 'bum): su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su dkar ba tshangs par spyod pa yang dag par ston to/ /de da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/ /sngags kyi spyod pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod dang / lam gsum
49a6(rgyud 'bum): gyi spyod pa'i lam sgrub par byed pa/ skyob pa dang gnas dang skyabs dang dpung gnyen dang / bde ba dang shin tu mthar thug pa dang shin tu yongs su mthar phyin par byed pa sems can rnams la ston te/ bcom ldan 'das de nyid
49a7(rgyud 'bum): kyis rjes su gnang nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs drung 'dir mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das me tog yang dag par skyes pa rgyal po'i dbang po de yang / bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes 'dri'o/ /'di
49a8(rgyud 'bum): skad kyang gsung ste/ gang du 'di lta bu'i snyigs ma lnga'i dus su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa 'byung ba ni ngo mtshar to zhes so/ /de yang lam gsum dang byang grol dang mir skye ba thob pa nyid kyi chos ston par byed do/ /gang du'ang
49b1(rgyud 'bum): sems can gyi ris skal ba med pa dang / srid pa gsum yang dag 'joms par byed pa'i lam dang gtan tu grub pa dang bde ba dang / mthun pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la sems can rnams dgod par byed pa'i bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub
49b2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i brtson 'grus ni ngo mtshar to/ /bcom ldan 'das bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen par 'gyur gyi/ bdag gis ci zhig 'tshal ba rngo thogs/ dbang phyug gis rnam par
49b3(rgyud 'bum): 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ rmad du byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa shes par ram/ 'tshal bar ram/ thugs kyi spyad pa spyod pa'i rjes su 'jug pa'i sgrub pa dang / spyod pa
49b4(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal bar ram mdor na bskal pa bye ba khri phrag brgya stong gi bar du'ang bstan par mi nus so/ /gang yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa bsdus pa'am/ tha dad ma lus pa'i ngo bo
49b5(rgyud 'bum): 'di ni chos 'dus ma byas su blta bar bya ste/ mthong bas spang bar bya ba la brten pa'am/ yon tan ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kho nas mkhyen pa yin gyi bdag gis ni ma lags so/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
49b6(rgyud 'bum): pas rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pas rin po che'i pad+ma sprul pa la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la blta zhing 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon
49b7(rgyud 'bum): nur gyur pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs sngon du 'gro ba mdzad nas chos bstan pa dang rjes su mthun pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa sgrub pa dang rjes su mthun pas tshangs pa'i
49b8(rgyud 'bum): dbyangs dang / ka la ping ka'i skad dang 'brug sgra dang / rnga bo che'i sgra skad kyi gsung gi dbyangs kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa khyod legs par 'ongs sam/ /
50a1(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' chen po'i spyod pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa bsgrub pas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi don thob par byed pa/ sngags thams cad kyi tshig dang gsang ba dang bcas pa dang / dbang
50a2(rgyud 'bum): bskur ba dang phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor dang cho ga dang / dbang bskur ba dang tshe dang nad med pa dang / dbang phyug dang bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ sgrub pa'i thabs thams cad dang ldan pa rgyud shes pa dang / shes
50a3(rgyud 'bum): bya dang dus dang mi snang ba dang / rgyal po'i zhing du gyur pa 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba shes par byed pa mdor na sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ rang gi yon tan dang mthun pa'i
50a4(rgyud 'bum): sngags kyi spyod pa rjes su 'jug pa/ sems can gzhan dga' bar byed pa mi snang bar 'gro ba/ nam mkha' la 'gro ba/ chu la mi nub par 'gro ba/ yid gzhungs par byed pa/ 'gugs par byed pa/ sa 'og tu 'jug pa/ mngon du spyod par
50a5(rgyud 'bum): byed pa/ 'dod pa thams cad thob par byed pa/ gnod sbyin dang / gnod sbyin mo thams cad dang / mngag gzhug pa dang sha za dang 'byung po thams cad 'gugs par byed pa/ byis pa dang / rgan po dang gzhon nu gnas ci lta ba bzhin 'jog par byed pa/

50a7(rgyud 'bum): pa chen po'i rin po che'i le'u rab 'byam 'di ngas kyang rjes su gnang zhing sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang gsungs te/ sems can dag pa'i rang gi sngags spyod pa'i don gyi chos kyi mdzod/ skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po

54b4(rgyud 'bum): dag pa gang na 'dug pa der phyin par gyur to/ /phyin nas kyang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la mchod pa'i las la brtson pa'i yid kyis gnas par gyur to/ /der gnas pa na bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i nye ba na gnas pa'i byang chub sems

58b8(rgyud 'bum): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'di dang 'jig rten gyi khams brgya phrag stong du ma'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul dang mnyam pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
59a1(rgyud 'bum): yang dag par rab tu g.yos te/ snang ba chen pos gsal bar yang byas nas/ rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs skyed pa ston te/ rang gi sngags kyi tshig kyang ston pa la/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA~M/ a b+hA ba swa b+hA ba mung+ga tA nA~M/
59a2(rgyud 'bum): namaHpra t+ye ka bud d+hA nA~M Ar+ya shra ba kA nA~M/ na mo bo d+hi sa twA nA~M/ da sha b+hU mi pra ti te shwa rA nA~M/ bo d+hi sa twA nA~M/ ma hA sa twA nA~M/ tad+ya thA/ u0f00 kha kha khA hi khA hi/ duSh+Ta sa twa da ma ka a si mu sa la pam+tu pA sha hasta/ tsa tu dza/ tsa turmu kha/
59a3(rgyud 'bum): Sha Ta tsa ra Na/ gats+tsha gats+tsha/ sarba big+h+na bin+ta ka /bi krI tA nan/ sarba b+hU ta b+ha yaM kar/ aT+TAT+Ta hA sa ni nA di ne/ bya g+h+ra tsarma ni bA sa na/ ku ru ku ru/ sarba d+harmA na/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ sarba man+t+rA na/ b+hin+d+ha b+hin+d+ha/ pa ra mu drAn/ A kaR+Sha ya/
59a4(rgyud 'bum): A kaR+Sha ya/ sarba b+hU tA na/ nirma tha nirma tha/ sarba duSh+TA na/ pra be sha ya pra be sha ya/ maN+Da la ma d+h+ye/ bai ba swa ta dzI bi tAn+ta ka ra/ ku ru ku ru ma ma sarba kAr+yam/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ mA bi lam+ba/ mA bi lam+ba/ sa ma ya ma nu smar/ hU~M hU~M phaT/
59a5(rgyud 'bum): s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ sarba A sha pa ri pU ra ka /he b+ha ga bAn kiny+tsi rA ya si ma ma sarbA R+tha~M sA d+ha ya swA hA/ 'di ni bac+doMs 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i khro bo chen po gshin rje'i gshed ces bya ba yin te/ gshin rje'i rgyal po yang 'aj+so~M
59a6(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / 'gugs par byed pa yin na/ sems can gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos/ khro bo'i rgyal po chen pos gzungs sngags 'di smras ma thag tu sems can thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lhags par gyur te/ 'jigs pa dang nyam thag
59a7(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / dngangs pa dang yid skyo ba dang snying 'gas par 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ma gtogs par skyabs gzhan med skyob pa gzhan med dpung gnyen gzhan med par gyur to/ /de nas gang su dag
59a8(rgyud 'bum): sa la gnas pa dang chu la gnas pa dang / nam mkha' la gnas pa dang / brtan par gnas pa dang / mi brtan par gnas pa dang / mngal nas skyes pa dang / sgo nga las skyes pa dang / drod gsher las skyes pa dang rdzus te skyes pa'i
59b1(rgyud 'bum): sems can gyi grangs su gtogs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa dag na rnam par gnas pa steng dang / 'og dang thad ka dang phyogs dang phyogs mtshams dag tu skad cig de dang yud tsam de la gab cing gnas
59b2(rgyud 'bum): pa dag skad cig de nyid la/ khro bo'i rgyal po chen pos 'di nyid du bkug par gyur to/ /khro bo'i rgyal po'i sngags 'di ni 'dod chags dang ma bral ba rnams kyi mdun du brjod par mi bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de yang 'chi
59b3(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur ba'am/ skam par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /dam tshig la dmigs par byas nas sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs sam sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten nam/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i sku gzugs
59b4(rgyud 'bum): kyi spyan sngar bzlas par bya'o/ /yang na las gzhan gyi ched du brjod par bya ste/ gang de dang de dag tu ni brjod par mi bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ltas ngan chen po dang / mya ngan chen po dang / bdag nyid 'jigs pa chen por 'gyur
59b5(rgyud 'bum): ba'i phyir ro/ /thugs rje mchog dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kho na'i spyod pa rjes su bsgrub cing bstan pa
59b6(rgyud 'bum): dang / sems can thams cad dbang du bya ba dang / chos kyi tshul yang dag par gnas par bya ba dang / sems can gyi khams mtha' dag mya ngan las 'das pa yang dag par thob par bya ba dang / bstan pa med pa dag
59b7(rgyud 'bum): tu bstan pa dang / lam gsum la yang dag par sbyor ba dang dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi bcad pa dang / sngags kyi spyod pa bstan pa'i phyir dang / thugs rje chen po'i mthu'i rgyu mthun pa'i thugs kyi bdud
59b8(rgyud 'bum): kyi stobs zil gyis gnon pa dang / bgegs chen po rnam par gzhig pa dang / rgyal po ma rungs pa rnam par gzhom pa dang / bdag gi stobs rnam par 'phel bar bya ba dang / gzhan gyi stobs rnam par gzhig
60a1(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / rengs par bya ba dang gsad pa dang / mi snang bar bya ba dang / rab tu bstan pa dang / nye bar sgom pa dang / dga' bar bya ba dang / rang gi sngags kyi spyod pa rab tu bstan pa dang / tshe dang nad med pa dang dbang phyug mngon
60a2(rgyud 'bum): par 'phel bar bya ba dang / myur ba'i las rjes su bsgrub pa dang / byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po dang btang snyoms chen po dang / dga' ba chen po'i yang dag par sdom pa la gnas pa dang de dag gi rgyu mtshan du rtog pa dang / rnam par
60a3(rgyud 'bum): rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba'i sems kyis smras so/ /de nas klu dang klu chen po de dag dang / gnod sbyin dang gnod sbyin chen po dang / srin po dang srin po chen po dang / sha za dang sha za chen po dang srul po dang srul po chen po dang lus srul
60a4(rgyud 'bum): po dang lus srul po chen po dang / ma mo dang ma mo chen mo dang / grul bum dang grul bum chen mo dang / gcan gzan dang gcan gzan chen po dang / ro langs dang ro langs chen po dang / ka tse'i mi dang / ka tse'i mi chen po dang / srin
60a5(rgyud 'bum): mo dang sring mo chen mo dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang mkha' 'gro ma chen mo dang / gzhib pa dang gzhib pa chen po dang / g.yengs byed dang g.yengs byed chen po dang / byis pa dang byis pa chen po dang / bran pa dang bran pa chen po dang /
60a6(rgyud 'bum): nad dang nad chen po dang / brjed byed dang brjed byed chen po dang / gdon dang gdon chen po dang / nam mkha'i ma mo dang nam mkha'i ma mo chen mo dang / gzugs can ma dang gzugs can ma chen mo dang / ngu 'bod dang ngu 'bod chen po dang /
60a7(rgyud 'bum): grib gnon dang grib gnon chen po dang / sbod gtong dang sbod gtong chen po dang / mngag gzhug ma dang mngag gzhug ma chen mo dang / gnod sbyin mo dang gnod sbyin mo chen mo dang / sha za mo dang sha za mo chen mo dang / rims
60a8(rgyud 'bum): nad dang rims nad chen po dang / rims nyin bzhi pa dang nyin bzhi pa chen po dang / rtag pa'i rims dang rims mi bzad pa dang / rtag pa las byung ba'i rims dang / yud tsam las byung ba dang rlung las gyur pa dang /
60b1(rgyud 'bum): mkhris pa las gyur pa dang / bad kan las gyur pa dang / 'dus pa las gyur pa dang / gcong chen po dang / grub pa dang grub pa chen po dang / rnal 'byor dang ldan pa dang / rnal 'byor dang ldan pa chen po
60b2(rgyud 'bum): dang / drang srong rnams dang / drang srong chen po rnams dang / mi 'am ci dang / mi 'am ci chen po dang / brang 'gro dang brang 'gro chen po dang / dri za dang dri za chen po dang / lha dang lha chen po dang / mi dang mi chen po
60b3(rgyud 'bum): dang / yul mi dang yul mi chen po dang / rgya mtsho dang rgya mtsho chen po dang / chu bo dang chu bo chen po dang / ri dang ri chen po dang / gter dang gter chen po dang / sa dang sa chen po dang / shing dang shing chen po dang /
60b4(rgyud 'bum): 'dab chags can dang 'dab chags can chen po dang / rgyal po dang rgyal po chen po dang / brgya byin dang brgya byin chen po dang / nor lha'i bu dang / ngu zhig dang 'byung ba chen po'i bdag po dang / dbang ldan dang /
60b5(rgyud 'bum): gshin rje dang / tshangs pa dang tshangs pa chen po dang / lha sna tshogs bzo bo dang / nor sbyin dang / yul 'khor skyong dang / 'phags skyes po dang / mig mi bzang dang / lus ngan po dang / gang ba bzang dang / nor bu
60b6(rgyud 'bum): bzang dang / lngas rtsen dang / dzam b+ha la dang / stam b+ha la dang / kum b+ha la dang / sngon po dang / skra sngon po dang / seng ge dang / 'phrog ma dang / ser skya ma dang / dga' byed dang / nor byed dang / chu dbang dang / 'jig rten dbang
60b7(rgyud 'bum): po dang nye dbang dang / gsang ba pa dang / gsang ba pa chen po dang / g.yo dang / g.yo byed dang / chu na spyod pa dang / g.yung drung ri dang / zla ba'i ri dang / ri bo chen po dang / brtsegs mig dang / mgo bo gsum pa ste/ de dag dang gzhan
60b8(rgyud 'bum): yang gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po gnod sbyin bye ba khri phrag brgya stong du ma'i 'khor de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen pos byin gyis brlabs pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang gi 'khor
61a1(rgyud 'bum): gyi dkyil 'khor chen po der rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs bskyed pas 'dus par gyur te chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khod do/ /gang yang srin po'i rgyal po chen po de dag gnod sbyin bye ba khri phrag brgya stong du ma
61a2(rgyud 'bum): 'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ khro bo'i rgyal po chen pos bkug pa la 'di lta ste/ sgra sgrogs dang nor ldan dang rnam par 'ju byed dang / gzer rna dang bum rna dang kun nas rna ba dang / gshin rje dang rnam par 'jigs byed dang 'jigs byed dang
61a3(rgyud 'bum): mi bzad pa dang sdig ldan dang / dbang po rgyal dang 'thab pa dang legs par 'thab pa dang / mdung dang mdung rtse gsum pa dang / mgo gsum pa dang mgo mtha' yas pa yang chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dus par gyur to/ /gang yang sha za chen po/
61a4(rgyud 'bum): sha za'i 'khor bye ba khri phrag brgya stong du ma dang ldan pa de dag kyang 'di lta ste/ pI lu dang nye ba'i pI lu dang / pI lu bzang po dang / pI lu mtha' yas dang / bsam pa dang bsam pa ma yin pa dang / gdung ba bzang po dang za byed dang / gzi brjid bzang po dang
61a5(rgyud 'bum): mi bzad pa dang mi bzad pa'i gzugs can yang chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dus par gyur to/ /gang yang klu'i rgyal po chen po klu bye ba khri phrag brgya stong du ma'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ khro bo'i rgyal po chen pos byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i rdzu
61a6(rgyud 'bum): 'phrul gyi stobs kyis bkug pa la 'di lta ste/ dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo dang / la ba dang nye ba'i la ba dang / nor ldan dang / mtha' yas dang / 'jog po dang pad+ma dang / pad+ma chen po dang 'dus pa skyong dang / dung dang dung skyong dang kak+kU Ta dang /
61a7(rgyud 'bum): rigs ldan dang / rigs med ldan dang / nga rgyal can dang / bum chu can dang / rdo rje can dang me tog tsam pa ka las byung ba dang nor ldan klu dang / nga rgyal 'joms dang / mtshon dpus dang nye ba'i dpus dang / dbyig pa dang dbyig pa chen po dang / dkar po
61a8(rgyud 'bum): dang dkar po bzang dang / sngo ba dang chu sbyin sngo ba dang 'o ma'i chu dang sog ma med dang / rgya mtsho dang nye ba'i rgya mtsho ste/ de dag dang gzhan yang klu'i rgyal po brgya stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang ldan pa de dag kyang chos mnyan pa'i phyir
61b1(rgyud 'bum): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po der 'dus shing 'khod par gyur to/ /gang yang drang srong dang drang srong chen po de dag la 'di lta ste/ rgyun shes kyi bu dang / gnas 'jog dang / gau ta ma dang / b+ha go ra tha dang / dza h+nu dang / ang gi ra sa dang /
61b2(rgyud 'bum): a ma ti dang / pu la sti dang / ri byi dang / rgyas pa dang / nag po dang / gau ta ma nag po dang / me dang / me'i rgyud dang / dza ma da g+ni dang yod pa pa dang thub pa mchog dang / gos can dang bai sham pA yA na dang rtsib logs skyes dang / mo mtshan gnyis las skyes dang
61b3(rgyud 'bum): dgra sta dang rnal 'byor dbang phyug dang / shing pi pa la gnas pa dang / shing pi pa la za ba dang / grog mkhar skyes dang nyi ma'i rigs te/ de dag dang gzhan yang drang srong chen po brgya stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang ldan pa de dag kyang / 'khor gyi dkyil
61b4(rgyud 'bum): 'khor der nye bar phyin te/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal nas sngags spyod pa'i don byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod mnyan pa'i phyir dang / rjes su yi rang ba'i don du 'khod par gyur to/ /gang yang lto 'phye chen po'i rgyal
61b5(rgyud 'bum): po de dag kyang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po der chos mnyan pa'i phyir rab tu zhugs te/ 'khod pa la 'di lta ste/ e raN+Da dang / te raN+Da dang / 'od zer gyi bu dang 'od zer dang snang ba dang snang ba bzang po'o/ /gang yang nam mkha' lding gi rgyal
61b6(rgyud 'bum): po de dag kyang nam mkha' lding brgya stong du ma'i 'khor dang ldan pa 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor der 'dus pa la 'di lta ste/ 'od bzang dang / 'dab dkar dang / rkang med 'gro dang / 'dab 'gro dang / 'dab bzangs skyes dang / 'dab med skyes dang / yid
61b7(rgyud 'bum): ltar mgyogs dang / klu rnam 'jigs dang / rnam 'dud bu dang / ba ra dwa dza dang / bya dang / bya chen po dang / 'dab ldan tshogs te/ de dag kyang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du 'du bar gyur to/ /gang yang mi 'am ci'i rgyal po mi 'am ci'i 'khor brgya stong phrag du
61b8(rgyud 'bum): ma dang ldan pa de dag kyang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor der 'dus pa la 'di lta ste/ ljon pa dang nye ba'i ljon pa dang ljon pa bzang po dang / ljon pa mtha' yas dang 'jig rten ljon pa dang ljon pa bral dang / brang rgyas dang brang chen po dang gzi brjid chen po
62a1(rgyud 'bum): dang rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / khyad par sgra dang / skad snyan dang yid du 'ong ba'i sems skyed par byed pa dang rigs mtho ba dang mtho sgra dang / btang snyoms pa dang / snying rje ldan dang chu lha dang / de dag dang gzhan yang mi 'am ci'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul che
62a2(rgyud 'bum): ba mi 'am ci'i 'khor brgya stong phrag du ma dang ldan pa chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor der 'dus par gyur to/ /de bzhin du mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / tshangs pa chen po dang / 'od gsal dang / 'od kyi sgra dang / dag pa'i 'od dang / bsod nams
62a3(rgyud 'bum): 'od dang mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / 'og min dang 'og bzang dang / ci yang med pa dang / ci yang med min dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas dang legs ldan dang legs ldan mthong dang / sprul pa bzang po dang yongs su sprul pa dang gnas gtsang ma dang / dga' ldan dang 'thab bral dang sum
62a4(rgyud 'bum): cu rtsa gsum dang rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris dang / rtag tu myos dang phreng thogs dang gzhong thogs dang pi bang gsum pa dang ri bor gnas pa dang khang rtseg gnas pa dang / rtse mor gnas pa dang lcang lo can na gnas pa dang grong khyer na gnas pa dang gzhal
62a5(rgyud 'bum): med khang na gnas pa dang bar snang la gnas pa dang / sa la gnas pa dang shing la gnas pa dang khyim na gnas pa dang / de bzhin du lha ma yin gyi dbang po rab tu tshim byed dang / stobs ldan dang thags bzangs ris dang shin tu bkra dang bde bkra dang rig byed
62a6(rgyud 'bum): bkra dang / sgra gcan dang lag pa dang de dag la sogs pa lha ma yin bye ba khri phrag brgya stong du ma'i 'khor dang ldan pa 'gros sna tshogs dang / nor sna tshogs dang lha dang 'thab pa'i lha ma yin de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs dang / byang
62a7(rgyud 'bum): chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor der 'dus par gyur to/ /gang yang gza' dang gza' chen po de dag 'jig rten gyi khams su spyod pa/ bar snang la spyod pa la
62a8(rgyud 'bum): 'di lta ste/ nyi ma dang zla ba dang mig dmar dang gza' lhag dang phur bu dang pa pa sangs dang spen pa dang sgra gcan dang sa 'gul dang mjug rings dang / gnam lcags 'byin dang skar ma dang rgyal mtshan dang / mi bzad dang dud ldan dang dud pa dang
62b1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje dang 'byor pa dang / char 'bebs dang nye ba'i char 'bebs dang / nor 'dzin dang mi snang byed dang rgod ldan dang rting bar ldan dang 'dod pa dang / ma rungs pa dang 'jig rten mthar byed dang rnam par ltung byed dang / kun du ltung byed dang / rtog pa dang
62b2(rgyud 'bum): gla sgang can dang dus kyi mtha' dang dur khrod dang sha drag ldan dang dkar po dang / byi bzhin dang byi bzhin gyi bu dang byams ldan dang gzer bu dang / gzer bu gsum dang rngon pa dang gseng phrom dang / brtan pa dang 'jig byed dang stobs ldan dang mi bzad
62b3(rgyud 'bum): pa dang skya rengs dang rnam par rgod pa dang 'chi ltas min dang / skem byed dang kun bged dang / nye ba'i kun bged dang / gzhon nu dang / rtse med dang / rgod byed dang / rab tu rgod byed dang / sems par byed pa dang / gar byed dang / 'theng po dang / gzugs ngan te/ gza' chen po de dag kyang rgyu
62b4(rgyud 'bum): skar brgya stong phrag du ma'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa la 'di lta ste/ tha skar dang / bra nye dang / smin drug dang / snar ma dang / mgo dang / lag dang / nab so dang / rgyal dang / skag dang / mchu dang / gre dang / dbo dang / me bzhi dang / nag pa dang / sa ri dang / sa
62b5(rgyud 'bum): ga dang / lha mtshams dang / na dang / snrubs dang / chu stod dang / chu smad dang / gro bzhin dang / mon gru dang / mon gre dang / khrums stod dang / khrums smad dang / nam gru dang / lha mo 'dra dang / byi bzhin dang pu na rna ba dang / 'od dang / ang gi ra si dang / rgyu skar dang nye ba'i gre
62b6(rgyud 'bum): dang / gre ldan dang / 'jig rten rab mchog dang / rab mchog ldan dang / dpal ldan dang / 'jig rten mgon po dang / chang ldan dang / rgyal byed dang / nor ldan dang lha don te/ de ltar rgyu skar gyi rgyal po de dag kyang de'i tshe gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang du
62b7(rgyud 'bum): rgyu skar brgya stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po der 'dus te 'khod par gyur to/ /khyim sum cu rtsa drug la 'di lta ste/ lug dang / glang dang / sbyor ba dang / sbal
62b8(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / seng ge dang / bu mo dang / srang dang / sdig pa dang / gzhu dang / chu srin dang / bum pa dang / nya dang / mi'u thung dang / nye ba'i bum pa dang / b+h+ring ga ra dang / ral gri dang / glang po che dang / ma he dang / lha dang / mi dang / dge ltas dang / dri za dang / 'jig rten dang / g.yung drung rgyal dang /
63a1(rgyud 'bum): drag po'i gzi brjid dang / zla ba'i 'od dang / sa dang / mun pa dang / rdul dang / nye ba'i rdul dang / sdug bsngal dang / bde ba dang / byang chub dang / so so gcig dang / nyan thos dang / dmyal ba'i rig pa 'dzin pa dang / gzi brjid
63a2(rgyud 'bum): chen po dang / gzi brjid chen po ldan dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dags dang / lha ma yin dang / sha ldan dang / sha za dang / /gnod sbyin srin po dang / 'byung po thams cad pa dang / 'byung ba pa dang / phyogs kyi glang po dang / steng 'gro dang / thad kar 'gro dang /
63a3(rgyud 'bum): kha bye ba dang / bsam gtan 'gro dang / rnal 'byor 'gro dang / rab tu gnas dang / mchog dang / bar ma dang tha ma ste/ khyim chen po de dag kyang khyim brgya stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang ldan pa gang na gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang gang na
63a4(rgyud 'bum): bar 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po der lhags shing phyin te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la btud nas rang rang gi gnas su 'khod par gyur to/ /gang yang gnod sbyin mo dag gnod sbyin mo brgya stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang bcas
63a5(rgyud 'bum): pa la 'di lta ste/ mig bzang ma dang / smin bzang ma dang / skra bzang ma dang / skad snyan ma dang / blo bzang ma dang / dge ldan ma dang / sna tshogs mig ldan ma dang / rdzogs byed ma dang / gsang ba ma dang / bzang po ma dang / ska rags bzang po
63a6(rgyud 'bum): ma dang / pad+ma ltar smra ba dang / 'jigs byed ma dang / mi 'jigs sbyin ma dang / rgyal ma dang / rnam par rgyal ma dang / nam gru ma dang / sgra gcan ma dang / sgra mthar byed ma dang / rlung ma dang / yid 'phrog ma dang / yid ldan ma dang / me tog ldan ma
63a7(rgyud 'bum): dang / me tog gi grong khyer la gnas ma dang / ser skya ma dang / 'phrog ma dang / dpal ldan ma dang / dpa' mo dang / dpa' bzang mo dang / shin tu mi bzad ma dang / mi bzad ldan ma dang / lha mdzes ma dang / ro bzang ma dang / gsang ba dam pa ma dang / shing la
63a8(rgyud 'bum): mu la gnas ma dang / mya ngan med ma dang / mun par mdzes ma dang / snang bar mdzes ma dang / 'od ldan ma dang / lhag par ldan ma dang / gzugs mdzes ma dang / dkar med ma dang / zhi ba ma dang / phyogs mtshams ma dang / stug ma dang / dga' byed
63b1(rgyud 'bum): ma dang / nye ba'i dga' byed ma dang / 'jig rten las 'das ma ste/ gnod sbyin mo chen mo 'di dag gnod sbyin mo brgya stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang ldan pa 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po der rgyang ring po nyid
63b2(rgyud 'bum): nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal zhing 'khod par gyur to/ /gang yang sha za mo dag sha za mo brgya stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po der rgyang ring po nyid nas bcom ldan 'das
63b3(rgyud 'bum): shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal zhing 'khod par gyur pa la 'di lta ste/ sdud ma dang phyag dar khrod kyi sha za mo dang / sha za mo drag mo dang sha za mo skar mda' ma dang sha za mo 'bar ma dang thal ba za ma dang sha za ma
63b4(rgyud 'bum): dang / dug ma dang bung ba ma dang rmongs byed ma dang sdigs mdzub ma dang / dmar ldan ma dang glang dmar ma dang 'jig rten nye gnas ma dang thal bar nye gnas ma dang shing pi lu dang ldan ma dang / mang ldan ma dang mang
63b5(rgyud 'bum): ma dang gdul dka' ma dang / e la ma dang mtshon byed ma dang du ba la gnas ma dang du ba ma ste/ sha za mo chen mo 'di dag sha za mo'i 'khor bye ba brgya stong phrag du ma dang bcas pa de dag kyang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor
63b6(rgyud 'bum): chen po der 'dus shing rab tu zhugs par gyur to/ /gang yang ma mo dang ma mo chen mo dag 'jig rten gyi rjes su rnam par spyod cing / sems can rnams la 'tshe bar byed cing / gtor ma dang / me tog dman
63b7(rgyud 'bum): ma la spyod par byed pa dag la 'di lta ste/ tshangs pa ma dang / dbang phyug chen mo ma dang / khyab 'jug ma dang / gzhon nu ma dang / rgan byad ma dang / phag mo dang / dbang mo dang / gshin rje mo dang / me phyogs ma dang / nyi ma'i
63b8(rgyud 'bum): bu mo dang / 'jig rten mthar byed ma dang / chu lha ma dang / dbang ldan ma dang / rlung phyogs ma dang / gzhan gyi srog 'phrog ma dang / mgo bregs ma dang / bya ma dang / bya ma chen mo dang / srul mo dang / lus srul mo dang / skem byed ma ste/
64a1(rgyud 'bum): ma mo chen mo de dag kyang ma mo'i 'khor bye ba khri phrag brgya stong du ma dang bcas pa de dag kyang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po der sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i tshig
64a2(rgyud 'bum): 'don cing 'khod par gyur to/ /de bzhin du mi dang mi ma yin pa bye ba khri phrag brgya stong du ma dang / sems can dang sems can ma yin pa nas dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa nas srid pa'i rtse mo'i
64a3(rgyud 'bum): bar du thams cad kyang skabs 'dir nam mkha'i dkyil du snang bar gyur to/ /sems can gyi ris na srog chags su la yang phan tshun mi mthun pa med par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs
64a4(rgyud 'bum): dang byang chub sems dpa'i cho 'phrul gyi rgyan gyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa sems can thams cad kyi spyi bo'i gtsug na bzhugs par mthong bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya
64a5(rgyud 'bum): thub pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rnam par gzigs nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ dag pa'i sems dpa' sngags kyi spyod pa'i
64a6(rgyud 'bum): don rnam par gtan la dbab pa dang ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u rab 'byam byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod gang 'di bshad pa'i dus la bab par sems na shod cig / de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
64a7(rgyud 'bum): pa bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas rjes su gnang bar mdzad pa na/ nam mkha'i ngo bo dang 'dra ba'i rdo rje mthug cing sra ba'i rgyud bkod pa'i rgyan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ 'jam dpal
64a8(rgyud 'bum): gzhon nur gyur pa de snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang de dpag tshad brgya stong du ma rgya che ba'i rdo rje'i rang bzhin du lhag par gnas par gyur to/ /gang du gnod sbyin dang srin po
64b1(rgyud 'bum): dang dri za dang rlung lha dang sha za de dag dang / mdor na sems can gyi khams thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis gzhal med khang de dag rdo rje'i nor bu rin po che lta bur gyur te/ der rab tu zhugs nas 'khod par gyur
64b2(rgyud 'bum): kyang phan tshun rnam par 'tshe bar byed pa med do/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po de 'dus par gyur par shes nas khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje'i gshed la smras pa/ kye khro bo chen po sangs rgyas dang
64b3(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rjes su nges par 'byung bar byed pa/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dus pa 'di'i sems can thams cad la srungs shig srungs shig /dbang du gyis shig ma rungs pa gdul bar gyis shig sems can
64b4(rgyud 'bum): zhi ba dag sad par gyis shig / sems can thams cad dad par gyis shig /ci srid du nga'i rang gi sngags kyi spyod pa rjes su sgrub pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod rgya che ba dag las sngags spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga 'chad
64b5(rgyud 'bum): par byed pa de srid kyi bar du 'di dag gi phyi rol du song la srung ba gyis shig / de skad ces smras pa dang / khro bo'i rgyal po chen pos bka' mnyan nas/ khro bo chen po'i gzugs kyis sems can thams cad rjes su bsrung ba dang rjes su bstan
