64b6(rgyud 'bum): p a'i phyir 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed khro bo'i 'khor brgya stong phrag du ma phyogs bzhi kun dang steng dang 'og dang thad ka dag tu shin tu mi bzad pa'i sgra rab tu 'don cing gnas par
64b7(rgyud 'bum): gyur to/ /de nas sems can de dag zhi ba dang yid dang sems bzang po dang ldan par gyur te bka' las mi 'da' bar byed par gyur to/ /'di lta bu'i sgra yang thos par gyur te/ gang dam tshig 'di las 'da' bar byed pa de
64b8(rgyud 'bum): dag ni a rdza ka'i dog pa bzhin du mgo tshal pa brgyar 'gas par 'gyur te/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyi rlabs kyang de yin no/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas rang gi sngags kyi spyod pa'i don du chos
65a1(rgyud 'bum): kyi tshig smras pa/ chos gcig la yang dag par bsams na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sngags 'grub par 'gyur te/ gcig po gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad spros pa med pa'i
65a2(rgyud 'bum): rnam par rjes su mthong ba'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gnyis la rab tu gnas na sngags 'grub par 'gyur te/ gnyis po gang zhe na byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba nyid dang / sems can thams cad
65a3(rgyud 'bum): la sems mnyam pa'o/ /chos gsum dang ldan na sngags kyi spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ gsum po gang zhe na/ sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba nyid dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi sdom pa srung ba dang /
65a4(rgyud 'bum): rang gi sngags yongs su mi gtong ba nyid do/ /chos bzhi dang yang dag par ldan na dang po sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sngags 'grub par 'gyur te/ bzhi po gang zhe na/ rang gi sngags yongs su mi gtong ba nyid dang / gzhan gyi sngags
65a5(rgyud 'bum): rjes su spyod pa med pa nyid dang / sems can thams cad la byams pas gnas pa nyid dang / snying rje chen pos yongs su bsgos pa'i sems pa nyid do/ /chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na dang po sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sngags
65a6(rgyud 'bum): 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /chos lnga dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod la 'jug cing sngags kyi spyod pa sgrub pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ lnga po gang zhe na/ rnam par dben pa'i phyogs yang dag par bsten pa nyid dang / /
65a7(rgyud 'bum): bas mtha' dgon pa sten par byed pa nyid dang / sems can gzhan la zhe sdang med pa nyid dang / 'jig rten pa'i sngags la mi lta ba nyid dang / tshul khrims dang thos pa dang spyod pa la gnas par byed pa nyid de chos lnga po 'di dag dang
65a8(rgyud 'bum): ldan na sngags spyod pa'i don 'grub cing yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /chos drug dang ldan na sngags kyi spyod pa 'grub cing yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ drug po gang zhe na/ dkon mchog gsum la dad pa rjes su mi gcod pa nyid dang /
65b1(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' la dang ba rjes su mi gcod pa nyid dang / 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sngags la kun du dga' ba nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings spros pa med pa la lta ba nyid dang / theg pa chen po'i mdo sde zab
65b2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i tshig gi don mi spong zhing skyo ba med pa'i sems nyid dang / sngags kyi spyod pa yongs su btsal ba dang / dge ba'i phyogs yongs su mi gtong ba nyid de/ chos drug po 'di dag dang ldan na rig pa'i spyod pa dang sngags 'grub cing
65b3(rgyud 'bum): yang dag par sgrub pa nyid du 'gyur ro/ /chos bdun dang ldan na rig pa sgrub pa'i dus kyi thabs thob par 'gyur zhing / sngags kyi spyod pa la rjes su spyod pa nyid du 'gyur te/ bdun po gang zhe na/ theg pa zab mo shes rab kyi
65b4(rgyud 'bum): pha rol tu phyin pa nyid sgom pa dang / klog pa dang / ston pa dang / 'don du 'jug pa dang / 'dri ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la mos pa nyid dang / dus dang / phyogs dang / nges par sdom pa dang / bzlas pa dang / sbyin sreg dang / mi smra ba
65b5(rgyud 'bum): dang / dka' thub la gzhol ba nyid dang / rtogs pa dang / blo dang / dran pa dang / shes rab dang / bstan pa la bsnyen pa nyid dang / byang chub kyi tshogs dang / theg pa chen po dang zab pa'i chos kyi tshul la yang dag par rab tu zhugs pa nyid dang rang dga'i
65b6(rgyud 'bum): sngags dgug pa'i bya ba la mkhas pa nyid dang / snying rje chen po dang / byams pa chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dang / dga' ba chen po nyid yongs su bsgom pa nyid dang spros pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams kyi chos kyi dbyings kyi de bzhin
65b7(rgyud 'bum): nyid la 'jug pa gnyis su med pa'i ngo bo'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su tshol ba nyid dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba nyid dang theg pa dman pa la dga' ba med pa nyid de/ chos bdun po de dag gis ni rig pa dang sngags 'grub
65b8(rgyud 'bum): cing yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /chos brgyad dang ldan na rig pa dang sngags kyi spyod pa'i don 'grub cing lam du 'gro bar 'gyur te/ brgyad po gang zhe na/ mthong ba dang ma mthong ba'i 'bras bu dag la blta ba dang sems par 'dod pa nyid dang /
66a1(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa'i 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa nyid la the tshom med cing dang ba nyid dang / phyin ci ma log pa'i sngags gzung ba dang bla ma la gus pa nyid dang / sangs rgyas
66a2(rgyud 'bum): dang byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyi sngags dang / rgyud dang spyod pa bstan pa mi slu ba bzung zhing bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gnas dang gnas ma yin pa rmi lam na mthong ba rab tu ston
66a3(rgyud 'bum): pa la mkhas pa nyid dang / ser sna dang gnyid dang rmugs pa mtha' dag dang bral bar byed cing rtag tu brtson 'grus rtsom la/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la bdag nyid 'bul bar byed pa nyid dang / mdor bsdu na dge
66a4(rgyud 'bum): ba'i rtsa bas chog mi shes shing go cha chen po bgos pa dang / bgegs thams cad rab tu sel bar 'dod pa nyid dang / byang chub kyi snying po gnon pa dang longs spyod chen po dang / dbang che bar grags par bdag nyid 'dod pa nyid dang dbang
66a5(rgyud 'bum): che bar grags pa'i gang zag la bsnyen pa dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang mi 'bral bar bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la nye bar gnas pa nyid de/ chos brgyad po 'di dag dang ldan na sngags
66a6(rgyud 'bum): spyad pa'i don 'grub pa'i yang dag pa'i lam du 'gyur ro/ /grogs po dag mdor na byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'bral ba dang / dkon mchog gsum la dad pa dang mchog tu sdug bsngal zhing tshul khrims nyams pa la yang
66a7(rgyud 'bum): mi skyo ba'i yid kyis rtag tu mngon par brtson pa la/ nga'i sngags kyi le'u rab 'byam mtha' yas shing rmad du byung ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i yid las byung ba 'grub par 'gyur te de las gzhan
66a8(rgyud 'bum): du shes par bya ba ma yin no/ /rnam par rtog pa med pa'i yid du byas nas nyam sad pa'i phyir yang bsgrub par bya ba yin no/ /de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang rang sangs rgyas
66b1(rgyud 'bum): dang 'phags pa nyan thos rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pa dag gis 'di skad du tshig rjod par byed de kye rgyal ba'i sras legs so legs so/ /sngags kyi spyod pa'i don rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i bya ba chos kyi tshul la rjes su 'jug
66b2(rgyud 'bum): pa dang mthun zhing chos bstan pa legs par bstan pa ni sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir ro/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas chos rnam pa sna tshogs bstan pa dang rjes su mthun zhing sngags kyi spyod pa dang rjes su mthun pa
66b3(rgyud 'bum): legs par bstan pa nyid do/ /rgyal po chen po gang la la zhig 'dus pa'i le'u 'di klog par 'gyur ba dang / 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang / yid la byed par 'gyur ba'am/ g.yul gyi thog mar glang po che'i steng du bzhag pa dang / me tog dang bdug pa dang / dri dang / phreng ba
66b4(rgyud 'bum): dang / byug pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mchod par byed na/ de la bdag cag byin gyis rlob par byed cing phyir rgol ba dang / dgra bo dag kyang dbang du 'gyur la gzhan gyi dmag gi dpung yang gzhig par bgyi'o/ /glegs bam la bris pa byas te rang gi
66b5(rgyud 'bum): khyim tu bzhag na de la rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo'am rgyal po'am rgyal po chen po'am rgyal mo'am rgyal mo chen mo'am/ dge slong ngam dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam dge bsnyen ma dag la srung ba chen po dang longs spyod chen po dang ldan pa dang / tshe ring
66b6(rgyud 'bum): ba nyid dang / nad med pa nyid dang / longs spyod rtag tu mngon par 'phel ba nyid kyang bgyi'o/ /de skad ces smras nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor cang mi smra bar gyur to/ /theg pa chen po sngags kyi spyod pa bstan pa'i cho ga zhib mo chen po las/ byang chub sems
66b7(rgyud 'bum): dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i le'u rab 'byam rtsa ba'i cho ga zhib mo las 'dus pa'i le'u ste dang po'o/ / // de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil
66b8(rgyud 'bum): 'khor la bltas nas/ /sems can thams cad kyi dam tshig la rjes su 'jug cing kun du lta ba zhes bya
67a1(rgyud 'bum): ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa snyoms par zhug ma thag tu lte ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs nas 'od zer bye ba brgya stong du ma'i 'khor dang ldan pa'i
67a2(rgyud 'bum): 'od zer phyung ste/ sems can gyi khams thams cad kun du snang bar byas nas slar log ste/ gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang snang bar byas nas 'khod par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
67a3(rgyud 'bum): chen po phyag na rdo rjes 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la smras pa/ sems can thams cad kyi dam tshig la rjes su zhugs pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi le'u rab 'byam gyi spyod pa sgrub pa/ sems can tha~Md
67a4(rgyud 'bum): kyi thun mong du gyur pa/ khyod kyi sngags kyi tshogs gang du sems can yang dag par zhugs na 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa tha~Md kyi sngags 'grub pa yang dag par thob par 'gyur bas/ sems
67a5(rgyud 'bum): dpa' chen po khyod smros shig smros shig / de skad ces smras pa dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po gnod sbyin gyi bdag po la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas mchog tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyud smras so/ /rig pa
67a6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad yang dag par bskul ba zhes bya ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa ston par yang byed do/ /lag pa g.yas pa bteg nas sor mo'i rtse mos 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la ston par byed de/ sor mo'i rtse mo de las rig
67a7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rgyal po bye ba khri phrag brgya stong du ma byung ste/ byung nas kyang gnas gtsang ma'i gnas kyi gzhal med khang thams cad snang ba chen pos gnas par gyur to/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas khro bo'i rgyal po gshin
67a8(rgyud 'bum): rje gshed kyi snying po las thams cad byed pa dang / dpa' bo gcig pa spyan drang ba dang gshegs su gsol ba dang / zhi ba dang rgyas pa dang / mngon spyod dang mi snang ba dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / sa 'og tu 'jug pa dang /
67b1(rgyud 'bum): chu la mi nub par 'gro ba dang dgug pa dang / rnam par dbye ba dang dbang du byed pa dang / dri thams cad dang phreng ba dang / mar me dag kyang rang gi rgyud kyi sngags kyis sbyin par byed de/ mdor na ji lta ji ltar
67b2(rgyud 'bum): sbyar ba de lta de ltar sgrub par byed pa ni yi ge gsum zhes bya ba/ stobs chen po don thams cad sgrub par byed pa/ khro bo'i rgyal po'i sngags smras pa de gang zhe na/ u0f00 AHhU~M/ 'di ni khro bo chen po de'i snying po ste las thams cad byed pa
67b3(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor thams cad dang sngags thams cad kyi spyod pa la sems dpa' chen po 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis smras te/ bgegs thams cad 'jigs par byed pa'o/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas lag pa g.yas
67b4(rgyud 'bum): pa bteg ste/ khro bo'i spyi bor gzhag pa byas so/ /'di skad du yang smras te/ sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dgongs su gsol/ gang su dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig
67b5(rgyud 'bum): rten gyi khams na rnam par gnas shing mtha' yas mu med pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dam tshig la lhag par gnas par gyis shig / de skad ces smras nas/ khro bo'i
67b6(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po la lag pa bskor nas btang bar gyur to/ /khro bo'i rgyal po chen po btang ma thag tu thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag tu song nas/ skad cig tsam gyis gang dag sdang ba'i bsam pa dang
67b7(rgyud 'bum): ldan pa'i sems can rdzu 'phrul che ba dag tshar bcad cing der bkug par gyur nas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang der yang dag par bcug ste/ gnas ji lta ba bzhin
67b8(rgyud 'bum): du gnas par byas nas sems can ma rungs pa dag la yang kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng ba'i tshogs su byas shing / spyi bo la yang dag par gnas par byas so/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de la yang bltas nas/
68a1(rgyud 'bum): sems can khyed cag thams cad nyon cig /gang yang dam tshig 'di las 'das par gyur na de la khro bo'i rgyal po 'dis chad pa gcod par 'gyur te gang gi phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi dam tshig ni 'da'
68a2(rgyud 'bum): bar bya ba ma yin te/ sngags kyi don gyi tshig gsang ba byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa rnams kyi mdor bstan pa brjod par bya yis/ de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad par bya'o/ /
68a3(rgyud 'bum): na maHsarba bud d+hA nA~M/ u0f00 ra ra smra ra a pra ti ha ta shA sa na/ ku mA ra rU pa d+hA ri Ne hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ grogs po dag 'di ni rtsa ba'i sngags yin te 'phags pa 'jam dpal zhes bya ba yin no/ /phyag rgya ni gtsug phud lnga pa zhes grags
68a4(rgyud 'bum): te de la rab tu sbyar bar bya'o/ /rtsa ba'i sngags 'di ni las thams cad pa zhes bya'o/ /snying po'i sngags 'di ni las thams cad byed cing shes pa yin te/ u0f00 bA kye daM na maH/ 'dir phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni gtsug phud gsum zhes bya ba yin te/
68a5(rgyud 'bum): longs spyod thams cad mngon par 'phel bar byed pa'o/ /'dir nye ba'i snying por 'gyur ba ni/ bAkye hU~M/ 'dir phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni gtsug phud gsum pa zhes grags pa yin te/ sems can thams cad 'gugs par byed pa yin no/ /'dir snying po
68a6(rgyud 'bum): mchog tu 'gyur ba ni ma~M/ 'dir phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni rma bya'i gdan zhes bya bar bstan pa yin te/ sems can thams cad dbang du byed pa'o/ /gzhan yang phyag rgya thams cad kyi snying po dpa' bo chen po zhes bya ba yi ge brgyad yod de/ dpal mchog
68a7(rgyud 'bum): tu byed pa/ dag byed chen po srid pa gsum gyi chos nye bar gcod par byed pa/ ngan 'gro thams cad zlog par byed pa/ zhi ba thams cad byed pa/ las thams cad byed pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba thob par byed pa/ sangs rgyas mngon sum
68a8(rgyud 'bum): du mthong ba bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa nyid bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/ sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir/ mchog tu gsang ba'i ngo bos nye bar gnas pa re ba thams cad
68b1(rgyud 'bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ gang du dran pa tsam gyis mtshams med pa lnga yang yongs su sbyong bar byed na bzlas pas lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de yang gang zhe na/ u0f00 A bI ra hU~M/ khe tsa ra/ grogs po dag 'di ni yi ge brgyad
68b2(rgyud 'bum): po dpa' bo chen po zhes bya ba/ gsang ba'i snying po'i bdag nyid yin te/ sangs rgyas nyid bzhin du rab tu nye bar gnas pa yin no/ /mdor na bya ba thams cad la yon tan gyi mtha' rgya chen po brjod par ni bskal pa bye ba khri phrag
68b3(rgyud 'bum): brgya stong du mar yang mi nus te/ 'dir phyag rgya yang stobs po che zhes par rnam par grags pa/ re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'o/ /spyan drang ba'i sngags ni/ u0f00 he he ku mA ra bi shwa rU pi NI/ sarba bA la b+hA Shi ta pra bo
68b4(rgyud 'bum): d+ha ne/ e h+ye hi b+ha ga bAn/ e h+ye hi ku mA ra/ Tha~M Da nut+pa la d+hA ri Ne maN+Da la ma d+h+ye tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nA~M hU~M/ mA bi baM ba ku ru phaT swA hA/ 'di ni bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gyi spyan drang ba'i sngags so/ /
68b5(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang /
68b6(rgyud 'bum): sha za dang / srin po dang / 'byung po thams cad kyi'ang yin no/ /tsan+dan gyi chur byas te/ lan bdun bsngags nas/ phyogs bzhi dang / steng dang / 'og dang / thams cad du gtor na sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / 'jam dpal gzhon
68b7(rgyud 'bum): nur gyur pa rang nyid 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dang / 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad dang / sngags dang de bzhin du 'byung po'i tshogs dang sems can thams cad 'gugs par 'gyur ro/ /na maHsarba bud d+hA nA~M/
68b8(rgyud 'bum): a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nA~M/ u0f00 d+hu d+hu ra d+hu ra d+hu ma bA si ni/ d+hu ma ra tsi shi hU~M tiSh+Tha sa ma ya ma nu sma ra swA hA/ bdug pa'i sngags so/ /tsan+dan dang / ga pur dang / gur gum gcig tu byas te/ bdug pas bdugs na de bzhin gshegs pa
69a1(rgyud 'bum): rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / sems can thams cad bdug pas tshim zhing dgyes nas bzhugs par 'gyur ro/ /'dir yang phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni/ /pad+ma'i phreng ba zhes grags pa/ /thams cad 'gugs
69a2(rgyud 'bum): byed zhi ba yin/ /spyan drang ba yi sngags la yang / /pad+ma'i phreng ba bzang po zhes/ /bya ba'i phyag rgya 'di nyid do/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / sems can thams cad byon pa la mchod yon dbul bar bya ste/ ga bur
69a3(rgyud 'bum): dang tsan+dan dang gur gum chu dang sbyar nas/ me tog ku su dang mA li ka dang / dbyar gyi me tog dang me tog pun nA ga dang me tog ba ku la dang / me tog paN+DI ta ga ru 'di dag gang yang rung ba'i me tog gam/ dus ci lta ba'i me tog
69a4(rgyud 'bum): dri zhim po bcug ste/ sngags 'dis mchod yon dbul bar bya'o/ na maHsarba bud d+hA nA~M/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nA~M/ tad+ya thA/ he he ma hA kA ru Ni ka bi shwa rU pa d+hA ra ni/ ar+g+ham pra tIts+tsha pa ya/ sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ maN+Da
69a5(rgyud 'bum): la ma d+h+ye pra be sha ya pra be sha ya/ sarba b+hu tA nu kaM pa ka grIh+na grIh+na hU~M/ aM ba ra bi tsA ri Ne swA hA/ 'dir yang phyag rgya ni gang ba zhes bya bar grags pa sems can thams cad dang rjes su mthun zhing brtan pa'o/ /'dir yang dri'i sngags su 'gyur ba ni/
69a6(rgyud 'bum): na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nA~M/ na maHsa man+ta gan+d+hA ba b+hA sa shri ye/ ta thA ga tA ya/ tad+ya thA/ ga ga ga na de/ gan+d+ha ma no ra the/ pra tIts+tsha pra tIts+tsha ma~M/ ga sa ma tA nu tsA ri Ni swA hA/ 'dir phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni lo ma zhes bya ba re ba thams cad
69a7(rgyud 'bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /'dir me tog gi sngags su 'gyur ba ni/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nA~M/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nA~M/ na maHsa~M ku su mi ta rA dza s+ya/ ta thA ga ta s+ya/ tad+ya thA/ ku su me ku su me ku su mA d+h+ye/ ku su ma pU ra
69a8(rgyud 'bum): bA si ni/ ku su ma ba ti swA hA/ bdug pa'i sngags 'di nyid dang gong du bstan pa'i bdug pas bdug par bya'o/ /sku ni rmad byung bsam mi khyab/ /sangs rgyas thams cad phyag 'tshal te/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa yi/ /
69b1(rgyud 'bum): gtor ma'i sngags ni bshad par bya/ na maHsarba bud d+hA nA~M/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nA~M/ tad+ya thA/ he he b+ha ga bAn/ ma hA sa twa sarbA lo ki te i ma~M ba li grIh+NA pa ya grIh+NA pa ya hU~M hU~M/ sarba bi shwa ra ra Ta Ta s+pha Ta swA hA/ 'dis
69b2(rgyud 'bum): ni bshos dbul bar bya ste/ 'byung po thams cad kyi gtor ma yang bya'o/ /'dir yang phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni/ /mdung zhes bya ba ma rungs pa/ /thams cad zlog par byed pa'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA~M/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nA~M/ sarba
69b3(rgyud 'bum): ta mo na d+ha kA ra bi d+h+wan sa nA~M/ na maHsa man+ta dz+yo ti gan d+hA rba b+hA sa shri ye/ ta thA ga tA ya/ tad+ya thA/ he he b+ha ga bAn/ dz+yo ti raSh+mi sha ta sa ha sra pra ti maN+Da ta sha rI ra bi kuR+ba bi kuR+ba ma hA bo d+hi sa twA sa man+ta dz+wa lod d+yo ti ta mUr ti
69b4(rgyud 'bum): khurda khurda/ a ba lo ka ya/ a ba lo ka ya mAn/ baM sarba/ sa twA nA~M tsa swA hA/ mar me'i sngags te 'dis mar me dbul bar bya'o/ /kha bye ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya ni/ sems can kun gyis mthong ba'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nA~M/
69b5(rgyud 'bum): a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nA~M/ tad+ya thA/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ dz+wa lA ya dz+wa lA ya/ hU~M bi b+ho da ka ha ri krISh+Na ping+ga la swA hA/ me'i bya ba byed pa'i sngags so/ /'dir yang phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni/ /sems can kun la 'od gsal byed/ /
69b6(rgyud 'bum): kha sbyar zhes byar 'jig rten grags/ /byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan gyir/ /thub pa mchog gis sngon bshad pa'o/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la
69b7(rgyud 'bum): smras pa gsang ba pa'i bdag po sngags kyi tshig 'di ni gsang ba dang bcas shing mchog tu gsang bar bya ba yin te/ khyod bu 'jig rten rnams grags pa'i/ /mi bzad pa ni gang yin pa/ /sngags
69b8(rgyud 'bum): rnams dag ni thams cad kyis/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis bsgrubs pa ste/ /spyi bo'i gdu bu zhes grags pa/ /rdo rje pad+ma'i rigs kyang yin/ /de ni rnam par gzhig bya'i phyir/ /rig pa 'di ni yang dag brjod/ /
70a1(rgyud 'bum): na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nA~M/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nA~M/ u0f00 ka ra ka ra/ ku ru ku ru/ ma ma kAr+ya~M b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ sarba big+h+na da ha da ha sarba badzra bi nA ya kan/ m+'ur d+ha dzI b-i tAn+ta ka ra ma hA bi krI ta r+'u pa d+hA ri Ni/ pa tsa pa tsa sarba
70a2(rgyud 'bum): duSh+TA na/ ma hA ga na pa ti dzI bi tAn+ta ka ra ban d+ha ban d+ha sarba gra hAn/ ShaT mu kha ShaT b+hu dza/ ShaT tsa ra Na ru dra mA na ya/ biSh+Nu mA na ya bra d+ya de ba mA na ya mA bi baM ba/ la hu la hu maN+Da la ma d+h+ye pra be sha ya/ sa ma ya ma nu sma ra
70a3(rgyud 'bum): hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M s+pha Ta s+pha Ta swA hA/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po 'di ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i mchog tu gsang ba'i sngags chen po gdong drug pa zhes bya ba yin te/ khro bo'i rgyal po bgegs thams cad 'jig par byed pa ste/
70a4(rgyud 'bum): 'di brjod pa tsam gyis sa bcu'i dbang phyug la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang 'jigs par byed pa yin na/ bgegs ma rungs pa lta smos kyang ci dgos 'di brjod pa tsam nyid kyis srung ba chen po byas par 'gyur ro/ /
70a5(rgyud 'bum): 'dir yang phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni/ /nag po chen po zhes bya ba'i/ /bgegs rnams thams cad 'jig byed pa'o/ /'di nyid kyi khro bo'i rgyal po'i snying po ni/ u0f00 hrIHSh+TIHbi krI tA na na hU~M sarba sha tru~M nA sha ya sta~M b+ha ya phaT phaT swA hA/ sngags
70a6(rgyud 'bum): 'di brjod pas dgra thams cad zug gzer chen po dang / nad chen po dang nyin bzhi pa'i rims kyis thebs par 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu dga' ba med pa dang / byams pa med pa dang / snying rje'i sems thob par mi 'gyur te/ bzlas pa
70a7(rgyud 'bum): zin gyi bar du grol bar mi 'gyur zhing 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa byed pa dag la bya'i/ zhi ba'i sems yod pa gzhan dag la ni ma yin no/ /phyag rgya ni rtse gsum chen po zhes bya ba sbyar bar bya'o/ /
70a8(rgyud 'bum): 'dir nye ba'i snying por 'gyur ba ni/ u0f00 tri kA la rU pa hU~M kha~M swA hA/ phyag rgya ni rtse gsum chen po zhes bya ba nyid sbyar bar bya'o/ /ma rungs pa thams cad la gang 'dod pa de byed par 'gyur ro/ /snying po'i mchog sangs rgyas thams cad
70b1(rgyud 'bum): kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i yi ge gcig pa zhes bya'o/ /hU~M/ 'di ni las thams cad byed pa'o/ /phyag rgya yang rtse gsum chen po zhes bya bar sbyar bar bya'o/ /phung khrol thams cad zlog par byed pa/ 'byung po thams cad dbang du byed
70b2(rgyud 'bum): pa ste/ mdor na khro bo'i rgyal po 'di ni las thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzlas pa byas na grub pa'i dus su khyad par du 'phags par 'gyur ro/ /'dir gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags su 'gyur ba ni/ na maH
70b3(rgyud 'bum): sarba bud d+hA nA~M/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nA~M/ tad+ya thA/ dza ya dza ya su dza ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka bi shwa rU pi Ni gats+tsha sarba bud d+hAsh+tsa/ bi sar dza ya sa pa rI pA ram swa b+hA ba nA~M tsa pra be sha ya sa ma ya ma nu sma ra sarbA sh+tsa me sid d+h+yan+tu
70b4(rgyud 'bum): man+t+ra pa da ma no ra thany+tsa/ me pa ri pU ra yan+tu swA hA/ 'di ni gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags te/ las thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o/ /phyag rgya ni bzang po'i gdan zhes bya ba yin te/ 'dis gdan la yang sbyar bar bya'o/ /yid
70b5(rgyud 'bum): kyis bzlas pa bdun byas te gshegs su gsol lo/ /'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor dang sngags dang sngags grub pa dag dang / dam tshig dang / bzlas pa dang / dus dang nges par
70b6(rgyud 'bum): sdom pa dag la yang sbyar bar bya'o/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la yang bltas te/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po dang / rang gi rig pa'i tshogs kyi sngags kyi le'u
70b7(rgyud 'bum): rab 'byam smras so/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nA~M/ a pra ti ha ta gA trA NA~M/ u0f00 ri Ti ni swA hA/ 'di ni 'jam dpal gyi rjes su 'brang ba skra can ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa/ las thams cad byed pa/ phyag rgya chen po gtsug phud lnga zhes bya ba
70b8(rgyud 'bum): dug gi las thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o/ /na maHsarba bud d+ha nA~M/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nA~M/ u0f00 ni ti Ti/ 'di ni nye ba'i skra can ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa yin te las thams cad byed pa'o/ /phyag rgya ni kha bye ba zhes bya ba gza' thams cad kyi las
71a1(rgyud 'bum): la sbyar bar bya'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nA~M/ a pra ti ha ta ga tI nA~M/ baM ni/ rig pa 'di ni pad+ma can zhes bya ste/ las thams cad byed cing dge ba'o/ /phyag rgya bzang po'i gdan zhes bya ba dang ldan
71a2(rgyud 'bum): pas gnod sbyin mo nges par dgug par bya'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nA~M/ a tsin t+yAd b+hu ta rU pI NA~M/ u0f00 Sh+Tai Sh+Tai swA hA/ phyag rgya mdung ni bsdam pa yis/ mkha' 'gro ma rnams 'joms par byed/ /sangs rgyas
71a3(rgyud 'bum): dag ni thams cad kyis/ /thams cad gzugs can rab bsngags pa/ /rig pa thod can zhes bya ba/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis bshad pa yin/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nA~M/ a pra ti ha ta tsa rI NA~M/ tad+ya thA/ u0f00 ba ra de
71a4(rgyud 'bum): swA hA/ phyag rgya gtsug phud gsum nyid ni/ /dpal sbyin byed pas sbyar bar bya/ /gzugs mnga' 'chang ba lha mo ni/ /myur du longs spyod sgrub byed pa'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nA~M/ a tsin t+yAd b+hu ta rU pI
71a5(rgyud 'bum): NA~M/ u0f00 b+hu ru swA hA/ phyag rgya mdung rtse yang dag sbyar/ /rims nad thams cad rnam 'jig yin/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA NA~M/ a tsin t+yAd b+hu ta rU pI NA~M/ u0f00 tA re swA hA/ rig pa phug ron zhes bya ba/ /
71a6(rgyud 'bum): las rnams kun la rab tu bsngags/ /phyag rgya mdung dang ldan pa yis/ /bgegs ni 'joms par byed pa yin/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nA~M/ a tsin t+yAd b+hu ta rU pI NA~M/ tad+ya thA/ u0f00 bi lo ki ni swA hA/ /
71a7(rgyud 'bum): rig pa snang ldan zhes bya ba/ /'jig rten thams cad dbang du byed/ /bde ba thams cad sbyin byed pa/ /gdong gi phyag rgya sbyar bar bya/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nA~M/ a tsin t+yAd b+hu ta rU pI NA~M/ tad+ya thA/ u0f00 bi shwe bi shwe
71a8(rgyud 'bum): sa~M b+hA be bi shwa rU pI Ni ka ha ka ha A be shwa be sha sa ma ya ma nu sma ra ru ru tiSh+Tha swA hA/ rig pa chen po stobs chen 'di/ /'jig rten 'dren pas bstan pa ste/ /mche ba'i phyag rgya ldan byas na/ /
71b1(rgyud 'bum): sems can thams cad 'bebs shing dge/ /'byung po kun la mchog sbyin pa/ /thams cad ces ni yang dag bsgrags/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nA~M/ a tsin t+yAd b+hu ta rA pI nA~M/ u0f00 shwe te shrI ba su swA hA/ rma bya'i gdan
71b2(rgyud 'bum): gyi phyag rgya yis/ /rnam dgod las ni thams cad byed/ /dkar mo chen mo zhes bya ba/ /rmad byung bsam med gzugs can te/ /'jig rten rnams kyi skal ldan byed/ /skyes pa bud med dbang du 'gyur/ /na maH
71b3(rgyud 'bum): sa man+ta bud d+hA nA~M/ a tsin t+yAd b+hu ta rU pI NA~M/ tad+ya thA/ u0f00 khi khi ri khi ri b+hang gu ri sarba sha truM sta~M b+ha ya dzam b+ha ya mo ha ya ba sha mA na ya swA hA/ rig pa 'di ni rig chen po/ /rnal 'byor ma zhes rab tu bstan/ /phyag rgya gdong gsum sbyar
71b4(rgyud 'bum): byas na/ /ma rungs sems can 'dul bar byed/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nA~M/ a pra ti ha ta shAk+ti pra tsa rI NA~M/ tad+ya thA/ u0f00 shrIH/ rig pa 'di ni dpal chen mo/ /'jig rten mgon gyis bstan pa ste/ /phyag rgya kha sbyar sbyar byas
71b5(rgyud 'bum): na/ /rgyal srid chen po sbyin byed pa'o/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nA~M/ sarba satwA b+ha ya pra da yi nA~M/ u0f00 a dzi te ku mA ra rU pI NI e h+ye hi A gats+tsha ma ma kAr+yaM ku ru swA hA/ rgyal byed ma zhes rnam grags pa/ /gzhon nu bdud rtsi las
71b6(rgyud 'bum): byung ba/ /rdzogs pa'i phyag rgya ldan pa yis/ /dgra rnams thams cad zlog par byed/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nA~M/ a tsin t+yAd b+hu ta rU pI NA~M/ tad+ya thA/ u0f00 dza ye swA hA/ bi dza ye swA hA/ a dzi te swA hA/ a pa rA dzi te swA hA/ sring mo bzhi zhes
71b7(rgyud 'bum): rnam grags pa/ /byang chub sems dpa'i rjes 'gro ba/ /sa rnams thams cad kun 'gro zhing / /kun la rjes su 'dzin byed pa'o/ /ming po gtum bu ru zhes grags/ /'di dag gi ni rjes su 'brang / /gru yi bzhon pa la zhon
71b8(rgyud 'bum): nas/ /rgya mtsho la ni gnas pa yin/ /khu tshur phyag rgya bcings pa yis/ /bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs byed/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nA~M/ lo kA grA d+hi pa tI nA~M/ tad+ya thA/ u0f00 ku mA ra ma hA ku mA ra kri Da kri Da/ shaM mu kha bo d+hi satwA
72a1(rgyud 'bum): nu dz+nyA ta/ ma yU rA sa na/ shak+to d+ya ta pA Ne/ ra ga rak+ta gan d+hA nu le pa na pri ya/ kha kha khA hi khA hi hU~M nrI t+ya nrI t+ya/ rak+ta puSh+pA rtsi ta mUrti sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/ b+h+ra ma b+h+ra ma/ b+h+rA ma ya b+h+rA ma ya/ lA hu lA hu mA
72a2(rgyud 'bum): bi lam+ba sarba kA Ni me ku ru ku ru/ bi tsi tra rU pa d+hA ri NA~M/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hU~M sarba bud d+hA nu dz+nyA ta swA hA/ skyob pa byang chub sems dpa' ni/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis bshad pa na/ /sa rnams ma lus rnam drug
72a3(rgyud 'bum): tu/ /kun nas yongs su rab tu g.yos/ /sems can kun gyi don phyir dang / /ma rungs sems can zlog pa'i phyir/ /mi bzad dbang phyug bu'i gzugs su/ /gdul ba'i don du 'dir ston te/ /skem
72a4(rgyud 'bum): byed dang ni mig dmar gyi/ /phyag mtshan gyis ni mtshon pa ste/ /snying rjes thugs ni brlan pa yis/ /'jam pa'i ngag gis gsungs pa yin/ /sems dpa'i nang na bdag nyid che/ /byis pa rnams la
72a5(rgyud 'bum): phan byed gang / /sems can spyod phyir brtson pa ni/ /'gro ba kun la rnam par spyod/ /phyag rgya mdung dang ldan pa yis/ /bdag nyid chen pos sbyar na ni/ /tshangs pa sogs pa'ang 'gugs byed na/ /mi rnams
72a6(rgyud 'bum): la ni smos ci dgos/ /gzhon nu'i sems su mtha' dag ni/ /bsdus nas yongs su bshad par bya/ /smin drug bu dang 'jam dpal gyi/ /sngags su 'di ni yang dag bstan/ /sems can rjes su gzung
72a7(rgyud 'bum): ba'i phyir/ /byang chub sems dpar 'di ston to/ /yig gsum zhes bya'i snying po ni/ /'di yi sngags su brjod pa yin/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /longs spyod 'dren pa'i mchog de yin/ /phyag rgya mdung dang ldan pa yis/ /
72a8(rgyud 'bum): bkod na las kun byed pa yin/ /u0f00 hU~M dz+dzaH/ sngags 'di mdo ru bsdu byas na/ /mi rnams kyi ni don byed do/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nA~M/ sa man+ta d+yo ti ta mU rtI nA~M/ u0f00 bi krI ta gra ha hU~M phaT swA hA/ 'di yang nye ba'i snying po ste/ /de bzhin phyag rgya mdung ldan pas/ /
72b1(rgyud 'bum): 'byung po thams cad 'gugs byed cing / /de bzhin gza' dang ma mor bcas/ /phyag rgya kun gyis phyag rgya la/ /bkod na 'bras bur bcas par 'gyur/ /'byung po rnams ni dngangs byed cing / /ma rungs 'jug pa
72b2(rgyud 'bum): zlog par byed/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di'i gdong drug gi bu zhes bya ba'i 'jam dpal gzhon nu'i rjes su 'brang ba ste/ las thams cad byed pa ste/ bzlas pa tsam kho nas las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /
72b3(rgyud 'bum): 'byung po thams cad dngangs par byed pa dang / skrag par byed pa dang / 'gugs par byed pa dang / dbang du byed pa dang skem par byed pa dang / 'jig par byed pa dang rig pa 'dzin pa ji ltar 'dod pa de thams cad sgrub par byed pa'o/ /na maHsa
72b4(rgyud 'bum): man+ta bud d+hA nA~M/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nA~M/ tad+ya thA/ u0f00 brash+pu brash+pu bar tsa sa shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ sngags 'di tshangs pa chen po ste/ /byang chub sems dpas bshad pa yin/ /'byung pos zhi gyur rab tu thob/ /
72b5(rgyud 'bum): skad cig nyid la bsil bar gyur/ /phyag rgya gtsug phud lnga sbyar na/ /myur du dge legs thob par 'gyur/ /mngon spyod dag ni thams cad la/ /srid srung gi ni rig byed 'dod/ /'di ni mdor bsdu bstan pa ste/ /
72b6(rgyud 'bum): 'di yi cho ga bsdus pa yin/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nA~M/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nA~M/ tad+ya thA/ u0f00 ga ru Da bA ha na tsa kra pA Ni/ tsa tur b+hu dza hU~M hU~M sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/ b+ho d+hi satwa A dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ 'jam pa'i dbyangs
72b7(rgyud 'bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ /zhi ba'i don ni myur byed yin/ /'byung po rnams ni rnam 'jig cing / /khyab 'jug gzugs kyi lus can yin/ /phyag rgya gtsug phud gsum sbyar na/ /las rnams kun byed brtan pa yin/ /
72b8(rgyud 'bum): gang dag khyab 'jug rgyud la ni/ /bya ba rgya cher bstan pa dag /thabs kyis gdul bya'i sems can la/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis bshad pa yin/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nA~M/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nA~M/ tad+ya thA/ u0f00 ma hA ma he shwa ra b+hU
73a1(rgyud 'bum): tA d+hI pa ti brI Sha b+ha d+h+wa dza pra baM ba dza TA dza Ta mu ku Ta d+hA ri Ne/ si ta b+hasma d+hu sa ri ta mUrti hU~M hU~M phaT phaT bo d+hi sa twa A dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ sems can rnams la phan 'dod pas/ /sngags 'di bdag gis smras pa ste/ /phyag rgya
73a2(rgyud 'bum): mdung rtse gsum sbyar na/ /'byung po thams cad rnam 'jig pa'o/ /bdag gis sngon ni gang bstan pa/ /'di yi cho ga sngon byung ba/ /sems can sa steng gnas pa la/ /zhi ba pa zhes brjod pa ste/ /yon tan sna tshogs rgya che ba/ /zhi ba'i rgyud las
73a3(rgyud 'bum): nga yis bstan/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nA~M/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nA~M/ tad+ya thA/ u0f00 shA ku na ma hA shA ku na/ pad+ma bi dA ta pa k+Sha sarba pan+nA ga na shA ga kha kha khA hi khA hi sa ma ya ma nu sma ra hU~M tiSh+Tha bo d+hi sa twa A dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ sngags
73a4(rgyud 'bum): 'di'i mthu ni chen po ste/ /nam mkha' lding zhes rnam par grags/ /gdul dka' 'dul byed rnams kyi mchog /gdengs ka can gyi dug rnams 'joms/ /phyag rgya che dang sbyar byas na/ /phung khrol shin tu mi bzad 'joms/ /
73a5(rgyud 'bum): gnas dang 'gro ba'i dug dag ni/ /gso bar byed la the tshom med/ /sems can gdul bya'i thabs su ni/ /byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag bka'/ /nam mkha' lding gzugs sa la spyod/ /'dab chags dbang po 'od chen ldan/ /ci srid nam
73a6(rgyud 'bum): mkha' lding rgyud du/ /cho ga rgya cher bstan de dag /sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir/ /thams cad nga yis bstan pa ste/ /byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' lding / /dul ba'i don du 'di bstan to/ /gdengs can dug ni gzhom bya'i phyir/ /'dab
73a7(rgyud 'bum): chags tshul gyis rnam par rgyu/ /'jig rten sngags ni ji srid pa/ /cho ga 'di ni bstan pa na/ /sems can gdul bya'i don du ni/ /de lta de ltar rnam par rgyu/ /gang yang de bzhin gshegs sngags dang / /rdo rje pad+ma'i rigs dag kyang / /
73a8(rgyud 'bum): nga yis cho ga rab 'byam dang / /mdo dag kyang ni bstan pa yin/ /ji ltar ma mo mang po ni/ /'bad pas byis pa rnams srung ba/ /de bzhin byis pa'i blo can la/ /sngags kyi tshul gyis nga yis bshad/ /sngon ni stobs bcu ldan pas bstan/ /da ni nga yis bstan pa yin/ /
73b1(rgyud 'bum): sngags rgyud don ni ma lus pa/ /'od chen gzhon nus bstan pa yin/ /rgyal ba mchog gis gang gsungs dang / /stobs bcu ldan pa'i sras gsungs dang / /rmad byung bsam mi khyab tshul gyis/ /'jam dbyangs kyis gsungs de dag go /
73b2(rgyud 'bum): de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po la gzigs nas/ dam tshig thams cad yang dag par bskul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
73b3(rgyud 'bum): par zhugs so/ /gang du ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa na sems can mtha' dag gi sgrub pa'i spyod pa sems la rab tu zhugs par gyur to/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu
73b4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad dang ldan pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang nor bu rin po che sna tshogs pa'i rgyan bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor du gyur te/ bsam gyis mi khyab cing rmad du byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rang sangs rgyas
73b5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang / byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa la zhugs pa dang / sa bcu'i dbang phyug la gnas pa dag gis kyang dkyil 'khor de bri ba'am 'drir gzhug par mi nus na so so'i skye bor gyur pa'i
73b6(rgyud 'bum): sems can gyis lta smos kyang ci dgos/ 'phags pa'i dkyil 'khor bzang po de grub pa'i gnas skabs la gnas pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gzigs nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas
73b7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad dang / 'phags pa nyan thos thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu la rab tu gnas pa/ rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur ba thams cad dang / spyod pa la zhugs pa thams cad dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa thams cad 'jam dpal
73b8(rgyud 'bum): gzhon nur gyur pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mdzad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyu mthun pa dang ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par gyi thugs las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor la zhugs par bdag
74a1(rgyud 'bum): nyid kyis yang dag par shes par gyur to/ /sems can so so'i skye bo'i yid kyis kyang de dmigs par mi nus na bri ba'am 'drir 'jug pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon
74a2(rgyud 'bum): nur gyur pas dkyil 'khor chen po bzang po de la rab tu zhugs pa'i sems can de dag la smras pa/ grogs po dag nyon cig 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams
74a3(rgyud 'bum): kyis 'da' bar bya ba ma yin na/ sems can gzhan 'phags pa dang / 'phags pa ma yin pa rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gsang ba pa'i bdag po
74a4(rgyud 'bum): phyag na rdo rje la smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras mi las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor dam pa/ yid las byung ba ni bstan to/ /mi rnams kyi dkyil 'khor bstan par bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
74a5(rgyud 'bum): yongs su mya ngan las 'das na'ang / sems can rnams gang du yang dag par zhugs na/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sngags thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po
74a6(rgyud 'bum): lag na rdo rjes 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la smras pa/ rgyal ba'i sras gang de dus la bab par shes na gsungs shig gsungs shig /shAkya seng ge mgon po ni/ /yongs su mya ngan 'das 'og na/ /sems can rnams
74a7(rgyud 'bum): kyi sangs rgyas nyid/ /sa steng khyod kyi dkyil 'khor byed/ /mthong ba tsam gyis 'jig rten na/ /sngags ni rab tu 'grub par 'gyur/ /mi shes cho ga nyams pa'am/ /dam tshig bdag por ma gyur na/ /
74a8(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid chen po tshangs pa yang / /sngags rnams 'grub par mi 'gyur ro/ /sngags la dad pa med pas ni/ /'bad pa du ma byas gyur kyang / /sngags rnams 'grub par mi 'gyur bas/ /ma rungs dam tshig mi bstan to/ /
74b1(rgyud 'bum): dam tshig sbyor ba nyams pa ni/ /rab 'byam brgya byin yin na yang / /sngags rnams 'grub par mi 'gyur na/ /mi rnams smos kyang ci zhig dgos/ /dam tshig bstan bcos de nyid shes/ /las kyi spyod pa sgrub pa la/ /'jig
74b2(rgyud 'bum): rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi/ /sngags rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor ni/ /las kun byed la rab zhugs na/ /bstan pa la ni gzhon nu bzhin/ /sngags rnams 'grub par
74b3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ba yin/ de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes sems dpa' chen po de la gsol ba btab pa/ kye sems can chen po sems can gyi don gyi phyir mdor bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor gsungs shig ces so/ /
74b4(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba pa'i bdag pos de skad ces smras pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas sems can gyi don gyi phyir/ dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga smras pa/ re zhig dang po cho 'phrul gyi zla phyed dam dpyid zla 'bring po
74b5(rgyud 'bum): 'am dpyid zla tha chungs sam zla ba yar ngo'am/ nyin zhag dge ba dang gza' bzang po bltas te/ rgyu skar bzang po dang ldan pa yar ngo'i tshes gcig dang / zla ba nya ba'am dus gzhan la dbyar gyi dus spangs la/ snga dro sa
74b6(rgyud 'bum): byin gyis brlab par bya ste/ gang du grong khyer chen po la brten pa'am/ dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon rang nyid 'dug par bya'o/ /rgya mtsho chen por 'jug pa'i gnas sam/ rgya mtsho'i ngogs dang nye ba'i grong khyer
74b7(rgyud 'bum): chen po'i byang shar gyi phyogs su ha cang yang mi ring ha cang yang mi nye bar dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon song ste lo ma'i spyil bu byas pa la zhag bdun nam zla ba phyed kyi bar du gcig pu rab tu gnas par bya ste/ gang gnas de dag tu'ang gtsang
74b8(rgyud 'bum): ma'i sa phyogs rdo ba med pa/ gyo mo dang thal ba dang sol ba dang / /phub ma dang rus pa spangs pa shin tu gtsang ba shin tu yongs su sbyangs pa'i sa phyogs su srog chags med pa'i chu la ba'i rnam lnga'am/ tsan+dan dang ga pur dang / gur gum gyi chus bsres pa
75a1(rgyud 'bum): khro bo gshin rje gshed kyi sngags stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ gtsug phud lnga'i phyag rgya chen po dang ldan pas sa phyogs der phyogs bzhi dang steng dang / 'og dang thad ka dang phyogs mtshams thams cad du bsang
75a2(rgyud 'bum): gtor bya'o/ /de nas phyogs der kun nas gru bzhir khru bcu drug gam khru bcu gnyis sam khru brgyad pa bya ste/ de la chen po ni khru bcu drug pa'o/ /'bring ni khru bcu gnyis pa'o/ /chung ngu ni khru brgyad pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor 'di ni rnam pa
75a3(rgyud 'bum): gsum/ /thams cad gzigs pas gsungs pa yin/ /rgyal po 'dod pas chen po ste/ /'bring ni longs spyod 'phel byed pa/ /chung ngu'i dam tshig yang dag srung / /las rnams kun byed zhi ba yin/ /de dag las yid la gang 'dod pa'i dkyil 'khor bri ba ni
75a4(rgyud 'bum): de la sa phyogs der khru do tsam brkos la/ der rdo ba dang sol ba dang thal ba dang rus pa dang skra la sogs pa dang / srog chags kyi rigs rnam pa sna tshogs gal te mthong na/ sa'i phyogs gzhan du brko ba byas na gnod pa med pa dang 'tshe ba
75a5(rgyud 'bum): med par 'gyur ro/ /ri bo'i rtse mo dang chu bo'i ngogs dang rgya mtsho'i 'gram dang chu bo chen po'i ngogs su bye ma'i phung po chen po rnams 'bad pas/ shin tu so sor brtags te/ shin tu gtsang ba dang srog chags med par byas la bri bar
75a6(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ /sa phyogs de yang srog chags med pa'i chu la ba'i rnam lnga bsres te/ chu bo'i klung gis gtsang ma'am/ grog mkhar gyi sa gang du srog chags med pa'i sa des dgang bar bya'o/ /bkang nas kyang legs par brdungs te kun nas mnyam par
75a7(rgyud 'bum): byas la dkyil 'khor rnam pa gsum gang 'dod par bya'o/ /seng ldeng gi phur ba bzhi la khro bo'i rgyal po'i sngags lan bdun bzla zhing phyogs bzhir gdab bo/ /tshon sna lnga'i skud pa la khro bo'i snying po lan bdun bzlas pa byas te/ dkyil
75a8(rgyud 'bum): 'khor phyogs bzhi kun nas bskor bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du dbus kyi gnas su nang du yang zur bzhir bya'o/ /dbus na gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis rang gi rig pa rtsa ba'i sngags stong rtsa brgyad bzla bar bya'o/ /gtsug phud lnga'i phyag rgya
75b1(rgyud 'bum): chen po bcings nas rtsa ba'i sngags kyis grogs po dang / bdag nyid bsrung bar byas la/ sngags zlo bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol tu byung ste/ dkyil 'khor de la g.yas su bskor ba byas nas kha shar phyogs su bltas te/ ku sha'i stan
75b2(rgyud 'bum): la 'dug par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yid la byas te/ dkyil 'khor de'i gru bzhi kun du ku shas bskor zhing dgram par bya'o/ /de nyid kyi phyi rol du yang ba rnams zhag gcig gnas pas bsnyal zhing dbyung
75b3(rgyud 'bum): bar bya'o/ /de la dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis sngon du bya ba rnams byas nas rang gi rgyud kyi sngags la mkhas pa dang / sems can gyi don gyi thabs kyi phyir theg pa chen po la mos pa dang / zhag gcig smyung bar byas pa dang grogs
75b4(rgyud 'bum): bzang po dang ldan pa dang / bstan bcos sna tshogs kyi las mthong bas/ tshon sna lnga'i phye ma zhib mo shin tu gsal zhing legs par sbyar bar byas la/ yi ge drug pa'i snying po mngon par bzlas pa'i phye ma dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su
75b5(rgyud 'bum): gzhag par bya'o/ /phyi rol du yang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan bsgreng ba dang rta babs bzhis brgyan pa chu shing 'bras bu'i tshogs kyis g.yur za ba dang rnga bo che dang rdza rnga brdung ba dang dung gi sgra dang dga' ba dang / bkra shis pa'i sgra sgrogs
75b6(rgyud 'bum): pa dag bya'o/ /zur bzhi nas chos mnyan pa dag la bshad par bya'o/ /phyogs bzhir theg pa chen po'i mdo sde bklag par bya ba la 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lho phyogs su bklag par bya'o/ /'phags pa zla ba'i sgron ma'i
75b7(rgyud 'bum): ting nge 'dzin nub phyogs su bklag par bya'o/ /'phags pa sdong pos brgyan pa byang phyogs su bklag par bya'o/ /'phags pa gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde shar phyogs su bklag par bya'o/ /glegs bam dag med na mdo sde bzhi po shes pa'i gang zag chos
75b8(rgyud 'bum): 'chad pa po la chos mnyan pa'i phyir bskul bar bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon langs nas tsan+dan dang ga pur dang gur gum bsres pa'i me tog dri zhim pa dkar po la rtsa ba'i sngags bzlas te/ dkyil 'khor de thams cad du chal bar dgram par bya'o/ /mngon par
76a1(rgyud 'bum): bkram pa byas nas phyi rol tu byung ste/ zhag bdun gyi bar du 'dod pa'i kha zas bsten pa'i ri mo mkhan gnyis sam gsum byang chub tu sems bskyed pa gso sbyong nye bar bsten pa mkhas pa dag bcug ste/ rtsa ba'i sngags kyis
76a2(rgyud 'bum): gtsug phud bcing ba byas la/ de nas gser dang dngul dang zangs dang rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs las tshon sna lnga shin tu mdzes pa yid du 'ong ba'i phye ma zhib mo rab tu blangs te longs spyod chen po dang ldan pa dang chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal po
76a3(rgyud 'bum): dag 'drir gzhug pa byas na/ dkyil 'khor mthong ba tsam gyis nges par byang chub 'thob pa yin na/ sngags sgrub par byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ shAkya'i skyes mchog 'das gyur nas/ /sems can bsod nams chung ba la/ /
76a4(rgyud 'bum): 'di 'dra'i longs spyod ga la yod/ /de bas cho ga 'di bstan bya/ /'jam dbyangs 'od chen ldan pa yis/ /skye bo phongs par gzigs nas ni/ /nyung zhing dkyil bsdus dkyil 'khor ni/ /mdor bsdus nas ni bstan pa yin/ /'bras sA lu
76a5(rgyud 'bum): dang thug po che'i phye ma shin tu zhib pa'i tshon sna lnga bzang po/ /dkar ba dang ser ba dang dmar ba dang nag po dang ljang gu dag gis bsgyur te/ sngar bzhag pa'i tshon gyi phye ma slob dpon rang gis blangs nas/ gtsug phud lnga'i phyag rgya
76a6(rgyud 'bum): chen po bcings te/ rtsa ba'i sngags kyi bzlas pa byas nas phye ma de la phyag rgya bcing ngo / /sgrub pa'i grogs mchog gi slob dpon gyis dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol shar lho mtshams kyi phyogs su cho ga mthong ba'i las
76a7(rgyud 'bum): kyis thab khung bya ste/ rgyar khru do la zabs su khru gang ba kun nas 'khor bar pad+ma'i ze ba 'dra ba/ phyi rol yang pad+ma'i ze ba 'dra ba shing pa la sha'i yam shing gis me sbar bar bya/ shing bil ba'i yam shing mtho gang tsam rlon pa la zho dang sbrang
76a8(rgyud 'bum): rtsi dang / mar la btags pa la rtsa ba'i sngags 'bru drug pa'am snying pos khu tshur gyi phyag rgya bcings te me lha spyan drang bar bya'o/ /spyan drangs nas sngar bstan pa nyid kyi rtsa ba'i sngags yi ge gcig pa'i snying pos phyir yang brgya rtsa brgyad
76b1(rgyud 'bum): sbyin sreg bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis cod pan dang 'tshog chas byas nas bdag nyid dang ri mo mkhan yang rtse gcig par byas nas sbyin sreg byed du gzhug go/ de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon sangs rgyas
76b2(rgyud 'bum): dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams yid la byas te/ sngar bstan pa'i bdug pas bdugs nas thal mo sbyar te byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la rab tu btud nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la yang phyag
76b3(rgyud 'bum): byas te/ tshon gyi phye ma blangs nas sku'i gzugs kyis bcad pa la/ ri mo mkhan gyis yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /cho ga 'di dag gis dang por sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa nyid rnam pa thams
76b4(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/ seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang na chos ston cing bzhugs pa bri bar bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon ri mo 'dri ba na 'dir sgrub pa'i grogs
76b5(rgyud 'bum): mchog gis slob dpon bdag nyid bsrung ba'i phyir/ rtsa ba'i sngags kyis 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma gtang bar bya ste/ phyi rol gyi phyogs bzhi dang steng dang 'og dag tu gtor bar bya'o/ /
76b6(rgyud 'bum): de nas khrus byas te thab khung du nye bar song nas gos gtsang ma bgos te/ gtsang sbra dang srung ba'i cho ga byas nas gur gum dang bsres pa'i mar gyi sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad bya'o/ /
76b7(rgyud 'bum): de nas ku sha'i khres la 'dug nas bzlas pa bya ste/ de nyid du gnas par bya'o/ /yungs kar la khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed kyi sngags brgya rtsa brgyad
76b8(rgyud 'bum): kyis mngon par bsngags la kham phor kha sbyar gyi nang du gzhag par bya'o/ /bgegs kyi rnam pa 'jigs su rung ba'i gzugs can mi bzad pa'i sgra rnam pa du ma rlung dang char dang yul ngan gzhan dang gzhan gang gi
77a1(rgyud 'bum): yang rung ba mthong na/ khros pas yungs kar kham phor nas phyung la chang par bcangs te lan bdun sbyin sreg byas pa des ni bgegs rab tu 'joms par 'gyur ro/ /mi'i bgegs la ni
77a2(rgyud 'bum): lan lnga chang pa nas sbyin sreg byas na skyes bu de rengs par 'gyur ba'am/ nus pa med par 'gyur ba'am/ 'chi bar 'gyur ba'am/ skad cig de nyid la mi ma yin pas zin par 'gyur ba la nams kyang
77a3(rgyud 'bum): the tshom med de/ brgya byin yang 'chi bar byed na ma rungs pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i mi'am/ bgegs tha mal pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ khro bo gshin rje gshed kyi 'jigs pas bgegs rnams phan tshun
77a4(rgyud 'bum): du 'bros shing mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas sgrub pa'i grogs mchog gis de nyid du ku sha'i khres la gnas nas khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed kyi bzlas pa byed cing gnas par bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor
77a5(rgyud 'bum): gyi slob dpon gyis bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku gzugs kyi g.yas ngos su/ rang sangs rgyas nyid pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs par bya'o/ /de gnyis kyi 'og tu nyan thos chen po gnyis chos nyan par
77a6(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ /de dag gi yang g.yas su bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ ston ka'i 'dam bu'i mdog ltar dkar ba/ pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ phyag
77a7(rgyud 'bum): g.yon pa na pad+ma bsnams pa/ phyag g.yas pa na mchog sbyin pa/ de'i yang g.yas na bcom ldan 'das ma yum gos dkar mo phyag g.yon pa na pad+ma bsnams pa/ phyag g.yas pas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la
77a8(rgyud 'bum): phyag 'tshal ba pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa gser gyi cod pan 'chang ba dar la dkar po'i na bza' mnabs pa/ thal ba nag pos thig le gsum byas pa de bzhin du sgrol ma dang / khro gnyer can yang rang rang gi gnas su spyod lam
77b1(rgyud 'bum): dag gis gnas par bya'o/ /de dag gi steng du ni bcom ldan 'das yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan dang gtsug tor gyi rgyal mo rnams bya'o/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' bcu drug
77b2(rgyud 'bum): bya ba la 'di lta ste/ kun tu bzang po dang / sa'i snying po dang / nam mkha' mdzod dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / ngan song rnam par sbyong ba dang / byams pa rnga yab lag na thogs shing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
77b3(rgyud 'bum): la blta ba dang / dri ma med par 'gro ba dang / dri ma med pa'i tog dang / nor bzang dang / zla ba'i 'od dang / dri ma med par grags pa dang / nad thams cad gso bar byed pa dang / chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po dang / 'jig rten
77b4(rgyud 'bum): 'gro ba dang / blo chen po dang / blo bzang po ste/ sems dpa' chen po 'di dag ni lus shin tu zhi ba dang rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bri bar bya'o/ /rig pa'i rgyal po'i gtso bo dang / rig pa'i rgyal mo dang pad+ma'i rigs gzugs dang phyag
77b5(rgyud 'bum): rgya lung ci lta ba bzhin du gnas ci lta ba ma lus pa dag tu bri bar bya'o/ /mtha'i gru bzhi'i gnas dag tu ni gnas rnams gzhag par bya'o/ /pad+ma'i me tog legs par byas pa dang rig pa'i lha gang dran pa yang de dag tu gzhag
77b6(rgyud 'bum): par bya'o/ /de bzhin du lho phyogs su bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa dang rang sangs rgyas gnyis ni/ ri spos kyi ngad ldang ba la bzhugs pa bri bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi shar du bdag nyid blta ba dang / thams cad
77b7(rgyud 'bum): la yang 'jug pa'i sgo rnams bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i g.yon gyi phyogs su rang sangs rgyas gzhan gnyis te/ tsan+dan dang grub pa zhes bya ba gnyis bri bar bya'o/ /de gnyis kyi 'og tu nyan thos
77b8(rgyud 'bum): gnyis ni 'od srung chen po dang kA t+yA ya na chen po bri bar bya'o/ /de dag gi'ang g.yon du 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje ut+pa la ltar mdog sngo bsangs gzugs shin tu mdzes pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ lag pa g.yas pa na
78a1(rgyud 'bum): rnga yab thogs pa/ g.yon pa khro bo'i lus kyis gnas pa rdo rje khu tshur ma rdo rje lcags kyu ma rdo rje lu gu rgyud ma dpung bzang ma rdo rje sde ma cha byad ci lta ba bzhin du bgegs kyi gdan la gnas pa/ rig pa'i rgyal po
78a2(rgyud 'bum): thams cad dang rig pa'i rgyal mo 'khor dang bcas pa bzlas pa dang / phyag rgya dang ldan pa ji ltar shes pa bzhin bri bar bya'o/ /de dag gi yang g.yon du zur bzhir sna tshogs rdo rje'i phyag rgya bri bar bya ste/ bris
78a3(rgyud 'bum): nas kyang gnas gang du rig pa'i tshogs ma dran pa'i gnas de dag kyang 'dir bzhugs shig ces brjod par bya'o/ /de'i steng du pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang / bcom ldan 'das yum mA ma kI bri bar bya ste rgyan
78a4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ gzugs shin tu mdzes par bya'o/ /de dag gi steng du gtsug tor gyi rgyal po brgyad kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng ba'i phyag rgya bcings nas rang rang dag gi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal
78a5(rgyud 'bum): po chen po'i gzugs su bri bar bya ste/ gser gyi mdog can dbang po shin tu dul la rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa la zur gyis blta ba dag la/ 'di lta ste/ gtsug tor 'khor
78a6(rgyud 'bum): los sgyur ba dang / gtsug tor mngon par 'phags pa dang / gtsug tor gdugs dkar po dang / rgyal ba'i gtsug tor dang / pad+ma'i gtsug tor dang / rnam par rgyal ba'i gtsug tor dang / gzi brjid phung po'i gtsug tor dang /
78a7(rgyud 'bum): gtsug tor mthon po ste/ brgyad po 'di dag ni gtsug tor gyi rgyal po rnams so/ /g.yon du bri ba ni rang sangs rgyas rnams so/ /'jug pa'i phyogs kyi sgor ni byang chub sems dpa' gnyis bya ste/ g.yas phyogs su ni 'jig
78a8(rgyud 'bum): rten las 'das par 'gro ba zhes bya ba ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba/ lus zhi ba lag pa g.yas pa mchog sbyin pas phreng ba 'dzin pa/ lag pa g.yon pas spyi blugs 'dzin cing sgo la mngon du phyogs pa bzhin cung zad
78b1(rgyud 'bum): khro gnyer dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o/ /'jug pa'i sgo'i g.yon phyogs su ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po ma rgyal ba las rgyal ba zhes bya ba bri bar bya ste/ lus rab tu zhi ba ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba/ lag pa g.yon pa
78b2(rgyud 'bum): na dbyig pa dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa/ lag pa g.yas pa na mchog sbyin pa phreng ba 'dzin pa bzhin cung zad khro gnyer dang ldan pa sgo la mngon du phyogs pa bri'o/ /seng ge'i khri'i 'og tu chos kyi 'khor lo kun tu
78b3(rgyud 'bum): 'bar bas khyab pa/ de'i 'og tu rin po che'i gzhal med khang de la gnas pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzhon nu'i gzugs can sku mdog dmar skya
78b4(rgyud 'bum): zhi ba'i gzugs dang / mdzes pa'i gzugs can cung zad zhal 'dzum pa/ phyag g.yon pa na ut+pa la sngon po bsnams pa phyag g.yas pa na bil ba bsnams pa/ byis pa'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/
78b5(rgyud 'bum): gtsug phud lngas nye bar mdzes par gyur pa mu tig gi phreng bas mchod phyir thogs pa dar la'i stod g.yogs mnabs pa dar gyi na bzas smad g.yogs mdzad pa 'od kun nas 'phro ba 'bar ba'i phreng bas
78b6(rgyud 'bum): kun nas khyab pa pad+ma'i gdan la nye bar bzhugs pa khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed la gzigs pa dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i sgo la mngon du phyogs pa blta na sdug pa bri bar bya'o/ /de'i g.yas phyogs
78b7(rgyud 'bum): kyi ngos kyi pad+ma'i 'og tu khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed bri bar bya ste/ mi sdug pa chen po'i gzugs can kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab pa/ bka' len cing 'dzin pa/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i
78b8(rgyud 'bum): phyogs su lta ba'o g.yon phyogs kyi pad+ma'i 'og tu gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu'i gzugs can/ byang chub sems dpa' lnga bri bar bya ba la 'di lta ste/ shin tu dri med dang shin tu dul ba dang dag pa dang mun sel
79a1(rgyud 'bum): dang kun tu snang ba'o/ /de dag thams cad kyang gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang na 'dug pa/ rin po che du ma 'bar ba'i rdo'i steng dang 'dra ba kun nas 'bar ba me tog sna tshogs kyis gcal bkram pa shin tu
79a2(rgyud 'bum): mdzes pa bri bar bya'o/ /phyi rol 'khor yug tu zur bzhi'i rnam par byas te/ rta babs bzhi dang ldan pa phyogs bzhi nas rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i tshon sna lnga gsal bas ri mo shin tu drang ba dang ldan pa nang gi dkyil 'khor
79a3(rgyud 'bum): bri bar bya'o/ /shar gyi bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i steng du ri mo'i dbus su me tog kun nas skyes pa'i rgyal po'i dbang po pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs cung zad chung bar bya'o/ /'od
79a4(rgyud 'bum): kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab pa/ mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya dang ldan pa/ skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/ de'i g.yas su gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba'i phyag rgya bri bar bya'o/ /g.yon du ni gzi brjid phung po'i phyag rgya bri bar bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan gyi steng
79a5(rgyud 'bum): du ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyag rgya bri bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi steng dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'i phyag rgya'i g.yas su bcom ldan 'das 'od
79a6(rgyud 'bum): dpag tu med pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs can bya ste/ phyag mchog sbyin pa/ pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa kun nas 'od 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab pa/ de'i yang g.yas phyogs su ni lhung bzed dang chos gos kyi
79a7(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya bya'o/ /de bzhin du mthar gyis 'jug pa'i gnas la ni pad+ma'i phyag rgya bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das me tog yang dag par skyes pa'i rgyal po'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa'i g.yon phyogs su gtsug tor gzi brjid phung
79a8(rgyud 'bum): po'i phyag rgya bri ste kun nas 'od 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab pa/ de'i g.yon phyogs su de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog bya ste/ rin po che'i ri bo'i steng du chos ston cing bzhugs pa/ bai DUr+ya sngon po dang margad dang pad+ma rA ga
79b1(rgyud 'bum): rnam pa sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od 'phro ba'i kun nas 'od dang ldan pa bri bar bya'o/ /de'i yang g.yon phyogs su rgyal ba'i gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab pa bri'o/ /de'i yang g.yon phyogs su chos kyi 'khor
79b2(rgyud 'bum): lo'i phyag rgya kun nas 'bar ba dang ldan pa bri'o/ /de'i yang g.yon phyogs su 'khar gsil dang / spyi blugs dang phreng ba dang bzang po'i gdan gyi phyag rgya bri'o/ /mthar gyis sgo'i gnas su rdo rje rtse gsum pa gnyis ka la yang kun
79b3(rgyud 'bum): nas 'bar ba bri'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i 'og tu phyag rgya chen po gtsug phud lnga zhes bya ba dang / ut+pa la'i phyag rgya kun nas 'bar ba 'di gnyis phan tshun 'brel ba bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor kun nas sgo bri bar
79b4(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ /sgo dag ni rgyab kyis lta ba dang / 'jug pa na ni mdun gyis blta bar bya'o/ /phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'gyur ba yang kha dog lnga'i tshon shin tu gsal ba sna tshogs blta na sdug pa/ zur bzhis rnam par 'byes pa/ rta
79b5(rgyud 'bum): babs bzhi'i rnam pa phyogs bzhir khru gnyis tsam nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol gyi shar phyogs su tshangs pa chen po bri bar bya ste/ gdong bzhi pa gos dkar po bgos pa la stod g.yogs gos dkar po dang / tshangs skud
79b6(rgyud 'bum): dkar po thogs pa/ kha dog gser 'dra ba/ ral pa'i cod can 'dzin pa/ lag na dbyug pa dang / spyi blugs 'dzin pa/ de'i g.yas phyogs su 'od gsal gyi lha'i bu bya ste/ mdog gser 'dra ba bsam gtan khyad par can gyi gzugs can/ dar
79b7(rgyud 'bum): la'i gos bgos pa dar la'i stod g.yogs byas pa/ bzhin shin tu gsal ba ral ba'i cod can 'dzin pa mchod phyir thogs dkar po can/ skyil mo krung gis 'dug pa lag g.yas pas mchog sbyin pa/ de'i g.yas phyogs su 'og min gyi lha'i bu
79b8(rgyud 'bum): bya ste/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ lus rab tu zhi ba bsam gtan gyi rnam pa'i cha byad can/ dar la'i gos bgos pa dar la'i gos kyis stod g.yogs byas pa/ skyil mo krung gis 'dug pa lag pa g.yas pas mchog sbyin pa/ mchod phyir thogs
80a1(rgyud 'bum): dkar pos byas pa/ de'i rim gyis dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / 'thab bral dang / brgya byin la sogs pa'i lha'i bu bri bar bya ste/ go rims ji lta ba dang cha byad dang dbyibs ci lta ba bzhin du'o/ /brgya byin gyi 'og
80a2(rgyud 'bum): tu rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris la rtag tu myos dang / phreng thogs dang / lag na gzhong thogs dang / pi bang gnyis pa dang sa bla'i lha'i bu dag go rims ji lta ba dang / cha byad ji lta ba bzhin du bri bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du lho phyogs su mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang shin tu
80a3(rgyud 'bum): mthong ba dang gya nom snang dang / dge chung dang bsod nams skyes la sogs pa'i lha'i bu cha byad dang dbyibs ci lta ba bzhin bri bar bya'o/ /nub phyogs dang byang phyogs su yang de bzhin te/ de dag ni rim pa 'og ma gnyis la brten te bri bar bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor
80a4(rgyud 'bum): gnyis kyi phyi rol du dkyil 'khor gsum par 'gyur ba la/ mthar gyis phyogs bzhir rgyal po chen po bzhi ste/ byang phyogs nas 'jug pa'i g.yas ngos su gter nye bar gnas pa la/ nor sbyin rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ gtsug phud cung zad
80a5(rgyud 'bum): 'dud pa gnod sbyin gyi gzugs can/ de'i g.yas su nor bu bzang po dang gang ba bzang po gnod sbyin gyi bdag po gnyis bri'o/ /de bzhin du mthar gyis gnod sbyin ma chen mo 'phrog ma yang bri'o/ /de bzhin du mthar gyis nub phyogs
80a6(rgyud 'bum): su chu lha lag na zhags pa thogs pa dang / klu dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo dang / 'jog po dang / nor rgyas la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po chen po brgyad po bri'o/ /de bzhin du rim pa gnyis la gnas pa'i mthar gyis gnod sbyin dang /
80a7(rgyud 'bum): srin po dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / drang srong dang / grub pa dang / yi dags dang / sha za dang / nam mkha' lding dang mi dang mi ma yin pa la sogs pa dang / sman dang nor bu rin po che'i bye brag dang ri dang chu bo dang gling dang mthar
80a8(rgyud 'bum): gyis gtso bo thams cad bri bar bya'o/ /lho phyogs su ni gshin rje ma mo bdun gyi 'khor dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o/ /shar lho mtshams su me kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab pa/ dbyug pa dang spyi blugs dang phreng ba
80b1(rgyud 'bum): lag na thogs pa/ ral pa'i cod pan 'dzin pa/ gos dkar po bgos pa/ dar la'i stod g.yogs byas pa/ mchod phyir thogs dkar po thogs pa/ mdog gser 'dra ba thal ba'i thig le gsum byas pa/ de bzhin du rgyan dang
80b2(rgyud 'bum): mtshon cha dang cha byad dang dbyibs dang kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs pa rim pa gnyis pa la brten te bri bar bya'o/ /thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i sgo'i phyi rol du dka' zlog gi bdag po khyu mchog la zhon pa/ lag
80b3(rgyud 'bum): na mdung rtse gsum thogs pa lha mo dka' zlog ma kha dog sna tshogs pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ smin drug gi bu rma bya'i stan la 'dug pa mdung thogs pa/ gzhon nu'i gzugs can gdong drug pa lus dmar
80b4(rgyud 'bum): por snang ba/ gos ser po bgos pa/ gos ser po'i stod g.yogs can lag pa g.yon pa na dril bu dang ba dan dmar po thogs pa/ mthar gyis b+h+ring gi ri ti shin tu rid pa 'dra ba dang / tshogs kyi bdag po chen po dang /
80b5(rgyud 'bum): dga' byed dbang phyug dang nag po chen po dang / ma mo bdun po rgyan dang mtshon cha dang kha dog dang dbyibs ci lta ba bzhin bri bar bya'o/ /nor lha brgyad dang drang srong bdun dang khyab 'jug lag pa bzhi na 'khor lo dang
80b6(rgyud 'bum): dung dang ga dA dang ral gri thogs pa/ gdan nam mkha' lding rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ gza' brgyad dang rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa bdun dang / gang yang nye ba'i gza' brgyad sa steng gi dkyil 'khor na rab tu rgyu ba
80b7(rgyud 'bum): yang bri bar bya'o/ /mthar gyis tshes grangs bcwa lnga dang yar ngo dang mar ngo'i phyogs dang / khyim bcu gnyis dang dus drug dang zla ba bcu gnyis dang lo tshigs dang / sring mo bzhi gru la zhon pa dang ming po lnga gru la zhon zhing
80b8(rgyud 'bum): chu la gnas pa ste/ mdor na phyag rgyar gzhag par bya ba yang yin no/ /lha mo de dag mthar gyis rim pa gnyis pa la brten te bya ba yin no/ /slob dpon bdag nyid phyi rol du byung nas dkyil 'khor de la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/
81a1(rgyud 'bum): mdor na dkyil 'khor gsum yang dkyil 'khor la brten cing bri bar bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gsum char yang gru bzhir rnam par gnas par bya ba yin no/ mdor na 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems
81a2(rgyud 'bum): can rnams kyi mgon po ni nges par bri bar bya'o/ /pad+ma'i rigs 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kyang nges par bri bar bya'o/ /rdo rje'i rigs 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje'ang nges par bri bar bya'o/ /byang chub sems
81a3(rgyud 'bum): dpa' rnams kyi gtso bo 'phags pa kun du bzang po'ang nges par bri bar bya'o/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'ang nges par bri bar bya'o/ /lhag ma rnams ni ji ltar rnam par bzhag pa bzhin phyag rgya bri bar bya'o/ /'di ni nang
81a4(rgyud 'bum): gi dkyil 'khor ro/ /dkyil 'khor bar ma la yang shar phyogs su ni mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa bri bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du 'od gsal ba ni lho phyogs su'o/ /'og min gyi gzugs can rnams lha'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par ro/ /
81a5(rgyud 'bum): 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched kyi bar ni brjod par mi bya'o/ /byang phyogs su brgya byin lha'i rgyal po dang / rab 'thab bral dang / yongs su dga' ldan dang / rab 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /
81a6(rgyud 'bum): 'od chung la sogs pa'i lha'i bu rnams nges par lha'i rgyal po re re bya'o/ /lhag ma rnams ni phyag rgyar gnas par bya'o/ /de bzhin du dkyil 'khor gsum par yang byang phyogs su 'byung po'i bdag po dbang ldan dka' thub zlog ma dang bcas pa nges
81a7(rgyud 'bum): par bri'o/ /'jam dpal gyi sgo gnyis pa'i sgo'i drung du ni smin drug gi bu rma bya'i stan yod pa lag na mdung thogs pa/ lus kyi kha dog dmar ba/ gos ser pos stod g.yogs dang gos byas pa lag pa g.yas pa na dril bu dang ba dan
81a8(rgyud 'bum): thogs pa/ gzhon nu'i gzugs can gyi 'khor la lta ba'o/ /shar phyogs su ni nam mkha' lding 'dab chags kyi gzugs can dang / drang srong gi nang nas mar ka Na Da nges par bri bar bya'o/ /lhag ma ni ji ltar gnas pa bzhin phyag
81b1(rgyud 'bum): rgyar bri bar bya'o/ /shar lhor ni gzhon nu ma bzhi dang / ming po gzhon nu dang bcas pa/ gru'i bzhon pa la gnas pa/ rgya mtsho chen po la rnam par rgyu ba dang / me lha'i rgyal po yang nges par bri bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du lho phyogs
81b2(rgyud 'bum): su ni srin po'i bdag po las ni grong khyer lang ka'i bdag po bi b+hi sha na shing pi tsu marda la gnas pa dang / dzam b+ha la chu dbang zhes bya ba gnod sbyin gyi gzugs can byang chub sems dpa' nges par bri bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du mthar
81b3(rgyud 'bum): gyis gshin rje'i rgyal po yi dags rdzu 'phrul chen po nges par bri bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du sha za'i rgyal po rnam par g.yengs byed ces bya ba nges par bri bar bya'o/ /lhag ma ni ji ltar gnas pa bzhin phyag rgyar bri
81b4(rgyud 'bum): bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du lho nub kyi mtshams su ni klu'i gtso bo dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo nges par bri bar bya'o/ /gza'i gtso bo nyi ma bri bar bya'o/ /nub phyogs su ni drang srong thub pa'i mchog gcer bu pa mu stegs kyi mchog
81b5(rgyud 'bum): gcer bu'i gzugs bri bar bya'o/ /lhag ma ni ci ltar gnas pa bzhin phyag rgyar bri bar bya'o/ /nub byang mtshams su ni gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po mchog sbyin dang / dri za'i rgyal po gtsug phud lnga pa dang / mi 'am ci'i rgyal po
81b6(rgyud 'bum): ljon pa nges par bri bar bya'o/ /lhag ma ni gnas ji lta ba dang / dbyibs ci lta ba bzhin du phyag rgyar bri bar bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi po phyi rol du ri mo lngar bkod de/ phyag rgya'i phreng bas nye bar mdzes par byas pa/
81b7(rgyud 'bum): zur bzhi nas rta babs bzhi dang rgyal po chen po bzhis brgyan pa ci ltar gnas pa la 'di lta ste/ phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni sgor 'jug pa la ut+pal sngon po bri'o/ /g.yas dang g.yon gyi phyogs su ni pad+ma rdo rje dgra sta/ ral gri
81b8(rgyud 'bum): mdung dang mdung rtse gsum pa dang / ga dA dang 'khor lo dang swa sti ka dang / bum pa dang / nya dang / dung dang / gdub kor dang / spyi blugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / zhags pa dang / dril bu dang / chu gri dang / gzhu dang / tho ba dang /
82a1(rgyud 'bum): 'di dag rnam pa 'di dag 'dra ba'i mtshon cha'i mchog gi phyag rgyas dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs su kun nas khyab par bya'o/ /de nas phyi rol gyi phyogs bzhir rgya mtsho chen po gzhag par bya ste/ byang phyogs su ni dkyil 'khor gru
82a2(rgyud 'bum): bzhir bya ste/ sna tshogs rdo rje rtse gsum yod pa kun nas 'bar ba bya'o/ /shar phyogs su ni dkyil 'khor gzhu'i dbyibs can byas te bzhag la kun nas 'bar ba'i pad+ma'i phyag rgyas mtshan pa'o/ /lho phyogs su ni dkyil
82a3(rgyud 'bum): 'khor zur gsum pa byas te kun nas 'bar ba'i lhung bzed kyis mtshan pa'o/ /nub phyogs su ni dkyil 'khor kun nas zlum por byas te/ ut+pa la sngon po sdong bu dang 'dab ma dang bcas pa kun nas 'bar bas mtshan pa'o/ /
82a4(rgyud 'bum): phyogs mtshams bzhir yang phyag rgya bri bar bya ste/ nub byang gi phyogs su ni dkyil 'khor zlum po bya ste/ zhags pa kun nas 'bar bas mtshan pa'o/ /lho nub mtshams su ni dkyil 'khor gzhu 'dra ba bya ste dbyug pa kun nas
82a5(rgyud 'bum): 'bar bas mtshan pa'o/ /shar lho mtshams su ni dkyil 'khor gru gsum pa bya ste/ dgra sta 'od zer kun nas 'bar bas mtshan pa'o/ /byang shar gyi mtshams su ni ral gri 'od kun nas 'bar ba gzhag par bya'o/ /de ltar thams cad bris nas
82a6(rgyud 'bum): steng dang 'og dang thad kar phyag rgya gsum dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol sgo dang nye bar phye ma dang bri bar bya la 'di lta ste/ na bza' dang rnga yab dang lham 'od zer kun nas 'bar ba bri bar bya'o/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs ni blo can gyis/ /
82a7(rgyud 'bum): sems can rnams la phan bzhed nas/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni cho ga rnams/ /'dir ni mdor bsdus bstan pa yin/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis dang po nyid du slob ma gzung bar bya ba la/ dbang po ma tshang ba med pa dang yan lag
82a8(rgyud 'bum): thams cad mdzes pa dang / bram ze dang rgyal rigs dang rje'u rigs dang dmangs rigs dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / theg pa chen por zhugs pa'i rang bzhin can dang theg pa dman pa mi 'dod pa'i ngang tshul can dang / sems dpa'
82b1(rgyud 'bum): chen po dang dad pa dang ldan pa dang / dge ba'i chos can dang rgyal po chen po mngon par 'dod pa dang longs spyod chung ba la smod pa dang / longs spyod chen po mngon par 'dod pa dang ldan pa dang / bzang ba dag dang dul ba dang
82b2(rgyud 'bum): ldan pa dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i dge slong dang dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma rnams yang dag par sdom pa la nges par gnas pa dang / gso sbyong la nye bar gnas shing sdom pa la gnas pa
82b3(rgyud 'bum): dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po la zhe mi sdang ba dang / phyogs chen po dang rigs mthon po dang rang bzhin nyid kyis chos spyod pa dang zhag gcig smyung ba byas pa dang / gos gtsang ma bgos pa dang skra dri zhim pa dang /
82b4(rgyud 'bum): dus gsum du khrus byed pa dang / de'i nyin zhag la ga pur dang gur gum dang li shi la wang ga'i dri zhim pos dri zhim par byas pa/ rtag tu nye reg dang ldan pa dang / ku sha'i khres la 'dug pa dang srung ba'i cho ga
82b5(rgyud 'bum): byas pa dang / tshangs par spyod pa dang bden pa dang ldan pa dang dus mtshams las rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol de nyid du ha cang yang mi nye ha cang mi ring bar gzhag par bya'o/ /shin tu gtsang ba dang shin tu gtsang sbra
82b6(rgyud 'bum): dang ldan pa gcig nas brgyad kyi bar te de las gzhan ma yin pa de dag kyang phan tshun gnyen du 'brel ba/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po chen po dag gi bu gzhon nu ma'am gzhon nu ma
82b7(rgyud 'bum): grong gi chos mi shes pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gzhon nu'i gzugs can byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal ni byis pa'i skye bo dga' bar byed pa/ gzhon nu'i rol pa la dgyes pa des na dang po nyid du
82b8(rgyud 'bum): gzhon nu nang du gzhug par bya'o/ /rgyal po chen po mngon par 'phel ba dang tshe dang nad med pa dang / dbang phyug dang skal ba chen po mngon par 'phel ba yin te/ khyad par du byis pa rnams la nges par sngags grub pas grub pa gnas pa yin
83a1(rgyud 'bum): te/ de dag sngar bzhag pa byas nas/ grogs po bag yod pa bzang po dang ldan pas/ dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis ga pur gyi bdug pas bdugs te/ rgyab kyis phyogs pa ma yin pas phyi rol du byung bar
83a2(rgyud 'bum): bya ste/ byung nas dus dang ci ltar mthun pa'i chu legs par gtsang sbra byas pa dang / srog chags med pa la rtsa ba'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bzlas te/ gtsug phud lnga'i phyag rgya chen pos phyag rgyar byas pa'i
83a3(rgyud 'bum): chus khrus byas la nye reg byas nas/ gos gtsang ma bgos pa'i gtsang bas me thab kyi drung du song ste/ ku sha'i khres la 'dug nas byang shar gyi phyogs su mngon par bltas te/ mar gyi sbyin sreg ga pur dang gur gum
83a4(rgyud 'bum): dang / tsan+dan dang bsres pas stong rtsa brgyad bya'o/ /sngar bshad pa'i cho gas spyan drang ba dang gshegs su gsol ba byas te/ yang dkyil 'khor du 'jug par bya'o/ /nges par yang bum pa gang ba brgyad ras gtsang ma'i gos
83a5(rgyud 'bum): dang ldan pa/ shing a mra'i lo ma dang 'bras bu dang ldan pa gser dang / dngul dang rin po che dang / 'bras dang 'bru nang du bcug pa gcig bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la dbul lo/ /gnyis pa ni sangs rgyas thams cad
83a6(rgyud 'bum): la'o/ /gsum pa ni rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang 'phags pa nyan thos la'o/ /bzhi pa ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po thams cad la'o/ /lnga pa ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa 'jam dpal la'o/ /drug pa ni
83a7(rgyud 'bum): lha thams cad la'o/ /bdun pa dang brgyad pa ni dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'i sgo khang la gzhag par bya ste/ /gcig ni 'byung po thams cad la'o/ /gcig ni sems can thams cad kyi thun mong du gyur par bsngos nas gzhag
83a8(rgyud 'bum): par bya'o/ /de bas na sngar bshad pa'i cho gas spyan drang bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du me tog dang bdug pa dang dri dang / mar me dang lha bshos kyang sngar bstan pa nyid kyi las kyis dbul bar bya ste/ thams cad kyi thams cad
83b1(rgyud 'bum): du go rims bzhin du bya'o/ /mar me 'dzin pas mar gyi mar me gzung bar bya'o/ /'phags pa dang 'phags pa ma yin pa thams cad la lha bshos zhes smos pa ni/ 'bras sA lu'i chan zho dang bcas pa dang sbrang rtsi dang ldan pa'i
83b2(rgyud 'bum): 'o thug khyad par can gyis nye bar sbyar ba'i mar la btsos pa'i snum khur gyi 'breng bu la sogs pa dang / khaN+Da la sogs pa'i bza' ba thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dbul bar bya'o/ /mar gyis gang ba dang
83b3(rgyud 'bum): tsan+dan gyi thang chu sbrang rtsi'i snying po dang 'o mar btsos pa'i bza' ba ni rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang byang chub sems dpa' chen po dang 'phags pa'i lha thams cad la dbul bar bya'o/ /
83b4(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin du gad u lo pi ka ri ka dang / khyad par du snum khur gyi yo byad 'byung po thams cad dang / sems can thams cad la sngags dang ldan pa'i cho gas sbyin par bya'o/ /de bzhin du me tog dri zhim pa sna ma'i
83b5(rgyud 'bum): me tog dang rgya spos dang / klu'i me tog dang me tog pun nA ga la sogs pa sngar bstan pa sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang 'phags pa nyan thos dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po dang 'phags
83b6(rgyud 'bum): pa dang 'phags pa ma yin pa'i lha thams cad la dbul bar bya'o/ /khyad par du ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la ni sna ma'i me tog dang / pad+ma'i rigs la ni me tog pad+ma dang / de bzhin du rdo rje'i rigs la ni
83b7(rgyud 'bum): me tog ut+pal dang / lha gzhan dag la ni gzhan gang yang rung bas dbul bar bya'o/ /ga pur gyi bdug pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la'o/ /tsan+dan ni pad+ma'i rigs la'o/ /de bzhin du gu gu la ni gsang ba'i
83b8(rgyud 'bum): bdag po phyag na rdo rje la shes par bya'o/ /lha gzhan thams cad ni bdug pa tha mal pas bya'o/ /mar gyi mar me 'phags pa rnams/ /thams cad la ni dbul bar bya/ /'phags min lha ni thams cad la/ /dri zhim
84a1(rgyud 'bum): 'bru mar dbul bar bya/ /cho ga ji bzhin rim pas ni/ /bdug pa mthong ba'i rgyu yis so/ /de ltar gsungs pa de bzhin dri/ /sngags rnams kun la rtag tu bya/ /spyan ras gzigs la gang gsungs dang / /
84a2(rgyud 'bum): gang gsungs phyag na rdo rje la/ /rang rang gi ni sngags dag gis/ /sngags spyod don du bsgrub pa'o/ /cho ga gcig pu blta bya ste/ /rtag tu rjes su mthun par bya/ de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis sngar mthong
84a3(rgyud 'bum): ba'i cho gas spyan drang ba dang / mchod pa dang bdug pa la sogs pa byas nas/ gtsor mthun pa'i bya ba byas te de'i 'og tu sgrub pa'i grogs mchog gis mkhas pa dang / myur bas 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor
84a4(rgyud 'bum): ma sha med pa/ kun nas rnga pa Ta ha dang dung gi sgra dga' ba'i sgra sgrogs pa la sogs pa des bdug pa dang spos dang me tog dang phreng bas brgyan pa'i phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad steng dang 'og dang thad ka thams cad
84a5(rgyud 'bum): du dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du bskor ba bya zhing / 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma rgya cher gtong bar bya'o/ /de nas khrus byas te yang zho dang sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis bsgos pa'i sA lu dang / 'bras thug po che'i
84a6(rgyud 'bum): sbyin sreg rtsa ba'i sngags yi ge drug pa dang snying pos stong rtsa brgyad bya'o/ /sbyin sreg byas nas dkyil 'khor la rjes su bcug cing sngar bzhag pa'i sems dpa' chen po la srung ba byas nas/ dkyil 'khor gyi
84a7(rgyud 'bum): slob dpon gyi slob ma nyid du khas blangs pa/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa gso sbyong byas pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la bdag nyid kyi lus phul ba/ dngos grub kyi phyir sems can thams cad kyi nye bar
84a8(rgyud 'bum): longs spyod pa dang yongs su longs spyod pa thun mong du gyur pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi snying po gnon par bya ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sangs rgyas thob par bya ba la
84b1(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor bstan par bya'o/ /bstan pa tsam nyid kyis sdig pa'i rnyog pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur te/ mtshams med pa lnga byed pa'i skye bo yang de ma thag tu grol bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi
84b2(rgyud 'bum): slob dpon gyis ras ma nyams pa tha ga mas btags ma thag pa skra med pa la/ rtsa ba'i sngags kyis lan gsum bzlas te/ dri zhim po'i tsan+dan dang gur gum gyis bsgos pa'i ras kyis gdong g.yogs par bya'o/ /
84b3(rgyud 'bum): dang por byis pa lo gsum nas lo bcu drug pa'i bar zur phud lngas nye bar mdzes pa'am/ gtsug phud gcig gis nye bar mdzes pa'am/ gtsug phud gsum gyis nye bar mdzes pa skra dang ldan pa/ rgyal
84b4(rgyud 'bum): po'i bu spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'am/ rgyal rigs kyi bu'am gzhan bdag nyid chen po rgyal po chen po 'dod pa dkyil 'khor du gzhug par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor gnyis pa la phyin pa na gdong g.yogs par
84b5(rgyud 'bum): bya ste/ uta pa la'i phyag rgya bcings nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rtsa ba'i sngags lan cig brjod du gzhug ste/ me tog dri zhim po tsan+dan dang gur gum dang bsres pa shin tu gtsang bar byas
84b6(rgyud 'bum): pa/ lag pa gnyis su byin la me tog 'dor du gzhug go/ gang du de'i me tog babs pa der de'i sngags sbyin par bya ste/ sngags 'di ni de'i yin par bstan te/ skye ba brgyud pa nas de dang rjes su 'brel pa yin te/ de nyid
84b7(rgyud 'bum): dge ba'i bshes gnyen byang chub kyi snying po la gnon pa/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs pa'i don du mngon par sgrub par byed pa/ longs spyod chen po dang rgyal po
84b8(rgyud 'bum): chen po dang grags pa chen po dang / gang zag rtse gcig par mngon par sgrub pa yin no/ /tshe 'di nyid la yang chos thams cad la yang the tshom med par bsgrub par bya ba 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du mthar gyis dngos grub
85a1(rgyud 'bum): 'dod pas brgya rnyed kyi bar du bya ste gzhan la ni ma yin no/ / gzhan dag la ci ltar sdig pa spang ba'i phyir dam tshig tsam sbyin par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis dbang bskur na/ dang por re zhig dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol ha
85a2(rgyud 'bum): cang yang mi nye ha cang yang mi ring bar byang shar gyi phyogs su rtsa ba'i sngags kyis dag par byas pas byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /rgyal po dbang bskur ba bzhin du bdag nyid sems pa dang gcig tu sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge
85a3(rgyud 'bum): 'dun la dad cing dad pa dang / spro ba chen po dang ldan pa dang / byang chub kyi sems dang ma bral ba dang / theg pa chen po la zhugs pa dang / dkon mchog gsum la phan par byed pa dang / dbang po ma tshang ba med pa dang ma smad pa dang /
85a4(rgyud 'bum): tshe 'di nyid la sngags grub par 'dod pa dang / bsam pa bzang po dang sngags kyi spyod pa la spro ba dang / blta bar 'dod pa'i rang bzhin can dang sad par 'dod pa'i phyir yang sngags kyi don la rnam par rtog pa med pa
85a5(rgyud 'bum): dang / der gtad pa'i yid dang gcig la sogs pa nas lnga'i bar du dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /lhag ma ni spang bar bya'o/ /shes rab can dang spyod pa la rmongs pa med pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa la dbang bskur bar bya'i/
85a6(rgyud 'bum): gzhan dag ni ma yin no/ /de nas rgyal po thams cad dbang bskur ba bzhin du yo byad thams cad bsogs te/ slob dpon mkhan po mnyes na/ de nas bla re chen po bres te/ rgyal mtshan dang ba dan mthon po bsgreng zhing
85a7(rgyud 'bum): gdugs dkar po dbu la 'dzin pa dang / rnga yab dkar pos g.yob pa dang / bkur sti chen pos dung dang / rnga bo che'i dga' ba'i sgra sgrogs shing rgyal ba'i sgra dang / bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa dang bde legs dang rab tu
