85a8(rgyud 'bum): bsngags pa'i tshigs su bcad pa/ rgyal bas gsungs pas mngon par bstod pa dang / dkyil 'khor de la bskor ba byas te/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag byas nas/ 'di skad du slob dpon
85b1(rgyud 'bum): bdag ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i sngags kyi spyod pa sgrub pa la yang dag par 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i gsang ba'i rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor la yang dag par 'jug pa dang / chos kyi rgyal
85b2(rgyud 'bum): srid thams cad kyi sangs rgyas nyid rtogs par 'dod pa dang / mdor na sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir ro zhes brjod par bya'o/ /de nas ku sha'i khres la 'dug ste/ shar gyi phyogs su phyogs te dkyil 'khor la blta zhing / dang por re zhig rig pa'i dbang
85b3(rgyud 'bum): bskur ba byin te phyag rgya chen po gtsug phud lnga 'ching du gzhug par bya'o/ /de nas rang 'dod pa'i sngags gang dang gang la dga' ba gro ga'i 'dab ma la gi wang gis bri bar bya ste/ bris nas kyang tsan dan dang gur gum gyi chus lag pa dang kham phor kha
85b4(rgyud 'bum): sbyar bkrus la/ de nas gro ga'i 'dab ma de kham phor kha sbyar ba'i nang du gzhag par byas pa dkyil 'khor gyi nang du byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyi zhabs drung du gzhag par bya'o/ /de nas ku sha de la gnas nas rig pa'i rtsa ba'i sngags
85b5(rgyud 'bum): brgya rtsa brgyad snga ma nyid du bzla bar bya'o/ /de nas ku sha'i khres la 'dug pa la dbang bskur bar bya ste/ phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor la gang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du gyur pa'i bum pa gang ba sgo dang nye bar sngar bzhag pa blangs
85b6(rgyud 'bum): te/ slob dpon gyis rtsa ba'i sngags brjod pas spyi bo nas dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /gzhan dag la ni ci ltar 'dod pa'i chus so/ /de nas kham phor kha sbyar de de la sbyin par bya ste mar me la klog tu gzhug par bya'o/ /gal te
85b7(rgyud 'bum): de nyid yin na ni rim gyis 'bad pas 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /yang na ci ste gzhan na ni sngags bzlas pa kho nas 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /yang na yi ge'i yan lag nyams pa'am/ lhag pa byin na ni dang po sgrub pa kho na la 'grub par the
85b8(rgyud 'bum): tshom med do/ /de ltar slob dpon gyis sngar bris pa'i sgrub pa gsum gyis nges par 'grub par the tshom med do/ /de bzhin du dang pos ni rig pa'i dbang bskur ba sbyin par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor gnyis pa la dbang bskur ba ni gnyis pa'i dkyil 'khor du lha thams cad la bstabs pa'i sngar gyi bum pa des dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /
86a1(rgyud 'bum): spyi bo la sngar gyi cho ga ci lta ba de nyid kyis byas na sdig pa'i rnyog pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis gnang zhing / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis 'jig rten
86a2(rgyud 'bum): dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi dam tshig dang / dkyil 'khor dang sngags dang phyag rgya thams cad sgrub pa la byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur zhing / slob dpon du dbang bskur ba sbyin no/ /dkyil 'khor gsum pa la ni rang sangs rgyas
86a3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad dang / nyan thos thams cad la phul ba'i bum pa gang ba de nyid kyi cho gas spyi bo nas dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa thams cad kyis 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las
86a4(rgyud 'bum): 'das pa thams cad kyi sngags rgyud dag 'don pa dang / dkyil 'khor bri ba dang ston pa dang phyag rgya dang spyod pa ston pa dang rang nyid spyod cing ston par khyod la rjes su gnang zhing brjod par bya ba yang tshe 'di nyid la yin la/ phyi nas skye ba
86a5(rgyud 'bum): brgyud pa dag la ni sangs rgyas nyid thob par 'gyur ba yin no/ /de bzhin du rgyal ba dang rnam par rgyal ba'i dbang bskur ba yang sngar bstan pa'i cho gas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la sngar phul ba'i bum pa dang / byang chub
86a6(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' la phul ba'i bum pa gang bas kyang de bzhin du dbang bskur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po dang / nyan thos rnams kyis kyang de bzhin du brjod par bya zhing khyod la rjes su gnang
86a7(rgyud 'bum): ba yin no/ /'byung po thams cad kyis rab tu thub par dka' zhing lus can thams cad kyis mi pham pa dang sngags pa thams cad las khyod rgyal ba dang ci ltar 'dod pa sgrubs shig pa'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis
86a8(rgyud 'bum): re re la yang ci ltar 'dod pa bzhin du dbang bskur ba lnga sbyin par bya'o/ /sems can rnams la yang lnga po nyid kyis bya'o/ /de dag mthar gyis dkyil 'khor la bcug ste/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bdag nyid
86b1(rgyud 'bum): phul nas dkyil 'khor la bskor ba lan gsum byas te slar gtang bar bya'o/ /de las gzhan pa'i nyin zhag la mthar gyis sngags kyi spyod pa la bslab par bya zhing sbyar bar bya'o/ /skad cig de nyid la bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
86b2(rgyud 'bum): dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la sngar phul ba'i bum pa gang ba blangs nas dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa de dag la chu khyor ba gsum shar du mngon par blta bar byas la blud par bya'o/ /'di skad du brjod par
86b3(rgyud 'bum): bya ste/ kye byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i gsang ba'i dam tshig las 'das par gyur na bsod nams ma yin pa mang po skye bar ma byed cig /sngags thams cad kyang 'dor bar ma byed cig /sangs rgyas
86b4(rgyud 'bum): dang byang chub sems dpa' dag kyang slu bar ma byed cig / bla ma mnyes par gyis shig /gzhan du dam tshig las 'das par gyur na sngags 'grub par mi 'gyur zhing / bsod nams ma yin pa mang por 'gyur ro/ /zhes
86b5(rgyud 'bum): de ltar smras la gtang bar bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis kyang zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa'i sA lu dang 'bras thug po che'i sreg blugs kyis yi ge brgyad pa'i snying po dang sbyin sreg bya'o/ /
86b6(rgyud 'bum): de nas langs nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su zhugs te/ sngar bstan pa'i me tog gis/ sngar bstan pa'i cho gas lha thams cad yid la byas te mchod yon dbul lo/ /bdug pas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /
86b7(rgyud 'bum): rang sangs rgyas dang 'phags pa nyan thos thams cad dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / srin po dang / sha za dang / 'byung po dang / rnal 'byor pa dang grub pa dang / drang srong
86b8(rgyud 'bum): rnams dang sems can thams cad yang dag par bdug nas me tog gtor te/ tsan dan dang gur gum gyis bsangs la sngar bstan pa'i cho gas slar gshegs su gsol bar bya ste/ sems kyis thams cad btang ba yin no/ /de nas
87a1(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis bshos dang gtor ma dang / sa tshon thams cad chu bor dor bar bya ba'am/ srog chags sdug bsngal ba rnams la sbyin par bya'o/ /sa phyogs de legs par byugs shing 'jam par
87a2(rgyud 'bum): byas te/ legs par phyag pa byas nas ba lang gi lci bas byug tu gzhug pa'am/ chus byug par bya ba'am/ shin tu gtsang ba'i sas byug pa'am/ bye mas gtor bar byas la/ de nas ci ltar 'dod par 'gro bar bya'o/ /
87a3(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor la zhugs pa des bdag nyid 'o ma dang / 'bras chan gyi zas sam/ lha la dbul ba'i kha zas bza' bar bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po'i dbang po las/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
87a4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa byang chub sems dpa'i le'u rab 'byam las/ dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bstan pa ste le'u gnyis pa rdzogs so// // de nas gzhan yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang
87a5(rgyud 'bum): gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dus pa la gzigs nas/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal te/ yi ge gcig pa mchog tu gsang ba dug thams cad 'joms par byed pa/ las thams cad byed
87a6(rgyud 'bum): pa sngags dang dkyil 'khor chung ngu sgrub pa'i thabs dang / las phran tshegs thams cad la nye bar sbyar bar bya ba smras so/ /de yang gang zhe na/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nA~M/ tad+ya thA/ u0f00 dza/ grogs po dag 'di ni 'byung po thams cad nyon
87a7(rgyud 'bum): cig / sngags 'di nyid ni yi ge gcig gi dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'i cho ga thams cad du dgos pa/ khru brgyad dam khru bzhi sa'i phyogs yang dag par byas la tshon sna lnga'i phye mas rang nyid kyis bri bar bya ste/ gzhan gyis ni ma yin te/
87a8(rgyud 'bum): gang de dang de dag tu yang 'dir ni nges pa med do/ /dkyil 'khor gru bzhi mnyam pos nye bar mdzes pa/ gtsug phud lnga'i phyag rgya chen po dang por re zhig bri'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i ut+pa la'i phyag rgya dang / mche ba'i
87b1(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya dang zhal gyi phyag rgya dang dbyug pa'i phyag rgya ste/ phyag rgya 'di dag dkyil 'khor gyi nang du shar gyi char bri bar bya'o/ /de nas pad ma dang rdo rje dang ut+pal dang phyag mtshan dang ba dan dang gdugs dang rta babs dang / shing
87b2(rgyud 'bum): rta dang glang po che dang rta dang glang dang ma he dang / swa sti ka dang rma bya dang ra dang lug dang / skyes bu gzhon nu'i gzugs can phyi rol gyi sgo'i rtsa bar bri bar bya ste/ mthar gyis rim pa la brten nas bris te/ dkyil 'khor gsum la
87b3(rgyud 'bum): brten nas de ltar bri bar bya'o/ /de nas yi ge gcig pa'i sngags nyid kyis shar lho'i phyogs kyi char me'i las bya ste/ shing a pa marga'i yam shing zho dang sbrang rtsi dang / mar la btags pas stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o/ /
87b4(rgyud 'bum): de nas me tog gi mchod yon dbul lo/ /yi ge gcig pa'i sngags kyis ci ltar 'dod par gtor ma dang lha bshos dang mar me dang bdug pa dang spyan drang ba dang gshegs su gsol ba rnams bya'o/ /de nas rgyal srid 'dod
87b5(rgyud 'bum): pas ni grong khyer gyi dbus su bri bar bya'o/ /longs spyod 'dod pas ni shing a mra'i drung du'o/ /bu 'dod pas ni bo de tse'i shing gi drung du'o/ /chung ma dang glang po che dang rta 'dod pas ni glang po che'i bres skyu'am/ rta'i bres skyur ro/ /chu 'dod
87b6(rgyud 'bum): pas ni mtsho chen po'am klu'i gnas su'o/ /nyin bzhi pa'i rims sam/ rtag pa'i rims sam/ rims thams cad la rtag gcig pa'am/ grong gi g.yas phyogs su'o/ /srin pos zin pa ni dur khrod dam khang pa stong par bya'o/ /
87b7(rgyud 'bum): yang srin pos zin pa la ni ba ru ra'i shing gi drung ngam/ e raN+Da'i shing gi drung du bya'o/ /ma mo thams cad kyis zin pa la ni bzhi mdo'am shi ba'i khyim dang bu btsas pa'i khyim du nye bar bya'o/ /tshangs pa'am srin pos zin pa la ni
87b8(rgyud 'bum): ta la'i shing drung du'o/ /sbyar ba'i dug 'byin pa la ni yi ge gcig pa'i sngags kyis chu la lan gsum bsngags pa byas te/ dkyil 'khor de nyid du blud pa byas na grol bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du bud med dam skyes pa grags pa 'dod
88a1(rgyud 'bum): pa la ni bzhi mdo'am bram ze gnas par bri bar bya'o/ /bu shi ba la ni shing 'bras bu can nam 'o ma can gyi shing drung du'o/ /'bras sA lu smin pa'i sa dang zhing gi dbus su ni bu med pa la bri bar bya'o/ /nad rnam pa gsum
88a2(rgyud 'bum): bdag gir byas pa dang gzhan gyis nyams pa la ni 'jug ngogs la sogs pa la'o/ /nad chen pos btab pa la ni dkyil 'khor chu bo'i ngogs dang 'gram du bya'o/ /nad thams cad kyis thams cad du btab pa la ni ri'i rtse mor
88a3(rgyud 'bum): bri bar bya'o/ /mkha' 'gro mas byas pa la yang bram ze'i ldum ra'am/ khang pa stong pa'am/ gnas dben par gzhol ba'i sa phyogs su bya'o/ /de bzhin du las thams cad la nam phyed dam dus thams cad du mngon par bri bar bya'o/ /yi ge
88a4(rgyud 'bum): gcig pa de nyid kyi sngags kyis me tog gi mchod yon phul te gshegs su gsol lo/ /dkyil 'khor la chus gtor ba byas na nad thams cad bsrung ba chen po byas par 'gyur te nad thams cad las grol bar yang
88a5(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ /bu med pas ni bu rnyed cing / /skal med rnams kyang skal ldan 'gyur/ /dbul po rnams kyis nor 'thob pa/ /dkyil 'khor mthong ba tsam gyis so/ /skyes pa'am yang na bud med kyang / /thos nas the tshom med byas na/ /ci 'dod
88a6(rgyud 'bum): rnam pa sna tshogs ni/ /thob 'gyur rtag tu phun sum tshogs/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi cho ga rab 'byam las/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rtsa ba las kyi dkyil 'khor gsum pa'i le'u ste gsum pa rdzogs so// //
88a7(rgyud 'bum): de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i gnas gtsang ma la gzigs nas/ gzhan yang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po der 'dus pa la yang gzigs te/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i zhabs gnyis la btud nas zhal 'dzum
88a8(rgyud 'bum): pa dang ldan pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir sngags kyi spyod pa'i cho ga'i sgrub pa'i rgyu mthun pa/ chos kyi char ci ltar 'dod pa'i 'bras bu sgrub pa'i cho ga rab 'byam las ras kyi ri mo'i
88b1(rgyud 'bum): cho ga bsod nams bla na med pa skyed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sa bon mngon par sgrub par byed pa/ mdor na bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa sngags thams cad kyi 'bras bu la rab tu sbyor zhing 'bras bu dang
88b2(rgyud 'bum): bcas par byed pa/ don med pa ma yin pa grub cing sgrub par byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i go cha bgos pa/ bdud thams cad kyi stobs zil gyis mnan cing rgyab kyis
88b3(rgyud 'bum): phyogs par byed pa bdag dang sems can thams cad la thugs brtse ba'i phyir de legs par bshad du gsol/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de skad ces gsol pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
88b4(rgyud 'bum): pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba'i phyir gang khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di 'dri bar sems pa ni legs so legs so/ /de shin du
88b5(rgyud 'bum): legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang / ngas bshad par bya'o/ /khyod kyi ras ris kyi cho ga rab 'byam sngags thams cad sgrub par byed pa la rab tu 'jug pa mthar gyis ngas bshad par bya'o/ /sngon yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bstan te da ltar
88b6(rgyud 'bum): yang ngas bshad par bya'o/ /dang por re zhig sa'i phyogs gtsang ba rdul med pa las ras bal yang dag par blangs la/ dam tshig la zhugs pa'i sems can rnams kyis ras bal de yang dag par byas te/ yang sngags 'dis
88b7(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor gyis brgya rtsa brgyad tu bsngags par bya'o/ /na maH sa man+ta bud d+hA nA~M/ bo d+hi sa twa a pra ti ha ta ga ti ma ti pra tsA ri NA~M/ na maHsa~M shod+ha na duHkha pra sha ma nen+d+ra rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya a ra ha te samyak+sa~M bud d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ u0f00 sho
88b8(rgyud 'bum): d+ha ya sa~M sho d+ha ya/ sarba big+h+na~M g+ha ta ka ma hA kA ru Ni ka ku mA ra rU pa d+hA ri Ni/ bi kuR+ba bi kuR+ba sa ma yam nu sma ra tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ de nas grong gi chos mi shes pa'i gzhon nu ma/ bram ze'i rigs dang rgyal rigs su skyes
89a1(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / rje'u'i rigs su skyes pa dang rigs ngan pa'i skyes gnas yongs su spangs pa/ dbang po ma tshang ba med pa/ yan lag thams cad mdzes pa pha dang mas rjes su gnang ba/ gso sbyong byas pa/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa/ snying rje dang ldan
89a2(rgyud 'bum): pa/ bzhin dkar ba/ kha dog gzhan rnam par spangs pa/ mdor na bud med kyi mtshan nyid rab tu zhi ba'i mtshan nyid kyis mtshan pa/ shin tu nyin zhag shis pa dang / zla ba yar ngo dang gza' bzang po bltas te/ du ba dang khug rna
89a3(rgyud 'bum): med cing sprin dang bral ba rlung med cing gtsang ba'i sa phyogs su sngar bstan pa'i gzhon nu ma khrus byas shing gos gtsang ma bgos te/ gos kyis legs par bkab pa byas pa la sngags 'di phyag rgya chen po dang ldan pas
89a4(rgyud 'bum): bsrung bar bya ste/ tsan dan dkar po dang / gur gum srog chags med pa'i chu dang sbyar bas ras bal de dang bu mo de sngags de nyid kyis yang dag par sbyangs te gtor la/ tsan dan dkar po dang / gur gum gyi chus steng dang 'og dang phyogs
89a5(rgyud 'bum): bzhir yang gtor bar bya'o/ /tsan dan dkar po dang gur gum dang ga pur gcig tu byas pa'i bdug pas bdug par bya ste/ rang nyid kyis sbyin pa'am/ sgrub pa'i grogs mchog gi slob dpon gyis sbyin par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas
89a6(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das dang sa bcu'i dbang phyug la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams/ ras kyi dog pa 'di la lhag par gnas par mdzod cig ces lan gsum brjod par bya'o/ /de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang
89a7(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams dgongs su gsol zhes byas nas/ bdug pas bdug pa de'i dus su rma bya dang / khrung khrung dang ngang pa dang bzhad dang ngur pa rnam pa sna tshogs bya dge ba thang la gnas pa'am/ chu la spyod pa
89a8(rgyud 'bum): rnams nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ba'am/ dge ba'i skad 'don na las 'di ni 'bras bu dang bcas pa yin no zhes sgrub pa pos shes par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis bdag gi ras
89b1(rgyud 'bum): skud 'di la byin gyis brlabs te/ bdag gi skye ba dam pa ni legs par 'tsho ba yin te/ bdag gi sngags sgrub pa 'bras bu med par mi 'gyur ro/ /rnga pa Ta ha dang rnga bo che dang rdza rnga dang dung dang pi bang dang gling bu dang khar
89b2(rgyud 'bum): rnga dang rdza rnga chen po'i sgra thos pa'am/ bud med dang khye'u'am/ bu mo'am skyes pa rnams bcos ma'am bcos ma ma yin pa de'i dus su blo bur du 'di skad ces/ rgyal ba dang grub pa dang sbyin pa dang byin pa dang khyer cig
89b3(rgyud 'bum): ces pa dang / dpal dang 'bras bu dang / 'bras bu yod pa dang / cho ga dang brgya byin dang / mang po dang de dag la sogs pa'i sgra gzhan rab tu dge ba 'don pa'am dril bu'i sgra dang dga' ba'i sgra thos na/ des na rig pa 'dzin pas
89b4(rgyud 'bum): shes par bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pa ni 'di yin te/ don yod pa'i grub pa ni 'di yin zhing gzhan du ma yin no zhes so/ /ci ste de'i dus
89b5(rgyud 'bum): su ma rungs pa'i tshig 'don pa khyer cig zo shig zung shig / nyams pa rnam par nyams pa/ kyi hud ring ba shin tu ring ba med pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sgra 'don pa'am/ spre'u dang ma he dang ce spyang dang bong bu dang byi la dang /
89b6(rgyud 'bum): ba lang dang dud 'gro smad pa rkang gnyis sam rkang bzhi pa'i sgra 'don par gyur na/ des ni sgrub pa pos bdag gi dngos grub ni med pa yin no zhes shes par bya ste/ skabs der brtul bar bya zhing yang snga ma bzhin du yang brtsam par bya'o/ /
89b7(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin du lan bdun gyi bar du byas la/ bdun pa'i las kyi bya ba la ni mtshams med pa lnga byas pa yang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas sgrub pa pos gzhon nu ma de bsrung ba byas la ku sha'i khres la gzhag par bya ste/ shar
89b8(rgyud 'bum): ram byang phyogs su phyogs par bzhag la bdag nyid srung ba dang lha la dbul ba'i kha zas zas su sbyin no/ /sngar sbyang ba byas pa'i ku sha'i khres de nyid kyi cho gas ras bal la yang bya'o/ /dog pa de 'jam pa dang legs par bsgrims
90a1(rgyud 'bum): pa dang sngar bslabs pa'i bu mos yang dag par blangs te/ gcig dang gsum dang lnga dang brgyad la sogs pa nas bcu drug gi bar ram/ kar sha'i grangs legs par bgrangs pa dang ldan pas bya'o/ /de la rab ni bcu drug
90a2(rgyud 'bum): bya/ /de bzhin brgyad ni bar ma ste/ /phran tshegs las la sgrub pa ni/ /gcig dang lnga ni tha ma'o/ /las rnams kun la sngags rig pas/ /ci ltar nus pa bzhin du bya/ /de nas brtsams te gang cung zad/ /sdig pa sngar
90a3(rgyud 'bum): ni byas pa dag / dog par sems kyis dmigs pa na/ /de yi mod la 'jig par 'gyur/ /dog pa 'di dag yang dag blangs/ /gtsang ma'i snod du gzhug par bya/ /de nas bzhag pa byas nas de/ /ga bur gyi ni bdug pas bdug /srog
90a4(rgyud 'bum): chags yan lag byung ba'am/ /gur gum tsan dan la sogs dang / /me tog ma le tsam pa ka /dri zhim sogs pas yongs su bsgo/ /bsrung ba'i cho ga byas nas ni/ /gtsang ma'i phyogs su yang dag bzhag /sngags rig
90a5(rgyud 'bum): las kun shes pa yis/ /shin du mnyam gzhag bzlas pa bya/ /de nas tha ga par song nas/ /ci 'dod pa yi rin sbyin no/ /rang dbang yan lag ma nyams dang / /dkar po'i chos la rtag tu dad/ /rgan min nad kyis gdungs pa
90a6(rgyud 'bum): min/ /lud pa dbugs mi bde ba spangs/ /ma ning smad pa ma yin dang / /'phye bo ma yin skra dkar spangs/ /kun gyis bkur ba'i mtshan nyid ldan/ /rab bsngags blta na sdug pa dang / /blo dang yang dag spyod pa dge/ /'jig rten
90a7(rgyud 'bum): pa yi tshul la brten/ /dngos grub 'dod pas de la ni/ /ras bzang btags pa'i ched du bskul/ /grogs po rigs bzang rab bsngags shing / /blo ldan bzo ni mkhas pa dang / /shin tu khyad par mchog gyur pa'i/ /ras thag
90a8(rgyud 'bum): bzang la bskul bar bya/ /rab ni rab tu bsgrub par bya/ /'bring ni 'bring la bsgrub par bya/ /tha mal phran tshegs las la ni/ /dman pa nyid ni thams cad la/ /bzo bo ci ltar smra ba bzhin/ /rin ni de ltar sbyin par bya/ /dang po'i
90b1(rgyud 'bum): tshig ni yang dag 'byung / /bzo bo la ni sngags rigs pas/ /de nas myur du rin byin pa/ /dpa' bo'i tshong zhes de la brjod/ /don du gnyer med de la ni/ /rin du smra byed sgrub pa po/ /'di ni myur du 'grub byed pa'i/ /ras ni bzang po bla na med/ /las kun
90b2(rgyud 'bum): byed cing mchod pa ste/ /lha dang mi yi bde ba sbyin/ /'byung po kun gyi dpal 'gyur zhes/ /yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis gsungs/ /de nas rig pa 'dzin pas tha ga pa la rgyu skar bzang po'am/ cho 'phrul gyi zla ba phyed dam nyin zhag dge ba'am
90b3(rgyud 'bum): gza' dge ba bltas te gso sbyong sbyin/ yang na dus kyi mchog dpyid kyi dus kyi zla ba yar gyi ngo la shing a mra'i me tog skyes shing shing gi mchog rnams kyi yal ga dang me tog rgyas pa de'i dus mtshams su/ snga dro nyi ma 'char ba la sngar bstan pa'i
90b4(rgyud 'bum): tha ga pa lha la dbul bar 'os pa'i kha zas bsten cing / gos gtsang ma bgos la mgo la cod pan bcings nas khrus legs por byas te/ tsan dan dkar po dang gur gum gang yang rung bas lus byugs nas ga pur gyi dris kha la bsgos te
90b5(rgyud 'bum): yid dga' ba dang bkres pa dang skom pa med par byas te/ thags kyi lag cha tha ga pa la sogs pa'i yo byad thams cad kyang sar pa la sa dang ba lang gi lci bas bkrus te/ yang ba'i rnam lngas bkru bar bya'o/ /de nas srog chags
90b6(rgyud 'bum): med pa'i chus kyang bkru bar bya'o/ /tsan dan dkar po dang gur gum gyi chus kyang gtor bar bya'o/ /gtsang ma'i sa phyogs su ca co med cing skye bo dang bral ba dben pa'i gnas su bkab pa dang gsang bar me tog gis mchod do/ /de nas
90b7(rgyud 'bum): sgrub pa pos yang dag par dag par byed pa'i sngags kyis brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags pa'i yungs kar gyis phyogs bzhi steng 'og phyogs mtshams su gtor bar bya'o/ /de nas tha ga pa la yungs kar gyis gtor
90b8(rgyud 'bum): bar bya zhing / phyag rgya chen po gtsug phud lnga bcings te/ gtsug phud bcing ba byas na srung ba chen po byas par 'gyur ro/ /gal te ras ris rab yin na ni/ zur bzhir zheng du khru bzhi chur khru brgyad de/ tha ga pas de tsam la
91a1(rgyud 'bum): yongs su goms par bya'o/ /'bring ni zheng du khru do chur khru lnga pa'o/ /tha ma ni zheng du bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang chur ni khru brgyad kyi phyed do/ /de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi mtho gang la ni yul dbus
91a2(rgyud 'bum): kyi skyes bu tshad dang ldan pa'i khru gcig ste/ 'di la bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho zhes bsgrags te/ tshad 'dis tshad du bstan pa yin no/ /ras ni rab kyis dngos grub mchog /'jig rten gang zag mchog gis gsungs/ /thub pa
91a3(rgyud 'bum): mya ngan 'das 'og tu/ /rgyal srid 'dod la bar ma yin/ /longs spyod che 'dod skyes bu dang / /lha mi lha min gdengs can ni/ /tha ma la ni grub par bshad/ /'bring gis 'bring ni grub pa'o/ /las rnams phran tshegs dag la ni/ /ras
91a4(rgyud 'bum): ni tha mas rtag tu 'grub/ /rdzas rnams kun la rtag tu ni/ /las rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /ras gsum gyis kyang bstan pa ni/ /skal 'dod mi la 'grub pa yin/ /brgya byin bde sogs bdag po la'ang / /
91a5(rgyud 'bum): cho ga nyams na 'grub mi 'gyur/ /cho ga yang dag ldan na ni/ /mi yi skye ba tha ma la'ang / /las rnams thams cad 'bad med par/ /myur ba nyid du 'grub par byed/ /rgyal ba rgya mtsho sras dag gis/ /lam 'di dag ni yang dag bstan/ /
91a6(rgyud 'bum): phongs pa mgon med sdug bsngal ba'i/ /sems can kun la legs sbyin pa'o/ /byang chub lam ni ma lus kyang / /de nyid gzigs pas bstan pa ste/ /byang chub rgyu yi chos 'di ni/ /sngags kyi lam gyis bstan pa yin/ /
91a7(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten dkyil 'khor ma lus dang / /'jig rten 'das pa'ang 'grub 'gyur te/ /dkyil 'khor gang dag bstan pa yis/ /'bad pa med par sngags rnams 'grub/ /gang zhig byang chub rgyu 'dod pas/ /de la rtag tu
91a8(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub 'gyur/ /'gro la phan sems rtag med pa/ /gzhan la 'grub par mi 'gyur ro/ /bdag nyid chen po 'jam dpal ni/ /gzhon nur gyur pas khyad par du/ /byang chub 'jug pa'i khyad sems la/ /ras ris 'grub
91b1(rgyud 'bum): par gsungs pa yin/ /bya ba myur du 'grub pa'i phyir/ /thams cad 'dir ni thob pa yin/ /de nas mthar gyis bzo bos ni/ /ras ni 'bad pas btags par bya/ /nyin zhag lnga dang brgyad dang ni/ /bcu drug gnyis dang
91b2(rgyud 'bum): bzhi dang ni/ /nyin zhag gcig gis myur du ni/ /myur bar ras kyi tha ga bya/ /grub pa mchog ni 'dod pa yis/ /nyin zhag gcig pa dge ba yin/ /gtsang sbra'i spyod pa phun sum tshogs/ /bzo bo rtag tu byin brlabs
91b3(rgyud 'bum): ldan/ /gnas nas thag ring song nas ni/ /bshang dang gci ba yongs su dor/ /de nas gos bcas khrus byas te/ /gos gzhan dag kyang bgo bya zhing / /gos dkar phreng ba ldan par 'chang / /yang dang yang du nye reg bya/ /
91b4(rgyud 'bum): lus ni tsan dan dkar pos byugs/ /bzo bos lag pa gnyis kyang byugs/ /legs 'jam rtag tu dri med par/ /'bad pas kyang ni tha ga bya/ /de la sogs pa'i sbyor ba 'am/ /gzhan ni rgyal bas gsungs
91b5(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / /rnam dpyad rang bzhin 'bad pa yis/ /ras ni ma lus tha ga bya/ /ras kyi tha ga zin pa dang / /sngar gsungs las kyis legs byas pa/ /tshad ldan nyams pa med pa ni/ /nyin zhag bzang la bltab ste
91b6(rgyud 'bum): bzhag / yar ngo'i shin tu bzang po la/ /de la sngags ni gzhug par bya/ /ras ni yongs su gsal byas pa/ /kha tshar mthar ni mdud mdzes bya/ /'od ma'i shing la btags nas ni/ /de nas ras ni blangs te 'gro/ /bzo bo
91b7(rgyud 'bum): bde legs byas nas ni/ /nor mang pos ni bgo bsha' bya/ /brtul zhugs bzang po legs spyod pa'i/ /sngags pa ci ltar 'dod song nas/ /me tog dri zhim gyis mchod de/ /gtsang ba'i phyogs su gzhag par bya/ /'di
91b8(rgyud 'bum): nyid kyi ni sngags kyis su/ /srung ba'i cho ga rab tu bya/ /sngon ni ras bal gang de yis/ /lan mang du ni yongs sbyangs la/ /bdag nyid dang ni ras dag la/ /de nyid kyis ni bsrung bar bya/ /dpa' bo chen po 'jam dpal gyis/ /sngags
92a1(rgyud 'bum): kyi bzlas pa gsungs pa dang / /'das pa'i sangs rgyas mang po dang / /ngas kyang da ltar gsungs pa yin/ /de nyid sngags ni thams cad kyi/ /sngags kyi ngo bos rnam par spyod/ /brtson 'grus che zhing gzi brjid che/ /sngags kyi
92a2(rgyud 'bum): don kun sgrub byed pa/ /cha byad rnam pa sna tshogs byed/ /skyob pa rnam pa sna tshogs rgyu/ /'dzam gling gnas pa'i sems can rnams/ /rmongs pa spyod cing sems pa med/ /ma dad phyin ci log par byed/ /log spyod shin tu
92a3(rgyud 'bum): brkam chags kyis/ /rdzas rnams ma lus pa dag dang / /sngags rnams kyis kyang 'grub mi byed/ /'khor ba'i mun pa'i btson rar ni/ /de nyid kyis ni 'khor bar 'gyur/ /gang yang rtag tu yid dag cing / /dad ldan bkra shis
92a4(rgyud 'bum): dag la dga'/ /sngags rnams kun la spro ba dang / /rtag tu 'dzin dang 'chang ba dang / /bdag nyid chen po dngos grub 'dod/ /spro ba che zhing gzi brjid che/ /rgyal bas gsungs pa'i sngags dag ni/ /'bad pa med par 'grub par

92a6(rgyud 'bum): spyod pa de dag la/ /sngags rnams rtag tu 'grub par gsungs/ /de nas sgrub pa pos bzo bo legs par bslab pa'i ri mo mkhan nam/ bdag nyid 'dri ba la mkhas pas/ tshon ma 'dres shing kha dog gsal ba dang
92a7(rgyud 'bum): ldan pa'i tshon rtsi rnams blangs te/ sngar tha ga pa la byas pa'i cho ga ci lta ba de nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pas/ ri mo mkhan la snga ma bzhin sbyar bar bya ste/ sngar ci ltar tha ga pa la byas pa de nyid kyis ras la ri mo
92a8(rgyud 'bum): 'drir gzhug go/ yang na bdag nyid kyis bri bar bya'o/ /ga pur dang tsan dan dang gur gum la sogs pa'i dris tshon rtsi la bsgo bar bya zhing bdug spos bsregs te/ de nyid kyi sngags kyis lan brgya rtsa brgyad
92b1(rgyud 'bum): 'khor dang bcas pa la yang bzla ste/ me tog nA ga ge sar dang pun nA ga dang ba ku la dang tsam pa ka dang dbyar gyi me tog dang d+hA nush+ka ri dang mA la ti'i me tog la sogs pas ras de gcal bkram pa byas la/ shar du mngon par
92b2(rgyud 'bum): phyogs pas ku sha'i khres la 'dug ste blo legs par gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la dmigs pa'i sems kyis pir phra mo lag par blangs nas/ 'khrug pa med pa'i sems kyis ras de
92b3(rgyud 'bum): la bri bar bya'o/ /dang por re zhig bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa bri bar bya ste/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis mtshan pa/ sku dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus nye bar

92b5(rgyud 'bum): sdong bu can 'og na ni klu'i rgyal po gnyis kyi gdan chen po'i pad ma'i sdong bu la 'dzin cing / de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba/ lag pa g.yas pas phyag 'tshal ba/ mdog dkar po rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa mi dang 'dra ba/
92b6(rgyud 'bum): phyed sbrul gyi gzugs can dga' bo dang nye dga' bri bar bya'o/ /kun nas pad ma'i mtsho pad ma'i 'dab ma dang me tog cung zad kha bye ba dang / rnam par kha bye ba dang chu las skyes pa'i srog chags rnams dang / bya dang nya la sogs pas khyab pa yangs shing mdzes par skyes pa bri bar
92b7(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ /gang bcom ldan 'das kyi rtsa ba'i pad ma'i sdong bu de las 'phros pa'i yal ga las pad ma'i me tog du ma mthar gyis mtho ba bya'o/ /g.yon gyi phyogs su pad ma'i me tog brgyad byas te/ pad ma de dag la byang chub sems dpa' chen po brgyad kyi gzugs
92b8(rgyud 'bum): bzhugs pa bri bar bya'o/ /dang po la re zhig 'phags pa 'jam dpal cung zad kha dog pad ma'i ge sar bzhin du ser skya'am gur gum mam gser gyi mdog 'dra ba gzhon nu'i cha byad byis pa dang / khye'u'i gzugs can skra zur phud lnga dang ldan pa/ gzhon nu'i rgyan gyis
93a1(rgyud 'bum): brgyan pa/ lag pa g.yon pa na ut+pal sngon po bsnams pa/ lag pa g.yas pas de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag byed pa/ sku mdzes pa zhi ba'i cha byad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba/ bzhin cung zad rgod pa 'od 'bar ba dang ldan pas
93a2(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor kun du khyab pa bri'o/ /pad ma gnyis pa la 'phags pa zla ba'i 'od shin tu gzhon sha can de bzhin du bri bar bya'o/ /gsum pa la ni nor bzang ngo / /bzhi pa la ni sgrib pa rnam par sel ba'o/ /lnga pa la ni nam mkha' mdzod do/ /drug pa la ni sa'i snying po'o/ /
93a3(rgyud 'bum): bdun pa la ni sdig med do/ /brgyad pa la ni spyan bzang yin te/ de dag thams cad kyang gzhon nu khye'u'i cha byad can/ gzhon nu'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa bri bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas phyogs su ni/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po brgyad byams pa ma gtogs
93a4(rgyud 'bum): pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ 'phags pa byams pa ni bcom ldan 'das dang nye bar bri bar bya ste/ tshangs par spyod pa'i cha byad 'dzin pa/ mgo ral pa'i cod pan bcings pa/ mdog gser 'dra ba/ ga sha dmar po gyon pa/ dar la dmar po'i stod g.yogs byas pa/
93a5(rgyud 'bum): thal ba'i thig le gsum gyis mtshan pa/ gzugs mdzes pa dang ldan pa dbyig pa dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa krISh+Na sa ra'i pags pa thal gong g.yon par bgos pa/ lag pa g.yon pas phreng ba 'dzin cing de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag byed pa/ der
93a6(rgyud 'bum): gtod pa'i lta ba sems kyi spyod pa bsam gtan la dmigs pa'i rnam pa can no/ /pad ma gnyis pa la 'phags pa kun du bzang po mdog me tog pri yang ku ltar sngo sangs/ lus rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ lag pa g.yon pa na nor
93a7(rgyud 'bum): bu rin po che thogs pa/ lag pa g.yas pa na bil ba thogs shing mchog sbyin pa/ gzugs mdzes pa dang ldan pa de bzhin du bri bar bya'o/ /gsum pa la ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'dam bu'i mdog 'dra ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis
93a8(rgyud 'bum): brgyan pa/ ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba/ mchod phyir thogs dkar pos byas pa/ 'phags pa 'od dpag med gzugs mdzes shing yid du 'ong ba/ stobs bcu dang ldan pa/ ral pa'i mthar skyil mo krung gis bzhugs shing cod pan du byas pa/ lag pa
93b1(rgyud 'bum): g.yon na pad ma bsnams pa/ lag pa g.yas pa mchog sbyin pa/ sems kyi spyod pa bsam gtan la dmigs pa'i rnam pa can/ lus kun nas 'od kyis gsal bar byas pa'o/ /bzhi pa la ni 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje lag pa g.yon
93b2(rgyud 'bum): na rdo rje 'dzin pa/ lag pa g.yas na bil ba thogs pas mchog sbyin pa mdog gser 'dra ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ gzugs mdzes pa/ zhi ba'i lta ba dang ldan pa dang / dra ba dang dra ba phyed pas lus nye bar dkris pa mu tig gi phreng bas mchod
93b3(rgyud 'bum): phyir thogs byas pa/ cod pan rin po che 'bar bas rnam par 'phro ba gos g.yo ba dang ldan pa bgos pa dar la dkar po'i stod g.yogs byas pa'o/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang kun du bzang po'i na bza' stod
93b4(rgyud 'bum): g.yogs kyang 'di bzhin du bya'o/ /cha byad ni ci ltar sngar bstan pa bzhin bya'o/ /de bzhin du pad ma lnga pa la ni 'phags pa blo gros chen po/ drug pa la ni blo gros zhi ba/ bdun pa la ni rnam par snang mdzad snying po/ /brgyad pa la ni
93b5(rgyud 'bum): ngan song spong ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag bri bar bya ste/ bil ba'i 'bras bu dang glegs bam lag na thogs pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis shin tu mdzes pa/ dar las stod g.yogs byas pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ g.yo ba dang
93b6(rgyud 'bum): ldan pa'i gos bgos pa'o/ /de dag gi steng du'ang rang sangs rgyas brgyad bri bar bya ste/ dge slong gi cha byad 'dzin pa lus skyes bu chen po'i mtshan dang ldan pa/ chos gos dmar po gyon pa/ skyil mo krung gis nye bar gnas pa/
93b7(rgyud 'bum): rin po che'i ut+pal la 'dug pa cha byad zhi ba'i bdag nyid kun nas 'od 'phro ba'i phreng bas khyab pa/ me tog dri zhim pos gcal bkram pa la 'di lta ste/ me tog mA li ta dang dbyar gyi me tog dang / d+hA nuSh+ka ri ka dang pun nA ga dang nA ga ge sar
93b8(rgyud 'bum): la sogs pa'i me tog gis ras ris kun nas gcal bkram par bri bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i g.yon phyogs su 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi steng du rin po che du mas nye bar spras pa/ shin tu yangs pa'i gzhal med khang gi
94a1(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor brag gi tshogs kyis shin tu nye bar mdzes par byas pa/ rin po che'i ut+pa las shin tu bkab pa ri'i rnam pa lta bu bri bar bya'o/ /gnas der sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das brgyad bri bar bya ste/ 'di lta ste rin chen gtsug
94a2(rgyud 'bum): tor can rin po che bai DUr+ya'i 'od rnam par 'phro ba/ kun nas 'od 'dom gang ba/ rin po che pad ma rA ga dang in+d+ra nI la dang / margad la sogs pa dang / bai DUr+ya dang asma gar b+ha la sogs pa nor bu rin po che chen po'i bye brag kun nas 'od 'phro ba dang
94a3(rgyud 'bum): ldan pa nyi ma 'char ka'i mdog 'dra ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lhung bzed dang chos gos dang bla gos dang ldan pa/ skyil krung gis bzhugs shing chos 'chad pa/ na bza' ser po mnabs pa/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gyis
94a4(rgyud 'bum): sku la khyab pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus sku nye bar mdzes pa/ zhi ba'i gzigs pa dang ldan pa/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gtsug tor can bri bar bya'o/ /gnyis pa de bzhin
94a5(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa me tog yang dag par skyes pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po kha dog gser 'dra ba bri bar bya'o/ /gsum pa pad ma'i gtsug tor pad ma'i ge sar dang 'dra ba chos 'chad pa bri bar bya'o/ /bzhi pa spyan bzang po yang bri bar bya'o/ /
94a6(rgyud 'bum): lnga pa bsnyen par dka' ba dang / drug pa rgyal ba rnam par snang mdzad dang / bdun pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po dang / brgyad pa de bzhin gshegs pa sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar byed pa'i spyan gyi rgyal po bri bar bya'o/ /
94a7(rgyud 'bum): 'di dag thams cad kyang gser gyi mdog can de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gzugs su bri bar bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi steng gi phyogs su g.yas g.yon nas sprin gyi gseb nas gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i bu gnyis lus mi snang
94a8(rgyud 'bum): bar me tog gi char 'bebs pa bri bar bya ste/ bar snang la gnas nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas dang 'phags pa nyan thos rnams la phyag 'tshal ba bri bar bya'o/ /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'og tu
94b1(rgyud 'bum): nyan thos chen po brgyad byang chub sems dpa'i mgo la 'dug pa spangs te bri bar bya ba la 'di lta ste/ gnas brtan shA ri'i bu dang maud gal gyi bu chen po dang 'od srung chen po dang / rab 'byor dang sgra gcan 'dzin dang / dga' bo dang
94b2(rgyud 'bum): bzang ldan dang / ka pi na'o/ /rang sangs rgyas dag kyang 'di lta ste/ spos kyi ngad ldang dang dman pa dang nye ba'i 'chi ltas dang / dkar po dang dkar po'i tog dang / mu khyud dang mu khyud bzang po'o/ /'di dag thams cad kyang shin tu mdzes
94b3(rgyud 'bum): pa/ zhi ba'i cha byad kyi bdag nyid can shin tu dul ba'i cha byad can no/ /nyan thos chen po dag kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la lta ba'o/ /steng du gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i bu gzhan gnyis nye bar kun nas
94b4(rgyud 'bum): gos kyi bla re chu zhing yangs pa shin tu mdzes pa 'dzin cing sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas dang 'phags pa nyan thos rnams kyi steng du lha'i gos dang phreng ba 'dzin pa bri bar bya'o/ /
94b5(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i steng dbu'i steng du mu tig gi phreng ba dang / thag gu dmar po pad ma rA ga dang / in+d+ra nI la la sogs pa'i mdud pa byas pa rin po che'i thag gu'i tshogs bya'o/ /de la yang gos kyi bla re shin tu legs par
94b6(rgyud 'bum): kun nas bkod pa dang / mu tig gi phreng ba 'phyang bas mdzes pa bri bar bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi 'og tu ni pad ma'i mtsho las 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi zhabs drung dang nye ba na/ klu'i rgyal po nye dga'i phyogs su
94b7(rgyud 'bum): rin po che chen po'i ri bo pad ma'i mtsho las mngon par 'thon pa rin po che'i myu gu dang phug dang ri sul dang byi ru'i yal ga dang rin po che'i shing gis yongs su bskor ba/ drang srong chen po'i gnas dang grub pa dag gis de la brten pa/ ri'i
94b8(rgyud 'bum): rtse mo'i steng du khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed shin tu mi bzad pa'i gzugs can/ lag pa g.yas pa na zhags pa thogs pa/ lag pa g.yon pa na gzhu thogs pa/ bzhin khro gnyer dang ldan pa/ bka' nyan cing 'phags pa 'jam dpal la
95a1(rgyud 'bum): phyogs te lta ba gsus pa 'phyang ba/ skra gyen du brdzes pa/ mig sman nag po dang sprin nag po dang 'dra ba/ kha spu ser ba sen mo ring ba mig dmar ba/ mgul ba'i phyogs sbrul gyis brgyan pa/ stag gi pags pa mnabs pa
95a2(rgyud 'bum): bgegs thams cad rnam par 'joms par byed pa rab tu mi bzad pa chen po khro bo'i rgyal po chen po kun nas 'bar ba khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje'i gshed bri bar bya'o/ /ri de'i 'og tu rdo'i steng na 'dug pa/ lus sa la btud de
95a3(rgyud 'bum): spos kyi snod lag na thogs pa/ cha byad dang dbyibs ci lta ba bzhin rtags 'dzin pa/ ji ltar rjes su mthun pa'i spyod pa dang / 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rjes su lta ba'i sgrub pa po bri bar bya'o/ /klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang
95a4(rgyud 'bum): nye bar bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i 'og de'i g.yas ngos su pad ma'i mtsho las mngon par byung ba'i rin po che'i ri'i rgyal po/ ji ltar sngar ri'i rgyal por bstan pa de bzhin du bri bar bya'o/ /khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje'i gshed
95a5(rgyud 'bum): med pa lha'i me tog gis khyab pa bri bar bya'o/ /ri de yang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 'og tu bri'o/ /ri de yang shin tu mtho ba rin po che pad ma rA ga'i them skas 'dra ba/ bai DUr+ya'i rang bzhin rtse mo myu gu
95a6(rgyud 'bum): 'dra ba bri bar bya'o/ /de la brten pa'i lha mo 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi thugs rje'i ngo bo 'phags ma sgrol ma rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ dar la dmar pos stod g.yogs byas pa kha dog rnam pa sna
95a7(rgyud 'bum): tshogs dang ldan pa'i gos can/ bud med kyi rgyan thams cad kyis lus brgyan pa/ lag pa g.yon pa na ut+pa la thogs pa/ gser gyi kha dog can rked pa phra ba ha cang yang mi skem ha cang yang mi sbom ha cang yang mi rgan/
95a8(rgyud 'bum): sems bsam gtan la zhugs pa/ bka' nyan cing 'dug pa/ kun nas 'bar ba'i 'od kyi phreng bas yongs su bskor ba/ der yang bai DUr+ya rin po che'i rtse mo la shing pun+nA ga'i yal gas kun nas bskor ba/ yal ga dag la yang
95b1(rgyud 'bum): me tog 'phel zhing kha bye bas legs par rgyas pas bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma mngon par bkab pa/ yal ga mngon par 'dud pa de nyid kyang shin tu kha dog sna tshogs pa byi ru'i myu gu'i 'brel ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyi ngo bo'i tshon
95b2(rgyud 'bum): 'bar ba na/ lha mo sgrol ma mngon du phyogs shing lta ba bri bar bya'o/ /lha mo bgegs rnams ma lus 'joms/ /'jigs pa sel bar byed pa'i mchog /sgrub pa po ni srung don du/ /des ni dam pa sbyin zhing dge/ /stobs bcu ldan
95b3(rgyud 'bum): sras thugs rje ni/ /bud med gzugs 'chang lha mo yin/ /'byung po kun gyi dpal don dang / /mchog sbyin byed pa bri bar bya/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs can 'od chen ni/ /gzhon nu'ang lha mo 'di la dgyes/ /bgegs rnams thams cad
95b4(rgyud 'bum): bsal ba'i phyir/ /sgrub pa pos kyang yang dag bkur/ /mi yi bdag po srung don dang / /dpal sgrub phyir yang ri mo bri/ /khro bo'i rgyal po gang yin te/ /ri yi rtse mor gzhag bris pa/ /bgegs rnams thams cad gzhig pa'i phyir/ /rgyal
95b5(rgyud 'bum): ba mchog dang sras kyis gsungs/ /mi bzad chen po 'khyil ba che/ /gtum chen 'od chen ldan pa po/ /ma rungs sems can tshar gcad phyir/ /sgrub pa la ni rab tu brtags/ /sgrub pa po ni srung ba dang / /bgegs rnams thams cad sel bar byed/ /
95b6(rgyud 'bum): mi bzad khro bo'i ngang tshul can/ /sngags kyi lha dag 'gugs par byed/ /shin tu mi bzad drag po'i gzugs/ /brtse ba med pa thams cad 'dul/ /sdig dang drag por spyod pa rnams/ /dbang du mi 'gyur dbang du byed/ /mkha' spyod
95b7(rgyud 'bum): sa la spyod pa dang / /sa 'og spyod pa thams cad kyi/ /thub pa'i bstan la 'gal byed gang / /ma rungs thams cad 'dul bar byed/ /ras ni kun nas gru bzhi dang / /zur bzhi dag tu bri ba yin/ /ras kyi 'og tu tha mar ni/ /chu bo
95b8(rgyud 'bum): rgya che'i gnas bya ste/ /klu yi gdengs ka yan lag can/ /gcig ni kun du bya ba yin/ /yan lag bzang po dkar po dang / /lus phyed mi yi rnam par skyes/ /byang du mgo ni gzhag bya ste/ /rtag tu thal mo sbyar byed pa/ /stobs chen
96a1(rgyud 'bum): gdengs ka bdun dang ldan/ /mtha' yas zhes ni bya ba yin/ /de bzhin gshegs la nges par lta/ /nor bu rin chen gyis mdzes pa/ /legs par mdzes dang gzugs mdzes dang / /rin chen rgyan gyis yongs brgyan pa'i/ /
96a2(rgyud 'bum): 'bar ba'i phreng can bri ba ni/ /klu rgyal chen por rnam par grags/ /'jig rten kun la phan par brtson/ /sangs rgyas bstan la rab tu zhugs/ /bgegs rnams thams cad rnam gzhig phyir/ /chu bo la brten bri bar bya/ /ras kyi cho ga
96a3(rgyud 'bum): dam pa 'di/ /rgyal ba rnams kyis gsungs pa yin/ /de bzhin gshegs pas sngon gsungs pa/ /rgyas bstan ngas ni mdor bsdus yin/ /mkhas pa gang zhig 'dri byed pa/ /de yi bsod nams mtha' yas 'gyur/ /bskal pa bye bar byas
96a4(rgyud 'bum): pa yi/ /sdig pa shin tu mi bzad pa/ /sa steng ri mo mthong ba tsam/ /de yi mod la 'byang bar byed/ /mtshams med lnga po byed pa dang / /tshul khrims nyams dang smad pa dang / /sdig pa kun la 'jug pa dang / /'khor ba'i mun par spyod pa dang / /'gro
96a5(rgyud 'bum): ba'i skye gnas ngan pa dag / der ni ras ris gzhag mi bya/ /ras ris mthong ba'ang don ldan zhes/ /thub pa'i dbang pos gsungs pa yin/ /mthong ba tsam gyis dag 'gyur te/ /de bas skad cig de tsam gyis/ /yid dag lus ni dag 'jug
96a6(rgyud 'bum): dang / /rjes su bzlas pa byed pa dang / /sngags rten nyid la rtag brtson pa'i/ /mi rnams grub 'dod smos ci dgos/ /bskal pa bye bar sangs rgyas la/ /mchod pa'i bsod nams gang yin pa/ /sa steng ras ris 'dri ba yi/ /sngags pas
96a7(rgyud 'bum): bsod nams de 'thob 'gyur/ /gang gA yi ni bye ma dag /tshad du bstan pa gang yin pa/ /de dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas dang / /rang rgyal dang ni byang chub sems/ /bse ru nyan thos 'jig rten na/ /lan mang dag tu mchod ston byas/ /ras
96a8(rgyud 'bum): ris mthong ba tsam gyis ni/ /mi yis de bzhin bsod nams 'thob/ /cho ga klog pa tsam dang ni/ /mchod dang rjes su yi rang ba/ /cho ga thams cad rab brtags pa/ /de la sngags kyi dngos grub des/ /'jig rten sngags rnams ci snyed pa/ /
96b1(rgyud 'bum): gang dag rgyal ba skyes mchog dang / /de'i slob bse ru byang chub sems/ /bdag nyid chen pos gang gsungs pa/ /ri mo 'di ni mdun bzhag na/ /sngags rnams ma lus grub par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa
96b2(rgyud 'bum): chen po'i mdo sde las/ ras ris chen mo dang po'i cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi pa rdzogs so// // de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la gzigs nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la
96b3(rgyud 'bum): bka' stsal pa/ gzhan yang khyod kyi 'bring gi ras kyi cho ga de ngas bshad par bya yis/ legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig /dang por re zhig sngar bstan pa'i dog pa dang / sngar bstan pa'i cho ga dang / sngar bstan pa'i
96b4(rgyud 'bum): bzo bo dang sngar gyi tshad bar ma dang ldan pa/ ras shin tu bzang ba dang 'jam pa dang shin tu bkrus pa kha tshar dang bcas pa dang / tshon ma 'dres pa dang skra la sogs pa med par byas la/ tshad ma gtogs pa dang po ci lta ba
96b5(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin du byas pa'i ras de la phyi nas bri bar bya ste/ dang por re zhig gnas gtsang ma kun nas mdzes pa/ rin po che shel gyi rang bzhin lta bu mu tig dkar pos brgyan pa/ de'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa bri bar bya ste/
96b6(rgyud 'bum): rin po che'i seng ge'i khri la rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa chos 'chad cing bzhugs pa'o/ /g.yas phyogs na 'phags pa 'jam dpal pad ma'i ge sar ram/ gur gum mam/ nyi ma'i mdog 'dra ba g.yon pa'i
96b7(rgyud 'bum): dpung pa'i phyogs su ut+pal bsnams shing thal mo sbyar bas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la blta ba/ bzhin cung zad rgod pa gzhon nu'i gzugs can/ zur phud lngas mgo mdzes par byas pa/ byis pa gzhon nu'i rgyan gyis
96b8(rgyud 'bum): brgyan pa/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga dang mgo 'dud pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i g.yon logs su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ston ka'i zla ba'i mdog ltar dkar ba/ snga ma ci lta ba de bzhin du bri bar bya ste/ 'on kyang
97a1(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das la rnga yab g.yob par bya'o/ /de'i phyogs su 'phags pa byams pa dang / kun du bzang po dang phyag na rdo rje dang / blo gros chen po dang zhi bar gshegs pa dang nam mkha' mdzod dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam
97a2(rgyud 'bum): par sel ba ste/ 'di dag kyang snga ma bzhin du bri bar bya'o/ /dang po ci lta ba de bzhin du rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bri bar bya'o/ /'di dag gi steng du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das brgyad bri bar bya ste/ bzhengs pa dang lag pa
97a3(rgyud 'bum): g.yas pas mchog sbyin pa dang / sku la na bza' ser pos stod g.yogs byas pa/ lag pa g.yon pas chos gos kyi dkyil nas 'dzin pa/ chos gos kyi kha dog cung zad dmar ba mnabs pa/ kun nas 'od dang ldan
97a4(rgyud 'bum): pa rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa la 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa me tog yang dag par skyes pa'i rgyal po'i dbang po dang / rin chen gtsug tor dang / gtsug tor can dang / thams cad skyob dang / log par dad sel
97a5(rgyud 'bum): dang / gser thub dang / 'od srung dang / spyan bzang ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bri bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas phyogs su 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mdun du 'khor chen po'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya ste/ nyan
97a6(rgyud 'bum): thos chen po brgyad dang / rang sangs rgyas brgyad snga ma ci lta ba de bzhin du bri ste/ 'on kyang 'phags pa maud gal gyi bu chen po dang / shA ri'i bu ni bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la rnga yab kyis g.yob pa 'greng bag tu bri bar
97a7(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ /de bzhin du gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu bri bar bya'o/ /lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang 'thab bral dang dga' ldan dang 'phrul dga' dang dag pa dang / dri ma med pa dang 'jam pa dang mi gdung ba dang 'od gsal
97a8(rgyud 'bum): dang / tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag po dang 'og min dang de la sogs pa'i lha'i bu gzugs na spyod pa dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu dag mthar gyis bri bar bya'o/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal dang nye bar 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor legs par dgod par
97b1(rgyud 'bum): bya ste/ rang rang gi gzugs dang cha byad du bri bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi seng ge'i khri'i 'og tu ni/ rgya mtsho chen po las mngon par byung ba'i kun nas rin po che'i ri bo ras kyi mtha' mar bri bar bya'o/ /ras ris kyi phyogs gcig gi
97b2(rgyud 'bum): mtha' la sgrub pa po cha byad dang dbyibs ci lta bu'i rnam pa pus mo'i lha nga dang mgo btud pa/ spos snod lag na thogs pa bri bar bya'o/ /rin po che'i ri bo de'i steng 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi 'og tu khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje'i gshed
97b3(rgyud 'bum): ci ltar bstan pa de ltar bri bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon phyogs seng ge'i khri'i 'og tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung dang nye ba der/ rin po che'i ri bo'i steng du lha mo sgrol ma sngar ci ltar bstan
97b4(rgyud 'bum): pa de bzhin du bri bar bya ste/ ras ris de'i kho ra khor yug tu me tog gtor ba bri bar byas la gcal bkram par bya ba la me tog tsam pa ka dang nI lod pa la dang pad ma dang dri mchog dang mA la ti dang / bAr shi ka dang d+dA nu Sh+kA ri ka dang pun nA ga dang / nA ga ge sar
97b5(rgyud 'bum): la sogs pa'i me tog gis ras ris de la kho ra khor yug tu gtor bar bya'o/ /ras ris kyi steng gi mtha'i zur gnyis su lha'i bu gnyis me tog gi tshogs 'thor ba/ gzugs rnam par bkra ba bar snang la gnas pa/ char 'byin pa'i sprin gyi nang
97b6(rgyud 'bum): nas mgo tsam 'thon pa lding bzhin pa/ kha dog dkar po bri bar bya'o/ /ras ris 'bring du gsungs pa 'di/ /dpal don gnyer la yang dag 'byung / /sa yi steng gi mi rnams la/ /grub pa 'bring ni 'di la brten/ /'khor bar sngon chad 'khor ba na/ /
97b7(rgyud 'bum): sdig pa cung zad gang byas pa/ /'dir ni ras ris mthong tsam gyis/ /de yi mod la rnam par 'jig /'gro ba lngar ni 'khor ba na/ /sems can rmongs pas mi shes te/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi ras ris ni/ /'bring po mthong
97b8(rgyud 'bum): bar mi byed pa'o/ /mtshams med lnga po byed pa dang / /sdig pa'i rnyog pa byed gyur pa/ /sngags rnams sna tshogs gsungs gyur pas/ /tshul khrims nyams pa'ang 'grub par 'gyur/ /myur du rtogs pa'ang 'grub
98a1(rgyud 'bum): pa ni/ /bzlas pas thob par byed pa yin/ /ras ris 'bring po mthong bas ni/ /nad pa dag kyang nad las thar/ /dbul po dag kyang nor thob byed/ /bud med rnams kyang bu 'thob 'gyur/ /de tshe mthong ba tsam gyis
98a2(rgyud 'bum): ni/ /bsod nams rgya chen thob par 'gyur/ /nges par lha dang mi rnams kyi/ /bde ba mi yis bsten par 'gyur/ /skye ba gzhan du nges par ni/ /sangs rgyas nyid ni nges thob 'gyur/ /klog dang 'dri ba nyid dang ni/ /

98a4(rgyud 'bum): yi rang de bzhin no/ /ras ris mthong ba'i skye bo yi/ /bsod nams thob pa don yod pa/ /bskal pa bye ba rnams su yang / /brjod par yang ni mi nus so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po rgya che
98a5(rgyud 'bum): ba'i mdo las/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga zhib mo le'u lnga pa'i cho ga rab 'byam las ras ris gnyis pa'i cho ga rdzogs so// //
98a6(rgyud 'bum): de nas gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gzhan yang khyod kyis ras ris gsum pa'i cho ga rab tu gsungs pa zhes bya
98a7(rgyud 'bum): ba yod de/ gang sems can rnams la 'bad pa med par 'grub par 'gyur ba sngar bstan pa'i bzo bo dang / cho ga dang bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang tsam thad kar de bzhin du kun nas zur bzhi snga ma bzhin du ras la
98a8(rgyud 'bum): ri mo bya'o/ /sngar bstan pa'i tshon gyis dang por re zhig 'phags pa 'jam dpal seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa snga ma bzhin du byis pa khye'u'i gzugs mdzes pa'i gzugs can 'od zer 'phro ba dang ldan pa chos 'chad pa bri
98b1(rgyud 'bum): bar bya'o/ /g.yon gyi phyogs su 'phags pa kun du bzang po rin po che'i ri la gnas pa/ rnga yab lag na thogs pa lag pa g.yon pa na nor bu rin po che thogs pa/ me tog pri yang ku ltar sngo sangs snga ma bzhin du bri bar bya'o/ /
98b2(rgyud 'bum): 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi g.yas phyogs su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug snga ma bzhin rin po che'i ri la gnas pa/ rnga yab lag na thogs pa lag pa g.yon pa na pad ma 'dzin pa/ lus kun nas 'od dang ldan pa
98b3(rgyud 'bum): bri bar bya'o/ /seng ge'i khri'i 'og tu rin po che'i ras ris kyi mtha'i bar du bri bar bya'o/ /ras kyi mtha' ma dang nye ba'i zur du 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi seng ge'i khri'i 'og g.yas phyogs su khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje

98b6(rgyud 'bum): yug tu ri'i rnam pas yongs su 'khor ba bri bar bya'o/ /steng gi ras kyi mtha' gnyis la gnas pa'i ri'i stod kyi cha la lding ba bzhin du me tog gi tshogs 'thor ba'i gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu dag pa dang
98b7(rgyud 'bum): rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba gnyis snga ma bzhin du bri bar bya zhing / /ras la me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyi gcal bkram pa yang bri bar bya'o/ /rnam gsum ras ris mtshan nyid ni/ /thams cad 'dir ni bstan pa las/ /'di ni
98b8(rgyud 'bum): tha ma zhes bya ste/ /phran tshegs las rnams dag la shes/ /bskal pa bye bar mi bzad las/ /ras ris mthong ba tsam gyis grol/ /ras ris mthong ba tsam gyis ni/ /skad cig de la grol bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas bye ba stong
99a1(rgyud 'bum): phrag ni/ /mthong ba tsam gyis grol 'gyur te/ /ras ris mthong ba tsam gyis kyang / /de yi mod la grol bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas bye ba stong phrag la/ /blo dang ldan pas bsnyen bkur bas/ /ras ris tha ma mthong ba ni/ /
99a2(rgyud 'bum): bcu drug char yang mi phod do/ /sangs rgyas skyob pa kun la ni/ /mchod byas bsod nams gang yin pa/ /mkhas pas bsod nams gang thob de/ /ras ris mtha' ma mthong ba'i yin/ /dge ba dag gi las rnams la/ /longs
99a3(rgyud 'bum): spyod phyir yang 'dir spyad do/ /sngags rnams gang dag ci yod pa/ /tshangs dbang drang srong gis bshad dang / /nam mkha' lding gis gang bshad dang / /chu lha nyi ma lus ngan dang / /nor sbyin sogs dang srin po dang / /lha min dbang po
99a4(rgyud 'bum): lto 'phye dang / /zla ba rlung dang gshin rje sogs/ /khyab 'jug lha chen sogs bshad pa/ /sngags rnams 'dir ni bkug pa dag /ras ris mdun du dngos grub 'gyur/ /'dir ni zhi ba bya ba ste/ /de bzhin du ni rgyas pa
99a5(rgyud 'bum): bya/ /'dir ni mngon spyod spang bya ste/ /thub pa mchog gis smad pa yin/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po'i mdo sde shin tu rgyas pa las/ 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga zhib mo le'u drug pa'i
99a6(rgyud 'bum): cho ga rab 'byam las/ ras ris chung ngu gsum pa'i cho ga rdzogs s+ho// // de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te/
99a7(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
99a8(rgyud 'bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa ni legs so legs so/ /rig pa thams cad kyi brtul zhugs spyad pa'i don dang / phan pa dang bde ba dang 'jig rten la snying brtse ba'i phyir dang / byang
99b1(rgyud 'bum): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs la mkhas pa ston pa/ phung po lhag ma dang bcas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du 'gro bar byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyud nges par byang chub sgrub par byed pa/
99b2(rgyud 'bum): sngags kyi spyod pa thams cad kyi don sgrub par byed pa/ bdag gi gsang sngags 'di skye bo thams cad la rgyas par byed par 'gyur ro/ /ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'jig rten gyi bla ma 'das pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi ma'i
99b3(rgyud 'bum): rigs nub pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad spangs pa dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis mun par gyur pa dang / snod kyi
99b4(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten rnam par 'jig pa dang 'phags pa'i lam dang / rig pa thams cad dang sngags dang sman dang / nor bu rin po che med pa dang / skye bo dam pa rnams kyis 'jig rten na yongs su ma zin pa dang / sems can gyi
99b5(rgyud 'bum): khams thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur te/ le lo can dang dran pa nyams pa dang / ma dad pa dang mi srun pa dang mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa dang g.yo sgyu dang ldan pa dang / slu ba spyod pa de dag chos kyi
99b6(rgyud 'bum): rnam grangs 'di thos nas skrag par 'gyur te/ le lo la mngon par 'dod cing dad par mi 'gyur la/ 'dod pa tshol zhing yid ches par mi 'gyur ro/ /log pa'i lta ba skye zhing bsod nams ma yin pa 'phel bar
99b7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ /mtshams med par gzhol zhing shin tu mi bzad pa'i yang shin tu mi bzad pa 'thob pa sdug bsngal ba de dag gi don dang dbang med pa la dbang du bya ba'i don dang / dbang du gyur pa la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i phyir dang / thabs mkhas pas
99b8(rgyud 'bum): bsdu ba'i sbyor ba/ sngags kyi ras kyi ri mo'i cho ga gang de'i dus la bab par mkhyen na bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ 'jam dpal
100a1(rgyud 'bum): gzhon nur gyur pa de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di 'dri bar sems pa legs so legs so/ /'jam dpal khyod kyi mchog tu gsang ba rig pa'i brtul zhugs spyod pa'i le'u ras ris kyi cho ga rab 'byam
100a2(rgyud 'bum): yod de/ snying po mchog rnams kyi don mchog tu gsang ba dam pa don chen po sngags thams cad kyi cho gar gyur pa drug po 'di dag yi ge drug gi snying po'i mchog /the tshom med pa de'i tshe 'grub par 'gyur te/ sems
100a3(rgyud 'bum): can de dag gdul ba'i phyir dang / thabs la mkhas pa la yang dag par rab tu zhugs pa'i phyir dang / nges par yang dag pa'i byang chub thob pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa drug gis sngar gsungs shing
100a4(rgyud 'bum): da ltar yang ngas bshad de/ ma 'ongs pa'i skye bo'i tshogs la phan pa'i phyir legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang / ngas bshad par bya'o/ /de gang zhe na/ de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas sngags gsungs pa/
100a5(rgyud 'bum): u0f00 bA kyeR+tha dza ya/ u0f00 bA kye she sha swA/ u0f00 bA kye baM dza ya/ u0f00 bA kye ni ya/ u0f00 bA kye ya na maH/ u0f00 bA kye daM na maH/ de ltar 'di dag 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa khyod kyi sngags drug dang yi ge drug pa mthu chen po dang stobs
100a6(rgyud 'bum): mnyam pa/ snying po dam pa mchog tu grub pa/ sangs rgyas bzhin du 'byung ba sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rab tu gsungs pa/ dam tshig nyams pa dang dam tshig g.yos
100a7(rgyud 'bum): pa rnams kyi las thams cad byed pa/ byang chub kyi lam rjes su ston pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la sngags kyi mchog tu gyur pa/ mchog dang 'bring dang tha ma gsum la rab tu sbyor ba/ legs par sbyangs pa'i las kyi 'bras
100a8(rgyud 'bum): bu'i rnam par smin pa sbyin pa/ bstan pa nub pa'i dus su yang dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro/ /las kyi tshul dang bcas pa la yang dag par gzhol ba la/ skad cig gis don bsgrub par 'gyur ba de dag myur du shin tu myur bar
100b1(rgyud 'bum): de'i tshe dang de'i dus su 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /nyam sad pa'i phyir yang snying po dam pa 'di dag bsgrub par bya ste/ mdor na ji lta ji ltar rab tu sbyar ba de lta de ltar 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /des na ras ris kyi cho ga 'di bya ba yin te/ de'i tshe
100b2(rgyud 'bum): de'i dus na 'jigs pa chen po dang / snyigs ma la sems can bsod nams chung ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/ grags pa chung ba dang / tshe thung ba dang longs spyod chung ba dang / chos spyod pa chung bas shin tu rgya che ba'i ras ris kyi cho ga'i sgrub
100b3(rgyud 'bum): pa la sogs pa rtsom par mi nus te/ de dag gi phyir shin tu mdor bstan par bya'o/ /dang por re shig dpa' bo'i tshong gis dog pa srang gcig gam srang phyed kyis nyos la chur khru gang / zheng du khru phyed tsam gyi ras kha tshar dang bcas
100b4(rgyud 'bum): pa thag pa la 'thag tu gzhug go/ yang na skra med pa'i ras kyi dum bu sar pa gzhan steng dang 'og tu ci ltar 'dod pa khru gnyis dang bzhi dang drug dang lnga dang bcu dang brgyad pa'i ras blangs te/ ci ltar 'dod pa'i ri mo bas ri mo
100b5(rgyud 'bum): bri bar bya'o/ /tshon ma 'dres pa dang tsan dan dang ga pur dang / gur gum gyis bsgos te/ ras kyi tsan dan dang ga pur dang / gur gum gcig tu byas pa srog chags med pa'i chu rdul med pa dang bsres te/ snod sar pa'i nang du bkrus
100b6(rgyud 'bum): la zhag gsum gyi bar du legs par bkab ste/ bzhag nas gtsang ba'i phyogs su srung ba byas shing bdag nyid kyang gtsang bar byas te/ zla ba yar ngo'i tshes bcwa lnga la ras snod kyi mdun du shar du mngon par phyogs te/ ku sha'i
100b7(rgyud 'bum): khres la 'dug nas/ sngags kyi tshig lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod par bya ba la 'di lta ste/ u0f00 he he b+ha ga bAn ba hu rU ba d+hA ra di bya tsak+Shu She/ a ba lo ka ya/ a ba lo ka ya/ mAM sa ma ya ma nu sma ra ku mA ra rU pa d+hA ri Ne/ ma hA bo d+hi sa twa
100b8(rgyud 'bum): kiny+tsi rA ya si hU~M s+pha Te s+pha Te swA hA/ sngags 'di bzlas pa byas la de nyid du nyal bar bya'o/ /gnyid log pa'i rmi lam du 'grub pa'am mi 'grub pa ston par 'gyur ro/ /de nas langs nas rmi lam du grub pa'i mtshan ma
101a1(rgyud 'bum): mthong na ring po mi thogs par ras ris bri bar bya'o/ /gal te grub pa'i mtshan ma rmi lam du ma mthong na/ ras de snod de las phyung la nyi ma la bskams nas yang snod sar pa gzhan du bcug la/ shin tu dben par legs par bsrung ba
101a2(rgyud 'bum): byas la bzhag go/ de nas yang snying po'i mchog de dag las gang yang rung ba'i sngags blangs la/ gang 'dod pa'i yi ge drug pa yang yi ge 'bum bzla bar bya'o/ /des na ras mi dge ba yang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /dang por re zhig ras de blangs
101a3(rgyud 'bum): la cho 'phrul gyi zla phyed dam/ yar ngo'i nyin zhag la rgyu skar bzang po dang ldan pa'i tshes grangs bzang po la/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal byis pa khye'u yi gzugs can mgo zur phud lnga dang ldan pa/ byis pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa
101a4(rgyud 'bum): mdog gser 'dra ba/ na bza' sngon po g.yo bzhin pa mnabs pa/ na bza' dar la sngon pos stod g.yogs byas pa/ chos 'chad pa seng ge'i khri la skyil mo krung phyed pas bzhugs la/ zhabs g.yas pas rin po che'i zhabs
101a5(rgyud 'bum): rten la bzhag pa/ g.yon pa seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa bzhin cung zad 'dzum pa dang bcas pa/ sgrub pa po la lta ba bri bar bya'o/ /g.yas phyogs su 'phags pa kun du bzang po rnga ma
101a6(rgyud 'bum): dkar po g.yob pa/ pri yang ku'i mdog ltar sngo bsangs lag pa g.yon pa na nor bu rin po che thogs pa/ yan lag thams cad mdzes pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ na bza' sngon po g.yo ba mnabs pa/ mu tig
101a7(rgyud 'bum): gi phreng bas mchod phyir thogs pa/ pad ma dkar po'i gdan la 'dug pa bri bar bya'o/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi g.yon phyogs su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ston ka'i zla rgyu'i mdog ltar
101a8(rgyud 'bum): dkar ba/ na bza' sngon po g.yo ba mnabs pa/ yan lag thams cad mdzes pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ mu tig gi phreng bas mchod phyir thogs byas pa/ lag pa g.yon pa na pad ma dkar po 'dzin
101b1(rgyud 'bum): pa/ lag pa g.yas pa na rnga yab gser gyi yu ba can dkar po thogs pa/ zhi ba'i cha byad can 'phags pa 'jam dpal la lta ba/ de bzhin du 'phags pa kun du bzang po pad ma dkar po la gnas pa/ gnyi ga yang
101b2(rgyud 'bum): de ltar bri bar bya'o/ /de nas sdong bu gcig las skyes pa'i pad ma gsum la dbus kyi rtsa ba'i pad ma'i ge sar la ni 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi seng ge'i khri dang rin po che'i zhabs rten no/ /gnyis pa'i pad
101b3(rgyud 'bum): ma la ni 'phags pa kun du bzang po'o/ /gsum pa'i pad ma la ni spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug go/ pad ma'i sdong bu mdzes pa rin po che margad 'dra ba/ pad ma'i me tog du ma kha ma bye ba dang / phyed
101b4(rgyud 'bum): tsam bye ba dang kha bye ba dang ldan pa/ mtsho chen po ma dros pa las skyes pa klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' gnyis pad ma'i sdong bu la 'dzin pa/ klu'i rgyal po de dag gi kha dog dkar ba/ gdengs ka bdun
101b5(rgyud 'bum): gyis nye bar brgyan pa/ lus rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ lus kyi stod mi la sbrul gyi gdengs kas mtshan pa/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal la lta ba/ lus phyed chu'i nang du nub pa nor bu rin po che dang gos
101b6(rgyud 'bum): kyis nye bar mdzes pa bri bar bya'o/ /mtsho chen po kun gyi 'og tu sgrub pa po ras ris kyi g.yas phyogs kyi mtha'i zur du 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi zhal gyi dkyil 'khor la lta ba/ spos snod lag
101b7(rgyud 'bum): na thogs pa mgo dang pus mo'i lha nga 'dud pa/ cha byad dang kha dog snga ma ci lta ba bzhin bri bar bya'o/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi steng ras kyi zur gnyis su lha'i bu me tog gi phreng ba 'dzin pa/ nam mkha' la lding ba/
101b8(rgyud 'bum): sprin gyi nang nas byung ba/ me tog gi tshogs chen po 'thor ba shin tu mdzes pa bri bar bya'o/ /ras ris kyi 'khor yug tu me tog nA ga ge sar la sogs pas rab tu gtor bar bri bar bya'o/ /ci ltar 'dod pa'i gzugs de bzhin du bri bar bya'o/ /
102a1(rgyud 'bum): 'phags pa 'jam dpal chos 'chad pa dang / 'phags pa kun du bzang po dang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs lag na rnga yab g.yob pa bri bar bya'o/ /yang na sgrub pa po ci ltar 'dod pa bzhin du ras ris kyi
102a2(rgyud 'bum): gzugs nges par bri bar bya ste/ ci ltar 'dod pa'i cha byad dam/ ci ltar 'dod pa'i dbyibs sam/ sgrub pa po ci lta ci ltar 'dod pa de lta de ltar bri bar bya'o/ /dbus su 'phags pa 'jam dpal g.yas g.yon
102a3(rgyud 'bum): du 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug dang / kun du bzang po ci ltar 'dod par nges par bri bar bya'o/ /yang na ci rnyed pa'i ras kyi dum bu mtho gang ngam/ khru gang la bdag nyid dam gzhan gyis sam/ ri mo mkhan gso sbyong byas
102a4(rgyud 'bum): pa'am gso sbyong ma byas pa dad pa'am ma dad pa'am/ gtsang ba'am mi gtsang ba'am/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa'am tshul khrims 'chal pa'i ri mo mkhan gyis kyang bri bar bya'o/ /bdag nyid dam sgrub pa pos nges par sngon du bsnyen pa
102a5(rgyud 'bum): byas pa dang / dad pa dang byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ni nges par bya'o/ /de ltar byas na sngags 'grub par 'gyur gyi gzhan du sdig pa'i las can gyis ni mi 'gyur te/ de ltar dad pa dang de ltar gyur pas bsgrub par bya'o/ /
102a6(rgyud 'bum): sngags kyi rgyal po dang sngags kyi lha dag 'dir dad pa dang ldan pas 'grub par 'gyur gyi gzhan dag gis ni ma yin no/ /gang phyir dad pa theg pa mchog /gang gis rnam par 'dren pa mchog /dad pa med pa'i mi
102a7(rgyud 'bum): la ni/ /dkar po'i chos rnams mi skye ste/ /sa bon tshig par gyur pa las/ /myu gu sngon po ci bzhin no/ /dad dang ldan pa'i mi dag la/ /sangs rgyas las ni 'grub 'gyur te/ /sngags rnams thams cad khyad par du/ /dad pa med la
102a8(rgyud 'bum): mi 'grub bo/ /gang yang 'jig rten lha dag dang / /de bzhin 'jig rten 'das pa dag /dad ldan kun la 'grub 'gyur te/ /sdig pa dag dang bral phyir ro/ /byang chub der song yid kyis ni/ /de dag myur du nges 'grub ste/ /gzhan la 'grub
102b1(rgyud 'bum): par mi 'gyur zhing / /bstan pa 'di la rnam par bzlog /ras ni chung dang chen po dang / /'bring du nye bar bsgrags pa yin/ /las rnams kun la sgrub pa ni/ /da ni rab tu bstan par bya/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal
102b2(rgyud 'bum): po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga bdun pa'i le'u rab 'byam las/ ras ris kyi cho ga bzhi pa'i le'u rab 'byam rdzogs so// // de nas bcom ldan 'das
102b3(rgyud 'bum): shAkya thub pas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nu gang khyod kyis bstan pa'i sems can de dag gi phyir/ le'u'i cho ga rab 'byam 'di thabs sla bas 'grub par 'gyur ba ngas
102b4(rgyud 'bum): kyang bstan te/ de dag gi don gyi phyir yon tan rgya che ba'i bye brag gi dbye ba/ las rnam par 'byed pa sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir yang dag par bshad par bya yis/ de legs par shin tu rab tu nyon cig dang
102b5(rgyud 'bum): bshad par bya'o/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bdag gi tshig gi nus pa gsal bar mdzad cing / sngags kyi spyod pa'i yon tan grub par
102b6(rgyud 'bum): mdzad pa ni legs so legs so zhes gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de'i dus la bab par mkhyen na bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du de bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa thams cad dang
102b7(rgyud 'bum): ldan pa'i 'khor la gzigs te 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer sngon po dang / ser po dang ljang gu dang shel gyi kha dog lta bu byung ste/ 'od zer de byung ma thag tu
102b8(rgyud 'bum): thams cad dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor snang bar byas nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bdud thams cad zil gyis mnan nas/ rgyu skar gyi 'od dang ri bo'i tshogs thams cad kyi 'od dang /
103a1(rgyud 'bum): gang 'di zla ba dang nyi ma rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba de dag gi 'od kyang zil gyis mnan te/ mi gsal zhing 'od med par 'gyur ba dang / rnam par mdzes par mi 'gyur zhing gsal bar mi 'gyur ro/ /nor bu thams
103a2(rgyud 'bum): cad dang / sngags dang sman dang / rin po che'i 'od thams cad 'od med par byas nas slar log ste/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i zhal gyi sgor nub par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje 'khor
103a3(rgyud 'bum): gyi dkyil 'khor de nyid du 'dus shing 'khod par gyur pa de stan las langs nas/ rings pa'i tshul gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ni rgyu ma mchis rkyen
103a4(rgyud 'bum): ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/ bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/
103a5(rgyud 'bum): phyag na rdo rje de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ ci skad smras pa de bzhin no/ /bcom ldan 'das ni rgyu med pa dang / rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad de/ rgyu yod rkyen yod do/ /gang zhig mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di
103a6(rgyud 'bum): 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga rig pa'i spyod pa rjes su sgrub pa las sgrub pa'i thabs la yang dag par gzhol ba/ chos kyi sprin la rten pa la yang dag par 'jug cing rjes su 'brang bar byed pa dang / 'dzin par
103a7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ba dang / klog par 'gyur ba dang / dad par 'gyur ba dang / glegs bam la 'dri ba byas nas mchod par 'gyur ba dang / tsan dan gyi phye ma dang byug pa dang / bdug pa dang / phreng ba dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnam pa
103a8(rgyud 'bum): sna tshogs pa'am/ tshig gi bye brag gis sam/ sil snyan rnam pa sna tshogs dang / pheg rdob pa dag gam tha na rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgyud la thob pa'am/ ba spu ldang bar byed pa'am/ rig pa'i mthu thos nas
103b1(rgyud 'bum): dga' ba skyes pa'am/ rjes su yi rang bar 'gyur ba'am/ spyod pa thob par 'gyur ba de dag ni ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur bar lung bstan te/
103b2(rgyud 'bum): des na rgyal ba de ltar 'dzum pa mdzad kyi gzhan du ni ma yin no/ /'dir dang por re zhig cho ga'i rgyal po 'di la dam tshig mthong ba sngon du bya ba rnams byas pa dang dbang bskur ba thob pa/ rtsa ba'i sngags sam snying
103b3(rgyud 'bum): po'am nye ba'i snying po'am/ sngags gang yang rung ba bzung nas yi ge gcig pa'am/ gang 'dod pa dgon pa chen por song ste 'bum phrag gsum bzla bar bya'o/ /'bras bu dang chus 'tsho ba'am/ rtsa ba dang /
103b4(rgyud 'bum): lo ma'i bza' ba byas na/ sngon du bya ba byas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas ri'i rtse mor 'dzegs nas ras ris chen po'i tshad nub phyogs su mngon du lta ba bzhag pa byas la bdag nyid shar du bltas te/ ku sha'i khres la
103b5(rgyud 'bum): 'dug nas/ pad ma dkar po la tsan dan dang gur gum gyis btags te/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas dang nyan thos dag la 'bum phrag
103b6(rgyud 'bum): gcig ri mo'i ras ris kyi 'og tu dbul bar bya'o/ /ga pur gyi bdug pa yang ci 'byor pas bdug go/ lha'i bu dang klu rnams la yang ci rnyed pa'i me tog gis mchod par bya'o/ /de nas mtshan phyed kyi dus su cho 'phrul gyi zla phyed
103b7(rgyud 'bum): kyi zla ba nya ba la/ ras ris kyi mdun du pad ma'i rnam pa lta bu'i me thab byas pa la/ tsan dan dkar po'i shing gis me sbar nas/ gur gum dang ga pur bsres pas sreg blugs ci 'byor pas stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg
103b8(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ /de nas bsrung ba bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa las 'od zer byung ste/ ras kyi ri mo'i 'khor yug nas gcig tu 'bar bar 'gyur te/ sgrub pa pos gur gum dang / tsan dan gyis btags pa'i tsan dan
104a1(rgyud 'bum): dkar po'i me tog gis mchod yon dbul lo/ /de nas sgrub pa pos rings pa'i tshul gyis ras ris la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad
104a2(rgyud 'bum): dang 'phags pa nyan thos rnams la phyag byas nas/ sgrub pa pos bris pa'i ras ris kyi mtha' ma'i phyogs nas 'jigs pa med pas ras ris gzung bar bya'o/ /de nas bzung ba tsam gyis 'phur te/ se gol gtogs pa tsam
104a3(rgyud 'bum): gyis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du phyin par 'gyur te/ me tog can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su rab tu gnas par 'gyur te/ gang du bcom ldan 'das me tog yang dag par skyes pa'i rgyal po'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa
104a4(rgyud 'bum): de bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal yang mngon du mthong ngo / /chos kyang thos so/ /byang chub sems dpa' du ma dag kyang mthong zhing / de dag la bsnyen bkur yang byed
104a5(rgyud 'bum): de bskal pa chen po stong du rga ba dang 'chi ba med cing gnas par 'gyur ro/ /ras ris kyang de na gnas par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ /de dag
104a6(rgyud 'bum): gis byin gyis brlabs par yang yang dag par shes so/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong yang 'da' bar byed do/ /lus stong yang ston par byed do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu du ma yang 'byin par byed do/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal
104a7(rgyud 'bum): yang dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'gyur ro/ /nges par byang chub la gzhol bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po rgya che ba'i mdo las/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga zhib mo
104a8(rgyud 'bum): rab 'byam sgrub pa'i thabs mchog gi las kyi le'u brgyad pa las dang po rdzogs s+ho/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha 'dus pa rnams la bka' stsal pa/
104b1(rgyud 'bum): grogs po dag khyed cag nyon cig /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor sngags sgrub pa'i thabs kyi las byed pa/ sgrub pa po bsrung ba'i phyir/ mchog tu gsang ba dam pa snying po dam pa de bzhin gshegs
104b2(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa rig pa'i rgyal po chen po bzlas pa gang gis sngags thams cad bzlas par 'gyur te/ kye lha'i tshogs dag 'di ni 'da' bar bya ba ma yin te/ rig pa'i rgyal po 'di ni 'jam dpal
104b3(rgyud 'bum): gzhon nur gyur pa yang rig pa'i rgyal po 'dis 'gugs shing dbang du byed la/ 'byor pa med par byed na byang chub sems dpa' gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sngags tha~Md
104b4(rgyud 'bum): dang / bgegs thams cad kyang 'jig par byed de/ 'di ni stobs che ba dang mthu che ba dang dpa' bo gcig pa dang sngags thams cad kyi mchog gcig tu bstan pa dang / yi ge gcig pa rnams kyi nang na gcig par bstan
104b5(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / yi ge gcig gis don thams cad sgrub par byed pa/ bya ba thams cad byed pa/ sngags thams cad gcod par byed pa/ ma rungs pa'i las rnams kyi sdig pa thams cad rab tu 'jig par byed pa/ sngags thams cad yongs su rdzogs par
104b6(rgyud 'bum): byed pa/ dge bar byed pa dang / 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sngags rnams kyi gong nas gong du 'dug pa/ thogs pa med pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par
104b7(rgyud 'bum): byed pa de gang zhe na/ u0f00 n+thI grogs po dag 'di nyid ni mchog tu gsang ba dam pa las thams cad byed pa/ yi ge gcig pa zhes bya ba rig pa'i rgyal po 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pa/ sems can thams cad kyis thub par dka'
104b8(rgyud 'bum): ba 'byung po thams cad kyi bkra shis pa/ sangs rgyas tha~Md sgrub par byed pa/ sngags thams cad kyi mnga' bdag 'jig rten tha~Md kyi dbang phyug /rnam par sdang ba rnams la byams pa'i bdag nyid dang skye bo tha~Md la snying brtse bar
105a1(rgyud 'bum): byed pa/ bgegs thams cad 'jig par byed pa ste/ mdor na ci lta ci ltar rab tu sbyar ba de lta de ltar las byed de/ bsgrubs pa med kyang las 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /sngags 'di bzlas la reg pas de dbang du 'gyur ro/ /gos la
105a2(rgyud 'bum): bsngags nas gyon na skal ba bzang por 'gyur ro/ /so shing la bsngags na so nad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /ka ra bI ra dkar po'i so shing la/ lan bdun bsngags te zos na don du ma gnyer bar yang kha zas 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /
105a3(rgyud 'bum): mig gi nad la rgyam tshwa btags te lan bdun mngon par bsngags la mig bkang na mig gi nad sel to/ /rna ba'i nad la 'brug sgrogs pa las skyes pa'i rtswa tsha tri ka zhes bya ba/ glang po che'i rgyab tu reg par byas la/ rang gi
105a4(rgyud 'bum): lo ma'i nang du btums nas me chung ba la bsregs te shin tu 'jam par byas la/ rgyam tshwa'i phye ma chu dro 'jam tsam dang sprus te lan bdun bsngags pas rna ba bkang ba dang / skad cig de nyid la rna ba na ba nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /
105a5(rgyud 'bum): bud med bu 'byung ba'i dus su mngal nas mthon te/ na zhing nyam thag pa la ni shing A DA ru sha ka'i rtsa ba srog chags med pa'i chu la btags te lte ba'i phyogs su bskus na nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /mtshon nang du lus pa'i
105a6(rgyud 'bum): skyes bu la ni mar rnying pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags te/ btung ba'am byugs na phyogs de nas de'i skad cig la zug rngu med par 'gyur ro/ /ma zhu ba dang gsud pa dang / 'khru ba'i nad la ni lan tshwa nag po'am
105a7(rgyud 'bum): rgyam tshwa'am tshwa gzhan gang yang rung ba la lan bdun bsngags te zos na nad de las grol bar 'gyur te/ de nyid kyi nyin par bde legs su 'gyur ro/ /ldan pa'i nad kyi tshad pas 'khru ba'am/ 'khru ba la ni ma du lung ga'i rtsa ba
105a8(rgyud 'bum): btags te/ lan gcig gam gnyis bzlas pa byas nas srog chags med pa'i chu dang 'thungs na gnod pa med par de las grol bar 'gyur ro/ /bud med mo sham bu mi skye ba skye bar 'dod na/ a shwa gan d+ha'i rtsa ba mar bzang po dang lhan cig
105b1(rgyud 'bum): bskol la/ ba'i 'o ma dang lhan cig bskol te ba'i 'o ma dang bsres la lan nyi shu rtsa lngar bzlas la zla mtshan gyi dus su blud la khrus byas pa'i 'og tu khyim bdag gzhan gyi chung ma spangs shing 'dod pas log par g.yem pa spangs pas/
105b2(rgyud 'bum): rang gi chung ma la mngon par song na rang gi khyo dang 'dra ba'i bu skye bar 'gyur ro/ /lo gsum mam lo lnga'i bar du bu btsa' ba'i dus su khrag 'byung ba'am/ lo du ma'i bar du bu ma chags pa'am/ gzhan gyi sngags rgyud dang
105b3(rgyud 'bum): sman dang gzhan gyi phyag rgyas bcings pa dang / gzhan gyis ma rungs par byas pa'am/ bu zla ba ma tshang bar byung ba'am/ nad las yang dag par byung ba'am/ gzhan gyi sbyor bas yang dag par byung ba'am/ gzhan gang
105b4(rgyud 'bum): yang rung ba cung zad gzhan gyis byas pa'i nad dang / gnas pa dang 'gro ba dang bcos ma dang / bcos ma ma yin pa'i dbyig dug la sogs pa byin pa'am rtsa ba dang sman dang sngags thams cad dang / mdza' ba dang mi mdza' bas
105b5(rgyud 'bum): sbyor ba byas pa la lan nyi shu rtsa bdun bsngags te/ mar rnying pa la rma bya'i sgro zla ba 'dra ba dang bsres te btags la de nas shin tu zhib par byas la sha kha ra dang lhan cig sbyar te/ a ru ra tsam bza' bar bya'o/ /zhag
105b6(rgyud 'bum): bdun gyi bar du kha ra dang ldan pa'i bskol ba btung bar bya ste/ yang dang yang du sngags kyang bzla bar bya'o/ /mgo bo'i nad la ni khwa'i gshog pa la lan bdun bsngags te byabs na bde legs su 'gyur ro/ /bud med la spyad drags
105b7(rgyud 'bum): pa la sogs pa'i nad ni shing a la ma bu sa'i rtsa ba'i lo ma dang lhan cig btags nas/ sman ni li ka'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa la brgya rtsa brgyad bsngags te 'o ma de dang bsres la btung bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du rims nyin gcig pa dang
105b8(rgyud 'bum): nyin gnyis pa dang nyin gsum pa dang nyin bzhi pa dang / ther zug pa'i rims dang / rtag pa'i rims dang rims mi bzad pa la sogs pa la 'o thug mar dang ldan pa la brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags te blud pa byas na bde bar gnas par
106a1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon gyis zin pa dag la ni/ bdag nyid kyi gdong la lan brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags te nad pa la bltas na bde bar gnas par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du ma mo dang byis pa
106a2(rgyud 'bum): dang lus srul po dang ro langs dang gzhon nu'i gdon la sogs pa mi ma yin pa'i mi bzad pa'i gdon thams cad kyis zin pa la ni/ bdag nyid kyi lag pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags pa byas nas gdon gyis
106a3(rgyud 'bum): zin pa'i mgo la reg par byas na bde bar gnas par 'gyur ro/ /lan cig bzlas pas bdag nyid bsrung bar 'gyur ro/ /lan gnyis bzlas pas grogs po bsrung bar 'gyur ro/ /lan gsum bzlas pas khyim bsrung bar 'gyur ro/ /
106a4(rgyud 'bum): lan bzhi bzlas pas ni grong bsrung bar 'gyur ro/ /lan lnga bzlas pas ni grong gi spyod yul gyi 'gro ba bsrung bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du lan stong gi bar du bzlas na dmag gi tshogs bsrung ba byas par yang 'gyur ro/ /de dag
106a5(rgyud 'bum): dang gzhan yang ma bsgrubs par las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /ci ste sgrub par 'dod na ni las phran tshegs rnams bya ba ma yin te/ gcig pu dben pa'i gnas su song nas rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu bo 'byung ba'i
106a6(rgyud 'bum): gnas dang / rgya mtsho'i ngogs dang chu bo gang gA'i ngogs dang / gzhan gang yang rung ba'i chu bo chen po'i ngogs la brten nas/ gtsang ma'i gnas su lo ma'i spyil po byas te/ khrus lan gsum bya zhing gos lan gsum brjes
