106a7(rgyud 'bum): la/ thub par gnas shing slong mo'i kha zas bza' ba'am tshod rngad dam/ khyor gang tsam mam 'o ma'am/ 'bras bu za zhing bzlas pa sum 'bum byas te/ grub pa'i mtshan ma mthong na de nas sgrub pa brtsam par bya'o/ /
106a8(rgyud 'bum): phyogs de nyid du ras ris chen po bzhag la/ ras ris la mchod pa chen po byas te/ mar me'i snod gser ram dngul lam zangs sam sa'i rang bzhin la/ shing du ru ska'i 'bru mar gyis bkang ba'am dri zhim po'i 'bru mar gyis bkang ba'am
106b1(rgyud 'bum): ba'i mar gyis yongs su bkang ba'i mar me ras kyi dum bu sar pa'i snying po byas te ras ris kyi mdun du 'bum phrag gcig gi mar me dbul bar bya'o/ /kho ra khor yug tu mar me'i phreng ba phul ma thag tu ras ris las
106b2(rgyud 'bum): 'od 'byung ste/ 'od byung ma thag tu ras ris kyi kho ra khor yug tu 'od 'bar ba'i phreng bas kun nas khyab par 'gyur ro/ /steng gi nam mkha' bar snang las rnga bo che'i sgra sgrogs shing legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra yang thos te/
106b3(rgyud 'bum): de nas rig pa 'dzin pas rings pa'i tshul gyis sgrub pa pos ras ris kyi mtha' la sngar bris pa'i ras ris kyi mtha' nas mchod yon gsol/ lan gsum bskor ba byas te sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal
106b4(rgyud 'bum): nas gzung bar bya'o/ /de nas de bzung ba tsam gyis mar me thams cad 'dzin pa'i sems can rnams gcig gis lhag pa'i gzhal med khang 'bum dang lhan cig 'phur bar 'gyur ro/ /lha'i sil snyan dang yang dag par ldan pa
106b5(rgyud 'bum): dang / glu snyan pa'i sgra la sogs pa dang ldan pa dang / gar dang ldan pa'i rig pa 'dzin ma 'khor yug tu khyab pa dag gis mar me thogs pa dang lhan cig sgrub pa po rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por dbang skur bar byed do/ /
106b6(rgyud 'bum): rga ba dang 'chi ba med pas rol par 'gyur zhing / bskal pa chen por gnas shing nyi ma dang 'dra ba dang / lha'i yan lag lta bur mdzes pa dang / gos rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa dang / 'khor de dag dang yang 'di lhan cig tu spyad
106b7(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ /rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyang 'di'i bran bzhin du nye bar gnas par 'gyur te/ rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/ /ring du 'tsho ba dang grub pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/ /rig pa
106b8(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin pa rnams kyi bu mo rnams la mchog tu yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /rdzas thams cad la dbang du 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la bzhugs par 'gyur ro/ /skad cig gis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du 'gro
107a1(rgyud 'bum): zhing brgya byin la yang bgrang ba med na/ rig pa 'dzin pa gzhan lta ci smos/ 'di ni mthar yang sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur zhing / 'phags pa 'jam dpal yang 'di'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang las
107a2(rgyud 'bum): kyi sgrub pa po yod de/ de nas shin tu brtson pas gcig pu dben pa/ skye bo med la 'dres pa med cing 'dres pa dang bral bas dgon pa chen por zhugs te/ gnas gang du pad ma chen po yod pa'i mtsho dang ldan pa'i r-i'i rtse mo gcig
107a3(rgyud 'bum): tu brten nas/ ri'i rtse mo de'i steng du 'dzegs te/ rig pa'i rgyal po yi ge gcig pa 'jam dpal gyi cho ga las bshad pa'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'am/ gzhan byang chub sems dpas bshad pa'am/ gang yang rung ba'i
107a4(rgyud 'bum): sngags 'dod pa de dag bzung ste/ pad ma'i rtsa ba'am 'o ma'i kha zas kyis 'tsho zhing / rig pa 'bum phrag sum cu rtsa drug bzlas la/ bzlas pa'i mthar cho ga de nyid kyis sngar bstan pa'i ras ris kyi ri mo chen po rab tu bzhag ste/
107a5(rgyud 'bum): me tog pad ma la tsan dan dkar po dang / gur gum gyis btags la seng ldeng gi shing gi me sbar te/ sngar yongs su btags pa'i me tog gis stong phrag drug cu rtsa drug gi sbyin sreg bya'o/ /de nas sbyin sreg gi mthar bcom
107a6(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i ras ris las 'od zer 'byung ngo / /de nas sgrub pa po snang bar byas te/ spyi bor zhugs par 'gyur la des reg ma thag tu sgrub pa pos mngon par shes pa lnga thob par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems
107a7(rgyud 'bum): dpa'i sa thob par 'gyur/ lha'i lus kyis ci ltar 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro bar 'gyur/ bskal pa sum cu rtsa drug gi bar du 'tsho bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing sum cu rtsa drug gnon par 'gyur/ de dag gi
107a8(rgyud 'bum): mthu yang dag par rjes su mthong bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas sum cu rtsa drug gi gsung rab 'dzin par 'gyur/ de la mchod cing bsnyen bkur ba la mngon par dga' bar 'gyur/ mthar yang byang chub la
107b1(rgyud 'bum): gzhol bar 'gyur/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyis byang chub kyi mthar thug pa/ mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du dge ba'i bshes gnyen du yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che
107b2(rgyud 'bum): theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo sde 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga dgu pa'i le'u rab 'byam las/ gnyis pa sgrub pa'i thabs dam pa'i las kyi le'u rab 'byam rdzogs s+ho// //
107b3(rgyud 'bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas sgrub pa'i las dam pa gzhan yang gsungs te/ cho ga'i rgyal po 'di las gang yang rung ba'i sngags bzung nas/ gang gA'i klung chen por zhugs te/ dkyil du gru'i bzhon
107b4(rgyud 'bum): pa la 'dug ste/ 'o ma dang sbyar ba'i 'bras chan za zhing ci ltar 'dod pa'i nyi ma la bzlas pa sum 'bum bya'o/ /de nas bzlas pa'i tha ma la klu thams cad mthong ste/ de nas bsgrub pa brtsam par bya'o/ /
107b5(rgyud 'bum): gru'i steng de nyid kyi nang du me thab pad ma'i rnam pa 'dra ba byas nas/ me tog nA ga ge sar dag gis ras ris la mchod pa chen po byas te/ ras ris chen po nub du bstan pas bzhag la/ bdag nyid shar
107b6(rgyud 'bum): du bltas nas ku sha'i khres la 'dug ste/ me tog nA ga ge sar re re la yang lan bdun bdun bsngags pa byas nas/ shing seng ldeng gis me sbar ba la sbyin sreg bya ste/ tsan dan dkar po dang gur gum dang
107b7(rgyud 'bum): bsres pa'i me tog nA ga ge sar gyis lan stong phrag sum cu rtsa drug gi bar du bya ste/ gzhan gyis ni ma yin no/ /klu rnams mthong ba yang don yod pa yin te/ grub pa'i rdzas rnams la rab tu chags
107b8(rgyud 'bum): pas blang bar mi bya ste/ grub pa'i rdzas rnams la chags pas len par mi byed na/ des na sbyin sreg rdzogs pa dang gru'i bzhon pa dang bcas par 'phur bar 'gyur te/ rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur la/
108a1(rgyud 'bum): klu'i rgyal po'i dbang po thams cad kyang rjes su 'brang zhing bran bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ro/ /bar gyi bskal pa sum cur 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /'di rang dbang du'ang spyod par 'gyur ro/ /'gro
108a2(rgyud 'bum): ba la thogs pa med par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /spyi bo la phyag gis reg par mdzad de/ reg pa tsam gyis mngon par shes pa lnga thob par 'gyur ro/ /nges par
108a3(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas nyid kyang 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /las kyi mchog gzhan yang bstan pa ni bil ba'i shing gcig gi rang bzhin las gru'i bzhon pa shin du brtan pa dang / legs par byas te de la zhon nas gang
108a4(rgyud 'bum): gA'i klung chen por zhugs te/ bil ba'i shing las rlung yor byas te/ de nyid kyis gru de rlung yor 'dzin pa mkhas pa gsal ba des phyag par bya'o/ /gang gA'i klung chen po mi dor bar yongs su thad ka'am/
108a5(rgyud 'bum): chur phyag par bya'o/ /de nas gzhan gang yang rung ba'i sngags rtsa ba'i sngags sam/ 'bru drug pa'am/ 'bru gsum pa'am/ 'bru brgyad pa'am 'bru gcig pa'am/ khro bo'am pho nya'am/ 'khor gyi sngags
108a6(rgyud 'bum): bzung nas/ dang por ras ris chen po de nyid nub tu bltas pas bzhag la/ sgrub pa po shar du blta bar bya'o/ /de nas ci ltar 'dod pa'i 'o ma dang / nas chan khyor gang ngam 'bras bu'i kha zas sam/ chu dang rtsa ba
108a7(rgyud 'bum): dang / 'bras bu'i kha zas kyis 'tsho la mi smra ba'i dka' thub dang / dus gsum du khrus bya zhing gos lan gsum brjes nas dge ba'i las bzang po yang dag par spyod pa dang / blo dge ba bzang po dang ldan pa'o/ /dang por re
108a8(rgyud 'bum): zhig ras ris kyi mdun du sngar ci ltar bstan pa'i sngar bshad pa'i cho gas rig pa 'bum phrag drug cu bzla'o/ /bzlas pa zin pa na gru de rgya mtsho chen por 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /sgrub pa po'i yo byad yang dag par blangs te
108b1(rgyud 'bum): sngar gyi gnas su gzhag par bya'o/ /de nas gru'i bzhon pa rgya mtsho chen por 'gro ba na 'jigs par mi bya ste bzlog par yang mi bya'o/ /sgrub pa po ma gtogs pas zlog par nus pa yang ma yin no/ /de nas dpag
108b2(rgyud 'bum): tshad stong du gnas pa'i rgya mtsho chen por yang yud tsam gyis 'jug par 'gyur na/ lam thung ngu lta smos kyang ci dgos/ rgya mtsho chen po der phyin pa na sgrub pa pos bsgrub pa'i las brtsam par bya'o/ /de nas seng ldeng gi shing
108b3(rgyud 'bum): gi me sbar la/ sngar byas pa'i me thab bam/ rdza mkhan gyis byas pa'i sa'i snod la/ me tog nA ga ge sar tsan dan dkar po dang ga pur gyis bsres pa'i sreg blugs kyis shin tu nyung ba'am rab tu mang ba yang rung 'bum
108b4(rgyud 'bum): phrag drug cu sbyin sreg bya'o/ /sbyin sreg byed pa na yang lang ka'i grong khyer na gnas pa'i srin po gzugs dang cha byad mang po 'dzin pa ha ha zhes bya ba'i sgra sgrogs pa dang / klu'i grong khyer gdengs ka dang ldan pa na
108b5(rgyud 'bum): gnas pa'i rgyal po rnams langs par 'gyur te/ cha byad rnam pa sna tshogs 'dzin pa rab tu drag pa dang / rab tu zhi ba'i klu de rnams dang / srin po de rnams 'di skad du khyed bzhengs shig bzhengs shig /bdag cag gi bdag po mdzad
108b6(rgyud 'bum): du gsol zhes brjod do/ /de bzhin du lha ma yin dang gnod sbyin dang / lha dang lto 'phye chen po dang grub pa dang mi ma yin pa thams cad kyang rab tu chags par byed na ldang bar mi bya/ 'jigs par mi bya'o/ /de nas rig pa 'dzin pas
108b7(rgyud 'bum): sngags zlo zhing / lag pa g.yon pa'i mdzub mos sdigs mdzub byas na/ de nas phan tshun du 'gro ba dang 'byor ba dang 'bros par byed do/ /de nas sbyin sreg zin pa na gru de sgrub pa po des blangs na skad cig gis 'og min du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /
108b8(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du yang 'gro ba dang 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sems dang mthu mnyam par 'gyur/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang rdzu 'phrul chen po dang mthu chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /'dis 'phags pa
109a1(rgyud 'bum): 'jam dpal yang rtag tu mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang sangs rgyas dang 'phags pa nyan thos ma gtogs pa/ klu'i rgyal po thams cad dang srin po thams cad dang gnod sbyin thams cad dang / lha thams cad
109a2(rgyud 'bum): dang lha ma yin thams cad dang / sems can thams cad kyang 'di'i bka' bzhin byed cing dbang du 'gyur ro/ /'di'i sngags grub pa de dag la yang byams pa'i bdag nyid du 'gyur zhing rjes su dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad
109a3(rgyud 'bum): kyis kyang mi thub pa'i bar du 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang las sgrub pa'i thabs dam pa yod de/ shing bil ba chen po las gru'i bzhon pa byas la yang shing gcig gi shing gi tshogs las gnas chen po byas te/ gang gA'i dbus kyi gling der
109a4(rgyud 'bum): gru'i bzhon pa'i gnas byas la/ der yang gru'i bzhon pa la zhon pa'i skyes bu brgya nyi shu rnams mar me lag na thogs pa/ gos dkar po bgos pa srung ba byas pa/ cho ga snga mas yang dag par bzhag pa'i ras ris mdun du
109a5(rgyud 'bum): gzhag par bya ste/ de nas ras ris la mchod pa chen po byas nas/ nA ga ge sar gyi phye ma tsan dan dkar po dang gur gum dang ga pur gyis bsres pa'i sreg blugs kyis seng ldeng gi me la stong phrag sum cu rtsa drug sbyin sreg bya'o/ /
109a6(rgyud 'bum): de nas sbyin sreg zin pa na/ skad cig gis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba dang 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /ci ltar 'dod pa bzhin du rnam par rgyu bar byed do/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur te/
109a7(rgyud 'bum): mthong ba tsam gyis sa thob par yang 'gyur ro/ /mngon par shes pa lnga 'thob pa dang yun ring du 'tsho zhing bskal pa chen por gnas par yang 'gyur ro/ /rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur bar yang 'gyur ro/ /mar me 'dzin pa de
109a8(rgyud 'bum): dag kyang rig pa 'dzin pa 'di'i grogs por 'gyur te/ de dag dang lhan cig ci ltar 'dod pa bzhin du rgyu zhing rang dbang du 'gro bar yang 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur byed par mngon par dga' bar 'gyur zhing /
109b1(rgyud 'bum): 'phral yang sangs rgyas nyid du nges par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang sgrub pa'i thabs kyi las dam pa yod de/ chu klung rgya mtsho'i 'gram dag gam/ /de bzhin ri bo kha ba can/ /ri yi rgyal po 'bigs byed la/ /las kyi mchog ni bsgrub par bya/ /
109b2(rgyud 'bum): ma la ya ri sa ha dang / /spos kyi ngad ldang ar bu dang / /ri yi rgyal po sum brtsegs la/ /las kyi mchog ni bsgrub par bya/ /de bzhin rgya mtsho chen po dang / /ri ni shing ldan me tog yod/ /'di dag gi ni phyogs dag tu/ /sngags grub par ni
109b3(rgyud 'bum): rgyal bas gsungs/ /gtsang zhing bas mtha' dben phyogs su/ /grong gi chos ni rnam par spangs/ /de bzhin ri yi tshang tshing du/ /sngags kyi rgyal po thams cad 'grub/ /bas mtha'i gnas mal nyams dga' dang / /rgyal bas de bzhin bsngags
109b4(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / /ma rungs sems can thams cad la/ /sngags kyi rgyal po thams cad 'grub/ /chos ldan rgyal po yod pa dang / /gtsang sbra spyod pa'i skye bo yod/ /pha dang ma la gus pa dang / /bram ze'i rigs ni yod pa yi/ /gnas der lha rnams
109b5(rgyud 'bum): 'grub 'gyur te/ /gzhan du 'grub pa ma yin no/ /chu bo gang gA'i 'gram dang ni/ /de bzhin legs mdzes ya mu na/ /sin+du nar ma dA nang dang / /zla ba'i cha ni gtsang ngogs dang / /de bzhin kA ba'i sa ra swad/ /chu bo chen po sI ta rnams/ /
109b6(rgyud 'bum): 'di dag grub pa'i zhing du ni/ /stobs bcu ldan sras rnams kyis bshad/ /stobs bcu ldan pas bshad pa'i zhing / /byang phyogs yod pa'i ri dag dang / /kha che dang ni rgya yul dang / /bal po de bzhin mang yul dang / /rgya yul che dang
109b7(rgyud 'bum): li yul dag / de dag ma lus grub pa'i zhing / /byang phyogs la ni gnas pa dang / /nas dang gro la spyod pa dang / /ri dang chu bo dag la yang / /bsod nams yul du bstan pa yin/ /sems can snying rje ldan gang gnas/ /de dag la ni
109b8(rgyud 'bum): nges 'grub 'gyur/ /dpal gyi ri bo'i ri chen ni/ /lho yi phyogs na yang dag gnas/ /dpal ldan 'bras phung mchod rten ni/ /rgyal ba'i ring bsrel gnas pa'i sa/ /thams cad don gyi gnas dag la/ /der ni sngags rnams myur du 'grub/ /mchod rten
110a1(rgyud 'bum): chen po rdo rje gdan/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor dang / /thub mchog zhi bar rab gshegs pa/ /der yang grub par rab tu snang / /lha las babs pa'i mchod rten dang / /nai ka sha dang cho 'phrul bstan/ /grong mchog ser skya
110a2(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya dang / /nags tshal lum bi nir 'khrungs la/ /sngags kyi rgyal po 'grub 'gyur zhes/ /rgyal bas rab bsngags brjod pa yin/ /bya rgod phung po'i ri dang ni/ /de bzhin sa steng bsil ba'i tshal/ /grong mchog me tog
110a3(rgyud 'bum): ces bya dang / /rtag tu de bzhin ga sha dang / /bcom brlag kan+ya kub dza dang / /sa steng grong ni 'phags rgyal dang / /de bzhin yangs pa can mchod rten/ /mi thi la yi grong khyer sa/ /grong dang grong khyer mchog dag ni/ /gang gzhan skye
110a4(rgyud 'bum): bo yang dag 'byung / /rab bsngags bsod nams yul dag ni/ /de dag la ni bsgrub pa bya/ /de dang gzhan yang yul dag dang / /grong dang ljongs dang ri bor dang / /gnas dang grong mchog gtso bo ni/ /bsod nams gnas la rab
110a5(rgyud 'bum): brten nas/ /der ni slong mos rjes 'tsho zhing / /bzlas dang sbyin sreg dga' ba dang / /gnas khang bla gab med pa dang / /rtag tu khyim ni stong pa la/ /sngags rnams las ni thams cad la/ /thog ma nyid du bya ba yin/ /
110a6(rgyud 'bum): sngags pas rtag tu yul dbus su/ /sngags bzlas mngon par 'dod pas bya/ /bzlas la rab zhugs rtag tu brtson/ /sngags rig gtong ba dag la goms/ /tshul khrims spyod cing shin tu dben/ /'byung po kun
110a7(rgyud 'bum): la phan par dga'/ /sngags spyod pa la dga' ba yi/ /sdom brtson gyis ni sngags bzlas bya/ /gtsang zhing gtsang sbra yod phyogs dang / /kla klo rkun ma rnam par spangs/ /sems can sdig sbrul la sogs pa/ /spangs pa'i
110a8(rgyud 'bum): sa phyogs 'dod pa yis/ /'bras bu me tog yang dag ldan/ /dri med rab bsngags chu yod par/ /sngags rigs sngags ni brten byas na/ /sbyor ba thams cad rab tu 'grub/ /gzhan yang dur khrod chen po ni/ /der ni bzlas pa rtag tu bya/ /dri med
110b1(rgyud 'bum): chu dang 'bab chu ni/ /srog chags dag kyang rnam par spangs/ /der ni de nyid bzla bya ste/ /mnyam par bzhag pas sngags bzlas bya/ /'jig rten spyod pa'i bsod nams min/ /der ni cung zad mi mthong ste/ /'on kyang sngags ni
110b2(rgyud 'bum): bstan pa yis/ /cung zad dus ni bstan pa'o/ /dam tshig tshogs pa'i rgyu ldan na/ /de las gzhan du'ang 'gro bya ste/ /der ni dam tshig thob bsten pa/ /cung zad dus te gzhan du min/ /de nas gzhan du'ang myur du ni/ /sngags rig pas
110b3(rgyud 'bum): ni ci nus 'gro/ /bde gshegs mchod rten bzhugs pa yi/ /sa steng dag la rtag tu bsten/ /'jig rten mu stegs thams cad ni/ /lta ba log par ltung ba dang / /gzhan yang stegs su gyur pa rnams/ /sngags rig pas
110b4(rgyud 'bum): ni rtag tu spang / /rgyu ngan 'gro ba ngan yod par/ /sngags rig pas ni der mi bsten/ /gang du rgyal ba mchog bzhugs dang / /sa steng bse ru rang rgyal dang / /byang chub sems dpa' skal ba che/ /nyan thos rgyal ba'i sras dag ni/ /
110b5(rgyud 'bum): de dag gnas pa'i phyogs dag tu/ /zlos pa sngags rig ldan pas bsten/ /'bad pas snga ma nyid du ni/ /gnas de la ni rtag tu spyod/ /sngags shes cho ga mthong ba yis/ /yang dang yang du sngags zlos bya/ /lus can sdig
110b6(rgyud 'bum): pa ma lus dag / bzlas dang sbyin sreg dag gis sel/ /de bas 'bad pa kun gyis ni/ /mnyam bzhag sngags ni bzla bar bya/ /las thams cad la gnas 'di dag gsungs pa las sgrub pa mchog gi las kyi thabs
110b7(rgyud 'bum): sgrub pa la gnas 'di dag ma rnyed na/ gang yang rung ba'i gnas de dag tu gtsang sbra byas te sngon du bsnyen pa byas la/ dad cing mos pas sgrub pa'i thabs kyi lam dam pa brtsam par bya ste/ dang por re zhig ras ris chen po nub tu bltas
110b8(rgyud 'bum): pas bzhag ste/ bdag nyid shar du bltas la/ grog mkhar gyi sa'am/ gang gA'i klung gi ngogs na yod pa'i sa blangs te/ rtswa u shi ra dang tsan dan dkar po dang gur gum dang ga pur la sogs pas bsre ba bya ste/ rma bya'i gzugs byas la
111a1(rgyud 'bum): ras ris de'i mdun du bzhag go/ ku sha'i rtse mo ma nyams pa sa phyogs gtsang mar skyes pa 'khor lo'i gzugs su byas te/ ras ris kyi mdun du lag pa g.yas pas bzung zhing / lag pa g.yon pas rma bya
111a2(rgyud 'bum): bzung la/ yar ngo'i zla ba nya ba'i mtshan mor ras ris la mchod pa chen po byas te/ ga pur dang tsan dan gyi dud pa bsregs la/ nam langs kyi bar du bzlas pa byas na/ de nas nyi ma shar ba'i dus su lha'i rang bzhin gyi rma bya ni rma bya
111a3(rgyud 'bum): chen po'i rgyal mor 'gyur ro/ /'khor lo ni kun du 'bar bar 'gyur zhing / bdag nyid kyang lha'i lus su 'gyur ro/ /de nas lha'i phreng ba dang gos dang rgyan gyis brgyan par 'gyur ro/ /nyi ma shar ba dang 'dra ba'i 'dod pa'i gzugs
111a4(rgyud 'bum): mdzes par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la phyag byas nas/ ras ris la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas la/ ras ris blangs te rma bya'i stan de la 'dug na yud tsam gyis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gnon par 'gyur ro/ /
111a5(rgyud 'bum): rig pa 'dzin pa bye ba khri phrag brgya stong gi 'khor du ma dang ldan pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/ /bar gyi bskal pa drug cur 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /ci ltar 'dod par 'gro zhing spyod par 'gyur ro/ /'gro ba
111a6(rgyud 'bum): la thogs pa med pa dang lha'i phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal yang mngon sum du 'gyur zhing / de nyid 'di'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'gyur ro/ mthar yang sangs rgyas nyid thob par
111a7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du dbyug pa dang / spyi blugs dang tshangs skud dang ldong ros dang gi wang dang ral gri dang / lcags mda' dang mtshon rtse gcig pa dang dgra sta dang / mtshon rnam pa sna tshogs kyi khyad par sa'i rang bzhin nam/ rkang gnyis
111a8(rgyud 'bum): dang rkang bzhi dang bya dang bzhon pa'i bye brag seng ge dang stag dang dom la sogs pa'am/ grog mkhar gyi sa'i rang bzhin la dri zhim po'i dris bsres pa las/ gdan dang bzhon pa dang gnas mal dang / gdugs dkar po dang cod pan dang
111b1(rgyud 'bum): rgyan gyi bye brag thams cad dang rin po che'i bye brag thams cad dang / rab tu byung ba'i yo byad kyi bye brag phreng ba dang lham dang shing lham dang / lhung bzed dang chos gos dang khar gsil dang khab dang / gri la sogs pa lcags
111b2(rgyud 'bum): khyad par can gyi rang bzhin nam/ gzhan yang gang cung zad sems can gyi yo byad snod la sogs pa/ lcags bzang po'i rang bzhin nam/ grog mkhar gyi sa'am/ chu bo'i ngogs kyi sa las byas pa de dag thams cad
111b3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rnam lngas bkrus pa'am/ chus gtor ba tsam byas la snga ma bzhin du yongs su dag par byed pa'i sngags sam/ yi ge gcig pa'i sngags sam/ gzhan gang yang rung ba'i sngags cho ga'i rgyal po sgrub
111b4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i thabs kyi sngags ma gtogs pas lan brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags pa byas te/ ci ltar 'dod par bdag nyid bsrung ba byas pa dang grogs po yang yongs su bskyab pa byas pa dang shin tu gsang ba'i sngags
111b5(rgyud 'bum): dang rgyud shes pa sngar bstan pa'i gnas dag tu ras ris nub tu bltas pas gzhag la/ bdag nyid snga ma bzhin du byas te/ ras ris la mchod pa chen po byas nas ras ris chen po la ga pur gyi bdug pas bdugs te/ sngar
111b6(rgyud 'bum): bstan pa'i mtshon dang yo byad dang sems can gyi khyad par sngar bstan pa'i bcos mar byas pa la/ yar ngo'i zla ba nya ba'i mtshan mo gong ma'i rdzas gang yang rung ba de dag blangs te/ mtshan mo nyi ma shar ba'i dus kyi bar du bzla
111b7(rgyud 'bum): bar bya'o/ /bar 'dir 'od chen po'i phreng ba ras ris la yang dag par mthong la/ gal te bzhon pa'i khyad par sgrub pa pos gzung bar gyur na ni/ de la zhon nas ci ltar 'dod par 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te rgyan gyi khyad par ram
111b8(rgyud 'bum): tshon gyi khyad par de blangs pas de bcangs na/ rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor lo 'dzin par 'gyur te/ ci ltar 'dod par 'gro zhing lha'i gzugs dang ldan pa dang / nyi ma shar ba dang 'dra bar 'gyur ba dang 'od kyi phreng ba chen po dang ldan pa dang / lus
112a1(rgyud 'bum): shin tu gsal bar 'gyur ba dang rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi mnga' bdag tu 'gyur ro/ /ring du 'tsho zhing bskal pa chen por gnas pa dang rig pa 'dzin pa bye ba khri phrag brgya stong gi 'khor du ma dang ldan pa dang /
112a2(rgyud 'bum): lha'i nor bu rin po che'i gzhal med khang la spyod pa dang bzhon pa gang sngar yongs su brtags pa sa'i rang bzhin grub na/ de nyid 'dir mthu chen po dang ldan par 'gyur te bzhon pa de nyid 'di'i grogs por 'gyur ba dang gzhan
112a3(rgyud 'bum): gyi sngags 'gugs par byed pa grub pa rnams kyi brten pa'i gnas su gyur pa/ bdag gi sngags kyi grub pa la yang dag par sbyor bar byed pa/ byams pa'i bdag nyid dang phan par 'dod pas rab tu 'brel ba gang 'di nyid
112a4(rgyud 'bum): kyi mtshon dang rgyan dang rin po che'i khyad par dang / stan dang gnas mal dang sems can la sogs pa nyid 'di la srung ba chen po nyid dang sba ba dang sbed pa la rtag tu 'brang bar 'gyur ro mthu chen po dang brtson 'grus chen po dang lus
112a5(rgyud 'bum): chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur zhing legs so zhes bya ba yang sbyin par mdzad la/ spyi bo la reg par mdzad cing byang chub kyi snying po thob kyi bar du dge ba'i bshes
112a6(rgyud 'bum): gnyen du sgrub par mdzad do/ /stobs bcu nyid kyang nges par thob par mdzad cing / sems can thams cad zil gyis gnon cing mchod par yang 'gyur ro/ /'byung po thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/ /yang dag pa'i rgyud kyi
112a7(rgyud 'bum): mtha' gcod pa med par 'gyur ba dang sa thob par 'gyur ba dang stobs bcu dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa nges par thob par 'gyur te/ mdor na las dam pa thams cad gnas dam pa dag tu gnas nas/ ras ris dam pa dag gi
112a8(rgyud 'bum): mdun du mchod pa dam pa la mngon par dga' bas las dam pa gzhan dag kho na bya'o/ /rig pa 'dzin pa nyid du nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rjes su zhugs pa dang mngon par shes pa lnga nyid dang sa dang sngags
112b1(rgyud 'bum): thob pa nyid dang lus 'di nyid kyis 'jig rten gyi khams dag tu 'gro ba nyid dang stobs bcu'i rgyud yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir dang / 'phags pa 'jam dpal mngon sum du mthong ba nyid kyi phyir dang 'bras bu yod par
112b2(rgyud 'bum): mthong ba'i chos ston pa mnyan pa'i phyir dang / sangs rgyas kyi gdung rgyun mi gcad pa'i phyir dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mthar gyis rjes su thob pa nyid kyi phyir dang / chos kyi sprin las byung ba'i sngags bzang po la
112b3(rgyud 'bum): 'jug pa nyid kyi phyir dang / nyon mongs pa bskam pa dang bdud rtsi'i char gyis nyon mongs pa zhi bar bya ba'i phyir dang / 'jig rten rjes su gzung ba la rab tu 'jug par rjes su sgrub pa nyid kyi phyir dang / de bzhin du chos kyi tshul gzung
112b4(rgyud 'bum): ba'i phyir dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung don yod par bya ba'i phyir dang / sngags kyi thabs kyi sgrub pa'i cho ga rab tu gsang ba nyid kyi phyir dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang rang sangs rgyas dang
112b5(rgyud 'bum): 'phags pa nyan thos kyi bdag nyid chen po 'byung ba nyid kyi phyir/ cho ga'i rgyal po rab 'byam sngags kyi mthu dang rab tu rnam par ldan pa 'di ras ris chen po'i mdun du nye bar gnas la bsgrub par bya ste/ 'jig rten dang
112b6(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sngags kyi cho ga dang / sngags rgyud thams cad kyi cho ga'i lam gyi ste/ mdor na 'dir cho ga gzhan du gsungs pa'i las kyis kyang cho ga'i rgyal po 'di bsgrub par bya ste/ myur du de dag gi sngags
112b7(rgyud 'bum): rnams 'grub par 'gyur te/ gang ngas bstan pa de dag nges par 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga
112b8(rgyud 'bum): bcu pa ras ris chen po'i cho ga'i le'u rab 'byam rdzogs s+ho/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas yang gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la gzigs nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/
113a1(rgyud 'bum): 'jam dpal khyod kyi ras ris bar ma'i cho ga gzhan sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga yod de/ mdor bsdus nas bshad kyis de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad do/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas
113a2(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang ston pa sems can thams cad la phan par dgyes pa dang / bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i phyir dang / ma 'ongs pa'i skye bo
113a3(rgyud 'bum): rnams la gzigs nas/ de'i dus la bab par mkhyen na de bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'jam dpal nyon cig dang por re zhig tshul khrims dang
113a4(rgyud 'bum): brtul zhugs dang / gtsang sbra'i spyod pa dang nges par sdom pa dang bzlas pa dang / sbyin sreg dang bsam gtan dang cho ga gang du legs par rab tu gnas pa la sngags thams cad kyi spyod pa sgrub pa'i las 'bras bu dang bcas shing
113a5(rgyud 'bum): don yod par 'gyur te/ sngags thams cad kyi sbyor ba 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /ngas bshad pa de gang zhe na/ gzhon nu nyon cig /dang por re zhig rig pa dang brtul zhugs dang / tshul khrims kyi yi dam dang po nyid du blang bar byas la/
113a6(rgyud 'bum): dang po re zhig dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis bstan pa'i dam tshig khyod kyi cho ga'i rgyal por bstan cing sngar bshad pa la rjes su 'jug par bya'o/ /blo gsal ba yid gzhungs pa dang ldan pa/ slob dpon du dbang bskur ba
113a7(rgyud 'bum): khyod kyis bstan pa'i cho ga shes pa/ dge ba gsal ba'i chos dang ldan pa/ bden par smra ba spro ba chen po dang ldan pa byas pa gzo ba/ yid gzhungs pa dang ldan pa/ 'dris brten pa ha cang mi rgan ha cang mi gzhon pa rnyed pa
113a8(rgyud 'bum): dang / bkur sti la chags pa med pa tshangs par spyod pa/ snying rje dang ldan pa rnyed pa tsam mam/ longs spyod kyi rgyu tsam mam/ rjes su chags pa'i rgyur yang rdzun mi smra na cung zad tsam mam/ chags pa'am rmongs pa tsam gyis
113b1(rgyud 'bum): rnam par lta smos kyang ci dgos/ dam bcas pa brtan pa dang sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa dang / snying rje dang ldan pa dang tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang / sngon du spyad pa byas pa dang khyod kyi gsang ba'i sngags rjes su
113b2(rgyud 'bum): zlos pa dang snga ma nyid du rig pa goms par byas pa dang / khyod kyi dkyil 'khor la mthar gyis yang dag par zhugs pa dang / 'jig rten shes pa dang cho ga shes pa dang yang dag par rjes su 'dzin par byed pa dang / 'bras bu
113b3(rgyud 'bum): dang ldan zhing mkhas pa dang legs pa la rab tu zhugs pa dang gzugs mdzes pa dang 'dod pa med pa dang / chags pa med pa dang dpa' ba dang brtson 'grus brtan pa dang nad med pa ste/ nad gang gis las mi nus pa'i ngang tshul
113b4(rgyud 'bum): can gyi nad med pa dang rigs mthon por skye ba'o/ /yon tan de dag dang ldan na ni dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon du 'gyur la/ sgrub pa po yang de dang mnyam pa ste/ yan lag lhag pa'am ma tshang ba cung zad kyang med pa'o/ /
113b5(rgyud 'bum): de lta bu'i dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon la mchod pa byas shing don du gnyer bar byas te/ slob dpon dang lhan cig byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i dam tshig la rjes su 'jug
113b6(rgyud 'bum): par 'tshal na/ slob dpon gyis bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ phan pa'i thugs dang brtse ba'i thugs kyis de bshad du gsol/ de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon des sngar bstan pa'i cho gas slob ma la snga ma ci lta
113b7(rgyud 'bum): bu bzhin du brtags nas rab tu gzhug par bya ste/ sngar ci ltar dbang bskur ba bzhin du phyis kyang sbyin par bya'o/ /go rims ci lta ba bzhin du dam tshig bstan te/ gsang ba'i phyag rgya dang rgyud dang sngags dang las kyang
113b8(rgyud 'bum): dus ring po nyid nas nges par brtags te/ bsam pa shes nas bstan par bya ste/ sngags la sogs pa'i las rnams kyang thams cad du gzhan du ma yin no zhes cho ga 'di ltar bstan pa yin no/ /de nas slob mas dkyil 'khor
114a1(rgyud 'bum): gyi slob dpon la ci nus pas/ gang gis slob dpon dgyes pa bdag dang longs spyod rab tu dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon des bu'i 'du shes nye bar gzhag par bya ste/ bu bzhin du bsgrub par
114a2(rgyud 'bum): bya zhing ma bzhin du yang longs spyod kyis nye bar bsdu bar bya'o/ /de nas sgrub pa po des sngags gang yang rung ba bzung ste/ gcig pu dben par song nas sngar bstan pa gong ma bzhin du rgya cher sbyar te/ de dag nyid kyis sngags
114a3(rgyud 'bum): dag gis ni spyan drang ba dang gshegs su gsol ba dang / mar me dang dri dang bdug pa dang gtor ma dang lha bshos dkyil 'khor la gsungs pa nyid kyi cho gas rgya cher bya ste / spyan drangs nas gdan dang mchod yon phul la/ dus mtshams
114a4(rgyud 'bum): gsum du khrus lan gsum bya zhing / gos lan gsum brje zhing nyin re bzhin du bzlas pa bya'o/ /de la dus gsum zhes bya ba ni mtshan mo'i mtha' nas brtsams pa yin te/ zung tsam nas nyi ma 'char ba'i bar 'dir dang po'i
114a5(rgyud 'bum): dus su brjod do/ /nyi ma gung ni nyi ma gnyi ga'i gung tsam gyi tshad du nam mkha' la gnas pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la ni nyi ma gung gi dus zhes brjod do/ /nyi ma nub pa'i dus su lhag ma zung tsam lus pa'i dus gsum pa
114a6(rgyud 'bum): zhes brjod do/ /tshul khrims brtul zhugs yang dag ldan/ /slob dpon mkhas pa chen po dang / /mthon po'i rigs su skyes pa dang / /rnam pa kun du brtson 'grus brtan/ /sngags rgyud dag la mngon brtson dang / /bya ba kun
114a7(rgyud 'bum): la blo gros dge/ /zhib cing mkhas la chog shes dang / /chos kyi dbyings ni rtag tu 'dzin/ /spro ba che zhing gzi brjid che/ /'jig rten chos la ltos pa med/ /thub mchog chos la dad pa dang / /'jig rten na ni yongs
114a8(rgyud 'bum): su bsngags/ /dben pa shes shing bzlas pa byed/ /sngon du bsnyen pas rjes bsnyen byed/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi sngags shes shing / /mthong bas nges 'dzin de mchog byed/ /sangs rgyas gsungs pa'i sngags rnams
114b1(rgyud 'bum): la/ /'jig rten pa yi sbyor ba shes/ /srung byed mthu ni brtan pa dang / /rtag tu gtsang sbra'i spyod la dga'/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa'i lam la ni/ /thams cad du ni 'jug par byed/ /rab bsngags rgyal bas bstod pa yi/ /sngags
114b2(rgyud 'bum): zlos pa la brtson par byed/ /las 'bras dag la rtag yid ches/ /'jig rten pha rol de bzhin no/ /sdig pa kun la 'jigs byed pa/ /shin tu phra ba'ang de bzhin no/ /gtsang zhing grims dang le lo med/ /yid gzhungs blta
114b3(rgyud 'bum): na sdug pa dang / /stobs bcu ldan pas sngags bshad dang / /de bzhin rgyal ba'i sras dang ni/ /gang dag 'jig rten sngags dag dang / /rdo rje pad ma'i rigs dag gis/ /de la rtag tu brtson byed dang / /gzhung dang bstan
114b4(rgyud 'bum): bcos don klog pa/ /nad med pa dang stobs ldan dang / /rgan dang gzhon pa rnam par spangs/ /sngags grub de bzhin shes nyen can/ /kun nas myur du byed pa dang / /las mtha' mi ring nga rgyal chung / /zur tsam
114b5(rgyud 'bum): gyis go khyad par can/ /tshangs par spyod cing shes rab che/ /gcig pu 'dre bar mi byed dang / /'jam dpal gyis gsungs rgyud dag la/ /dbang bskur thob cing dpa' ba dang / /bzlas pa'i mthar byas ldan pa dang / /
114b6(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin rig pa goms byas dang / /sems dpa' che zhing 'jig rten shes/ /'gro ba'i de nyid rjes sems dang / /legs pa'i lam nyid rab sbyar byed/ /sbyin byed 'byung po phan la dga'/ /khyad par can de'i slob dpon la/ /
114b7(rgyud 'bum): rtag tu don du gnyer bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor de ni bris pa la/ /sngags rnams grub pa ster bar 'gyur/ /de nyid kyis ni dbang bskur na/ /'bras bu chen po ster bar 'gyur/ /grub pa 'dod pa'i slob mas kyang / /thub mchog de ni rtag
114b8(rgyud 'bum): tu mchod/ /de yi bka' ni mi 'gom par/ /slob mas 'bad nas bya ba yin/ /ci ltar 'byor pa yod pa bzhin/ /longs spyod de la sbyin par bya/ /nyung ba'ang yang na mang ba'ang rung / /gang gis dga' ba thob 'gyur ba/ /lus dang srog gi don
115a1(rgyud 'bum): phyir ni/ /nor ni ci ltar sbyin pa bzhin/ /slob ma chos rig de bzhin du/ /slob dpon phyir ni nor sbyin na/ /tshe dang nad med de bzhin du/ /grags pa thob par 'gyur ba yin/ /slob mas bla ma de mchod na/ /dag pa'i 'gro
115a2(rgyud 'bum): ba thob par 'gyur/ /lam ni sna tshogs nyer bstan pas/ /de la sngags ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /de la bsten dang bsnyen bkur byas/ /ri mo byas dang mchod pas ni/ /sangs rgyas rnams dang de bzhin du/ /rgyal ba'i
115a3(rgyud 'bum): sras rnams mnyes par 'gyur/ /bla ma rtag tu bsnyen bkur na/ /lha rnams thams cad dga' bar 'gyur/ /bla ma sngags rnams mthong ba yis/ /de ltar thams cad bstan pa yin/ /sgrub pa pos ni dang por yang / /
115a4(rgyud 'bum): dam tshig la ni 'jug par bya/ /dma' ba'am de dang mnyam pa'ang rung / /gal te khyad par gyur na yang / /rmongs pa'am lhag pa yin yang rung / /rtag tu bla ma brnyas mi bya/ /ci ltar de nyid rjes mthong la/ /sngags 'grub pa
115a5(rgyud 'bum): la bya ba yin/ /sngar bstan pa yi slob ma yis/ /de la phrag dog bya ba min/ /lus can brtse ba 'phel byed pa'i/ /mig ni gang la yod gyur pa/ /de ni slob ma nyid bya ste/ /slob dpon rgyur yang bya ba yin/ /gang du phan tshun rgyud
115a6(rgyud 'bum): la ni/ /brtse ba'i phreng ba yod pa dang / /brtse ba'i rgyud ni 'dzin pa la/ /de la sngags ni sbyin par bya/ /slob dpon la ni slob ma 'am/ /bla mas slob ma mthong ba'ang rung / /rtag tu spro bar 'gyur ba la/ /gnyi ga la ni grub pa
115a7(rgyud 'bum): gnas/ /de dag la ni rtag tu yang / /sngags spyod lam ni bstan par bya/ /gnyi gas pha dang bur shes la/ /sngags ni 'bras bcas gnas pa yin/ /slob ma bla mas rtag tu ni/ /brtan dang dga' ba de bzhin thob/ /bu ni chos dang rjes mthun la/ /
115a8(rgyud 'bum): 'bad pas rtag tu bsrung bar bya/ /de dag la ni sangs rgyas chos/ /rtag tu rgyun mi chad par 'gyur/ /gal te de med mgon bral la/ /sngags rnams ci skad gsungs pa bzhin/ /sems can dbul po rnams la ni/ /khyad par du yang
115b1(rgyud 'bum): sngags byin na/ /sems can kun la'ang sbyin pa bas/ /sngags kyi spyod pa khyad par 'phags/ /mchog dang bar ma tha ma ni/ /dus rnams kun du bya ba ste/ /rtag tu sems can kun la ni/ /rjes su gzung ba'i phyir bya'o/ /'gro
115b2(rgyud 'bum): ba'am skye gnas rnam brtags nas/ /'dod pa dag la sbyin par bya/ /de ni ci ltar 'dod pa'i sngags/ /slob mas de la blang bar bya/ /de nyid kyis bstan lam yin te/ /gzhan du de lta ma yin no/ /'jig rten pha rol pa la
115b3(rgyud 'bum): ni/ /grub pa de las bslang bar bya/ /pha bzhin mgo bos phyag byas nas/ /de nas ci ltar 'dod bzhin 'gro/ /de nas gcig pu 'gro byas nas/ /mnyam par bzhag ste bzlas pa bya/ /slong mo slong bas rjes 'tsho zhing / /thub pa
115b4(rgyud 'bum): dus gsum zlos par byed/ /sngar ni ci ltar bstan pa bzhin/ /lam du rab tu 'jug par byed/ /de la rjes 'jug bsten pa dang / /'dug pa dang ni gnas pa'o/ /dben pa chen po ri rtse dang / /de bzhin chu bo'i ngogs gtsang dang / /
115b5(rgyud 'bum): ba lang gnas dang mtsho chen dang / /dben pa skye bo rnam spangs dang / /lha khang stong dang shing dang ni/ /mtshan gcig ri ni mthon po dang / /rgya mtsho che ngogs dga' ba dang / /gling rnams chen po dag dang ni/ /rnam pa sna tshogs sngar
115b6(rgyud 'bum): bstan pa'i/ /yul ni yid du 'ong ba dang / /'di dag las ni phyogs gzhan du/ /mnyam bzhag sngags ni bzla bar bya/ /grogs po mtshan nyid ldan pa ni/ /sngags don lugs dang tshad mar ldan/ /zur gyi rnam pa de nyid
115b7(rgyud 'bum): shes/ /bdag dang de yang 'dra ba'o/ /dpa' zhing g.yul las rnam rgyal dang / /snying stobs che zhing bzod dang ldan/ /rgyal bas gsungs pa'i bstan pa dang / /sngags kyi spyod pa la dad cing / /sngags pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan la/ /
115b8(rgyud 'bum): bzod dang ldan pa'i grogs po la/ /de la 'bad pa med par ni/ /sngags kyi las rnams 'grub par 'gyur/ /tho rangs mal nas langs nas ni/ /mtsho chen las byung chu bo las/ /byung chu srog chags skyon med pa'i/ /bzang pos
116a1(rgyud 'bum): khrus ni rab tu bya/ /sa dang lci ba phye ma yis/ /sngags shes pas ni lus dril bya/ /sngags kyis de bzhin dag byas pa'i/ /dri med gtsang sbrar byas pa'i chus/ /sngags ldan bdag nyid khrus bya zhing / /ha cang ring bar
116a2(rgyud 'bum): 'dug mi bya/ /de nas langs nas chu ngogs 'dug /sa dag gis kyang lag gnyis bkru/ /bdun dang bdun dang yang bdun ni/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig bar du'o/ /de bzhin du yang nye reg bya/ /so shing dag kyang yang dag byed/ /so shing
116a3(rgyud 'bum): rnam par bor nas ni/ /de nas skyob la phyag kyang bya/ /'jig rten mgon la phyag 'tshal nas/ /mchod pa yid du 'ong bar bya/ /rnam pa sna tshogs mchod bstod dang / /yang dag bstod pa yang yang bya/ /dri zhim me tog de bzhin
116a4(rgyud 'bum): du/ /ston la zlos pas mchod yon dbul/ /sangs rgyas rnams dang de'i slob la/ /spyi bos rab tu phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten mgon po de dag gi/ /mdun du sdig pa bshags par bya/ /ras ris bar ma'i mdun du ni/ /
116a5(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid dag kyang dbul bar bya/ /ku sha'i khres ni byas pa der/ /legs par mnyam gzhag 'dug nas ni/ /des ni phreng ba thogs nas su/ /'bad pas bzlas pa bya ba yin/ /ci ltar rnyed pa'i sngags kyis bya/ /de tshe sngags
116a6(rgyud 'bum): gzhan bzlas mi bya/ /ha cang ngan pa spang bya ste/ /ha cang bzang po'ang de bzhin no/ /bar ma bar ma'i las dag la/ /sdom chen sngags ni rtag tu bzla/ /ha cang skad mthon 'bad pas spang / /tshig ni dma' ba'ang ma yin no/ /
116a7(rgyud 'bum): bar ma dbus kyi yul dag tu/ /rjes mthun rgyal bas bsngags pa'o/ /ha cang skad mtho dma' ba'ang min/ /bar mas rtag tu bzlas pa bya/ /sangs rgyas snga ma kun gyis ni/ /tshig ni legs ldan yin zhes gsungs/ /
116a8(rgyud 'bum): rtag tu gzhan gyi rna lam dang / /gzhan gyi drung du mi bzla'o/ /dben pa'i phyogs su'ang bdag rig pas/ /sngags kyang bar ma bzla bar bya/ /de ltar sngags bzlas rab sbyar na/ /sngags ni gang yang myur du 'grub/ /bar ma'i sngags
116b1(rgyud 'bum): ni 'grub 'dod na/ /yang dang yang du bzlas pa bya/ /de bas bzlas pa rnam bral dang / /sngags kyi de nyid don legs thos/ /dben zhing gdung ba med par ni/ /zlos pas sngags ni bzla bar bya/ /mtshan mo yi ni bzhi cha dang / /de phyed de bzhin
116b2(rgyud 'bum): phyed nyid dang / /skya rengs dmar po zung tsam la/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'char ba na/ /dang po'i bar ma nyid du ni/ /thub pa mchog gis gsungs pa yin/ /zung tsam khru ni bzhi pa ste/ /bar mar yongs su bsgrags pa yin/ /de nas nyi ma phyed
116b3(rgyud 'bum): shar na/ /sngags bzlas de tshe spang bar bya/ /sngags bzlas de tshe btang ba na/ /sdom brtson mchod yon slar gshegs gsol/ /de tshe btang ba'i lhag dus la/ /thub pa'i bstan la dge ba bya/ /dam chos bklag la sogs pa ni/ /shes
116b4(rgyud 'bum): rab pha rol phyin la sogs/ /glegs bam sa bcu zhes bya ba/ /mchod dang bklag pa rtag tu bya/ /de nas dus la bab gyur na/ /rang sngags sngags kyi mgon po dang / /thub pa mchog la phyag 'tshal nas/ /de nas 'tsho ba'i don du 'gro/ /dus
116b5(rgyud 'bum): gsum spyod dang de bzhin ldan/ /dus su zas spyod dbang po thul/ /chos can sgrub la brtson pa dang / /sangs rgyas bstan la rab tu dad/ /mi smra grong gi nang du 'dug /rtag tu gtsang sbra spyod la dga'/ /chos ldan sems can khyim
116b6(rgyud 'bum): du ni/ /slong dus rtag zlos byed cing 'dug /srog chags med chos grub pa yi/ /zas ni gtsang bar grags pa dang / /yang dag lta ba'i khyim dag dang / /sangs rgyas bstan la dad pa yi/ /de 'dra'i khyim la rtag tu ni/ /slong ba'i don du
116b7(rgyud 'bum): slong mo blang / /ci ltar dpa' bos go bgos te/ /nyam nga'i g.yul du 'jug pa na/ /rtag tu dgra ni 'joms byed de/ /dgra yis 'joms kyang mi nus pa/ /de bzhin sngags pa rtag grong du/ /slong mo'i 'tsho bas 'jug pa na/ /
116b8(rgyud 'bum): gzugs sgra la sogs bzang po ni/ /de ltar mthong bas chags gyur na/ /'dod chags zhi ba'i don gyi phyir/ /dge ba mi gtsang bsgom par bya/ /lang tsho'i rnam pas brgyan pa yi/ /bud med gzugs ni mthong ba na/ /
117a1(rgyud 'bum): mi gtsang dri ngan bsgom bya zhing / /shin tu smad pa rnag dang gcin/ /srin bus zos dang dur khrod gnas/ /lus ni mi rtag sdug bsngal yin/ /byis pa sngags la rmongs pa yis/ /'gro ba lnga po dag tu 'khor/ /
117a2(rgyud 'bum): las kyi skud pas bcings nas ni/ /yun ring dus su mya ngan byed/ /mi shes sgrib pas rmongs pas na/ /dmus long sdug bsngal rgyu yang yin/ /gang du blo ni phyin ci log /skye bo chags pas phongs par 'gyur/ /rnam pa sna
117a3(rgyud 'bum): tshogs las gar gyi/ /rnam pa du mar chags byed pas/ /yun ring res kyis gnas nas ni/ /'gro dang 'ong bar spyod par byed/ /gar byed bzhin du spyod pa yis/ /bran bzhin du ni gtong bar byed/ /mi gtsang dga' ba'i
117a4(rgyud 'bum): sems can gang / /yun ring lam du phongs par 'gyur/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i chu 'byung ba/ /zo chun gyi ni rnam pa bzhin/ /'gro ba de dag mi bzad pa'i/ /sdug bsngal chu yis khyab pa yin/ /sangs rgyas kyis
117a5(rgyud 'bum): ni bud med dag / ma 'dres sdug bsngal rtsa bar gsungs/ /nyan thos byang chub sems dpa' dang / /rang rgyal thub pas de bzhin gsungs/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho mi 'khrugs pa/ /rgya mtsho 'di ni skam par dka'/ /
117a6(rgyud 'bum): bud med sems kyis bslus pas na/ /gang du sems can bying gyur nas/ /dmyal ba dud 'gro'i 'jig rten dang / /yi dags 'jig rten lha ma yin/ /de bzhin mi yi 'jig rten dang / /lha yi 'gro ba'i 'gro
117a7(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gro/ /bud med chags pas bslus pas na/ /kun nas yongs su 'khor 'gyur zhing / /'dam chen nang du 'bying 'gyur la/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho btson ra yin/ /bud med chags pa'i blun po'i mi/ /rul ba'i
117a8(rgyud 'bum): ro la wa bzhin no/ /gang du mi ni chags byed pa/ /shin tu mi bzad sdug bsngal bzod/ /dkar po'i chos ni des nyams byed/ /sangs rgyas bstan la zhugs pas ni/ /sdug bsngal 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho nyid/ /
117b1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad yongs su zlog byed cing / /sngags zlos dga' zhing brtson pa dang / /grags pa che zhing chags dang bral/ /gzi brjid ldan zhing kun dang mdza'/ /de dag la ni sdug bsngal med/ /yang dag sdom dang tshangs bden
117b2(rgyud 'bum): shes/ /bla ma lha la mchod byed dang / /ma dang pha la gus pa rnams/ /de dag la ni sdug bsngal med/ /dam pa'i don la brten na ni/ /mi rtag sdug bsngal stong pa dang / /de bzhin dbyig dug zug rngu bzhin/ /zlos pas
117b3(rgyud 'bum): bud med lus bsam bya/ /blo ngan phung po'i lcags kyus zin/ /'khor ba las ni 'byung mi nus/ /rtag tu bud med chags gyur pa/ /de la grub pa yod ma yin/ /zlos pa 'di la tshul khrims nyams/ /de la grub
117b4(rgyud 'bum): pa mchog med cing / /grub pa 'bring yang yod med de/ /grub pa tha ma'ang yod ma yin/ /tshul khrims 'chal la thub dbang gis/ /sngags grub par ni ma gsungs te/ /mya ngan 'das grong 'gro ba yi/ /yul dang
117b5(rgyud 'bum): phyogs kyang ma yin no/ /byis pa ngan pa 'di la ni/ /sngags grub pa ni ga la yod/ /skye bo tshul khrims 'chal 'di la/ /de la bde 'gro ga la yod/ /mtho ris su yang mi 'gyur zhing / /bde ba mchog tu'ang mi
117b6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur na/ /rgyal bas gsungs pa'i sngags rnams ni/ /'grub par 'gyur ba smos ci dgos/ /ta la'i shing gi mgo bo ni/ /gang tshe bcad par gyur pa na'ang / /sngon po nyid kyi skal med na/ /myu gu nam zhig 'byung
117b7(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin sngags grub rmongs pa dang / /tshul khrims nyams shing sdig las byed/ /rtag tu bud med chags pa la/ /'dir ni rab tu bstan pa yin/ /mi dge'i bshes gnyen bsten pa la/ /sngags
117b8(rgyud 'bum): kyi rgyal po ga la 'grub/ /de bas dul dang rtag bzlas byed/ /bud med skyon ni rnam spyod la/ /de la chags pa rnam spang ba/ /de la grub par brjod pa yin/ /byis pa bud med la brgyal ba/ /gzhan la grub pa
118a1(rgyud 'bum): bsten pa min/ /blo ldan g.yeng ba med la dga'/ /gtsang zhing ma chags shes nyen can/ /rigs mtho brtan dang dpa' ba dang / /brtser ldan mthong na dga' ba dang / /chos dang chos min rnam dpyod shes/ /
118a2(rgyud 'bum): de la grub pa rnyed mi dka'/ /de ltar sngags shes zhugs pa ni/ /grong du slong phyir rab tu 'jug /sngar ni brtags pa'i gnas dag tu/ /ci ltar 'dod bzhin song nas ni/ /blo ldan dag pas bslang ba'i snod/ /
118a3(rgyud 'bum): gtsang ba'i phyogs su yang dag gzhag /phyi rol song nas rkang gnyis bkru/ /de nas yang ni yan lag ste/ /de tshe srog chags med pa'i chus/ /lag pa g.yas pas byin pa g.yas/ /lag pa g.yon pas byin
118a4(rgyud 'bum): pa g.yon/ /yang na gnyi ga dus gcig bkru/ /sa ni lag g.yon yang bzhag nas/ /sngar ni yang dag bzhag pa yi/ /bdug pa gtsang ma'i sa dag gis/ /lag pa gnyis ni rab tu bkru/ /de nas sngags kyi dag
118a5(rgyud 'bum): byas pa'i/ /dri med gtsang sbra dag snod la/ /ba ni ser skyas bor ba yi/ /lci ba sar pa blang bar bya/ /srog chags med pa'i chur sbyar bas/ /ston pa la ni dkyil 'khor bya/ /dang po thub pa mchog la ni/ /khor yug
118a6(rgyud 'bum): khru gang tsam du bya/ /gnyis pa rang sngags mgon po la/ /gsum pa rang rig lha la'o/ /sngags pa bzlas pa gang byed pa/ /rtag tu'ang de nyid bya ba yin/ /yang ni sems can thams cad kyi/ /longs spyod phyir ni bstan
118a7(rgyud 'bum): pa yin/ /g.yas su 'jig rten mgon po yi/ /dkyil 'khor 'di ni rtag tu bya/ /dkon mchog gsum gyi dkyil 'khor ni/ /gru bzhi dag tu bya ba yin/ /gnyis pa rang sangs rgyas rnams la/ /gsum pa stobs bcu ldan pa'i
118a8(rgyud 'bum): sras/ /dkyil 'khor bdun po 'di dag ni/ /kun nas gru bzhir bya ba yin/ /khru gang ngam ni khru phyed du/ /nyin re zhing ni bya ba yin/ /sdig pa 'jig byed bzlas pa ni/ /dben pa'i phyogs su nyin re bya/ /sngags pa de nas langs nas ni/ /
118b1(rgyud 'bum): 'bad pas lag gnyis rab tu bkru/ /gtsang ba'i chu yis nye reg bya/ /dag cing srog chags spangs pa yi/ /dri med gtsang sbras 'bad nas ni/ /gtsang ba'i snod ni de tshe blang / /mtsho chen dang ni 'bab chu 'am/ /chu mig
118b2(rgyud 'bum): chu bo la gnas dang / /gtsang ba'i phyogs nas byung ba yi/ /sems can dag pa lag blangs la/ /gnyis sam gsum du rtag tu yang / /sngags pas nye reg bya ba yin/ /de nas chus reg gdong dang ni/ /de bzhin du ni
118b3(rgyud 'bum): rna khung dag / mig dang sna dang lag gnyis dang / /spyi bo lte ba'i phyogs reg bya/ /dge ba spyod pas lan lnga'am bdun/ /cho ga ji bzhin thams cad bya/ /gtsang sbra'i spyod pa legs ldan pas/ /zlos pa gtsang bar gyur
118b4(rgyud 'bum): pa yis/ /slong snod yang dag blangs nas ni/ /chu yi gzhir ni 'gro bar bya/ /gang du chu yi rgyun 'bab gnas/ /de bzhin du ni chu mig dang / /chu bo rab tu 'bab pa la/ /rtag tu zas ni bkru bar bya/ /gtsug lag khang ngam
118b5(rgyud 'bum): gnas khang du/ /de nas langs nas 'gro bar bya/ /gang du sngon ni brten pa dang / /gang du gnas pa der 'gro bya/ /de nas zlos pas lhung bzed de/ /song nas phyogs ni der gzhag bya/ /de nas nye reg myur byas nas/ /de bzhin yang ni lhung bzed
118b6(rgyud 'bum): blangs/ /lhung bzed sa 'am lo ma 'am/ /dngul dang gser gyi snod dang ni/ /zangs ma shing shun dag kyang rung / /ston pa la ni dbul bar bya/ /ston pa la ni bshos phul nas/ /rang sngags sngags kyi rgyal po'ang brjod/ /'gron gcig sdug bsngal gyur
118b7(rgyud 'bum): 'ongs nas/ /ci nus par ni sbyin pa bya/ /rnam pa kun du kha zas ni/ /ha cang mang ba sbyin mi bya/ /sngags rig lus gdung mi bya ste/ /rnam pa kun du ci rigs bya/ /lto ba'i tshad tsam gzhag byas te/ /lhag ma'i zas ni rtag tu sbyin/ /bkres dang skom
118b8(rgyud 'bum): pas nyen gyur na/ /sngags kyi don la rten mi nus/ /kha zas mang dang nyung zos na/ /sngags rnams mnyes par mi nus so/ /de nyid phyir na thub dbang gis/ /sems can zas kyis gnas pa'o zhes/ /lus can rnams la gsungs pa ste/ /gang gis mi rnams
119a1(rgyud 'bum): 'tsho ba dang / /lha dang lha min dri za dang / /klu dang gnod sbyin mi 'am ci/ /srin po yi dags sha za dang / /'byung po skar ma gza' rnams dag /gang zhig kha zas mi za ba/ /de ni gang yang yod ma yin/ /rags pa'i zas ni gang yin pa/ /
119a2(rgyud 'bum): kham gyi zas su rnam par bsgrags/ /sems can phra ba'i zas can yang / /de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis gsungs/ /bsam gtan zas can rnams la ni/ /gzugs kyi khams na spyod pa'o/ /gzugs med khams kyi lha dag ni/ /ting 'dzin
119a3(rgyud 'bum): 'bras bu la spyod pa'o/ /srid pa bar ma'i sems can rnams/ /dri yi zas su rab tu bsgrags/ /de bzhin 'dod khams sems can dag /sna tshogs zas la spyod pa yin/ /de nyid phyir ni thub dbang gis/ /las kyi rgyu yis gsungs pa ni/ /sems
119a4(rgyud 'bum): can zas kyis gnas pa zhes/ /thams cad la ni rab tu bsgrags/ /zlos la rtag tu brtson pas ni/ /zas kyi tshod rig bya ba yin/ /gang phyir sngags brten nus pa ni/ /kha zas la ni rab tu gnas/ /spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang / /dge zhing tshangs
119a5(rgyud 'bum): par spyod pa dang / /kha zas tshod ni rig pa la/ /de la grub pa rnyed mi dka'/ /ci ltar shing rta'i shing rta pas/ /mig ni yongs su bskus pa ni/ /yun ring dus su brten phyir dang / /khal ni 'degs par bya phyir ro/ /de bzhin sngags pa sngags shes pas/ /
119a6(rgyud 'bum): kha zas gnas phyir 'dzin byed dang / /lus kyang tshim par bya ba'i phyir/ /zlos pas rtag tu gso bar bya/ /sngags rnams bsgrub pa'i phyir dang ni/ /byang chub tshogs ni bya ba'i phyir/ /de bzhin du ni sngags bzla ba/ /mi yi 'jig rten bsrung bya ba'o/ /
119a7(rgyud 'bum): de nyid phyir na thub mchog ni/ /'od srung zhes bya sngon byung ba/ /de tshe de dus sa steng 'dir/ /'od chen ldan pa des gsungs pa/ /'byung po rnams la legs don du/ /sngags 'di rab tu gsungs pa ni/ /'jig rten ma lus sdug bsngal dang / /dman dang
119a8(rgyud 'bum): dbul dang skyo ba dang / /'bad rtsol dag la nyon mongs pa/ /de dag don phyir gsungs pa ni/ /'byung po rnams la legs don dang / /de bzhin gnas par 'dod pa yang / /'byung po rnams la zas don du/ /sngags mchog 'di ni gsungs pa yin/ /nyan thos
119b1(rgyud 'bum): dag ni thams cad dang / /byang chub la gnas thams cad nyon/ /bdag gis sngags 'di rab brjod kyis/ /nad rnams 'jig byed zung shig dang / /gang yang bkres nad kyis nyen dang / /gang yang sems can skom pa rnams/ /kun
119b2(rgyud 'bum): gyi sdug bsngal nyer zhi'i phyir/ /'byor pa 'dod rnams rab nyon cig /'od srung 'od ni chen po pa/ /thub pa mchog gis de skad gsungs/ /nyan thos rnams ni yid dga' nas/ /khyab bdag la ni gsol ba 'debs/ /chos mkhyen sngags
119b3(rgyud 'bum): ni bshad du gsol/ /chos kyi rgyal po thub pa che/ /sems can brtse ba'i mchog gyur pa/ /dus ni rab tu nye bar gnas/ /de skad gsol nas thub mchog gis/ /ka la ping ka'i sgra skad dang / /rnga bo che yi sgra skad dang / /tshangs dbyangs
119b4(rgyud 'bum): stobs ni chen po dang / /tshangs shes rgyal ba sngon 'dren pas/ /'byung po'i tshogs ni gang su dag /'dir lhags gyur pa kun nyon cig /rkang med dang ni rkang mangs dang / /rkang gnyis pa dang rkang bzhi pa/ /mdor na sems can kun gyi phyir/ /
119b5(rgyud 'bum): bde 'byung sngags ni bshad par bya/ /'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar gyi/ /sems can gang dag 'dir lhags pa/ /'byor pa 'dod rnams da nyon cig /mdor na bdag gis rab bshad bya/ /na maHsarba bud d+hA nAM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa
119b6(rgyud 'bum): nA nAM/ tad+ya thA/ ga ga ne ga ga na gany+dza A na ya sa la hu la hu sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/ A kaR+Sha Ni/ mA bi baM ba mA bi baM ba/ ya the pe staM me saM pa dA ya swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis de skad ces gsungs nas
119b7(rgyud 'bum): cang mi gsung bar gyur to/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis/ bar der rig pa'i sngags kyi tshig rgya cher gsungs pa na/ nam mkha' de thams cad chen po la 'os pa'i zas kyi
119b8(rgyud 'bum): sprin gyis yongs su khengs par gyur to/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi nam mkha'i dkyil kun du zas kyi sprin gyis khyab par snang bar gyur to/ /sems can gyi bsam pa
120a1(rgyud 'bum): ci ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i bza' ba dang ci ltar 'dod pa'i zas de dag la char bzhin du bab par gyur to/ /ci ltar 'dod pa'i zas dang bza' ba'i bya ba ni bkres pa'i sdug bsngal zhi ba'i don dang / skom pa
120a2(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyis btung bar bya ba ni/ yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chu'i rgyun yid la 'dod pa bzhin du der bab par gyur to/ /de'i tshe de'i dus kyi skad cig de nyid la bkres pa'i nad thams cad rab tu zhi ba dang skom pa thams
120a3(rgyud 'bum): cad dang bral bar gyur to/ /thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de yang ngo mtshar dang rab tu dga' ba thob par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod de rjes su yi rangs nas/ bcom ldan
120a4(rgyud 'bum): 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas su rnam par bzhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das
120a5(rgyud 'bum): shAkya thub pa ngas kyang de'i tshe de ltar bshad cing rjes su yi rang bar byas so/ /sngags kyi rgyal po'i mchog 'di la sems can thams cad kyi don du bkres pa dang skom pa sel ba'i phyir dang / sngags thams cad zlos pa dag la yang
120a6(rgyud 'bum): khyad par du sel bar 'gyur ro/ /dang por re zhig zlos pas sngags 'di bsgrub par bya ste/ gal te bsod snyoms la 'gro bar spro ba med na/ ri'i rtse mor 'dzeg ste 'bum phrag bdun bzla bar bya zhing / zas dkar gsum mam 'o ma
120a7(rgyud 'bum): 'i zas bza' zhing ri'i rtse mo de nyid du 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi ras ris bar ma gong ma bzhin bzhag ste/ mchod pa chen po byas nas shin tu rgya che ba'i gtor ma phul te/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung 'di nyid
120a8(rgyud 'bum): kyis gsungs pa'i sngags kyis seng ldeng gi yam shing gi me rab tu sbar te/ shing u dum bA ra'i yam shing la mar dang sbrang rtsis btags pa'i shing rlon mtho gang tsam mam/ bil ba'i 'bras bu'i yam shing stong rtsa brgyad kyis
120b1(rgyud 'bum): sbyin sreg bya'o/ /de nas nam phyed kyi dus mtshams su sprin nag po chen po dang rlung gi dkyil 'khor byung na 'jigs par mi bya/ langs te gzhan du 'gro bar mi bya zhing / 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi yi ge brgyad kyi snying
120b2(rgyud 'bum): pos bdag nyid bsrung ba dang / dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang grogs bsrung ba yang byas na/ snga ma lta bu'i sprin nag po chen po de dang rlung nag po de yang mi snang bar 'gyur te/ bud med yang rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan
120b3(rgyud 'bum): pa/ 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis phyogs thams cad snang bar byas te sgrub pa po'i mdun du 'dug nas smra ba ni/ kye sems can chen po longs shig /khyod ni grub pa yin no zhes so/ /de nas sgrub pa pos sna
120b4(rgyud 'bum): ma'i me tog gis bsres pa'i dri zhim po'i chus mchod yon sbyin no/ /de nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /gang de'i nyin mo nas bdag nyid dang grogs po nyi shu rtsa lnga'am/ yang na ci 'dod pa'i grogs po dag la ci
120b5(rgyud 'bum): 'dod pa'i kha zas dang ci ltar 'dod pa'i yo byad rnams yang dag par ster bar byed do/ /de nas sgrub pa pos ras ris la gshegs su gsol ba'i mchod yon dbul te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas ras ris
120b6(rgyud 'bum): blangs te/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phyag byas nas/ sngar bstan pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs ci lta bu'i gnas dgon pa chen po'am/ ri'i rtse mo'am mi med pa'i gnas su 'gro
120b7(rgyud 'bum): bar bya'o/ /der lo ma'i spyil po byas te bdag nyid dang grogs po gnyi gar bcas te rab tu gnas par bya'o/ /der gnas pa dang gnas de la nam mkha' la 'gro ba la sogs pa'i las byas te/ de nas sgrub pa
120b8(rgyud 'bum): pos snga ma bzhin du ku sha'i khres la 'dug nas/ ras ris bar ma snga ma bzhin du bzhag ste/ seng ldeng gi yam shing gis me rab tu sbar la/ dus gsum du me tog pad ma dkar po zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa stong rtsa
121a1(rgyud 'bum): brgyad nyi ma nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du sbyin sreg bya'o/ /de nas mtshan phyed kyi dus su sbyin sreg gi mthar 'phags pa 'jam dpal mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /'dod pa'i mchog stsol bar yang
121a2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ /nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang mi snang ba dang byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang rang sangs rgyas nyid dam nyan thos nyid dam/ tshe ring ba nyid dam rgyal srid chen po dang / longs spyod chen po nyid dam rgyal po dga' ba nyid
121a3(rgyud 'bum): dam/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal dang lhan cig rjes su spyod par 'gyur te mdor na gang 'dod pa de thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /gang don du gnyer ba de yang rjes su stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /grub pa'i rdzas
121a4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /sems can chen po rnams kyang 'gugs par byed par 'gyur ro/ /mdor na ji lta ji ltar brjod pa de thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /sngon gyi las kyi nyes pa yang yang dag
121a5(rgyud 'bum): par sbyong bar byed do zhes bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas gsungs so/ /gzhan yang las kyi thabs bar ma sgrub pa yang yod de dang por re zhig de ltar khyad par du gyur pa'i gnas sam gtsang ba'i sa phyogs
121a6(rgyud 'bum): sam/ chu bo'am chu gling gi ngogs su snga ma bzhin du thams cad bya ste/ ras ris nub tu bstan te bzhag la bdag kyang shar du mngon par phyogs par byas nas ku sha'i khres la 'dug ste/ snga ma bzhin du rgya cher sbyar bar
121a7(rgyud 'bum): byas nas dus gsum du yi ge drug pa bzla bar bya ste/ bzlas pa rdzogs pa dang dong ka'i me tog la tsan dan dkar po'am gur gum gyis bsgos pas snga ma bzhin du sbyin sreg stong phrag brgya bya'o/ /de bzhin du me sbar nas
121a8(rgyud 'bum): sbyin sreg gi mjug tu ras ris rab tu 'gul ba na ni blon po nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ /ras ris las 'od kyi snang ba byung na ni 'od las rgyal srid thob par 'gyur ro/ /ras ris 'od 'bar ba'i phreng bas kun du khyab na ni
121b1(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po chen po bzhi'i rgyal srid thob par 'gyur ro/ /ras ris las me stag byung na ni sum cu rtsa gsum gyi dbang phyug brgya byin nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ /ras ris las chos 'chad pa'i sgra byung na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sa gsum
121b2(rgyud 'bum): gyi dbang phyug nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ /ras ris kyi phyag gis mgo la byug par mdzad na ni/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang / sa bdun pa thob pa dang stobs bcu la gnas pa mthar gyis thob pa yin no/ /de nas sgrub pa po la
121b3(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis gsungs pa'i sngags bsgrubs te/ bkres pa dang skom pa rab tu bsal ba'i don rjes su thob pa de nyid kyi 'tshog chas/ sngags spyod pa'i don sgrub pa'i thabs kyi chos la yang dag par
121b4(rgyud 'bum): rjes su bsgrub par bya'i/ gzhan du ni 'di 'grub par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ltar mthar gyis sngags kyi spyod pa la rjes su 'jug cing / mdor na nges par 'bad pa la ni rdzas dang sman dang yo byad kyi khyad par dang / nor bu rin po che sngar
121b5(rgyud 'bum): ji skad bshad pa rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /sngags rig sngags ni zlos pa dang / /sems ni chog la mkhas pa dang / /sngags pa de tshe de yul du/ /de tshe gtsang ba'i kha zas bza'/ /zos nas yid ni dga' ba dang / /rtag tu dbang po
121b6(rgyud 'bum): rgyas pa dang / /lhung bzed lhag ma blangs nas ni/ /chu bo gtsang ba dag du 'gro/ /dben par yongs su bor nas ni/ /sdom can gyis sbyin dud 'gro la/ /dud 'gro la ni byin nas kyang / /'bad pas snod ni bkru bar bya/ /de nas 'bad pa byas nas
121b7(rgyud 'bum): ni/ /sa yi snod kyang bsreg par bya/ /lhag ma lhung bzed bya ba ni/ /snum med zas ni med pa dang / /dri nyid yongs su spang bya zhes/ /lhag ma lhung bzed thub pas gsungs/ /gang du slong ba'i lhung bzed la/ /der ni kha zas mi spyad do/ /shing thog
121b8(rgyud 'bum): dngos rnams thams cad dang / /bca' ba rnams kyang der mi spyad/ /pad ma'i lo mar bza' mi bya/ /ut+pal snod la bza' ba min/ /me tog dri mchog la min te/ /sngags pas de la bza' mi bya/ /gang yang lo ma ku mu dang / /p+lak+sha u dum
122a1(rgyud 'bum): bAr las byung / /pa Ta shing gi lo ma'ang min/ /tsher ma'i shing dang ri khrod byung / /a mra'i lo ma dag la'ang min/ /de bzhin pa Ta la las byung / /sa la shri sha'i lo ma dang / /byang chub shing las yang dag byung / /gang du bcom ldan sangs rgyas ni/ /
122a2(rgyud 'bum): shAkya seng ge bzhugs pa yi/ /shing de 'bad pas spang bya ste/ /so shing du yang bca' mi bya/ /klu shing gi ni ge sar dang / /lo ma dag kyang mi btu zhing / /gang du'ang nam yang bza' mi bya/ /mkhas pas de kun rnam par spongs/ /thub pa'i lo ma'i spyil
122a3(rgyud 'bum): po las/ /rmongs pas nam yang 'gong mi bya/ /sngags pa dam tshig nyams 'gyur bas/ /lo ma de dag la mi bza'/ /lo ma gzhan la bza' bya ste/ /sngags pas der ni bza' bar bya/ /sa dang zangs mar bstan pa dang / /de bzhin dngul dang gser las
122a4(rgyud 'bum): byung / /shel dang rdo yi rang bzhin las/ /rtag tu bza' ba blang bar bya/ /lo ma'i rgyab tu mi bza' ste/ /lag pa'i mthil du'ang de bzhin no/ /stobs bcu ldan dang de yi sras/ /gang yang rang rgyal bse ru dang / /nyan thos gang zag dag la ni/ /phul ba'i
122a5(rgyud 'bum): lo ma gang yin pa/ /de dag zlos pas spang bya ste/ /rkang pas kyang ni mi 'gong ngo / /zas snod rnam pa sna tshogs dang / /de bzhin btung dang bza' ba rnams/ /thams cad de ltar phul bas na/ /sngags pas 'bad pas blang mi bya/ /rgyal dang rgyal
122a6(rgyud 'bum): ba'i mchog rnams dang / /de bzhin nyan thos gang zag dang / /dkon mchog gsum la phul ba yang / /zlos pas de dag rtag tu spang / /cung zad tsam yang lus can la/ /sngags rnams de la mi 'grub ste/ /bkra shis thams cad 'dod pa dang / /
122a7(rgyud 'bum): legs pa bzang po smos ci dgos/ /rgyas pa dang ni zhi ba dang / /bsam pa thams cad rdzogs byed pa/ /bshos ni za bar byed de la/ /de tshe 'grub par mi 'gyur ro/ /gtsang zhing shes rab tshul khrims ldan/ /snying rjes snying rje'i las
122a8(rgyud 'bum): can dang / /gtsang sbra'i spyod la dga' ba nyid/ /sngags rnams kun du 'grub par 'gyur/ /sems can gzhan la sbyin pa'i zas/ /zlos pas de ni bza' mi bya/ /gzhan gyis rab tu ma bstabs pa'i/ /zas gzhan bza' bar mi bya'o/ /cung zad tsam gyi
122b1(rgyud 'bum): kha zas kyang / /rang la byin pa blang bar bya/ /sngags shes de ltar 'jug gang yin/ /de la grub pa dpag na gnas/ /zlos pa 'di yi cho ga yis/ /sdom can bza' ba blang bar bya/ /thub pa rnams kyis bsngags pa yi/ /sngags rnams ma lus
122b2(rgyud 'bum): bsgrub par bya/ /mdor na cho ga mthong bas ni/ /bza' ba kun bya las rnams la/ /de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /sngags kyis ma lus dbang du byed/ /de nas zlos pas nye reg byas/ /de tshe sngags ni bzlas par bya/ /sngags pas de tshe lan bdun du/ /
122b3(rgyud 'bum): lus sbyang phyir ni bzlas nas su/ /'byung po'i tshogs dang lha rnams dag /de don rgya cher rab nyon cig /lus kun nye reg byas nas ni/ /thub pa'i sngags 'di brjod par bya/ /na maHsarba bud d+hA nAM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/ tad+ya thA/ sarba
122b4(rgyud 'bum): kilpi Sha nA sha ni/ nA sha ya nA sha ya/ sarba duSh+Ta pra yug+tan/ sa ma ya ma nu sma ra hUM dzaHswA hA/ sngags 'dis bslangs pa'i zas ji ltar yongs su spyod pa'i kha zas la lan bdun du bsngags te yongs su spyad par bya'o/ /zos nas kyang
122b5(rgyud 'bum): snga ma bzhin du nye reg bya ste/ spyi bo la sogs pa lus thams cad tu nye reg byas nas/ de nas ngal bso bar bya ste/ ngal sos nas yud tsam gyi phyed dam thun gcig ste/ de nas ras ris dang sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal nas dam pa'i
122b6(rgyud 'bum): chos kyi glegs bam bklag par bya'o/ /'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 'phags pa zla ba'i sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'phags pa sa bcu pa dang / 'phags pa gser 'od dam pa dang / 'phags pa rma bya chen mo dang / 'phags pa rin
122b7(rgyud 'bum): po che tog gi gzungs dang 'di dag las gang yang rung ba bklag par bya'o/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor zung tsam gyi tshad kyi dus na/ de nas yongs su grub pa ni ji ltar nus pa de bzhin du bklag par byas nas/ glegs bam brtul ba'am
122b8(rgyud 'bum): gos gtsang ma bgos te/ dam pa'i chos la phyag byas nas/ de nas khrus kyi don du chu bo'i ngogs sam/ mtsho chen por song ste 'jug par bya'o/ /phyin nas srog chags med pa'i sa blangs te/ lan bdun bzlas te de chu la gdab bo/ /
123a1(rgyud 'bum): de yang gang zhe na/ na maHsarba bud d+hA nAM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/ tad+ya thA/ sarba du staM b+ha ya hUM/ na di ba rA bA ra Ni/ ku mA ra krI Da rU pi Ne ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ sa ma ya ma nu sma ra phaT phaT swA hA/ 'dis bsrung ba byas nas phyogs rnams
123a2(rgyud 'bum): bcing ba dang / grogs rnams dang dkyil 'khor dang thab khung bcing ba dang / ma rungs pa dang rab tu ma rungs pa thams cad 'gugs par byed pa dang / skud pa dkar po la lan bdun bzlas te rked pa'i phyogs su bcings na thams cad du 'gro
123a3(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur ro/ /bzlas pa'i dus thams cad dang khrus kyi dus thams cad du yang bgegs ma rungs pa rnam par 'jig pa dang / rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir sngags 'di 'bum phrag gcig bzlas na/ des ni las thams cad byed par
123a4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ /gtsug phud lnga'i phyag rgya chen po dang ldan pa dgod par bya'o/ /las thams cad byed par 'gyur te gzhan du ma yin no/ /de nas sgrub pa pos sa dang lci ba'i phye ma la sogs pa blangs te/ ci bde bar khrus byas te/
123a5(rgyud 'bum): srog chags med pa'i chus kyang bkrus te/ las thams cad la yang srog chags med pa'i chus bya'o/ /de nas sa dang lci ba'am gzhan yang dri zhim po dang ldan pa'i yo byad kyi khyad par gyis byugs te de'i 'og tu
123a6(rgyud 'bum): khrus bya'o/ /chu'i nang du bshang gci yang dor bar mi bya'o/ /chu gtor zhing dor bar yang mi bya'o/ /chu la rtse bar yang mi bya'o/ /snying rjes bdag dang sems can thams cad la so sor brtag par bya'o/ /bdag med
123a7(rgyud 'bum): pa dang stong pa dang / sdug bsngal gyis khyab pa/ tshor bas mngon par gnod pa dang / sdug bsngal thob pa bzhin du 'gro ba dang 'ong ba'i sbyor bas sdug bsngal ba/ de bzhin du sems can sgrub pa dang bral ba/
123a8(rgyud 'bum): sngags rig pas 'di lta bur 'jig pa dang rnam par g.yeng ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi tshogs kyis nye bar khyab pa/ 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho brgal dka' ba la gnas pa'i
123b1(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid du mthong zhing gnas med pa dang / skyob pa med pa dang skyabs med pa dang shin tu dman pa'i yid can du bdag nyid brtags la/ sgom pa pos mi gang tsam gyi chu'am lte ba tsam gyi chu la gnas te chu de
123b2(rgyud 'bum): nyid kyi dbus su sems rtse gcig tu nye bar gnas par bya'o/ /dang po re zhig pad ma chen po'i rtsa lag la me tog pad ma chen po dang ldan pa/ pad ma chen po'i 'dab mas nye bar mdzes pa blta na sdug pa/ sdong bu
123b3(rgyud 'bum): rin po che bai DUr+ya'i rang bzhin las byung ba/ pad ma'i ge sar rin po che margad las grub pa/ 'dab ma stong shel las byas pa/ shin tu rnam par kha bye ba/ de'i rjes su skyes pa'i shel dang pad ma rA ga'i me tog gis
123b4(rgyud 'bum): mdzes par byas pa de'i steng du seng ge'i khri rin po che'i rang bzhin las grub pa rin po che du mas nye bar mdzes pa/ ras bcos bu zung gis rab tu bkab pa de'i steng du bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
123b5(rgyud 'bum): 'das bsgom par bya ste/ chos 'chad cing bzhugs pa gser gyi mdog ltar snang ba/ kun nas 'od 'bar ba'i phreng ba can 'od 'dom gang ba'i phreng ba can 'od 'dom gang gi dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa/ sku'i tshad
123b6(rgyud 'bum): chen po nam mkha' la thug pa dang 'dra ba/ skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa g.yas su'ang 'phags pa 'jam dpal rgyan thams cad kyis nye bar mdzes par byas pa/ pad ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa rnga yab
123b7(rgyud 'bum): thogs pa/ bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa'i zur na gnas pa/ sku'i kha dog dmar skya'am gur gum bdar ba lta bu'o/ /g.yon du yang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kha dog ston ka'i zla rgyu 'dra ba rnga yab thogs pa
123b8(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' brgyad la 'phags pa byams pa dang kun tu bzang po dang sa'i snying po dang nam mkha' mdzod dang sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / ngan song sbyong ba dang 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje dang khams bzang can te/
124a1(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' bcu po de dag gi g.yas logs su rang sangs rgyas brgyad bsgom par bya ste/ tsan dan dang spos kyi ngad ldang dang tog dang legs tog dang tog dkar dang 'dod pa dang nye ba'i 'dod pa dang mu khyud de 'di brgyad do/ /
124a2(rgyud 'bum): de nyid du nyan thos chen po brgyad gnas pa la 'di lta ste/ 'phags pa maud gal gyi bu chen po dang shA ri'i bu dang ba lang bdag dang ba ra dwa dza bsod snyoms len dang / pi lin da'i bu dang 'phags pa sgra gcan 'dzin dang / 'od srung
124a3(rgyud 'bum): chen po dang 'phags pa kun dga' bo'o/ /nyan thos chen po de dag dang nye bar dge slong gi dge 'dun mtha' yas pa bsgom par bya'o/ /rang sangs rgyas dang nye ba na rang sangs rgyas bsam gyis mi khyab pa bsgom par bya'o/ /byang chub
124a4(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' chen po brgyad kyi gnas su yang byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun bsam gyis mi khyab pa bsgom par bya'o/ /de bzhin du nam mkha'i dkyil thams cad du 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po dang ldan pa bsgom par bya ste/
124a5(rgyud 'bum): bdag kyang lte ba tsam gyi chu la gnas bzhin du lha dang mi'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs pa la me tog man dA ra ba dang / man dA ra ba chen po dang pad+ma dang pad+ma chen po dang / d+ha nu ska ri dang bar shi ka dang ut+pal sngon po dang / me tog rnam
124a6(rgyud 'bum): pa sna tshogs la tshad chen po dang / tshan chen por gyur pa ri rab tsam gyi me tog gi snyim bas bcom ldan 'das la yang dag par mchod de nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la lha dang mi'i phye ma dang gos dang / gdugs
124a7(rgyud 'bum): dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dag dang mar me rab tu mang po bye ba khri phrag brgya stong yid du 'ong bas yang dag par mchod par byed la/ de bzhin du lha dang mi'i gtor ma dang / bdug spos dang bshos la sogs pa bsnyen bkur thams cad dang yo
124a8(rgyud 'bum): byad rnams nye bar dbul bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i mdzod spu nas kyang 'od zer byung ste/ bdag nyid dang phyogs thams cad kyang snang bas khyab par bsgom mo/ /zlos pa po bsam gtan la zhugs ma thag tu
124b1(rgyud 'bum): tshangs pa'i bsod nams dang mnyam pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur nges par byang chub la yang gzhol bar 'gyur ro/ /de la sogs pa'i bsam gtan ni/ /'jig rten gang zag mchog gis gsungs/ /'byung po kun la legs pa
124b2(rgyud 'bum): dang / /sngags pa rnams la phan pa'i don/ /bsam gtan de tshe dang po'i gtsos/ /sngags pa rnams la phan don du/ /gsungs pa sems can rnams la ni/ /de nas thub mchog bdun pa yis/ /dkyil 'khor rnam pa de nyid ni/ /gang yin
124b3(rgyud 'bum): dang po thub pas gsungs/ /gnyis pa yi ni dkyil 'khor yang / /gsum par yang ni de las gzhan/ /dang po mchog gi grub pa yin/ /gnyis pa de bzhin de las gzhan/ /tha ma grub pa phra mo zhes/ /thub pa mchog gis nges par
124b4(rgyud 'bum): gsungs/ /mchog dang bar ma tha ma ni/ /de bzhin ras ris bar ma bsgom/ /mdor na rnam gsum sgom pa ni/ /sdig pa'i rnyog pa ma lus 'jig /mkhas pas sgom pa'i rnam pa ni/ /de las gzhan du mi bsten te/ /
124b5(rgyud 'bum): sngags rnams de la 'grub par 'gyur/ /bsam gtan de la rab tu gnas/ /ci 'dod cho ga bstan nas ni/ /zlos pas bsam gtan byas nas su/ /sngags kyi lha ni gshegs gsol te/ /mchod yon gsol nas ci bde
124b6(rgyud 'bum): bar/ /chu bzhi de las byung nas ni/ /ci bde bar ni 'gro bar bya/ /gnas kyang sngar ni bstan pa yi/ /cho ga legs dben mthong ba yi/ /sngags pas sngags ni de tshe bzla/ /ci bzhin las ni sngar bstan pa'o/ /
124b7(rgyud 'bum): rang gi lha ni spyan drangs pa/ /der ni sngags kyis gshegs su gsol/ /de nas rang nyid bsrung bya zhing / /de bzhin grogs po dag kyang bsrung / /dge ba'i las kyi de nyid shes/ /cho ga'i las la dga' zhing 'dod/ /
124b8(rgyud 'bum): bstod pa'i rnam pa mang pos mchod/ /gang zag mchog la bstod nas ni/ /rang sngags sngags kyi mgon po dang / /nyan thos rang rgyal bse ru dang / /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /'jig rten gsum la
125a1(rgyud 'bum): rjes gzung mdzod/ / sngags zlos pas ni gnas de nas/ /de nas kyang ni langs nas su/ /gnas ni thag ring song nas ni/ /phyi rol rlung ni rnam spangs par/ /snabs dang mchil ma rnam par dor/ /bshang dang gci ba'ang de bzhin te/ /
125a2(rgyud 'bum): nyin par byang du kha bltas te/ /mtshan mo lhor ni blta bar bya/ /der ni don rnams mi bsam ste/ /sngags zlos nam yang bya ba min/ /der ni sngags kyang mi bzla zhing / /las bcas rigs kyang bshad ma yin/ /rab sngags 'gros dang
125a3(rgyud 'bum): mtshan sogs kyis/ /de tshe sa la 'dug par bya/ /gtsang phyir gos mtha' chur gzhug bya/ /chu gtsang gis ni nye reg bya/ /'bad pas rkang gnyis bkru bya ste/ /sa ni khyor ba bdun blangs nas/ /lan bdun sa de nyid kyis so/ /
125a4(rgyud 'bum): bshang ba la ni sum cus bya/ /mchil ma dor dang de bzhin du/ /snabs dor ba la re re'o/ /de nas nye reg bya ba yin/ /sgra med de bzhin song nas ni/ /lam la sogs pa spangs pa'o/ /de nas gzhan yang ci 'dod par/ /
125a5(rgyud 'bum): lho phyogs mtha' ni phyi rol du/ /g.yang sa zhing dang tshwa sgo dang / /de bzhin bye mas khyab pa la/ /chu bo spang zhing ngogs kyang spang / /mi gtsang ba yang spang bar bya/ /rab tu bkab dang dben yid ches/ /bas mtha' skye bo
125a6(rgyud 'bum): rnam spangs pa/ /sngags pas de 'dra'i sa dag tu/ /mi gtsang ba ni dor bar bya/ /sngags zlos dus ni shes pa yis/ /ci ltar 'dod pa'i shugs dag min/ /de nas gtsang mtha'i phyogs song nas/ /bshang
125a7(rgyud 'bum): gci'i bya ba byas nas ni/ /de nas gnas su ci bder gnas/ /gsal ba'am dben pa'am g.yogs pa'am/ /skye bo med pa'i sa phyogs su/ /mi smra lus reg spangs nas ni/ /rtag tu bshang gci bya ba yin/ /
125a8(rgyud 'bum): bshang dang gci ba med byas nas/ /sdom can gtsang sbra rtag tu bya/ /reg na 'jam dang 'dod pa yi/ /srog chags rnam par spangs pa yi/ /sa gsum yongs su blangs nas su/ /gcig gis bshang ba'i phyogs su bya/ /
125b1(rgyud 'bum): sa yi cha gnyis dag gis kyang / /lag pa gnyis ni bkru bar bya/ /sngags pas sa dag rtag tu ni/ /sngar bstan pa dag blang bar bya/ /'bad pas rkang g.yon bkru bya ste/ /de nas g.yas pa bkru bar bya/ /phan tshun nyid du bshibs nas ni/ /
125b2(rgyud 'bum): zlos pas rkang pa bkru bar bya/ /sngags zlos pas ni gtsang sbra dag /sngar ni rgya cher bstan pa yin/ /dri nga med pa'i gtsang sbra yang / /thub pas sngar ni bstan pa yin/ /sngags zlos pa yi gtsang sbra ni/ /'dir ni mdor bsdus bstan pa
125b3(rgyud 'bum): yin/ /dri ma bral ba'i gtsang sbra yi/ /gtsang sbra nyid ni rtag tu bya/ /rgyud rnams kun la snang ba zhes/ /thub pa'i dbang pos gsungs pa yin/ /de nas zlos pas nye reg bya/ /sdom can gyis grub las kyang bya/ /sngar
125b4(rgyud 'bum): bstan pa yi cho ga yis/ /yid ni nang gi dag pa yin/ /rgyud rnams kun la bsngags pa yi/ /gtsang sbra lnga yi cho ga gsungs/ /lus kyi dag dang ngag dag dang / /yid kyi dag pa yin par bstan/ /bzhi pa bden pa'i
125b5(rgyud 'bum): dag pa ste/ /chu yi dag pa lnga par bshad/ /bden pa'i chos can khro ba thul/ /de nyid shes shing bstan bcos mthong / /phra ba'i de nyid don la mkhas/ /sngags shes las la grags pa dang / /phyi dang nang la mkhas pa
125b6(rgyud 'bum): dag / de la dngos grub rnyed mi dka'/ /bden pa'i chos ni rnam spangs pa'i/ /rdzun gyi tshig ni smra mi bya/ /de nyid thams cad rnam spangs pa'i/ /ma rungs rab tu ma rungs dang / /rnam par sdang dang 'khrug
125b7(rgyud 'bum): bcas dang / /rtsub dang gnad rnams smra ba dang / /bden pa'i chos ni rnam nyams pa/ /sems can gzhan la gnod byed pa/ /phra ma nyon mongs can sems dang / /chos kun rnam par spangs pa dang / /
125b8(rgyud 'bum): rtag tu 'tshe ba'i bdag nyid dang / /khrims 'chal chos min spyod pa dang / /zlos pa'i sngags pas rtag tu spang / /grong gi chos kyang de bzhin no/ /khro ba log par 'byung ba yi/ /'jig rten pha rol 'jigs rnams la/ /
126a1(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang / /blo ldan rnams kyis yongs su smad/ /rtag tu rang rgyal bse ru dang / /nyan thos kyis kyang rtag tu smad/ /brdzun pa de bzhin 'jig rten na/ /sa steng grub
126a2(rgyud 'bum): pa 'dod rnams la'o/ /brdzun pa nye bar smra ba dag /shin tu mi bzad dmyal bar 'gro/ /de bzhin dud 'gro yi dags dang / /gshin rje'i 'jig rten rtag tu 'gro/ /brdzun ni nye bar smra ba yis/ /der
126a3(rgyud 'bum): ni rtag tu gnas pa yin/ /blo ngan mi bzad ltung ba ni/ /thig nag rab tu tsha ba dang / /yang sos ral gri'i lo ma dang / /de bzhin shal ma li nags su/ /brdzun smra ba yi gang zag ni/ /bskal pa
126a4(rgyud 'bum): mang por der gnas so/ /log par smra bar gyur pa dang / /rmongs pas log par brjod pa yis/ /'byung po rnams la slu byed pa/ /de la sngags grub ga la yod/ /des na rmongs pa'i las de yis/ /
126a5(rgyud 'bum): sngags ni grub par ma mthong nas/ /'di skad du ni tshig smra ba/ /sngags las grub pa med do zhes/ /de skad kyi ni tshig smra ba/ /gang gis sangs rgyas bstan pa 'di/ /sa steng 'dir ni spangs pa yin/ /
126a6(rgyud 'bum): bskal pa bye ba mang por yang / /de la grub pa ga la yod/ /des na mi bzad dmyal bar 'tshed/ /mnar med 'jigs pa chen po dang / /yang sos dang ni thig nag dang / /rab tu tsha ba'i dmyal bar ni/ /
126a7(rgyud 'bum): dam pa'i chos la brnyas pa yis/ /der ni bskal pa chen por gnas/ /gang yang dmyal ba mi bzad par/ /byis pa'i skye bo 'tshed byed pa/ /dam pa'i chos la brnyas byed dang / /zhe sdang mun pas bsgribs pa'o/ /
126a8(rgyud 'bum): mi shes byis pa'i ngo bo 'am/ /rmongs pa log pa'i nga rgyal gyis/ /rig pa'i rgyal po brnyas byed pa/ /mi bzad dmyal bar 'gyur ba yin/ /de bas sdig pa mi bya zhing / /log par smra ba'ang smad pa dang / /dam pa'i
126b1(rgyud 'bum): chos kyang mi brnyas shing / /lta ba log pa'ang smad par bya/ /de bas rtag tu dad gyur nas/ /sngags kyi cho ga rtag tu bsten/ /chos shes bden par smra ba dang / /sems can rnams la phan par dga'/ /sngags dang sngags
126b2(rgyud 'bum): shes bsten gyur pa/ /nges par de la grub pa yin/ /mchog dang bar ma tha ma las/ /rnam pa sna tshogs las byed de/ /las ni bya bas byed pa ste/ /bya ba mi byed rtag tu ni/ /bya ba las ni ldan pa las/ /rtag tu de las grub
126b3(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ /bya phyir las rnams thams cad phyir/ /las phyir rtag tu bya ba yin/ /bya ba'i don du bya ba min/ /bya ba las la sbyar ba yin/ /don bcas nyid kyi bya ba la/ /bya ba nyid kyis rtag tu bya/ /bya ba las dang 'bras bu nyid/ /bya ba
126b4(rgyud 'bum): las 'bras rtag tu bya/ /'bras med pa las 'bras 'byung zhing / /'bras bu nyid kyang rtag 'bras 'gyur/ /'bras med 'bras bur bcas pa yang / /thams cad 'bras bu kho nar 'gyur/ /yang dag ldan pas sngags grub ste/ /yang
126b5(rgyud 'bum): dag ldan pas sngags grub pa'o/ /ldan pas rnam par bral ba ni/ /mi ldan ldan pa grub pa min/ /bsgrub bya sgrub pa med pa ni/ /de la grub pa mi 'grub bo/ /grub pa'i rdzas ni thams cad kyang / /grub pa'i rgyu dang 'gal ba
126b6(rgyud 'bum): yin/ /sngags pa ma grub sgrub byed pa/ /sngags ni sgrub par byed pa yin/ /byed pa rab 'dod las yin te/ /las la 'dod pa bya bar 'dod/ /las min las ni thams cad la/ /las kyi rgyur ni mi bya'o/ /sngags dang rgyud kyi
126b7(rgyud 'bum): don ldan pa'i/ /'bras bcas las ni brtsam par bya/ /brtsam pa'i las ni brtsam par bya/ /las med nyid la brtsam mi bya/ /ma brtsams bya ba'i sngags rnams ni/ /lus can kun la 'grub mi 'gyur/ /sems can kun la
126b8(rgyud 'bum): thugs brtse bas/ /thub pa mchog gis sngon gsungs pa/ /sngags ni rgyu yi sgo dag nas/ /rgyal ba'i sras la dam tshig bshad/ /sgrub pa sngags ni kun shes shing / /sngags kyi rgyal po mchog 'di ni/ /sngags kyi tshul du rab bstan
127a1(rgyud 'bum): yin/ /yang dag rdzogs lam rgyu yin pas/ /gang du rigs pa rtags yod la/ /sngags rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /dus ni ring po mi thogs par/ /mkhas pas grub pa thob pa yin/ /'byung po rnams la zhi
127a2(rgyud 'bum): don du/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis rab tu bstan/ /lam yang sngags kyi tshul gyis ni/ /mya ngan 'das grong 'gro ba yin/ /de bzhin rtag tu byang chub lam/ /las don thams cad rdzogs par byed/ /de yi mthar thug dpung gnyen ni/ /
127a3(rgyud 'bum): dang po'i gnas ni sangs rgyas nyid/ /de bzhin 'bad med grub pa ni/ /'di las 'bras bcas thob pa yin/ /sna tshogs las dang las shes yin/ /sngags bzlas dag ni byed par 'gyur/ /tshul khrims bsam gtan rnam
127a4(rgyud 'bum): thar rnams/ /mdor bsdus 'di yis thob pa ste/ /don kun sgrub byed grub pa ste/ /rgyal ba mchog gis gsungs pa yin/ /nor rnams rgyas par 'thob 'gyur te/ /dam pa'i 'gro bar gnas pa dang / /de bzhin rtag tu gnod sbyin
127a5(rgyud 'bum): spyan/ /lha mi'i rgyal srid byed par 'gyur/ /mi lha lha min 'jig rten gyi/ /de bzhin bdag po thob 'gyur te/ /bdag po ma lus de dag gi/ /sngags pas thams cad 'thob pa dang / /'bras bcas bya ba byed par 'gyur/ /gtsang
