127a6(rgyud 'bum): sbra'i spyod dang ldan pa dang / /tshul khrims bsam gtan rtag tu dga'/ /rgyud rnams kun las gsungs pa yi/ /sngags pas bzlas pa rtag tu bya/ /sngags pa 'byor pa 'dod pa yis/ /las rnams sna tshogs bya ba ste/ /de bzhin
127a7(rgyud 'bum): mchog dang bar ma dang / /tha ma nyid kyang bya ba yin/ /tha mas longs spyod 'phel pa'i gnas/ /'bring gis gong ma'i lus thob cing / /mchog gis rab tu 'gro ba ste/ /zlos pas rtag tu thob par 'gyur/ /sngags pas zlos mthar
127a8(rgyud 'bum): ngal bso zhing / /ji srid dus su bsdad par bya/ /zlos pas dus la bab pa na/ /der ni bsgrub pa bya ba yin/ /de ltar mod kyi de la sngags pas las rnams bsgrub pa na der rtag tu bzlas na/ skyes bu rnams kyi sdig pa zad par byed cing / las
127b1(rgyud 'bum): rnam pa sna tshogs skye ba brgyud pa dag tu gang du gang byas pa de dag la grub pa gnas par nam zhig 'gyur zhe na/ skyes bus ji srid tshogs pa rnyed pa na/ sngags pa'i ngo bos sngags bzlas pa na sdig pa zad pa'i don dang las bsrabs
127b2(rgyud 'bum): pas sngags 'grub par 'gyur te/ de bzhin du mchog dang bar ma dang tha ma dang 'jig rten gyis mchod pa dang / bzlas pas sdig pa mtha' dag zad par byed cing / lus can thams cad kyi skye ba brgyud pa dag tu gang byas pa'i
127b3(rgyud 'bum): sdig pa de dag thams cad 'jig par byed de/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sngags bzlas na lus rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa yid dga' zhing / yon tan thams cad kyis grags par 'gyur ba dang /
127b4(rgyud 'bum): gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyi rgyal po nyid dang rtag tu don thams cad thob pa dang ldan pa yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi
127b5(rgyud 'bum): rtsa ba'i cho ga rab 'byam las/ sgrub pa'i thabs kyi las kyi gnas bzhi pa las bzlas pa dang nges par sdom pa dang sbyin sreg dang bsam gtan dang / gtsang sbra'i spyod pa dang las thams cad kyi cho ga sgrub pa'i le'u
127b6(rgyud 'bum): rab 'byam bcu gcig pa rdzogs s+ho/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la gzigs nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la
127b7(rgyud 'bum): bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal nyon cig /khyod kyi rig pa'i sngags rjes su spyod pa/ sems can thams cad kyi don la rjes su brtson pa/ sems can rnams gang zlos par byed pa dang gang gis zlos par byed pa dang / de'i phreng
127b8(rgyud 'bum): ba'i cho ga de thams cad rgyud thams cad kyi spyi sngags thams cad kyi sgrub pa'i thabs legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig / de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
128a1(rgyud 'bum): to/ /bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so/ /bdag la thugs brtse ba'i don dang / sngags thams cad kyi spyod pa dang dam tshig la zhugs pa rnams kyis sems can rnams kyi slad du de bshad du gsol/ de skad
128a2(rgyud 'bum): ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'jam dpal nyon cig /rnam par dbye ba rgya cher bshad par bya ste/ sngags thams cad kyi spyod pa la mngon par
128a3(rgyud 'bum): brtson pa na sems can thams cad kyi don sgrub par byed de/ dang por re zhig sngags su 'gyur ba de gang zhe na/ na maHsarba bud d+hA nA~M/ a tsin t+yAd bud d+ha rU pI NAM/ tad+ya thA/ ku ru ku ru/ sarbA sA d+ha ya/ sarba duSh+TaM bi mo
128a4(rgyud 'bum): ha ni/ ga ga nA bi la bi sho d+ha ya swA hA/ sngags 'dis phreng ba thams cad la las bya'o/ /sbyang ba dang dgug pa dang blang ba dang rgyu ba la sogs pa'i las bya'o/ /dang po phreng ba'i shing la ni/ /sngags kyis lan grangs
128a5(rgyud 'bum): nyi shu bdun/ /mngon par bsngags pa byas nas ni/ /sdom brtson rtag tu bsrung ba bya/ /mtshan gcig der ni nyal byas na/ /rmi lam nang du des mthong ba/ /mi ma yin gzugs grub pa ni/ /mi sdug mche ba gtsigs
128a6(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ /sngags pa la ni des smras pa/ /nor ni ci 'dod khyer cig ces/ /sgrub byed nang par langs nas ni/ /shing de las ni 'gro bar byed/ /sngags pas shing de bor nas ni/ /gzhan dag tu ni 'gro byed na/ /mi sdug gzugs
128a7(rgyud 'bum): can 'jigs byed pa/ /rmi lam du yang mthong mi 'gyur/ /dang por ru drAk+Sha yin te/ /in drAk+Sha ni gnyis pa yin/ /tha ma bo de tse yin la/ /gzhan yang 'bras bu yod pa'o/ /shing la legs par 'dzeg mkhas pa'i/ /grogs
128a8(rgyud 'bum): po med par gyur na ni/ /rang nyid de la 'dzeg par bya/ /steng gi yal ga'i 'bras gnas su/ /sdom brtson brtul zhugs can 'dzegs te/ /rtag tu de la bag yod pas/ /steng gi yal ga la byung nas/ /yal ga'i steng gi 'bras
128b1(rgyud 'bum): blangs te/ /steng gi las la sbyar bar bya/ /steng gi grub pa mchog tu ni/ /gang zag mchog gis gsungs pa yin/ /bar ma bar ma'i grub pa ste/ /grub pa tha ma'ang tha ma'i yin/ /rtag tu srog chags ma zos pa'i/ /
128b2(rgyud 'bum): 'bras bu yang dag blang bar bya/ /nub kyi yal ga las thob pa/ /rdzas kyi rgyur ni grub pa yin/ /byang gi gnod sbyin la sogs dang / /lha rnams rtag tu 'gugs par byed/ /skad cig 'gugs par byed bsten pa'i/ /
128b3(rgyud 'bum): 'byung po thams cad zhi phyir dang / /lha dang lha min dri za dang / /mi 'am ci dang srin po rnams/ /dbang du bya ba'i las byed de/ /'byung po kun yang rgyas par byed/ /don yod las ni byed pa ste/ /las rnams sna tshogs ma lus
128b4(rgyud 'bum): byed/ /shar phyogs yal ga las skyes shing / /yang dag 'byung ba'i 'bras bu ni/ /de tshe 'bad de byas gyur na/ /tshe ni ring ba'i rgyu yang yin/ /rtag tu sngags grub 'bras bu ni/ /rnam pa sna tshogs byed pa yin/ /gang zhig lhor
128b5(rgyud 'bum): ni 'gro ba yi/ /yal ga lo mar rab ldan pa'i/ /sngags pas de ni 'bad de spang / /sems can rnams kyi srog 'phrog byed/ /lhor brten pa yi yal ga dang / /'bras bu gang dag skyes pa ni/ /blangs na gdung byed dgra rnams kyi/ /
128b6(rgyud 'bum): srog ni 'jig par byed pa yin/ /zlos pas 'bad de spang bar bya/ /bsod nams ma yin mang po'i rgyu/ /yal ga 'og tu 'phyang gnas la/ /'bras bu gang zhig rab bsgrags pa/ /lha min bu mo gnas pa yi/ /sa yi
128b7(rgyud 'bum): 'og tu 'gro bar 'gyur/ /de yi 'bras bu'i phreng ba ni/ /blangs nas 'og tu 'gro brten pa/ /sa yi 'og tu gnas par ni/ /des na de ni 'gro bar byed/ /der zhugs lha yi bde ba ni/ /zlos pas thob par 'gyur ba yin/ /lha min bu mo
128b8(rgyud 'bum): chags bzhin du/ /bskal par de ni gnas par byed/ /me tog phreng ba kun blangs nas/ /de nas zlos pa slar log bya/ /grogs dang lhan cig bsrung byas nas/ /de nas ji ltar bde bar 'gro/ /gnas nas thag ring song nas ni/ /de bzhin
129a1(rgyud 'bum): gtsang phyogs cho ga bzhin/ /de nas sngags pas rtag tu 'dug /phreng ba yongs su sbyang bar bya/ /brtson pas phreng ba'i 'bras blangs te/ /kun nas yongs su dag byas nas/ /sngags pa bzang pos phreng ba dbug /gsum
129a2(rgyud 'bum): bdun brgyad dang gcig gam ni/ /nyi shu dang ni rtsa gcig tu/ /sngags kyi de nyid shes pas bkru/ /snga ma'i sngags kyis rtag tu yang / /bdun nam brgyad du bzlas par bya/ /de nas dag par yang dag 'dod/ /pad ma'i rtsa lag
129a3(rgyud 'bum): dag las ni/ /bu mos bkal ba'i skud pa dag /gsum dang lnga ldab byas pa yi/ /sdom can gyis ni phreng skud bya/ /sngags kyi de nyid shes pas brgyu/ /'bru ni phra zhing shin tu zlum/ /rtag tu srog chags bu ga med/ /legs
129a4(rgyud 'bum): 'jam smad pa'ang med pa yin/ /mdzes dang kha dog mdzes pa dang / /de bzhin gas med bu ga med/ /ru drAk+Sha dang bo de tse/ /in drAk+Sha yi 'bras bu nyid/ /rtag tu lung tang mdzes pa dang / /gzhan yang 'bras bu 'dod pa dag /
129a5(rgyud 'bum): 'bad pa yis ni phreng ba dag /sngags pas brtson byas de tshe brgyu/ /gser ram yang na dngul dag gam/ /nor bu shel las byas pa dang / /dung dang mu sa ra dag dang / /mu tig las kyang bya ba yin/ /byi ru rnam pa sna tshogs
129a6(rgyud 'bum): kyi/ /phreng ba dag kyang bya ba yin/ /gzhan yang rin chen bzang po yi/ /phreng ba legs par rab tu bya/ /sa ni rab bzlums ril bu dag /mnyam par bzhag nas skud pas brgyu/ /gzhan yang ril bu cung zad gang / /'bras
129a7(rgyud 'bum): bu 'byung khung dag las bya/ /ku sha'i rtse mo'i mdud pas kyang / /sngags pas 'bad de bya ba yin/ /brgya rtsa brgyad dam nyi shu 'am/ /lnga bcu nyid ni bar ma yin/ /sngags pa mnyam par bzhag nas ni/ /tshad 'dis phreng ba brgyu
129a8(rgyud 'bum): ba yin/ /rtsa brgyad stong du bya ba ni/ /phreng ba'i mchog tu bya ba yin/ /phreng ba'i rnam pa 'di bzhi yang / /sngags pas rtag tu brgyu ba yin/ /de ltar brgyu ba byas nas ni/ /rim pa gsum mam gnyis su bya/ /lcags bzang rang bzhin
129b1(rgyud 'bum): gdu bur bya/ /de bzhin gser dngul dag dang ni/ /de bzhin zangs ma'i gdu bu yis/ /phreng ba kun yang bcing bar bya/ /de nas yang mig kun mthar ni/ /kun la'ang de bzhin gdags par bya/ /'bad pas dam du bcing bya ste/ /ji ltar
129b2(rgyud 'bum): dam por 'gyur bar ro/ /yongs su gsal bar byas nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor lta bur mthong ba yin/ /de ltar sbrul gyi gdengs ka ltar/ /yongs su 'khor bas brgyan pa yin/ /mu tig phreng ba 'dra ba yis/ /mgul bar brgyan
129b3(rgyud 'bum): pa lta bur bya/ /chu bo dag ni dri med pa'i/ /chu gtsang dag gis khrus bya zhing / /ji ltar go rims khrus byas nas/ /chu bzhi las ni ldang nas su/ /'bad pas de bzhin nye reg bya/ /phreng ba rjes su blangs nas ni/ /ba yi rnam lngas rab tu
129b4(rgyud 'bum): bkru/ /de bzhin sa yi phye ma dang / /chu gtsang dag gis rab bkrus te/ /dri zhim dag gis rjes byugs shing / /rab tu bsngags pa'i kha dog kyang / /tsan dan dkar dang gur gum mo/ /de nas de bzhin gnyi ga 'gro/ /'bad pa yis ni rab tu bkru/ /
129b5(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin khrus byas song nas ni/ /gang na ras ris bar ma de/ /rgyal ba gtso bo thub mchog ni/ /shAkya seng ge mi yi mchog /de bzhin rtag tu ston pa'i gzugs/ /sa steng rgyal ba'i ring bsrel can/ /de yi mdun du phreng ba ni/ /de dang nye
129b6(rgyud 'bum): bar gzhag par bya/ /de dang nye bar bzhag nas ni/ /de yi mdun du nyer gnas nas/ /stong phrag gcig dang brgyad dang ni/ /brgya dang rtsa brgyad bzlas nas kyang / /nyin zhag gcig ni smyung byas te/ /bdun pa thub la phreng ba dbul/ /
129b7(rgyud 'bum): snga ma de bzhin bzlas byas nas/ /tshad kyang de dang mnyam par bya/ /de nas phreng ba la bzlas nas/ /de yi mtshan mo nyal bar bya/ /ku sha bting ba'i sa la ni/ /sngags shes der ni nyal bar bya/ /gal te des ni rmi la~M na/ /dge ba'i rmi la~M mthong
129b8(rgyud 'bum): na ni/ /'bras bcas rmi lam ston pa ste/ /de la grub par bstan pa yin/ /sangs rgyas nyan thos bse ru ni/ /gal te 'di yis rmi lam mthong / /sngags pa de yi bya ba ni/ /'bras bcas nges par 'grub par 'gyur/ /gzhon nu'i gzugs
130a1(rgyud 'bum): can byis pa ni/ /rnam pa sna tshogs mdzes mthong ba/ /gal te rmi lam nges mthong dang / /phreng ba stsol ba'ang de bzhin te/ /don yod de ni 'grub 'gyur te/ /sngags kyi don rnams sgrub byed pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod theg pa
130a2(rgyud 'bum): chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga las ras ris bar ma la brten pa cho ga rab 'byam las/ phreng ba'i cho ga rab 'byam bcu gnyis pa rdzogs s+ho// // de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya
130a3(rgyud 'bum): thub pas/ gzhan yang thams cad dang ldan pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la gzigs nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyi sngags mtha' dag rnam par dgod pa'i khyad par gyi
130a4(rgyud 'bum): cho ga dang sbyin sreg gi las la rab tu sbyor ba'i rig pa sgrub pa yod de/ me la nye bar spyod pa'i khyad par gyi cho ga'i phyir/ gang gi rig pa thams cad kyi spyod pa la mngon par brtson pa'i sems can rab tu 'jug cing gnas par 'gyur ro/ /
130a5(rgyud 'bum): de gang zhe na/ gsang ba'i rig sngags kyi gzhi ni 'di lta ste/ ut+tiSh+Tha ha ri ping ga la lo hi tA k+Sha/ de hi da dA pa ya hU~M s+pha Ta s+pha Ta sarba bi bi nA sha ya swA hA/ 'jam dpal 'di ni me'i snying po'i mchog las thams cad byed pa 'dod
130a6(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad ster bar byed pa yin te/ dang po re zhig sgrub pa pos me'i snying po 'di lan cig bzlas pas/ sreg blugs gsum gyis me la sbyin sreg byas nas me spyan drang bar 'gyur ro/ /de ltar rab tu sbyar na zhi ba dang rgyas pa dang /
130a7(rgyud 'bum): drag po'i las dag la yam shing rnam pa gsum du 'gyur te/ mya ngan med shing zhi don du/ /rlon pa nyid ni rab tu bsngags/ /mtho gang 'am ni khru gang tsam/ /sor gsum srid du bya ba yin/ /snum pa'i rnam pa rab tu bsngags/ /cho ga 'di ni
130a8(rgyud 'bum): bya ba yin/ /bu ga med cing nang stong min/ /de bzhin ne tso'i 'dab ma dang / /ljang dang dkar ba'i kha dog gam/ /kha dog nag pa spang bar bya/ /srin bu rnams kyis zos pa'ang spang / /bu ga yod pa'ang rnam par bzlog /gzhan yang kha dog
130b1(rgyud 'bum): rab bsngags min/ /tha ma nyid kyang rnam par spangs/ /ha cang skam min rlon pa'ang min/ /tshig min las ni brtsam par bya/ /rul ba dang ni yo ba'ang min/ /shin tu ring ba'ang spang bar bya/ /de nas me thab bya ba ni/ /kun nas gru bzhir bya ba
130b2(rgyud 'bum): ste/ /'og nyid du yang brko ba ni/ /'bad pas khru ni bzhi yi tshad/ /khru gsum dang ni khru gnyis dang / /de bzhin khru gcig tshad du bya/ /rtag tu srog chags spangs pa dang / /bye mas legs par sbyar ba gang / /de nas pad 'dra'i lan kan ni/ /kun
130b3(rgyud 'bum): nas dkyil 'khor 'dra ba'o/ /yang na 'bad pas zur bzhi yang / /de bzhin lan kan dbyibs su bya/ /rdo rje'i rnam pa 'dra ba yi/ /rtse mo gnyis su'ang rtse gsum bya/ /me thab kyi ni thad ka la/ /khru gnyis thad kar bya ba yin/ /gtsang
130b4(rgyud 'bum): dang de bzhin gsal ba'i gnas/ /chu klung de bzhin chu dbus dang / /shing gcig gi ni phyogs dag dang / /dur khrod dang ni khang stong du/ /sbyin sreg legs par yang dag brtsam/ /de bzhin ri bo'i rtse dag tu'o/ /rtag tu lha khang stong
130b5(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / /dgon pa chen po'ang de bzhin no/ /gang yang sgrub pa'i phyogs dag tu/ /gang zag mchog gis rab gsungs pa/ /sbyin sreg gnas ni thams cad la/ /gnas de dag ni thams cad gsungs/ /ku sha'i khres ni khru gang tsam/ /de la
130b6(rgyud 'bum): 'dug par byas nas ni/ /sngags shes der ni sbyin sreg las/ /khyad par du yang bya ba yin/ /gnas de dag la 'dug na ni/ /myur du 'grub par the tshom med/ /shar dang byang du bltas pas kyang / /zhi ba dang ni rgyas par bya/ /lhor bltas nas ni
130b7(rgyud 'bum): drag po'i las/ /sngags pas de ni spang bar bya/ /shar du bltas pas zhi ba 'grub/ /byang du bltas pas rgyas pa'o/ /'di yis sngags pa dus rtag tu/ /sngags kyi ngo bo yang dag brtsam/ /bil ba p+lag sha n+ya gro d+has/ /rgyas pa'i las ni
130b8(rgyud 'bum): yongs su bya/ /mngon spyod shing las bya ba ni/ /dkar dang tshwa dang skyur dang rno/ /de dag thams cad spang bya ste/ /thub pa rnams kyis rtag tu bkag /zhi dang rgyas pa'i las la ni/ /shing rlon dag ni rab tu bsngags/ /drag po'i las la
131a1(rgyud 'bum): shing skam ste/ /thub pa rnams kyis rtag tu spangs/ /yam shing de dag med na ni/ /tha mal shing dag kun du brtag /gnyi ga'i rtse mor bya ba ni/ /ku shas kun du yang dag dkri/ /sngo dang snum pa 'dra ba dang / /rma bya'i
131a2(rgyud 'bum): mgrin pa 'dra ba dang / /de 'dra'i ku shas rtag tu ni/ /zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa bya/ /margad rnam pa 'dra ba dang / /rtswa skam gyis ni rtag tu yang / /sdig pa'i las rnams bya ba yin/ /'dir ni thub pa mchog gis bkag /dri med chu
131a3(rgyud 'bum): ni yongs dag pa/ /srog chags dag gis rtag spangs pa/ /des ni kun nas gtor byas nas/ /g.yas phyogs su ni bskor byas te/ /sdom brtson gyis ni me sbar bya/ /cho ga ji bzhin nye reg bya/ /gtsang ba'i rtswa yi rtsa bas ni/ /
131a4(rgyud 'bum): me sgron tshad dang ldan byas nas/ /de nas chang par bcangs nas ni/ /'bad pas me ni spar bar bya/ /kha yi rlung gis mi bya ste/ /rtag tu gos kyi mthas kyang min/ /sham thabs bla gos rnam par spangs/ /gos gzhan dag ni
131a5(rgyud 'bum): bkag ma yin/ /shin tu drag pas de mi bya/ /gnod par dga' ba'i ma yin na/ /rlung yab gtsang dang de bzhin gos/ /lo mas kyang ni rlung yab bya/ /rlung gis khyad du mi gsod pa/ /me ni rab tu sad byas nas/ /sngags
131a6(rgyud 'bum): shes pas ni me sbar te/ /sbyin sreg don du legs mnyam gzhag /lag pa de ni g.yon pa yis/ /lan gsum bar du chus gtor nas/ /der ni ba yi mar gyis ni/ /sreg blugs gsum ni des sbyin bya/ /de nas
131a7(rgyud 'bum): kyang ni phyag bya ste/ /sangs rgyas kun dang skyob pa dang / /rang sngags sngags kyi mgon po la/ /de nas ci 'dod phyag bya'o/ /de tshe me yi snying po yis/ /sngags kyis lan bdun rtag bzlas pa'i/ /dri zhim me tog dag gis
131a8(rgyud 'bum): ni/ /sdom brtson me ni spyan drang bya/ /sngags shes rtag tu spyan drangs nas/ /mkhas pas gnas ni sbyin par bya/ /gdan dang gnas ni sbyin byed na'ang / /de nyid sngags yin gzhan pas min/ /zho dang mar gyis sbags
131b1(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / /sbrang rtsis sbags pa'i yam shing gis/ /rgyas pa'i las ni bya ba'i phyir/ /sngags kyis kun du sbyin sreg bya/ /mar dang sbrang rtsir ldan pa 'am/ /yang na zho dang ldan pa yi/ /yam shing rdzas dang ldan pa
131b2(rgyud 'bum): yis/ /gnyi ga la gnas de tshe bya/ /stong ngam yang na 'bum mam ni/ /yang na brgya rtsa brgyad du brtag /de tshe sngags pas sngags bzung nas/ /lan re bzlas shing me la dor/ /'bar ba'i me yi phreng ba 'am/ /
131b3(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin me lce gcig gyur la/ /zhi ba'i las kyi sbyin sreg bya/ /dud pa med la rgyas pa'ang bya/ /dud bcas drag po'i las la bya/ /de ni rgyal bas smad cing spangs/ /gal te me ni mdog ldan na/ /sbyin sreg
131b4(rgyud 'bum): las ni rab tu sbyar/ /zhi la kha dog dkar po ni/ /rgyal ba mchog gis rtag tu bsngags/ /gal te me dkar sbyin sreg byas/ /der ni sngags rnams 'grub par 'gyur/ /de bzhin rtag tu mdog dmar la/ /rgyas
131b5(rgyud 'bum): pa 'grub par 'dod pa yin/ /gnag dang du ba'i kha dog dang / /ser skya la ni sdig ldan las/ /kha dog rnam gsum bstan pas ni/ /rnam gsum grub pa 'di dag yin/ /mdog gzhan sprin gyi kha dog gam/ /rnam pa sna
131b6(rgyud 'bum): tshogs mdog ldan pa/ /sa steng 'di la sngags rnams ni/ /grub pa yod pa ma yin no/ /de 'dra'i kha dog 'dra ba 'am/ /rnam pa sna tshogs mdog ldan pa'i/ /me ni 'bar ba de mthong na/ /las kyi sbyor ba'ang brtsam par bya/ /
131b7(rgyud 'bum): gal te sngags ni grub 'dod na/ /phyi rol me ni sbar bar bya/ /cho ga mthong ba'i las kyis ni/ /phyir yang sbyin sreg rab tu bya/ /me yi sngags ni zlos pa yis/ /gshegs gsol spyan drang nyid kyang bya/ /dkyil 'khor 'dir ni cho ga bzhin/ /
131b8(rgyud 'bum): sngar ni rab tu brtags pa yis/ /de nyid kyis ni sbyin sreg bya/ /gshegs gsol spyan drang la sogs pa'ang / /de nyid kyi ni las dag gis/ /las rnams thams cad nyid kyang bya/ /me yi las dang de bzhin gzugs/ /
132a1(rgyud 'bum): ras ris mdun du brtsam byas na/ /der ni sngags rnams 'grub 'gyur zhes/ /sngon gyi bde gshegs rnams kyis gsungs/ /rgyal bas bsngags pa'i las rnams dag /der ni rnam pa kun du bya/ /sdig pa dag ni khyad par du/ /
132a2(rgyud 'bum): gang yang rgyal bas smad pa dang / /'jig rten 'gro bas smad pa dag /gzhan gyis smad pa'ang bya ba min/ /'khor los sgyur bzang nyid dang ni/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'thob dang / /de bzhin mngon shes lnga 'thob dang / /de nas lha nyid thob
132a3(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ /ras ris la rtag brtson zhing gshegs/ /sbyin sreg las la 'jigs med dang / /sa 'og gi ni bdag po 'am/ /yang na bar snang spyod par 'gyur/ /sa bdag lha dang gnod sbyin nyid/ /rtag tu gnod sbyin mo 'gugs byed/ /
132a4(rgyud 'bum): rgyal srid bdag po nyid dang ni/ /yul nyid dang ni grong dag dang / /rig pa 'dzin dang lha min nyid/ /sems can thams cad dbang du byed/ /bdag nyid che dang sems can che/ /'byung po rnams ni 'gugs par byed/ /byang chub sems dpa'
132a5(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' che/ /sa bcu la ni yang dag gnas/ /sbyin sreg las kyis 'gugs byed na/ /sa steng mi rnams smos ci dgos/ /sde dpon dag dang de bzhin du/ /khyad par 'jig rten dbang phyug 'gyur/ /dbang 'gyur cig car
132a6(rgyud 'bum): 'byung po kun/ /de bzhin mi yi dbang po nyid/ /sems can kun la dbang don dang / /yang na rgyal po dbang du 'gyur/ /de bzhin rtag tu las kun la/ /sbyin sreg gis ni kun du bya/ /thams cad kun la brtson bdag nyid/ /las kun las ni bsten
132a7(rgyud 'bum): byas na/ /de ni nges par 'grub 'gyur te/ /las dge'i don ni dam pa yin/ /bar ma nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur/ /tha ma'i las kyang de bzhin no/ /rdzas rnams dag ni de bzhin du/ /grub dang ldan pa'ang rnam pa gsum/ /'bras
132a8(rgyud 'bum): dang bcas par grub snang ste/ /sbyin sreg las la rab tu bstan/ /phyag rgya gtsug phud lnga bcings nas/ /sngags kyang skra can mas byas na/ /las rnams kun ni bya ba dang / /sngags pas bdag nyid bsrung ba bya/ /
132b1(rgyud 'bum): sbyin sreg las la rab 'jug pas/ /de nas sngags 'di brjod par bya/ /bdun nam brgyad du bzlas pa yis/ /las 'di la ni rtag tu bya/ /na maHsarba bud d+hA bo d+hi satwA nA~M/ a pra ti ha ta ga tiM ga tA nA~M/ tad+ya thA/ dz+wa la tiSh+Tha
132b2(rgyud 'bum): hU~M ru ru bi shwa saM b+ha ba saM b+ha be swA hA/ sngags kyi sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /yang dang yang du shing la bzla/ /gnyis sam bdun du bzlas pa yis/ /sngags rig des ni sbyin sreg bya/ /me tog bdug pa dri yang rung / /ma lus thams
132b3(rgyud 'bum): cad dag dang ni/ /chu la sngags rnams bzlas pa yang / /'di nyid kyis ni sbyin par bya/ /las rnams kun gyi rgyu yi phyir/ /de nas cho ga brtsam par bya/ /las rnams dag ni thams cad la/ /snga ma'i sbyor ba nyid kyis bya/ /
132b4(rgyud 'bum): snga ma'i gtsug pud lnga bcings te/ /phyag rgya chen po grags ldan ma/ /snga ma'i gtsug pud lnga bcings bya/ /skra can ma nyid rab bzlas pas/ /des na srung ba byed par 'gyur/ /grub pa'i rgyu la 'jigs med pas/ /
132b5(rgyud 'bum): las rnams thams cad brtsam par bya/ /gal te la nye bzang mthong ba'am/ /rtag tu dge ba'i sgra thos na/ /de la sngags ni don yod de/ /ji ltar 'dod bzhin mchog stsol 'gyur/ /dang po'i las la rab sbyor dang / /sngags
132b6(rgyud 'bum): kyi rgyu la rab 'jug na/ /thams cad 'bras bu bcas pa dang / /de la grub par brjod pa yin/ /rgyal sgra rnga ni pa Ta ha/ /rnga bo che yi sgra dag ni/ /brtson byas grub pa ma lus 'gyur/ /sbyin sreg las la yang dag
132b7(rgyud 'bum): bsten/ /gzhan yang la nye bzang po dang / /'dab chags dge ba'i sgra dag dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs nges pa'i sgra/ /rgyal ba rnams kyis bsngags pa dang / /bkra shis bzang po rab bsngags dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs yid 'ong sgra/ /
132b8(rgyud 'bum): gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan dang / /bud med rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / /de bzhin mchod yon bum pa gang / /mthong na 'grub pa'i rgyu rnams yin/ /rnam pa du ma'i kha dog gam/ /'jig rten gyis mchod rab bsngags pa/ /de dag
133a1(rgyud 'bum): mthong na 'grub 'gyur ba/ /sngags rnams du ma'i spyod yul yin/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga bcu
133a2(rgyud 'bum): gsum pa ste/ sbyin sreg gi cho ga rab 'byam rdzogs s+ho// // de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas gzhan yang gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la gzigs te/ 'jam dpal
133a3(rgyud 'bum): gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyi gsang ba'i rig pa yod de/ sngags thams cad kyi sgrub pa po'i thabs/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis yang dag par rjes su gnang ba/ chos kyi mdzod
133a4(rgyud 'bum): las byung ba/ chos kyi sprin gyi rjes su zhugs pa/ nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sngags thams cad kyi mnga' bdag shin tu gtso bor gyur pa/ gzhon nu ji ltar de bzhin
133a5(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa ni sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu brjod de/ shin tu gtso bor gyur cing dam pa yin la/ lha dang mi rnams kyi skyes bu khyu mchog sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yin no/ /gzhon nu de
133a6(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du rig pa'i rgyal po 'di ni sngags thams cad kyi mchog tu bstan cing shin tu gtso bo yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das brjod du med
133a7(rgyud 'bum): pa dag gis sngon gsungs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog gi snying po mchog tu gsang ba kun nas bkra shis par 'dod pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yang dag par bstod pa rab tu bsngags
133a8(rgyud 'bum): pa sems can thams cad yang dag par dbugs 'byin pa sdig pa thams cad rab tu 'jig par byed pa 'dod pa thams cad sbyin par byed pa re ba yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de yang gang zhe na/ bar 'dir bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas smin mtshams kyi
133b1(rgyud 'bum): mdzod spu nas sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag par bskul ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer phyung bar gyur to/ /gang 'di phyogs bcu steng 'og thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing snang bas khyab par mdzad de/
133b2(rgyud 'bum): sems can thams cad kyi yid tshim par mdzad nas slar log ste/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i dbu'i gtsug tor du nub par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi gtsug tor nas kun nas 'bar ba'i 'od dang
133b3(rgyud 'bum): ldan pa'i lus can blta bar mi nus pa/ sems can thams cad kyis mi thub pa 'od chen pos yang dag par 'phags pa 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis lus brgyan pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi gzugs dang ldan pa/
133b4(rgyud 'bum): 'khor los sgyur ba chen po'i gzugs can rig pa'i rgyal po yi ge gcig pa zhes bya ba byung bar gyur to/ /byung nas nam mkha'i dkyil thams cad snang bar byas te/ rig pa'i rgyal po thams cad kyis yongs su
133b5(rgyud 'bum): bskor ba rig pa du ma bye ba khri phrag brgya stong 'byin par byed pa/ yi ge gcig pa'i sgra 'don cing 'od zer chen po 'bar ba rab tu 'byin pa steng gi phyogs nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la mngon du blta ba dang
133b6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad dang ldan pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po yang snang bar byas nas bar snang la gnas par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas yi ge gcig pa rig pa'i 'khor
133b7(rgyud 'bum): los sgyur ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog ces bya ba'i snying po mchog tu rab tu gsang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las bcom ldan 'das rin chen
133b8(rgyud 'bum): tog gis yang dag par thob pa/ sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang 'od dpag med dang bsnyen par dka' ba dang spyan bzang dang tog bzang dang me tog dbang po dang gnyid mthar phyin dang 'jig rten thub pa dang / gser thub la
134a1(rgyud 'bum): sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba dang 'das pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba de yang gang zhe na/ tad+ya thA/
134a2(rgyud 'bum): b+h+ru~M/ 'jam dpal 'di ni snying po dam pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog sngags thams cad kyi rig pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba yi ge gcig pa zhes bya ba dag byed chen po 'di yang dag par bsgrubs na sngags
134a3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad 'grub par 'gyur te/ gzhon nu gang yang khyod kyi cho ga'i rgyal po'i mchog la sngags thams cad dang rjes su mthun pa/ mchog tu gsang ba'i mchog yang dag par rjes su gnang ba las kyi sgrib pa
134a4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad yang dag par sbyong bar byed pa/ dang po re zhig sgrub pa pos nges par 'bum phrag gsum bzlas brjod bya'o/ /de nas las rnams sngags dang bcas pa 'dir gzhon nu khyod kyi cho ga'i rgyal po la 'jig
134a5(rgyud 'bum): rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sngags dang rgyud rnams bsgrub par bya'o/ /'dis bsrung ba byas na 'byung po thams cad kyis tshugs par mi 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bgegs
134a6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyis zil gyis non par mi 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas de gsungs ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur
134a7(rgyud 'bum): te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du yang snang bas khyab cing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor der 'dus par gyur te/ gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang du 'khod par gyur to/ /
134a8(rgyud 'bum): sa bcu thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa'i sems can thams cad dang
134b1(rgyud 'bum): rig pa'i rgyal po rnams 'od zer gyis yang dag par bskul nas lhags par gyur to/ /'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag na rnam par gnas pa'i sems can mang po dbang du gyur to/ /dmyal ba dang dud 'gro dang yi dags kyi ngan 'gro
134b2(rgyud 'bum): la gnas pa rnams 'od zer chen po'i snang bas reg cing snang bar byas pas sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba'i rgyun la gnas pa yid shin tu bde bas tshim zhing skyo ba med par gyur te/ nges par theg pa gsum la gnas par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
134b3(rgyud 'bum): shAkya thub pas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de la gzigs nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal nyon cig rig pa'i rgyal po 'di rdzu 'phrul che ba dpa' bo gcig pu las thams cad byed pa/ rig pa thams cad
134b4(rgyud 'bum): kyi rgyal po 'khor los sgyur ba/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa cho ga zhib mo thams cad yongs su rgyas pa/ khyod kyi sngags dang rgyud dang / cho ga rab 'byam la yang dag par zhugs pa/ sngags thams cad
134b5(rgyud 'bum): sgrub par byed pa/ thun mong du gyur pa/ grags pa che ba dang / spro ba che ba dang / sems can sgrub pa po'i khyad par gyi thabs dang shes rab la mkhas pa byang chub kyi lam thams cad yongs su sbyong bar byed pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa la rab tu
134b6(rgyud 'bum): 'jug par byed pa/ bdud zil gyis gnon par byed pa/ byang chub kyi snying po la gnas par byed pa/ dge ba'i tshogs yang dag par 'byung bar byed pa'o/ /'di nyid mdor bsdu na/ cho ga zhib mo rgyas pa ras ris kyi cho ga'i dkyil
134b7(rgyud 'bum): 'khor sgrub pa'i thabs/ sngon gyi sngags kyi spyad pa rjes su spyod pa/ gang la rab tu gnas na sems can gyi rig pa'i rgyal po 'khor los sgyur ba chen po sgrub par 'gyur te/ rmad du byung ba chen po sngags thams cad kyi dbang
134b8(rgyud 'bum): phyug dam pa/ 'od byed pa/ thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ rnam par 'dren pa/ 'gro ba thams cad la phan par byed pa/ sangs rgyas bzhin du mngon sum du nye bar bzhugs pa rang byung du
135a1(rgyud 'bum): gyur pa mchog dang bar ma dang tha ma'i las thams cad byed pa shin tu bde ba dam pa shis pa dang zhi bar byed pa sdig pa thams cad rab tu 'jig par byed pa'o/ /lha rnams kyi yang lha nyid de/ /thub pa rnams kyi thub pa mchog /
135a2(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas nyi ma'i gnyen gyur pa/ /dag pa 'jig rten rnam par grags/ /chos kun rang gi ngo bo mkhyen/ /yang dag mthar gyur rnyog pa med/ /de yi cho ga mchog bshad bya/ /'byor pa 'dod pas mnyan par gyis/ /re zhig
135a3(rgyud 'bum): dang por ras bzang po/ /skyon rnams dang ni ma 'dres pa/ /sar pa phra ba'i khyad par ldan/ /kha tshar dang bcas nyid la bri/ /chur ni khru do'i tshad yin la/ /zheng du khru gang tshad du bya/ /de 'dra'i bzang po kho na la/ /dri med blta na
135a4(rgyud 'bum): sdug pa dang / /bcos bu dkar po de bzhin du/ /phra dang legs bkrus ras bal spangs/ /phyag dar dri ma med pa yi/ /du gu la yi ras nyid la/ /rgyu ni shing kun nyid dang ni/ /dag la rgyud ni rnam spangs pa/ /chu ngan las ni
135a5(rgyud 'bum): bkrus min dang / /skye bos zhal mthong phul ba'ang min/ /ma bgos pa dang de bzhin du/ /gzhan yang cung zad dam pas bsngags/ /de 'dra'i ras ni bzang po la/ /gzhal med khang ni bri bar bya/ /'od kyi dkyil
135a6(rgyud 'bum): 'khor phreng ba can/ /ston pa'i gzugs ni yang dag bri/ /de bzhin gser gyi mdog can ni/ /'od zer phreng ldan bri bar bya/ /gcig pu phug na bzhugs pa ni/ /ri bo la gnas grags pa che/ /
135a7(rgyud 'bum): dar la'i bla re bre ba ni/ /rin chen phreng ba 'phyang ba'o/ /steng du lha ni gnyi ga yang / /'dzin pa dag ni yang dag bri/ /ri rnams kyi ni steng dag tu/ /rin chen phreng ba rab tu bya/ /bla re'i 'khor yug mu tig gi/ /
135a8(rgyud 'bum): dra ba dra phyed dag gis brgyan/ /ri rgyal steng du 'bad pa yis/ /'di dag thams cad bri bar bya/ /ri bo dag gi rtsa ba yang / /rgya mtsho chen por nub par bya/ /ras ris mthar yang me tog ni/ /kun nas 'khor bar
135b1(rgyud 'bum): yang dag bri/ /nA ga ge sar pun nA ga /ba ku la dang zhu ti ka /sna ma'i me tog pri yang ku/ /de bzhin ku ra ba ka dang / /ut+pa la dang dri mchog dang / /de las gzhan yang pad ma dkar/ /me tog rigs ni
135b2(rgyud 'bum): sna tshogs dang / /de bzhin gzhan yang drir ldan pa'i/ /me tog dag ni 'di dag nyid/ /gang yang rung ba rtag blangs nas/ /ston pa la ni mchod don du/ /yid du 'ong ba'i mchod yon dbul/ /sngar bstan cho gas ras ris
135b3(rgyud 'bum): ni/ /mchog dang de bzhin gzhan dag kyang / /dog pa tha ga pa dag dang / /ri mo mkhan yang de bzhin 'dod/ /cho 'phrul gyi ni zla phyed kyi/ /nyi ma dge ba dag la ni/ /dus ni de ltar gyur pa la/ /bzlas pa nyid kyang bya ba
135b4(rgyud 'bum): yin/ /'di la sems can thams cad kyis/ /sngar bstan bzhin du yang dag spyad/ /tshon gsal rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/ /ston pa'i gzugs ni bri bar bya/ /rnam pa du mar ldan pa yi/ /dong ka'i me tog mdog
135b5(rgyud 'bum): 'dra dang / /tsam pa ka yi mdog 'dra dang / /gser gyi mdog dang 'dra bar bri/ /de lta'i rnam pa ldan pa yi/ /rin chen rigs skyes thub pa bri/ /chags pa chen po rin chen tog /gtso bo thub mchog dam pa ni/ /
135b6(rgyud 'bum): chos rnams thams cad yongs thob pa'i/ /sangs rgyas dkon mchog de bri bya/ /rin chen ri bor gnas pa dang / /rin chen phug gis nyer mdzes shing / /skyil krung gis ni bzhugs pa dang / /chos ni rjes su 'chad cing stsol/ /
135b7(rgyud 'bum): cung zad 'dzum zhing brtan pa dang / /thugs ni bsam gtan la dmigs dang / /phyi rol phug ni yang dag bri/ /'og dang de bzhin 'khor yug tu'o/ /ras mtha'i zur du sgrub pa pos/ /pus mo'i lha nga yang dag btsugs/ /
135b8(rgyud 'bum): bdug spos lag na thogs bzhin du/ /lus ni cung zad 'dud pa dang / /bla gos gcig tu byas nas ni/ /cha byad ji lta bzhin du yang / /bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas phyogs kyi/ /'og gi rgya mtsho che steng du/ /sngags pas
136a1(rgyud 'bum): dge ba'i don gyi phyir/ /sdom brtson rtag tu bri bar bya/ /las kyi cho ga 'di dag ni/ /'jig rten gyi sngags bstan pa yin/ /dkyil 'khor de yi lha dag kyang / /da ni rab tu brjod par bya/ /de tshe sngags
136a2(rgyud 'bum): pas rig pa'i sngags/ /de tshe sngags ni rig pa des/ /sngags la rtag tu bsnyen byas dang / /bzlas pa phun sum tshogs mngon shes/ /'jam dbyangs cho ga 'di la ni/ /de tshe sngags pa dbang bskur ba/ /dkyil 'khor rnam pa
136a3(rgyud 'bum): la mkhas shing / /rtag tu gtsang sbra byed pa dang / /sngags rnams kun la dbang bskur dang / /dkyil 'khor 'di la 'jigs pa med/ /rig pa'i sngags dang sngags bcas dang / /bdag nyid bsrung dang phan 'dod dang / /grogs kyang
136a4(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin bsrung shes dang / /yongs su legs brtags 'od chen ldan/ /slob dpon legs par yang dag rtsom/ /rtsom zhing sbyangs yon bsten pa dang / /shes rab che zhing legs 'jam dang / /dpal ldan snying rjer
136a5(rgyud 'bum): rtag tu ldan/ /grogs po dag ni thams cad kyang / /mtshan nyid de bzhin kun tu bstan/ /gcig gnyis gsum dang de bzhin du/ /gzhan yang de bzhin brgyad kyi bar/ /slob ma legs par sbyang bar bya/ /mang po dag
136a6(rgyud 'bum): ni spang bar bya/ /sngar bstan cho ga ji lta bar/ /dkyil 'khor 'di la'ang yang dag spyad/ /stobs bcu ldan pas dang por ni/ /dkyil 'khor gang dag rab bstan pa/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs las gzhan min dang / /rgyu
136a7(rgyud 'bum): gzhan dag gis bri mi bya/ /dkyil 'khor 'od chen ldan pa yi/ /tshad ni rab tu bstan par bya/ /khru bzhi'am khru ni gnyis pa dang / /de bzhin gzhan yang khru brgyad par/ /gtsang ba'i phyogs sam chu klung ngam/ /
136a8(rgyud 'bum): khyad par du ni ri bo'i rtser/ /tshon sna lnga yi phye ma dang / /sngar bstan pa yi las kyis so/ /gru bzhi sgo ni bzhi pa dang / /rta babs bzhi yis brgyan pa dang / /zur bzhi mnyam zhing bzang ba dang / /lha yi rnam pa 'dra ba'i mdog /
136b1(rgyud 'bum): tshon rtsi gsal ba sna tshogs dang / /mdzes pa'i kha dog legs mdzes dang / /dri zhim bzang dang gzugs bzang dang / /grogs bzang dag gis yang dag brtsam/ /thub pa'i brtul zhugs yang dag spyad/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i
136b2(rgyud 'bum): brtul zhugs bsten/ /nyon mongs med sems zas tshod rig /chos ldan rtag tu zlos pa byed/ /sdig med las dang yongs srung byed/ /de bzhin zhi dang rgyas pa shes/ /de nas dkyil 'khor dbus zhugs nas/ /bstan bcos
136b3(rgyud 'bum): las gsungs bzhin du bri/ /rin chen lha tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i/ /ri mo dang por bri bar bya/ /der bzhugs gzi brjid chen po ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog /skyil krung gis ni legs bzhugs pa/ /chos kyi
136b4(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo rjes bskor ba'o/ /ras ris la ni ji lta bar/ /bstan bcos la sngags thams cad bri/ /ri mo'i phreng ni gsum dag dang / /phyag rgyas rab tu brgyan pa dang / /gser mdog rim pas khor yug tu/ /yongs su bri bar
136b5(rgyud 'bum): bya ba yin/ /gsal dang yongs su rdzogs pa dang / /drang po de yi rnam pa'o/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i bdag po che/ /de yi dbus su bya ba yin/ /nyi ma 'char ka 'dra ba dang / /gur gum rnam pa 'dra mdog can/ /'khor lo chen po'i rjes
136b6(rgyud 'bum): 'brang ba/ /'bad par gnas pas kun tu bri/ /rgyal po chen po mnyam 'dra ba/ /gzhal med khang bcas rgyan gyis brgyan/ /sems dpa' chen po'i cod pan can/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rab tu brgyan/ /dar la mdzes pa'i
136b7(rgyud 'bum): smad g.yogs can/ /sna tshogs dar las stod g.yogs shing / /phreng ldan zhi ba'i kha dog 'od/ /gos dang phreng bas brgyan pa dang / /me tog phreng ba bak+ku la/ /lag pa g.yas pas snoms par byed/ /bzhin ni cung zad 'dzum pa'i lha/ /
136b8(rgyud 'bum): mthu chen 'od dang ldan pa'o/ /gzugs bzang gzugs ni mdzes pa dang / /byis pa rgan po rnam par spangs/ /lag pa g.yon na 'khor lo ste/ /'bar ba'i 'od kyi phreng ba can/ /de ni yongs su bskor ba dang / /skyil krung phyed kyis
137a1(rgyud 'bum): gnas pa bri/ /gzugs bzang gzugs la bsten nas ni/ /lha yi gzugs 'dra bri bar bya/ /ri bo 'od chen ldan pa'i steng / /rin chen du ma'i steng du gnas/ /sngags rnams kun la che ba dang / /rtag tu mchog
137a2(rgyud 'bum): sbyin la 'jug byed/ /'bar ba'i me dang 'dra ba dang / /'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis mdzes pa/ /rlung gis sbar ba'i me bzhin du/ /kun nas me ni 'bar ba'o/ /de bzhin sngags kyi sbyor ba yis/ /khyab bdag me yis 'bar bar
137a3(rgyud 'bum): byed/ /stobs chen de dang 'dra ba yi/ /sngags kun rab tu sgrub byed pa/ /gang gis bdag nyid chen po mthong / /sdig pa kun las yongs su grol/ /mtshams med lnga po byed pa dang / /tshul 'chal blo ni chung ba dang / /sdig pa
137a4(rgyud 'bum): kun la 'dzud byed pa/ /khyab bdag mthong ba tsam gyis grol/ /lha yi lha ni 'khor lo'i bdag /dkyil 'khor mthong ba tsam gyis ni/ /gzhan yang sdig tu yongs bstan pa/ /de yi mod la grol bar 'gyur/ /sngags
137a5(rgyud 'bum): pas rtag tu khyab bdag gi/ /de nas shar sgo yang dag sbyar/ /rta babs kun nas yongs bsgreng ste/ /ba dan dag gis nyer mdzes bya/ /mtha' dag gzugs ni mdzes pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor yongs su gsal byas nas/ /bshos
137a6(rgyud 'bum): dang bdug pa dri dang ni/ /rtag tu phreng ba bzang po yis/ /cho ga snga ma kho na ltar/ /de dag thams cad gus par bya/ /dbus kyi bum pa gang ba ni/ /'khor lo can gyi mdun du dgod/ /de'i bum rnam par rgyal zhes
137a7(rgyud 'bum): bya/ /sngags shes pas ni de mi bteg /cho ga mthong ba'i las kyis ni/ /me thab snga ma bzhin du bya/ /sbyin sreg cho ga yang dag brtsam/ /cho ga sngags ni gzhan pas min/ /sbyin sreg kyang ni brgya rtsa brgyad/ /seng
137a8(rgyud 'bum): ldeng bud shing me la ni/ /pa la sha dang bil ba'i shing / /bil ba u dum arka dang / /'bad pas las rnams kun la ni/ /a pa margas sbyin sreg bya/ /til la mar gyis btags pa 'am/ /zho la sbrang rtsis bsres pa yis/ /
137b1(rgyud 'bum): las rnams kun la sbyin sreg ni/ /stong rtsa brgyad ni rtag tu bya/ /dus gsum dus ni kun bstan pa/ /khrus dang gos ni brje ba dang / /dkar gsum rgyu skar bzang po ni/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis bstan pa yin/ /las rnams sngar ni bstan
137b2(rgyud 'bum): pa yi/ /bzlas dang sbyin sreg de bzhin gzhan/ /sngags dang yang dag ldan pas sam/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs kyis bya/ /las rnams dag ni kun la yang / /yi ge gcig pa'i sngags kyis bya/ /de ni mthu chen don ldan te/ /
137b3(rgyud 'bum): dpa' bo gcig pu rtag pa mchog /de la rtag tu zlos byed pa/ /sngags rnams kun gyi cho ga spyod/ /'jig rten pa yi 'jig rten 'dod/ /cho ga thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /'jig rten 'das pa'i brtson 'grus che/ /rig pa'i rgyal
137b4(rgyud 'bum): po dka' thub che/ /sngags kun 'grub par 'gyur ba ni/ /cho ga 'di las gzhan pas min/ /thub pa rnams kyis sngags gsungs dang / /de bzhin stobs bcu ldan sras dang / /'jig rten skyong ba brgya byin sogs/ /khyab 'jug dbang
137b5(rgyud 'bum): ldan tshangs pa dang / /zla ba nyi ma de bzhin gzhan/ /gnod sbyin dbang po srin po dang / /lto 'phye che dang mi 'am ci/ /de bzhin sa steng drang srong mchog /nam mkha' lding dang rlung lha dang / /sems can ming ldan 'jig rten gzhan/ /gang gis
137b6(rgyud 'bum): bshad pa'i sngags rnams ni/ /'dir yang 'grub par 'gyur ba yin/ /sngags rnams kun la 'gugs byed dang / /las rnams kun la ston byed dang / /'byung po kun gyi sngags rgyud ni/ /rgyas dang bcas pa dbang du byed/ /
137b7(rgyud 'bum): yi ge gcig pa'i sngags 'di ni/ /sngags pa kun gyi rab byed pa/ /bzlas pa tsam gyis don ldan te/ /lha rnams kun ni 'gugs byed la/ /cho ga rnams ni dbang du byed/ /yi ge gcig chen bdag po yin/ /dam pa rnams kyis rab
137b8(rgyud 'bum): bsngags pa'i/ /rnam pa sna tshogs byed pa yin/ /'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i sngags/ /yang dag sbyar na sgrub par byed/ /ma lus mthong na mdzes pa yi/ /ras ris gsal ba byas nas ni/ /gtsang ba'i phyogs dang 'bab chu'i ngogs/ /
138a1(rgyud 'bum): ri bo'i rtser yang gzhag par bya/ /snga ma'i las kyi sbyor ba yis/ /nub kyi phyogs su rtag tu bstan/ /cho ga mthong ba'i las kyis ni/ /sgrub pa po ni shar du blta/ /dUr ba'i khres la 'dug nas ni/ /'du 'dzi med par bzlas
138a2(rgyud 'bum): pa bya/ /sgra ni drag min ngal bas min/ /gzhan la ngan sems med gyur na/ /sangs rgyas ma lus kun gyi yang / /'di la myur du 'grub pa yin/ /rtag tu 'jig rten byams sems dang / /sdug bsngal can la snying brtser ldan/ /mgon
138a3(rgyud 'bum): med sems ni dman pa dang / /phongs pas nyam thag stobs chung dang / /mi bzad 'khor bar ltung ba la/ /snying rje'i sems ldan 'grub par 'gyur/ /'bad pas ras ris mdun dag tu/ /mchod pa chen po rtag tu gzhag /dngos su 'byor
138a4(rgyud 'bum): dang yid kyis sprul/ /bzang po sems las byung ba dang / /rgyal dbang gzugs kyi ri mo ni/ /bsam pa'am yang na bya ba yin/ /de nyid kyi ni cho ga yis/ /de nyid du ni me thab bya/ /me ni shin tu 'bar ba la/ /sgrub pas sreg blugs sbyin
138a5(rgyud 'bum): sreg bya/ /tsan dan dkar dang ga pur dang / /gur gum gyis bsres mang po ni/ /brgya ni rtsa brgyad sreg blugs kyis/ /sngags rig me 'bar sbyin par bya/ /seng ldeng p+lag sha n+ya gro d+ha/ /pa la sha ni gang yin pa/ /de dag las byung shing
138a6(rgyud 'bum): dag gis/ /me chen rtag tu sbar bar bya/ /shing de dag ni med gyur na/ /shing gzhan yongs su gzung bar bya/ /pi tsu mar da tsha dang skyur/ /po son cha las byung ba'i shing / /tsher ma can sogs spang bya ste/ /sdig pa'i las la rab tu
138a7(rgyud 'bum): bsgrags/ /yi ge gcig pa'i sngags nyid kyis/ /zhi dang rgyas pa byas gyur na/ /de ni myur bar 'grub par 'gyur/ /sdig pa'i las ni spyang mi bya/ /sngags mchog kun kyang 'di la ni/ /las rnams cho ga rgya chen kun/ /rnam rtog med
138a8(rgyud 'bum): pas rab sbyar na/ /rtag tu 'grub par 'gyur ba yin/ /de tshe sngags ni 'grub 'gyur zhing / /mchog sbyin nyid du'ang 'gyur ba yin/ /yam shing p+lag sha u dum bar/ /yang na p+lag sha n+ya gro d+ha/ /mar gyis btags dang sbrang rtsir ldan/ /zho dang
138b1(rgyud 'bum): ldan pas mnyam bzhag nas/ /sa steng rgyal thabs 'dod pa yi/ /sngags pas dus kun sbyin sreg bya/ /lha yi rgyal po 'dod pas ni/ /gur gum tsan dan sbyin sreg bya/ /rig pa 'dzin pa'i lha dag gi/ /bdag po nyid ni 'dod gyur na/ /
138b2(rgyud 'bum): pad ma'i sbyin sreg 'bum phrag ni/ /sum cu rtsa drug ge sar bcas/ /sbyin sreg mthar ni mchod yon yang / /bstan bcos las byung bzhin du dbul/ /rgyal bas bsngags pa'i ras ris mchog /der ni kun nas yongs su
138b3(rgyud 'bum): 'bar/ /de la reg pa tsam gyis ni/ /tshangs pa'i 'jig rten dag dang ni/ /'og min gyi ni bar dag gnas/ /yang na sa 'og rim par 'gro/ /bar skabs 'dir ni grub rnams kyi/ /der ni rgyal por rtag tu 'gyur/ /stobs chen brtan
138b4(rgyud 'bum): zhing pha rol gnon/ /'byung po rnams ni 'byer bar byed/ /rtag tu rig 'dzin rgyal por 'gyur/ /las rnams yongs su sbyong bar byed/ /de ni yun ring 'tsho 'gyur te/ /bskal pa tsam du'ang gnas pa yin/ /gang tshe lus ni shi 'phos
138b5(rgyud 'bum): nas/ /nges par byang chub gzhol bar 'gyur/ /gzhan yang las ni 'di dag kyang / /mdo dang rgyas pa bstan par bya/ /pad ma dkar po yongs blangs nas/ /tsan dan dkar dang ldan pa yi/ /sbyin sreg 'bum phrag brgya byas na/ /
138b6(rgyud 'bum): des ni rin chen tog mthong 'gyur/ /rgyal ba dam pa de mthong na/ /de tshe mngon shes lnga thob 'gyur/ /bskal pa chen por ring 'tsho zhing / /sangs rgyas rjes su 'gro bar 'gyur/ /mtha' yas phyogs na bzhugs pa yi/ /
138b7(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas de nas mthong bar 'gyur/ /de dag la ni rtag mchod cing / /de dag nyid dang lhan cig gnas/ /rin chen ldan zhes 'jig rten khams/ /gcig na bcom ldan de bzhugs pa/ /thub gtso mchog ni dam pa ste/ /
138b8(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog /de la de ni rtag gnas te/ /sngags kyis dag par the tshom med/ /gzhan yang las ni 'dod pa dag /gang zag mchog gis gsungs pa ni/ /nA ga ge sar ga pur dang / /tsan dan
139a1(rgyud 'bum): gur gum cha mnyam pa/ /sngags pas de tshe gcig byas nas/ /sbyin sreg 'bum phrag bdun cu brgyad/ /de tshe lha ni sbyin sreg mthar/ /'khor lo can de 'dir byon nas/ /rtag tu dgyes nas mchog stsol te/ /
139a2(rgyud 'bum): sgrub byed spyi bor byug par mdzad/ /de tshe reg pa tsam gyis ni/ /sngags pa sa bdun bdag por 'gyur/ /rgyal sras thugs las skyes pa yi/ /byang chub sems dpar de brjod do/ /nges pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang / /
139a3(rgyud 'bum): de ni lung bstan 'gyur ba yin/ /de nas brtsams nas cung zad gang / /shes dang shes bya rgyal ba'i sras/ /shes 'gyur sngags rnams ma lus ni/ /rtogs pa'i bdag nyid cher rgyas yin/ /de la reg pa tsam gyis ni/ /
139a4(rgyud 'bum): mngon shes lnga ldan sngags rgyal 'gyur/ /rtag tu bdag dang gzhan bdag nyid/ /rnam pa sna tshogs byed par 'gyur/ /rnam pa kun mchog ldan pa yi/ /mchod pa'i las la rtag tu dga'/ /skad cig de nyid kho
139a5(rgyud 'bum): na la/ /byang chub las la brtson par 'gyur/ /de tshe skad cig tsam gyis ni/ /'jig rten sangs rgyas zhing der 'gro/ /'jig rten khams ni stong dag tu/ /thams cad du yang 'gro bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas
139a6(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' ni/ /de tshe spyod bcas mthong bar 'gyur/ /de las chos ni thos pa dang / /mchod pa'i las la brtson par 'gyur/ /rgyal ba 'khor los sgyur gsungs pa'i/ /'dir ni las rnams gzhan
139a7(rgyud 'bum): yod de/ /mar me yon du dbul ba ni/ /mar bcas snying po gtsang ba ni/ /gser dang dngul gyi snod dag dang / /zangs ma sa dag nyid yin na/ /der ni mar me rab sbar te/ /skyes bu grangs ni 'bum dag gis/ /
139a8(rgyud 'bum): grangs kyi tshad tsam nges bzhag ste/ /brgya phrag stong las lhag pa min/ /bud med spangs pa'i skyes pa yis/ /kho ra khor yug mar me 'dzin/ /mchod pa'i las kyi don du ni/ /ston pa'i ras ris
139b1(rgyud 'bum): sku la dbul/ /sngags rnams re re'ang 'dod bzhin du/ /thams cad mnyam par rab zhugs nas/ /ston pa la ni 'bul byed na/ /de yi mod la grub par ston/ /kun nas sgra ni sgrogs byed cing / /rnga bo che yi sgra
139b2(rgyud 'bum): yang sgrogs/ /gang phyir lha tshogs du ma ni/ /legs so zhes pa'i sgra rab 'don/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yang / /de tshe nam mkha' la bzhugs nas/ /shes rab can khyod legs so legs/ /

142a1(rgyud 'bum): las rnams kun la ni/ /khyad par du ni sbyin sreg bya/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga las/ le'u bcu bzhi pa
142a2(rgyud 'bum): 'khor los sgyur ba'i ras ris kyi cho ga'i dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i thabs rab 'byam rdzogs s+ho/ / // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje 'khor gyi nang der 'dus
142a3(rgyud 'bum): shing 'khod par gyur te/ 'dug pa de stan las langs nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so/ /

142a8(rgyud 'bum): gsol/ gang gis rig pa thams cad sgrub pa'i rjes su dpyod pa'i sems can grub pa'i mtshan ma'i las rtsom par byed par 'gyur ba dang / 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i rig pa thams cad kyi mtshan mar 'gyur ba'o/ /

142b8(rgyud 'bum): hA/ sngags 'dis srung ba byas shing sbyin sreg gi las thams cad la las bya'o/ /de nas ku sha'i rtse mo gnyis ka phyi rol du bstan te bting la ku sha'i khres kyi sngas byas te mgo shar phyogs su bstan la
143a1(rgyud 'bum): ras ris kyi mdun nas ha cang yang mi ring ha cang yang mi nye bar nyal bar bya'o/ /thun dang po la mi nyal ba'i sbyor bas rjes su brtson par byas nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phyag byas
143a2(rgyud 'bum): nas sdig pa rnams so sor bshags te/ sangs rgyas thams cad la bdag nyid phul la/ de nas ji ltar bde bar gnyid kyi dbang du 'gro bar bya'o/ /dang po'i thun gyi rmi lam gang / /bad kan las byung shes par
143a3(rgyud 'bum): bya/ /gnyis par gang byung mkhris pa ste/ /'jig rten la yod smad pa yin/ /gsum pa rlung byung shes par bya/ /bzhi pa bden par 'byung ba yin/ /bad kan rmi lam dang po ni/ /'di 'drar rtag tu mthong ba yin/ /

143b7(rgyud 'bum): rA ga dang / /gzhan yang rin chen gang yin pa/ /gang du rmi lam mthong na ni/ /lus can mkhris pa las gyur yin/ /me dang tsha ba sten pa dang / /reg dang za bar byed pa dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs kha dog ser/ /rmi lam mkhris pas
143b8(rgyud 'bum): brgyal ba yin/ /rtag tu tsha ba'i nyi ma dang / /nyi ma rtag tu 'de bar ni/ /gang gis rmi lam mthong gyur na/ /lus can mkhris pa las gyur yin/ /nam mkha' gser gyi mdog gyur dang / /sa yi steng ni kha dog ser/ /rmi lam na ni
144a1(rgyud 'bum): gang gis mthong / /mkhris pa las gyur na ba yin/ /me ni kun nas 'bar ba yis/ /nam mkha'i ngos nas rab gsal bar/ /rmi lam dus su mthong ba ni/ /mkhris pas gnod pa'i lus can yin/ /sa dang de
144a2(rgyud 'bum): bzhin ri bo dang / /brag ni mthon po'ang gser gyi mdog /shing chen de bzhin theg pa ni/ /rtag tu thams cad gser rang bzhin/ /rtag tu rmi lam gnas mthong na/ /mkhris pa las gyur rmi lam yin/ /theg pa rgyan dang bzhon pa dang / /snod
144a3(rgyud 'bum): rnams gser gyi rang bzhin dang / /stan rnams dang ni gnas mal rnams/ /sa le sbram gyi rang bzhin la/ /reg dang 'gro bar byed pa nyid/ /rmi lam mthong na mkhris gyur yin/ /phreng ba ser po thogs pa dang / /ser po'i gos
144a4(rgyud 'bum): kyis nyer mdzes dang / /ser po'i 'od dang dri yis byugs/ /ser po'i mchod phyir thogs pa dang / /bdag nyid ser po'i rnam pa dang / /gang gis rmi lam la mthong ba/ /gnyis pa'i thun du mthong na ni/ /mkhris pa las gyur shes par bya/ /

144a6(rgyud 'bum): pa du ma'i gzugs can ni/ /ser por snang ba yang dag 'byung / /'jig rten gtso bos gsungs pa ni/ /rmi lam mkhris las yang dag byung / /gang yang rlung byung rmi lam ni/ /gsum pa'i thun du bstan pa yin/ /'khor yug tu

144a8(rgyud 'bum): bstan pa/ /'di lta bu la bya ba yin/ /rgal dang mchong dang de bzhin du/ /shing rnams la ni mngon par 'dzeg /bstan bcos ma lus 'don pa dang / /khyad par du ni sngags rnams dang / /bshad dang brjod par byed pa dag /phal cher
144b1(rgyud 'bum): yang ni rlung las gyur/ /shing rnams tsher ma can 'dzeg dang / /kha ba dag kyang za ba dang / /bza' ba ma lus tsha dang skyur/ /zos pa rlung las gyur pa yin/ /gtsor yang rlung ni yang dag 'byung / /shing thog rlung ni rab bskyed pa/ /de dag za

145a1(rgyud 'bum): zhing mtshon pa med/ / de bzhin sa yi bdag po dang / /dmag dpon don du gnas pa ste/ /longs spyod chen po skye 'gyur zhing / /rang gi las kyis nye bar 'tshe/ /rang gi las 'bras bstan pa ni/ /las kyi sngags

145a8(rgyud 'bum): shes bzhin las kyis nyer spyod pa'i/ /sems can zil gyis mnan nas spyod/ /sngags ni srog la gnod byed pa/ /de ni de la myur 'grub 'gyur/ /mi bzad thub pas spangs pa'i don/ /myur du sgrub par byed
145b1(rgyud 'bum): pa yin/ /sems can gnod phyir byed pa'i las/ /lus can de la grub par 'gyur/ /cho ga sbyar ba'i chos rnams gang / /sngags pas thams cad rab sbyar na/ /spyod pa des ni 'grub 'gyur te/ /gzhan las sems can de la
145b2(rgyud 'bum): min/ /sngags pa zhe sdang can dag la/ /sems can gzhan la gnod pa dang / /de bzhin gzhan gyi sngags gcod pa/ /sems can khro ba la grub 'gyur/ /gzhan gyi rdzas ni 'phrog don dang / /gzhan gyi srog ni gcod pa la/ /

145b5(rgyud 'bum): ni mig dmar zhing bdag gnas/ /bad kan can la phur bu'i bdag /skye 'gyur nyung ngu za ba dang / /tsha dang skyur ba'i ro bsten cing / /de yi tshe ni ring 'gyur zhing / /dran dang ldan pa skye bar 'gyur/ /spyod pa dang ni rjes spyod pa/ /

146a1(rgyud 'bum): sems can rlung nad 'khrug pa la/ /gti mug nye bar zhi ba dang / /rmongs pa'i rigs can la gsungs pa/ /rmongs pa'i sngags ni rab sgrub pa/ /rtag tu de dag rmongs pa la/ /rmongs pa dag ni 'grub par

147a1(rgyud 'bum): na maH sa man+ta bud d+hA nA~M/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nA~M/ tad+ya thA/ he he ma hA kro d+ha Sha Na mu khA Sh+Ta tsa ra Na/ sarba big+ha na big+hA na g+hA ta ka hU~M hU~M/ kiny+tsi ra ya si bi nA ya ka dzI bi tAn+ta ka ra duHswA me nA sha ya/ la hu

148b7(rgyud 'bum): phyogs kyang chung ba dang / /rked pa rgya che bzang ba dang / /lte ba zab cing g.yas su 'khyil/ /kun nas dkar med ba spu dang / /lag ring lag ni che ba dang / /rked pa seng ge 'dra ba'i mtshan/ /gang gi brla ni zlum pa dang / /
148b8(rgyud 'bum): gru mo nyams med zlum pa dang / /byin pa e na ya lta bur/ /zlum pa'i nang ni zlum por grub/ /rkang pa sha dang ldan pa dang / /sor mo rnams kyi ring ba dang / /dmar zhing sen dmar snum pa dang / /sha rgyas pas ni snum pa yin/ /
149a1(rgyud 'bum): nang stong ma yin mthil mnyam gnas/ /dge zhing mthong na dga' ba dang / /'jam zhing kha dog dag pa dang / /rab bsngags 'jig rten bkra shis dang / /de dag gi ni steng dag tu/ /rtsa yi dra ba mngon pa med/ /bshang ba
149a2(rgyud 'bum): 'byung ba'i lam dag tu/ /ri mo zab cing g.yas su 'khyil/ /mchig pa rab bsngags shin tu chud/ /rtag tu zlum zhing dge ba yin/ /ma 'brel dum bu ma yin dang / /gcig min nyid du bstan pa yin/ /gang tshe skyes dbang
149a3(rgyud 'bum): gtsang ba dang / /rtse mo dmar la yang dag gnas/ /skye bo nyal khar kha zas ni/ /ro ni rtsa bar byed pa za/ /bshang ba kha dog sngo ba 'am/ /gal te dmar por rab snang zhing / /mang po ma yin snum pa dang / /dge ba'i mtshan gyi
149a4(rgyud 'bum): rab mtshan pa/ /de lta'i sems can gang yin pa/ /grub pa mchog tu 'dod pa yin/ /lan gsum bshang zhing sngags drug dran/ /gtsang sbra'i spyod dga' yongs su gtsang / /gang zhig thun ni tha mar nyal/ /tho rangs
149a5(rgyud 'bum): ldang ba'i skye bo rnams/ /de yi grub pa rtag tu mchog /las kun byed par snang ba yin/ /'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs dang / /phun tshogs rnam pa mang po la/ /mi rnams rjes su 'dod pa yang / /mtshan nyid kyis ni
149a6(rgyud 'bum): mngon mtshan pa'o/ /rgyu skar dag la'ang skyes pa ni/ /rgyal dang nam gru gre dbo dang / /mchu dang lha mtshams dag dang ni/ /nag pa snar ma smin drug dang / /nus pa'i gza' rnams kyis mtshan pa/ /de dag la ni skyes
149a7(rgyud 'bum): mthong dang / /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'char kha ni/ /tho rangs dus su gang skyes dang / /gang tshe de yi dus su skyes/ /de la grub pa rab tu snang / /nyin phyed dang ni tho rangs dang / /nyi ma'i mthar yang gza' bzang po/ /dkar ba zla ba
149a8(rgyud 'bum): pa wa sangs/ /ser ba gza' lhag phur bu yin/ /skye bo rnams kyis mthong na ni/ /'bras bu 'grub phyir nus pa yin/ /mi ni gang zhig dge las kyis/ /'di la skyes par gyur pa yi/ /sngags don ma lus sgrub pa la/ /
149b1(rgyud 'bum): de dag 'bad med 'grub par 'gyur/ /nyi ma phyed ni 'das pa dang / /rtag tu nyi ma nub pa na/ /lus can rnams kyi rtag de la/ /ma rungs gza' mthong gang yin pa/ /ma rungs nyi ma mig dmar dang / /mjug
149b2(rgyud 'bum): rings sgra gcan spen pa dang / /gang yang gza' ni gtso bo dang / /las ni ngan 'joms skar mda' can/ /skar ma shin tu mi bzad nyid/ /de bzhin nag po 'chi ltas dang / /dus min 'chi ba sa la ni/ /mi bzad de tshe
149b3(rgyud 'bum): snang ba yin/ /nyi ma 'char ba'i dus su ni/ /gza' lhag gis ni sa rnams mthong / /gnya' shing gang tsam nyi mas phyin/ /phur bus sa de mthong bar 'gyur/ /de nas pha rol gnya' shing tsam/ /pa sangs
149b4(rgyud 'bum): nor spyan gyis de mthong / /nyi ma phyed ni yongs rdzogs na/ /zla bas lus can ma lus mthong / /gza' lhag dus su rgyal thabs thob/ /phur bus nor dang longs spyod byed/ /pa sangs nor ni nges sgrub dang / /rgyal srid
149b5(rgyud 'bum): tshe dang longs spyod ldan/ /zla ba de bzhin tshe ring zhing / /dbang phyug dang ni 'bras bu bcas/ /de bzhin nyin phyed nyi ma ni/ /nyi ma phyed du mnyam par mthong / /rtag tu nyin phyed rnam 'das na/ /nyi mas phyogs ni
149b6(rgyud 'bum): mthong bar byed/ /thung 'gyur nyi ma gnya' shing tsam/ /byed pa nyid du bstan pa ni/ /sgra gcan spen pa nyid dag yin/ /mun pa dus dang dus mthar byed/ /de nas phar ni thung ba na/ /'chi ltas skar mda' sa 'gul byed/ /
149b7(rgyud 'bum): li khri tshogs kyis mdog bsgyur ba'i/ /nyi ma nub kar zangs ma'i mdog /gza' yi gtso bo gang yin de/ /byis pa gzhon nu'i tshul 'dzin cing / /lag na mdung thogs ma rungs pa/ /mig dmar nyid kyis mthong ba yin/ /
149b8(rgyud 'bum): de nas nyi ma gnya' shing 'das/ /dge ba'i gza' ni 'byung ba yin/ /nyi mas mthong ba las skyes pa/ /ma rungs bab col byed par 'gyur/ /spen pa mig dmar las skyes pa/ /khro ldan skam zhing nga rgyal can/ /mjug rings
150a1(rgyud 'bum): 'chi ltas dud rnams la/ /skyes pa nad ni yang dag 'byung / /dbul zhing nad btab glen pa dang / /de bzhin du ni rtag tu rmongs/ /dus dang mun pa 'gul byed dang / /skar mda' can dang gza' ngan dang / /'gul byed
150a2(rgyud 'bum): sgra drag dmar ba'i mdog / gnam lcags nyid kyang rab rdung byed/ /de bzhin rdo rje 'chi ltas dang / /gzhan yang khyim sogs rab tu mthong / /skye bo kun gyis sgra gcan ni/ /mi bzad rab tu mthong gyur na/ /
150a3(rgyud 'bum): dbul zhing mgon med tshul khrims 'chal/ /mi ni rtag tu sdig pa spyod/ /mi ni sdug bsngal skye 'gyur te/ /nad kyi gzhi ni skye bar 'gyur/ /mdze can nad ni mang ba dang / /long ba 'theng bo shu bar bcas/ /
150a4(rgyud 'bum): za ma ma ning mo sham dang / /bud med mtshan ni ngan pa dang / /skyes pa bud med de bzhin gzhan/ /gza' ni ngan pa mthong ba yin/ /de ltar skyes gyur skyes pa dang / /'jig rten mang po skye ba yin/ /dkar dang ser
150a5(rgyud 'bum): ba'i gza' mchog ni/ /de dag las skyes dge ba yin/ /mdog ni dkar dang ser ba dag /rgyal bas rab tu bsngags par gsungs/ /gza' ni gtso bo bzhir bshad pa/ /pa sangs zla ba bla ma lhag /zlos pa
150a6(rgyud 'bum): las rnams kun la ni/ /de dag mthong na 'grub pa'i don/ /sems can byis pa rnams la yang / /rtag tu de dag skye ba bzang / /lo ni kun la 'dod pa'ang zhes/ /'jig rten mchog gis gsungs pa yin/ /skad
150a7(rgyud 'bum): cig tsam la'ang de bzhin du/ /mig 'byed mi 'dzum se gol gtogs/ /'di ni mdor bsdus skye ba zhes/ /'jig rten mchog gis gsungs pa yin/ /'di tsam gyi ni tshad dag tu/ /gza' kun 'jig rten dgongs pa yin/ /de dag
150a8(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin rtag tu 'char/ /'di dag dus kyi de nyid yin/ /'di dag dge dang sdig pa'i gza'/ /'khor lo bzhin du rtag tu 'khor/ /'jig rten dge dang mi dge byed/ /de nyid 'jig rten gnas pa yin/ /des na de dag gang cung zad/ /
150b1(rgyud 'bum): sdig pa'i blo yang skye bar 'gyur/ /sems can dge dang mi dge'i 'bras/ /mang po yang ni skye bar 'gyur/ /gza' rnams las la spyod pa zhes/ /des na 'di ni mthong zhes gsungs/ /myur ldan myur bcas 'od 'gyur zhing / /
150b2(rgyud 'bum): myur bar 'ong bas myur ldan yin/ /mig gis mthong dang ma mthong ba'i/ /se gol gtogs pa'i myur 'gros yin/ /'di tsam gyi ni tshad dag tu/ /blo mchog rnams kyis bstan pa yin/ /de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa/ /
150b3(rgyud 'bum): nges par zlos pas rtag tu bya/ /yud tsam dag ni bcu gnyis dang / /dus dang dus min 'gro ba'i rgyu/ /grub pa'i rgyu 'am ma yin pa/ /'gro ba min pa'ang bshad par bya/ /'jig rten la nye bzang ba dang / /char dang char min
150b4(rgyud 'bum): yang dang yang / /yul 'khor 'jig dang mu ge dang / /lo legs nyi ma gsal mthong dge/ /dus dang de bzhin dbang po'i gzhu/ /skye bo rnams la rtag zhi byed/ /mjug rings sa 'gul gnam grum dang / /skar mda' dang ni lho 'ur
150b5(rgyud 'bum): dang / /rgyu skar gza' dang skar rnams kyi/ /spyod pa dge dang mi dge ba/ /'byung po rnams kyi spyod pa ni/ /dge dang mi dge'i spyod pa yin/ /sha za dang ni ma mo dang / /drag po ma rungs nyer 'joms byed/ /sha za rnams kyi spyod pa ni/ /
150b6(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin ma rungs sems can brjod/ /gang du lha la rab dad dang / /rin chen chos dang blo mchog dang / /dge ba'i las dang rtag tu ldan/ /byams sems brtse bar ldan pa dang / /legs par spyod pa'i don ldan blo/ /gzhan gyi sdug
150b7(rgyud 'bum): bsngal dag la sems/ /sngags dang rig pa rnams kyis drangs/ /sman gyi don du kha zas spyod/ /gang du mtshan nyid la brten pas/ /spyod pa rgya cher bstan pa yin/ /gzhan gyi lus la gnas nas ni/ /mi lus brten nas
150b8(rgyud 'bum): gnas pa yin/ /lha ni mchod pa zhes bshad de/ /lha min nga rgyal can gyi rgyus/ /gnas der gnas pa'ang rnam pa gnyis/ /rim bzhin lha dang lha ma yin/ /de yang der ni rnam gnyis te/ /drag pa dang ni thun mong yin/ /de yang der
151a1(rgyud 'bum): ni rnam gnyis 'gro/ /dge dang mi dge 'gro ba lnga/ /der gnas rnam gsum 'gro ba ste/ /nyi shu sum cu grangs med pa'o/ /lha dbang dang ni 'og min par/ /go rims ji bzhin sa med pa'o/ /'jig rten khams ni mtha' med pa/ /dge
151a2(rgyud 'bum): dang mi dge 'jig rten yin/ /'khor spyod sems can ji snyed dang / /'phags pa nyan thos ji snyed dang / /sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / /de yi thugs las skyes sras dang / /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /sa bcu la ni
151a3(rgyud 'bum): rab gnas dang / /rtag tu sems can thams cad kyi/ /sems can skye gnas yang dag brten/ /byis pa'i skye bo thams cad kyi/ /'gro ba'i skye gnas rten pa dang / /rtag tu 'phags rnams thams cad kyi/ /mtshan nyid dang ni spyod pa
151a4(rgyud 'bum): dang / /tshig dang brda dang de nyid kyang / /rgya cher rab tu bshad par bya/ /sngags dang rgyud ni rig bcas pas/ /'byung po kun ni dgug par bya/ /dbab dang dgug pa'i sngags shes pas/ /gzhan gyi lus la yang dag brten/ /dge dang
151a5(rgyud 'bum): mi dge'i las shes zhing / /bag yod rigs ni bzang ba dang / /mi blun spyod pa'i sems can dang / /tshar gcad rjes gzung spyod pa dang / /'jig rten sa steng 'gugs byed pa/ /mi ni sngags zlos byed pa dag /de dag grub pa'i
151a6(rgyud 'bum): mtshan ma ni/ /de nyid thams cad bshad par bya/ /mi rnams kyi ni mdor bsdu na/ /de dag gi ni lus bzung nas/ /rtag tu shin tu chos don dang / /thar pa'i don du rnam par brtag /ma rungs rnams ni tshar gcad dang / /rnam
151a7(rgyud 'bum): dag rnams ni mchod pa ste/ /tshar gcad rjes gzung nyid la ni/ /sngags dang rgyud ni rab tu brtag /rlung dang bad kan mkhris can ni/ /rnam gsum dag la spyod pa'ang gsum/ /de dag zhi bar rab brtags la/ /
151a8(rgyud 'bum): rnam gsum nyid du rim par 'dod/ /mi rnams kyi ni gso ba la/ /sngags dang rgyud kyis rtag tu bya/ /'byung ba chen por rnam brtags pa/ /'byung dang 'byung min la sogs shes/ /'byung ba min dang 'byung ba dang / /
151b1(rgyud 'bum): lhag par 'byung ba de la brjod/ /skye bo gang tshe lhag 'byung zin/ /de tshe bde ba med par 'gyur/ /'byung dang 'byung min rnam pa ni/ /rnam pa gnyis su rab tu brtag /rtag tu sems can 'byung ba che/ /sems can
151b2(rgyud 'bum): ma yin rab tu brtag / mkhris pa bad kan de bzhin rlung / /gang gzhan rnam pa sna tshogs byas/ /'byung ba chen po bzhi dang ni/ /lnga pa dag ni nam mkhar brjod/ /chu dang me dang ldan pa dang / /sa dang rlung du yang dag ldan/ /
151b3(rgyud 'bum): blo dang ldan pas rtag tu yang / /sems can min pa'i grangs su bstan/ /'jig rten mchog gi bdag po dang / /'od chen ldan pas gsungs pa yin/ /sems can ma yin grangs su bstan/ /sems can grangs 'gro
151b4(rgyud 'bum): mi ma yin/ /blo mchog smra ba dam pa yis/ /mi rnams sems can nyid du gsungs/ /mi ma yin dang mi dag kyang / /rtag tu sems can grangs nyid do/ /sems can rnams la dge don du/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i gsung
151b5(rgyud 'bum): yang yin/ /'das dang ma byon sangs rgyas dang / /de bzhin da ltar byung rnams kyis/ /dge ba'i las kyi las byung phyir/ /las 'di dag ni yongs su gsungs/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsung dag pa/ /las ni don med mi byed de/ /
151b6(rgyud 'bum): de yi rgyu mtshan rigs dang spyi/ /grub pa nyid du rab snang ste/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang / /bde zhing zhi la rtag tu gtsang / /mthar thug dag dang bdag med dang / /don dam thar pa 'dod pa ste/ /de nyid chos ni btsal bya'i
151b7(rgyud 'bum): phyir/ /rgyud 'di yongs su bshad pa yin/ /rgyud dang sngags dang sman bzang po/ /bka' ni yang dag gsungs pa yin/ /byung dang 'byung 'gyur da ltar gyi/ /bstan bcos thams cad legs bsngags dang / /'jig rten
151b8(rgyud 'bum): mchog dang chos bdag med/ /rtag tu zhi dang shis pa'i gnas/ /'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i gsung / /de yi go 'phang mchog gnas pa/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'byung / /
152a1(rgyud 'bum): ma 'dres rab tu brtags pa yin/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi mthu dang ni/ /byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan dang / /sngags rnams kun gyi cho ga la/ /grub pa kun tu bstan pa yin/ /des na 'di nyid thub
152a2(rgyud 'bum): dbang gis/ /cho ga'i rgyal por gsungs pa yin/ /lus can rnams ni sngags tshul gyi/ /'di nyid kyi ni lam gyis 'gro/ /zhi ba nad med phun sum tshogs/ /mya ngan 'das grong phyin par 'gyur/ /mya ngan med
152a3(rgyud 'bum): dang rdul med dang / /rtag tu byang chub gzhol zhing shis/ /gang 'di bstan pa dag la ni/ /sngags kun 'don par byed pa na/ /kun mkhyen shes dang shes bya yi/ /las kyi rgyud ni 'brel pa dang / /sngags zlos pa yi ched
152a4(rgyud 'bum): du ni/ /rgyud rnams mtha' dag sa steng gsungs/ /sngags rgyud ma lus don dag ni/ /byang chub rnam gsum gzhol ba ste/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes dag /cho ga 'dir ni rab tu bstan/ /sems can rnams la'ang
152a5(rgyud 'bum): phan pa'i phyir/ /'jig rten kun la rab tu bskor/ /gzhan la cho ga rab snang ba/ /cho ga'i rgyal po 'di la'ang yod/ /thub mchog thub pa'i sras dag gis/ /gzhan du cho ga gang bstan pa/ /sngags rnams
152a6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad 'di la yod/ /de na cho ga rgya chen yin/ /de nyid phyir na thub dbang gis/ /lus can kun la gsungs pa yin/ /gang du cho ga'i rgyal po 'dis/ /dbang 'gyur min dang bkug min pa/ /sa steng 'jig rten
152a7(rgyud 'bum): gsum 'di na/ /rig pa'i sngags rgyal de yod min/ /thub pa'i zla ba rab nub cing / /sa yi dkyil 'khor stongs pa na/ /cho ga 'jig rten 'dir gnas pa/ /bstan pa'i don ni byed par 'gyur/ /'jam pa'i
152a8(rgyud 'bum): dbyangs ni rtag tu dge/ /'byung po kun la gzhon nu ni/ /de tshe sangs rgyas mdzad pa ni/ /'jig rten bstan la byed par 'gyur/ /cho ga'i rgyal po mthu la ni/ /yun ring dus su 'dod pa rnams/ /
152b1(rgyud 'bum): lan cig thos kyang grol 'gyur te/ /rtag tu de la 'grub par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung dag ni/ /rtag tu dge ba don yod 'gyur/ /sngags rnams kun la sngags pa ni/ /bzlas dang sbyin
152b2(rgyud 'bum): sreg rtag 'dod pa'o/ /dus gsum dag tu shes bya la/ /mkhyen pa gang du rab 'jug pa/ /de bzhin 'di la 'jug byed pa/ /cho ga'i rgyal po dam pa yin/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan pa ni/ /sngags
152b3(rgyud 'bum): su rab gnas de 'dir gsungs/ /sngags de rnam par mi rtog par/ /cho ga de 'dir gsungs pa yin/ /don dang don min sems can gyi/ /dge dang mi dge byed par 'gyur/ /de tshe 'gro ba blo bzhin du/ /'jig
152b4(rgyud 'bum): rten kun gyi dge mi dge/ /de nyid cho ga 'dir spros pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa spros pa med/ /'jig rten 'das pa rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /'jig rten phyir ni 'dir gsungs so/ /las
152b5(rgyud 'bum): rnams kun la shin tu lhag / 'jig rten las las rab tu 'das/ /chos rnams rnam pa sna tshogs byed/ /'jig rten kun gyis rab tu bsngags/ /sngags rgyal las la brtson par byed/ /
152b6(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin sems can tshogs la phan/ /gzhon nu 'jam pa'i dbyangs de ni/ /sangs rgyas mdzad pa byed par 'gyur/ /de don yon tan nges grub dang / /'jig rten khams kyi dge mi dge/ /bag med ma
152b7(rgyud 'bum): bskul ma yin te/ /bskul nas ngas ni chos bshad do/ /sems can ma lus phan nyid phyir/ /sangs rgyas kyis ni bshad pa yin/ /'das pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyis kyang / /bshad cing ngas kyang bshad pa
152b8(rgyud 'bum): yin/ /sangs rgyas gdung ni mi gcod phyir/ /bdag gis kyang ni bshad pa yin/ /sngags pa'i las rnams kun la ni/ /kun mkhyen ye shes 'byung don du'o/ /kun
153a1(rgyud 'bum): mkhyen ye shes rab 'jug la/ /las rnams gcig tu bsngags pa yin/ /'jig rten sngon las bdag yin te/ /de ni da ltar yongs su spyod/ /de bas las rnams rab tu bya/ /tshe 'dir dka' ba legs
153a2(rgyud 'bum): spyad cing / /las ldan tshe ni 'di la yang / /'bad pa med par sngags rnams 'grub/ /las ni 'di la'ang snang 'gyur na/ /skye ba 'di la 'grub par 'gyur/ /de bas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /las ni gcig
153a3(rgyud 'bum): pu rab tu bsngags/ /las de cho gar ldan pa na/ /de ni 'di la myur du 'grub/ /sems can byis pa cho ga nyams/ /rab tu rmongs pa 'khor bar 'gyur/ /de bas rnam pa kun gyis ni/ /las ni gcig pu rab
153a4(rgyud 'bum): bsngags yin/ /cho ga las ni yang dag ldan/ /sgrub pa pos ni bsgrub par bya/ /de bzhin cho ga nyams pa'i las/ /shin tu yun ring dag gis 'grub/ /bsam gtan med par thar pa med/ /thar pa med par
153a5(rgyud 'bum): bsam gtan med/ /de bas bsam gtan thar pa ni/ /yang dag ldan pa byang chub brjod/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga /byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo
153a6(rgyud 'bum): las/ las thams cad kyi bya ba'i don gyi le'u rab 'byam bcwa lnga pa rdzogs s+ho// // de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas gzhan yang gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la gzigs
153a7(rgyud 'bum): nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ blo dang ldan pa gnod sbyin gyi bdag po lag na rdo rjes nga la dris nas/ 'jam dpal khyod kyi don thams cad bya ba'i las kyi le'u rab 'byam
153a8(rgyud 'bum): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi nang du rgya cher sngar bstan pa yin no/ /sngags kun don dang ldan pa yi/ /rmi lam dge dang mi dge yin/ /des na zhar la 'di kun ni/ /sngags kyi zlos pa bstan pa yin/ /gnod sbyin
153b1(rgyud 'bum): bdag po yid dga' nas/ /thal sbyar spyi bor byas nas ni/ /ston la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ /de tshe tshig ni 'di skad zhus/ /'jig rten rjes su gzung don du/ /blo mchog rnams kyis gsungs pa dang / /
153b2(rgyud 'bum): bdag la'ang rjes su thugs brtse dang / /sems can rnams ni bde don du/ /zlos pa'i sngags ni thams cad la/ /rmi lam dge dang mi dge dang / /sems can mchog dang tha ma yi/ /spyod pa'i yon tan rgya cher
153b3(rgyud 'bum): bstan/ /bzang po'i 'gro ba'i skye gnas dang / /rgyu dang shes pa'i rnam pa spyod/ /'das dang ma 'ongs shes pa dang / /dge dang mi dge da ltar gyi/ /thams cad kun 'gro'i shes pa dang / /kun mkhyen ye shes spyod pa dang / /snang
153b4(rgyud 'bum): med dmigs pa med pa dang / /spros med rab tu spros pa yin/ /rnam pa kun mchog ldan pa dang / /shis pa zhi ba bstan pa yin/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi mthu rnams ni/ /blo mchog gis ni bstan pa yin/ /khyad par du ni zlos pa
153b5(rgyud 'bum): la/ /sngags rnams don dang ldan par bshad/ /las dang las 'bras sems can gyi/ /bya ba dus dang de bzhin du/ /de bzhin snod dang gnas dang ni/ /cha byad rmi lam zhar la gsungs/ /gnod sbyin bdag po thub mchog
153b6(rgyud 'bum): ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bdun pa la/ /gang zhig bskal bzang sangs rgyas pa/ /shAkya'i skyes mchog bdun pa 'di/ /shAkya'i seng ge dgra las rgyal/ /'di ni bdun par rab tu brtags/ /dus kyi tha mar rdzogs
153b7(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas/ /'jig rten mgon po 'od byed pa/ /brtson 'grus che zhing shes rab che/ /thub pa mthu ni chen po thob/ /lag na rdo rje gnod sbyin bdag /byang chub sems dpa' phyag byas te/ /rang gi gnas su 'dug
153b8(rgyud 'bum): gyur nas/ /blo ldan de nas cang mi smra/ /de nas 'jam dpal shes rab che/ /de tshe thub pas dris pa ni/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas la bskul ba ni/ /thub mchog dam pa tha ma la/ /legs so bcom ldan rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /
154a1(rgyud 'bum): las dang shes pa rgya cher bcas/ /bcas pa'i gza' ni gtso bo ste/ /dge dang mi dge legs tshul bshad/ /las dang shes pa rgyur bcas pa'i/ /sems can mang po'i spyod pa gsungs/ /mchog dang tha ma'i spyod
154a2(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / /dge ba'i don dang ldan pa dang / /zlos pa grub pa'i mtshan ma dang / /bsgrub bya sgrub min rnam par brtags/ /'byor pa 'dod dang de bzhin du/ /'jig rten dbang phyug longs spyod 'dod/ /rgyal po khyad par can 'dod dang / /rig
154a3(rgyud 'bum): pa 'dzin pa grub 'dod dang / /thams cad kun 'gro'i ye shes kyis/ /mdor bsdus nas ni bshad du gsol/ /rgyal ba'i sras kyis gsol btab nas/ /thub pa mchog gis gsungs pa ni/ /blo ldan ka la ping ka'i skad/ /
154a4(rgyud 'bum): lha yi rnga sgra'i skad dang ni/ /brtson 'grus chen po tshangs pa'i sgra/ /'brug sgra yi ni sgra skad kyis/ /thub pa bdun pas tshig bshad nas/ /sangs rgyas gsung ni dag pas gsungs/ /gzhon nu 'di ni dngos don khyab rgyur
154a5(rgyud 'bum): cing / /ma byung 'jig rten phan pa sgrub byed la/ /'gro ba kun la phan pa dge phyir ston/ /thar pa shes shing dag pa'i gnas su 'dug /bden dang brtse dang bzod pa phan sems dang / /gang zhig rtag tu byams dang sbyin la
154a6(rgyud 'bum): dga'/ /de dag rtag tu grub pa thob par byed/ /kye ma gzhan la'ang grub pa yod ma yin/ /rtag tu sngags mchog la ni dga' dad dam/ /bstan dang 'khor lo 'dzin dang 'jam mchog dang / /de ni bdud 'dul
154a7(rgyud 'bum): chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/ /'khor lo 'dzin par 'dir ni rigs pa yin/ /gang gi gsung ni bzang po yid 'ong zhing / /rtag tu byis pa'i skye bo rnam spangs yin/ /yid 'ong bzang po rnar ni snyan pa dang / /
154a8(rgyud 'bum): dga' skyed snyan pa dang ni rjes su mthun/ /sems ni tshim byed bde ba rab tu sbyin/ /'jam zhes bya bar sangs rgyas yang dag gsung / /de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i khyad par gyis/ /gang gis mthu ni mkhyen
154b1(rgyud 'bum): par mi spyod de/ /de dag gi sras de bzhin sar zhugs pa/ /'jig rten 'das pa de bzhin bcu yi grangs/ /khyod kyang lha yi dbang phyug 'jig rten khyad par gyis/ /thub bzang shes par nus pa ma yin no/ /gzugs
154b2(rgyud 'bum): dang gzugs med de bzhin sa gnas dang / /'dod ldan lha dang mi ni yid las skyes/ /rnal 'byor grub pa thob dang 'jig rten na/ /khyad par can kun de bzhin mi yi gtso/ /de yi che ba gang gis shes gyur pa/ /sems
154b3(rgyud 'bum): can gang de yod pa ma yin te/ /khyod kyi che ba 'di ni yongs shes pa/ /'jam zhes bya bar rab shes sangs rgyas yin/ /'jam dpal zhes byar yongs su brtags pa ni/ /khyod kyi ming ni sngon gyi rgyal bas mdzad/ /
154b4(rgyud 'bum): khyod kyi ming du 'di ltar brtags byas pa/ /'das dang ma byon da ltar sangs rgyas kyi/ /gzhan du ma yengs rtse gcig yid dag pas/ /khyod kyi ming ni 'khor gyi nang du thos/ /des ni 'di la shis dang zhi ba thob/ /
154b5(rgyud 'bum): srid mthar byang chub mchog ni khyad par thob/ /sngags rnams ma lus 'grub par 'gyur ba dang / /'gro ba'i skye gnas mchog ni rab thob cing / /rtag tu chos mchog la ni yang dag gnas/ /bgegs rnams
154b6(rgyud 'bum): rnam par spang shing grub pa thob/ /'dod pa'i sngags rnams ma lus 'grub par byed/ /byang chub shing dbang drung du myur du 'gro/ /song nas byang chub mchog ni thob par byed/ /song nas sems can phan phyir
154b7(rgyud 'bum): der 'dug ste/ /sangs rgyas byang chub 'khor lo rab tu skor/ /de ltar rgyal ba'i gtso bos yon tan gsungs/ /'jam dpal zhes ni khyod kyi ming dran pa/ /yon tan bsam mi khyab ces rgyal bas gsungs/ /
154b8(rgyud 'bum): rgyal ba'i gtso bo sngar gshegs thams cad kyis/ /rtag tu khyod kyi mthu ni bstan pa yin/ /gzhon nu dag pa khyod kyi sngags rtogs pa/ /bskal pa grangs med rtag tu'ang ston mi nus/ /'jam dpal
155a1(rgyud 'bum): khyod kyi sngags kyi spyod pa ni/ /sangs rgyas ma lus dag gis rab tu bshad/ /gzhon nu 'di ni thams cad kun tu 'gro/ /nga yi bstan la khyod ni mi mchog bstan/ /dag pa'i gnas la gnas pa'i skye bo
155a2(rgyud 'bum): rnams/ /'dir ni ma lus mtha' dag zhi bar 'gyur/ /khyod kyi sngags ni nam yang 'da' ma gyur/ /khyod kyi sngags ni nam yang nyams ma gyur/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga /
155a3(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/ /tshigs su bcad pa'i le'u rab 'byam bcu drug pa rdzogs s+ho// //
155a4(rgyud 'bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa snyoms par
155a5(rgyud 'bum): zhugs ma thag tu/ smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas 'od zer sngon po dang ser po dang dkar po dang le brgan dang shel gyi kha dog lta bu byung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad kyang snang bar byas
155a6(rgyud 'bum): shing / 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag kyang snang bar mdzad nas/ gza' dang rgyu skar thams cad kyang yud tsam gyis zil gyis mnan te bkug par gyur to/ /bkug nas kyang rang rang gi gnas la yang
155a7(rgyud 'bum): dag par sbyar nas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor der sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis bkug nas bcom ldan 'das kyi mdzod spu de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /gza' dang rgyu skar dang skar ma thams
155a8(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi 'od med par byas nas nyam thag pa dang 'jigs pas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la skyabs su 'gro zhing thal mo sbyar nas 'dug par gyur te/ de ltar rab tu 'dar zhing yang dang yang sa'i steng du
155b1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyel bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas gza' dang rgyu skar dang skar ma thams cad la mkhas pa rnams dang / byis pa'i skye bo'i blo dang ldan pa'i sems can rjes su gzung ba'i phyir
155b2(rgyud 'bum): bka' stsal pa ni/ lha'i tshogs mi dang bcas pa'i grogs po dag khyed cag nyon cig /'jig rten sna tshogs ni las nyid la sems can rnams rnam par rten par byed de/ gang yang sangs rgyas
155b3(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyi rdo rje'i sku yang mngon par grub la/ gang yang lha dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten yang 'khor zhing / 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa chen por rab tu zhugs la/ 'jig rten rnam pa sna tshogs
155b4(rgyud 'bum): kyi lus mngon par grub ste/ thams cad kyang las dge ba dang mi dge ba dang 'brel ba las skyes la/ de la byed pa'i byed pa po'am dbang phyug gam gtso bo'am skyes bu'am grangs can gyis rab tu 'byin par byed pa ni
155b5(rgyud 'bum): gang yang med do/ /las las skyes pa ni ma gtogs te/ de yang las kyi rkyen gyis skyed pa rgyu la ltos pa yin te/ de yang rgyu dang rkyen la ltos pa'o/ /de bzhin du rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i rkyen phan tshun
155b6(rgyud 'bum): du 'byung ba nye bar 'brel ba yin te/ lhag ma 'byung po rnams mngon par 'grub pa ni 'byung ba chen po las skyes pa yin te/ 'byung ba chen po de yang ma 'ongs pa'i phung po gzhan dag tu 'gro bar skye bar 'gyur zhing / skyes nas
155b7(rgyud 'bum): kyang 'gro ba dang / yul gzhan rgya che ba'i rnam par dbye ba dag tu skye bar 'gyur te/ dus gzhan na lugs las bzlog ste 'gag pa na ye shes kyi mes bskul te/ las kyis bsags pa'i bag chags mtha' dag mngon par
155b8(rgyud 'bum): bsregs nas/ theg pa rnam pa gsum mnyam zhing spros pa med par yang dag par bsgrub par 'gyur ro/ /theg pa chen po ni dus ring por nye bar chags pa'i las bdag gir byed pa dang / dus bar ma ni rang rgyal ba bse
156a1(rgyud 'bum): ru lta bu rang byung gi shes rab rab tu 'byung ba dang / gzhan gyi sgra'i rjes su 'jug pa nyan thos ni dus thung ngus mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'o/ /chos gzhan la blo nyid 'jug par 'gyur ba ni ma yin te/
156a2(rgyud 'bum): byis pa rnams kyi rnam par rmongs pa nyid dang ji ste yang 'jig rten sna tshogs gnas pa 'di ni las las skyes pa yin te/ phyogs dang cha byad zhig na nad med pa'i go 'phang mya ngan med pa/ rdul med pa las kyis 'jig rten grub
156a3(rgyud 'bum): pa la ltos pa yin te/ dri ma med pa'i lam rnam par grol ba/ yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa/ shin tu bsil ba'i las nyid kyis byed de/ las gzhan la ltos pa ma yin zhing las dang las ma yin pa las rnam par grol
156a4(rgyud 'bum): te/ spros pa med pa la nye bar gnas pa yin no/ /theg pa rnam gsum rab 'jug las/ /zhi ba gzhan yang yod min te/ /sngags kyang rnam pa gsum du 'gyur/ /rnam gsum las su yang dag bsgrags/ /de las
156a5(rgyud 'bum): rnam zlos rnam gsum las/ /rnam pa gsum du rab tu snang / /rigs kyang rnam gsum gsungs pa ni/ /sngags rnams kun gyi gzhi yang yin/ /rigs gsum rnam pa brgyad du yang / /rgyud dag la ni rab tu snang / /rnam pa
156a6(rgyud 'bum): gcig tu'ang rigs snang ste/ /sngags rnams kun gyi gnas kyang yin/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi dag pa'i thugs/ /rigs ni zhi ba mya ngan 'das/ /yan lag so so de nyid las/ /sngags rnams kun tu rab tu bstan/ /'jig rten skar
156a7(rgyud 'bum): mkhan yan lag ni/ /grub pa'i rgyur ni rab tu brtag /de nyid yan lag las yin te/ /rkyen gyi yan lag dag la 'jug /ji ltar sA lu'i 'bru rnams ni/ /myu gus rnam par shes par byed/ /de bzhin grub pa'i rdzas
156a8(rgyud 'bum): rnams ni/ /mtshan nyid kyis ni rnam par shes/ /ji ltar kha dog dkar po ni/ /tha snyad kyis ni rnam par brtags/ /de bzhin skar ma ldan pas ni/ /tha snyad don du rab tu brtag /thams cad du ni thams cad ldan/ /
156b1(rgyud 'bum): las ni gcig pu rab tu bsngags/ /las rnams med par mtshon pa med/ /gang na'ang lus ni yod ma yin/ /rgyu mtshan dang ni spyod pa dang / /skye ba dang ni rigs dang gnas/ /rtag tu la nye sna tshogs pa/ /las de las ni
156b2(rgyud 'bum): nye bar dmigs/ /las ni gang du'ang lus can min/ /nang na gnas shing mtshon pa med/ /kun nas skye bo rgas pa na/ /rnam par 'gyur las nye bar dmigs/ /de bzhin lus la brten nas ni/ /las ni lus can dag la
