156b3(rgyud 'bum): snang / /'bras bu dge dang mi dge'i rtags/ /skye bar yang ni rab brjod dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs la nye bzang / /las rnams sna tshogs dag las byung / /dus tshod de bzhin 'gro ba dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs srog chags sgra/ /
156b4(rgyud 'bum): grub dang ma grub mtshan ma ni/ /rkyen gyi don la ltos pa yin/ /rgyu mtshan spyod dang mtshan ma ni/ /rkyen la mngon par rab tu brtag /de bas rnam kun 'bad nas ni/ /rkyen la rag las bya ba yin/ /zlos pa'i sngags
156b5(rgyud 'bum): rnams rtag tu ni/ /grub pa rgyu la ltos pa yin/ /'di dag rkyen gyi yan lag ni/ /las ni bdag gir byed pas mtshon/ /mi mtshon sngags rnams thams cad ni/ /bgegs las shin tu mi bzad 'gyur/ /de
156b6(rgyud 'bum): bas 'di dag thams cad kyi/ /yan lag tu ni thub pas gsungs/ /sa dbang rgyal po thams cad mkhyen/ /byang chub snying por ting 'dzin thob/ /sngags ni yongs su gsungs pa na/ /bgegs rnams ma lus
156b7(rgyud 'bum): rab tu 'jig / rmi lam ngan dang mtshan ma ngan/ /bzod par dka' ba'ang rnam par 'joms/ /kun mkhyen bdag nyid chen po yi/ /de thugs byang chub la zhugs pa/ /ma rungs bdud kyi sems kyis ni/ /
156b8(rgyud 'bum): bgegs chen 'jigs par ga la 'gyur/ /de nas 'jigs pa chen po ni/ /des ni rgyu mtshan med par snang / /rnam pa sna tshogs 'jigs pa rnams/ /de la rgyu mtshan med par 'byung / /de ni bsod nams stobs bskyed pa/ /
157a1(rgyud 'bum): yun ring dus su yongs su bsngags/ /de yi sngags kyi stobs kyis ni/ /de tshe bdud ni bcom par 'gyur/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing brtson 'grus che/ /de ni 'od chen ldan par gyur/ /de yi sngags kyis
157a2(rgyud 'bum): mthu yis ni/ /byang chub dam pa thob par gyur/ /rmi lam ngan pa nyer 'jig pa/ /sngags de 'dir ni bshad par bya/ /gang dag sa la spyod pa yi/ /'byung po'i tshogs kun rab nyon cig /rmi lam ngan pa bzod
157a3(rgyud 'bum): dka' dang / /ma rungs sems can zlog byed pa/ /rgyal ba sA la'i dbang po yi/ /sngon ni sngags rgyal yongs gsungs pa/ /lha yi tshogs dang gza' rnams dang / /rgyu skar skar mkhan rnams nyon cig /
157a4(rgyud 'bum): gza' dang rgyu skar skar ma rnams/ /ma rungs tshar gcad don dang ni/ /'byung po rnams ni thams cad kyang / /zhi ba'i sems ni rab bskyed phyir/ /gang dag sa la spyod pa dag /rkang med rkang mang dag dang
157a5(rgyud 'bum): ni/ /rkang gnyis dang ni rkang bzhi dang / /mdor na sems can thams cad ni/ /'gro ba dang ni gnas pa yi/ /'byung po'i tshogs rnams kun nyon cig /na maH sarba bud+d+ha nA~M/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nA~M/
157a6(rgyud 'bum): kha kha khA hi khA hi hU~M hU~M dz+wa la dz+wa la/ pra dz+wa la pra dz+wa la/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha Sh+Ti phaT phaT swA hA/ gtsug tor 'bar ba zhes bsgrags pa'i/ /sngags 'di sngags rnams kun gyi mchog /gang zhig las rnams stong
157a7(rgyud 'bum): phrag ni/ /dgu bcu rtsa bzhi dag dang ni/ /bkra shis thams cad 'dod pa yi/ /rnam pa sna tshogs las rnams byed/ /rmi lam ngan dang mtshan ma ngan/ /lan cig bzlas pas sel bar byed/ /las rnams
157a8(rgyud 'bum): gzhan yang byed pa ni/ /sngags rnams kun gyi bdag po yin/ /'byung po kun la dbang byed pa/ /bla ma mnga' bdag sangs rgyas 'di/ /sngags 'di dran pa tsam gyis ni/ /sngags rnams ma
157b1(rgyud 'bum): lus rab tu sems/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas pa lha yi lha/ /thub mchog gis ni de gsungs nas/ /yud tsam mi gsung bzhugs nas ni/ /cung zad dus ni bzhes par mdzad/ /de tshe gnas gtsang gnas
157b2(rgyud 'bum): pa yi/ /lha tshogs dag kyang 'dug par 'gyur/ /lha rnams gtso bo thams cad ni/ /rgyu skar gza' dang skar ma rnams/ /gtsug tor sngags kyi byin rlabs kyis/ /'jigs shing dam tshig la gnas phyir/ /
157b3(rgyud 'bum): gtsug tor zhes bya mthu bo che/ /mthu mnyam mthu ni chen po ste/ /brgya phrag lnga 'am bzhi 'am ni/ /de bzhin bdun nam brgyad dang dgu/ /gnyis dang drug dang lnga dang bdun/ /gtsug tor dbang por rab
157b4(rgyud 'bum): tu bsgrags/ /de ltar grangs dang grangs med ni/ /gtsug tor rgyal po dge ba yin/ /de dag dang ni sngags 'di mtshungs/ /sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams kyis bshad/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho
157b5(rgyud 'bum): ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/ las bdag gir byas pa'i rkyen gyi le'u rab 'byam las bcu bdun pa rdzogs s+ho// // de nas bcom
157b6(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das shAkya thub pas rgyu skar dang gza' dang skar ma dang skar mkhan thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa dang / phyogs thams cad du rnam par gnas pa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa'i
157b7(rgyud 'bum): mchog rnams la bka' stsal pa/ grogs po dag khyed cag nyon cig /gza' dang rgyu skar thams cad kyi mthu'i tshig khyed cag thams cad dag la yang ston cig /khyed kyi sngags bya ba'i don thams cad
157b8(rgyud 'bum): kyang sgrubs shig / khyed kyis dam tshig la yang gnas par gyis shig /sngags kyi rgyal po 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis bstan pa 'di grub na/ de nas gzhan cho ga'i rgyal po grub pa la yang khyed cag yid dad par gyis shig
158a1(rgyud 'bum): ces so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas/ gza' rnams kyi spyod pa sems can thams cad kyi don du gsungs te/ zlos pa thams cad la phan pa'i phyir dang sngags kyi don yang rab tu
158a2(rgyud 'bum): bsgrubs pa'i phyir thams cad kyang thams cad mkhyen pas gsungs so/ /tha skar dang ni bra nye dang / /smin drug dang po'i rgyu skar te/ /rgyu skar gsum po 'di dag la/ /mig dmar gza' ni bdag po yin/ /lug ni
158a3(rgyud 'bum): khyim du bstan pa ste/ /'di la grub pa yod ma yin/ /grub mchog bar ma tha ma nyid/ /grub pa yin par 'dod pa yin/ /las rnams kun tu'ang mi 'gro zhing / /ma rungs gza' ni rnam par zlog /snar ma
158a4(rgyud 'bum): mgo dang de bzhin du/ /lag tu rgyu skar brjod pa yin/ /rgyu skar nab so rgyal dang ni/ /skag tu'ang rab tu brjod pa yin/ /mchu dang de bzhin gre dang dbo/ /de bzhin me bzhi nag pa dang / /sa ri sa ga lha mtshams
158a5(rgyud 'bum): dang / /na dang de bzhin snrubs dang ni/ /chu ni stod smad dge ba ste/ /zlos pa la phan rab tu bsngags/ /rgyu skar gro bzhin mon gru ni/ /drag po'i las la rab tu bsngags/ /mon gre khrums ni stod smad
158a6(rgyud 'bum): gnyis/ /rgyu skar grub pa'i rgyu yin no/ /nam gru las skye dpal dang ldan/ /'thab la dga' zhing 'jigs pa med/ /rgyu skar lhag ma gtso bo ni/ /dus kyi tha mar 'byung ba min/ /byi bzhin legs par spyod
158a7(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / /grub dang bsod nams rab tu bsgrags/ /nye rgyal dang ni tha chungs dang / /'dod pa dag ni nyid yin no/ /yang dag bden dang 'jig rten dang / /snang bar yang ni brjod pa yin/ /longs spyod sbyin dang dge sbyin
158a8(rgyud 'bum): dang / /ma 'gags pa dang 'gags pa nyid/ /grags sbyin gzi brjid rgyal po dang / /de bzhin rgyal po 'jig rten dang / /rgyu skar mang po gsungs pa ste/ /stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi'o/ /dus kyi tha ma 'di la ni/ /'di dag
158b1(rgyud 'bum): gi ni nus pa yod/ /cho ga rgyal 'di bde don du/ /de tsam shes par gsungs pa yin/ /rang nyid 'od ldan sems can ni/ /de yi dus su rdzogs ldan yin/ /thams cad nam mkha' la 'gro zhing / /rga dang 'chi ba rnam par spangs/ /
158b2(rgyud 'bum): de yi dus su rgyu skar med/ /nyi ma zla ba skar ma med/ /lha dang lha min 'jig rten med/ /dang po'i dus ni dus mchog yin/ /ming med rigs kyang yod ma yin/ /tshes dang skye ba'i skar ma med/ /smyung ba med cing sngags
158b3(rgyud 'bum): kyang med/ /dge dang mi dge'i las kyang med/ /'di dag rang dgar spyod pa ste/ /bza' dang bza' bar bya ba'ang med/ /'di dag nad med dag pa ste/ /rtag tu sems can rnam mang po/ /de nas dus ni bri ba na/ /'jig
158b4(rgyud 'bum): rten snod min rab tu 'jug / sngon gyi las kyis drangs nas ni/ /de nas sa yi steng du 'gro/ /sa steng lha gnas gzhal med khang / /lha dang lha min yang dag byung / /bar ma'i dus su phyin gyur nas/ /mi yi lus la
158b5(rgyud 'bum): yang dag brten/ /bza' dang btung la brkam chags pas/ /'od de dag ni rab tu nyams/ /lus ni sra ba nyid gyur cing / /dge dang mi dge rnam par spyod/ /de nas nyin zhag zla ba dang / /gza' yi 'od ni byung bar gyur/ /
158b6(rgyud 'bum): de nas bzung nas gang cung zad/ /skar ma'i dpyad shes pa nyid dang / /sems can rjes su gzung bar brjod/ /ngas ni de dag bstan pa yin/ /sngon ni drang srong cha byad gyur/ /blo ldan tshangs pa'i cha byad dang / /dbang phyug
158b7(rgyud 'bum): chen po'i lus bstan cing / /yang na khyab 'jug cha byad kyis/ /nam mkha' lding gi lus spyad dang / /gnod sbyin srin po dri za dang / /sha za dag gis lus nyid gyur/ /skye dang skye bar bdag nyid skyes/ /byang chub sems
158b8(rgyud 'bum): dpa' mkhas par ni/ /de dang der ni skye ba la/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod don phyir/ /rtag tu skye ba'i dbang gis so/ /bdag nyid de tshe dus dag tu/ /sngon ni byang chub sems dpar gyur/ /mi shes mun pas bsgribs pa yi/ /
159a1(rgyud 'bum): bdag ni de tshe byis par gyur/ /'jig rten ji snyed yod pa yi/ /khyab 'jug gis byas gzo spyad dang / /lugs kyi bstan bcos sngon gyi rabs/ /de bzhin rig byed brda sprod pa/ /sdeb sbyor skar ma'i dpyad nyid dang / /rtsis
159a2(rgyud 'bum): dang sgyu rtsal 'dod pa dang / /log shes de bzhin shes pa dang / /de bzhin log par spyod nyid dang / /'jig rten bstan bcos thams cad ni/ /yun ring bdag gis sngon bstan to/ /zhi ba thub bdag ji lta bar/ /ye shes bdag
159a3(rgyud 'bum): gis thob ma yin/ /byang chub rgyu ni grol don dang / /de bzhin du ni thar pa'i phyir/ /'khor ba'i btson rar rab bcings pas/ /las rnams las kyang bdag ma grol/ /zhi ba rnam rgyal sangs rgyas nyid/ /ma nyams go 'phang mya
159a4(rgyud 'bum): ngan 'das/ /yun ring don du mngon 'dod cing / /legs par yongs su btsal bas thob/ /de ltar bdag gis rig ldan pas/ /tshegs chung bya bas thob pa yin/ /rgyal bas sngon ni bstan pas na/ /rang byung ye shes
159a5(rgyud 'bum): thob pa yin/ /de 'dra'i gnas ni rab mthong ba/ /phyi rol lam gyis thob ma yin/ /byang chub rgyu ni rnyed dka' bas/ /'khor ba'i dgon par 'khyams pa yin/ /bdag gi rang byung 'di 'dra ba/ /ye shes bdag
159a6(rgyud 'bum): gis thob pa min/ /rig pa bzang po'i las dga' bas/ /da ni mya ngan 'das pa thob/ /bdag gis bstan bcos 'di dag ni/ /bsdus pa 'ba' zhig byas pa yin/ /las las grol ba med par ni/ /
159a7(rgyud 'bum): grub pa'i rgyu ni rnyed ma yin/ /'khor ba'i yun ring zhags pa 'dis/ /las kyi 'ching bas nges par bcings/ /de yi 'gro 'di bdag nyid che/ /dge dang mi dge'ang smin par 'gyur/ /rgyu skar gza' dang skar ma'i dpyad/ /
159a8(rgyud 'bum): mtshon par byed pa kho nar zad/ /chos dang mi ldan mi rnams dang / /gzhan la rtags ni snang mi 'gyur/ /de nyid kyis na gza' gsungs pa/ /dge dang mi dge'i rjes gzung phyir/ /'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dag
159b1(rgyud 'bum): dang / /khams ni bzhi po dag dang ni/ /chu dang sa dang rlung dang me/ /nam mkhar yongs su bstan pa yin/ /'byung ba yang dag bsdu ba'i phyir/ /'di dag 'byung ba chen po yin/ /sems can yang dag bsdu ba'i
159b2(rgyud 'bum): phyir/ /bag med las kyis byas pa yin/ /de dag dus ni nges pa yis/ /sngags rnams grub par 'gyur ba yin/ /de yi skye ba 'bad pa yis/ /dge dang mi dge bsrung bar bya/ /rang bzhin gyis ni 'jig rten gtso/ /
159b3(rgyud 'bum): lha yi dbang phyug brgya byin sogs/ /de yang de tshe de dus su/ /dus kyi mthar ni yongs su brtags/ /dus kyi tha ma dag la ni/ /sngags rnams grub pa nges pa yin/ /de nyid kyis na thub dbang gis/ /gzhon nu yongs su brtags pa ni/ /shes rab chen po
159b4(rgyud 'bum): 'jam pa'i dbyangs/ /byis pa gzhon nu'i gzugs dang ldan/ /'jig rten 'dir ni kun tu rgyu/ /sems can rjes su gzung bar bzod/ /de yi dus su grub pa ni/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs ni rab tu mthong / /rgyu skar
159b5(rgyud 'bum): skar ma'i dpyad shes pa/ /de yi tshe na 'byung bar 'gyur/ /nyi shu rtsa bdun rgyu skar dang / /yud tsam dag tu rab tu bsgrags/ /dus kyi tha ma de la ni/ /bcu gnyis khyim yang yod pa yin/ /rgyu skar tshogs la brten nas ni/ /
159b6(rgyud 'bum): de dag gza' ni rnam par dbye/ /thams cad so sor gyur pa ni/ /'jam dpal gyis ni so sor mdzad/ /skye ba dang ni spyod pa nyid/ /khyim rnams kun la rab tu gnas/ /skye bo rmongs pas khyab 'gyur la/ /
159b7(rgyud 'bum): dge dang mi dge'i 'bras bu 'byung / /de nyid las kyi 'ching ba yis/ /de dag khyim ni yang dang yang / /sems can rnams kyis grub pa tsam/ /dge dang mi dge rtog par byed/ /rgyu skar snar mar ldan par
159b8(rgyud 'bum): ni/ /skye bar yongs su rab brtags pa/ /dpal ldan bzod pa phun sum tshogs/ /tshe ring bu ni mang ba dang / /rtag tu de tshe nor skal ldan/ /de ni dmag gi bdag po byed/ /'di ni khyu mchog
160a1(rgyud 'bum): khyim skyes na/ /khyu mchog nyid la yongs su 'chi/ /mgo nyid la ni 'jig rten shes/ /chos ldan mthong na dga' bar 'gyur/ /smin drug char skyes rtag tu ni/ /sa bdag rgyal por snang ba ste/ /
160a2(rgyud 'bum): yang dag skye ba de la brten/ /rtag tu rgya mtsho gsum bdag 'gyur/ /phyogs gcig skyes pa bgrod dka' ba'i/ /phyogs gcig rgyal por 'gyur ba yin/ /gza' ni bla mas mtshan pa yi/ /gal te skye bar 'byung
160a3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur na/ /sa ni khor yug ma lus par/ /rjes su spyod par 'gyur ba yin/ /lo ni bcu dang lnga po nyid/ /de yi rgyal thabs byed par 'gyur/ /tha skar bra nye nyid dang ni/ /smin drug cha las skyes gyur
160a4(rgyud 'bum): pa/ /khyim 'di dag gi nus pa ni/ /tshong gi don gyis nor sgrub 'gyur/ /gal te skyes pa des byung na/ /dbang phyug longs spyod phun sum tshogs/ /rgyu skar 'di la skyes pa na/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
160a5(rgyud 'bum): dmar bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin nyi ma nub pa na/ /de ni 'chi bar 'gyur ba yin/ /ma rungs tsham tshom med pa dang / /bden par smra ba ma yin dang / /lus kyi lpags srab dmar ba'i mdog /sa yi steng na de
160a6(rgyud 'bum): snang ngo / /'di yi 'gro ba skad cig ni/ /mig 'byed 'dzums su rab tu bstan/ /'di yi bar du gang skyes pa/ /rgya che yon tan de 'di yin/ /se gol gtogs gnas tsam du ni/ /'di yi 'gro ba rab tu bstan/ /
160a7(rgyud 'bum): des na de dag 'gro ba nyams/ /gza' rnams kyis ni mthong ma yin/ /skye ba rnam par 'dris gyur pa'i/ /sems can rnam pa sna tshogs skye/ /'dres pa'i 'gro ba phun sum tshogs/ /'dren pa'i longs spyod ldan
160a8(rgyud 'bum): pa yin/ /de nyid kyis na mi skye ste/ /skye ba nyid na brjod pa yin/ /skye ba'i skar ma sum cu ni/ /dge dang mi dge'i 'bras bu 'byung / /gza' ni mig dmar gyis mtshan pa/ /'di ni ma rungs skye bar 'gyur/ /
160b1(rgyud 'bum): gsus che lus ni snum pa dang / /mig dkyus ring zhing snyan par smra/ /gza' ni phur bus bltas pa ni/ /rtag tu brtan ldan skye bar 'gyur/ /chu tshod zung tsam nyi ma dang / /zla ba'i lha ni rab bshad pa/ /de bzhin rtag tu
160b2(rgyud 'bum): nyin mtshan la/ /yang dag skye bar 'dod pa yin/ /phyin ci log pa'i skye ba gzhan/ /phyin ci log tu'ang brtags pa yin/ /gza' ni mi dge mthong ba dang / /mi dge'i skye ba dge mi dge/ /mi dge'i 'bras bu grub pa dang / /
160b3(rgyud 'bum): yang dag skye ba bzang po 'byung / /'gro ba'i skye gnas la brten nas/ /khyim la skye bar rab tu gnas/ /gza' ni ngan spong bus mtshan pa/ /sbyin byed sems dpa' che ba ste/ /lag dang nab so dag dang ni/ /
160b4(rgyud 'bum): skag gi cha la rab tu brjod/ /'di dag la skyes gtong ba che/ /g.yo sgyu can ni bab col byed/ /don dang don med 'byor ba la/ /rtag tu brkam chag bud med chags/ /gzhan gyi bud med mngon 'gro zhing / /de nyid
160b5(rgyud 'bum): nag po la spyod dang / /dud pa'i mdog 'drar skye 'gyur te/ /drag cing 'khrig pa la yang dga'/ /sbyor ba'i khyim la rab brten nas/ /de ni spen pa dag la skye/ /nyin dang mtshan du yang dang yang / /der gnas
160b6(rgyud 'bum): spen pa rgyu bar byed/ /de las skyes pa nyi ma phyed/ /sems ni stobs dang ldan par 'gyur/ /de yi dus la gang skyes pa/ /de yi mtshan nyid brjod par bya/ /nor ni grub par 'gyur ba dang / /dbang phyug gis ni
160b7(rgyud 'bum): legs mtshan pa'o/ /rgyu skar de bzhin rgyal dang ni/ /skag la yang ni gang skyes pa/ /'di ni sbal pa'i khyim yin te/ /dge dang ldan zhing rdzu 'phrul che/ /mdog ni ser po dang ldan zhing / /de ni skye ba mchog tu bstan/ /
160b8(rgyud 'bum): rtag tu de bzhin mtshan phyed du/ /'di ni skye bar bstan pa yin/ /de yi dus kyi tshad la ni/ /gal te sems can skye bar 'dod/ /cho ga mthong ba'i rgyu yis na/ /'di ni don rnams thams cad sgrub/ /de ni shin tu gzhon pa nas/ /
161a1(rgyud 'bum): rgyal thabs byed cing nor rnams thob/ /mdog ni ser dang sngo bsangs ni/ /kha dog rgyas pa snang bar 'gyur/ /gtsang sbra'i spyod la dga' ba dang / /de ni dpal ldan 'jigs med skye/ /mchu dang de bzhin gre dang
161a2(rgyud 'bum): ni/ /de bzhin dbo yi cha dag ni/ /snang byed kyi ni zhing du 'gyur/ /seng ge'i khyim du bya ba yin/ /de la skyes pa dpa' bo che/ /sha yi kha zas de la dga'/ /ri yi rdzong la brten nas ni/ /rgyal thabs dbang phyug
161a3(rgyud 'bum): byed par 'gyur/ /gal te der skyes thob gyur na/ /zhing la gnas shing des sdom rten/ /de bzhin nyi ma 'char ba na/ /skyes pa 'di la brjod pa yin/ /rgyu skar dbo yi cha dang ni/ /de bzhin me bzhi nag pa nyid/ /rgyu
161a4(rgyud 'bum): skar de la skye gnas pa/ /mi ni yongs su dpa' bar 'gyur/ /sdom min gzhan gyi bud med 'gro/ /de ni dmag dpon byed par 'gyur/ /gal te skye ba thob 'gyur na/ /nges par rgyal thabs byed par 'gyur/ /gang du
161a5(rgyud 'bum): skar ma de dag gnas/ /'di ni bu mo'i khyim du 'gyur/ /'di yi bdag po gza' lhag ste/ /kha cig tu ni gzhan yang yin/ /'di dag skar ma mchog la ni/ /gza' ni mi bzad bsrung bar 'gyur/ /zla ba yang ni bzang ba
161a6(rgyud 'bum): ste/ /yang na zla ba'i bu bdag yin/ /nyin phyed rdzogs na skye ba ni/ /'di yi skye bar snang ba yin/ /nag pa'i cha dang sa ri dang / /sa ga'i phyed kyis lhag pa la/ /srang gi khyim ste bzang po'i don/ /zla ba la spyod
161a7(rgyud 'bum): sems can gyi/ /'di ni mi bzad zhing yin te/ /skal med ma yin nor gyi gnas/ /'di yi skye ba skye gyur gnas/ /mtshan mo'i thun gyi tha ma'o/ /mi ni 'di la skyes gyur pa/ /rtag tu btung ba dag la dad/ /
161a8(rgyud 'bum): spyi mtshan ma yin ngo tsha med/ /mang pos bkur cing mchod pa dang / /la lar rgyal srid longs spyod dang / /nor chen thob par 'gyur ba yin/ /nges med skye ba yongs snang zhing / /byis par mas ni spangs pa yin/ /gal te
161b1(rgyud 'bum): skye ba thob 'gyur na/ /bu mang bde ba skye bar 'gyur/ /rgyu skar lha mtshams las skyes pa/ /bzo yi las ni sgrub pa dang / /byams pa'i bdag nyid grogs po mang / /rtag tu dpa' zhing rtul phod che/ /'jig rten snron la
161b2(rgyud 'bum): skyes pa ni/ /mi ni rab gtum brtan pa yin/ /sdug bsngal mang po bzod pa dang / /mi ni ma rungs skye bar 'gyur/ /khyim ni sdig par bshad pa ste/ /rtag tu rno zhing bab col byed/ /'di dag nyid la rtag skyes pa/ /skye
161b3(rgyud 'bum): bar yang dag brjod pa yin/ /de bzhin nyin phyed nyi ma la/ /gal te mi ni skye gyur na/ /drag cing g.yul las rnam rgyal ba'i/ /rgyal por de ni nges par 'gyur/ /byis pa gzhon nu'i gzugs yod pa'i/ /
161b4(rgyud 'bum): de yi skad cig gzas mthong 'gyur/ /sa yi lha mo'i bur gyur pa/ /gang yin de ni mig dmar gsungs/ /de nyid phyir na sa la spyod/ /rang bu nyid kyis gsod par byed/ /de las gzhan pa bzlog pas
161b5(rgyud 'bum): ni/ /dge dang mi dge'i skye ba nyid/ /tshe ring gzi brjid ldan pa dang / /shes ldan nyid du'ang skye bar 'gyur/ /lha mtshams la ni rab skyes pa/ /shes rab che zhing grogs la byams/ /mig dmar gyi ni zhing 'di yin/ /
161b6(rgyud 'bum): yang na rtag tu gza' 'dres yin/ /rgyu skar snrubs las skyes pa dang / /de bzhin du ni chu stod dang / /chu smad kyi ni cha dag la/ /gzhu yi khyim du rab tu bstan/ /de yi skye ba'i skye ba ni/ /phur
161b7(rgyud 'bum): bu'i zhing der brtan pa yin/ /nyi ma phyi dror gyur pa dang / /zla ba nam smad gyur pa la/ /de yi skye ba zhes bstan pa/ /gang zhig skyes pa skye ba'i rgyu/ /snrubs las skyes pa rang rigs 'jig /tha mar bzang por 'gyur ba yin/ /
161b8(rgyud 'bum): skye gnas bar mar longs spyod ni/ /thob par de ni the tsom med/ /gzhon pa yongs su 'das pa na/ /snang byed dkyil 'khor ji lta bar/ /rgas par gyur na rgyal por 'gyur/ /longs spyod che zhing nor cher 'gyur/ /
162a1(rgyud 'bum): dma' ba'i phyogs su lus 'gyur gyi/ /gzhan gyi phyogs su ma yin no/ /de las gzhan du bzlog par ni/ /rnam pa sna tshogs skye bo snang / /chu smad kyi ni cha dag dang / /gro bzhin nyid du brtan pa dang / /
162a2(rgyud 'bum): mon gru rgyu skar mchog nyid ni/ /khyim 'di chu srin kho na yin/ /'di ni spen pa'i zhing yin te/ /yang na gza' gzhan gyis mtshan pa'o/ /rtag tu 'di la skye gnas pa/ /de yang sa steng 'di la snang / /dang
162a3(rgyud 'bum): po'i mtha' dang bar ma'i mtha'/ /mtshan mo'i cha ni 'das pa la/ /de dag las skyes longs spyod cher/ /kun nas snang bar gyur pa yin/ /mtho dang dma' ba'i rigs gnas shing / /de dag sa yi bdag por 'gyur/ /
162a4(rgyud 'bum): rab gtum kha dog nag po'am/ /sngo bsangs mdog tu de dag 'gyur/ /mig mtha' dmar zhing 'jam pa dang / /rtag tu dpa' zhing rtul yang phod/ /de bzhin chu yis khyab pa yi/ /phyogs su rgyal po byed par 'gyur/ /
162a5(rgyud 'bum): tshe ring bu ni med pa dang / /sdug bsngal mang po bzod par 'gyur/ /de las gzhan pa bzlog pa la/ /skye bo rnam par bzlog pa snang / /mon gru'i phyed dang mon gre dang / /de bzhin khrums stod phyed dag ni/ /de yi
162a6(rgyud 'bum): khyim du 'gyur ba ni/ /bum pa zhes ni brjod pa yin/ /'di la gza' yi gtso bo ni/ /zhing du rtag tu brten pa yin/ /de bzhin 'dres pa'ang zla ba dang / /blo ldan pa wa sangs nyid yin/ /'di dag skye bar 'gyur ba ni/ /
162a7(rgyud 'bum): mtshan mo'am nam ni langs par snang / /rtag tu skye 'di bzang po ste/ /'jig rten spyod pa dag pa yin/ /mi ni ma rungs las byed cing / /blo dang ldan par brjod pa yin/ /longs spyod sna tshogs phun sum tshogs/ /sa steng rjes
162a8(rgyud 'bum): su spyod par 'gyur/ /de las gzhan du bzlog na ni/ /dbul zhing nad rnams snod du 'gyur/ /rgyu skar khrums smad nyid dang ni/ /nam gru zhes ni brjod pa dang / /khrums stod kyi ni bzhi cha la/ /khyim ni nya ru rab tu brtags/ /skye ba de dag rtag gnas
162b1(rgyud 'bum): pa/ /kun tu ji ltar snang zhe na/ /mtshan mo'i thun gyi bar ma dang / /nyin par nyi ma shar ba dang / /nyi ma thun phyed 'das pa dang / /nyin phyed cung zad 'das pa dang / /lhag ma khru gang tsam 'das par/ /'di yi dus su'ang skyes
162b2(rgyud 'bum): pa ni/ /dag pa dang ni rab dag nyid/ /pa sangs nyid kyis rab tu mchod/ /pa wa sangs kyi zhing zhes pa/ /lha yi rigs zhes tshangs par spyod/ /ser dang dkar ba'i mdog dag gi/ /gza' yis kyang ni rab tu bsten/ /des shing
162b3(rgyud 'bum): rtag tu dge ba dang / /chos ldan mchog tu bzang ba yin/ /mi ni de la skyes gyur pa/ /yan lag kun kyang shin tu mdzes/ /brtson 'grus che zhing rgyal po 'dod/ /gnyen dang bshes ni brtan pa dang / /tshe ring longs spyod che ba dang / /
162b4(rgyud 'bum): dma' ba'i yul la yang dag brten/ /shar gyi phyogs la brten nas ni/ /de dag rtag tu skye bar 'gyur/ /de dag mya ngam phyogs su ni/ /rtag tu skye bar mi 'gyur te/ /nya ni thang la yongs spyod par/ /nam yang snang ba ma
162b5(rgyud 'bum): yin no/ /drang srong rnams kyi chu gnas dang / /chu bo dag tu 'phel bar 'gyur/ /de la skye bar rab brtan pa/ /khyim nyid du ni rab tu bstan/ /mi ni de dag las skyes pa/ /dma' ba'i yul du rnam par 'phel/ /rtag
162b6(rgyud 'bum): tu shar gyi phyogs gnas pa'i/ /sa bdag skal ba chen por 'gyur/ /phur bu dang ni spen pa dag /gza' mchog gi ni mngon par bltas/ /shar gyi phyogs kyi bdag po byed/ /de dag las skyes the tshom med/ /
162b7(rgyud 'bum): khyim ni rnam pa mang po dang / /rgyu skar du ma gsungs pa yang / /rnam pa sna tshogs gza' mchog kyang / /sngon gyi dus yin da ltar min/ /mi rnams de las skyes pa yang / /de bzhin tshes grangs bco lnga dang / /nyin zhag
162b8(rgyud 'bum): sum cu dag nyid de/ /des na zla bar rab tu bstan/ /zla phyed nyin mtshan bco lnga ste/ /zla phyed gnyis la zla bar brjod/ /des na zla ba bcu gnyis la/ /lo gcig tu ni rab tu bsgrags/ /'di tsam
163a1(rgyud 'bum): dus kyi tshod la ni/ /dus kyi tha mar yongs su brtags/ /rtsod pa'i dus su phyin pa na/ /'di yi grangs su rab tu bstan/ /mi rnams tshe ni de bzhin du/ /lo brgya dag tu bsgrags pa yin/ /de dag lo tshigs phyin pa na/ /
163a2(rgyud 'bum): dus ni drug tu rab tu brjod/ /dang po bar dang tha mar ni/ /de dag gsum du rab tu bstan/ /lha mtshams la ni sa 'gul na/ /mi rnams 'dir ni tshe ring 'gyur/ /de dag mi yi 'jig rten 'dir/ /skye zhing 'phel bar 'gyur
163a3(rgyud 'bum): ba yin/ /mi ma yin pa 'jig rten 'dir/ /phan tshun du ni 'byer bar 'gyur/ /de dag rnam skrag 'jigs pa dang / /phan tshun du ni rnam par rgyu/ /lha dang lha min gtso bo ni/ /gang tshe 'thab par rab 'jug pa/ /de tshe mi yi 'jig
163a4(rgyud 'bum): rten 'dir/ /nad ni 'byung bar byed pa yin/ /mjug rings las dang skar mda' dang / /gnam lcags dang ni rdo rje dang / /dud pa phyogs ni mtha' dag tu/ /du ba mjug rings rab tu snang / /zla ba nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la/ /mun nag gis ni khebs
163a5(rgyud 'bum): par gnas/ /nyi zla rdzu 'phrul chen po dag /bug pa yod par snang ba dang / /de ltar rnam pa sna tshogs pa/ /rnam mang yang ni snang gyur na/ /mu ge tshe ni nyams pa dang / /de bzhin yul 'khor 'jig pa dang / /mi yi bdag po
163a6(rgyud 'bum): 'chi ba dang / /sdom brtson 'jigs pa chen po 'byung / /sdom brtson 'jig pa chen po 'byung /
163a7(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten dag ni thams cad la/ /der ni 'jigs su rung ba 'byung / /mchu dang tha skar dag dang ni/ /nab so la ni sa 'gul na/ /de tshe dbus kyi yul dag tu/ /rkun ma bab col byed la gnod/ /lho yi phyogs la gnas pa yi/ /rgyal po chen po
163a8(rgyud 'bum): rnam par 'jig / bra nye smin drug nyid dang ni/ /gang tshe snar ma dang ni mgo/ 'gul na 'jig rten 'jigs pa che/ /de la dogs pa rab tu 'byung / /nub phyogs na ni gnas pa yi/ /de tshe rgyal po 'chi bar 'gyur/ /gang yang mtha' 'khob gnas pa yi/ /
163b1(rgyud 'bum): kla klo rku bas 'tsho byed dang / /de bzhin 'bigs byed steng gnas dang / /nang du mi yi dbang phyug gnas/ /de yang de yi dus dag tu/ /nad kyis brgyal zhing gnod par 'gyur/ /de dag la ni dgra rnams 'byung / /gcig la gcig
163b2(rgyud 'bum): ni yul 'phrog 'gyur/ /rgyu skar lag dang rgyal dang ni/ /skag dang de bzhin gre dang dbo/ /'di dag la ni sa 'gul na/ /mi bdag kun ni mi mthun nas/ /phan tshun gnod pa byed 'gyur ba/ /gsod dang 'ching dang gnod pa dang / /
163b3(rgyud 'bum): mu ge dag kyang rab tu 'byung / /me bzhi nag pa sa ri dang / /de bzhin lha mtshams na nyid la/ /snod kyi 'jig rten sar gyur pa/ /'di la gang tshe 'gul gyur na/ /kha ba can gnas kla klo dang / /rkun ma kun nas gnas
163b4(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / /bal yul gyi ni bdag po dang / /kha sha'i lung par gnas pa yi/ /der ni mi bdag ma lus pa/ /phan tshun du ni mi mthun nas/ /thams cad g.yul la spyod 'gyur bar/ /'dir ni the tshom med pa yin/ /
163b5(rgyud 'bum): rgyu skar gang yin snrubs dang ni/ /chu ni stod smad gnyi ga la/ /sa yi steng du 'gul bar ni/ /'di dag la ni rab mthong na/ /shar gyi phyogs kyi mi rnams dang / /pon dra o Ta kA ma ru/ /b+hang+ga la bdag rgyal po ni/ /
163b6(rgyud 'bum): 'chi bar 'di la the tshom med/ /gau TA'i bdag po dpal dang ldan/ /yul 'khor gzhan gyis yongs bskor ba'am/ /'phral la na bar gyur pa dang / /la lar yang na 'chi bar 'gyur/ /'jig rten rgya mtsho'i ngogs
163b7(rgyud 'bum): gnas dang / /gang+gA'i 'gram du yang dag gnas/ /chu yis thams cad khyer ba'am/ /nad rnams mang po kun gnod byed/ /gro bzhin dang ni mon gru dang / /mon gre dang ni chu stod dang / /de bzhin du ni chu smad dang / /
163b8(rgyud 'bum): gal te nam gru las skyes pa/ /rab tu 'gul ba nyin phyed la/ /snod kyi 'jig rten yang dag 'gul/ /sa rnams thams cad rab 'gul ba/ /ri bo dang ni nags su bcas/ /rtag tu nam mkha' la snang ba/ /
164a1(rgyud 'bum): 'phar zhing 'og tu 'byung byed na/ /byang phyogs kyi ni yul dag dang / /nub phyogs la ni yang dag gnas/ /lho yi phyogs ni thams cad dang / /phyogs rnams kun la gnas byed pa'i/ /mi mchog
164a2(rgyud 'bum): sa ni mang spyod pa/ /phan tshun du ni gnod pa byed/ /sems can rnams ni gnod chen ldan/ /mu ges yul 'khor 'byer bar 'gyur/ /tho rangs sa ni 'gul gyur na/ /lus can shis dang zhi bar 'gyur/ /de las cung zad phyi dus
164a3(rgyud 'bum): na/ /drag po'i 'gul ba rab tu skye/ /de nas cung zad phyis 'gul na/ /yul ni ma ga d+hAr gnod dang / /ang+ga'i yul du gnod 'gyur te/ /ma ga d+hA rgyal de bzhin no/ /de nas cung zad nyin phyed dam/ /phyi dro'i dus su
164a4(rgyud 'bum): gyur pa na/ /gal te sa ni 'gul bar gyur/ /sa steng ma lus nyid dag gi/ /rab tu byung ba thams cad la/ /rtag tu nad ni 'byung ba 'thob/ /rims dang yi ga 'chus dang gzer/ /de bzhin nad ni 'brum bu yis/ /
164a5(rgyud 'bum): zhag bdun btab par gyur nas ni/ /de nas de dag sos par 'gyur/ /de nas nyi ma yang 'das nas/ /sa ni gal te 'gul gyur na/ /rigs bzhi dag gi mchog gyur pa/ /bram ze rtswa ni so ma 'thung / /nyon mongs
164a6(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po'i blon po ni/ /'chi bar 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /mdun na 'don ni chos dang ldan/ /blon po'am zham 'bring byed pa na/ /gzhan yang sdom can gtso bo ni/ /sngags rgyud don la mkhas pa dang / /bram ze dang
164a7(rgyud 'bum): ni rgyal rigs dang / /de bzhin dmangs rigs rje'u rigs dang / /brtan pa mkhas pa dag dang ni/ /bstan bcos de nyid don lugs ldan/ /gsod dang rab tu nyams pa'am/ /dran ldan thos dang de nyid shes/ /sngon byung
164a8(rgyud 'bum): ba ni sems pa dag / myur du nad kyis 'jigs 'gyur te/ /gnam lcags rdo rjes shing la bzhin/ /de nas nyi ma nub pa na/ /de nas yang ni song ba na/ /phyi dro dus kyi mtha' la ni/ /gal te sa ni rab tu
164b1(rgyud 'bum): 'gul/ /de bzhin sems can 'dres pa dang / /dud 'gro dag gi 'gro ba dang / /mi yi 'jig rten gtso bo dag /de tshe 'gum dang rnam par 'jig /mtshan mo'i thun ni dang po la/ /gal te sa ni 'gul gyur na/ /
164b2(rgyud 'bum): sems can 'dres pa sna tshogs dang / /dud 'gro'i skye gnas rnams dang ni/ /mi ni 'jig rten gtso rnams su/ /char chen rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur/ /cung zad thun de bri gyur la/ /sa ni 'gul bar gyur pa yi/ /
164b3(rgyud 'bum): de tshe rtags de snang gyur na/ /rlung dang char pa'i 'jigs chen 'byung / /de nas thun de zad pa'i mthar/ /'gul snang las ni mi bzad pa/ /nub phyogs mi yi bdag po yi/
164b4(rgyud 'bum): /pha rol dmag tshogs 'byung bar shes/ /thun ni gnyis pa dang po la/ /gal te sa ni 'gul ba byung / /gzhan gyi dmag tshogs nad dang 'chi/ /khong pa'i nad ni mi bzad 'byung / /mkhris pa bad kan las gyur nad/ /
164b5(rgyud 'bum): skye bo rnams la 'byung bar 'gyur/ /'byung po rnams ni skyo 'gyur zhing / /de tshe phyogs dang phyogs su 'gro/ /de nas gnyis pa'i thun dkyil du/ /sa ni rab tu 'gul byung na/ /rlung chen 'byung bar shes bya ste/ /
164b6(rgyud 'bum): shing dang lha khang 'gyel bar 'gyur/ /yang thog ra ba ri rnams kyi/ /rtse mo 'jig par the tshom med/ /gnas dang 'dug gnas bzang po dang / /khang pa dang ni rta babs dang / /dud 'gro rnams kyi 'dug gnas
164b7(rgyud 'bum): kyang / /sa la myur du ltung bar 'gyur/ /de nas mtshan phyed dus dag tu/ /gal te sa ni 'gul ba byung / /de tshe shar phyogs yul gyi bdag /mi mchog gtso bo 'chi ba'am/ /de bu 'chi bar 'gyur ba'am/ /
164b8(rgyud 'bum): mu ge 'byung bar rab tu ston/ /bar ma'i thun ni bri gyur nas/ /tha mar nye la 'gul ba byung / /sa rnams dag ni ma lus la/ /zhi zhing nad med nges par ston/ /de nas mtshan phyed mthar gyur la/ /gal te sa
165a1(rgyud 'bum): ni 'gul bar snang / / gsher chen yul gyi dbus dag tu/ /mi yi bdag po nad kyis gnon/ /phan tshun mi mthun gyur nas ni/ /sdug bsngal mi bzad 'chi bar 'gyur/ /thun ni gsum par phyin nas 'gul/ /
165a2(rgyud 'bum): byis pa rnams la bde ba 'byung / /sbrang bu sha sbrang phye leb dang / /rkun po rnams ni 'jig par 'gyur/ /tho rangs 'gul bar gyur na ni/ /tshe ring nad med lo legs byed/ /grong khyer gyi ni khor yug dag /me yis tshig
165a3(rgyud 'bum): par shes par bya/ /nyi ma 'char ba'i dus dag tu/ /sa ni rab tu 'gul ba byung / /dbus kyi yul ni thams cad du/ /rkun mas rnam par 'tshe bar 'gyur/ /de tshe zhag ni bdun dag las/ /rgyal po 'chi bar
165a4(rgyud 'bum): snang ba yin/ /gang du stobs ni rab che ba/ /sa ni 'gul bar gyur pa yin/ /de tshe gnas ni de dag tu/ /dge dang mi dge'i spyod pa snang / /skar mda' gnam grum sa 'gul ni/ /skar mda' dkar po
165a5(rgyud 'bum): 'bar gyur na/ /des ni sngar bstan sel bar byed/ /de bzhin dkar mdog rtag tu ni/ /dge zhing rab tu bsngags pa yin/ /mi bzad chen po kha dog dmar/ /me yis tshig par nye bar ston/ /dud ka'i
165a6(rgyud 'bum): mdog nag nag po ni/ /rgyal po 'chi bar ston pa yin/ /ser ba'am yang na ser skya'am/ /'dres pa'i mdog ni snang gyur na/ /de tshe 'dres pa'i las 'gyur ba/ /skar mda' ltung bas rnam par ston/ /
165a7(rgyud 'bum): gnam grum nyid du bstan pa ni/ /gar byung der ni ston pa ste/ /gal te dbus na de tshe dbus/ /yul nyid du ni rab tu bstan/ /sgra brnyan snyan pa byung na ni/ /bde zhing nad med ston par byed/ /ma rungs mi
165a8(rgyud 'bum): bzad 'jig rten du/ /rnga sgra yis ni dge ba sbyin/ /'jigs dang shin tu 'jigs rung sgra/ /der ni mu ge ston pa yin/ /de la sogs par sbyor ba ni/ /rtag tu gza' rnams 'dod pa yin/ /rgyu skar 'di
165b1(rgyud 'bum): dag mthong ba la/ /grub pa'i las ni de tshe bya/ /tha skar snar ma nyid dang ni/ /rgyal dang khrums ni stod smad gnyis/ /nam gru dang ni lha mtshams dag /bzlas pa'i dus su rab tu bsngags/ /'di dag la ni
165b2(rgyud 'bum): sngags rnams 'grub/ /grub pa'i don yang ster bar byed/ /skar ma dag ni 'di dag la/ /dkyil 'khor nyid kyang bri bar bya/ /gza' yi res kyi gtso bo ni/ /ser dang dkar bar snang ba yin/ /tshes ni 'di dag
165b3(rgyud 'bum): la dge ste/ /rtag tu zla ba nya ba yin/ /yul gzhan dag tu 'gro byed dang / /dkyil 'khor dag kyang bri bar bya/ /dang po gsum pa lnga pa dang / /bcu pa dang ni bdun pa dang / /bcu gsum pa la ci bde bar/ /
165b4(rgyud 'bum): mi yi bdag po 'gro bar brtag /skye bo kun la dge ba sbyin/ /chas shing 'gro bar rab tu bsngags/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni sngags rgyud dag /sngags rnams thams cad mi bri'o/ /'di dag la ni sngags mi 'grub/ /
165b5(rgyud 'bum): bgegs kyi rgyur ni bstan pa yin/ /'gro dang sbyin sreg grub pa la/ /tshes grangs gza' ni dam par ldan/ /phur bu pa sangs zla ba dang / /gza' lhag mchog ni las kun la/ /gza' mchog 'di
165b6(rgyud 'bum): dag rtag tu ni/ /bzhi po tshes dang ldan pa ni/ /sa steng 'jig rten kun tu ni/ /'gro ba'i las ni grub par byed/ /ma rungs 'chi ltas bral ba yi/ /nyi ma la ni brtag par bya/ /yud tsam bcu gnyis kho
165b7(rgyud 'bum): na ni/ /de yi dus su rab tu sbyar/ /dkar dang byams ldan nyid dang ni/ /mig dmar du yang rab tu bstan/ /drag bu dbang chen dag pa dang / /byi bzhin nyid dang legs mdzes dang / /'khor dang 'khor bar
165b8(rgyud 'bum): byed pa nyid/ /dge ba sbyin zhes bstan pa yin/ /zla ba mchog ni sbyin pa nyid/ /'di dag bcu gnyis mtshan nyid yin/ /yud tsam dag tu bstan pa ni/ /nyin zhag sum cu nyid la'o/ /bcu pa char ni 'bab
166a1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur te/ /bcu bzhi pa ni yul 'khor 'jig /brgyad pa bcu gnyis pa nyid dang / /bzhi pa nyid ni spang bar bya/ /myur la sogs pa'i grangs dang ldan/ /mar ngo la ni mtshan mo yin/ /lhag ma bgegs
166a2(rgyud 'bum): ni byed pa yang / /log 'dren yin te bzhi pa'o/ /'di dag grangs ni ldan pa la/ /dus 'di dag tu rab tu bstan/ /mig ni 'byed dang 'dzums pa dang / /se gol myur ba'i 'gros 'di ni/ /'di dag dus kyi tshad dag ni/ /
166a3(rgyud 'bum): rgya cher yang ni bstan par bya/ /se gol brgya yi tshogs dag la/ /rtsa rgyun gcig tu bstan pa yin/ /rtsa rgyun bzhi la chu tshod bstan/ /chu tshod bzhi la thun zhes bya/ /thun bzhi la ni nyin par te/ /mtshan mo dag
166a4(rgyud 'bum): kyang de bzhin bstan/ /de ltar brgyad dang ldan pa la/ /nyin mtshan du ni rab tu brtags/ /mig gi 'byed 'dzums bcu la ni/ /skad cig tsam du rab tu brtags/ /skad cig bcu zhes bshad pa ni/ /yud tsam du ni yongs
166a5(rgyud 'bum): su brtags/ /yud tsam bzhi la thun gcig ces/ /sngags rig pas ni yongs su brtags/ /'di tsam dus kyi tshad la ni/ /gsum gyi grangs su yongs su brtags/ /sbyin sreg dus dang bzlas pa yi/ /
166a6(rgyud 'bum): grub pa'i dus dang sbyar bar bya/ /nyal ba'i dus dang mi nyal dang / /rtag tu nyin zhag phrugs btungs la/ /nyin dang mtshan ni nyi ma zhes/ /de ltar ming ni 'jug pa yin/ /nyi ma bcwa lnga nyid la ni/ /zla ba phyed du
166a7(rgyud 'bum): rab tu bstan/ /zla phyed gnyis la zla ba zhes/ /rtsis shes 'jigs pa med pas bstan/ /de bzhin zla ba zla drug gis/ /sgra gcan gyis kyang 'dzin pa yin/ /de nas zla ba bcu gnyis la/ /lo yi sgrar
166a8(rgyud 'bum): ni rab tu bsgrags/ /de nas lo ni bcu gnyis la/ /lo chen zhes ni de la bya/ /gza' dang rgyu skar phyin ci log /lha min dbang po thams cad kyang / /de nas lo ni bcu gnyis la/ /'dir ni dge dang mi dge byed/ /
166b1(rgyud 'bum): gang tshe yar ngor lha min dbang / /sgra gcan rab tu snang 'gyur zhing / /zla ba nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /ma lus rab tu zin gyur na/ /mtshon gyi tshogs ni chen po yang / /sa yi steng du snang bar 'gyur/ /
166b2(rgyud 'bum): de la sogs pa chen po ni/ /dus dang dus su rab sbyor 'gyur/ /rnam pa du ma mang po yi/ /bgegs ni mi bzad snang bar 'gyur/ /dus kyi tha mar phyin pa na/ /'jig rten snod ni chos min la/ /rgyu skar snrubs
166b3(rgyud 'bum): la gnas pa la/ /zla ba ma lus 'dzin 'gyur zhing / /mtshan mo ma lus 'dzin pa nyid/ /zla ba 'dzin pa nub bzhin dang / /gal te nyi ma nyin par ni/ /nub bzhin du ni 'dzin 'gyur dang / /nyi ma dang ni zla ba nyid/ /
166b4(rgyud 'bum): mtshan phyed dag tu gzung gyur nas/ /lha min dbang po'i grib ma yis/ /gal te 'jigs shing nub gyur na/ /shar phyogs gnas pa'i rgyal po ni/ /sdang bas gsod par the tshom med/ /rang nyid 'chi ba'i 'jigs pas
166b5(rgyud 'bum): sam/ /gzhan gyis de ni gsod par 'gyur/ /kla klo yi ni bdag po nyid/ /shar phyogs su ni gsod par byed/ /o Da'i yul gyi mi rnams dang / /de tshe rdo rje zhes bdag kyang / /gal te tha skar snar
166b6(rgyud 'bum): ma dang / /de bzhin du ni bra nye dang / /smin drug dag la nyi zla ni/ /gang tshe 'dzin par snang 'gyur na/ /rnam pa sna tshogs bad kan dang / /mkhris pa dang ni rlung gyur dang / /de bzhin 'dres par gyur pa ni/ /gzhan yang
166b7(rgyud 'bum): lus can kun la 'byung / /byis pa dag ni thams cad la/ /rnam pa du ma'i nad rnams 'byung / /gal te rgyu skar mchu dang ni/ /gre dang de bzhin dbo nyid dang / /me bzhi nag pa sa ri dang / /sa ga dag gi rgyu skar ni/ /
166b8(rgyud 'bum): de la nyi zla shar ba na/ /'dzin par the tshom med 'gyur zhing / /nyi zla gnyis ni shar phyogs su/ /sgra gcan gyis ni zin gyur na/ /shar phyogs mi yi bdag po dang / /lA Da yul gyi bdag po dang / /ang+ga ma ga d+hA
167a1(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po/ /mig gi nad kyis 'debs pa'am/ /bu rnams 'chi bar 'gyur ba'am/ /de rnams 'chi bas nyer 'jigs 'gyur/ /dgra rnams sdang ba'i sems ldan pa'i/ /tshogs kyang de tshe 'byung bar
167a2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ /mgo dang lag dang nab so dang / /de bzhin rgyal dang skag nyid dang / /nyi ma zla ba 'di dag la/ /sgra gcan gyis zin snang gyur na/ /ma ga d+hA rgyal gnod 'gyur zhing / /de bzhin yul mi dag la'ang gnod/ /
167a3(rgyud 'bum): blon po nad 'jigs shes par bya/ /'ching dang nyon mongs grong khyer 'gyur/ /lha mtshams dang ni na dag la/ /sgra gcan gyis zin kun la snang / /de tshe nad rnams kun tu 'gro/ /yul mi kun la'ang nad rnams 'byung / /
167a4(rgyud 'bum): gsod dang 'ching dang nyon mongs dang / /gnod pa rnam pa du ma 'byung / /'ching dang gzhan gyi dmag tshogs ni/ /skye bo'i gtso la de dag skye/ /chu stod dang ni gro bzhin dang / /de bzhin chu smad kho na la/ /nyi ma'i dkyil
167a5(rgyud 'bum): 'khor dbus gnas dang / /zla ba la ni dmar bar snang / /gza' ni 'dzin par snang gyur pa/ /rtag tu mu ge 'byung bar 'gyur/ /gro bzhin mon gre'i rgyu skar dang / /de bzhin du ni khrums stod dang / /gang tshe mon grub
167a6(rgyud 'bum): dag la ni/ /gal te nyi zla gzas zin te/ /gza' ni byung bar shes gyur na/ /kha dog nag pa la brten nas/ /mya ngan chen po nyon mongs dang / /mu ge kun tu 'byung bar ni/ /yul mi kun la 'byung ba dang / /rgyal
167a7(rgyud 'bum): po rkun ma'i 'jigs chen 'byung / /nam gru rgyu skar nyid dang ni/ /gang tshe khrums smad dag la ni/ /zla ba nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du/ /shar nas sgra gcan 'dzin pa na/ /nub phyogs nas ni nyi ma 'dzin/ /ma ga
167a8(rgyud 'bum): d+hAr ni mi yi bdag / sems can rgyal po'i thabs nyams par/ /zla phyed gcig gis snang bar 'gyur/ /rtag tu sgra gcan 'gro ba yi/ /mtshan ma 'di dag bstan pa yin/ /zla ba nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
167b1(rgyud 'bum): gyis/ /phyogs ni gang nas zin gyur pa/ /de dang de yi phyogs dag tu/ /dge dang mi dge 'byung bar 'gyur/ /gang nyid sa steng 'gul ba ni/ /'jig rten mtshan mas bstan pa dag /dge dang mi dge
167b2(rgyud 'bum): de dang der/ /de bzhin gzas zin shes par bya/ /khug rna ser ba mjug rings ni/ /nyi ma lnga yi bar du yod/ /de 'og 'jig rten sems las 'byung / /ngogs la spyod cing gnas pa yi/ /yul mi
167b3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad 'jig 'gyur zhing / /nad kyi gzhi ni 'byung ba yin/ /byang phyogs gang gA'i 'gram gyi ni/ /rgyal po dag kyang 'jig par 'gyur/ /de bzhin kha ba can gyi dbus/ /bgrod dka' khrad khrod la gnas dang / /
167b4(rgyud 'bum): sa yi bdag po la gnas dang / /kho ra yug na rtse rje dang / /byang phyogs gang gA'i 'gram dag na/ /de tshe 'gram spyod bdag po dag /mya ngan gdung ba du ma yis/ /skye bo'i bdag po de 'ching 'gyur/ /rgyu skar
167b5(rgyud 'bum): gang la sa 'gul ba/ /de la khug rna yang dag bstan/ /phyogs rnams ma lus khug rna ni/ /mi bzad 'od ni spangs pa dang / /nyin zhag lnga yi bar du yang / /rtag tu nyin zhag mang por ni/ /phan tshun
167b6(rgyud 'bum): chos ni mi mthong dang / /mi yi spyod yul mthong ba min/ /mi rnams dag ni phan tshun du/ /der ni mthong bar 'gyur ma yin/ /der ni 'jig chen 'byung bar shes/ /rgyal po yul 'khor bcas te
167b7(rgyud 'bum): 'jig / skar mda' 'khor yug dag tu ni/ /gang dag las kyis byung gyur pa/ /phyogs kyi mthar ni rab snang ba/ /gnyis dang gsum ni mi bzad yin/ /mtshan mo dbang po'i gzhu nyid dang / /
167b8(rgyud 'bum): bya rog gal te 'dab ma dkar/ /dkar ba'am yang na kha dog nag /yang na dkar dang nag par mthong / /phyin log 'dab chags kha dog dang / /phyin ci log gi dus sgra dang / /phyin ci log gi bya rnams yod/ /
168a1(rgyud 'bum): gang du der ni 'jigs chen 'byung / /rkang gnyis rkang pa bzhi nyid dang / /rkang med dang ni rkang mang dang / /'dab chags dud 'gro srog chags rnams/ /phyin ci log 'gyur 'jigs chen byung / /
168a2(rgyud 'bum): khyi ni gyen du gdong bltas te/ /yang dang yang du zugs gyur pa/ /nyin par ram ni mtshan mo ru/ /gang du der ni 'jigs chen 'byung / /de ltar rnam pa du ma dang / /rnam mang gang du rab brtags pa/ /der
168a3(rgyud 'bum): ni char mi 'bab par 'gyur/ /rgyal po'i tshogs kyang rnam par 'jig /ji ltar skye ba'i skar ma ni/ /dge dang mi dge'i srog chags yin/ /de bzhin mtshan ma gang skyes pa/ /dge dang mi dge byed
168a4(rgyud 'bum): pa yin/ /sngon gyi rgyu ni ma yin pa/ /rgyu mtshan cung zad mi mthong ste/ /rgyu med rab tu 'jug byed pa'i/ /bgegs 'byung ba ni yod ma yin/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub
168a5(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/ skar ma'i dpyad kyi rgyu mtshan shes pa'i le'u rab 'byam las bcwa brgyad pa rdzogs s+ho// // de nas
168a6(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas gzhan yang gza' dang rgyu skar dang skar ma dang skar mkhan gyi tshogs rnams la bka' stsal pa/ kye kye gza' dang rgyu skar kyi tshogs rnams khyed cag thams cad
168a7(rgyud 'bum): nyon cig / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i cho ga'i rgyal po 'di las 'da' bar ma byed cig /sngags dang / rgyud dang / dbang bskur ba dang / dkyil 'khor dang / cho ga rnams dang / bzlas pa dang / nges par
168a8(rgyud 'bum): sdom pa dang / rig pa sgrub pa la 'jug pa dang / rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi cho ga dang / rgyu skar kyi spyod pa dang / rtsis mngon par shes pa rnams kyi cho ga'i rgyal po de la khyed cag rnams kyis der bgegs ma byed
168b1(rgyud 'bum): cig / bstan pa la rab tu zhugs pa rnams la lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis kyang de la srung bgyis shig /sems can ma rungs pa thams cad kyang dgag par gyis shig /bstan par gyis shig /thams
168b2(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi thams cad du gsod par ma byed cig / stobs bcu dang ldan pa rnams kyi bstan pa la rnam par gzhag par gyis shig /de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas sems can thams cad kyi ma rungs
168b3(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor mngon par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa snyoms
168b4(rgyud 'bum): par zhugs ma thag tu/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na rnam par bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang na bzhugs
168b5(rgyud 'bum): pa la rnam par blta ba'i phyir nye bar lhags par gyur to/ /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sangs rgyas nye bar lhags pa rang rang gi byin gyis brlabs kyis bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la bos te/ gsungs
168b6(rgyud 'bum): shig gsungs shig dpa' bo che/ /'jig rten rnams la'ang phan pa'i phyir/ /sngags rgyud cho ga ji lta bar/ /sngags rnams kun la rab 'jug phyir/ /rig pa'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul che/ /sangs
168b7(rgyud 'bum): rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa yi/ /gtso mchog yi ge gcig pa ni/ /dus nyams rtsod pa'i dus dag tu/ /sngags rnams kun gyi rab mchog ni/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa yin/ /gtsug tor rgyal po stobs po che/ /
168b8(rgyud 'bum): 'byung po kun ni zlog par byed/ /gza' dang rgyu skar ma mo rnams/ /ma rungs sems ldan 'gog par byed/ /'jig rten bgegs rnams ji snyed dang / /de bzhin gzhan yang gdug sems ldan/ /sems can rnams ni rjes gzung dang / /zlos pa
169a1(rgyud 'bum): rnams ni bde bya'i phyir/ /bstan pa 'di la cho ga mchog /stobs chen 'khor los sgyur ba yin/ /gtsug tor rgyal po mthu bo che/ /kun la dbang phyug dam pa ni/ /gang gi dus ni 'di yin pa/ /de bzhin gshegs
169a2(rgyud 'bum): pa khyod kyis gsungs/ /de skad gsungs nas sangs rgyas rnams/ /mi gsung bar ni bzhugs par gyur/ /de nas sangs rgyas 'dus pa de rnams kyis/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems
169a3(rgyud 'bum): can thams cad snod kyi 'jig rten rnams gcig tu 'bar bar gyur la/ sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs kyis sems can gcig la yang gnod par ma gyur te/ snang ba chen po yang dag par snang bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom
169a4(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das shAkya thub pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la gzigs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang de na gnas pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang nyan thos dang rang sangs
169a5(rgyud 'bum): rgyas thams cad dang bcom ldan 'das dang 'khor chen po 'dus pa la bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dgongs su gsol/
169a6(rgyud 'bum): yi ge gcig pa 'di ni rig pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor gong nas gong du gnas pa bstan pa thogs pa med pa/ dpag tu med pa'i stobs dang pha rol gnon pa/
169a7(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das gtsug tor gyi rgyal po 'khor los sgyur ba'i cho ga yang ngas bshad par bya'o/ /bstan pa nub pa'i dus su rtsod pa'i dus 'di la bcom ldan 'das gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba de bstan pa 'di la
169a8(rgyud 'bum): srung ba gcig pur 'gyur zhing dus thams cad du grub par yang 'gro ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa nub pa'i dus tshod la 'di nyid sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yin te/ bstan pa'i don byed par 'gyur ro/ /
169b1(rgyud 'bum): yi ge gcig po 'di la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi mdzod 'dus par 'gyur ro/ /kye lha'i tshogs dang sems can thams cad nyon cig /b+h+rUM/ bcom ldan 'di ni thams cad
169b2(rgyud 'bum): mkhyen/ /sangs rgyas sngags gzugs rnam par gnas/ /ston pa thugs rje che dang ldan/ /sems can kun la rnam par spyod/ /sngags rnams bdag po dpal dang ldan/ /gtsug tor las byung bstan pa
169b3(rgyud 'bum): yin/ /snying rje dbang la brten nas ni/ /'di ni yi ge gcig tu gnas/ /chos kyi dbyings la brten nas ni/ /'di ni sna tshogs gzugs la gnas/ /ji ltar sangs rgyas sku rnams ni/ /skye bo rnams la sku gdung
169b4(rgyud 'bum): gyur/ /'jig rten gyis mchod zang zing bcas/ /zang zing med pa'ang khyad par du/ /dam chos sku gdung dag tu bstan/ /'jig rten zang zing med pa'i rgyu/ /sku ni zang zing bcas par gsungs/ /thub pa'i zla ba
169b5(rgyud 'bum): zag pa med/ /zang zing bcas dang zang zing med/ /'jig rten rgyur ni gsungs pa yin/ /chos kyi dbyings la brten nas ni/ /thugs rje'i dbang gis sems can la/ /'jig rten mgon po 'od byed pa/ /
169b6(rgyud 'bum): sngags kyi tshul gyis bzhugs pa yin/ /sna tshogs gzugs can thams cad mkhyen/ /sa steng 'di la snang ba yin/ /sems can rnams kyis sngags sgrub pa/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs
169b7(rgyud 'bum): pa yin/ /sngags 'di yongs su mdor bsdu na/ /rang gis cho gas 'dir bzlas na/ /sngags rnams ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin/ /rtag tu 'bras bcas byed par 'gyur/ /'di yi cho ga mdor bsdus nas/ /
169b8(rgyud 'bum): dus su yang ni bshad par bya/ /dus mthar thub mchog 'jig rten du/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nub pa na/ /de yi dus su cho ga 'grub/ /sngags 'grub par ni gsungs pa yin/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor
170a1(rgyud 'bum): los sgyur ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor gzhan gyi las kyis sbyor ba rnam par 'jig par byed pa/ ma rgyal ba las rgyal ba/ sngags thams cad kyi bdag po/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis
170a2(rgyud 'bum): don du gnyer ba gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba'i cho ga yi ge gcig pa sngar rgya cher bstan nas/ yang mdor na re zhig dang po bzlas pas gang du gnas pa las/ dpag tshad lnga'i nang nas ma rungs pa'i gdon
170a3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad 'byer bar 'gyur ro/ /grub pa thams cad kyang nus pa med par 'gyur zhing lha thams cad kyi nus pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /sgrub pa po'i 'dod pa ma gtogs par lha thams cad kyang gnas
170a4(rgyud 'bum): par mi 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sgrub pa po gzhan rnams kyis grub pa 'phrog par byed cing / gzhan gyi sbyor bas gsang sngags bcad pa dang bcom pa dang phur bus btab pa'ang
170a5(rgyud 'bum): thar bar byed do/ /bdag gis gzhan gyi rig sngags gcod par 'dod na/ rtswa ku sha sngon po chang pa gang blangs la/ lan brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags pa byas nas mtshon gyis bcad na/ rig pa
170a6(rgyud 'bum): gang gi phyir dmigs te bcad pa de gcod par 'gyur ro/ /gzugs brnyan byas te 'dis seng ldeng gi phur pas snying la btab na gnad la bab par 'gyur ro/ /le brgan du btsos pa'i skud pa la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas
170a7(rgyud 'bum): te/ mdud pa bor na bcing bar 'gyur ro/ /kham phor kha sbyar gyi nang du brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te kha bkab pa byas na rengs par 'gyur ro/ /mtshon chas snying dum bu gnyis su byas na gnyis su gas par 'gyur ro/ /ske tshe
170a8(rgyud 'bum): la dug dang khrag gis btags pas bsku ba byas na 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /ka ra bI ra'i lcug mas kun tu brdeg na gnod par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan gyi rig pa thams cad la mngon spyod bya ba ni ci dgar byar rung ngo / /sngar gsungs pa'i las
170b1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad la 'o mas khrus byas nas sbyin sreg byas na zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /mar gyi sbyin sreg gis ni thams cad zhi bar 'gyur zhing nyams rtas pa byas par yang 'gyur ro/ /khu tshur bcings pas sngags thams cad rengs
170b2(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ /yid kyis ni dgrol bar bsams pas bkrol bar 'gyur ro/ /sngags sgrub par 'dod pas kyang 'di nyid kyis bcing ba byas te bsgrub par bya'o/ /cho ga gang sgrub par 'dod pas kyang de nyid 'dis bsgrub par bya'o/ /
170b3(rgyud 'bum): sngags sgrub pa dang 'di nyid kyi sngags kyis spyan drang ba bya ba dang yang slar gshegs su gsol ba bya ba yin no/ /gang 'di nyid kyis srung bar byed pa thub par dka' bar 'gyur ro/ /gang gis sngags 'di ma grub bam lan ma thob na 'di nyid dang
170b4(rgyud 'bum): lhan cig tu bzlas brjod byas na/ myur du 'grub bam lan thob cing / gal te ma grub bam lan ma byin na de ring por mi thogs pa nyid du 'jig par 'gyur ro/ /sngags gang la dmigs te zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis til la
170b5(rgyud 'bum): btags te brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg dus gsum du zhag bdun byas pa de 'di'i dbang du 'gyur zhing / gang brjod pa de'i las byed par 'gyur ba'am lan thob par 'gyur ro/ /lha dbang du bya bar 'dod na thang shing gi yam
170b6(rgyud 'bum): shing gi brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na zhag bdun gyis dbang du 'gyur ro/ /klu dbang du bya bar 'dod na mngar gsum gyi sbyin sreg bya'o/ /dri za dang dri za mo thams cad dbang du bya bar 'dod na shing mya ngan med pa dang pri yang
170b7(rgyud 'bum): ku'i yam shing ngam me tog gi sbyin sreg byas na dbang du 'gyur ro/ /gnod sbyin mo dang klu mo'i gdon rnams la ni ske tshes bya'o/ /rgyal po rnams la ni yungs dkar gyi bya'o/ /bram ze rnams la ni me tog gi sbyin sreg bya'o/ /
170b8(rgyud 'bum): rje'u rigs la ni zho dang 'o ma dang mar gyi bya'o/ /dmangs rigs la ni phub ma'i rdul gyi bya'o/ /bud med la ni lan tshwa'i sbyin sreg bya'o/ /gdol pa la ni mon sran gre'u dang dzam bu li ka'i sbyin sreg bya'o/ /bu mo gzhon nu ma la ni 'bras
171a1(rgyud 'bum): yos kyi sbyin sreg bya'o/ /sems can thams cad la ni mar dang til gyi sbyin sreg byas na dbang du byed do/ /thams cad du yang dus gsum du zhag bdun du bya'o zhes gsungs nas/ rgyal ba'i mchog cang mi
171a2(rgyud 'bum): gsung bar gyur to/ /thub mchog bdun pas sngags 'di ni/ /de tshe lha yi tshogs la gsungs/ /'jig rten chos shes grol ba dang / /de tshe de ni chags bral zlos/ /de tshe thub pa mchog gis ni/ /sangs
171a3(rgyud 'bum): rgyas sras po thu bo lha/ /byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che/ /'jam dpal la ni de tshe gsung / /lha yi lha ni blo ldan pa/ /mgon po 'khor lo'i bdag po yi/ /cho ga 'di ni rgya che bas/ /gang
171a4(rgyud 'bum): gi bskal pa'i tshad du yang / /rgyal bas kyang ni bshad mi nus/ /mi rnams la ni phan pa'i phyir/ /cho ga yi ni phyogs gcig tsam/ /mdor bsdus nas ni bshad pa yin/ /de tshe de skad gsungs nas ni/ /
171a5(rgyud 'bum): dpal ldan 'jam dbyangs rdzu 'phrul che/ /gtsang ma'i gnas kyi steng bzhugs pa'i/ /sangs rgyas de la skul bar byed/ /gsungs shig gsungs shig dpa' bo che/ /rkang gnyis dam pa rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /
171a6(rgyud 'bum): dus mtha' 'jigs pa'i dus su ni/ /mi rnams bde ba skyed pa'i phyir/ /mthu chen sngags kyi rgyal po ste/ /gzi brjid chen po 'di yis ni/ /ras ris ji ltar grub par 'gyur/ /myur du ras ris 'grub par gsungs/ /
171a7(rgyud 'bum): 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/ yi ge gcig pa 'khor los sgyur ba 'byung ba'i le'u rab 'byam las ba cu dgu pa
171a8(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs s+ho/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la gzigs nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal nyon cig /mdor na yi ge gcig pa 'khor
171b1(rgyud 'bum): los sgyur ba rdzu 'phrul chen po'i ras ris kyi cho gar 'gyur ba rgya che ba ni sngar bstan to/ /de ni dus kyi tha ma'i dus su sems can rnams brtson 'grus chung bar 'gyur zhing / shes rab chung ba dang / yid gzhungs pa dman pa
171b2(rgyud 'bum): 'i phyir ras ris kyi tshad rgya che ba'i sbyor ba sgrub pa nyams par 'gyur bas/ sems can rnams la phan par 'dod pas zlos pa pos ji ltar dngos grub mchog thob par 'gyur ba de ltar ngas mdor bshad par bya ste/
171b3(rgyud 'bum): sgrub pa mchog byed par 'dod pas ras ma nyams pa kha tshar ma bcad pa skra dang bral ba dag la tshon ma 'dres pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das 'drir gzhug par bya ste/ chos kyi rgyal po chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor
171b4(rgyud 'bum): ba 'jig rten thams cad kyi bdag po skyes bu dam pa rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog / de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog ces bya ba rgyal ba'i mchog chos 'chad pa kun nas 'bar ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dang
171b5(rgyud 'bum): ldan pa'o/ /'og tu ni tshangs pa dang 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje/ steng du ni phreng ba 'dzin pa'i lha'i bu gnyis 'og tu sgrub pa po de'i mdun du dus gsum du a ga ru sreg cing 'bum phrag bcu bzlas pa bya'o/ /de nas las
171b6(rgyud 'bum): su bya ba ni dang po 'khor lo'i sgrub pa byed par 'dod na/ lcags bzang po'i rang bzhin las rtsibs bcu gnyis pa'i 'khor lo byas te/ cho 'phrul gyi zla phyed la bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar dus gsum du a ga ru'i dud
171b7(rgyud 'bum): pas bdug cing 'bum phrag bcu bzlas pa bya'o/ /tha mar zla ba nya ba la mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas lag pas bzung ste/ ji srid rab tu 'bar ba'i bar du bzlas pa bya'o/ /de bzung na rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los
171b8(rgyud 'bum): sgyur bar 'gyur ro/ /gang gis mthong ba de dang lhan cig nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas gdugs bsgrub par 'dod na/ gdugs kha dog sna tshogs pa sar pa byas la gser gyi 'khor los mtshan pa ka shi ka'i gos 'phyang

172a2(rgyud 'bum): bcu bzlas pa byas la/ tha mar zla ba nya ba la mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas lag pas bzung ste/ ji srid du rab tu 'bar ba'i bar du bzlas pa bya'o/ /de thogs na rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/ /zla ba re re zhing zla ba
172a3(rgyud 'bum): nya ba dang cho 'phrul gyi zla ba phyed lnga'i bar gyis 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /'di grub pa tsam gyis chos thams cad mngon sum du 'gyur ro/ /mngon par shes pa thams cad rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems

172a7(rgyud 'bum): che dang sman gyis yongs su bkang la/ ras dkar pos bcings te de la sngags 'dis bsgrub par bya ste/ cho 'phrul gyi zla phyed gcig la brtsams na gnyis pa la 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de la lag pa rab tu bcug na ni
172a8(rgyud 'bum): 'dod pa de thob cing mi zad par yang 'gyur ro/ /ji ste nor bu rin po che bsgrub par 'dod na gser gyi dbyug pa'am/ nor bu bzang po dang shel gyi nor bu byas te/ gos 'phyang bar byas la cho ga 'di nyid kyis bsgrubs na

172b2(rgyud 'bum): 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /lha'i lus thob cing bskal pa chen por 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /gzhan gang yang gtsug tor gyi rgyal po gdugs dkar po la sogs pa de yang 'dis bcom ldan 'das la 'bum phrag bcu bzlas
172b3(rgyud 'bum): pa byas na las rnams byed par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar thogs pa med pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor gzhan gyi rtog pa'i cho gas ji lta ji ltar rab tu sbyar ba de lta de ltar ring po mi thogs par 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /
