172b5(rgyud 'bum): na tsan+dan dmar po la rdo rje rtse gcig pa'am yang na lcags bzang po las byas te/ ba'i rnam lngas bkrus la yar gyi ngo'i bcwa lnga la ras ris kyi mdun du mchod pa chen po bya zhing mar gyi mar me brgya sbar
172b6(rgyud 'bum): la dri'i chus rdo rje bkrus te/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bdag nyid phul nas/ gtsug tor gyi rgyal po'i 'khor ram gzi brjid phung po'am/ gtsug tor gdugs dkar po'i
172b7(rgyud 'bum): sngags 'dis bsrung ba byas la/ dkyil 'khor gyi nang du grogs la yang bsrung ba byas nas rdo rje lag pa g.yas pas blangs te/ thun dang po 'das shing thun gnyis pa la nye bar 'dug ste/ sems rtse gcig pas ji srid
172b8(rgyud 'bum): rab tu 'bar ba'i bar du bzlas pa bya'o/ /skabs 'dir rig pa 'dzin pa lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin thams cad 'dus te/ rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po thams cad kyang 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /de dag rig pa 'dzin pa'i bstod pa byed cing khyim du 'gro bar
173a1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ /rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/ /lus phyag na rdo rje dang 'dra zhing phyag na rdo rje dang 'dra bar mgyogs pa'i mtshan nyid du 'gyur ro/ /skad cig gis 'og min gyi lha'i gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /
173a2(rgyud 'bum): bskal par gnas par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa byams pa mthong zhing chos nyan par 'gyur ro/ /shi nas gang du 'dod pa der skye bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs drung du yang skye bar 'gyur ro/ /
173a3(rgyud 'bum): ci ste ral gri bsgrub par 'dod na skyon med pa'i ral gri blangs nas nyin zhag gcig smyung bar byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas ji srid du rab tu 'bar ba'i bar du bzlas pa bya'o/ /de grub na
173a4(rgyud 'bum): g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /skra rna cha gdub kor dang 'dra bar 'khyil ba dang / lo bcu drug pa'i cha byad can dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs med cing / rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyis
173a5(rgyud 'bum): mi tshugs pa dang bar gyi bskal par 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /ci ste ldong ros bsgrub par 'dod na dpa' bo'i tshong gis nyos te/ rgyal dang ldan pa'i dus su zhag gsum smyung ba byas te/ dge slong bzang po'i dge
173a6(rgyud 'bum): 'dun la bshos drangs nas bka' lung stsal par bskul lo/ /sgrub pa po la der rjes su gnang nas rang gi gnas su rab tu zhugs te/ mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas mar gyi mar me stong rab tu sbar nas zhag
173a7(rgyud 'bum): gsum smyung ba byas la/ sems can thams cad la byams pa bskyed nas bdag nyid phul te ldong ros blangs nas/ ji srid grub pa rnam gsum thob pa de srid du bzlas pa byas te/ dro ba dang du ba 'thul ba dang 'bar
173a8(rgyud 'bum): bas sngar gang bsams pa nyid du grub par 'gyur te/ dro bar gyur pas dpral bar thig le byas na/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / 'byung po thams cad dang / sha za la sogs pa dang / 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas pa'i sems can bran du 'gyur zhing gang cung
173b1(rgyud 'bum): zad thams cad sgrub par byed par 'gyur ro/ /lo stong gi bar du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /du ba 'thul ba la ni dpral bar thig le byas na mi snang bar 'gyur te/ gal te 'dod na lha rnams kyis kyang mi mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /skad cig thang cig yud tsam la
173b2(rgyud 'bum): snang zhing yang mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /mi snang ba thams cad kyi rgyal por 'gyur zhing lo sum stong gi bar du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /'bar bas ni rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur te/ g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /rig pa
173b3(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin pa'i rgyal por 'gyur te/ lha gzhon nu'i lus su 'gyur zhing lha thams cad kyis kyang mi thul bar 'gyur na/ rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ bskal par yang gnas par 'gyur ro/ /dus byas nas dga'
173b4(rgyud 'bum): ldan gyi lha'i ris su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /ji ste mdung rtse gsum bsgrub par 'dod na lcags bzang po las byas pa'i mdung rtse gsum pa byas te/ lo'i bar du bzlas pa bya'o/ /de nas bye ma'i rang bzhin gyi mchod rten khru gang
173b5(rgyud 'bum): tsam gyi tshad byas te/ /de la mchod pa chen po bya zhing gtor ma rgya chen po btang la lag pa g.yas pas mdung rtse gsum pa blangs la skyil mo krung bcas nas ji srid du spros pa na/ 'od zer stong byung ba de'i bar du bzlas pa
173b6(rgyud 'bum): byas na skabs 'dir dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa lha rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad me tog gi char 'bebs pa dang lha thams cad kyang me tog gi char rab tu 'bebs par 'gyur ro/ /de nas
173b7(rgyud 'bum): de thams cad kyis yongs su bskor nas/ gang dag gis mthong ba dang gang mthong ba de dang lhan cig tu nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur/ rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po mig gsum par 'gyur te/ dbang phyug chen po gnyis pa
173b8(rgyud 'bum): dang 'dra ba'o/ /rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyis phyag byas shing / bskal pa chen por gnas par 'gyur la/ bltas pa tsam gyis gdug pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams ltung bar 'gyur ro/ /lha dang bcas pa'i
174a1(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten gang gis kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur na/ rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos/ shi 'phos nas bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /ji ste ro langs bsgrub par 'dod na/ yan lag rma med pa'i skyes
174a2(rgyud 'bum): bu'i ro blangs te/ seng ldeng gi phur bu bzhis btab la brang gi steng du rin po che'i phye mas gtor cing mchod na/ de'i lce'i rtse mo la nor bu rin po che snang bar 'gyur te/ de blangs na rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur bar
174a3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ /mtshon gang dag yid la bsams pa tsam gyis de dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /'od dpag tshad brgya tsam du snang bar 'gyur ro/ /'dod na dus byed par yang 'gyur ro/ /gang du 'dod pa der 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /'jig
174a4(rgyud 'bum): rten gyi khams gzhan dag tu yang rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur bar yang 'gyur ro/ /shi 'phos nas kyang dri ma med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /ro langs gnyis pa sgrub pa ni rma med pa'i lus
174a5(rgyud 'bum): kyi ro blangs la/ rgya shug gi shing gi phur bus btab la de'i khar lcags kyi phye mas gtor zhing byin na/ de'i lce 'byin par 'gyur te/ de bcad na g.yog 'khor brgya dang bcas te nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur/ bar gyi
174a6(rgyud 'bum): bskal par gnas par 'gyur/ ri rab kyi rtse mor rtse zhing dga' bar 'gyur/ gang gi tshe 'chi ba de'i tshe phyogs gcig gi rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /ji ste lcags kyu bsgrub par 'dod na/ rtswa ku sha'i rang bzhin gyi lcags kyu
174a7(rgyud 'bum): bya ste/ thab mo ba mdog nag po'i lag pa'i mthil gyis ba'i rnam lngas bkrus te/ mtshan mo gcig smyung ba byas nas lcags kyu khru gang gi tshad du byas la/ mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas phyag na rdo rje la mar gyi mar
174a8(rgyud 'bum): me brgya sbar bar bya'o/ /rdo rje lcags kyu dang bdag nyid la gdugs dkar pos bsrung bar bya'o/ /gzi brjid phung pos ni dkyil 'khor bcing bar bya'o/ /phur bu la lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa byas te/ phyogs
174b1(rgyud 'bum): bzhir gtor la phur bus btab na 'og tu bcing ba byas shing gnas yongs su gzung ba byas par yang 'gyur ro/ /de nas thun gnyis pa la rtse gcig pa'i yid kyis skyil mo krung bcas la/ lcags kyu la me tog dang
174b2(rgyud 'bum): dri dang bdug pas mchod na de bsrung ba byas pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal nas/ skabs 'dir lcags kyu lag pas bzung nas ji srid du dmyal ba'i
174b3(rgyud 'bum): sems can rnams 'tshe ba nye bar zhi ba'i bar du bzlas la/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal na nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po
174b4(rgyud 'bum): 'gro ba la thogs pa med pa lcags kyu lag na thogs pa lha thams cad dang klu dang gnod sbyin la sogs pa yang thag ring po nyid nas mthong na phyag 'tshal bar byed do/ /bskal par gnas par 'gyur ro/ /
174b5(rgyud 'bum): gang gi tshe 'chi ba de'i tshe phyag na rdo rje'i gnas su 'gro zhing phyag na rdo rje mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te ras ris sgrub par gyur na/ de 'bar ba na rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ cho ga gang bsgrub par
174b6(rgyud 'bum): 'dod kyang de'i sngags kyi ming bzung la 'bum bzla zhing / de nas nub gcig smyung ba byas te/ mchod pa rgya chen po byas la/ shing arka'i me rab tu sbar te til dag la zho dang mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong
174b7(rgyud 'bum): rtsa brgyad byas na/ sbyin sreg gi mthar 'ongs nas nor gang 'dod pa de ster bar 'gyur zhing mngag gzhug pa dbang du byed pa bzhin du nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro/ /ji ste dbang phyug chen po dbang du byed par 'dod na/ dbang phyug chen po la
174b8(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa rgya chen po byas la/ lho phyogs su yud tsam gyis shing arka'i me rab tu sbar la sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas pa na/ ha ha zhes pa'i sgra byung bar gyur na 'jigs par mi bya/ de nas de 'ong bar 'gyur te/ bdag gis ci zhig bya zhes smra
175a1(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur ro/ /dbang phyug chen po'i rig pa thams cad bdag la grub par gyur cig ces smras pa dang / mchog gang 'dod pa de ster bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin du gyur cig ces byas nas mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /
175a2(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin du khyab 'jug dang tshangs pa la sogs pa gang yang 'gugs par 'gyur te/ mchog gang 'dod pa de'ang 'di bzhin te/ cho ga 'di bzhin du byas la legs par bsrung ba yang bya'o/ /ci ste gnod sbyin mo dgug par 'dod na/
175a3(rgyud 'bum): de'i ming bzung la zhag bdun du shing mya ngan med kyi me tog gis sbyin sreg byas na 'ong zhing mchog ster bar byed do/ /zhag bdun gyis ma dang sring mo dang chung ma gang 'dod pa de'i cha byad du nges par 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /
175a4(rgyud 'bum): ji ste mi 'ong na mgo 'gas par 'gyur ro/ /klu mo dbang du byed par 'dod na klu shing gi me tog gis cho ga 'di bzhin du bya'o/ /srin mo dgug par 'dod na/ zla ba gsum du zho dang 'bras chan gyi sbyin sreg bya'o/ /
175a5(rgyud 'bum): sbyin sreg gi mthar zhag gcig smyung ba byas la/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod cing gnod sbyin la gtor ma chan rnams sbyin par byas shing gnod sbyin dgug par bya'o zhes yid la byed cing / /a mra'i shing gi yam shing
175a6(rgyud 'bum): zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na/ skabs 'dir lus ngan po la sogs pa'i gnod sbyin 'ong bar 'gyur la/ de dag la shing arka'i me tog gi mchod yon byin na de dag ci zhig
175a7(rgyud 'bum): bya zhes smra bar 'gyur ro/ /des brjod par bya ba ni nyin re zhing gnod sbyin lung bzhin du byed pa dgos so zhes brjod par bya ste/ des gnod sbyin re re ster bar 'gyur ro/ /des lung bsgo bar bya ba ni dpag tshad brgya nas bud med rnams 'dir
175a8(rgyud 'bum): 'ong bar gyis la tho rangs de nyid du khyer cig ces pa dang 'khor brgya la yang 'bras chan byin cig ces brjod na/ rgyab tu khur nas gang du 'dod pa der 'gro zhing khyer bar 'gyur ro/ /lung stsal ba thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /ci ste phyag na rdo rje
175b1(rgyud 'bum): bsgrub par 'dod na bzhi 'gyur dang bdun 'gyur gyi sngon du bsnyen pa byas la/ cho 'phrul gyi zla ba phyed po ma lus pa la rab tu rgya che ba'i mchod pa byas la ji srid zla ba nya ba'i bar du ste/ zla ba nya ba'i bar du mchod pa byas la
175b2(rgyud 'bum): dge slong gi dge 'dun khyad par can dag la bshos gsol nas/ 'phags pa rdo rje 'dzin kho na la rjes su yi rang bar byed du gzhug go/ de nas mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas dang po'i thun 'das te gnyis pa'i thun la skyil mo krung
175b3(rgyud 'bum): bcas te 'dug la/ sems rtse gcig pas rdo rje 'dzin blta bar bya'o/ /zhes sems la kun tu brtags te/ gu gul gyi ril bu rgya shug gi 'bras bu'i tshad tsam gyi mtshan mo thun gcig tu sbyin sreg bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan
175b4(rgyud 'bum): 'das kyi yul bskyod par 'gyur zhing / sa 'gul ba dang sprin gyi sgra sgrogs par 'gyur ba dang / rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad me tog gi char rab tu 'bebs par 'gyur ro/ /skabs 'dir bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje rig pa thams cad
175b5(rgyud 'bum): kyis yongs su bskor ba dang rig pa mchog la sogs pa'i rig pa'i rgyal pos yongs su bskor ba byon par 'gyur ro/ /lha thams cad dang / klu thams cad dang / gnod sbyin thams cad dang / dri za dang mi'am cis byang chub sems dpa' yongs su bskor ba byon
175b6(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ /de'i mod la dmyal ba'i sems can rnams kyi shin tu drag pa'i tshor ba'i sdug bsngal nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /dri'i chus mchod yon dbul zhing phyag 'tshal te 'dug par bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin gyis gsungs
175b7(rgyud 'bum): pa ni mchog ci zhig sbyin par bya/ rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba nyid dam sa 'og tu 'gro ba'am rgyal srid dam mi snang bar 'gro ba'am gang 'dod pa de nyid bcom ldan 'das las thob par 'gyur ro/ /gang 'dod pa'i rig pa 'dzin
175b8(rgyud 'bum): pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba nyid dang rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi 'khor los sgyur ba rdo rje'i sku dang / phyag na rdo rje dang 'dra ba dang bsams pa tsam gyis mtshan ma thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /bskal pa chen por gnas par 'gyur ro/ /gang gi tshe 'dzin pa de'i tshe rdo rje'i gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /
176a1(rgyud 'bum): rig pa 'dzin pa gzhan dag gi yang cho ga 'di bzhin te/ mdor na phyag na rdo rje'i cho ga gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi cho ga gang yin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i cho ga gang yin pa
176a2(rgyud 'bum): dang / tshangs pa'i cho ga gang yin pa dang / dbang phyug chen po'i cho ga gang yin pa dang / mdor na 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sgrub pa gang yin pa de dag kyang 'di nyid kyis sgrub pa byas na 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /sngags gang
176a3(rgyud 'bum): gis sgrub pa byas kyang ma grub pa ni 'dis lus la bzlas pa byas na/ nub bdun gyis nges par mthong ba sbyin par byed do/ /ji ste mi sbyin na ni rnam par nyams par 'gyur ro/ /dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha'i mdun du
176a4(rgyud 'bum): gal te zlos pa byed na nub bdun gyi nang du mthong ba sbyin par byed do/ /gal te sbyin par mi byed na mgo tshal pa bdun phrag gsum du 'gas par 'gyur ro/ /zla ba dang nyi ma gzas zin pa na mar dang shu dag dang mig sman dang dag
176a5(rgyud 'bum): byed dang so shing dang mchod phyir thogs dang ba bla dang ldong ros la sogs pa bsgrub par bya'o/ /ji ste rdzas rnams bsgrub par 'dod na/ ldong ros blangs te mi'i 'o ma dang sbyar ba byas la ril bu lngar bya zhing / a ga ru'i snod kha
176a6(rgyud 'bum): sbyar gyi nang du bcug cing yungs kar dang lhan cig bsgrub par bya'o/ /zla ba dang nyi ma gzas zin pa'i dus su gtor ma'i cho ga byas te/ gang gi tshe yungs kar tsi ti tsi ti zhes sgra 'don pa de'i tshe grub pa dang po yin te/
176a7(rgyud 'bum): skye bo thams cad dbang du 'gyur la de'i tshe 'di thams cad dbang du byed par 'gyur te/ gang smras pa de thams cad byed do/ /ji ste du ba 'thul bar byed na mi snang bar byed pa thams cad kyi rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /bar gyi
176a8(rgyud 'bum): bskal par 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /gang gi tshe 'bar bar gyur pa de'i tshe ni lha gzhon nu'i gzugs su 'gyur zhing / nyi ma 'char ka'i gzi brjid dang ldan la rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal por 'gyur/ bskal pa chen por
176b1(rgyud 'bum): 'tsho bar 'gyur/ de bzhin du gi wang dang ba bla la sogs pa la'ang bsgrub par bya'o/ /ci ste mig sman bsgrub par 'dod na/ lig bu mig dang ut+pa la sngon po dang ru rta dang tsan+dan dag gcig tu byas te/ zangs ma'i snod du
176b2(rgyud 'bum): gzhag la zla ba gzas zin pa'i dus su ci srid du ba 'thul ba de srid kyi bar du bzlas pa bya'o/ /de nas mig la bskus na mi snang bar 'gyur te/ ci ltar 'dod pa'i gzugs dang mi snang bar byed pa thams cad kyi rgyal
176b3(rgyud 'bum): por 'gyur ro/ /ji ste ral gri bsgrub par 'dod na ral gri ma nyams pa blangs la/ mar ngo'i tshes brgyad dam bcu bzhi la ras ris la mchod pa rgya chen po dang gtor ma btang zhing bsrung ba byas na/ ral gri lag pa g.yas pas
176b4(rgyud 'bum): bzung ste/ ji srid 'od 'phro ba dang 'bar ba de srid kyi bar du bzlas pa byas na/ gal te 'od 'phro na ni rig pa 'dzin pa gcig pur 'gyur ro/ /'bar bas ni de rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi rgyal por 'gyur ba dang / stobs dang
176b5(rgyud 'bum): pha rol gnon pa thogs pa med pa dang gang gis mthong ba dang gang mthong ba de dang lhan cig nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /ci ste rdo rje bsgrub par 'dod na lcags bzang po'i rang bzhin las rdo rje byas te/ sor bcu
176b6(rgyud 'bum): drug pa rtse mo gnyi ga yang rtse gsum pa tsan+dan dmar pos byugs la/ cho 'phrul gyi zla phyed kyi tshes nas brtsams nas ras ris la mchod pa rgya chen po byas te bzlas pa bya zhing / tshes nas nyi ma re re zhing re res
176b7(rgyud 'bum): bskyed pa'i dge slong dag la bshos drang bar bya'o/ /tha mar nub gsum smyung ba byas la sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi mdun du ras ris rab tu bzhag cing / mchod pa rgya chen po byas la/ mar gyi mar
176b8(rgyud 'bum): me brgya rab tu sbar zhing ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug par bya'o/ /lag pa gnyis kyis rdo rje bzung la ji srid 'bar ba de'i bar du bzlas pa bya zhing / de bzung na de 'khor dang bcas pa nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur/
177a1(rgyud 'bum): rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur/ phyag na rdo rje dang 'dra bar pha rol gnon par 'gyur/ bskal pa chen por 'tsho bar 'gyur/ lus zhig nas phyag na rdo rje'i gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du mdung
177a2(rgyud 'bum): rtse dang 'khor lo dang mda' dang mdung la sogs pa mtshon thams cad dang mchil lham dang so shing dang mchod phyir thogs la sogs pa gzhan gyi cho ga'i bya bas bsgrub par bya zhing / thams cad kyang grub pa rnam pa gsum
177a3(rgyud 'bum): yin no/ /zhi ba byed par 'dod pa la pad ma'i rnam pa 'dra ba'i thab khung byas la/ mchod sbyin la 'os pa'i yan lag gis me rab tu sbar la blugs gzar gyis zas mchog dang zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar dang sbyar ba'i sbyin
177a4(rgyud 'bum): sreg stong rtsa brgyad zhag gsum byas na/ bdag dang gzhan zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /zhag bdun gyis ni grong ngam grong khyer gyi 'chi ba mang po'i nye bar 'tshe ba zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /shing sha ma'i yam shing la zho dang sbrang rtsi
177a5(rgyud 'bum): dang mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad kyang bya'o/ /yang na shing u dum bA ra'i yam shing la zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad kyang bya'o/ /char mi 'bab pa la ni mngar
177a6(rgyud 'bum): gsum gyi sbyin sreg byas na thams cad du mchog tu zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro/ /slong mo'i zas za zhing cho 'phrul chen po'i zla phyed kyi zla ba nya'i bar du nub gsum smyung ba byas la/ zla ba gzas zin pa na ba nag mo'i 'o ma
177a7(rgyud 'bum): la lan brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags te 'thungs na bcud kyis len gyi yon tan dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /rtswa dUr ba'i 'jag ma la zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pas stong rtsa brgyad nub bcu'i bar du sbyin sreg byas na dus
177a8(rgyud 'bum): ma yin par 'chi ba rab tu zhi zhing tshe ring bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal mtshan dang dung la sogs pa la mngon par bsngags na/ mthong ba dang thos pas pha rol gyi sde dpung gis mi g.yo bar byas par 'gyur ro/ /bum pa sar pa 'bru thams
177b1(rgyud 'bum): cad dang spos chus bkang ba la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas pas log 'dren gyis gtses shing zin pa bkrus te dbang bskur na dpal dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /'dis dbang bskur na sdig pa kun las grol bar 'gyur
177b2(rgyud 'bum): te/ dkyil 'khor gyi las dang gdon gyi las rnams kyang byed par 'gyur ro/ /rma bya'i mjug ma la lan 'bum bzlas brjod byas na dug thams cad sel bar 'gyur ro/ /de nyid kyis rims dang mig gi nad dang gzer thabs
177b3(rgyud 'bum): la sogs pa sel bar byed do/ /srung ba'i skud pas ni nad thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro/ /phyag rgya dang ldan pa'i ji skad gsungs pa'i sngags kyis seng ldeng gi yam shing la zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg
177b4(rgyud 'bum): stong rtsa brgyad byas na lha ma yin gyi sngags 'joms par byed do/ /dus gsum du nyin mtshan nyi shu rtsa gcig la 'bras thug po che la zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na longs spyod thob par
177b5(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ /lha dbang du bya bar 'dod na a ga ru'i yam shing la zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg dus gsum du nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig la stong rtsa brgyad bya'o/ /'bras thug po che la zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis
177b6(rgyud 'bum): btags pa gcig tu byas pas sbyin sreg byas na zas mi zad par 'gyur ro/ /gnod sbyin dbang du byed na gu gul gyi ril bu la zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad bya'o/ /shing mya ngan
177b7(rgyud 'bum): med kyi yam shing gi ni gnod sbyin mo rnams la bya'o/ /klu rnams la ni klu shing gi me tog gis bya'o/ /'phags pa phyag na rdo rje la ni a ka ru'i yam shing gis bya'o/ /rig pa 'dzin pa la ni po son cha'i shing gi yam shing gis
177b8(rgyud 'bum): so/ /a ga ru'i yam shing la tu ru ska'i 'bru mar gyis btags pas ni dri za la sbyin sreg bya'o/ /yi dags rnams la ni bil ba'i shing gi yam shing gis so/ /mi'am ci rnams la ni sra rtsi pog gi sbyin sreg gis so/ /
178a1(rgyud 'bum): log 'dren thams cad la ni zhag bdun du sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o/ /rgyal po'i bu la ni yungs kar til mar gyis btags pa dus gsum du zhag bdun la sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad bya zhing / nyi ma la
178a2(rgyud 'bum): mngon du phyogs nas bzlas brjod 'bum byas na sdig pa thams cad las rab tu grol bar 'gyur ro/ /rig pa thams cad tshim par byed par 'dod na ba gcin dang nas kyi kha zas za zhing rtswa u shi ra las gzugs brnyan
178a3(rgyud 'bum): byas te/ me tog dkar pos mchod cing 'o ma brgya rtsa brgyad kyis sbyin sreg byas nas 'o mas khrus byas te/ bzlas pa brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas shing a ga ru'i dud pas bdugs na tshim zhing rgyas par byas par 'gyur ro/ /
178a4(rgyud 'bum): lan gcig bzlas pas bdag bsrung ba byas par 'gyur ro/ /lan gnyis bzlas pas gzhan bsrung ba byas par 'gyur ro/ /lan gsum bzlas pa byas pas rdzas bsrung ba byas par 'gyur ro/ /lus chad pa dang zhom
178a5(rgyud 'bum): pa dang dug gis reg pa dang phur bus btab pa rnams la rtas par byed par 'dod na sman u shi ra las gzugs brnyan du byas te/ me tog dkar pos mchod la 'dis gtsug tor gyi rgyal po'i ras ris kyi mdun du yungs kar
178a6(rgyud 'bum): gyi rgyal po la zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags la sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na rig pa nye bar dmigs nas phur bu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /ji srid du bzlas kyang rig pa 'bras bu med par shes na gi wang gis gro
178a7(rgyud 'bum): ga la bris te/ gro ga de la brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags pa byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa rgya chen po byas la/ bcom ldan 'das 'di dang lhan cig stong rtsa brgyad bzlas la/ ku sha'i stan de nyid du
178a8(rgyud 'bum): gnyid log na rmi lam du 'ongs te 'bras bu med pa'i rgyu ston par 'gyur ro/ /ci ste me tog pad ma bsgrub par 'dod na/ tsan+dan dmar po las pad ma byas te/ mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas zhag gsum smyung
178b1(rgyud 'bum): ba byas te/ pad ma lag pa g.yas pas bzung la ji srid 'bar ba de srid kyi bar du bzlas pa byas na/ g.yog 'khor nyi shu dang nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur/ rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur/ thogs
178b2(rgyud 'bum): pa med par 'gro bar 'gyur/ gang gi tshe 'chi ba de'i tshe bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /ci ste rdo rje bsgrub par 'dod na/ grog mkhar gyi sa dang bye ma bsres nas rdo rje byas la/ bslangs pa'i kha zas kyis 'tsho zhing mi smra ba'i
178b3(rgyud 'bum): dka' thub dang lam 'gog par byed cing rdo rje bzung ste/ myur du bzlas pa 'bum bya'o/ /rdo rje ni rtse gcig par byas te/ rdo rje de yungs kar gyi nang du gzhag la/ yungs kar de ji srid du tsi ti tsi ti'i sgra sgrogs pa de srid du bzlas pa
178b4(rgyud 'bum): byas na rdo rje 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje de blangs nas las thams cad byed par 'gyur te/ ri'i rtse mo yang phye mar byed la klu'i shing yang skem par byed cing chu bo yang rgyun phyogs las zlog par byed do/ /klu rnams 'byer bar
178b5(rgyud 'bum): byed do/ /dug rnams dug med par byed do/ /srog chags thams cad rengs par byed do/ /rmongs par byed do/ /ltung bar byed do/ /sngags phye mar byed do/ /shing rta la sogs pa yang rengs par byed do/ /de la sogs pa'i las
178b6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad byed par 'di nyid kyi rtse gsum pa'i rdo rjes sgrub par byed de/ gtsug spyod kyis kyang mngon sum du bgegs byed par mi nus so/ /'di'i cho gas rtag tu bzlas pa byed pa'i dus su sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyi sngags kyis
178b7(rgyud 'bum): thog ma dang tha mar lan re re bzlas pa byed na/ de dag zhi ba nyid du 'gyur zhing grub pa yang mngon sum du 'gyur ro/ /de nas rgya mtsho chen por 'bab pa'i chu bo la yi ge gcig pas pad ma 'bum dor na/ dpal
178b8(rgyud 'bum): rang 'ongs nas mchog dang rgyal srid kyang sbyin par byed de/ ci ste 'bru gcig pa dang bcas pa'i pad ma 'bum phrag gsum dor na sa kun la dbang ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /lnga 'bum bzlas na 'dzam bu'i gling gi bdag por
179a1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ /sa 'og tu 'jug pa'i sgor rkang pa bzhag ste/ 'bum phrag gsum bzlas na 'khrul 'khor thams cad bcom nas dogs pa med par 'gyur zhing / zhugs nas kyang bcud kyis len thams cad 'byin par 'gyur ro/ /
179a2(rgyud 'bum): ji ste de nyid du 'dug na'ang khyab 'jug gi 'khor lo'i 'jigs pa med par 'gyur ro/ /ci ste 'khor lo nang du byung na yang sngags dran pa tsam gyis thal bar 'gyur ro/ /bsams pa tsam gyis phyir gso bar yang nus so/ /nam yang phyis
179a3(rgyud 'bum): rab tu 'jug par yang mi 'gyur ro/ /yar ngo de dang de'i tshes gcig nas brtsams te/ dus gsum du sna ma'i me tog la lan gcig bzlas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi mthe bo'i drung du gzhag pa byas
179a4(rgyud 'bum): nas/ ci tsam na zhabs kyi mtho bo nas 'od zer byung nas/ sgrub pa po de'i lus la zhugs par 'gyur gyi bar du byas na/ de'i mod kho na la skra 'khyil zhing 'khor dang ldan par yang 'gyur ro/ /'khor dang bcas pa nam
179a5(rgyud 'bum): mkha' la 'gro zhing rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal por yang 'gyur ro/ /bskal par yang gnas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rgya mtsho'i ngogs su ras ris nub phyogs su bstan te bzhag la klu shing gis me rab tu sbar nas/
179a6(rgyud 'bum): rgya mtsho la dmigs nas klu shing gi me tog gis sbyin sreg 'bum byas na/ rgya mtsho'i rlabs 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de ni grub pa'i mtshan ma yin pas 'jigs par mi bya'o/ /ji srid rgya mtsho las bram ze'i
179a7(rgyud 'bum): gzugs kyis 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /bdag gis ci zhig bya zhes smra ba na khyod nga'i dbang du gyis shig ces smra bar bya'o/ /de nas gang ci bsgo ba de thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /sa la pad ma 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa bris te/ de'i
179a8(rgyud 'bum): steng du 'dug nas brgya phrag stong bzlas pa byas na pad ma de sa las 'phags nas g.yog 'khor stong dang bcas pa nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /bskal pa chen por gnas pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal
179b1(rgyud 'bum): por yang 'gyur ro/ /lam gcod par byed par yang mi nus so/ /'od dpag tshad lngar snang bar byed par 'gyur ro/ /cho 'phrul chen po'i zla ba phyed la sna ma'i me tog dang ldan pas re re zhing bzlas shing / bcom ldan 'das kyi
179b2(rgyud 'bum): gtsug tor gyi steng du 'bum phrag gcig phul na/ ji srid gtsug tor nas 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur te/ sgrub pa po'i lus la zhugs kyi bar du byas na de'i mod kho na la mngon par shes pa lnga thob par 'gyur ro/ /'bum phrag
179b3(rgyud 'bum): bcu bzlas pa byas na ji lta ji ltar rab tu sbyar ba ste de lta de ltar las byed par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di nyid dang lhan cig gal te rig pa zlo bar byed na de nges par 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /mngon sum du bzlas na
179b4(rgyud 'bum): yang 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te 'ong bar mi byed na de'i mgo 'gas pa'am skem par 'gyur ro/ /yi ge gcig pa 'di ni gzhan ci zhig yin te/ gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba de bzhin gshegs pa 'di nyid mngon sum
179b5(rgyud 'bum): yin te/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na sngags dang rig pa thams cad kyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa nyid do/ /gdugs dkar po dang gzi brjid phung po la sogs pa ni 'di'i g.yog 'khor yin te/ gtsug
179b6(rgyud 'bum): tor gyi rgyal po thams cad kyis kyang bsgrub par bya ba yin te/ cho ga thams cad 'di nyid la sbyar bar bya zhing / gtsug tor gyi rgyal po thams cad kyis kyang 'di bsgrub par bya'o/ /cho ga thams cad kyis kyang 'di bsgrub
179b7(rgyud 'bum): par bya'o/ /dngos grub dam pa 'dod pas kyang gnas ma yin par sbyar bar mi bya'o/ /gal te sbyor bar byed na grub pa dam par 'gyur ba ma yin zhing / mdor na lha thams cad kyang 'dis 'gugs par byed do/ /de nas gter
179b8(rgyud 'bum): 'byin par 'dod na gang du gter yod pa der song la/ rtsa ba mi gnag pa'i bum pa blangs nas dri zhim po thams cad kyi lde gus byugs te/ tsan+dan dkar po dang chu'i nang du bcug ste/ stong rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags pa byas
180a1(rgyud 'bum): nas gal te gter yod na sa de rang bye bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te gter de mi gang tsam na yod na chus gtor la khru gang tsam brkos la blang bar bya'o/ /ci ste seng ge bsgrub par 'dod na grog mkhar gyi sa dang gi wang gi lde
180a2(rgyud 'bum): gus bsres pa'i gong bu las byas nas bzhag ste/ mchod pa rgya chen po byas la ji srid 'gul ba de srid kyi bar du bzlas pa byas na 'grub par 'gyur te 'gul ba na 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /rgyab tu zhon na rna cha gdub kor dang 'dra zhing
180a3(rgyud 'bum): 'khyil ba'i skra dang bdag dang bcas pa'i 'khor lnga bcu dang nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /tshangs pa ji lta bar lo stong phrag dgur 'tsho bar 'gyur/ rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyis mi thub par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du glang
180a4(rgyud 'bum): po che dang ma he bsgrub par bya'o/ /gang gi tshe seng ge seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa de'i tshe lha rnams stan las sa la ltung bar 'gyur ro/ /pad ma'i mtshor phyin nas pad ma 'bum gyis mchod na sa kun gyi rgyal thabs thob par
180a5(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ /shing ka ra bI ra'i me tog kha ma 'bus pa'i sbyin sreg 'bum byas na rgyal po'i bu mo thob par 'gyur ro/ /sna ma'i me tog 'bum gyis rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu bo la sngags dang bcas pas gtor na/ gang
180a6(rgyud 'bum): 'dod pa'i bu mo thob par 'gyur zhing grub pa mchog thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba 'di'i sngags kyis ni de gang du 'ongs pa der dbang po yang de la stan stobs par 'gyur ro/ /lha'i
180a7(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po thams cad kyis kyang ring po nas mthong na 'jigs pas dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /lha rnams kyi rgyal po thams cad du yang 'gyur ro/ /de ltar rgya cher bcom ldan 'das shAkya seng ge mi mchog gis gsungs pa yin no/ /
180a8(rgyud 'bum): 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga /byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/ yi ge gcig pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i las kyi cho ga dang ras ris bstan pa'i le'u rab 'byam
180b1(rgyud 'bum): las nyi shu pa rdzogs s+ho/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas gzhan yang gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la gzigs nas/ de na gnas pa'i lha'i tshogs thams cad dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang sangs rgyas
180b2(rgyud 'bum): dang / nyan thos dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal bstan pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nor du gyur pa/ chos kyi mdzod 'jig rten pa rnams kyi bsam pa 'bras bu dang bcas pa byed pa
180b3(rgyud 'bum): 'i phyir nor bu rin po che lta bur gyur pa'o/ /dus kyi tha ma'i dus de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'das shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag stongs pa na dam pa'i chos kyi tshul nub pa'i dus tshod na/ de bzhin gshegs
180b4(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyi sngags kyi mdzod yang dag par bsrung ba'i phyir gzhon nu khyod kyi sngags dang rgyud rnams kyi cho ga'i rgyal po ni thun mong du gyur cing gter du gyur par 'gyur ba yin te/ sems can thams cad kyi bsams pa yongs su
180b5(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir cho ga bzhin du bzlas pa byas na thob pa yin no/ /'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags dang rgyud rnams kyi 'di ni snying por gyur pa yin te/ gzhon nu khyod kyi cho ga'i rgyal po 'di ni
180b6(rgyud 'bum): mchog tu gyur pa yin no/ /yi ge gcig pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba 'di bzlas pas ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rig pa'i rgyal po bzlas par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal gzhan yang khyod kyi cho ga'i rgyal po gter
180b7(rgyud 'bum): du gyur pa/ snying por gyur pa/ mchog tu gyur pa/ gtso bor gyur pa/ yi ge gcig pa sngon byung bar 'gyur ro/ /'das pa'i dus dang 'das pa'i dus tshod du gang gA'i klung gi bye ma drug cu rtsa gnyis snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs
180b8(rgyud 'bum): pa dang tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa rnam par nges pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/
181a1(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ bla na med pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gis dran pa tsam mam mtshan 'dzin pas kyang mtshams med pa lnga'i las kyang
181a2(rgyud 'bum): zad par 'gyur ro/ /gang gi mtshan thos pa tsam gyis kyang sems can mang po nges par byang chub la gzhol bar 'gyur na sngags 'grub pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ sngags zlos pa thams cad kyis kyang nges par tshe dang ye shes
181a3(rgyud 'bum): dpag tu med pa rnam par nges pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'di la dang por ngag gis kyang phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa rnam par nges pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po de
181a4(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin du de nas 'od dpag med dang rin chen tog la phyag bya'o/ /de nas sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag byas
181a5(rgyud 'bum): nas ci 'dod pa'i sngags bzlas pa byas na myur du grub pa stsol bar 'gyur te/ gang gi phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa gsum gyi mtshan yongs su bsgrags pa dang phyag 'tshal bas ni bsod nams chen po 'phel ba'i
181a6(rgyud 'bum): phyir dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la yang phyag 'tshal bas ni nges par byang chub la gzhol ba dang dge ba'i tshogs 'di yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i grangs su 'gro zhing de'i sngags kyang myur du 'grub
181a7(rgyud 'bum): pa stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa rnam par nges pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis yi ge gcig pa'i sngags 'di gsungs te/ de
181a8(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po sngags dang rgyud thams cad kyi mngon par 'dod pa/ sngags thams cad kyi don sgrub par byed pa/ 'jam pa'i dbyangs khyod kyi cho ga'i rgyal po mchog tu gtsang ba dang gtsang ba dam pa dang 'jig
181b1(rgyud 'bum): rten rnams la phan pa'i phyir rab tu sbyar bar bya'o/ /slob ma ma yin pa dang chos dang mi ldan pa dang de bzhin du ston pa dang bstan pa la ma dad pa dang gzhan gyis pham pa dang ma rungs pa dang nga rgyal can dang ston pa dang bstan pa la
181b2(rgyud 'bum): nyes pa tshol ba la ni nam yang rab tu sbyar bar mi bya'o/ /rgyal ba'i sras la rab tu mi dang ba dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams la yang mchod pa dang rjes su gzung ba mi bzod pa de la ni ngas sbyin par mi bya'o/ /de la
181b3(rgyud 'bum): ni sngags grub pa mi snang ste/ dad cing zhi ba'i sems ldan dang / /sangs rgyas bstan la rab tu dang / /byang chub sems la rtag tu ni/ /mchod dang rjes bzung de gtsor byed/ /de la sngags 'di 'grub 'gyur zhes/ /cho ga 'dir
181b4(rgyud 'bum): ni yang dag bstan/ /sngags chen yi ge gcig pa ni/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis nges par sbyar/ /'jig rten mgon 'dis sngags 'di ni/ /re ba skyed byed stsol ba yin/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po yin/ /sngags rnams ma lus 'byung
181b5(rgyud 'bum): ba'i gnas/ /bdun cu rtsa drug bye ba ni/ /rang byung nyid kyis sngon gsungs pa/ /lus can sdig pas rmongs rnams la/ /sngags rnams dge ba'i don du yin/ /de bzhin gshegs rnams kun gyi sngags/ /ston pa'i
181b6(rgyud 'bum): gzugs su yang dag gnas/ /de dag la 'di snying por 'gyur/ /rig pa'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul che/ /yi ge gcig por rtag par gnas/ /ther zug tu yang 'di rab 'jug /'dir ni chos kyi mthar gnas te/ /'gro la
181b7(rgyud 'bum): phan phyir sangs rgyas yin/ /chos kyi tshul la yang dag gnas/ /'di ni yi ge gcig pa yin/ /sngags ni don rnams ma lus sgrub/ /rgyal po ma rungs zlog byed yin/ /las ni sna tshogs byed pa yin/ /las kun ma lus sgrub pa'o/ /
181b8(rgyud 'bum): las ni rtsa brgyad stong po rnams/ /nges par yang ni byed par 'gyur/ /cho ga mthong ba'i las kyis ni/ /phun sum tshogs pa sna tshogs ster/ /'jam dpal gyi ni snying po ni/ /yi ge ma dang yang dag ldan/ /yi ge u dang rtag 'gro zhes/ /
182a1(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten na ni rtag 'jug 'gyur/ /tshe dang ye shes dpag med rgyal/ /dbang pos nges pa'i don du gsungs/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs la sangs rgyas kyis/ /dbang gi don du 'di rab sbyin/ /des na dus mtha'i 'jig
182a2(rgyud 'bum): rten 'dir/ /ston pa mya ngan 'das pa na/ /cho ga mthong ba'i rgyu yis ni/ /myur du grub par 'gro bar 'gyur/ /tshe ni dpag med ces bya bas/ /rnam par brtags par gyur pa yin/ /der ni bcom ldan sangs rgyas te/ /chos
182a3(rgyud 'bum): kyi 'khor lo skor byed pa/ /dpag med bskal par gnas pa dang / /tshe la dbang bar byin gyis brlabs/ /de nyid phyir na de mtshan gyur/ /dpag med tshe dang ye shes nges/ /'jig rten kun gyi rgyal po'i dbang / /rdzu 'phrul
182a4(rgyud 'bum): che 'di de bzhin gshegs/ /de ni sngags mchog gtso 'di byin/ /sangs rgyas sras po blo dang ldan/ /sras kyi gtso bo dam pa ni/ /rdzu 'phrul che zhing stobs kyang che/ /de nas sras po de nyid kyis/ /'di ni kun tu bzang
182a5(rgyud 'bum): la sbyor/ /de nas sangs rgyas sras rnams la/ /de ni de bzhin gshegs dag gis/ /sngags rnams kyi ni mchog gyur pa/ /chos kyi rgyal pos gsungs pa ni/ /'byung po rnams la phan don du/ /sngags rnams ma lus
182a6(rgyud 'bum): gsungs pa yin/ /tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa rnam par nges pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal po tshe
182a7(rgyud 'bum): dpag tu med pa dang 'od dpag tu med pa dang rin chen tog la sogs pa sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de rnams la phyag 'tshal nas lan gsum sngags bzla bar bya'o/ /yi ge gcig po de gang zhe na/ mu/ grogs
182a8(rgyud 'bum): p o dag 'di ni tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa rnam par gdon mi za ba'i dbang po'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bkod pa dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa'i 'jig
182b1(rgyud 'bum): r ten gyi khams su bzhugs te gsungs pa ni sems can thams cad kyi don dang phan pa dang bde ba dang 'jig rten la snying brtse ba'i phyir dang skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i don dang ma 'ongs pa'i skye bo dag la gzigs nas bstan pa nub pa'i
182b2(rgyud 'bum): dus tshod du mkhyen nas dus kyi tha ma la dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa byed pa'i ma rungs pa'i rgyal po bzlog pa'i phyir dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi sras kyi gtso bo mthu chen po thob pa'i byang chub sems
182b3(rgyud 'bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po la sbyin pa'i phyir dang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis kun tu bzang po la byin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po des kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
182b4(rgyud 'bum): pa la byin no/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa des kyang sems can thams cad rjes su gzung ba'i phyir snying rje chen po'i dbang gis snying gi gnas su rang gi lus la bzhag go/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus la bltos nas dus
182b5(rgyud 'bum): kyi tha ma bstan pa nub pa'i dus tshod la de bzhin gshegs pa'i tha ma bdag gis kyang bstan te/ rtsod pa'i dus dang bstan pa 'jig pa'i dus su nga'i bstan pa yang dag par bsrung ba'i don byed par 'gyur ro/ /'di'i cho
182b6(rgyud 'bum): ga gzhan yang mdor bsdus nas brjod par bya ba ni 'jam pa'i dbyangs gzhon nu nyon cig / bdag nyid chen po'i cho ga rgya che ba 'di'i cho ga'i rgyal po'i dbang po brjod par bya ste/ dang por re zhig ri'i rtse mor 'dzegs te/ 'bum
182b7(rgyud 'bum): phrag sum cu bzlas pa byas na sngar bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /'o mas 'tsho zhing mi smra ba'i brtul zhugs dang sngags gzhan la mi rten pa dang / gzhan la mi sems pa dang / skyabs gsum yongs su blangs pa dang / byang chub tu sems
182b8(rgyud 'bum): bskyed pa dang / khrims lnga'i sdom pa yang dag par blangs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa yang dag par blangs pas bzlas pa byas la des las rnams bya ba ste/ dang por re zhig ras la ri mo bya ba ni ri mo mkhan gso sbyong byas la tshon ma 'dres pa dag gis
183a1(rgyud 'bum): bri'o/ /gtsang ma'i ras kyi dum bu gang yang rung ba'am dar la tsan+dan dang ga pur dang gur gum gyi chus gtor la/ gtsang ba'i sa phyogs su gtsang ba'i ri mo byed pa dkar gsum za zhing gos dkar po gyon pas zla ba nya ba'i bcwa lnga
183a2(rgyud 'bum): la nyi ma 'char ba'i dus su rnam par dag pa'i rgyu skar la nyi ma phyed pa'i bar du bri bar bya ste de nas bri ba spang bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du nyin re zhing yang yongs su rdzogs kyi bar du bya'o/ /dang por re zhig ras la tshe dpag tu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams
183a3(rgyud 'bum): bri bar bya'o/ /ras khru gang tsam mam bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang gi tshad dam/ ras khru bzhi pa la kho ra yug tu tshe dpag tu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bri'o/ /pad ma rA ga dang in+d+ra nI la dang shel dang rin po che margad kyi ras
183a4(rgyud 'bum): ris kyi 'og gi phyogs su mdzes par bya'o/ /de dag gi steng gi phyogs su rin po che'i gzhal med khang mdzes pa'i rnam pa dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan mdzes pa'i rnam par bsgreng ba dang de'i dbus su tshe dpag tu med pa rnam par gdon mi za
183a5(rgyud 'bum): ba'i dbang po'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa chos 'chad pa seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa/ kun nas 'od kyi phreng ba rab tu 'bar ba/ kha dog cung zad dmar zhing dkar ba/ g.yon phyogs su mthing shing gi rdo la bzhugs pa byang chub
183a6(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob phyag g.yas na rnga yab thogs shing de bzhin gshegs pa la gtod pa'i lta ba dang lag pa g.yon na skyur rtsi chen po'i shing thog thogs pa/ me tog pri yang ku ltar sngo
183a7(rgyud 'bum): sangs gzhon nu'i rgyan gyis lus brgyan pa/ kun nas khor yug tu 'od 'phro ba/ g.yas ngos su byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po rin po che'i ri la bzhugs pa/ lag pa g.yas pa na
183a8(rgyud 'bum): rnga yab thogs shing g.yob pa/ lag pa g.yon pa na rin po che thogs pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ rin po che'i cod pan gyis brgyan pa/ me tog pri yang ku ltar cung zad dkar ba/ ras sngon po g.yo ba dang ldan pas
183b1(rgyud 'bum): g.yogs pa/ mu tig gi phreng ba dang rin po ches mchod phyir thogs byas pa/ khor yug rab tu 'bar bas 'brel ba de'i g.yas ngos su 'phags pa 'jam dpal rin po che'i ri la gnas pa/ gzhon nur gyur pa zur phud lngas mgo legs par
183b2(rgyud 'bum): mdzes par byas pa/ byis pa gzhon nu'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ gser gyi mdog dang 'dra ba/ dar sngon po g.yo ba can mnabs pa/ mu tig gi phreng ba dang rin po che 'dzin cing 'dres pa'i mchod phyir thogs byas pa/ de bzhin gshegs par song
183b3(rgyud 'bum): ba'i lta ba cung zad bzhin 'dzum pa dang ldan pa/ zhi ba'i rnam pa gzugs mdzes pa/ thal mo sbyar ba rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa bri bar bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu rtags dang cha byad dang dbyibs 'dzin pa'i sgrub pa po me tog gi phreng
183b4(rgyud 'bum): ba 'dzin cing / pus mo'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas yang dag par 'dug pa dang mgo mngon par btud pa ras ris kyi zur gyi mtha' ma'i phyogs su bri bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
183b5(rgyud 'bum): bzhi bri bar bya'o/ /g.yas phyogs su de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis bri bar bya ba la/ sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang rin chen tog khor yug tu kun nas 'bar ba'i 'od dang ldan pa/ g.yon phyogs su gser thub dang 'od srung
183b6(rgyud 'bum): rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/ me tog thams cad kyis gcal bkram pa/ pad ma'i gdan gnyis la bzhugs pa/ ha cang mi ring ba na chos 'chad cing skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/ zhi ba'i rnam pa dang ldan pa/ bcom
183b7(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das kyi steng nas me tog gi char rab tu 'bebs pa/ sprin gyi nang nas ro stod byung ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nam mkha' la lding ba spyan mdzes zhes bya ba mngon par bri bar bya ba ni/ rnam pa thams cad kyi
183b8(rgyud 'bum): mchog dang ldan pa/ kun nas 'bar ba'i 'od kyi phreng ba dang ldan pa/ phyag g.yas pas mchog sbyin pa/ phyag g.yon pas chos gos kyi tha ma la 'dzin pa/ 'di ni tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa rnam par gdon
184a1(rgyud 'bum): mi za ba'i rgyal po'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ras ris cho ga bcom ldan 'das 'di nyid yi ge gcig pa'i sngags kyi mchog 'di yin te/ 'di ni gtsug tor gyi rgyal po
184a2(rgyud 'bum): gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba dang rab tu 'gran pa/ brtson 'grus mtshungs pa/ stobs mtshungs pa 'di'i yon tan rgya che ba'i mthu ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ rdzu 'phrul che zhing stobs che ba/ mdor na de bzhin gshegs pa thams
184a3(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi gtsug tor gyi rgyal po 'khor los sgyur ba yin no/ /yi ge gcig pa la cho ga rgya cher bstan pa gang yin pa de thams cad kyang byed do/ /ma bsgrubs kyang bzlas pa tsam gyis kyang las rnams byed na bsgrubs pas lta smos kyang ci dgos/
184a4(rgyud 'bum): ji ltar 'dod pa'i 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa dang 'dod pa yang thob par 'gyur ro/ /yid kyis gang mngon par 'dod pa de ras ris mthong ba tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /nges par byang chub la gzhol bar 'gyur ro/ /de nyid
184a5(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa rnam par gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po'i dbang pos byin gyis brlabs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po zhes brjod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug
184a6(rgyud 'bum): tor gyi rgyal po zhes brjod do/ /'khor los sgyur ba zhes brjod do/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chen po zhes brjod do/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i snying po zhes brjod do/ /yi ge gcig pa zhes brjod do/ /
184a7(rgyud 'bum): mdor na 'di'i mthu ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ gang gi phyir sangs rgyas rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /sgrub pa med pa dang
184a8(rgyud 'bum): sngon du spyod pa ma byas pa dang khyim gyi rtsom pa thams cad la rab tu gnas pa dang bza' ba thams cad sha dang chang dang grong gi chos la rab tu zhugs pa dag la yang 'grub ste/ dad pa med pa dang byang chub tu
184b1(rgyud 'bum): sems bskyed pa med pa ni ma gtogs te 'di dag la ni grub pa med do/ /dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa byed pa dang de la zhugs pa la gnod pa byed pa dang 'di dag la yang las phra mo yang grub pa med na/ grub pa 'bring dang rab
184b2(rgyud 'bum): la ni lta smos kyang ci dgos/ 'dod pa thams cad dang bza' ba dang spyod pa gtsor byed pa'i sgrub pa po la ni las stong rtsa brgyad kyi las phran tshegs la rab tu sbyar bas 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de dag kyang gang zhe na/ dang por re
184b3(rgyud 'bum): zhig lan gcig bzlas pas bdag bsrung ngo / /lan gnyis bzlas pas gzhan bsrung bar 'gyur ro/ /lan gsum bzlas pas srung ba dam par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bcu la rab tu gnas pas kyang
184b4(rgyud 'bum): yang dag par bskyod par mi nus na/ de las gzhan pa'i sems can gyis lta smos kyang ci dgos/ tshon sna lnga'i skud pa la lan bzhi bzlas nas rked par bcings na sa bon bsdams par 'gyur ba yin te/ rmi lam na yang 'di
184b5(rgyud 'bum): la sa bon 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rang 'dod pa ni ma gtogs te de nyin par ram mtshan mo gcig la gal te 'dod pa na nyi ma re re zhing bya'o/ /ci ste mi 'dod na thal ba la lan bdun bsngags pa byas nas lte ba'i phyogs su bskus
184b6(rgyud 'bum): na zhag bdun phrag gsum du sa bon bsdams pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /lan lnga bzlas te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsgoms na gang la reg pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/ /zla ba gzas zin cing zla ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad
184b7(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin pa na/ shing arka'i me rab tu sbar la ras ris med kyang shar du mngon par bltas te/ mar gyi sreg blugs stong phrag bcus sbyin sreg bya'o/ /rgyal po'i pho brang dang nye ba chu bos bar ma bcad pa/ lha'i gnas su ma byas
184b8(rgyud 'bum): pa/ phyogs gang du rgyal po gnas pa de dang nye bar sbyin sreg rab tu sbyar na tho rangs rgyal po dbang du 'gyur ro/ /gang smras pa de thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /gal te dbang du ma gyur pa de'i tshe/ de'i sems phyin ci log tu 'gyur ba'am
185a1(rgyud 'bum): sems g.yeng ba thob par 'gyur na phyir yang bzlog par bya ste/ 'o ma'i sreg blugs stong rtsa brgyad kyis sbyin sreg byas na gang de'i dus de nas brtsams nas rang bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ro/ /las de dag ni dad pa dang ldan pa
185a2(rgyud 'bum): dang dkon mchog gsum la dad pa dang byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rnams la ni mi bya ste/ gal te byed na shin tu bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /gzhan dag la gnod pa byed pa/ ma rungs pa'i sems dang drag
185a3(rgyud 'bum): po'i sems dang ldan pa rnams la ni bya ba yin no/ /nyin re zhing yang mthong ba sbyin par byas na sems zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te zhi bar ma gyur na phung khrol chen po dang ldan par 'gyur te/ srog gi lhag ma tsam lus par 'gyur ro/ /
185a4(rgyud 'bum): gzhan yang las su 'gyur ba ni zla ba gzas zin gyi dus su shing pa la sha'i yam shing gis me rab tu sbar te/ mar gyi sreg blugs stong rtsa brgyad byas na tho rangs yul gyi bdag po'i rgyal po spyan drangs par 'gyur ro/ /de dang lhan
185a5(rgyud 'bum): cig tu gros byas na bsam pa bden pa nye bar ston par 'gyur te/ de la bstan ngag byas na zla ba drug gi nang du bsod snyoms stong yod pa'i grong ster bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te mtshan phyed du sbyin sreg byas na zla ba gsum gyis
185a6(rgyud 'bum): ster bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te thun thams cad kyi mtshan mo sbyin sreg byas na zla ba gcig gis thob par 'gyur ro/ /gal te zla ba gcig gi mtshan mo re re la sbyin sreg byas na yul thob par 'gyur ro/ /yang na yul
185a7(rgyud 'bum): dang 'dra ba'i grong ngam yang na gzhan cung zad nor yod pa la yang dgra yod par mi 'gyur te/ gal te dgra yod na yang las rnams byas pa yin te/ zla ba gzas zin pa na shing a pa margas me rab tu sbar la/
185a8(rgyud 'bum): shing pa la sha'i yam shing la zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pas bram ze'i skra la sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad bya'o/ /de'i tha mar shing pi tsu marda'i lo ma la ske tshe'i 'bru mar gyis btags pa'i sreg blugs
185b1(rgyud 'bum): kyis sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na tho rangs bram ze'i dgra zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te rgyal po sdang bar 'gyur na las gzhan yang yod de/ zla ba gzas zin la shing ci rnyed pas me rab tu sbar la mar gyi sreg blugs kyis sbyin sreg
185b2(rgyud 'bum): stong rtsa brgyad byas la sbyin sreg gi tha mar phyogs gang na rgyal po yod pa de'i phyogs su thal ba de gtor na de dbang du 'gyur ro/ /dus gang la longs spyod gang 'dod pa rgya che ba de dag gi grogs kyang byed par 'gyur ro/ /grong nyung ba'am
185b3(rgyud 'bum): mang po rab tu ster bar 'gyur te/ nges par zla ba drug gis don yod par 'grub par yang 'gyur ro/ /de nas rigs bzhi las gang yang rung ba rtags gtso bo dang ldan pa'am lha gzhan nam 'jig rten pa la dad pa dag sems
185b4(rgyud 'bum): 'khrugs par gyur na/ phyogs gang na gnas pa der thal ba de gtor na yul gzhan du 'gro bar 'gyur ba'am skyo bar 'gyur ba'am mtshan mo glal bar 'gyur ba'am nye du la gnod par 'gyur ro/ /de phyir gso ba ni 'o ma'i sreg
185b5(rgyud 'bum): blugs stong rtsa brgyad kyis sbyin sreg byas na sos par 'gyur ro/ /yang na gza' bzhi po nyid kyi cho gas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i sku gzugs dang ras ris sam dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam
185b6(rgyud 'bum): mam sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la gos gtsang ma bgos shing nyin zhag gcig smyung ba byas te/ srog chags med pa'i chus las bya zhing me tog dkar po dri zhim po dang gur gum dang ldan pa dang ga
185b7(rgyud 'bum): pur gyi dud pas bdug par bya'o/ /gang du las la sbyar ba ni bram ze'i dgra la ni shing pa la shas bya'o/ /rgyal rigs kyi dgra la ni shing a shwat+thas bya'o/ /rje'u rigs kyi dgra la ni shing seng ldeng gis bya'o/ /dmangs rigs
185b8(rgyud 'bum): kyi dgra la ni de las gzhan pa'i shing gi me rab tu sbar la de nyid kyi las bya'o/ /bram ze la ni shing pa la sha'i yam shing dang rgyal rigs la ni a shwat+tha'i yam shing dang rje'u rigs la ni seng ldeng gi yam shing dang dmangs
186a1(rgyud 'bum): rigs la ni a pa marga'i yam shing ngam de las gzhan pa ji snyed pas mar gyi sbyin sreg bya'o/ /de bzhin du las gzhan yang bya ba ni/ rgyal po chen po la ni shing a pa ra dzi ta'i rtsa ba'i yam shing dang mar gyi sreg
186a2(rgyud 'bum): blugs stong rtsa brgyad kyis sbyin sreg bya'o/ /tha mar yang de nyid kyi thal bas gtor bar bya'o/ /gang gi phyogs nas sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa 'ong ba de'i phyogs su gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba yi ge gcig pa'i phyag rgya
186a3(rgyud 'bum): bcings nas gtor ro/ /yang na ut+pa la'i phyag rgya bcings na de 'jigs nas ldog pa'am/ dmag gi tshogs nyams par 'gyur ba'am/ gzhan gang cung zad rnam par ltung ba chen por 'gyur ba'am/ 'go ba'i nad chen po'am/ sems
186a4(rgyud 'bum): sdug bsngal bar gnas pa'am/ gang gis 'di'i ngag ldog par 'gyur ba'am/ 'di dag dang gzhan yang ji ltar 'dod pa'i las rnams byed par 'gyur ro/ /gos la mngon par bsngags te bgos na skal ba bzang por 'gyur ro/ /
186a5(rgyud 'bum): mig sman la mngon par bsngags te mig la bskus na skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /mig dang gdong la lan bdun bsngags pa byas la khros pa'i gdong la bltas na zhi ba dang dbang du 'gyur ro/ /me tog dang 'bras
186a6(rgyud 'bum): bu'am gzhan gang cung zad dri zhim pa la lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa byas la rgyal po la byin na de bsnams pa tsam gyis dbang du 'gyur ro/ /gzhan sems can gang la la mthong ba tsam gyis de dbang du 'gyur ro/ /
186a7(rgyud 'bum): yan lag thams cad na ba la brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bzlas pa byas la/ chu dron pos khrus byas na bde legs su gnas par 'gyur te las 'di rnams ni bya ba yin no/ /sems can sdug bsngal ba thams
186a8(rgyud 'bum): cad dang / mgon med par gyur pa dang / bkren pa dang / bstan pa 'di'i brtul zhugs can dang / dkon mchog gsum la dad pa la ni 'di lta bu'i las mi bya'o/ /bud med la yang las mi bya'o/ /de bzhin du byis pa dang
186b1(rgyud 'bum): rgan po dang nad pa dang dbul po dang sdug bsngal ba dang sems can phra mo dang skye gnas ngan par skyes pa 'di dag la yang mi bya ste/ las 'di dag ni sems can chen po dag la rab tu sbyar bar bya'o/ /dpa' zhing brkam chags
186b2(rgyud 'bum): bab chol med/ /phyogs chen nor ni che ba dang / /mngon pa'i nga rgyal rab gtum la/ /las ni 'di 'dra bya ba yin/ /bstan la zhe sdang khro ba dang / /gzhan gyi nor ni 'phrog byed dang / /sngags rnams kun dang sman rnams dang / /rnal
186b3(rgyud 'bum): 'byor ldan la ma dad dang / /spyis brtsan gdug pa'i sems ldan dang / /'jig rten gyis smad rgyal po ste/ /'di dag la ni las sbyar bya/ /chos dang ldan la rnam par spang / /las rnams gzhan yang 'di skad brjod/ /blo yis de
186b4(rgyud 'bum): ni yongs su spang / /de nyid khros pas thal ba ni/ /bzlas pas phyogs su gtor byas na/ /de rnams dgra ni rab khros dang / /rgyal po dag kyang rnam 'jig 'gyur/ /nges par skye bo de dag kyang / /yun ring nad kyis thebs par 'gyur/ /
186b5(rgyud 'bum): de dag phyogs su 'chi ba mang / /'go ba'i nad kyang rab tu snang / /shin tu nyon mongs cher gyur kyang / /las rnams 'di dag bya min te/ /der ni skye bo'i bdag po kun/ /zhag bdun gsum gyis nyams par 'gyur/ /las rnams
186b6(rgyud 'bum): brtsams nas sngon du ni/ /bdun phrag gnyis la yang dag brtul/ /bdun pa dang pos sems rnams g.yeng / /zhag bdun gnyis pas nad kyis 'debs/ /bdun pa gsum gyis 'chi bar 'gyur/ /de bas de ni yongs su spang / /
186b7(rgyud 'bum): dang po 'di dag rnam par 'byer/ /gnyis par phyogs su rnam par 'khyam/ /zhag bdun gsum par rnam par 'jig /de bas las 'di bya ba min/ /sems can gdul bya'i don nyid la/ /'jig rten 'dren pas bstan
186b8(rgyud 'bum): pa yin/ /sangs rgyas thugs ni dag pa yis/ /gdug pa'i las 'di gsung mi 'gyur/ /srog la gnod par byed pa'i las/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis smad pa yin/ /grub pa mchog ni rab 'dod pa'i/ /zlos pa
187a1(rgyud 'bum): de dag bya ba min/ /dmyal ba dag tu skye ba'i las/ /'di dag nyid la rab tu snang / /dkar nag 'bras bur 'byung byed pa/ /'di dag kho na bstan pa yin/ /las rnams sna tshogs bdag nyid che/ /rkang gnyis
187a2(rgyud 'bum): mchog gis ji bzhin gzigs/ /rtag tu dkar las dkar ba byung / /nag las nag pa rab tu smin/ /'dres las 'dres pa'i las rnams ni/ /'dres pa dag tu rnam par smin/ /de bzhin las 'di sna tshogs su/ /de nyid
187a3(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas gzigs pa yi/ /thugs rje can gyis gsungs pa'o/ /de las zlos pa spang bya ba/ /nag dang 'dres pa'i las nyid do/ /dge byed dkar po bsten par bya/ /dge ba'i las kyi 'bras bu 'byung / /srog
187a4(rgyud 'bum): gcod pas ni zlos pa dag / yang dang yang du dmyal bar 'gro/ /de bzhin de las log pa'i chos/ /'tshe med las ni dam pa yin/ /dge ba'i blos ni sngags rnams dang / /de bzhin mtho ris thar pa 'grub/ /legs byas
187a5(rgyud 'bum): las kyis thob pa yin/ /'gal ba'i las kyis 'gal bar gsungs/ /ji ltar chos dang chos min gsungs/ /thams cad mkhyen nyid spyod pa yin/ /zlos pa grub par 'dod pa yis/ /dge ba'i las ni brtsam par
187a6(rgyud 'bum): bya/ /zlos pa dge la gnas pa la/ /de yi sngags ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /dkar po'i las la gzhol byed la/ /de yi thar pa mi ldog 'gyur/ /sngags kyis dge ba 'grub 'gyur zhes/ /de bzhin gshegs pas rab
187a7(rgyud 'bum): tu gsungs/ /las rnams sna tshogs gsungs pa ni/ /sgrub pa rnams la bsdus don yin/ /ci 'dod las ni stong phrag brgyad/ /phra mo'i las ni byed pa na/ /sgrub pa po ni mi 'grub ste/ /grub pa mchog ni mi 'thob bo/ /
187a8(rgyud 'bum): 'bad pas bzlas dang sbyin sreg bya/ /grub pa 'bring ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /cho ga mthong ba'i las kyi ni/ /tha ma myur du 'grub par 'gyur/ /mchog dang tha ma bar ma yi/ /las ni rnam pa gsum du bstan/ /dka' thub can ni
187b1(rgyud 'bum): zlos mchog gis/ /de bzhin grub pa mchog thob 'gyur/ /de bzhin bzlas pa bar ma yis/ /bar ma las grub thob pa yin/ /de bzhin zlos pa tha mas ni/ /tha ma'i las la yang dag brten/ /grub pa phra mo thob par yang / /
187b2(rgyud 'bum): gzhan gyi grub pa thob ma yin/ /dus dang tshod dang bzlas pa dang / /sbyin sreg mthong bas de bzhin 'grub/ /mchog gis mchog ni 'grub pa dang / /bar mas bar ma'i grub pa snang / /tha mas tha ma'i las dag la/ /phran
187b3(rgyud 'bum): tshegs grub pa thob pa yin/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/ yi ge gcig pa rtsa ba'i rgyud 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi
187b4(rgyud 'bum): snying po'i cho ga rab 'byam las/ le'u nyi shu rtsa gcig pa rdzogs s+ho// // de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas gzhan yang gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la gzigs nas/ 'jam dpal
187b5(rgyud 'bum): gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal gzhan yang khyod kyi ras ris kyi cho ga sgrub pa'i thabs la las thams cad kyi don sgrub pa nyon cig /'di nyid kyi yi ge gcig pa'i snying po'i sngags sam yi ge drug po ma'i
187b6(rgyud 'bum): mtha' can khyod kyi sngar bstan pa'i yi ge drug pa'i snying po'am dang po na yod pa'i yi ge gcig pa'i ras ris dang po 'di nyid kyi cho gar 'gyur ba ni phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa nga yongs su mya ngan las
187b7(rgyud 'bum): 'das te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing stongs shing rtsod pa'i dus tha mar phyin pa na/ 'jig rten skyob pa med pa dang skyabs med pa dang gnas med pa dang / dpung gnyen med pa na/ cho ga'i rgyal po 'di nyid skyob par gyur pa dang / skyabs su gyur pa
187b8(rgyud 'bum): dang / gnas su gyur pa dang / dpung gnyen du gyur par 'gyur ro/ /dang por re zhig snga ma bzhin du ras ma nyams pa skra shad dang bral ba/ zhag bdun nam zhag bdun gsum gyi bar du tha ga pas btags pa kha tshar dang bcas pa/ gur gum
188a1(rgyud 'bum): dang tsan dan gyi chus bsang gtor byas te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa pad ma'i gdan la bzhugs shing chos 'chad pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la gzigs pa bri bar bya'o/ /g.yas phyogs
188a2(rgyud 'bum): su nor bzang dang 'phags pa blo gros mi zad pa dang 'jam dpal yang bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal bar byed pa/ gzhon nu'i gzugs can lus rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bri bar bya'o/ /g.yon phyogs su kun tu bzang
188a3(rgyud 'bum): po dang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang bzang skyong dang legs skyes kyang bri bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi sku las shin tu chung bar 'drir gzhug par bya'o/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang nor
188a4(rgyud 'bum): bzang ni lag na rnga yab thogs par bya'o/ /'og tu ni sa'i lha mo rin po che'i za ma tog lag na thogs pa/ ro stod sa las byung ba 'drir gzhug par bya'o/ /steng du ni rig pa 'dzin pa gzhon nu gnyis phreng ba 'dzin pa
188a5(rgyud 'bum): sprin gyi nang nas char gtong ba rig pa dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang lag na me tog thogs pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal la rnam par lta ba dang rgyan dang ldan pa/ dang ba'i lta ba dang
188a6(rgyud 'bum): ro stod bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la 'dud pa dang bcas pa 'drir gzhug par bya'o/ /de 'di lta bu'i ras ris sku gdung dang ldan pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du nub tu bstan te bzhag la 'jam dpal 'di'i
188a7(rgyud 'bum): yi ge gcig pa bzlas pa 'bum bya'o/ /shing bzhin du mi smra ba'i dka' thub dang dus gsum du khrus byed pa dang gos lan gsum brje ba dang rtag tu gso sbyong byed pa dang / tshod rngad dang nas chan khyor gang tsam dang 'o ma dang slong
188a8(rgyud 'bum): mo'i zas kyis 'tsho ba'o/ /zas kyang cha rnam pa bzhir bya ste/ cha gcig ni dkon mchog gsum la'o/ /gnyis pa ni 'jam dpal la'o/ /gsum pa ni sems can thams cad la'o/ /bzhi pa ni bdag nyid nye bar spyad par bya'o/ /
188b1(rgyud 'bum): mi dub pa'i lus kyis bcom ldan 'das yid la bya ste/ sems can thams cad la dmigs pa'i yid dang bdag nyid kyi don ci yang mi byed cing gzhan sems can thams cad kyi don 'dir bya'o zhes bsgoms nas bzlas pa bya'o/ /
188b2(rgyud 'bum): khrus dang dri dang me tog dang spos dang bshos dang mar me dag kyang dbul bar bya'o/ /khrus ni ras ris kyi grib ma'am gzugs brnyan la bya'o/ /dri ni 'og tu gtor bar bya'o/ /me tog dang bshos kyang rtag tu dbul lo/ /
188b3(rgyud 'bum): de nyid du 'di dag la sngar mchod par bya ste/ dang po dkon mchog gsum dang / de'i 'og tu byams pa dang / de'i 'og tu spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / 'phags pa kun tu bzang po dang / nam mkha'i snying po dang / 'phags pa blo gros
188b4(rgyud 'bum): mi zad pa dang / zla 'od gzhon nu dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / 'phags pa rdo rje 'dzin dang / 'phags ma sgrol ma dang / 'phags ma rma bya chen mo dang / 'phags ma gzhan gyis mi thub ma dang / bcom ldan 'das
188b5(rgyud 'bum): ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma la dri dang / me tog dang spos dang gtor ma dang mar me 'di dag thams cad la sngar mchod nas phyis ras ris la mchod par bya ste/ de nas phyi rol gyi phyogs 'ga' zhig tu sbrul dang

193b2(rgyud 'bum): chen mo/ g.yas phyogs su 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzugs can ma rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ gos dkar po bgos pa bri bar bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu pad ma'i mtsho me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyis khyab pa na klu'i
193b3(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po gnyis ro stod chu'i nang nas byung ba/ pad ma'i sdong bu la lag pas 'dzin pa'o/ /'phags pa gzhan gyis mi thub ma phyogs gcig tu bri bar bya ste/ log 'dren gyi bgegs 'jigs par byed pa/ me 'bar bar mngon
