198b4(rgyud 'bum): pa yin/ /lha min sngags kyi gtso bo dang / /gang gzhan de bzhin 'jig rten pa'i/ /sngags rgyud lho phyogs dag tu ni/ /brten pa dag la 'grub par 'gyur/ /rtag tu yi dags rgyal po dang / /gshin rjes kyang ni bstan
198b5(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / /zhi ba khyab 'jug gis bstan pa'i/ /sngags gzhan dag kyang 'grub par 'gyur/ /gdug cing gdug pa'i las dag ni/ /lha yi gnas su bstan pa yin/ /sngags rnams gdug pa'i las rnams
198b6(rgyud 'bum): ni/ /lag na rdo rjes bstan pa dag /lho yi phyogs la bsten na ni/ /sdig pa'i las ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /de dag gi ni phyogs dag tu/ /myur du yang dag 'grub par snang / /nyi mas bshad pa'i sngags rnams
198b7(rgyud 'bum): ni/ /nyi ma'i sngags zhes rab tu bsgrags/ /nub phyogs na ni gang yod pa/ /sngags dang rgyud ni rab tu 'grub/ /gnod sbyin dbang po rdzu 'phrul che'i/ /der ni rang sngags 'grub par 'gyur/ /byis pa rnams
198b8(rgyud 'bum): ni rmongs pa yi/ /'byung po kun la nor sbyin zhing / /cho ga mthong ba'i rgyu yis ni/ /skye bo rnams la nor sbyin byed/ /longs spyod ldan zhing mdzod 'phel ba/ /nub kyi phyogs su 'grub par 'gyur/ /nor
199a1(rgyud 'bum): sbyin zhes bya'i ming gis ni/ /sa yi steng du rnam par grags/ /gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje rang / /byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che/ /sngags pa mchog ni dam pa ste/ /rang nyid sa bcu'i bdag po yin/ /
199a2(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje pad ma'i rigs dag gi/ /de dag sngags ni grub pa yin/ /de bzhin rigs brgyad sngags dag ni/ /phyogs brgyad dag tu gnas pa yin/ /rgyal ba'i rigs kyi sngags dag ni/ /byang gi phyogs su 'grub pa yin/ /
199a3(rgyud 'bum): pad ma'i rigs las byung ba'i sngags/ /de bzhin shar gyi phyogs su 'grub/ /lho yi phyogs su gnas pa la/ /rdo rje'i rigs ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /nub phyogs su ni mdzod 'grub gsungs/ /phyogs mtshams dag tu
199a4(rgyud 'bum): rin chen rigs/ /de bzhin nub byang mtshams su ni/ /de dag 'grub par rab tu brtags/ /lho nub kyi ni mtshams dag tu/ /de bzhin gnod sbyin rigs kyang 'grub/ /shar lho dag gi cha dag tu/ /nyan thos rnams
199a5(rgyud 'bum): ni gzi brjid che/ /de dag rigs su snang ba ni/ /der gnas pa la 'grub par 'gyur/ /byang shar dag gi cha dag tu/ /rang rgyal rnams su yang dag 'byung / /rigs ni 'jig rten kun gyis mchod/ /de dag der ni 'grub
199a6(rgyud 'bum): pa yin/ /'og gi phyogs kyi cha dag tu/ /'jig rten pa yi sngags rnams 'grub/ /sa 'og 'jug par gyur pa'i sngags/ /rigs brgyad kun la 'grub par 'gyur/ /de bzhin 'jig rten 'das pa'i sngags/ /
199a7(rgyud 'bum): gtsug tor la sogs rab bsgrags pa/ /steng du 'gro ba'i grub par ni/ /rgyal ba 'khor lo sgyur bas gsungs/ /thad kar kun nas khor yug tu/ /rdo rje can gyi 'grub pa yin/ /de bzhin gzhan yang
199a8(rgyud 'bum): sngags rgyal kun/ /pad ma'i rigs las byung ba ni/ /thams cad du ni thams cad 'grub/ /sngags rnams kun kyang longs spyod ster/ /rdo rje pad ma'i rigs dag kyang / /dus rnams kun tu 'grub par 'gyur/ /
199b1(rgyud 'bum): 'di dag zhing du bstan pa ste/ /de yi dus ni yongs su bstan/ /rgyal ba'i rigs kyi sngags grub pa/ /sangs rgyas rnams la sngon byung ba'o/ /pad ma rdo rje'i rigs dag ni/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi bar ma'i
199b2(rgyud 'bum): dus/ /gzhan gyi dus su sngags dag ni/ /de las gzhan pa'i rigs 'grub yin/ /de dag grub pa'i dus su gsungs/ /dus gzhan rab tu bstan ma yin/ /dka' thub kyis ni grub pa mchog /skye ba gsum gyis thob
199b3(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ /rtag tu sngags rnams zlos pa dang / /der dang yid ni der sems dang / /rgyal sras rnams la rab dang ba/ /skye ba 'di la'ang 'grub par 'gyur/ /dkon mchog gsum la gus pa dang / /byang chub
199b4(rgyud 'bum): sems kyis brgyan pa dang / /shes rab che zhing sdom la gnas/ /sngags dang rgyud la 'jigs pa med/ /byang chub sdom la gnas pa dag /'bad pa med par sngags rnams 'grub/ /sems can rnams kyis
199b5(rgyud 'bum): las grub dang / /bdag kyang grub par nyer bstan pa/ /rtag tu sngags nyid grub pa yin/ /rmongs pa'i sems can 'grub pa med/ /de nyid phyir na rgyal dbang gis/ /cho ga'i rgyal po gsungs pa ni/ /sangs rgyas gtso bo
199b6(rgyud 'bum): bdun pa yis/ /sngags rnams rgya che'i las dag bstan/ /sangs rgyas sras kyi thu bo ni/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs ni gzi chen la/ /thub pa'i zla ba rdzu 'phrul che/ /des ni gsung mchog rab tu bstan/ /sngags rnams kyi ni mthar
199b7(rgyud 'bum): thug mthu/ /gzhon nu rab tu nyon cig dang / /gang tshe sangs rgyas rtag tu ni/ /'jig rten 'dren pa bzhugs gyur pa/ /de tshe de bzhin grub pa ni/ /gtsug tor la sogs rab grags pa/ /de bzhin 'khor los sgyur ba dang / /gzi brjid phung por rab bstan dang / /
199b8(rgyud 'bum): rgyal ba gtsug tor gdugs dkar po/ /rgyal bas mang por gsungs pa ni/ /de la sogs pa'i gtsug tor ni/ /de yi tshe ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /gang tshe 'khor los sgyur ba ni/ /'dzam bu'i gling du 'byung 'gyur zhing / /chos kyi rgyal po rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /
200a1(rgyud 'bum): rkang gnyis dam pa bzhugs pa na/ /sngags rnams ma lus bshad pa dag /de yi tshe na 'grub par 'gyur/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin
200a2(rgyud 'bum): tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/ zhing dang dus kyi cho ga nges pa'i le'u rab 'byam las/ nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa rdzogs s+ho// // de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas gzhan yang gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la
200a3(rgyud 'bum): gzigs nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ras ris ni sngar bstan te/ sems can la yod pa'i spyod pa dge ba dang mi dge ba'i mtshan ma rnams ni bshad par bya yi nyon cig /
200a4(rgyud 'bum): de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos btud nas thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams ni gzhan gyi lus
200a5(rgyud 'bum): la 'jug pa'i sems can rnams te/ 'phags pa dang lha'i skye gnas dang grub pa dang dri za dang gnod sbyin dang srin po dang sha za dang lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa las sna tshogs kyis byas pa'i lus rnam pa sna tshogs la brten
200a6(rgyud 'bum): cing gnas pa/ cha byad rnam pa sna tshogs dang rtags sna tshogs dang mi dang mi ma yin pa dang 'byung po thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa bcom ldan 'das bstan pa'i dus lags/ bde bar gshegs pa bstan pa'i
200a7(rgyud 'bum): dus ni lags te/ de'i dus la bab par mkhyen na legs par bshad du gsol/ de skad ces rgyal ba'i mchog 'jig rten gyi 'dren pa gau ta ma bdun pa la gsol ba btab nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur
200a8(rgyud 'bum): gyur pa cang mi smra bar gyur te/ rang gi stan la 'dug par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas sems can rnams kyi sems kyi spyod pa dang mtshan ma shes pa dang rtags dang dus gsungs pa/
200b1(rgyud 'bum): gzhan gyi lus zhugs sems can ni/ /sngags kyi sbyor bas drang bar bya/ /kha cig zas la chags pa yi/ /sa steng mi ni 'dzin par byed/ /gzhan dag khro ldan sems kyis ni/ /sa steng dag tu mi bzad
200b2(rgyud 'bum): pas/ /rtag tu chags dang bral ba dag /snying rje'i dam tshig dag gis ni/ /mi yi 'jig rten dag 'jug pa/ /dge ba'i mi la 'dzin par byed/ /rab bsngags dge dang g.yo ba med/ /mi rnams kyi ni mdog kyang sgrub/ /
200b3(rgyud 'bum): nyi ma dag ni 'char ba la/ /de dag 'jug par brjod pa yin/ /mi rnams nyi ma nub pa yi/ /de yi dus su 'jug par 'gyur/ /mtshan mo'i thun gyi dang po la/ /yar ngo la ni snang bar 'gyur/ /rab bsngags dge ba'i las dag dang / /rtag tu gang
200b4(rgyud 'bum): zhig chos ldan mi/ /gang zhig shes nyen ldan pa ni/ /de dag la ni 'jug par snang / /'dod chags bral ba rdzu 'phrul che/ /des na mi la 'jug pa yin/ /phyogs gtsang skye bo gtsang ba dang / /rgyu skar skar ma bzang
200b5(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / /nyin zhag sngags dang zla res bzang / /yar ngo dge ba'i nyin zhag dang / /gza' bzang yang dag ldan pa dang / /tshes grangs rdzogs dang yang dag ldan/ /de bzhin zla ba nya ba la/ /de dag la ni 'jug par
200b6(rgyud 'bum): snang / /chags bral rdzu 'phrul chen po ni/ /'jug par 'gyur ba'i mtshan ma yang / /nam mkha' la ni ta la tsam/ /sa las 'phags te 'dug pa yin/ /de ni skyil krung 'dug nas kyang / /
200b7(rgyud 'bum): nam mkha' la ni gnas par snang / /tshig kyang bzang po mtshungs med dang / /tshangs dbyangs de bzhin rnar snyan dang / /gang du 'dod chags bral de gnas/ /sems dpa' chen po de dag smra/ /gtsug tor phyag rgyas drangs
200b8(rgyud 'bum): pa yi/ /sa yi steng du 'dug par gyur/ /sa steng de la 'dug pa na/ /de yi mod la mchod yon sbyin/ /sna ma'i me tog dag la ni/ /tsan dan bzang po gur gum bsres/ /bsres pa'i chu dang chu gtsang ni/ /de yi mod la dbul bar bya/ /
201a1(rgyud 'bum): sngags pas sa la rab btud nas/ /phan pa'i blo yis gsol ba gdab/ /dpa' ba'i rang bzhin sems kyis ni/ /sems can des ni gsol ba gdab/ /tshig ni bzang po 'don byed cing / /rnar snyan de bzhin rmongs
201a2(rgyud 'bum): pa med/ /sngags shes cho ga 'jigs med pas/ /de nas ji ltar 'dod pa 'dri/ /'jam dbyangs yang dag dran nas ni/ /de yi dus su 'jigs med bya/ /gtsug pud lnga pa'i phyag rgya 'am/ /gtsug tor las byung gzhan pa'ang bcing / /
201a3(rgyud 'bum): de nas phyogs ni bcing bya ste/ /steng dang 'og tu'ang de bzhin no/ /de nas de yi 'byung ba kun/ /bar dang tha mar rab tu brjod/ /de bzhin dang po bar ma'i dus/ /byung dang ma 'ongs dus dag dang / /de bzhin da ltar byung gyur pa/ /'od
201a4(rgyud 'bum): ldan des ni ston par 'gyur/ /de bzhin 'dzum med mig gis ni/ /chags bral des zin rab tu lta/ /gang yin des bstan tshig gis ni/ /bden par 'gyur gyi gzhan du min/ /de bzhin grub dang bsgrub bya'i rdzas/ /gang
201a5(rgyud 'bum): zhig tshogs kyi rnam pa dang / /rang rgyal byang chub dgra bcom dang / /nges par byang chub chen po'ang de/ /nges par sangs rgyas nyid rig nyid/ /de bzhin byang chub sems rigs dang / /rigs med nyid dang dus dang ni/ /
201a6(rgyud 'bum): sems can skal ldan brjod pa'ang yin/ /dam tshig gis ni mngon mtshon pas/ /bden pa kun ni des ston 'gyur/ /skad cig tsam ston rnal 'byor la/ /dus ring dus su sdod ma yin/ /skad cig de la
201a7(rgyud 'bum): gang cung zad/ /yid la bsams shing don du gnyer/ /myur du sngags grub kho na la/ /de dag thams cad ston par byed/ /ci 'dod mngon par re ba dag /phun sum tshogs pa thams cad thob/ /sngags pas
201a8(rgyud 'bum): slar ni gshegs gsol ba/ /myur du mchod yon phul nas 'gyel/ /cho ga mthong ba'i las kyis ni/ /snod ni yang dag bsrung ba bya/ /sems can lus ni 'gyel ba yang / /sa yi steng du nyal ba nyid/ /gtsug
201b1(rgyud 'bum): tor sngags dang ldan pa yi/ /sngags ni cho gar gsungs pa dag /de nyid kyis ni bsrung ba dang / /phyag rgya gtsug phud lnga yis so/ /de tshe lus ni bde legs 'gyur/ /sa yi steng las ldang bar 'gyur/ /
201b2(rgyud 'bum): sems can kun la'ang 'jug pa yi/ /srung ba 'di ni rab tu brtag /snod la brten te 'tshe byed par/ /gdug pa'i sems can gyis mi nus/ /skye bo snod du gyur pa la/ /'di ni srung ba chen po yin/ /de yi tshig ni
201b3(rgyud 'bum): bar mar gnas/ /dbus kyi yul gyir rab tu bsgrags/ /lha yi skye gnas la brten pa'i/ /'og min gzugs dang ldan pa dang / /de dang de yi rtags rnams dang / /gzugs ni rab tu snang ba yin/ /'dod pa'i khams
201b4(rgyud 'bum): kyi dbang phyug dang / /'dod dang ldan pa'i lha dag dang / /de las dman pa'i 'gro ba'i rtags/ /tshig nyid kyang ni shin tu snyan/ /de nas sa la gnas pa dang / /gzhal med khang gnas lha rnams kyi/ /tshig ni ku sha'i
201b5(rgyud 'bum): grong khyer mtshungs/ /ma ga d+hA yi gnod sbyin tshig /de bzhin ang+ga'i yul gyi tshig /lto 'phye chen por rab tu bstan/ /gzi brjid chen po nam mkha' lding / /de dag shar phyogs tshig tu 'gyur/ /bang ga'i yul
201b6(rgyud 'bum): du yang dag skyes/ /gang dag tshig tu bstan pa ni/ /de bzhin mi'am ci yi tshig /de yi tshig tu rab brtag bya/ /rtag tu piN+Da'i tshig gyur pa/ /grub dang ral gri'i rig pa 'dzin/ /de tshig rig pa 'dzin pa dang / /
201b7(rgyud 'bum): drang srong 'dod pa'i gzugs can yin/ /de tshig mngon shes lnga dang ni/ /drang srong rnams kyis yongs su brtags/ /gang yang yul tshig ma ga d+hA/ /gang yang ha ri ki la'i tshig /mi gsal mi dod nyid dang ni/ /yi ge ta la
201b8(rgyud 'bum): shin tu brten/ /la yi yi ge mang ba'i tshig /sha za'i tshig tu brjod pa yin/ /las tshon zhes bya'i gling dang ni/ /na li ke ra 'byung ba'i gnas/ /gling ni rtsub par byed nyid dang / /gcer bu stobs ldan bu
202a1(rgyud 'bum): gnas kyang / /sems can dag byed gnas pa dag /de bzhin 'di dag gling las byung / /yi ge la mang tshig dag dang / /tshig ni gsal ba'i rnam pa med/ /mi gsal bsri ba med nyid dang / /khro bcas
202a2(rgyud 'bum): yi dags skye gnas tshig / lho phyogs pa yi tshig dag dang / /an+d+ra kar Na dra bi DA/ /sems can ko sa la 'brog gnas dang / /sing ga la yi gling dag na/ /yi ge ga dang rar bcas pa/ /de ni srin po'i tshig
202a3(rgyud 'bum): tu shes/ /de dag gling la gnas pa de'i/ /ming ni gang zhig brjod pa yang / /ma mo rnams ni gzi brjid che/ /de yi tshig 'dir gsungs pa yin/ /tshig ni nub phyogs phyogs mtshams dang / /ma la ba yi tshig dag dang / /
202a4(rgyud 'bum): be'u nya dang rgya mtsho'i tshig /shu ra se yi rnam brtags dang / /rgya mtsho bcu 'dus chu bo 'dus/ /dpal mgrin dang ni ko dz+wa ri/ /'di dag tshig ldan 'jug pa ni/ /nyi ma la sogs gza' mchog gdon/ /de
202a5(rgyud 'bum): las gzhan gdon gtso bo ni/ /yul ni ba ri ya tra'i tshig /yul ni ar bu ta sa h+ya/ /ri ni mA la yar gnas dang / /lang ba'i yul du yang dag skyes/ /tshig ni ci 'dra yod pa yi/ /de 'dra'i tshig tu smra ba
202a6(rgyud 'bum): ni/ /grul bum skye gnas 'dzin pa yin/ /yi ge sha Sha sa dang ni/ /ra la ba las yang dag byung / /yi ge g+ha dang ldan pa'i tshig /lha ma yin du nges par bstan/ /kha che'i yul las byung ba dang / /skye ba'i
202a7(rgyud 'bum): gnas ni ka bi sha / gnod sbyin rgyal po'i rigs las byung / /phyag na rdo rje'i rigs su bstan/ /de dag lnga yi gtso bo ni/ /kun gyi tshig tu 'dod pa yin/ /de bzhin dbus kyi phyogs gnas dag /pad ma'i rigs kyi skye gnas rten/ /tshig dang 'gros dang
202a8(rgyud 'bum): mtshan ma yang / /pad ma'i rigs su snang ba yin/ /rgyal ba'i sras kyis rnam brtags pa/ /snga ma nyid du bstan pa yin/ /'dod chags bral ba'i mtshan ma gang / /rgyal ba'i mtshan mar rab tu 'byung / /yul phyogs gang gi tshig smra ba/ /der gnas
202b1(rgyud 'bum): 'gros dang spyod pa yin/ /der bstan sems can nyid dang ni/ /'gros dang mtshan ma'ang kun tu bstan/ /kha ba can gyi nang gnas pa/ /dri za drang srong skye bo'i tshig /gang gA'i ngogs kyi byang phyogs pa/ /gnod sbyin tshig tu rab tu snang / /ri ni 'bigs
202b2(rgyud 'bum): byed la gnas pa/ /gang gA'i 'gram gyi lho phyogs dang / /dpal gyi ri bor skyes gyur dang / /gang yang skye bo rnam dag ni/ /srin pa skar ma yi dags dang / /ma mo cha lugs ngan pa dang / /mi bzad gzugs can bgegs
202b3(rgyud 'bum): chen po/ /gdon ni shin tu ma rungs pa/ /brkam zhing gzhan gyi srog 'phrog byed/ /de yi tshig ni yang dag 'byung / /gang dag yul ni de dag brtag /de dag yul gyi 'gros dang spyod/ /de dag tshig tu smra ba ni/ /
202b4(rgyud 'bum): ma rungs gdon 'jug rnam spyod yin/ /'di dag gzhan yang mang po ni/ /gang gi spyod 'gros spyod pa dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs tshul dang ni/ /rnam pa sna tshogs mtshan nyid dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs sems can gtso/ /
202b5(rgyud 'bum): rnam pa sna tshogs skye gnas 'dod/ /de ltar gdon 'jug mtshan ma ni/ /mtshan nyid 'gros dang spyod pa yin/ /mi rnams kyi ni bde skyed pa/ /sems can du yang bya ba ste/ /gzhon nu sna tshogs yang dag
202b6(rgyud 'bum): 'byung / /bsrung ba'i don du rab sbyar bya/ /yi ge drug pas bya ba ni/ /phyag rgya chen po dang ldan pa'i/ /sngags nyid kho na bzlas byas na/ /bsrung ba chen por 'gyur ba yin/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi
202b7(rgyud 'bum): rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/ gdon 'jug pa'i spyod pa'i cho ga'i le'u rab 'byam las/ nyi shu rtsa lnga pa rdzogs s+ho// // de nas bcom ldan
202b8(rgyud 'bum): 'das shAkya thub pas/ gzhan yang gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la gzigs nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyi sngags rnams rgyud thams cad la yang dag par
203a1(rgyud 'bum): 'jug pa/ rig pa thams cad la 'os pa/ dus dpag tu med pa'i yon tan ma lus pa'i 'bras bu 'byung ba yang rjes su 'brel ba'i mtshan ma'i tshad yod de/ de 'grub par bya ba'i rgyur bshad pa ni 'di lta ste/ skye ba gzhan gyis
203a2(rgyud 'bum): 'grub pa nyid/ /dus kyi rgyus ni 'grub pa med/ /de yi tshad dang sbyor ba ni/ /sngon byung rgyu las byung ba yin/ /rtse gcig bdag gir byed pas 'grub/ /grub pa rigs pa rnam dpyod pa'o/ /rigs pa gzhon nu khyod bsten na/ /lus can kun la
203a3(rgyud 'bum): rab tu snang / /mthar gyis byas pa'i las rnams ni/ /rigs pa zhes ni bya ba yin/ /dpa' bo'i rigs ldan de sbyor bas/ /grub pa mchog ni thob par 'gyur/ /grub med bsgrub bya'i las rnams med/ /las rnams med par
203a4(rgyud 'bum): 'grub pa'ang med/ /las dang byed par yang dag ldan/ /yang dag ldan pas grub pa 'thob/ /cho ga ldan pa'i rgyu yis ni/ /gnas pa mchog ni thob par 'gyur/ /sngags pa sngags ni mi sgrogs na/ /sngags min
203a5(rgyud 'bum): pa yang sngags par 'gyur/ /thub pa'i las ni yang dag spyod/ /grub pa rgyas pa thob par 'gyur/ /rigs kyi sa bon la brten na/ /blo yi mchog la gnas par 'gyur/ /gnas mchog dam par nges sdom na/ /dang
203a6(rgyud 'bum): po'i bgrod pa thob par 'gyur/ /blo dang bsam pa legs gnas na/ /nad med go 'phang 'thob par 'gyur/ /gang gi dus dang mtshan ma las/ /dus min grub par 'dod pa ni/ /mdor na brgya byin yin na yang / /de yi sngags
203a7(rgyud 'bum): rnams mi 'grub bo/ /'byung po skye bo mi phan dang / /dus min par yang rtsom pa yang / /bdag nyid chen po tshangs pa yang / /de la grub pa mi snang ngo / /snyom dang sred dang yang dag ldan/ /dregs dang nga rgyal ldan pa dang / /lhod dang yun ring
203a8(rgyud 'bum): 'thab la dga'/ /grong gi skye bo la rtag dga'/ /le lo phan tshun sbyor ba la/ /'di la grub pa ga la yod/ /gang yang lha yi bla ma dang / /gang yang rtag tu lha min bla/ /sngags rnams de dag gis bsgrub kyang / /cho ga spangs na nus med yin/ /de bzhin
203b1(rgyud 'bum): cho ga'i las nyams na/ /sems ni rnam par rmongs par byed/ /de bas sngags ni bzla mi bya/ /cho ga med par rigs pa min/ /byis pa rnams kyis mthong ba rmongs/ /de lta bus ni skyed par 'gyur/ /de bas byis pa rmongs pa yang / /
203b2(rgyud 'bum): shin tu dka' ba'i 'gro bar lhung / /de nas de dag sngags spyod pa/ /de las de dag drang ba yang / /mthar gyis de dag grub pa ni/ /dge ba 'gro ba rab tu 'theb/ /de las zlos pa'i sngags pas ni/ /mi g.yo zhi ba'i gnas su
203b3(rgyud 'bum): 'jog / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngags bzlas pa/ /de ltar sngags rnams don yod de/ /sems can mig zur gyis bltas pa'ang / /rjes su gzung ba nyid du 'gyur/ /de dag dge ba'i bshes gnyen te/ /'di dag sems can
203b4(rgyud 'bum): mnyes gshin pa'o/ /'di dag grub par bstan pa ste/ /theg gsum mnyam pa nyid zhi ba/ /de bas rnam kun rab 'bad nas/ /mnyam par bzhag cing sngags zlos bya/ /sngags zlos rab tu sbyor byed pa/ /sngags ni cho ga med par
203b5(rgyud 'bum): spyod/ /yun ring dus su 'khor ba na/ /nam zhig cig na grub par 'dod/ /shin tu yun ring dus song nas/ /sngags rnams grub par snang ba'o/ /cho ga ldan pa'i sngags kyis ni/ /myur du grub pa rab tu 'thob/ /'bras bu 'grub par
203b6(rgyud 'bum): mthong ba ste/ /'bras med sngags ni gsung ba min/ /gsang sngags 'bras bu ldan pa ni/ /tshe 'di nyid la grub par gsungs/ /grub byed 'bras bu las ma yin/ /las med par yang 'bras mi 'dod/ /'bras bu las dang yang
203b7(rgyud 'bum): dag ldan/ /'bras bcas las su bstan pa yin/ /de bas skye dang rga spangs pa/ /de ltar yang dag byung gyur pa/ /'jig rten zhi bar gsungs pa ste/ /zhi ba srid las rnam grol yin/ /bdag nyid chen po der 'gror gtogs/ /sangs rgyas
203b8(rgyud 'bum): chos ni rjes su bstan/ /'jig rten phyin ci log dus su/ /de la grub pa rab tu snang / /tshe 'di nyid la'ang grub 'gyur te/ /tshe rabs gzhan du'ang 'byung bar 'gyur/ /zhi ba'i lam ni 'dus ma byas/ /mthar thug zhi ba'i bar
204a1(rgyud 'bum): du 'gyur/ /gang du 'jig rten rnam bstan pa/ /zhi ba'i gnas ni dri med bzang / /sangs rgyas nyid ni legs bstan pa/ /rgyal bas kun tu bstan pa yin/ /de la mthar ni de dag phyin/ /sngags grub par ni gsungs pa yin/ /rang
204a2(rgyud 'bum): rig so so'i rgyal ba yis/ /sngags 'di bstan pa ma yin te/ /thub zla rdzu 'phrul chen po yis/ /'jig rten dag la sngags bstan to/ /tshe 'dir lus can rnams la ni/ /mngon sum du ni grub pa bstan/ /de nyid stong pa rig pa yis/ /sngags
204a3(rgyud 'bum): ni sangs rgyas nyid du ston/ /rtsod dus tha ma'i dus dag tu/ /zhi ba'i de nyid khyad par du/ /sngags 'grub par ni mi 'gro zhing / /myur ba'i las la'ang 'grub pa med/ /de yi dus su sbyor ba ni/ /cho ga mthong ba'i las dag gis/ /
204a4(rgyud 'bum): sngags rgyud shes pas sgrub bo zhes/ /bstan pa 'di la thub pas gsungs/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa na/ /grub mchog myur du grub par 'dod/ /de bzhin bar ma'i dus dag tu/ /bar ma'i grub pa nye bar
204a5(rgyud 'bum): bstan/ /tha ma'i dus la brten nas ni/ /tha ma'i grub par gsungs pa yin/ /bzang po yi ni dus dag la/ /de bzhin nam mkhar 'gro ba dang / /sngags rnams kun ni rab 'grub par/ /'jig rten 'dren pas bstan pa yin/ /
204a6(rgyud 'bum): de dus rgyal ba'i dbang po ni/ /rigs kyi mchog de rab tu 'grub/ /pad ma'i rigs ni bar mar 'grub/ /dus kyi mtha' la rdo rje'i rigs/ /kha cig smon lam dbang gis ni/ /thams cad du ni sngags rnams 'grub/ /spyan ras
204a7(rgyud 'bum): gzigs dang 'jam dpal dang / /sgrol ma khro gnyer gnod sbyin rgyal/ /rin chen rigs spyod gnod sbyin ni/ /dus rnams kun tu 'grub par 'gyur/ /lha rnams kun gyi sngags gzhan ni/ /gang yang chags can gyis rab sbyar/ /
204a8(rgyud 'bum): rtsod pa'i dus su 'grub 'gyur zhing / /'jig rten pa yi bstan pa'ang 'grub/ /lha dang mi dang lha min gyi/ /dbang po gnod sbyin srin po dang / /drang srong nam mkha' lding dang ni/ /sha za 'byung po gza' tshogs dang / /mi dang mi ma yin pa
204b1(rgyud 'bum): dang / /'dod pa'i khams na gnas pa yi/ /bsod nams ldan pa rdzu 'phrul che/ /ma rungs las ni mi bzad ldan/ /brgya byin tshangs pa drag po dang / /dbang ldan de bzhin gzhan dag kyang / /khyab 'jug 'byung po thams cad dang / /
204b2(rgyud 'bum): rdzu 'phrul chen po'i sngags bstan pa/ /de dag dus kyi tha ma la/ /bzlas pas 'grub par 'gyur ba yin/ /de dus 'jigs pa chen po la/ /sdang ba'i las ni de bzhin 'grub/ /'byung po dbang dang dgug bya ba/ /sa steng sha za
204b3(rgyud 'bum): 'i las dag 'grub/ /don med grub par snang ba ste/ /'jig rten pha rol dag tu smod/ /des na rgyal ba'i dbang po yi/ /de dus 'jigs pa chen po yang / /'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis yang dag bstan/ /kun la rjes gzung gtsor
204b4(rgyud 'bum): byas nas/ /zlos pa la ni sngags gzugs kyis/ /zlos pa bstan pa la dad cing / /dkon mchog gsum la mchod byed la/ /de tshe sems can sngags gzugs kyis/ /gdul bar byed par 'gyur ba yin/ /'phags pa
204b5(rgyud 'bum): 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las cho ga nges par sdom pa'i dus kyi le'u rab 'byam las/ nyi shu rtsa drug pa rdzogs s+ho// //
204b6(rgyud 'bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas gzhan yang thams cad dang ldan pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la gzigs nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod
204b7(rgyud 'bum): kyi cho ga'i rgyal po chos kyi dbyings kyi mdzod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rgyu mthun pa'i rjes su spyod pa/ mdo chen po'i mchog /rin po che'i le'u de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i mchog rjes
204b8(rgyud 'bum): su gnang ba/ sngags kyi mchog sgrub pa la rgyu mtshan shes pa dang rtags dang dus gzhan shes pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs rnams nges par bstan cing yang dag par bstan no/ /'byung po thams cad kyi sgra sgrogs pa dang sems can dang sems can
205a1(rgyud 'bum): ma yin pa'i ming gi sgrar 'gyur ba ni/ sgra las byung ba'i ming du shes pa dang sgra las byung ba ma yin par bstan pa dang de bzhin du 'dren ma dang ldan pa'i sngags rnams ni rnam pa gsum du bya ba yin te/
205a2(rgyud 'bum): sgra bzang yang dag ldan pa dang / /rtag tu don dang rab tu 'brel/ /zur chag tshig dang rtag tu bral/ /legs par sbyar don gyis brgyan pa/ /phyi rol grub mtha' yod ma yin/ /'phags pa'i sngags su rab tu bsgrags/ /rtag tu
205a3(rgyud 'bum): tshig don ldan pa ste/ /rnam pa gsum gyi dbye bar 'gyur/ /ring dang thung dang de bzhin du/ /bar ma'i yi ges brgyan pa'ang yin/ /sngags kyi lha mor gyur pa ni/ /dbyangs yig sdeb sbyor gyis brgyan pa/ /ngag ni legs sbyar
205a4(rgyud 'bum): legs sbyar min/ /ci ste don dang don med min/ /don ldan tshig dang don med tshig /sngags don rnam par gsungs pa yin/ /rnam rtog mang po'i tshig dag ni/ /'jig rten pa rnams kun gyi sngags/ /gcig dang gnyis
205a5(rgyud 'bum): kyi yi ge dag / sdeb sbyor dbyangs yig bzang po'i gzhi/ /gsum dang bzhi dang lnga dang drug /de bzhin bdun pa brgyad pa yin/ /dgu pa bcu pa de bzhin du/ /yi ge dag ni grub par 'dod/ /yi ge bcu dang yang
205a6(rgyud 'bum): dag ldan/ /yi ge rnams kyi gnas pa mnyan/ /ji srid 'di dag bcu 'gyur ni/ /sa steng 'di la yi ge mthong / /yi ge drug dang nyi shu dang / /yi ge gcig gi bar du 'gyur/ /'di tsam tshad kyi yi ge ni/ /sngags kyi tshig ni rtag
205a7(rgyud 'bum): tu sbyar/ /rkang pa bzhi dang yang dag ldan/ /sngags ni don kun sgrub pa'o/ /mchog ni rab mchog don ldan pa/ /sngags ni gang zhig rgyal bas gsungs/ /de sras rgyal ba'i sras dag gis/ /gsungs pa dag ni bar ma yin/ /
205a8(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten kun gyis bstan pa yi/ /sngags ni tha mar gyur pa yin/ /bden bral gyis bstan ngan pa'ang yin/ /bcwa brgyad bdun nam nyi shu'am/ /brgya dang lnga bcu dag gi bar/ /'di tsam tshad kyi sngags rnams ni/ /rgyal ba
205b1(rgyud 'bum): 'phags pas gsungs pa yin/ /gcig dang gnyis kyi yi ge dang / /lnga brgya'i yi ge'i bar 'gyur ba/ /de tsam tshad kyi sngags rnams ni/ /byang chub sems dpas rab tu gsungs/ /de nang tshig ni dgod pa dang / /sngags dang ldan
205b2(rgyud 'bum): par brjod pa yin/ /sdeb sbyor ldan zhing dbyangs yig ldan/ /khams kyi don gyis rnam par brgyan/ /tshig dang legs par rab ldan dang / /rgyud dang rigs par ldan pa dang / /sgra dang dbyangs yig rnam bral ba/ /nam zhig na ni
205b3(rgyud 'bum): grub par 'gyur/ /legs par rab ldan sgra rnams kyang / /skye bo drod gnas rkan dad ni/ /so mchu lkog ma'i sgra dag ni/ /sbyar ba bzhin du rim gyis 'byung / /mi gsal brjod las ldog gyur pa/ /legs par rab
205b4(rgyud 'bum): ldan brjod pa yin/ /yongs rdzogs tshig dang sgra dag dang / /yang dag ldan pas bsgrub par 'gyur/ /sgrub pa nyams dang bya ba nyams/ /sgra dang don dang rnam bral na/ /myur du sngags rnams mi 'grub ste/ /yun
205b5(rgyud 'bum): ring dus su 'gor ba yin/ /de la grub pa yong med min/ /log par yang ni de mi byed/ /skye ba gzhan du'ang snang ba ste/ /sngags grub mchog kyang ster bar 'gyur/ /yun ring dus su bzlas pa yi/ /de yi
205b6(rgyud 'bum): sngags kyi mthu yis ni/ /sngags rig skye bo'i sngags de ni/ /don med las ni byed ma yin/ /sngags rnams kun kyi tha ma ni/ /mi ma yin pa'i 'jig rten pa/ /'byung po kun ni ser snar bcas/ /gang yin des ni sngags bstan pa'o/ /
205b7(rgyud 'bum): yi ge gang dag des bstan pa/ /gcig dang gnyis kyi grangs dag dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs kla klo'i skad/ /yul gyi skad du bstan pa ste/ /phreng du bsdebs dang ldan pa dang / /sgra ni 'dres par gyur pa yin/ /de dag yi ge gcig pa nas/ /rtsa brgyad
205b8(rgyud 'bum): stong gi bar du'o/ /tshig rkang bzhi dang rkang med dang / /rkyang pa tshigs su sbyar des bstan/ /tshigs bcad rgyun chags cha dag dang / /tshigs bcad tshigs su brjod pa yin/ /yang dang yang ni brjod don ldan/ /gsal ba'i don gyis brgyan
206a1(rgyud 'bum): pa yin/ /zur chag legs sbyar sgra nyams kyang / /don ni rab tu brtag pa yin/ /mi gsal gsal ba med pa dang / /yi ge nyams kyang 'dod pa yin/ /'gro ba yul dang rnam bral ba/ /de la'ang sngags ni 'grub par brjod/ /de ltar
206a2(rgyud 'bum): sngags rnams kun la ni/ /rtag tu phan pas rigs par gsungs/ /zag med zag bcas thams cad kyi/ /sngags rnams 'di yi mtshan 'di yin/ /gang la yi ge sa mang zhing / /ni ta yis brgyan pa ni/ /de las de yi mod la ni/ /de dag la ni
206a3(rgyud 'bum): nges 'grub 'gyur/ /dang po sngags ni yi ge / /mtha' na yi ge ma yod la/ /yi ge sa ni rkang par ldan/ /de bzhin ta yis bar mdzes shing / /ta yi rnam pa zur bzhir ldan/ /mtha' gnas yi ge rnam par spangs/ /ra gnyis ldan pa yi
206a4(rgyud 'bum): ge ta/ /sngags rnams kyi ni grub pa byed/ /dang por ra gnyis mang ba dang / /yi ge hU~M gi yon tan yod/ /yi ge tsa ni gru bzhir snang / /de dag yi ge sgrub par brjod/ /yi ge b+ha ni rar ldan zhing / /yig mthar ma dang yi ge gnas/ /dang por ma dang
206a5(rgyud 'bum): mang yi ge/ /de ni sngags kyi mchog tu bstan/ /gang yang yi ge na mang zhing / /rgyud rnams kun la snang ba yin/ /sngags de dag ni zhi bar gsungs/ /gshin rje hU~M gis brgyan pa yis/ /yi ge b+ha ni mang ba de/ /dbang po rlung gi phyogs su gsungs/ /
206a6(rgyud 'bum): yi ge ba ni chu lhar gsungs/ /'jig rten phan zhing rgyas byed yin/ /sngags gang yi ge e mang ba/ /dbang chen de ni rab tu snang / /dang po dkon mchog gsum skyabs 'gro/ /gang yin sngags ni de bzhin du/ /phyag 'tshal
206a7(rgyud 'bum): ba la rab 'jug dang / /zhi ba'i rgyu dang bde ba byed/ /de las gzhan pa'i lha rnams la'ang / /phyag 'tshal don du rab tu sbyar/ /sngags dang rgyud la rang gi sngags/ /rang sngags las ni thams cad pa/ /gang la yi ge
206a8(rgyud 'bum): ra mang zhing / /mtha' na yi ge phaT hU~M bcas/ /'di dag sngags ni gdug pa che/ /gzi brjid ldan zhing gzi mdangs che/ /mi zhi srog gcod byed pa ste/ /gdug pa'i sems can dag la sbyar/ /khyad par du ni sdig yod pas/ /
206b1(rgyud 'bum): de bas las de mi bya'o/ /rtag tu thub pas spangs pas na/ /'bad de zlos pos spang bar bya/ /sngags ni zhi dang rgyas pa dag /gnyis kyi don ni 'grub 'gyur te/ /las la ji srid gsungs pa dag /skad cig gis ni thams cad 'grub/ /
206b2(rgyud 'bum): 'di dag sngags ni legs bzlas na/ /gzi brjid ldan zhing rdzu 'phrul che/ /rgyal bas gsungs pa'i sngags kyis ni/ /zhi ba'i las ni bya ba yin/ /rin chen rigs kyi bya ba ni/ /rgyas pa'i las ni thams cad do/ /gang dag sdig pa'i las rnams kun/ /
206b3(rgyud 'bum): mngon spyod la ni rab tu sbyar/ /mngon par spyod pa'i las rnams ni/ /rdo rje'i rigs kyis bya ba yin/ /'jig rten mgon gyis bkag na yang / /gnod sbyin dbang la rab tu bstan/ /sems can rnams ni gdul ba'i phyir/ /
206b4(rgyud 'bum): sngags kyi che ba'i bdag nyid gsungs/ /rigs gsum nyid kyis thams cad du/ /rnam pa gsum du bstan pa yin/ /thub pa nyid kyis rigs dag ni/ /gang yang brgyad du yang dag bstan/ /grub pa de dag rnam gsum 'gyur/ /
206b5(rgyud 'bum): rnam pa gsum du yang dag bstan/ /mchog dang bar ma tha ma ni/ /de dag rnam pa gsum 'byed pa/ /zhi dang rgyas pa dag dang ni/ /mngon spyod par ni 'dod pa yin/ /sngags dang ldan pa nyid dag dang / /rgyud dang ldan pa kho
206b6(rgyud 'bum): nar bstan/ /sngags kyi 'gro ba'i bdag nyid che/ /mngon par spyod la sbyar ba yin/ /'di dag las ni mi 'dod de/ /thub pa mchog gis smad pa yin/ /shin tu nyam ngar gyur kyang ni/ /srog la gnod las mi bya'o/ /
206b7(rgyud 'bum): mdor bsdu na ni ma 'dres par/ /las kyi bdag nyid chen por bstan/ /der ni rigs dang cho ga sngags/ /las ni rgya che rgya che ba/ /cho ga'i rgyal po 'di la gsungs/ /rgyud gzhan dag la'ang snang ba yin/ /las nyams
206b8(rgyud 'bum): rnams ni mi bsten cing / /sngags rnams kun la rigs par ldan/ /'jig rten sngags rnams ji snyed pa/ /de bzhin cha bcas cha med pa'o/ /'jig rten 'das pa thams cad kyang / /'di 'dra'i yon tan shes par bya/ /sngags grub grangs
207a1(rgyud 'bum): ni med gyur kyang / /de grangs yongs su brjod par bya/ /dang po grangs gcig 'byung ba ste/ /de bzhin nyi shu'ang ldan par 'byung / /de nas mdor na sum cu ste/ /de las gzhan yang bzhi bcu yin/ /de phyed bsnan
207a2(rgyud 'bum): na drug cu ste/ /de bzhin bcus bsnan bdun cu yin/ /de steng bcus ni bsnan pa la/ /brgyad cu'i grangs su gsungs pa yin/ /de la bcus bsnan dgu bcur gsungs/ /bcu gzhan gyis bsnan brgya yin te/ /
207a3(rgyud 'bum): brgya yi grangs kyis bgrang ba yi/ /de dag bcu la stong phrag gcig /stong phrag bcu la khri yin te/ /khri bcu la ni 'bum phrag gcig /'bum phrag bcu la sa ya ste/ /sa ya bcu la bye ba yin/ /bye ba bcu la dung phyur ste/ /
207a4(rgyud 'bum): dung phyur bcu la ther 'bum yin/ /de bcu ther 'bum chen por bstan/ /de bcu la ni shu rdog ste/ /shu rdog bcu la mchog nyal yin/ /mchog nyal bcu la rkyang phye ste/ /rkyang phye chen po de bcu yin/ /de bcu la ni khyad
207a5(rgyud 'bum): phyin yin/ /khyad phyin chen po de bcu yin/ /de dag bcu la sgyu mar brjod/ /sgyu ma chen po de bcu yin/ /de bcu la ni mtsho yas zhes/ /'jig rten 'dren pas gsungs pa yin/ /mtsho yas chen po de dag bcu/ /
207a6(rgyud 'bum): mtsho yas chen po de bcu la/ /dug chen pa yi rgya mtsho yin/ /de dag nyi shu'i phyed la ni/ /dug chen rgya mtsho chen po yin/ /dug chen rgya mtsho bcu la ni/ /mchog yas zhes ni brjod pa yin/ /mchog yas bcu zhes bstan
207a7(rgyud 'bum): pa ni/ /ban bun dag tu rab tu bstan/ /ban bun de dag bcu la ni/ /de ni ma lus pa zhes brjod/ /de dag nyi shu phyed la ni/ /ma lus chen po zhes su brjod/ /de tshe grangs kyi tshad du ni/ /'jig rten 'dren pas gsungs pa yin/ /bcu yi grangs kyis
207a8(rgyud 'bum): bcur byas na/ /grangs ni grangs med ces su brjod/ /grangs med bcur ni bsgyur byas na/ /de las gzhan du dpag med yin/ /dpag med stong du bsgyur byas na/ /'jig rten zhes ni yongs su bstan/ /'jig rten de bcu 'jig rten che/ /'jig
207b1(rgyud 'bum): rten chen po bsgres byas na/ /de 'og mun pa zhes su brjod/ /mun pa las ni snang bar brjod/ /snang ba chen po de dag bcu/ /de bcu la ni phung por brjod/ /phung po de bcu bsgres na ni/ /phung po chen por de brjod do/ /phung po chen po de
207b2(rgyud 'bum): bcu la/ /'di ni zab pa zhes brjod do/ /zab pa las ni brtan par brjod/ /brtan pa la ni rab brtan 'gro/ /de nas gong du mang ldan yin/ /mang por 'dod pa gnas su brjod/ /rtsis shes dam pas gnas su brjod/ /de nas
207b3(rgyud 'bum): gnas ni chen por 'gro/ /chen po'i gnas zhes 'dod pa yin/ /dpag dang dpag med mnyam byas nas/ /de don chen por yongs su bsgrags/ /don chen rab 'byor gnas dang ni/ /de nas rgya mtsho chen por 'gro/ /dang po rgya mtsho
207b4(rgyud 'bum): chen por bstan/ /dang po'i dang por phan pa dang / /dang po mchog ces bya bar bstan/ /mchog las gtso bor brjod pa ste/ /gtso las khyim gyi ming yin no/ /de ni bsam mi khyab par brjod/ /bsam mi khyab las mi bzad gzugs/ /
207b5(rgyud 'bum): mi bzad gzugs las rgyal thabs 'dod/ /rgyal thabs las gzhan gter yin te/ /de yi 'og ma dge ba yin/ /dge ba'i pha rol sems las byung / /de las gzhan pa sems byung che/ /sems las sems ni rnam par g.yeng / /
207b6(rgyud 'bum): brjod pa zhes ni de la bya/ /brjod pa las ni brjod med nas/ /bsnyad yas su yang brjod pa yin/ /bsnyad yas las gzhan bsnyad yas che/ /de tshe phyar phyur zhes kyang brjod/ /phyar phyur las ni phyar phyur che/ /shu rdog de bzhin shu
207b7(rgyud 'bum): rdog che/ /rtsis kyi pha rol phyin pa'i gnas/ /dge zhing zhi ba zhes su bstan/ /de nas bgegs chen mthong ba ste/ /chu 'byung zhes ni de las brjod/ /chu 'byung de las sems 'phrul nas/ /de las gzhan pa dam pa yin/ /
207b8(rgyud 'bum): de las pha rol sangs rgyas yul/ /de las gzhan ni 'phel byed sa/ /'jig rten mi yi rtsis dag ni/ /bgrang bar yang ni mi nus so/ /de las gzhan du sangs rgyas kyi/ /go 'phang dang ni spyod yul yin/ /sangs rgyas
208a1(rgyud 'bum): zhing ni gang gA'i klung / /bye ma snyed du brjod pa ni/ /bsdus nas rdul gyi tshogs dag ni/ /'dren pas bstan pa mdzad pa yin/ /'di dag dper ni byas pa ste/ /tshad ma shes pa'i spyod yul min/ /rgyu yis dngos po bsgrub
208a2(rgyud 'bum): bya ste/ /rtsis kyi pha rol phyin mi nus/ /'di tsam rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la/ /sngon ni nga yis bsnyen bkur byas/ /dpag med bskal pa dag tu ni/ /de dag la ni mnyes byas nas/ /de tsam dus kyi mthar thug par/ /nga ni byang
208a3(rgyud 'bum): chub sems dpar gyur/ /sems can don ni bsgrub bya'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas nyid du'ang yang dag bstan/ /de dang der ni bdag gi sngags/ /cho ga rgya chen bstan pa yin/ /cho ga yi ni rab mchog 'di/ /sangs rgyas 'di dag
208a4(rgyud 'bum): kun gyis gsungs/ /'di tsam tshad kyi sangs rgyas kyis/ /sngon chad 'di ni gsungs pa yin/ /dus kyi tha ma'i skye bo la/ /gzhon nu nga yang nga yis bstan/ /ji snyed 'jig rten sngags rnams dang / /cho ga'i rgyal po'i snod dang
208a5(rgyud 'bum): ni/ /de bzhin 'jig rten 'das pa dang / /mi dang lha dang lha min dang / /thams cad kun gyi sngags rnams ni/ /rgyud dang rigs par rab tu bstan/ /cho ga'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul che/ /gang du kun gyis yongs su bkur/ /de dag cho ga zhib mo
208a6(rgyud 'bum): yis/ /'jam pa'i ngag ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi cho ga ni/ /'di nyid kyi ni zhib mo zhes/ /de dag 'grub par gsungs pa ste/ /thams cad kun pas mthu ldan 'gyur/ /gang yang mi yi 'jig rten dang / /
208a7(rgyud 'bum): gang gzhan sngags kyi lha mo dang / /'jig rten 'das pa'i sngags kun dang / /'jig rten rdzu 'phrul che dang bcas/ /'di nyid tshul gyi cho ga yis/ /cho ga'i rgyal pos 'grub pa nyid/ /sngags rnams kun dang cho ga kun/ /'di yi
208a8(rgyud 'bum): dbang du 'gyur bar bstan/ /cho ga'i rgyal po bla med 'di/ /gang du 'jam dpal gyis rab bzhed/ /gang yang bzo ni rnam par shes/ /'jig rten pa yi 'jig rten 'dod/ /rgyu mtshan shes dang la nye bzang / /skar ma'i dpyad kyi rtags dang ni/ /
208b1(rgyud 'bum): rgyu mtshan shes dang spyod pa dang / /sgra skad dge dang mi dge dang / /'byung po kun gyi skad shes dang / /spyod dang sems kyi spyod pa dang / /zur gyis shes pa dag kyang bshad/ /de bzhin gter lta nor sgyur byed/ /rtsis dang brda sprod
208b2(rgyud 'bum): bstan bcos dang / /gos kyi rim pa'i cho ga dang / /nang rig gso ba rig pa dang / /de nyid thams cad phan dang bde/ /gtan tshigs lugs kyi bstan bcos dang / /gzhan yang sgra yi bstan bcos bstan/ /sdeb sbyor rig
208b3(rgyud 'bum): byed dri za'i glu/ /spos sbyor dag kyang bstan pa yin/ /bdag gis byang chub sems kyis ni/ /sems can don phyir bshad pa yin/ /bdag ni byang chub sems sngon gyur/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtshor sngar gnas tshe/ /sems
208b4(rgyud 'bum): can rnams la phan pa'i phyir/ /bdag gis su ni bshad pa yin/ /'khor ba'i dgon pa'i tshang tshing du/ /bdag ni yun ring dus su gnas/ /ji ltar gdul bya'i sems can la/ /de ltar bdag gis de bzhin byas/ /ji lta
208b5(rgyud 'bum): ji ltar sems can rnams/ /phan pa'i las ni len pa dag /phan don las kyis dge ba'i gzhi/ /de lta de ltar 'di dag byas/ /sna tshogs las kyis bsgyur ba yi/ /sems can 'gro ba'i skye gnas dag /'di dag bya ba sna
208b6(rgyud 'bum): tshogs byas/ /sna tshogs skye gnas rab tu bstan/ /las rnams sna tshogs ldan pa yis/ /sna tshogs don gyi bstan bcos bstan/ /rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs ldan pas/ /'di la de bzhin byas pa yin/ /sna tshogs 'gro ba'i skye gnas
208b7(rgyud 'bum): su/ /bdag gis de bzhin cha byad byas/ /phan pa'i bsam pas sems can la/ /sna tshogs gzugs ni bdag gis sprul/ /dbang phyug brgya byin tshangs pa sogs/ /khyab 'jug nor sbyin bden bral dang / /sna tshogs gza' yi gzugs sogs kyang / /
208b8(rgyud 'bum): de tshe sngon ni nga yis sprul/ /thugs rje chen po'i dbang gyur thugs/ /sems can bsam pa'i spyod yul can/ /de dag la ni rim gyis su/ /zhi ba'i gnas la bzhag pa yin/ /'khor bar phan tshun 'gro ba na/ /yun ring dus su thogs pa ni/ /
209a1(rgyud 'bum): sems can rnams kyi don bsgrub phyir/ /sngags kyi tshul gyis bstan pa yin/ /yun ring 'khor ba'i skye bar ngas/ /sangs rgyas rigs la brten nas ni/ /ye shes sngags dang cho ga ni/ /mthar gyis bstan par byas
209a2(rgyud 'bum): pa yin/ /byed pa dang ni bdag po'ang rung / /nga la gang yang yod min te/ /nges pa'i rigs la brten nas ni/ /nga ni sangs rgyas byang chub mchog /bde ba nad med yang dag zhi/ /dri med mya ngan med zhi ba/ /ngas thob mya ngan
209a3(rgyud 'bum): 'das zhi ba/ /skye ba'i 'ching las nga rab grol/ /yang na 'khor lo rab bskor zhing / /yang dag mtha' la brten nas ni/ /sngags kyi tshig ni rgya chen dang / /cho ga 'di ni nga yis bstan/ /las dang cho ga rgya che ba/ /zlos pas don med
209a4(rgyud 'bum): mi bya'o/ /'jig rten ji snyed sngags rnams dang / /cho ga dag kyang rab bstan pa/ /de kun mchod cing ri mor bya/ /de dag la ni brnyas pa spang / /cho ga rgya chen de dag kyang / /des na sngags pas brnyas mi bya/ /rgyu mtshan
209a5(rgyud 'bum): shes dang rig pa dang / /skar ma'i dpyad shes skad shes pa/ /'di dag don med mi bya ste/ /bkra shis don du bstan pa yin/ /mthong ba'i chos kyi don du yang / /grub pa'i rdzas sogs sman dang ni/ /zang zing bcas par mig
209a6(rgyud 'bum): sman 'grub/ /de las bkra shis 'grub pa yin/ /rab bsngags rgyal ba'i tshigs bcad dang / /bde legs tshigs bcad kyis brgyan pa/ /rab bsngags zhag ni bzang po dag /yar ngo dag gis legs mtshan pa/ /gza' mchog
209a7(rgyud 'bum): dkar ba dag ldan la/ /sngags sgrub pa ni brtsam par bya/ /de la sogs pa'i dge dang ldan/ /mi dge dag kyang spang bya ba/ /nga nyid kyis ni sngon bstan te/ /de bas zlos pas gzung bar bya/ /'jig rten ji snyed gang su dag /skar
209a8(rgyud 'bum): ma'i dpyad la mkhas pa dang / /gzhan gyi rgyud la mkhas pa dang / /lugs kyi bstan bcos gtan tshigs bcas/ /rig pa'i bstan bcos legs 'brel ba/ /sems can rnams la phan byed gang / /de kun nga yis sngon gsungs te/ /sngags
209b1(rgyud 'bum): zlos pas ni gzung bar bya/ /lam 'di grub pa'i rgyu yin par/ /de nyid gzigs pas bstan pa yin/ /grub pa'i mtha' ni mtha' dag kun/ /gang yin thar pa'i rgyur gsungs pa/ /sngags kyi lam gyi grub pa'i rgyur/ /nga nyid
209b2(rgyud 'bum): kyis ni byas pa yin/ /sngags kyi rig pa mtha' dag ni/ /zlos pas don med mi bya'o/ /'jig rten pa yi sngags kun dang / /dam par yang ni rab bstan dang / /de bzhin 'jig rten 'das bzang po/ /thams cad kun la rab
209b3(rgyud 'bum): sbyar bya/ /sems ni log par mi bya ste/ /yid kyis nam yang sun mi dbyung / /sngags rnams kun la mchod byed pa/ /dam tshig shes pas rab tu bstan/ /sangs rgyas dgongs shing phan pa yin/ /de bzhin ston pa'i
209b4(rgyud 'bum): bstan pa la/ /rab zhugs rgyal ba'i sras rnams kyang / /zhugs par rab tu shes pa yi/ /thub zla'i dkyil 'khor dag la ni/ /'di ni dam tshig shes par gsungs/ /rtag tu sngags rnams don yod de/ /yang dag bsams pa thob pa
209b5(rgyud 'bum): yin/ /gzhan dbang ngas ni ma byas te/ /brnyas pa dag kyang spyad ma yin/ /sngags rnams 'phags pa ma yin pa'ang / /de dag don med byas min brjod/ /'jig rten ji srid sngags rnams sam/ /yang na gzugs su byung ba'ang rung / /
209b6(rgyud 'bum): kun nas nyon mongs mthong lam mtha'/ /de dag 'bras bu yod par bstan/ /khros dang zhe sdang ldan pa yis/ /don med par ni mi bya'o/ /mi 'dod gus pa med pa yi/ /las ni mi bya 'bras bu med/ /de dang 'brel ba'i sems
209b7(rgyud 'bum): la ni/ /nam yang de la sbyin mi bya/ /rtag tu mnyam par bzhag nas ni/ /sngags tshig ldan par bzlas byas shing / /cho ga ji bzhin gzung byas na/ /'bras bu mtha' dag thob par 'gyur/ /yid ni g.yo med byas nas kyang / /sngags gcig
209b8(rgyud 'bum): de ni bzla bar bya/ /sngags ni don kun sgrub pa ste/ /rtse gcig sems kyis 'grub par 'gyur/ /rmongs pa'i bdag nyid g.yeng ba'i sems/ /de la grub pa 'grub mi 'gyur/ /gang la yid ni dag pa dang / /bstan pa la ni rab dad pa/ /'bras bu
210a1(rgyud 'bum): mtha' dag 'grub pa ste/ /'gro ba dam pa 'thob par 'gyur/ /dkon mchog gsum la dad pa ni/ /'dod pa'i grub par nye bar bstan/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po
210a2(rgyud 'bum): che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/ las dang bya ba dang cho ga dang rgyu mtshan shes pa'i le'u rab 'byam las/ nyi shu rtsa bdun pa rdzogs s+ho// // de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas gzhan yang gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal
210a3(rgyud 'bum): med khang la gzigs nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyi phyag rgya dang sngags rab 'byam mchog tu shin tu gsang ba nyon cig /ma dad pa'i sems can dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan
210a4(rgyud 'bum): pa la mngon par dad pa med pa dang / dam tshig med pa dang / gnang ba med pa dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun gcod par byed pa dang / mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa dang / bsod nams mi 'dod pa dang / skye bo sdang ba dang /
210a5(rgyud 'bum): 'grogs shing 'dres pa dang / sdig pa'i grogs pos yongs su zin pa dang / sangs rgyas dang chos las thag ring du gyur pa dang / cho ga 'di la 'bras bu med par gyur pa dang / slob dpon gyi man ngag med pa dang / gzhon nu khyod kyi gsang ba'i
210a6(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor la dbang ma bskur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la dam tshig ma mthong ba dang / skye bo mngon par mi 'dod pa dang / snod du ma gyur pa'i sems can rnams la bstan par mi bya'o/ /sangs rgyas chos la ma dad dang / /
210a7(rgyud 'bum): byang chub lam ni ring gyur la/ /de la phyag rgya mi sbyin zhing / /rgyud nyid kyang ni bstan mi bya/ /bag med rmongs par gyur pa'am/ /yang na gal te chags pas byin/ /zlos pa phyin ci log byed la/ /de la sngags ni mi 'grub bo/ /phyag
210a8(rgyud 'bum): rgya nye bar mi 'gyur zhing / /sngags nyid kyang ni gzhan du 'gyur/ /myur du grub pa mi 'thob cing / /de yi lus kyang nyams par 'gyur/ /zhi zhing dad pa'i sems ldan dang / /der ni dam tshig mthong ba dang / /rgyud dang sngags la rab zhugs la/ /
210b1(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya rgyud ni bstan par bya/ /dkon mchog gsum la mchod byed dang / /rgyal ba'i bstan la rab dad dang / /cho ga'i sbyor ba mthong ba dag /de dag la ni phyag rgya bstan/ /byang chub sems kyi cho ga shes/ /byang chub sems kyis rnam par
210b2(rgyud 'bum): brgyan/ /rtag tu byang chub lam la gnas/ /de dag la ni phyag rgya bstan/ /sngags dang rgyud la rab brtson zhing / /phan tshun brgyud pas dam tshig mthong / /byang chub chen por dam bcas pa/ /de la phyag rgya rab tu bstan/ /rgyal ba'i sras po dag dang
210b3(rgyud 'bum): ni/ /de bzhin nyan thos rang rgyal dang / /mthong ba'i chos kyi 'bras thob gang / /de la phyag rgya rab tu bstan/ /chos rnams la ni rnam rtog med/ /dad cing ser sna bral ba dang / /ston pa'i bka' la rigs par shes/ /de la phyag rgya rab tu
210b4(rgyud 'bum): bstan/ /rtsa brgyad brgya yi tshad du ni/ /'di dag phyag rgya phyag rgyas btab/ /lhag dang nyung ba ma yin par/ /mngon sum sangs rgyas kyis rab bshad/ /'jam dpal gang gi cho ga la/ /sngags kyang de dang mnyam pa yin/ /brgyad bcas
210b5(rgyud 'bum): brgya zhes gsungs pa dang / /sngags rnams de dang mnyam par bstan/ /phyag rgya'ang brgya ni rtsa brgyad du/ /thub pa mchog gis sngon gsungs so/ /'di tsam tshad du cho ga la/ /phyag rgya sngags ni yang dag 'byung / /sangs rgyas kun gyi
210b6(rgyud 'bum): mdzod nyid ni/ /sngags kyi mdzod du nye bar bstan/ /phyag rgya sngags ni mnyam ldan na/ /yang dag ldan pas las myur byed/ /'khor lo med pa'i shing rta ni/ /rigs par 'gro bar mi 'byung ste/ /de bzhin sngags rnams ma lus pa/ /phyag rgya
210b7(rgyud 'bum): med par las mi byed/ /sngags dang phyag rgya mnyam ldan zhing / /yang dag ldan pas myur las byed/ /lha dang lha min bcas pa yi/ /'jig rten gsum kun 'gugs byed na/ /las gzhan dag gis legs sbyar ba'i/ /mi yi 'jig
210b8(rgyud 'bum): rten smos ci dgos/ /mthong chos 'bras bu 'di dag gi/ /phyag rgya sngags la snang ba yis/ /gnyi ga ldan zhing dag pa dang / /cho ga ldan pa'i don bstan na/ /rgyal ba mchog dang sras rnams dang / /'byung po rnams ni 'gugs par byed/ /
211a1(rgyud 'bum): sngags dang phyag rgya dka' thub nyid/ /rnam gsum las ni legs gnas dang / /ci 'dod phun sum tshogs pa kun/ /de bzhin zlos pas thob par 'gyur/ /sngags rnams phyag rgyas phyag rgya btab/ /sngags kyis kyang ni de rgya
211a2(rgyud 'bum): btab/ /sngags ni phyag rgya med pas min/ /sngags kyang phyag rgya spangs pas min/ /phyag rgya sngags ni mnyam ldan na/ /yang dag ldan pas las kun byed/ /'di dag phan tshun 'bras bu ste/ /phan tshun 'bras bu 'byung ba
211a3(rgyud 'bum): yin/ /sgrub pas rigs ldan sbyar byas na/ /bsgrub bya min pa'i las rnams med/ /phyag rgya ldan pa'i zlos pa pos/ /sngags rnams ma lus 'grub par 'gyur/ /cho ga mthong bas rab brtson zhing / /sngags dang phyag rgya kun byas na/ /gang
211a4(rgyud 'bum): du 'gugs 'gyur mi 'grub pa/ /de gnas de ni yod ma yin/ /srid rtse mnar med bar dang ni/ /'jig rten khams kyi 'gro ba gzhan/ /gang du mi 'bebs mi 'gugs dang / /bsgrub bya ma yin gang yang med/ /sems
211a5(rgyud 'bum): can skye gnas las skyes dang / /byang chub sems dpa' mi snang ba'ang / /cho gas bskul nas mi 'gugs pa/ /de ni gang yang yod ma yin/ /srung ba'i cho ga'i rgyud dag gam/ /las 'grub bzlog par bya ba la/ /sa bcu
211a6(rgyud 'bum): la ni gnas pa yi/ /byang chub sems dpas kyang mi nus/ /sngags dang phyag rgya la gnas la/ /'byung po kun gyis mi tshugs so/ /dka' thub bzlas pa cho ga'i lam/ /sbyin sreg las la rab sbyar na/ /'di las skye zhing
211a7(rgyud 'bum): de las grub/ /phyag rgya sngags la snang ba yin/ /zlos pa rtag tu 'bad brtson zhing / /rtag tu de dag la gnas na/ /sngags rnams grub par 'gyur ba ste/ /don yod 'gyur bar thub pa'i bka'/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi
211a8(rgyud 'bum): gsung dag ni/ /de dag gis ni gzhan du byed/ /sngags dang rgyud ni rigs pa la/ /gang zhig rtag tu mi 'jug pa'o/ /sngags dang phyag rgya mtha' dag ni/ /gang zhig cho ga ldan byed pa'o/ /'jam dpal gzhon nu 'di dag ni/ /yang dang yang du
211b1(rgyud 'bum): bstan pa yin/ /sngags kyi rig pa mtha' dag ni/ /phyag rgyas sngags ni phan pa 'byung / /de srid las la cho ga'i rgyal/ /'dis ni 'bras bu rgya chen 'byung / /'jig rten gsang mchog phan pa dang / /sngags dang phyag rgyas dam bcas pa/ /
211b2(rgyud 'bum): de nas rigs ldan 'jam dpal te/ /khyab par byed pa byis pa'i gzugs/ /cung zad 'dzum pa'i bzhin gyur gnas/ /gzhon nu sna tshogs yang dag 'byung / /byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus che/ /sa bcu la ni gnas pa yis/ /sangs
211b3(rgyud 'bum): rgyas nyi ma'i gnyen gyur pa/ /thub pa mchog la rab tu zhus/ /bcom ldan sngags kyi rgyud dag ni/ /gang yin 'di ni 'jig rten bstan/ /sngon gyi sangs rgyas dag gis kyang / /de yang bdag la gsungs pa yin/ /de ltar shAkya seng ge
211b4(rgyud 'bum): yis/ /ci yi phyir na rab tu gsungs/ /bdag ni de ltar the tshom 'tshal/ /thub pa mchog gis bdag la gsungs/ /blo ldan ka la ping ka'i skad/ /tshangs pa yi ni gsung dbyangs kyis/ /sa bcu la ni rab gnas pa'i/ /byang chub sems dpa'
211b5(rgyud 'bum): la gsungs pa/ /sngon ni bskal pa mang po ru/ /nga ni 'khor bar 'khor ba na/ /thub dbang me tog kun skyes las/ /cho ga'i rgyal po'ang nga yis thob/ /de dang der ni sems can la/ /phan pa mang po byas pa yin/ /thugs rje'i dbang du song
211b6(rgyud 'bum): nas ni/ /de tshe bdag gi smon lam byas/ /sangs rgyas mchog tu de tshe bdag /dus kyi mthar ni yang dag byung / /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas ni/ /bstan pa'i don ni byas pa yin/ /phyi ma yi ni dus dag tu/ /de tshe nga ni
211b7(rgyud 'bum): mya ngan 'da'/ /de na cho ga'i rgyal dbang po/ /khyod kyi drung du nga yis bstan/ /nga yang 'jig rten mya ngan 'das/ /'dzam bu'i gling ni rab stongs shing / /de bzhin ston pa'i chos kyi mdzod/ /rtsod dus thag ring gyur pa na/ /sems can rnams
211b8(rgyud 'bum): la bstan pa'i don/ /cho ga'i rgyal po gcig byed 'gyur/ /cho ga'i rgyal po rgya chen la/ /de bzhin 'di ni yang dag 'jug /sems can rnams ni don la brtson/ /de yi tshe na 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de dus 'jigs su rung ba yi/ /de tshe sems can chos
212a1(rgyud 'bum): ldan min/ /rtag tu lus la mi gnas shing / /rgyal po rnams ni ma rungs yid/ /mi dang mi ma yin rnams ni/ /kun kyang bstan la rnam par sdang / /ngas bshad chos kyi mdzod rnams ni/ /nga yi thams cad 'jig par 'gyur/ /de dag
212a2(rgyud 'bum): gdul ba'i don gyi phyir/ /sngags kyi mdzod ni nye bar bstan/ /bskal pa bsam mi khyab par sngon/ /gzhon nu khyod kyi smon lam 'di/ /sangs rgyas ji snyed gang su dag /'jig rten gnyen gyur mya ngan 'das/ /de dag bstan pa'i don du
212a3(rgyud 'bum): ni/ /dus dang dus su bya'o zhes/ /bdag ni byis pa gzhon nu'i gzugs/ /dus kun tu ni rnam par spyod/ /sngags kyi gzugs kyis sems can la/ /de dang der ni rnam par 'dul/ /gzhon nu khyod kyi smon lam 'di/ /sngon chad du ni byas
212a4(rgyud 'bum): pa yin/ /nga ni byis pa'i gzugs thob gyur/ /des na khyod la bshad par bya/ /skye bo skyabs ni med pa dang / /sangs rgyas zhing ni stongs pa na/ /sngags kyi gzugs kyis sems can la/ /byis pa'i tshul gyis yang dag shod/ /sems can mang po
212a5(rgyud 'bum): 'dul byed cing / /phun sum tshogs pa sbyin byed pa/ /dus kyi tha ma de la ni/ /sems can kun la mchog sbyin byed/ /'jig rten nga ni mya ngan 'das/ /sa yi steng ni stongs gyur na/ /khyod nyid byis pa'i gzugs kyis ni/ /sangs rgyas mdzad
212a6(rgyud 'bum): pa byed par 'gyur/ /de tshe dgon chen rab dga' ba/ /kha ba can nang yod pa yi/ /chu bo gser dang ldan 'gram du/ /da ni mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal
212a7(rgyud 'bum): po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/ phyag rgya bskul ba'i cho ga 'jam dpal gyis yongs su zhus shing bstan pa'i le'u rab 'byam las/ nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs s+ho// // de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya
212a8(rgyud 'bum): thub pas gzhan yang gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la gzigs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya'i mdzod yang dag par bskul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /snyoms par zhugs ma thag
212b1(rgyud 'bum): tu bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i mdzod spu nas 'od zer du ma bye ba khri phrag brgya stong grangs med pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa byung ste/ /'od zer gyi dra ba du ma des sangs rgyas kyi zhing du ma gsal bar byas nas/ sangs
212b2(rgyud 'bum): rgyas thams cad la yang dag par bskul nas/ phyir yang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i mdzod spur zhugs par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la yang dag par bskul ma thag tu nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid kyi
212b3(rgyud 'bum): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ gnas gtsang ma'i steng gi nam mkha'i dkyil du bzhugs par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la
212b4(rgyud 'bum): bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal phyag rgya'i le'u'i cho ga'i mdzod sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa bshad kyis nyon cig /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhabs la btud de phyag
212b5(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mdzod kyi phyag rgya mchog tu shin tu gsang ba gang yin pa de dus la bab par mkhyen na/ bcom
212b6(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das de ni legs te bshad du gsol/ skye bo mang po la phan pa dang skye bo mang po la bde ba dang 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang skye bo'i tshogs mang po'i don dang phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir dang lha dang mi rnams dang sems
212b7(rgyud 'bum): can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba dang bde ba'i rnam par smin par 'gyur ba'i slad du'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gsol ba btab nas/ phyag rgya thams cad
212b8(rgyud 'bum): la gzigs shing sangs rgyas thams cad la mkhyen par byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad rab tu dga' bar byed pa/ 'phags pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag par tshim par byed pa/ 'phags pa'i
213a1(rgyud 'bum): sngags rnams la yid brtson par byed pa la yang dag par gzengs stod pa/ ma rungs pa thams cad zlog par byed pa/ 'jigs pa thams cad dbugs 'byin par byed pa/ 'khor bar gnas pa dag la bde ba dang shis pa dang mya ngan las
213a2(rgyud 'bum): 'das pa la rab tu 'jog par byed pa/ sems can sdug bsngal ba thams cad la bde ba'i don gyi phyir phyag rgya'i le'u'i cho ga ngas bshad kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nu nyon cig /dang po gtsug phud lnga pa ni/ /de ni phyag

217b4(rgyud 'bum): chub sems dpa' kun/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po 'joms byed cing / /lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dag /thams cad g.yo ba med byed pa'o/ /bzang po'i stan ni de nyid la/ /gung mo la ni yang dag brten/ /steng du rnam par dgod
217b5(rgyud 'bum): pa ni/ /gung mo srin lag rab brkyang ba'o/ /de nyid gdan du gsungs pa ni/ /thub pa dgra rgyal seng ges so/ /de bzhin lag gnyis sbyar nas ni/ /sor mo rnams ni bcing bar bya/ /de nas yal ga 'dra bar ni/ /'og tu mthe'u chung rtse mor
217b6(rgyud 'bum): sbyar/ /gung mo yang dag dgug bya zhing / /pad ma'i 'dab ltar yangs pa bya/ /mthe bo gnyis ka sbyar bzhag nas/ /rtag tu bsgreng ste bzhag pa yin/ /zhe sdang bral ba'i sangs rgyas kyis/ /'di ni rma bya'i gdan du gsungs/ /'di
217b7(rgyud 'bum): ni blo ldan 'jam pa'i dbyangs/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'di yi ni/ /byis pa rtag tu rtse byed pa'i/ /gdan du thub pa mchog gis gsungs/ /mthu chen phyag rgya chen po 'di/ /rang byung rnams kyis sngon bshad pa'o/ /'jam dbyangs
217b8(rgyud 'bum): sngags kyis rab bskul na/ /rnam pa sna tshogs las rnams byed/ /sha za sha ni za ba rnams/ /gdug pa rnams ni 'jig par byed/ /nyi shu de bzhin tshang bar ni/ /de dag phyag rgyar 'dod pa ste/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas pa rkang gnyis mchog /
218a1(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten gtso bos gsungs pa yin/ /de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /phyag rgya rnams kyi cho ga rnams/ /lag pa dge zhing dag pa dang / /dri med chu yis bkrus pa dang / /tsan+dan dkar dang ga pur dang / /gur
218a2(rgyud 'bum): gum chu dang ldan pa yi/ /dri yi khyad par mang po yis/ /byugs shing me la bskams pa yi/ /lag pa ma nyams gtsang ba dang / /ma smad shu ba med pa yis/ /dang por phyag bya rkang gnyis mchog /de yi phyag rgya bcing bar bya/ /
218a3(rgyud 'bum): sa la me tog kun skyes dang / /'od dpag med dang rin chen tog /dpag med tshe shes mi g.yo dbang / /'jig rten mgon po nyin byed dang / /bde byed 'jig rten mgon po dang / /spyan bzang chos kyi tog dang ni/ /
218a4(rgyud 'bum): 'od kyi phreng ba zhes grags pa/ /gtso bo mchog ni dam pa dag /'di dag ga pur sangs rgyas ni/ /rkang gnyis mchog la phyag byas nas/ /gtsang ba'i gnas su gtsang byas nas/ /zlos pa'i dus su phyag rgya
218a5(rgyud 'bum): bcing / /slob dpon la ni yang dag dris/ /the tshom don las rnam par grol/ /de 'dra'i spyod pa de ldan na/ /ci ltar bde bar phyag rgya bcing / /rnam sbyangs rnam par dben pa dang / /gnas kyang mngon par bsngags byas pa/ /khros
218a6(rgyud 'bum): min zas lhag bcas pa min/ /gzhan dag gis ni sems g.yeng min/ /sol ba thal ba'i nang dag tu/ /nam yang phyag rgya bshad mi bya/ /gzhan gyi bud med la chags dang / /gzhan nor chags la'ang bshad mi bya/ /
218a7(rgyud 'bum): langs dang nyal ba dag la ni/ /phyag rgya bde 'byung bshad mi bya/ /lhor bltas 'dug la'ang ma yin te/ /nub tu bltas te 'dug par min/ /steng dang 'og gi phyogs dag tu'ang / /phyag rgya bcing bar mi bya'o/ /byang dang shar du bltas
218a8(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / /phyogs mtshams dag ni de dag tu/ /dkyil 'khor bdag po'i sngags dran nas/ /sngags shes pas ni phyag rgya bcing / /phyag rgya ma lus bcing ba la/ /cho ga mchog 'di 'dod pa yin/ /de yi 'og tu brjod bya ba/ /phyag rgya
218b1(rgyud 'bum): nyi shu gcig pa yin/ /lag gnyis mnyam par byas nas ni/ /sor mo rnams ni sbyar bar bya/ /de nas sor mo gung mo ni/ /rtse mo sbyar bar bya ba yin/ /mdzub mo dang ni mthe'u chung gi/ /rtse mo tshigs ni bar mar gzhag /phyag rgya shes pas rtag
218b2(rgyud 'bum): bya ba/ /mthe bong gnyis ni bkug rten cing / /rtse mo gsum sbyar yang dag ldan/ /paT+Ti saM du mkhas pas shes/ /phyag rgya 'di ni mchog yin te/ /myur du gzhan gyi sngags rnams gcod/ /de nas gzhan gyi phyag rgya gcod/ /ma rungs
218b3(rgyud 'bum): sems can la sbyar bya/ /gza' dang ma mo srul po yi/ /'byung po kun ni skrag par byed/ /las rnam sna tshogs byed pa ste/ /zhi ba'ang myur du 'gugs par byed/ /drag po khyab 'jug tshangs pa dag /gang dag rang gis smras pa'i sngags/ /cho ga mthong
218b4(rgyud 'bum): ba'i las kyis ni/ /sngags shes pas ni de dag gcod/ /bdag nyid chen po paT+Ti sa'i/ /phyag rgya dang ni ldan pa dang / /rgyal ba'i zhal nas byung ba yi/ /sngags nyid dang yang ldan gnas na/ /rnam pa sna tshogs las byed de/ /de bzhin gcod dang
218b5(rgyud 'bum): dral ba'i las/ /sems can gzhan gyis byas pa'i skyon/ /ma lus mtha' dag 'jig par byed/ /lag gnyis de bzhin sbyar nas ni/ /gung mo srin lag bsgreng bya ste/ /lag gnyis yang dag ldan pa ni/ /mtshan dang
218b6(rgyud 'bum): 'dra bar yang dag 'byung / /sor mo bzhi ni yang dag ldan/ /mtshan gyi phyag rgya zhes 'dod do/ /lha yi bu ni dbang phyug che/ /rang gi rgyas ni phyag rgya btab/ /thub pas sngon ni bkug pa la/ /rgyud 'di las ni gsungs
218b7(rgyud 'bum): pa yin/ /cho ga mchog 'dir dam tshig dang / /bdag nyid sngags ni ma lus dag /de bzhin phyag rgya rgya cher bcas/ /bkug nas rab tu bstan pa yin/ /phyag rgya yi ni rab mchog 'di/ /'jig rten dag la rab
218b8(rgyud 'bum): tu bstan/ /phyag rgya dag ni gang ji snyed/ /drag pos sa steng rab bstan pa/ /de dag gi ni bdag po mchog /phyag rgya 'di ni rtags gcig yin/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs ni blo ldan pa/ /byang chub sems dpa'i mthu yis ni/ /
219a1(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor 'dir ni bsdus pa ste/ /sbyin sreg las ni rab sgrub pa'o/ /gang dag ji snyed gdug pa pa/ /sa yi steng na rgyu ba yi/ /gdon dang sha rjen sha za dang / /ma mo dang ni lus srul po/ /drag pos
219a2(rgyud 'bum): bgegs ni byas pa dag / de dag bzlog pa'i don ched du/ /mtshan mo gtor ma'i las dag la/ /phyag rgya mchog 'di gsungs pa yin/ /sangs rgyas byin rlabs rdzu 'phrul gyis/ /las rnams ma lus byed par 'gyur/ /
219a3(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin de ni rnam gnyis byas/ /rtags ni gnyis su yang dag bstan/ /de bzhin sor mo phreng bar byas/ /phreng ba zhes ni yongs su bsgrags/ /de nyid phreng ba yang dag bsdus/ /kha sbyar 'dra bar yang dag 'byung / /mdzub mo
219a4(rgyud 'bum): gnyis kyi rtse sprad pa/ /gzhu dang 'dra bar bya ba yin/ /mthe bo gnyis ni chang par gnon/ /de ni gzhu yi phyag rgyar mtshon/ /de bzhin sor mo byas nas ni/ /g.yas pa'i mdzub mo nges par brkyang / /g.yon pa'i mdzub
219a5(rgyud 'bum): mo'ang brkyang byas te/ /mthe bo'i tshigs ni chang bas gnan/ /lcags mda'i phyag rgya zhes bstan te/ /mtshan ma mnyam par yang brjod do/ /de bzhin lag gnyis byas nas ni/ /sor mo rnams ni phan tshun bcing / /mdzub
219a6(rgyud 'bum): gnyis bslang bar yang dag sbyar/ /mdung dang 'dra bar byas pa yang / /ma rungs thams cad rjes skrag pa/ /'di ni mdung zhes rab tu gsungs/ /de bzhin lag gnyis byas nas ni/ /gnyi ga'ang khu tshur bcing bya zhing / /
219a7(rgyud 'bum): mthe bo gnyis ni bsgreng byas pa/ /tho ba'i phyag rgyar bstan pa yin/ /kha sbyar tho ba de nyid las/ /cung zad rab tu bskyod pa ni/ /mda' chen mchog tu gsungs pa ste/ /phyag rgya dgra ni 'jig byed pa'o/ /de nas ud
219a8(rgyud 'bum): pa la bcings byas te/ /de bzhin mthe'u chung sor mo gnyis/ /mthe bo'i 'og gi nang dag tu/ /dgod cing mdzub mo bstan par bya/ /'di ni mche ba zhes gsungs te/ /rnam par bye ba zhal zhes brjod/ /sor mo dag ni
219b1(rgyud 'bum): kun nas kyang / /de dag mnyam par byas nas su/ /g.yas pa'i lag pa'i dkyil dag tu/ /g.yon pa'i lag bzhag ba dan brjod/ /lag pa dag ni gnyi ga yang / /kha sbyar dag ni mdzes par gzhag /sor
219b2(rgyud 'bum): dang sor mo dag kyang ni/ /phan tshun rtse mo dag sbyar bya/ /de nas srin lag rtse gnyis dgug /bum pa'i phyag rgyar yang dag bstan/ /de nyid khu tshur sbyar nas ni/ /mdzub mo gnyis ni sngon du bsgreng / /rtse mo dgug
219b3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rnam par bya/ /'khar gsil 'dra bar 'gyur ba yin/ /phyag rgya 'di ni yang dag bstan/ /'khar gsil sgra ni sel bar byed/ /'khar gsil de nyid cung zad tsam/ /legs par rab tu btud pa ni/ /mthe bo gnyis la
219b4(rgyud 'bum): rnam par sbyar/ /de 'dir bya ma bum du brjod/ /mdzub mo dang ni srin lag gnyis/ /bsgreng bar yang ni bya ba ste/ /de dag gi ni rtse bzhi sprad/ /gtun shing 'dra bar yang dag 'gyur/ /sngags shes yang dag ldan pa yis/ /
219b5(rgyud 'bum): gtun shing gi ni phyag rgyar bshad/ /lag gnyis de bzhin sbyar nas ni/ /gung mo srin lag 'og dang ni/ /steng du de dag rnam par dgod/ /g.yas pas g.yon pa bcing bar bya/ /sor mo mdzub mo mthe'u chung dag /
219b6(rgyud 'bum): phan tshun du ni yang dag sbyar/ /khor yug skyil krung 'dra ba yi/ /phyag rgyar de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs/ /'di ni skyil krung phyag rgya zhes/ /'jig rten kun tu grags pa yin/ /phyag rgya 'di dang ldan pa dang / /
219b7(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin sngags dang rab ldan pa/ /rgyal ba kun gyis gsungs pa dang / /rdo rje pad ma'i rigs las byung / /'di dag gi ni sngags ldan 'di/ /zhi ba'i las kun byed pa yin/ /
219b8(rgyud 'bum): gtun shing la sogs mdung gi bar/ /gang yang phyag rgya de bzhin gsungs/ /thams cad khro bo'i rgyal po ni/ /gshin rje gshed 'di'i bstan pa yin/ /mtshon cha drag po 'di dag ni/ /thams cad gdul phyir sprul ba
220a1(rgyud 'bum): yin/ /byang chub sems dpa'i mthu yis ni/ /de tshe bsgrub bya sgrub pa yin/ /gdul bya gdug pa thams cad la/ /bum pa la sogs phyag rgya gsungs/ /lag gnyis de bzhin bkod nas ni/ /pa Ta ha yi rnga 'dra bya/ /sor mo
220a2(rgyud 'bum): rnams ni mnyam par sbyar/ /thams cad kyis kyang rim par bsnol/ /mthe bong yang ni rim par bya/ /de nas lag pa'i nang du gzhug /gung mo mdzub mo gnyis po ni/ /gyen du bsgreng ba dag tu bya/ /'di ni pa Ta ha zhes bya/
220a3(rgyud 'bum): bstan/ /phyag rgya ma rungs zlog byed pa'o/ /lag gnyis de bzhin byas nas ni/ /sor mo rnams ni legs par sbyar/ /gdub kor 'dra bar mdzes pa yi/ /mdzub mo gnyis ni rnam bkug la/ /mthe bo gnyis ni 'og mthar
220a4(rgyud 'bum): bya/ /mthe bo gnyis kyang smad par bya/ /gung mo sbyar la rab gzhug gzhag /dung ni mdzes par 'gyur ba yin/ /'di ni chos kyi dung zhes pa'i/ /lag pa'i phyag rgyar rab tu bstan/ /thub mchog gsungs pa'i sngags ldan na/ /
220a5(rgyud 'bum): las ni thams cad byed pa yin/ /rnam pa sna tshogs las byed pa/ /rtsa ba'i sngags dang rab sbyar na/ /mche ba'i dug can thams cad dang / /sbrul gyi dug rnams thams cad sel/ /rig pa'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul che/ /phyag rgya
220a6(rgyud 'bum): dung ni 'bud bzhin bzlas/ /dug gis brgyal ba'i skye bo ni/ /myur du dug ni med par 'gyur/ /phyag rgya mchog ni rdzu 'phrul che/ /bzhi bcu dag ni yang dag bstan/ /de nas gzhan yang phyag rgya yi/ /mtshan zhing
220a7(rgyud 'bum): yang dag bshad bya ba/ /lag gnyis de bzhin rnam bkod pa/ /sor mo'i rtse mo legs par sbyar/ /g.yon min lag pa'i nang du ni/ /'bad pas lag g.yon gzhug par bya/ /thams cad 'og tu byas pa yi/ /
220a8(rgyud 'bum): lu gu rgyud du bstan pa yin/ /'di ni phyag rgya rab mchog ste/ /gdug pa ma lus 'ching bar byed/ /thub pa mchog gis gsungs pa yi/ /sngags 'di dag dang ldan byas na/ /gza' dang ma mo sdig ldan rnams/ /'byung po ma lus
220b1(rgyud 'bum): 'ching bar 'gyur/ /lag gnyis de bzhin kun bsdus nas/ /bkrol zhing rim par yang dag bsgreng / /gung mo'i tshigs su mthe bo ni/ /'di nyid cho gas gzhag par bya/ /mthe bo gnyis kyi rtse mo yang / /gung mo'i bar
220b2(rgyud 'bum): tshigs yang dag sbyar/ /me la mngon phyogs bstan byas nas/ /me yi sngags dang legs par sbyar/ /me yi las la thams cad du/ /me la spyan ni drang bya ste/ /me yi phyag rgya rab sbyar na/ /myur du me ni spyan drang 'gyur/ /'di nyid
220b3(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya sngags kyis gshegs su gsol/ /mdzub mo'i rtse mo nyid la ni/ /mthe bo'i rtse mo rab sbyar bas/ /me yi lha ni gshegs gsol ba'i/ /phyag rgya 'di ni kun gyis bzhed/ /me yi las ni rab sgrub pa'o/ /zlos pa
220b4(rgyud 'bum): sngags ni gang 'dod pa'i/ /lha rnams dag ni spyan drang 'gyur/ /phyag rgya kun gyi bzhed pa 'di/ /sangs rgyas byin brlab gsungs pa yin/ /sngags mchog dang ni ldan pa yis/ /las rnams rnam pa sna tshogs byed/ /lag gnyis
220b5(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin byas nas ni/ /sor mo tshang bar sbyar nas ni/ /sor mo'i rtse mo'i mthong dbye zhing / /lhod cing zlum par yang dag bya/ /de nas pad ma yongs rdzogs pa/ /kha ni bye bar ma gyur bya/ /'di ni re ba rdzogs byed pa'i/ /phyag rgya
220b6(rgyud 'bum): don kun sgrub byed ces/ /phyag rgya 'di ni rab mchog ste/ /sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs/ /sems can rnams la phan 'dod nas/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis sbyar ba yin/ /sems can yid la 'dod pa
220b7(rgyud 'bum): dag / yid la re ba'i phan 'dod gang / /rdzu 'phrul chen po sngags ldan pas/ /myur du de dag sgrub par byed/ /phyag rgya 'di ni rab mchog ste/ /yid la re ba rdzogs zhes brjod/ /'di ni phyag rgya rab mchog ste/ /
220b8(rgyud 'bum): las kun rab tu sgrub byed pa'o/ /myur du sngags rnams sgrub byed cing / /rgya che nyid kyi rdzas dang bcas/ /thub pa'i zla ba de yis ni/ /zla ba'i 'od la rab tu bstan/ /zla bas pad ma'i rigs dag la/ /des ni phyag rgya
221a1(rgyud 'bum): 'di la sbyar/ /sngags mkhan ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin/ /rnam pa sna tshogs las rnams byed/ /lag gnyis de bzhin bsdu byas nas/ /mdzub mo gnyis ni bsgreng bar bya/ /gung mo'i sor mo'i rtse mo gnyis/ /
221a2(rgyud 'bum): cung zad smad pa rta babs yin/ /de nyid yang dag bsgreng byas na/ /rta babs bzang por gsungs pa yin/ /de nyid phan tshun sbyar byas pa/ /sangs rgyas ru dung sgra ru bstan/ /mthe bo'i gtso bo bsgreng byas pa/ /mkhas
221a3(rgyud 'bum): pas rgyal ba'i sgra ru shes/ /lag gnyis de bzhin yang dag sbyar/ /mdzub mo'i rtse mo yang dag dgug /sor mo thams cad sbyar byas la/ /cung zad yangs par 'byung ba ni/ /de ni sangs rgyas rnga chen mkhyen/ /
221a4(rgyud 'bum): chos kyi rnga ni bsgreng byas pa'o/ /de nas lag gcig thal mo ni/ /g.yas pa g.yon pa'i steng du bsgreng / /'og tu rab tu sbyar ba ni/ /glang po'i rnam par yang dag sbyar/ /g.yas pa'i gung mo'i sor mo ni/ /
221a5(rgyud 'bum): glang po'i sna 'drar rab tu bya/ /'khor ba'i pha rol phyin pa yis/ /phyag rgya de ni glang por bstan/ /phyag rgya 'di ni phyag rgya che/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis rab tu bstan/ /las rnams mtha' dag byed pa ste/ /'jig rten
221a6(rgyud 'bum): kun gyis mchod pa yin/ /lag g.yas brkyang zhing rab bsgreng ba/ /de ni mi 'jigs sbyin par brtags/ /lag pa g.yon pa brkyang byas pa'i/ /mkhrig ma'i tshigs la rab bzhag pa'o/ /gung mo mdzub mo sbyar byas
221a7(rgyud 'bum): la/ /mthe bo gnyis ni bar du gzhug /gung mo gnyis ni bsgreng bar bya/ /'khrul pa med pa'i rgya de yin/ /de nyid sor mo rnam sbyar zhing / /mthe bo steng du gnas byas te/ /tshigs kyi 'og tu rab bzhag pa/ /mjug rings kyi ni rgya zhes
221a8(rgyud 'bum): bstan/ /de nyid mdzub rtse rab bsgreng ba/ /mda' yi phyag rgyar bstan pa yin/ /mdzub rtse gnyis ni yang dag ldan/ /phan tshun rtse mo rnam sprad cing / /de gnyis tshigs su mtheb gnyis sbyar/ /mthe'u chung gnyis ni yang dag brkyang / /
221b1(rgyud 'bum): de nyid dgra star bstan pa ste/ /phyag rgya don kun sgrub byed pa'o/ /thams cad yang dag bsdu ba yang / /phyag rgya kun gyis mchod pa yin/ /de bzhin du ni rab bsgreng ba/ /mdzub gnyis rtse mo sbyar byas pa/ /de ni mtshon cha rtse gcig
221b2(rgyud 'bum): rgya/ /de bzhin 'khor lo mda' chen gshol/ /mdzub mo 'khor lo bzhin bya dang / /phyag rgya dam pa gshol yang bya/ /phyag rgya drug cu 'di dag ni/ /cho ga dang bcas gsungs pa'ang yin/ /'di dag ma lus mtshon cha'i rgya/ /sngags
221b3(rgyud 'bum): dang yang dag ldan par gsungs/ /dman pa kun gyis byas pa'i skyon/ /gza' dang grul bum ma mo dang / /srin mo kun gyi gtso bo rnams/ /byis pa'i sems can 'jigs byed pa/ /phyag rgya'i mtshon cha las byung
221b4(rgyud 'bum): bas/ /de dag thams cad des 'jig 'gyur/ /phyag rgya drug cu 'di dag gi/ /mtshan nyid nye bar bstan pa yin/ /de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /phyag rgya'i cho ga yang dag 'byung / /lag gnyis de
221b5(rgyud 'bum): bzhin rnam bkod pa/ /pad ma 'dra bar yang dag bsgreng / /sor mo thams cad kyis bsgrubs pa/ /phyag rgya pad ma zhes bya'o/ /phyag rgya 'di ni mchog ces bya/ /pad ma'i rigs la yang dag sbyar/ /pad ma'i rigs ni ji snyed pa/ /
221b6(rgyud 'bum): sngags dang ldan pas dge bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas byin rlabs las byung ba/ /myur du las rnams byed par brjod/ /ji snyed pad ma'i rigs gsungs pa/ /sngags rnams ma lus sgrub par byed/ /pad ma rnams kyi phyag rgya 'di/ /
221b7(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya'i pad ma zhes su brjod/ /lag gnyis yang dag sbyar nas ni/ /mdzub mo gnyis ni yang dag bsgreng / /gung mo'i sor mo sbyar byas nas/ /rdo rje rtse gsum yang dag 'byung / /gung mo'i sor mo'i tshigs dbus
221b8(rgyud 'bum): su/ /mthe bo gnyis kyi rtse mo sbyar/ /de nyid rdo rje zhes gsungs te/ /phyag rgya dam pa tha ma yin/ /ji snyed rdo rje'i rigs kyi sngags/ /de dag phyag rgya 'di sgrub 'gyur/ /cho ga ldan par rab zhugs na/ /myur ba nyid du 'grub par
222a1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ /sgrub pa las dang yang dag ldan/ /bsgrub bya rtag tu sgrub pa na/ /grub mchog tha ma bar ma ni/ /de la rtag tu 'grub par 'gyur/ /'jig rten sngags rnams ma lus pa'ang / /the tshom med par 'grub par 'gyur/ /
222a2(rgyud 'bum): lag gnyis yang dag sbyar byas nas/ /gung mo gnyis ni yang dag bsgreng / /srin lag mthe bo dag kyang dgug /mthe'u chung gnyis ni sbyar byas la/ /mdzub gnyis rtse mo sprad nas ni/ /mdzub mo'i dbus tshigs gnyis
222a3(rgyud 'bum): dgug bya/ /gung mo gnyis kyi rtse mo sbyar/ /'khor lo 'dra bar yang dag 'byung / /'di ni chos kyi 'khor lo ste/ /'dir ni phyag rgya'i rgyal por bstan/ /de tshe chos rgyal gyis gsungs te/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /
222a4(rgyud 'bum): thub pa'i zla ba bdun pa yis/ /de tshe zhi ba'i 'khor lor gsungs/ /phyag rgya'i rgyal po rab sbyar nas/ /dus gsum rgyun mi chad bzlas na/ /'jig rten pa yi sngags kun dang / /khyab 'jug dbang ldan gyis bshad pa/ /
222a5(rgyud 'bum): zlos pa phyag rgyar yang dag ldan/ /mthong ba tsam gyis de dag gcod/ /'di ni phyag rgya rab mchog ste/ /chos kyi dbyings las rnam par byung / /sems can rnams ni ci 'dod pa/ /thams cad las ni byed par 'gyur/ /chos
222a6(rgyud 'bum): kyi rgyal pos zhi don du/ /phyag rgya 'di ni yang dag bstan/ /cho ga'i rgyal pa'i mchog 'di ni/ /las rnams ma lus rab tu sgrub/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis bstan pa la/ /chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya 'di'o/ /ma zhi ba
222a7(rgyud 'bum): yi phyag rgya kun/ /zhi ba'i las la rab tu sbyar/ /sngags pas rtag tu mgo bor ni/ /'khor lo'i phyag rgya brtag par bya/ /lag gnyis de bzhin byas nas ni/ /kha sbyar 'dra bar bya ba yin/ /sor mo lhod cing
222a8(rgyud 'bum): yangs par bya/ /lag gnyis sor mo'i rtse dgug pa/ /'di ni pad ma dkar po yi/ /phyag rgya sems can don sgrub shes/ /de las lag pa gcig btang nas/ /khu tshur phye zhing sor mo bsrings/ /lag pa brkyang ba lta bu ni/ /mchog
222b1(rgyud 'bum): sbyin gyi ni phyag rgyar brjod/ /lag gnyis kyang ni de bzhin byas/ /kun nas sor mo rnams kyis ni/ /phreng ba bzhin du gshib byas pa/ /rgyal ba'i phyag rgyar 'di brjod do/ /de bzhin lag gnyis sbyar nas ni/ /gung mo mdzub
222b2(rgyud 'bum): mo gnyis dag ni/ /khab kyi rnam par bya ba yin/ /de las gzhan pa'i sor mo ni/ /cung zad dgug par bya ba yin/ /de nas mdzub mo gnyis dag ni/ /gnas pa'i rnam par legs dgod bya/ /de yang yang dag sbyar byas
222b3(rgyud 'bum): te/ /srin lag gi ni tshigs su brten/ /'jig rten mang po'i 'dren pas ni/ /rus sbal phyag rgyar 'di bstan to/ /de bzhin lag gnyis rnam par dgod/ /sor mo dag ni kun nas kyang / /gnyi ga khu tshur mnyam byas
222b4(rgyud 'bum): nas/ /mdzub mo gnyis ni sbyar bya ba/ /mkhas pas phyag rgya de nyid ni/ /rdo rje dbyug par yang dag brjod/ /lag gnyis de bzhin yang dag par/ /kha sbyar 'dra bar byas nas ni/ /phan tshun sbyar ba la brten nas/ /sor mo
222b5(rgyud 'bum): thal mor rnam par dgod/ /mthe bong gnyis ni nang gzhug pa/ /dgra 'jig phyag rgyar brjod pa yin/ /de nas lag gnyis mnyam byas te/ /de nas thal mor byas nas ni/ /kun nas gzhol bar rab tu bya/ /
222b6(rgyud 'bum): gru yi bzhon par rab tu 'byung / /'jig rten gsum gyi skyob pa yis/ /gru yi phyag rgyar 'di rab bstan/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho chen po las/ /'byung po rnams ni yang dag sgrol/ /sor mo de nyid bsgreng nas ni/ /de tshe lag
222b7(rgyud 'bum): gnyis sna tshogs bya/ /phyag rgya gzhal med khang zhes bya/ /sems can steng du rjes su 'dzud/ /de bzhin lag gnyis yang dag bsdus/ /shing rta zhes ni de la brjod/ /theg gsum 'gro ba'i gtso bo ste/ /skyob pa rnams kyis shing
222b8(rgyud 'bum): rtar gsung / /zlos pa sngags ni 'dod pa la/ /'byung po kun ni 'dren par byed/ /theg pa mchog la brten nas ni/ /sangs rgyas go 'phang 'thob par byed/ /de nyid lag gnyis rab bsgred nas/ /gnyi ga yang ni kha sbyar bya/ /lag mthil
223a1(rgyud 'bum): gnyis ni mnyam byas brkyang / /lan kan 'dra bar yang dag 'byung / /'di ni phyag rgya rab mchog ste/ /'jig rten mgon gyis legs mchod pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gnas rnams su/ /thub pa'i zla bas yang dag gsungs/ /
223a2(rgyud 'bum): gang du 'das pa'i sangs rgyas dang / /ma 'ongs da ltar bzhugs pa dang / /mya ngan 'das pa'i dbyings la bzhugs/ /gang du gnas mal la bzhugs pa/ /phyag rgya gnas mal zhes bya bar/ /'jig rten 'dren pas de 'dir mkhyen/ /lag
223a3(rgyud 'bum): gnyis de bzhin byas nas ni/ /sor mo rnams ni yang dag sbyar/ /kha sbyar du ni rnam par dgod/ /g.yas pa'i mdzub mo gcig gis ni/ /g.yon pa'i rtse mor gtug bya ba/ /de ni zla ba phyed du brjod/ /lag gnyis de bzhin
223a4(rgyud 'bum): byas nas ni/ /g.yas pa'i sor mos khu tshur bya/ /lag pa g.yon la yod pa yi/ /sor mo kun ni mnyam bsgreng ste/ /sor mo'i rtse mos khu tshur bcing / /g.yas dang g.yon pa ldan pa yi/ /sor mo rnams ni sbyar byas nas/ /
223a5(rgyud 'bum): mthe'u chung gnyis ni brkyang byas pa/ /pi bang phyag rgyar nye bar bstan/ /lag gnyis de bzhin byas nas ni/ /sor mo cung zad kha bye yang / /mthe bo gnyis kyi bar du ni/ /mdzub mo gnyis ni brten par bya/ /'di ni pad mtsho'i
223a6(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya ste/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis 'gro la gsungs/ /rtag tu mthe bo gnyis brkyang ba/ /ut+pa la yi phyag rgya zhes/ /rkang gnyis dam pa sangs rgyas kyis/ /'jig rten du ni gsungs pa yin/ /de nyid thal
223a7(rgyud 'bum): mo sbyar byas pa/ /'gro ba phyag 'tshal 'dra ba ste/ /bla ma phyag 'tshal rgya 'di zhes/ /'jig rten kun tu rnam par grags/ /rgya de nyid ni bsdam byas na/ /lag gnyis zung du yang dag 'byung / /rgya 'di lag pa
223a8(rgyud 'bum): gnyis gzung zhes/ /'jig rten gsum du rnam par grags/ /cung zad mthe bo rtsar bzhag ste/ /mtheb rtsar phan tshun legs gnon pa/ /de ni kha sbyar rgya ru 'gyur/ /mya ngan 'khrug pa rnam par 'jig /gang
223b1(rgyud 'bum): dag mtshon cha las byung rnams/ /phyag rgya 'di dag gsungs pa yin/ /me tog gdan dang bzhon pa dang / /gzhan yang gdon ni 'jigs byed pa/ /thams cad las kun byed ldan pa/ /skyob pa'i sngags kun thams cad yin/ /
223b2(rgyud 'bum): tshes grangs dang ni rgyu skar dang / /smyung ba dag kyang mi bya ste/ /phyag rgya sngags su rab ldan na/ /las rnams myur du grub par byed/ /zlos pa dka' thub ldan pa dang / /sngags zlos pa la mkhas pa dang / /phyag rgyar
223b3(rgyud 'bum): sngags su rab bstan na/ /bsgrub bya min pa'ang cung zad med/ /lag pa gnyis po bya ba ni/ /phan tshun thal mo yang dag sbyar/ /mthe'u chung srin lag mthe bo yi/ /tshigs ni bar ma sbyar bar bya/ /gung mo sbyar ba'i tshig
223b4(rgyud 'bum): gsum par/ /mdzub mo bkug ste sbyar bar bya/ /rigs gsum gyi ni spyi la yang / /mchod yon gyi ni phyag rgyar bstan/ /sor mo zung ni gsum po dag /de bzhin phan tshun yang dag sbyar/ /mdzub mo'i rtse gnyis yang
223b5(rgyud 'bum): dag sprad/ /mthe bo gnyis kyi 'gram du bskum/ /thal mo 'dra bar yang dag ldan/ /me tog phyag rgyar bstan pa yin/ /lag pa'i thal mo bkan byas nas/ /mthe'u chung sbyar byas rgyab tu ni/ /srin lag yang dag
223b6(rgyud 'bum): sbyar bar bya/ /de yi rgyab tu gung mo sbyar/ /mdzub mo gnyis ni sbyar bar bya/ /sa la thal sbyar bya ba yin/ /mthe bo gnyis ni 'gram bzhag pa/ /chos kyi phyag rgyar bstan pa yin/ /thal mo gzhan gyi sbyor ba yi/ /
223b7(rgyud 'bum): mdzub gnyis cung zad bkug pa ni/ /gtor ma spyi yi phyag rgya ru/ /'jig rten skyob pas de gsungs so/ /ji ltar cho ga bzhin du ni/ /nang du me tog gzhug byas na/ /gtor ma kun gyi las la ni/ /gsang
223b8(rgyud 'bum): sngags kun la byin par 'gyur/ /g.yas pa mi 'jigs sbyin pa'i lag /g.yon pa'ang de bzhin bya ba yin/ /mkhrig mar sbyor ba'i bya ba yis/ /g.yas g.yon dag ni bsnol bar bya/ /'di ni sngags rnam+sa ma
224a1(rgyud 'bum): lus pa'i/ /dri yi phyag rgyar brjod pa yin/ /lag g.yas khu tshur bcings nas ni/ /mthe bo dang ni gung mo gnyis/ /de nas rab tu sbyar bar bya/ /mar me'i phyag rgyar brjod pa yin/ /srin lag dang ni mthe bo
224a2(rgyud 'bum): nyid/ /bgrang phreng dag tu yang dag gnas/ /rtag tu mthe'u chung rnam par brkyang / /de 'og gung mo'ang brkyang bar bya/ /mdzub mo bskums te bzhag pa la/ /bgrang phreng gi ni phyag rgyar brjod/ /de nas thal sbyar nang
224a3(rgyud 'bum): du ni/ /sngags rig pas ni phreng ba gzhug /ci 'dod sngags ni bzla byas na/ /myur du grub pa'i mchog rab ster/ /cho ga 'di ni rtag mthong na/ /sngags rnams kun ni spyod par byed/ /me la lag pa g.yas pa ni/ /mi
224a4(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs sbyin pa'i phyag rgyar bya/ /me la mngon du bltas bzhag nas/ /mdzub mo rtag tu dgug par bya/ /mthe bo lag pa'i dbus su ni/ /bkug nas yang dag rab tu dgod/ /me ni yongs su spyan drang ba'i/ /phyag rgyar 'di ni
224a5(rgyud 'bum): bstan pa yin/ /mdzub mo yi ni rtse mo dang / /mthe bo gcig tu sbyar bya ba/ /me dang las rnams kun la ni/ /gshegs su gsol bar rab tu snang / /sngags rnams kun la mkhas pa yis/ /sbyin sreg las la bya ba
224a6(rgyud 'bum): yin/ /rgya 'di dag dang ldan pa yis/ /sngags ni me la legs par sbyar/ /phyag 'tshal thal mo byas pa las/ /sor mo kun nas nang du gzhug /de nyid rnam par bzlog byas nas/ /mthe bo gnyis kyang gshib
224a7(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ /mdzub mo phyi rol yang dag bkug /gung mo dag la yang dag brten/ /phyag rgya 'di ni mchog tu gsungs/ /mchod pa'i las la sbyar bar bya/ /sngags rnams kun la phyag 'tshal dang / /sngags
224a8(rgyud 'bum): kyi mgon po rgyal sras sbyar/ /sngags rnams kun la sbyang ba dang / /gdan dag la yang rab tu sbyar/ /me tog med par gyur na yang / /phyag rgya bcings la mchod par bya/ /cho ga 'di yis mchod na ni/ /sngags rnams
