224b1(rgyud 'bum): don kun sgrub par byed/ /mchod yon phyag rgya byas pas ni/ /mchod pa bzang po byas par 'gyur/ /gnyis pa sems kyi mchod pa ste/ /me tog ci 'dra yod pas so/ /rdzogs sangs rkang gnyis dam pa yis/ /mchod
224b2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i cho ga 'di gsungs so/ /me tog med par gyur na yang / /mchod pa rnam pa gnyis su brjod/ /sngags rnams rab tu 'grub bya'i phyir/ /las rnams kun la sbyar bar bya/ /sngags kun byed pa'i phyag rgya ni/ /
224b3(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa'ang yin/ /gnas dang mal dang bzhon pa dang / /khrus dang btung dang bza' ba dang / /mar me spos dang sngags khrus dang / /dkyil 'khor dag ni byed pa la/ /sngags rnams kun gyi dam tshig dang / /
224b4(rgyud 'bum): sngags pa rnams kyis byin rlabs byed/ /'jig rten mgon gyis gsungs pa yi/ /phyag rgya 'di ni las kun byed/ /phyag rgya rnams kyi nges byung ba/ /yongs rdzogs brgyar ni gsungs pa yin/ /de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /
224b5(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya dag ni brgyad po ste/ /lag gnyis de bzhin sbyar nas ni/ /gnyi ga kun nas mnyam byas la/ /de dag nyid las mdzub mo dang / /gung mo gnyis ni sbyar bar bya/ /mthe bo gnyis kyi sen mo ni/ /gsum pa'i
224b6(rgyud 'bum): tshigs char sbyar bar bya/ /cung zad nang du bkug nas ni/ /rab tu sbyar ba dag tu bya/ /bdag nyid chen po 'khor lo can/ /sngags kyi bdag po'i phyag rgya yin/ /'di nyid las ni mdzub mo dgug /gung mo dag ni
224b7(rgyud 'bum): mnyam par sbyar/ /srin lag gnyis kyi sen mo ni/ /sbyar ba'i rnam par dgod par bya/ /'di ni gtsug tor phyag rgyar ni/ /rgyal ba'i dbang pos gsungs pa yin/ /lag gnyis de bzhin bkod nas ni/ /gung mo'i
224b8(rgyud 'bum): sor mo bcings byas pa/ /mthe'u chung sor dang yang dag ldan/ /gdugs dkar po las rgya 'di byung / /gung mo mnyam par byas nas ni/ /sor mo gnyis ni yang dag sbyar/ /gdub kor zlum po 'dra ba ni/ /phyag rgya chen
225a1(rgyud 'bum): por de la brjod/ / de nyid las ni mdzub mo yi/ /tshigs ni skam kha lta bur bya/ /de nas gung mo sbyar te dgod/ /lag pa'i 'og gi char sbyar nas/ /de las gsum pa'i tshigs dag tu/ /mthe bo'i sor mos gnon par
225a2(rgyud 'bum): bya/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs ni blo ldan gyi/ /'di ni phyag rgya mchog tu gsungs/ /lag gnyis de bzhin bkod nas ni/ /cho ga mthong la yang dag gnas/ /sor mo de nyid kun gyis ni/ /kun nas gang ba'i mdzod ltar gnas/ /
225a3(rgyud 'bum): lag pa gnyis ni rnam bskyed nas/ /lag sor brgyad ni rab tu brkyang / /skyes bu brgyad po de nyid shes/ /zung bzhi dag tu gyur pa ni/ /rdzogs sangs rkang gnyis dam pa yis/ /de nyid dge 'dun zhes kyang gsungs/ /de nyid 'phags
225a4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i dge 'dun rgyar/ /srid pa'i gnas 'dir gsungs pa yin/ /phyag rgya 'di ni rab mchog ste/ /phyag rgya ma lus rab tu sgrub/ /lag gnyis de bzhin kha sbyar te/ /thal mo sbyar ba'i rnam par gnas/ /mdzub
225a5(rgyud 'bum): mo gcig ni rab brkyang ba/ /lag pa g.yas pa yang dag brkyang / /de 'di 'byung po zhi byed par/ /de nyid gzigs pa rnams kyis bstan/ /phyag rgya 'di ni mchog ces bya/ /las rnams kun gyi don sgrub byed/ /lag gnyis
225a6(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin sbyar nas ni/ /sor rtse rim bzhin mtshan pa yi/ /bsdus nas kha sbyar dag tu bya/ /mthe bo gnyis ni bsgreng nas bskum/ /de 'di pad ma'i phreng ba zhes/ /dang po'i sangs rgyas dag gis gsungs/ /
225a7(rgyud 'bum): lag pa dag ni de gnyis kyis/ /sor mo kun nas bkan la brkyang / /sor mo gsum gnyis bsgreng nas ni/ /me tog kha bye'i rnam par bya/ /gnyis pa'i tshigs la bzhag pa ni/ /mthe bo dang ni mdzub mo gnyis/ /
225a8(rgyud 'bum): de 'dir srid pa gsum gnas kyi/ /phyag rgyar rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis gsungs/ /phyag rgya 'di ni phyag rgya che/ /las kun byed kyi phyag rgya brgyad/ /mthu mnyam brtson 'grus chen por ni/ /
225b1(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis yang dag gsungs/ /muSh+Ti gtams phrag bye ba ni/ /stong phrag brgyad cu yang dag 'byung / /thub mchog grangs med 'das pa yis/ /phyag rgya 'di dag rab tu gsungs/ /phyag rgya cho ga yang dag
225b2(rgyud 'bum): 'byung / /rtsa brgyad brgya ni rab tu gsungs/ /'di dag kun gyi sngags kun dang / /las rnams dag kyang grub pa yin/ /sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul che kun gyi/ /phyag rgya 'di ni bzhed cing gsungs/ /cho ga 'di dag sbyar ba
225b3(rgyud 'bum): yis/ /don rnams myur du sgrub par byed/ /shAkya seng ge mi yi mchog /thub pa mchog gis de gsungs nas/ /byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs la de bzhin gsungs/ /'jam dpal
225b4(rgyud 'bum): gyi ni cho ga 'di/ /phyag rgya dag ni yang dag byung / /sa steng bstan pa bsrung don du/ /phyag rgya 'di ni rab tu gtad/ /dus mtha' nye bar 'od 'gyur zhing / /dus mthar mya ngan 'das pa na/ /nga yi bstan pa bsrung don du/ /
225b5(rgyud 'bum): nga yis 'di dag thams cad bshad/ /sngags rnams dag ni rgya cher bcas/ /phyag rgya rnams kyi mtshan nyid bshad/ /'jig rten kun la gsang ba dang / /shin tu gsang ba'ang brjod pa yin/ /mdo 'dir cho ga lhag pa ste/ /yon
225b6(rgyud 'bum): tan rgya chen gsal bar byas/ /sngags rnams du ma'i tshig dang ni/ /yon tan brjod pa yang dag 'byung / /phyag rgya rnam pa mang por ldan/ /rigs pa'i rgyud ni rab tu bstan/ /mthu dang yon tan grub mtha' dang / /zlos pa'i
225b7(rgyud 'bum): rgyu ni yang dag 'byung / /'gro ba'i skye gnas sems can gyi/ /dge ba'i 'bras bu 'byung ba'ang gsungs/ /gzhon nu khyod kyi sngags rnams kyi/ /grub pa'i gtan tshigs rab tu sbyar/ /de skad gsungs nas 'jam
225b8(rgyud 'bum): dpal ni/ /gzhon nu nam mkhar gnas pa yis/ /'jig rten mgon po 'od byed pa/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas la mgos phyag 'tshal/ /dbugs ring phyung nas snying rjes brlan/ /mchi ma de nas phyis nas kyang / /
226a1(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas zhabs drung gnas nas kyang / /de la myur du zhus pa ni/ /bcom ldan 'jig rten 'das pa na/ /sngags kyi mdzod 'di sa steng du/ /bdag nyid chen po'i sems can la/ /de tshe ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de skad
226a2(rgyud 'bum): gsungs nas sangs rgyas kyis/ /de tshe 'jam pa'i dbyangs la gsungs/ /gzhon nu khyod kyis yongs zhus pa/ /bu khyod 'jam dpal rab tu nyon/ /nga ni 'jig rten mya ngan 'das/ /sa steng stongs par gyur pa dang / /chos kyi
226a3(rgyud 'bum): mdzod kyang 'jig pa dang / /nyan thos rnams kyang 'das pa na/ /rkang gnyis dam pa ston pa yi/ /gzugs brnyan mchod rten dag kyang bya/ /spos dang dri dang byug pa yis/ /mchod dang bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs
226a4(rgyud 'bum): gos mchog dang / /gzhan yang nor bu'i gdub kor rgyan/ /rnam pa sna tshogs bza' dang bca'/ /yang dag sbyar ba dbul bar bya/ /rnam pa sna tshogs phun sum tshogs/ /ci 'dod kha zas byas pa la/ /de bzhin sngags ni
226a5(rgyud 'bum): bzlas byas dbul/ /sems can dge ba'i skyes gnas 'gyur/ /dam pa'i 'gro ba'i skye gnas su/ /grong mchog dag tu skye bar 'gyur/ /mthar ni byang chub gzhol 'gyur zhing / /phyi nas zhi bar de dag 'gro/ /de skad
226a6(rgyud 'bum): gsungs nas 'jam dpal ni/ /sangs rgyas kyis ni gsungs la dga'/ /byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che/ /blo ldan de nas cang mi smra/ /chos kyi 'khor lo skor byed pa'i/ /sangs rgyas 'dus par sangs rgyas kyi/ /
226a7(rgyud 'bum): gtsang ba'i gnas kyi steng gnas nas/ /'di dag sangs rgyas snga mas gsungs/ /de tshe chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/ /yun ring dus su 'das pa yin/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod
226a8(rgyud 'bum): phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/ phyag rgya'i cho ga'i le'u rab 'byam las/ nyi shu rtsa dgu pa rdzogs s+ho// // de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas gzhan yang gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal
226b1(rgyud 'bum): med khang la gzigs nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal mchog tu rab tu gsang ba khyod kyi phyag rgya dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid 'khor dang bcas pa yod de/ las thams cad
226b2(rgyud 'bum): la nye bar sbyar ba phun sum tshogs pa thams cad sbyin par byed pa/ 'bras bu dang bcas pa/ sngags thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba/ las thams cad sgrub pa/ mdor na 'jam dpal nyon cig /dang por re zhig thal
226b3(rgyud 'bum): mo rab tu brkyang la mdzub mo dang mthe'u chung gnyis rtse sprad de tshigs bar ma btud nas so so so sor rjes su bcug pa yin te/ /de la 'di ni 'jam dpal khyod kyi rtsa ba'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba las thams cad byed par 'gyur
226b4(rgyud 'bum): ba'o/ /lag pa gnyis de bzhin du byas la srin lag gnyis sbyar la de bzhin du gung mo dang mdzub mo yang bya zhing mthe'u chung gnyis kyi ri mo gong ma la mthe bo'i rtse mo bzhag pa ste/ 'jam dpal 'di ni khyod kyi gdong gi
226b5(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya zhes bya ba ste gnyis pa'o/ /phan tshun du sor mo bsnol ba khu tshur du byas la gung mo'i sor mo gnyis rnam par bkrol la rtse mo sbyar te/ de'i 'gram gnyis su mdzub mo gnyis dkri zhing mthar gzhag par bya'o/ /de la 'di
226b6(rgyud 'bum): ni 'jam dpal khyod kyi mche ba'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba gzhan yin no/ /mche ba'i phyag rgya'i 'gram du mthe bo gnyis bzhag pa'i phyag rgya 'di ni mngon sum du 'jam dpal gzhon nu khyod nyid yin no/ /gnas
226b7(rgyud 'bum): de dang lag pa'i kha sbyar der nye bar bzhugs shing dam tshig gis byin gyis rlob par byed do/ /lag pa'i sor mo phan tshun khu tshur du byas la mdzub mo gnyis bkrol te/ mthe bo gnyis gung mo'i nang du chung bar
226b8(rgyud 'bum): byas pa 'di ni 'jam dpal khyod kyi gtsug pud kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba ste/ gzhan yin no/ /thal mo'i tshigs rnams brkyang ba byas la srin lag dang / mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo gung mo'i nang du rtse sprad de bzhag pa 'di ni
227a1(rgyud 'bum): 'jam dpal mngon sum khyod nyid kyi rtsa ba'i sngags su bstan pa yin no/ /'di nyid kyi phyag rgya la mdzub mo gnyis brkyang bar byas pa ste/ de la 'di ni 'jam dpal khyod kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ro/ /mthe'u chung dang
227a2(rgyud 'bum): srin lag gnyis bsnol ba byas nas lag pa kha sbyar gyi nang du bzhag la gung mo'i phyi rol tu mdzub mo'i rtse mo yongs su bkug la/ mthe bo gnyis kyi rtse mo yang dag par bcar ba'o/ /gzhan 'di yang 'jam
227a3(rgyud 'bum): dpal khyod kyi zhal gyi phyag rgya yin no/ /las thams cad pa yang yin te 'di nyid kyi rim gyis sor mo re re bkrol ba mthe bo dang bcas pa byas na ma rungs pa'i gdon thams cad rab tu 'byer bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du
227a4(rgyud 'bum): rna ba dang mgrin pa dang lag ngar dang snying dang lag pa dang lkog ma dang rked pa dang lte ba dang brla dang byin pa dang rkang pa dang mig dang kha dang lce rnams te/ de ltar sor mo bcu rnams mthar gyis brkyang na/ rim bzhin du phyag rgya'i
227a5(rgyud 'bum): mtshan nyid du 'gyur te/ mthar gyis kyang las byed do/ /zhal gyi phyag rgyas ni kha 'ching bar byed do/ /mche ba'i phyag rgyas ni gdon ma rungs pa las grol lo/ /lce'i phyag rgyas ni tshig ngan pa zlog par byed do/ /snying gi phyag
227a6(rgyud 'bum): rgyas ni mi'i bdag po'i khro ba sel bar byed pa'am/ sems can gzhan lha dang lha ma yin dang mi dang mi ma yin pa dang 'gro ba rnam pa sna tshogs la brten pa'i khros pa rnams kyi khro ba 'jig par 'gyur te/ de bzhin du mthar
227a7(rgyud 'bum): gyis thams cad du las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar rim pa 'dis phyag rgya grangs med par 'gyur te/ /las grangs med pa dag kyang byed par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal khyod kyis rnam pa thams cad du phyag rgya thams
227a8(rgyud 'bum): cad kho na las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /dpa' bo chen po de bzhin gshegs pa grangs las 'das pa dag gis phyag rgya 'di dag bcings so/ /phyag rgya chen po dpa' bo chen po sa chen po la gnas pas kyang bcings so/ /
227b1(rgyud 'bum): gang du gtams pa phrag bye ba sum bcu rtsa gsum mam brgyad cu'am dgu bcu rtsa lnga'am khri phrag drug cu'i grangs la sogs pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i yang 'das pas phyag rgya bcings so/ /'jig rten bya ba gang gzhan
227b2(rgyud 'bum): ni/ /kun kyang phyag rgya rnams su 'dus/ /'di dag gang yang rung ba yi/ /phyag rgyas don kun sgrub byed pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa'i dus dag tu/ /lag pa gnyis kyis bcing bar bya/ /sngon du bsnyen pa la brtson pas/ /sbyin
227b3(rgyud 'bum): sreg bzlas pa dag la'ang bya/ /'dug pa'am 'greng ba dag gis kyang / /zlos pas ci 'dod bar du bzla/ /srung ba chen po'i cho gas kyang / /myur du grub pa thob par 'gyur/ /dus kun phyag rgya kun gyis ni/ /las rnams kun ni
227b4(rgyud 'bum): bya ba yin/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/ phyag rgya'i cho ga'i le'u rab 'byam gnyis pa las/ sum bcu pa rdzogs s+ho// //
227b5(rgyud 'bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas gzhan yang gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la gzig+sa nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyi rtsa ba'i cho ga la phyag
227b6(rgyud 'bum): rgya mchog tu shin tu gsang ba gzhan yang yod de/ phyag rgya dang rgyud thams cad kyi cho ga sngags thams cad kyi mngon par 'dod pa/ sngags thams cad dang lhan cig yang dag par sbyar na/ las thams
227b7(rgyud 'bum): cad rab tu sgrub par byed pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam rnam par sbyor bar byed pa/ sems can thams cad kyi lam du gyur pa yin no/ /mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo dang gung mo gnyis kyi
227b8(rgyud 'bum): rtse mo dag yongs su sbyar ba ni gtsug tor 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya yin te/ 'dir sngags ni/ oM dz+wA la dz+wA la dIp+tod ga toSh+NI Sha dU ra dU ra hU~M ha~M/ srin lag de nyid bkug pa dang gung mo sbyar ba de
228a1(rgyud 'bum): gnyis kyi sor mo'i rtse mo'i sen mo gshibs la/ rna cha gdub kor zlum po ltar bya ba ni gtsug tor gdugs dkar po'i phyag rgya yin te/ 'dir yang sngags su 'gyur ba ni/ ma ma ma ma hU~M ni/
228a2(rgyud 'bum): mdzub mo de nyid phan tshun mnyam par sbyar la gung mo gnyis sbyar ba ni gzi brjid phung po'i phyag rgya'o/ /'dir sngags ni/ ta thA ga toSh+NI ShA ba lo ki te/ mUr+t+ti te dzo rA shi hU~M dz+wA la dz+wA la/ d+ha ka d+ha ka /da ra bi da ra/ ts+tshin+da
228a3(rgyud 'bum): ts+tshin+da/ hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ mdzub mo de nyid yang dag par sbyar ba dkyil 'khor lta bur bya ba ni rgyal ba'i gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya'o/ /'dir sngags su 'gyur ba ni/ dza ya dza yo Sh+NI Sha dz+wA la dz+wA la ban+d+ha ban+d+ha da ma da ma/ hU~M hU~M hU~M ho
228a4(rgyud 'bum): ha na hU~M/ rgyal ba'i gtsug tor gyi sngags so/ /mdzub mo de gnyis kyi rtse mo btud pa byas pa gung mo sbyar ba la/ mdzub mo'i sen mo gung mo'i tshigs gsum pa'i char sbyar ba ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /na mo a pra
228a5(rgyud 'bum): ti ha ta ta thA ga toSh+NI ShA ya/ a na ba lo ki te mUr+d+ha na tsakra brti hU~M dz+wA la dz+wA la/ d+ha ka d+ha ka /d+hu na d+hu na/ bi d+hu na trA sa ya mA ra yo ta sA d+ha ya/ ha na ha na/ AM AM A/ ka ka /dro khi Ni dro khi Ni/ kuN+Da li ni/ a pa rA dzi tA
228a6(rgyud 'bum): tra pa ri Ni hU~M phaT/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i sngags so/ /mdzub mo de nyid kyi rtse mo mdud pa byas la/ gung mo sbyar ba byas pa la mdzub mo sen mo'i 'og gi gsum pa'i cha la sbyar ba ni sngags kyi bdag po
228a7(rgyud 'bum): 'khor los sgyur ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /mdzub mo de nyid kyi rtse mo yang dag par bkug pa gung mor sbyar ba'i 'og tu yang dag par bcar ba ni sngags kyi bdag po'i phyag rgya'o/ /mdzub mo de nyid kyi rtse mo yang dag
228a8(rgyud 'bum): par bkug la gung mo sbyar ba'i sen mo dang tshigs nang du yang dag par sbyar ba ni 'khor los sgyur ba chen po'i phyag rgya'o/ /mdzub mo de nyid kyi rtse mo gnyis yang dag par bkug la gung mo sbyar zhing 'og tu yang
228b1(rgyud 'bum): dag par sbyar te/ gdub kor ltar byas pa ni 'khor los sgyur ba chen po'i phyag rgya'o/ /mdzub mo de nyid kyi rtse mo yang dag par bkug la gung mo'i tshigs gsum pa'i nang du yang dag par sbyar ba ni sngags
228b2(rgyud 'bum): kyi bdag po 'khor los sgyur ba chen po'i phyag rgya ste/ srid pa'i las thams cad rnam par 'jig par byed pa/ sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho ba tshe dang nad med pa dang dbang phyug dang bsam
228b3(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ sems can thams cad yongs su dga' bar byed pa/ sems can thams cad kyi yid la mngon
228b4(rgyud 'bum): par 'dod pa 'bras bu dang bcas par byed pa/ las thams cad byed pa/ sngags thams cad rab tu sgrub par byed pa/ phyag rgya dang sngags thams cad dang ldan pa yin te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa
228b5(rgyud 'bum): khyod de nyon cig / dang po re zhig gtsug tor gyi mtshan nyid du gyur pa ni/ lag pa gnyis mnyam por bkan cing brkyang bar bya'o/ /mthe bo dang srin lag gnyis lag pa'i dkyil du sen mos bzung zhing mthe bo'i rtse mo sbyar bar bya'o/ /
228b6(rgyud 'bum): mthe'u chung gnyis kyi rtse mo gtug cing sbyar bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du gung mo gnyis kyi sen mo dang rtse mo gnyis sbyar bar bya zhing mdzub mo dang mdzub mo yang sbyar bar bya'o/ /kun tu snang ba'i gtsug tor gyi mtshan
228b7(rgyud 'bum): nyid chen po zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya yin te/ 'dir sngags ni/ aM mu ha~M/ mdzub mo de nyid yang dag par bkug ste/ sen mo dang sen mo'i rtse mo'i dkyil 'khor ltar sbyar bas ni/ lta ba ngan pa'i zug rngu'i phyin ci
228b8(rgyud 'bum): log sel ba zhes bya ba chos kyi 'khor lo chen po'i phyag rgya'o/ /'dir sngags su 'gyur ba ni/ oM badzrA sha ni hU~M phaT/ 'di ni skyil krung gi phyag rgya ste/ sngags dang yang dag par
229a1(rgyud 'bum): ldan na las thams cad byed pa/ ji ltar ston ka'i sprin bzhin du bgegs thams cad 'jigs par byed pa/ gang yang bdud bzhis byams pa dang gang yang lha dang lha ma yin gyi bgegs rnams ni skyil
229a2(rgyud 'bum): krung gi phyag rgya dam pa mthong ba tsam gyis 'jigs par 'gyur ro/ /'og ma gnyis kyang rtse mo mnyam par gshibs na khu tshur gyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ro/ /sngags kyang 'di dag gang yang rung ba dang phyag rgya lag pa gnyis kyis bcings te sgrub
229a3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i dus sam sngon du bsnyen pa'i dus su 'dug pa'am langs te/ lan cig gam ji srid 'dod kyi bar du bzlas par bya'o/ /de ltar byas na bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad kyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur zhing grub pa yang
229a4(rgyud 'bum): mngon du 'gyur ro/ /mdzub mo de nyid kyi rtse mo gnyis sbyar la kun nas zlum por bya zhing gung mo gnyis sbyar te/ gung mo'i tshigs gsum pa'i 'og tu sbyar ba ni gzhan gyis mi thub pa gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur
229a5(rgyud 'bum): ba'i snying po'i phyag rgya'o/ /'dir snying po ni/ oM a pa rA dzi tA d+hi ka /gtsug tor gyi rtsa ba'i phyag rgya de nyid la gzhan gang yang rung ba dang lhan cig pa'i spyod pas bkod na las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /de las mthe bo'i
229a6(rgyud 'bum): rtse mo bteg la srin lag gi rtse mo gtugs nas yang dang yang bteg pa ni bod pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /'dir sngags ni/ na mo b+ha ga ba te a pra ti ha toSh+NI ShA ya/ e h+ye h+yi b+ha ga bAn d+harma rA dza pra tIts+tshe da ar+g+haM/ ga / pu d+hU pa~M ba liM dI pa~M
229a7(rgyud 'bum): mAM tsA b+hi rak+Sha/ a pra ti ha ta/ ba la pa rA kra mA ya swA hA/ me tog dkar pos spyan drang bar bya'o/ /rang gi gzugs kyi mchod yon dang zhabs bsil ba dbul bar bya'o/ /gdan dang bzhugs su gsol ba yang bya'o/ /de la 'di
229a8(rgyud 'bum): nyid kyi phyag rgya dang sngags kyis phyogs dang phyogs mtshams dang steng 'og bcing bar bya'o/ /de nyid kyi srin lag dang mthe bo'i rtse mos gtugs shing smad pa byas la/ tshigs bar ma la mthe bos gtugs shing yang dang
229b1(rgyud 'bum): yang bteg par byas nas/ mchod yon phul na rang gis lha gshegs su gsol bar 'gyur ro/ /phyag rgya g.yon phyogs su bskor na phyogs bcings pa las grol bar 'gyur ro/ /'dir sngags ni/ na mo a pra ti ha toSh+NI ShA ya/ gats+tsha gats+tsha
229b2(rgyud 'bum): b+ha ga bAn d+harma rA dza pra tIts+tshe daM ar+g+haM/ ga pu/ d+hU pa~M mAM tsA b+hi rak+Sha/ a pra ti ha ta ba la pa rA kra mA ya/ phyag rgya dang sngags gshegs su gsol ba ni mchod yon gyis so/ /mdzub mo de nyid gung mo'i tshigs gsum pa'i 'og tu bzhag
229b3(rgyud 'bum): ste/ gung mo yang dag par sbyar la mthe bo gnyis dang mthe'u chung gnyis phan tshun mnan cing khu tshur du bya'o/ 'dir sngags ni/ /na mo b+ha ga ba te a pra ti ha toSh+NI ShA ya/ drA ban+d+ha hU~M phaT/ a pra ti ha toSh+NI ShA ya/ bi ki ri Ni/ bi ki ri Ni/
229b4(rgyud 'bum): d+hu na d+hu na d+hu/ rnam par 'jig par byed pa/ bcom ldan 'das rig pa'i rgyal po'i gtsug tor gyi sngags bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad kyis zin pa dag dang dbang bskur ba dang bdag bsrung ba dang phyogs bcing ba dang dkyil 'khor bcing
229b5(rgyud 'bum): ba la sogs te las thams cad la rab tu sbyar ro/ /mdzub mo de gnyis kyi rtse mo gnyis bkug cing yang dang yang brkyang ba ni me lha spyan drang ba'o/ /de nas sbyin sreg gi las bya ste/ 'di nyid kyis slar gshegs su
229b6(rgyud 'bum): gsol ba ni bzlog pa'o/ /mdzub mo gnyis kyang 'bar ba'i phreng bar bsam mo/ /gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya 'di ni las thams cad la thogs pa med pa'o/ /'dir sngags ni/ na mo b+ha ga ba te/ a pra ti
229b7(rgyud 'bum): ha toSh+NI ShA ya/ e h+ye hi te dzo mA li ni ag+na ye swA hA/ mdzub mo de nyid kyi rtse mo gnyis cung zad bkug par bya zhing gung mo sbyar la gung mo'i tshigs gsum pa'i nang du sbyar bar bya'o/ /gtsug tor gyi stobs shin tu
229b8(rgyud 'bum): drag po'i phyag rgya yin no/ /'dir sngags ni/ na mo b+ha ga ba ti/ a pra ti ha toSh+NI ShA ya/ i ma~M ga / d+hU pa~M/ pu ba liM dI pa~M tsa pra tIts+tsha ha ra sarba bud+d+ha a d+hi te/ d+harma rA dza a pra ti ha tA ya swA hA/ dri la sogs pa'i
230a1(rgyud 'bum): sngags so/ /srin lag gnyis bzlog ste/ tshigs gsum pa la mthe bo gnyis yang dag par sbyar zhing mdzub mo gnyis kyang sbyar ba ni gzi brjid gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya ste/ log 'dren thams
230a2(rgyud 'bum): cad kyis 'joms par mi nus so/ /phyag rgya 'di ni srung ba dang bzlas pa'i dus dang / sgrub pa'i dus dang dkyil 'khor dang las thams cad la yang bya ba yin no/ /'dir sngags ni/ na mo b+ha ga ba te/ a
230a3(rgyud 'bum): pra ti ha toSh+NI ShA ya/ sarba bi g+h+naM bi d+hA na sa na ka rA ya kro d+hA ya swA hA/ srin lag gnyis kyi rtsa bar mthe bong gnyis gtugs te/ de bzhin du gdub kor ltar bya zhing mdzub mo gnyis kyi nang stong pa'i rnam par bya'o/ /
230a4(rgyud 'bum): 'di ni thams cad du thogs pa med cing gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya yin no/ /'dir sngags ni/ na mo b+ha ga ba te/ a pra ti ha toSh+NI ShA ya/ sarba tra a pa rA dzi tA ya/ sha ma ya sha ma ya/ shAn+te dAn+te
230a5(rgyud 'bum): d+harma rA dza ba shi te/ ma hA bid+yA+e sarbAr+tha sA d+ha ni swA hA/ mar gyi sbyin sreg la sogs pas zhi ba dang rgyas pa la sogs pa'i las bya'o/ /srin lag gnyis kyis gdub kor ltar bya zhing mdzub mo'i rtse mo
230a6(rgyud 'bum): gnyis bkug pa ni thogs pa med pa'i bde byed kyi gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya'o/ /'dir sngags ni/ na mo b+ha ga ba te/ a pra ti ha toSh+NI ShA ya/ oM shang ka re swA hA/ las thams cad srung bar byed do/ /
230a7(rgyud 'bum): mthe bo gnyis kyi rtse mos srin lag gnyis kyi gsum pa'i tshigs la mnan la/ de bzhin du mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo yang rdo rje'i rtse mo dang 'dra bar bya'o/ /'di ni dam tshig thogs pa med pa'i spyi gtsug
230a8(rgyud 'bum): gi phyag rgya ste/ dam tshig thams cad kyi thun mong ngo / /'dir sngags ni/ na mo b+ha ga ba te/ a pra ti ha toSh+NI ShA ya/ oM shang ka re sa ma ya~M swA hA/ mthe bo gnyis kyi rtse mos srin lag gnyis
230b1(rgyud 'bum): kyi bar ma'i tshigs la bcar la mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo dgug par bya zhing gung mo gnyis kyi rtse mo dang tshigs bar ma sbyar ba ni dam tshig thogs pa med pa gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya yin te/ lha dang lha ma yin la
230b2(rgyud 'bum): sbyar na dam tshig la 'jog par byed do/ /'dir sngags ni/ na mo b+ha ga ba te/ a pra ti ha toSh+NI ShA ya/ oM shang ka re ma hA sa ma yaM swA hA/ 'dis dkyil 'khor bcing ba byas nas bzlas na 'khor los sgyur ba
230b3(rgyud 'bum): yang dam tshig la gnas par 'gyur zhing 'khor los sgyur ba gzhan yang zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ro/ /gnas de nyid du bzlas pa byas na rig pa'i mthu stobs kyis 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das
230b4(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyi sngags rnams kyis phan tshun gnod pa byed par nus pa ma yin no/ /bzlas pa ni gnas gcig tu rnam pa thams cad du bya'o/ /de la sogs pa gtsug tor gyi rgyal po grangs med pa yod de/
230b5(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs la rgya cher bya'o/ /'jam dpal cho ga'i rgyal po 'di la ni sngags tshad med pa yod de/ phyag rgya yang rnam pa sna tshogs nyid de ngas 'di mdor bsdus nas bshad pa
230b6(rgyud 'bum): yin no/ /ngas gal te rgya cher bshad na ni mi dang mi ma yin pa thams cad kyis bskal pa stong gi tshad du yang 'dzin pa'am 'chang bar nus pa ma yin no/ /'jam dpal de lta bas na mdor bsdus nas bshad par
230b7(rgyud 'bum): bya yis/ mdor na yid la nye bar gzung bar gyis shig /dang po thub pa'i phyag rgya mchog /'dir ni rab tu gsungs pa yin/ /lha yi lha ni de nas kyang / /'khor los sgyur ba'i phyag rgya dang / /byang chub sems dpa' blo
230b8(rgyud 'bum): ldan ni/ /spyan ras gzigs ni zla ba dang / /de nas phyag na rdo rje'i rgya/ /gnod sbyin dbang po'i bstan pa yin/ /de nas gzhan yang phyag rgya ni/ /dpag med chen po'i gzi brjid ldan/ /pho nya pho nya mo tshogs kun/ /bran pho bran mo de bzhin gzhan/ /de bzhin
231a1(rgyud 'bum): gnod sbyin gnod sbyin mo/ /klu dang klu mo de bzhin gzhan/ /mngag gzhug mngag gzhug mo dag dang / /rdzu 'phrul chen po sha za mo/ /de bzhin gzhan yang srin mo dang / /lha dang lha min bu mo dang / /grub dang rig pa
231a2(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin rnams dang / /mi rnams ma lus pa dag dang / /skye bo thams cad dag gi ni/ /so so so sor phyag rgya bstan/ /sngags kyang rnam pa sna tshogs dang / /las dang ting 'dzin sna tshogs dang / /glang po nor bu'i rigs dag dang / /
231a3(rgyud 'bum): de dag so so'i phyag rgya dang / /dgra bcom dang ni rang rgyal dang / /legs 'byung phyag rgya de nyid dang / /sa bcu la ni rab gnas pa'i/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi/ /phyag rgya snying po sngags dag ni/ /gcig pa nyid du yongs
231a4(rgyud 'bum): su bsgrags/ /lha dang gnod sbyin rigs dang ni/ /drang srong dri zas mchod pa dang / /phyag rgya dri zas bstan pa dang / /bdun pa'i rigs kyis gsungs pa dang / /de bzhin brgyad pa'i phyag rgya ni/ /gnod sbyin rigs su yongs su
231a5(rgyud 'bum): bstan/ /phyag rgya thams cad yang dag bstan/ /gzhan yang bder gshegs bka' dag gis/ /rgyud rnams dag ni so so dang / /'jig rten pa yi yang 'dir gzung / /phyag rgya ldan pa'i sngags dag ni/ /las rnams la ni
231a6(rgyud 'bum): gsal bar 'gyur/ /phyag rgya 'ching la sogs mkhas na/ /log 'dren dag gis gnod mi 'gyur/ /de nas phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi snying po'i phyag rgya'i mtshan
231a7(rgyud 'bum): nyid du 'gyur ba ni/ lag pa gnyis kyi sor mo phan tshun bsdams la mthe bo gnyis bstan par bya'o/ /'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thugs kyi phyag rgya'o/ /'di nyid la mthe bo g.yas pa gcig
231a8(rgyud 'bum): bstan pa ni pad ma 'dzin pa'i phyag rgyar 'gyur ro/ /lag pa g.yas g.yon snga ma bzhin du khu tshur bcangs te/ gung mo'i sor mo gnyis rab tu phyung zhing brkyang bar byas la gcig tu byas shing rdo rje'i rtse
231b1(rgyud 'bum): mo 'dra ba 'di ni rdo rje 'dzin gyi phyag rgya'o/ /de las gcig bkug pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' spos kyi glang po'i phyag rgya'o/ /yang de nyid brkyang nas gung mo gnyis gdub kor ltar byas pa 'di ni byang chub
231b2(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' glang po'i spos kyi phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis po thams cad bsdus te/ khu tshur du byas pa 'di ni rin po che'i rigs kyi phyag rgya'o/ /nor bu la spyod pa thams cad dang dzam b+ha la chu dbang
231b3(rgyud 'bum): la sogs pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya 'di nyid sbyar bar bya'o/ /mdzub mo gnyis kyi tshigs gnyis bkug nas sen mo gnyis phan tshun du sprad pa 'di ni gnod sbyin gyi rigs lngas rtsen la sogs pa'i
231b4(rgyud 'bum): gnod sbyin rdzu 'phrul chen po'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis snga ma bzhin du khu tshur bcing ba byas la mthe bo'i sen mo gnyis phan tshun sprad cing steng du bzhag la gung mo gnyi ga'i rtse mo rdo rje'i rtse
231b5(rgyud 'bum): mo dang 'dra bar byas pa 'di ni lha thams cad de lha'i rigs 'og min la sogs pa'i phyag rgya yin no/ /lag pa gnyis de bzhin du bsdams la khu tshur bcangs nas mthe bo gnyis bstan pa 'di ni rang
231b6(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas rnams dang 'phags pa nyan thos kyi phyag rgya'o/ /khu tshur bcang bar byas pa 'di dag ni 'phags pa'i gang zag brgyad kyi phyag rgya'o/ /rgyal ba'i sras thams cad kyi phyag rgya ni gcig
231b7(rgyud 'bum): tu brjod par bya ste/ thal mo brkyang ba sbyar nas cung zad rtse mo bskum par byas pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpar grags pa'i phyag rgyar bstan pa yin no/ /nor bu rin po che dang / 'khar gsil dang / snam sbyar dang /
231b8(rgyud 'bum): lhung bzed dang / chos gos dang / mche ba dang / mi 'jigs pa'i lag pa ste/ bdun po de dag ni thub pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /spyan dang byams pa dang 'od kyi dra ba dang chos ston pa dang mdzod spu'i nor bu dang gnas pa dang
232a1(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya bdun po 'di dag kyang rgyal ba'i sku nyid las skyes pa'o/ /bdun gnyis kyi tshogs gnyis pa 'di dag dang phyag rgya lnga ngas bshad pa dang thub pa'i snying po dang ldan pa nyi shu ni dang po'i rang byung gis
232a2(rgyud 'bum): kyang bstan pa yin te 'khor los sgyur ba nyi shu'i 'khor gyi phyag rgya yang bstan to/ /phyag rgya dang sngags byung ba 'di grangs kyi mthar yang byas pa yin no/ /thal mo sbyar ba byas nas gdub kor ltar byas pa ni nor bu
232a3(rgyud 'bum): rin po che'i phyag rgya'o/ /skyil mo krung gi g.yas g.yon brla'i nya'i phyogs su khu tshur rgyal mtshan du 'dzin pa ni 'khar gsil gyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ro/ /lag pa thal mo sbyar la phan tshun du mngon par phyogs
232a4(rgyud 'bum): pa ni snam sbyar gyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ro/ /lag pa thal mo sbyar ba las bzed pa ltar byas pa ni lhung bzed kyi phyag rgya'o/ /chos gos ni lag pa g.yon pas so/ /thugs kyi phyag rgya bzhin du g.yon pa'i mthe bo
232a5(rgyud 'bum): bteg pa ni mche ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa g.yas pas mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa dang g.yon pas chos gos la 'dzin pa ni mi 'jigs pa'i lag pa'o/ /thal mo sbyar ba las gung mo gnyis rdo rje'i rtse mo ltar byas la/ de'i rgyab tu mdzub
232a6(rgyud 'bum): mo gnyis cung zad bkug cing bzhag la/ mthe bo gnyis nang du bcug pa 'di ni sangs rgyas spyan gyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ro/ /'di nyid kyi gung mo'i tshigs bkug la mdzub mo gnyis gcig tu byas pa 'di ni sangs rgyas byams
232a7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /thal mo sbyar ba yangs par byas la mdzub mo dang srin lag gnyis bkug la rdo rje rtse gsum du byas pa 'di ni mA ma kI'i phyag rgyar 'gyur ro/ /thal mo sbyar ba byas nas mdzub mo gnyis gung mo gnyis kyi tshigs
232a8(rgyud 'bum): gsum pa la bkug nas bzhag la mthe bo gnyis so sor bskyed nas thal mo'i rnam par bya ba 'di ni longs spyod ldan pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya yin no/ /lag pa gnyis thal mo sbyar nas mdzub mo gnyis dang gung mo
232b1(rgyud 'bum): gnyis sbyar ba ni rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /g.yas pa'i sor mo gsum rdo rje'i rtse mo ltar byas la rked pa'i phyogs su brten pa 'di ni gnas pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /de ltar bdag nyid kyi mgo bor rig pa'i rgyal po
232b2(rgyud 'bum): 'i phyag rgya dang phyag rgya chen po brgyad bcings la las thams cad bya zhing dam tshig gzung ba'am dkyil 'khor bya ba dag la'ang me tog gtor bar bya'o/ /yang na sngar bstan pa'i cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du byas na ci 'dod pa'i
232b3(rgyud 'bum): las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /sngags dang phyag rgya dang rig pa brjod pas ni dam tshig thams cad du 'gyur ro/ /legs par phyag rgya bcing na ni phyag rgya'i mthu 'byung bar 'gyur gyi/ gang phyag rgya bab col du byas pa dang gnas ma
232b4(rgyud 'bum): yin par bcas pa des ni 'di'i dam tshig nyams par 'gyur ro/ /gang rdo rje'i phyag rgya de nyid ni mdud rtse'i phyag rgya yin mod kyi/ rtse gsum dang rdo rje ni khyad par yod de/ gang gyen du bstan pa de ni rdo rje 'dzin gyi phyag rgyar
232b5(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur la/ 'og tu bltas pa ni dbang phyug chen po'i phyag rgya yin no/ /bar du bzhag pa ni sbyin gnas su 'os pa'i slob dpon dang bla ma la ni phyag rgya dbus su gzung bar bya'o/ /mi thams cad la ni sor mo
232b6(rgyud 'bum): gcig gdeg par bya'o/ /mi ma yin pa thams cad dang rkang gnyis dang rkang bzhi dang rkang mang dang srid pa gsum la gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni sor mo gnyis bsgreng ba'o/ /gnod sbyin
232b7(rgyud 'bum): dang gnod sbyin mo thams cad kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni gsum bsgreng ba'o/ /rig pa 'dzin pa dang rig pa 'dzin ma thams cad kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni sor mo bzhi bsgreng ba'o/ /lha dang lha ma yin thams cad kyi
232b8(rgyud 'bum): bu mo'i phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni lag pa'i mthil mnyam por bzhag pa'o/ /thal mo sbyar ba legs par byas te bzhag pa ni gzugs na spyod pa'i lha thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o/ /thal mo de nyid legs par byas
233a1(rgyud 'bum): pa las khu tshur bcing ba byas pa ni 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug la sogs pa 'dod pa'i khams na gnas pa thams cad kyi yin no/ /dmyal ba dang dud 'gro dang yi dags dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten
233a2(rgyud 'bum): gyi sems can thams cad kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni de nyid las sor mo gcig yang dag par bsgreng ba'o/ /sha za dang sha za mo la sogs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni sor mo gnyis bsgreng ba'o/ /srin po
233a3(rgyud 'bum): dang srin mo rnams kyi ni gsum bsgreng ba'o/ /sha rjen za ba thams cad dang gdon dang ma mo dang grul bum la sogs pa dang / sha za rnams dang mkha' 'gro ma thams cad dang sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa thams
233a4(rgyud 'bum): cad la ni sor mo bzhi bsgreng ba'o/ /sdig pa thams cad kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni sor mo thams cad bsdus pa'o/ /lag sor bsdus pa'i phyag rgya ni dgug pa'o/ /lag sor brkyang ba ni slar gtang ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /
233a5(rgyud 'bum): las thams cad ni rang gi sems kyis bya'o/ /ci 'dod pa'i phyag rgya 'di dag la rang rang gi sngags sbyar bar bya'o/ /gzhan gyi phyag rgyar gzhan gyi las ni mi bya'o/ /gang gi sngags gang la yod pa de dang de'i phyag
233a6(rgyud 'bum): rgyar sbyar bar bya'o/ /phyag rgya 'di dag ni rin thang mnyam pa med pa yin te/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa sems can thams cad kyis phyag rgya mthong bas khro bar byed mi nus so/ /phyag rgya las
233a7(rgyud 'bum): 'da' bar byed pa ni rnam par nyams pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /phyag rgya nyams pa las ni dam tshig nyams pa dang rig pa thams cad las rnam par 'das par 'gyur ro/ /mthar yang ngu 'bod kyi 'gro ba thob par 'gyur ro/ /dmyal
233a8(rgyud 'bum): ba chen po mnar med par yang shin tu brtan par skye ba thob par 'gyur ba ni phyag rgya la bgegs byed pas so/ /gang yang phyag rgya dang dam tshig la gnas pa de dag ni yun ring po mi nyung bar bde bar 'gyur te/ lha'i gnas chen po'i
233b1(rgyud 'bum): 'gro bar skye bar 'gyur ro/ /mthar yang nges par byang chub la gzhol bar 'gyur ro/ /mdor na dang po'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul chen po dag gis phyag rgya rnam pa mang po rnams rab tu gsungs so/ /
233b2(rgyud 'bum): sems can thams cad kyis kyang 'di'i mtha' rtogs par ram gzung bar ram grangs rtsi bar byed par mi nus so/ /mdor na rgyal ba'i rigs kyi rig pa'i rgyal po 'khor los sgyur ba'i yi ge gcig pa de'i phyag
233b3(rgyud 'bum): rgyar 'gyur ba ni lag pa g.yas g.yon snga ma bzhin du khu tshur du byas la/ gung mo gnyis phyir phyung la brkyang ste gcig tu rtse sprad la/ gnyi ga'i yang rtse mo'i tshigs bkug la mdzub mo gnyis kyi tshigs gnyis
233b4(rgyud 'bum): bkug cing sen mo gnyis phan tshun rtse sprad de/ mthe bo gnyis kyi sen mo'i steng du bzhag pa 'di ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i phyag rgya ste/ las thams cad byed pa phyag rgya thams cad kyi rab mchog 'jig rten gyi skyob pa
233b5(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyis gsungs pa/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i yi ge gcig pa dang yang dag par ldan na las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /'dis bsgrubs na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs dang 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las
233b6(rgyud 'bum): 'das pa thams cad kyi sngags grub par 'gyur ro/ /'dis bzlas pa byas na sngags thams cad bzlas par 'gyur ro/ /sgrub pa pos nges par sngon du cho ga'i rgyal po 'dir gsungs pa'i sngags kyi mchog brgyad stong
233b7(rgyud 'bum): bzlas pa bya'o/ /de ltar byas na rig pa 'di thams cad mngon du 'gyur zhing myur du grub pa rab tu ster bar 'gyur ro/ /myur du mchog kyang ster bar 'gyur ro/ /nges par byang chub la gzhol bar 'gyur ro/ /pad ma 'dzin pa'i phyag
233b8(rgyud 'bum): rgya dang spyan ras gzigs kyi snying po yi ge gcig pa dang ldan par byas na las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /yang na gos dkar mo'i rig pa phyag rgya dang ldan par byas na'ang de bzhin du las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje 'chang gi
234a1(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya dang de nyid kyi snying po yi ge gcig pa dang ldan par byas na yang de bzhin du las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /yang na mA ma kI'i rig pa chen mo dang ldan par byas na'ang las thams cad byed par
234a2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du glang po'i rigs kyi yi ge gcig pa byang chub sems dpa' glang po'i spos kyi snying po dang de bzhin du de nyid kyi phyag rgya dang rin po che'i rigs dang gnod sbyin gyi rigs dang lha dang 'phags pa dang
234a3(rgyud 'bum): 'di dag la yang 'dir snying po yi ge gcig pa nyid la phyag rgya dang sngags thams cad dang ldan par byas na las thams cad bya ba yin no/ /ji ltar rigs par rig pa dang sngags kyi stobs bskyed pa mtha' dag bya'o/ /
234a4(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin du drang srong rnams la ni dmod pa 'debs pa'i lag pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /de bzhin du dri za dang lha dang lha ma yin dang bcas pa rnams la ni lag pa g.yon pa'i mthe bo nang du bcug pa byas pa'o/ /grub pa bstan pa'i
234a5(rgyud 'bum): khu tshur du gnas pa'i rgya ni gzhon nu ma bzhi'i phyag rgya dang de nyid kyi sngags kyis so/ /de bzhin du smin drug gi bu la ni mdung gi phyag rgyas so/ /de bzhin du gshin rje dang chu lha dang lus ngan dang gnod sbyin dang srin po dang sha
234a6(rgyud 'bum): z a dang lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa sems can srid pa gsum la yang dag par gnas pa thams cad dang 'gro ba thams cad du gtogs pa dang khams thams cad na gnas pa dang sems can thams cad kyi gdon dang ma mo dang sha rjen za ba dang sdig pa
234a7(rgyud 'bum): can gyi sems can thams cad dang thams cad kyi phyag rgya dang sngags kyang thams cad du gsungs pa yin no/ /rim gyis sbyar zhing mthar gyis thams cad kyi thams cad du 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no/ /dang por re zhig sgrub pa pos cho ga'i rgyal po 'di la de
234a8(rgyud 'bum): b zhin gshegs pa las byung ba'i phyag rgya chen po dang phyag rgya de'i yan lag tu gyur pa las byung ba dang 'phags pa kun tu bzang po dang mthu chen thob dang dri ma med par grags pa dang 'jam dpal khyod kyi ut+pa la'i phyag
234b1(rgyud 'bum): rgya dang byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag gi phyag rgya shar du mngon par bltas te gnas pa dang nyi ma la mngon du bltas te gnas nas/ tho rangs langs la gtsang zhing gtsang ba'i gnas la gnas nas sgrub pa pos nges par 'di
234b2(rgyud 'bum): dag gi phyag rgya gang yang rung ba bcings la rang gi spyi bo'i steng du gzhag par bya'o/ /'di dag gang yang rung ba'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa byas na nad thams cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe ring ba dang bgegs
234b3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyis zil gyis gnon par mi 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/ /myur du grub pa ster bar 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlab par 'gyur ro/ /nges par byang chub la gzhol bar 'gyur ro/ /
234b4(rgyud 'bum): byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'gyur ro/ /snying po dang phyag rgyar 'gyur ba de yang gang zhe na/ dang por re zhig dpa' bo chen po'i phyag rgya bca' bar bya ste/ lag pa
234b5(rgyud 'bum): gnyis sbyar bar byas la sor mo rnams nang du bsdus te/ mthe bo gnyis bteg la tshigs gsum pa'i cha bkug pa 'di ni dpa' bo chen po'i phyag rgya de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gsungs so/ /'dir sngags ni/ a bI ra hU~M
234b6(rgyud 'bum): baM/ sngags 'di dang yang dag par ldan na phyag rgya 'di ni las thams cad byed pa yin no/ /lag pa gnyis de bzhin du yang dag par sbyar ba byas la phyir yang rnam par phye zhing / kun nas sor mo rnams pad ma kha bye ba ltar byas pa 'di ni
234b7(rgyud 'bum): kha bye ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya mchog yin te/ dang po'i sangs rgyas kyis rab tu bstan to/ /'dir sngags ni/ ga ga na sam+b+ha be dIp+ta dIp+ta dz+wA la ya dz+wA la ya/ bud+d+ha a d+hi te bi kA sA ya sarba b+hu tA / hU~M hU~M bi kA si ni phaT phaT swA hA/
234b8(rgyud 'bum): 'di ni pad ma kha bye ba'i sngags te/ phyag rgya 'di dang yang dag par ldan na las thams cad par 'gyur ro/ /gdon zhugs pa la sogs pa yang rab tu shes pa yin no/ /smra bar byed par 'gyur ro/ /gdon gyis zin pa rnams dang sha za sdig pa dang ldan
235a1(rgyud 'bum): pas zin pa dang dug gis brgyal ba rnams la ji lta ji ltar rab tu sbyar ba de lta de ltar de thams cad byed do/ /'di ni mdor na rig pa me tog kha bye ba'i phyag rgya dang ldan par byas na don thams cad sgrub par byed do/ /ma grub pa
235a2(rgyud 'bum): nyid kyang myur du 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /lag pa gnyis sbyar ba byas la sor mo rnams nang du mnyam par byas te bcug pa ni snying po'i phyag rgya ste/ snying pos lan bdun mngon par bsngags la bkrol bar bya ste/ de bzhin du thams cad
235a3(rgyud 'bum): du yang bya'o/ /'dir sngags ni/ go da ro bI ra swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'o/ /lag pa de nyid khu tshur du bya ste sor mo rnams brkyang la sor mo'i rtse mo phan tshun sprad cing nang du stong pa ni gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya'o/ /'dir sngags
235a4(rgyud 'bum): ni/ ban+d+ha swA hA/ 'di ni las thams cad byed pa ste/ lag pa g.yas pa'i mthe bo bteg la khu tshur bcangs pa ni 'khar gsil gyi phyag rgya'o/ /'dir sngags ni/ d+hu na dzi ta ra NI hU~M/ 'khar gsil gyi sngags ni las thams cad pa'o/ /
235a5(rgyud 'bum): 'di nyid kyi phyag rgya dang ldan pas lag pa g.yon pa chos gos la 'dzin par byas pa ni chos gos kyi phyag rgya'o/ /'dir sngags ni/ rak+Sha rak+Sha sarba bud+d+ha a d+hi ta da ma tsI ba ra swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos gos kyi sngags so/ /
235a6(rgyud 'bum): 'di nyid kyi phyag rgya dang ldan par byas na las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /gos la mngon par bsngags nas gos bgos na bsrung ba chen po byas par 'gyur ro/ /gdon thams cad dang ma mo dang sha za dang sha rlon za ba dang sdig pa
235a7(rgyud 'bum): can rnams dang bgegs thams cad kyang mthong ba tsam gyis rab tu 'byer ro/ /mthe bo g.yas g.yon dang mthe'u chung gnyis phan tshun sprad pa byas la lag pa'i kha sbyar thur du bstan pa ni lhung bzed kyi phyag rgya'o/ /'dir sngags ni/
235a8(rgyud 'bum): lo ka bA la a d+hi ta~M ba ra d+hA rA ya/ ma hA nu b+ha ba nu d+ha bA trA swA hA/ phyag rgya 'di dang sngags 'di yang dag par ldan par byas na las thams cad byed do/ /kha zas za ba'i dus su dran par byas na sbyar ba'i dug thams cad nus pa med par
235b1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ /lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcang la mdzub mo gnyis dang gung mo bkug pa 'di ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgya'o/ /'dir sngags ni/ te dzo dz+wA la sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ka sid d+h+ya tsin tA ma Ni d+ha ra na hU~M/ nor bu rin po che
235b2(rgyud 'bum): 'i sngags so/ /phyag rgya 'di nyid dang yang dag par ldan na las thams cad byed cing dge ba yin no/ /rgyan gyi khyad par thams cad la 'di nyid kyis mngon par bsngags te rgyan du byas na bdag nyid la bsrung ba chen po byas par 'gyur ro/ /
235b3(rgyud 'bum): mchog tu skal ba bzang po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /go cha la mngon par bsngags te rang nyid kyis bgo bar byas nas g.yul du 'jug na/ 'di ni lus la mtshon gyis mi phog cing mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/ /dgra thams cad
235b4(rgyud 'bum): kyi rang gi dpung 'byed par byed cing pha rol gyi sde yang rab tu gnon par byed de/ de la sogs pa tshad med pa'i las ma grub pa nyid kyang grub par byed do/ /rin po che pad ma rA ga dang margad ta la sogs pa gang yang rung ba'i
235b5(rgyud 'bum): rin po che'i khyad par blangs la/ brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags pa byas nas rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'am rang gi mgo bo'am glang po che'i mchog mar bcing ba byas nas g.yul gyi thog mar zhugs na nges par pha rol gyi
235b6(rgyud 'bum): dpung dang 'thab pa med pa kho nar mthong bas 'jigs par 'gyur ba'am rmugs pa chen po nyid du 'gyur ba'am bdag po dpung dang bcas pa de dag rab tu 'byer bar 'gyur ro/ /sor mo rnams phan tshun bsdus nas khu
235b7(rgyud 'bum): tshur du byas la sor mo gung mo'i gnas kyi gsum pa'i tshigs kyi cha la mdzub mo'i rtse mo bkug pa 'di ni chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya'o/ /'dir sngags ni/ ts+tshin+d+ha ts+tshin+d+ha ha na da ha/ tsakra dI hU~M/ chos kyi 'khor lo'i sngags
235b8(rgyud 'bum): so/ /rkang pa g.yon pa bteg la rkang pa g.yas pas la bzhag ste/ g.yon pa'i rkang pa'i bol gyis g.yas pa brkyang ba'i brla la bzhag la/ lag pa g.yas pas brdeg pa'i tshul du nga rgyal gyis brtan par byas
236a1(rgyud 'bum): pa 'di ni gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /'dir sngags ni/ oM hu lu hu lu tsaN+Da li ma tang gi swA hA/ gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i sngags so/ /chos kyi 'khor lo dang gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i sngags 'di dag
236a2(rgyud 'bum): nyid dang yang dag par ldan pas las thams cad par 'gyur ro/ /mdor na sdug bsngal thams cad nges par gcod par byed do/ /ji lta ji ltar rab tu sbyar ba de lta de ltar las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /lag pa
236a3(rgyud 'bum): g.yon pa brla'i steng du dkur brten la/ lag pa g.yas pas chos ston pa'i phyag rgya ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdung gi phyag rgya yin no/ /'dir sngags ni/ oM bi dza ye ma hA sha ka ti d+hu ra d+ha ri hU~M phaT/ bi dza yi ni phaT/
236a4(rgyud 'bum): mang ga lA ya phaT/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdung gi sngags so/ /'di nyid kyi phyag rgya dang yang dag par ldan na las thams cad par 'gyur ro/ /bgegs thams cad dang ma rungs pa thams cad dang dgra thams cad dang lha dang
236a5(rgyud 'bum): bcas pa yang rengs par byed do/ /'di'i yon tan ni mtha' yas te ji lta ji ltar rab tu sbyar ba de lta de ltar las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /lag pa'i sor mo rnams phan tshun de bzhin du byas la/ lag pa gnyis bkan
236a6(rgyud 'bum): te mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo sbyar la de nyid bzlogs la thur du bstan te dpral bar bzhag pa 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang po'i sangs rgyas kyi mdzod spu'i phyag rgyar gsungs so/ /'dir sngags ni/ na maH
236a7(rgyud 'bum): sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ a te b+h+yaH/ samya ka sam bud d+he b+h+yaH he he ban d+ha ban d+ha tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha d+hA ra ya d+hA ra ya/ ni run d+ha ni run d+ha/ Ur+Na ma Ni swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzod spu'i sngags 'di nyid kyi phyag rgya dang /
236a8(rgyud 'bum): yang dag par ldan na las thams cad par 'gyur ro/ /gi wang gi lde gus dpral ba la thig ler byas la sngags bzlas na dgra'i nang du zhugs kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/ /ma rungs pa thams cad kyis
236b1(rgyud 'bum): kyang mi 'tshe bar 'gyur ro/ /g.yul gyi nang du zhugs na yang mthong ba tsam gyis gzhan gyi sde 'jig par byed do/ /ma mthong yang las tshad med pa byed par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad med pas
236b2(rgyud 'bum): kyang gsungs so/ /rgyun mi chad par phan tshun thal mo sbyar ba byas la mdzub mo gnyis phan tshun rtse sprad la/ tshigs bar ma bkug cing mthe bo gnyis kyang bkug pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan gyi
236b3(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya'o/ /'dir sngags ni/ oM ru ru s+phu ru dz+wA la tiSh+Tha sid+d+ha lo tsa ni sarbA R+tha/ sA d+ha ni swA hA/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan gyi sngags so/ /'di nyid kyi phyag rgya dang yang dag par ldan pas las thams cad byed
236b4(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ /mig gnyis la mngon par bsngags te dgra'i nang du zhugs na/ dgra rnams mthong ba tsam gyis byams pa'i sems dang phan pa'i bsam pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /bshes gnyen nyid du'ang 'gyur/
236b5(rgyud 'bum): yang na g.yul gyi thog mar mig gnyis la mngon par bsngags nas pha rol gyi dpung la bltas na/ zhi ba'i sems dang ldan par 'gyur zhing mtshon brdeg par rab tu nus pa ma yin no/ /'thab pa med pa nyid
236b6(rgyud 'bum): du'ang ldog par 'gyur te/ /grogs nyid du'ang rab tu sgrub par byed do/ /lag pa gnyis kyi sor mo de bzhin du glegs bam lta bur phan tshun gyi rtse mo sbyar la/ thad kar bzhag pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
236b7(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya'o/ /'dir sngags ni/ na mo b+ha ga ba te tsu ru daR+sha ne oM thA/ 'di ni bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngags so/ /'di nyid kyi phyag rgya dang yang dag par ldan na las thams cad byed par 'gyur
236b8(rgyud 'bum): ro/ /sngags 'di bzlas nas snying la byugs shing myangs na dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /dgra ma rungs pa'i nang du bzlas pa byas na de dag gi sems 'phrog par 'gyur ro/ /yang na g.yul gyi nang du rkang gnyis dang /
237a1(rgyud 'bum): rkang bzhi la sogs pa phyir rgol ba thams cad rnam par rmongs par byed pa'am sems rnam par g.yengs par byed par 'gyur ro/ /mdor na bcom ldan 'das ma 'di ni ji lta ji ltar rab tu sbyar ba de lta de ltar las thams cad
237a2(rgyud 'bum): byed par 'gyur ro/ /mdor na yon tan mtha' yas pa dang 'di'i las mtha' yas par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi phyag rgya dang sngags ni mtha' yas par 'gyur te/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
237a3(rgyud 'bum): kyi 'khor 'dus pa'i le'ur gsungs pa de bzhin du sngags dang phyag rgya thams cad la yang rab tu sbyar bar bya'o/ /yang na gzhan dag tu sngags dang phyag rgya'i cho ga grangs med par 'gyur ba de dag kyang cho ga'i rgyal po
237a4(rgyud 'bum): 'dir nges par sbyar bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du pad ma'i rigs la pad ma'i phyag rgya dang ldan pa'i sngags su 'gyur te/ oM dzi dzi dzi nA~M ga ta~M ya te di ne swA hA/ sngags 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs
237a5(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug gi pad ma'i phyag rgya dang yang dag par ldan na las thams cad par 'gyur ro/ /'di bzlas na pad ma'i rigs thams cad bzlas pa yin no/ /'di grub na pad ma'i rigs thams cad grub par 'gyur ro/ /
237a6(rgyud 'bum): de nas gos dkar mo'i rig pa chen po gang yin pa de'i sngags ni/ a ka Te bi ka Te ni ka Te/ ka Ta~M ka Te swA hA/ rang gi phyag rgya'am pad ma'i phyag rgya sbyar na las thams cad par 'gyur ro/ /dur khrod thams cad du song nas bsrung
237a7(rgyud 'bum): ba yang bya'o/ /de bzhin du sgrol ma dang khro gnyer can dang skul byed ma dang rta mgrin la'ang sbyar bar bya'o/ /rig pa 'dus pa'i le 'ur gang gsungs pa'i pad ma'i rigs grangs med pa thams cad kyang 'dir sbyar
237a8(rgyud 'bum): bar bya'o/ /phyag rgya dang sngags kyi cho ga rgya cher pad ma dag kyang sbyar bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du rdo rje'i rigs kyi rdo rje'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa yin no/ /'dir yang sngags ni/ oM ku la~M ba ri ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hU~M phaT/ 'di
237b1(rgyud 'bum): ni mA ma kI zhes bya ba'i rig pa chen mo las thams cad byed par sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstan to/ /sngar rab tu sbyar ba'i phyag rgya dang rig pa chen mo mA ma kI dang yang dag par ldan na sgrub pa po 'dod pa bzhin du las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /
237b2(rgyud 'bum): gleng gzhi'i le'u sngar bstan pa'i phyag na rdo rje'i 'khor rdo rje'i rigs ma lus pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya dang sngags dang ldan pa yang 'dir rab tu sbyar bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du glang po'i rigs la glang po'i spos kyi byang chub
237b3(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa'i sngags su 'gyur ba ni/ ga dza a hwa ye hU~M khe tsa ra swA hA/ sngar bstan pa'i phyag rgya dang yang dag par ldan na las thams cad par 'gyur te/ snga ma de bzhin du thams cad glang po'i rigs la grub par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du kun tu
237b4(rgyud 'bum): bzang po'i sngags ni/ sa ma ya sa ma dzin su ra ta mA bi baM ba hU~M phaT/ mthu chen thob kyi sngags ni/ oM tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha ma hA ma ga ta bo d+hi/ sa ma ya ma nu sma ra hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ dri ma med par grags pa'i sngags ni/ bi ma
237b5(rgyud 'bum): le bi ma le bi ma la mUrte/ oM d+ha ka d+ha ka sa ma ya ma nu sma ra swA hA/ nam mkha' mdzod kyi sngags ni/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi phyag rgya dang yang dag par ldan na las thams cad par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du ngan song kun spong dang rtag tu ngu dang sa'i
237b6(rgyud 'bum): snying po dang rin chen lag pa dang byams pa la sogs pa sa bcu rab tu thob pa rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang grangs med cing phyag rgya dang sngags kyang grangs med par 'gyur te/ de dag kyang cho ga'i
237b7(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po 'di la rab tu sbyar ba bya bar 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi shin tu rgya che ba dang bcas pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya thams cad kyi cho ga rgya che ba dang dam tshig chen po dang dam tshig la rab tu
237b8(rgyud 'bum): zhugs pa cho ga dang cho ga'i rnam pa thams cad kyi bye brag cho ga'i rgyal po 'dir gsungs te/ sngags thams cad kyang 'di la sgrub pa byar rung ba yin no/ /de bzhin du rin po che'i rigs dang gnod sbyin gyi rigs dang lha'i rigs
238a1(rgyud 'bum): dag la yang sngags dang rgyud dang phyag rgya thams cad rab tu sbyar ba 'dir bstan pa yin no/ /rigs gcig kho nar 'gyur zhing gzhan du ma yin pa ni 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs te de yang
238a2(rgyud 'bum): 'jam dpal gzhon nu de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su blta bar bya ste/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad dang /
238a3(rgyud 'bum): zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i phyag rgya dang / cho ga dang cho ga'i rnam pa rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi nang du gtogs so zhes gzung bar gyis shig /'jam dpal rig pa dang rgyud thams cad dang sngags kyi
238a4(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig la ma chud pa de ni gang yang med do/ /'jam dpal gzhon nu de rab tu rtogs pa nyid du zung shig /gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa mchog tu gsungs te de bas na de bzhin
238a5(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa'i rigs kyang mchog nyid du brjod do/ /'jam dpal gzhon nu de ltar na cho ga'i rgyal po 'di yang rigs kyi mchog rin po cher dang po dang po'i sangs rgyas kyis rab tu bstan pa dang ston pa dang rab tu gzhag pa
238a6(rgyud 'bum): dang rnam par 'grel par mdzad pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das me tog kun tu skyes pa'i rgyal po dang / bcom ldan 'das sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang / bcom ldan 'das me tog kun nas skyes pa'i dri mchog rgyal po dang / bcom
238a7(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das rin chen tog dang / bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag tu med pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bsod nams kyi 'od dang me tog dam pa dang / yang dag pa'i me tog dang / me tog bzang po dang / tshe dang ye shes dpag tu
238a8(rgyud 'bum): med pa rnam par nges pa'i rgyal po'i dbang po dang / gser thub dang / 'od srung dang / 'khor ba 'jig dang / gtsug tor can dang thams cad skyob dang / da ltar shAkya thub pa ngas kyang rab tu bstan te/ de bzhin du de ltar sangs rgyas gcig
238b1(rgyud 'bum): nas gcig tu brgyud de 'ongs pa 'di ni 'jam dpal gzhon nu cho ga'i rgyal po'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mchog rin po cher gyur pa/ phan yon che ba nges par chos kyi dbyings la brten pa/ bskal pa
238b2(rgyud 'bum): stong du'ang 'di'i phan yon bstan par ni mi nus so/ /yon tan chen po rgya che ba'i yon tan 'byung ba ni mthong ba'i chos dang 'jig rten pha rol du'ang yin no/ /dad pa can gang zhig gis the tshom med par 'chang ba dang klog pa dang /
238b3(rgyud 'bum): the tshom med par rgyud 'di la brtson pa byed cing sngags sgrub pa dang zlos pa dang phyag rgya 'ching ba dang rtag tu mngon par brtson par byed pa de la ni mthong ba'i chos kho na la yon tan gyi phan yon brgyad rab tu 'thob ste/ 'khrul pa
238b4(rgyud 'bum): med par 'gyur ba dang phyir rgol ba thams cad dang dgra'i 'jigs pa 'di la mi 'byung ba dang / 'di'i lus la dug mi 'byung ba dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpas kyang 'di la byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ba dang tshe ring ba dang /
238b5(rgyud 'bum): bde ba la brten par 'gyur ba dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'ang 'di'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'gyur ba dang mtshan mo'ang 'di la nyin re zhing rmi lam du mthong ba stsol ba dang sngags thams cad kyang 'di la bsrung bar 'gyur ro/ /
238b6(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya'ang 'di la rmi lam du ston par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po ma rungs pa dang sems can ma rungs pa dang mi phan pa 'dod pa rnams kyis kyang gnod pa med par 'gyur ro/ /nges par byang chub la gzhol bar 'gyur ro/ /dad cing the tshom med la mngon
238b7(rgyud 'bum): par brtson pa'i phan yon ni brgyad po 'di dag yin te/ khyim pa'am rab tu byung ba'am bud med dam skyes pa'am sems can chen po bstan pa la phan par byed pa rnams kyi yin gyi/ sdig pa la zhugs pa gzhan gyi ni ma yin te/ de las
238b8(rgyud 'bum): bzlog pa de'i 'gro ba ni ngu 'bod la sogs par skye bar 'gyur ro/ /phyag rgya snga dro bcing ba byas na tshe ring bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngags dang 'khor gyi snying po dang gtsug tor la sogs pa'i sngags
239a1(rgyud 'bum): dang spyan la sogs pa gzhan gyi phyag rgya de bcing bar bya'o/ /yang na 'jam dpal gzhon nu khyod kyi phyag rgya bya ste/ 'di dag ni brtson 'grus dang stobs mnyam pa yin no/ /gtsang zhing gtsang ba'i gnas su 'dug ste zhes bya ba ni
239a2(rgyud 'bum): g nas gtsang ma'i phyogs su zug rngu med pa'i gnas la ba'i lci ba sa la ma lhung bar byugs la me tog dkar po'i dri zhim po dag gis gcal bkram pa der 'dug la sngags bzla zhing phyag rgya bcing bar bya'i gzhan du ni ma yin
239a3(rgyud 'bum): no/ /gzhan dag tu ni phyag rgya dang lhan cig bzlas pa gcig kyang mi bya'o/ /gtsang ba zhes gang gsungs pa ni nyi ma nub pa na srog chags med pa'i chu gtsang mas khrus byas te gos sar pa bgos la/ gtsug tor gyi sngags kyis srung
239a4(rgyud 'bum): ba byas la/ grong gi chos rnam par spangs shing gtsang zhing gtsang sbra la dga' zhing dge ba ska rags dkar pos bcings pa de bzhin gshegs pa bsgoms la thun gcig 'das pa dang der nyal bar bya'o/ /bram ze mo'i bu mo gtsang mas
239a5(rgyud 'bum): bkal ba'i skud pa blangs la/ sngags 'di brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par sngags pa bya'o/ /ha ra ha ra ban+d+ha ne shu kra d+hA ra NI sid d+hAR+the swA hA/ mA ma kI'i phyag rgya dang bzlas pa bya'o/ /de nas skud pa rked pa la lan gsum dkris nas bcing
239a6(rgyud 'bum): ba byas na sa bon bcing ba byas par 'gyur te/ 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gis kyang rmi lam du yid la gnod pa byed par mi nus na/ rmi lam du log 'dren rnam pa sna tshogs kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de bzhin du cho ga 'di 'dod chags dang ldan
239a7(rgyud 'bum): pas kyang mi nus na/ 'dod chags dang bral bas lta smos kyang ci dgos/ 'dod pa'i dbang phyug dga' ldan gyi bu mo gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs 'chang ba'i 'dod chags can gyis kyang yid la gnod pa skyed par mi nus na de las gzhan pa'i mi dang mi ma
239a8(rgyud 'bum): yin pa'i bud med kyis kyang lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de lta bu'i cho gas nang par langs la so shing bca' zhing gdong rab tu bkrus la/ cho ga snga ma bzhin du srog chags med cing dri ma med pa'i chus khrus byas te/ shar phyogs su
239b1(rgyud 'bum): bltas la phyag rgya bcing zhing sngags bzlas pa byas na tshe ring bar 'gyur zhing las thams cad la nus pa dang nad chen po las grol te skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /dgra rnams kyang bshes gnyen nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /mthong ba tsam gyis gdon
239b2(rgyud 'bum): thams cad dang sha rjen za ba dang sdig pa can la sogs pa rab tu 'byer bar 'gyur ro/ /dgra rnams rengs par 'gyur ro/ /mthong ba tsam gyis gtsang ba'am mi gtsang ba'i cho gas las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du cho ga'i rgyal po
239b3(rgyud 'bum): 'di'i phyag rgya dang sngags kyi tshogs kyi 'khor 'di yang grangs med pa yin te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med pas gsungs pa dang gsungs pa yin te/ shAkya thub pa ngas kyang da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
239b4(rgyud 'bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis kyang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi nang du gsungs te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nu khyod la yang bstan pa yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir dang chos kyi dbyings yun ring du yang dag par bsrung ba'i phyir 'di khyod la yongs
239b5(rgyud 'bum): su gtad do/ /nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das te chos kyi de nyid la brten cing yang dag pa'i mtha'i tha mar gyur te zhi bar gyur pa na/ sems can snying rje chen po dang bral ba'i sems dang ldan pa la phan pa'i phyir gsungs shing dus
239b6(rgyud 'bum): kyi mtha' 'jigs pa chen po'i dus la bab pa na/ dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa byed pa'i sems can rnams kyang bzlog pa'i don dang gdul ba'i don gyi phyir cho ga'i rgyal po 'di ngas gsungs la rgya cher rnam par dbye ba
239b7(rgyud 'bum): byas na sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir yin no/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/ sngags dang phyag rgya dang nges par sdom
239b8(rgyud 'bum): pa dang las dang cho ga'i le'u rab 'byam las/ sum bcu rtsa gcig pa rdzogs s+ho// // de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas gzhan yang thams cad dang ldan pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la
240a1(rgyud 'bum): gzigs nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal mdor na nyon cig phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid dang sngags rnams kyi rgya che ba dang dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'i mdor bsdus pa dang dam tshig
240a2(rgyud 'bum): la rjes su 'jug cing phyag rgya'i gnas dang sngags thams cad dang rgyud de dag thams cad la gsang ba dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor ni/ rdzu 'phrul che kun sangs rgyas kyis/ /'di kun sngar ni gsungs pa yin/ /sngags shes bdag
240a3(rgyud 'bum): nyid chen po dang / /yon tan kun kyang bstan pa yin/ /dang po'i sangs rgyas dag gis sngar/ /sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir/ /sngags kyi 'khor lo dag dang ni/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bla med bskor/ /yang dag mtha'
240a4(rgyud 'bum): la brten nas ni/ /zhi ba'i 'khor lo'i rjes su song / /'jig rten sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul che/ /sangs rgyas de kun zhi bar gshegs/ /dang po'i de bzhin gshegs rnams kyis/ /'di kun sngon ni bstan pa yin/ /
240a5(rgyud 'bum): ngas kyang phyi ma'i dus dag tu/ /'jam pa'i blo ldan khyod la bstan/ /sangs rgyas 'od can de yi bka'/ /de tshe 'di ni thos nas kyang / /'jam pa'i dbyangs ni gzhon nu yang / /thal mo sbyar byas spyan sngar 'dug /
240a6(rgyud 'bum): rkang gnyis rdzogs sangs rgyas pa la/ /smra ba'i mchog gis yongs su zhus/ /'jig rten rnams la phan pa'i phyir/ /shes rab chen po chos gsungs shig /mdor bsdus rgya ni mi che bar/ /yon tan bdag nyid che 'bras
240a7(rgyud 'bum): 'byung / /'jam dpal gyis ni de skad gsol/ /de nas cang mi smra bar gnas/ /de nas dpal ldan tshangs pa'i dbyangs/ /ka la ping ka'i sgra skad kyis/ /dkyil 'khor dgod pa'i phyag rgya ni/ /de dag kun ni ston pa
240a8(rgyud 'bum): yin/ /gnas gtsang steng du gnas pa'i dus/ /de tshe sngags dang rgyud dag ni/ /shAkya seng ge mi mchog ni/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis yang dag gsungs/ /phyag rgya'i cho ga 'byung ba dang / /phyag rgya rgyud dang ldan pa yi/ /
240b1(rgyud 'bum): yon tan bdag nyid rgya che ba/ /'jam dpal gzhon nu khyod nyon cig /sems can sems can ma yin pa'ang / /dang po'i rtags mtshan bzhin du bya/ /rnam pa spyad dang spyod pa dang / /zur gyis thams cad smra ba dang / /
240b2(rgyud 'bum): lag gnyis rkang gnyis spyi bo dang / /lag gcig sor mo'i sbyor ba dag /sngon gyi sangs rgyas de dag gis/ /de kun phyag rgya zhes su gsungs/ /bya bum gdugs dang de bzhin du/ /pad ma rgyal mtshan ba dan dang / /
240b3(rgyud 'bum): nya dang rdo rje dung dang ni/ /de bzhin bum pa 'khor lo dang / /'jig rten sna tshogs mtshon cha ni/ /ji srid yongs su bstan pa dang / /ut+pal 'dra ba'i phyag rgya dang / /de kun phyag rgya dkyil 'khor dgod/ /de dag go rims
240b4(rgyud 'bum): gnas pa dang / /cho ga ldan par bstan pa yin/ /rtag tu de dag nyid la ni/ /rang gzugs 'dra bar bri bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor phyag rgyar gsungs pa ni/ /thams cad du ni spyir gsungs pa'o/ /de dag phyag rgyar yongs
240b5(rgyud 'bum): bstan pa/ /gnas ni ji bzhin dag la dgod/ /dkyil 'khor dag ni kun la yang / /rang dang 'dra ba nyid du sbyar/ /'khor los sgyur la 'khor lo dang / /gtsug tor gdugs dkar nyid la ni/ /gtso bor gdugs ni dkar po
240b6(rgyud 'bum): yin/ /dkyil 'khor la ni rtag tu bri/ /chos kyi 'khor lo sangs rgyas la/ /pad ma pad ma'i rigs dag la/ /rdo rje rdo rje'i rigs la gsungs/ /glang po glang po'i rigs zhes bya/ /nor bu'i rigs la bum pa ste/ /dkyil 'khor
240b7(rgyud 'bum): kun la rab tu sbyar/ /lha gzhan gyi ni rigs dag la/ /dpal be'u bkra shis ldan pa bri/ /tshangs pa che la ngang pa bri/ /brgya byin la yang rdo rje dang / /dbang phyug che la bri ba ni/ /rtse gsum khyu mchog yang dag bya/ /skem byed rtse gsum
240b8(rgyud 'bum): paT+Ti sa/ /mdung dang bcas pa nyid kyang yin/ /khyab 'jug 'khor lo bri ba ste/ /lha ma yin la da pus dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs brgya phrag ni/ /lha yi mtshon cha sna tshogs dang / /de dag gzhan yang bzhon pa ni/ /rnam pa sna tshog+sa
241a1(rgyud 'bum): de tshe bri/ /gzugs brnyan ji ltar gnas pa ni/ /rang gzugs 'phos pa bzhin du bri/ /dkyil 'khor dag ni thams cad du/ /gang yang rung ba 'di cig bri/ /gcig dang gnyis dang yang dag ldan/ /grangs med gsum
241a2(rgyud 'bum): la sogs pa bya/ /dkyil 'khor rgyal ba mchog gsungs pa/ /lan kan phreng ni de dang mnyam/ /gang gi ched du dkyil 'khor gsungs/ /de ni dbus su nges par sbyar/ /rgyal ba'i rigs ni nang du bri/ /nang gi dbus su'ang sangs
241a3(rgyud 'bum): rgyas te/ /de tshe nang du'ang gzugs brnyan ni/ /ston pa yi ni kun tu bri/ /gnyis par pad ma'i rigs dgod cing / /gsum par rdo rje'i rigs kyang bri/ /mthar gyis lha dang lha ma yin/ /de bzhin de tshe thams cad ni/ /de nas
241a4(rgyud 'bum): sa kun la gnas pa'i/ /gnod sbyin srin po mi dang bcas/ /mthar gyis ji ltar gnas pa yi/ /mu stegs rnams kyang de nas bri/ /cho ga bzhin du thams cad kyang / /phyogs skyong de bzhin bri bar bya/ /mdor na gzugs
241a5(rgyud 'bum): brnyan gcig dang ni/ /gnyis dang gsum sogs grangs med pa/ /mtha' yas phyogs la gnas pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor ji srid kun tu bri/ /ma mo'i dkyil 'khor nyid dag ni/ /tshad med de tshe bri bar bya/ /gzugs brnyan gcig la sogs
241a6(rgyud 'bum): pa ni/ /mtha' yas sa yi steng dag tu/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga gsungs pa ni/ /rnam pa gsum du nges bstan pa/ /mchog dang bar ma de bzhin du/ /tha ma nyid du'ang bstan pa yin/ /mchog la mchog dag grub pa dang / /'bring la
241a7(rgyud 'bum): 'bring du nye bar bstan/ /tha mas phran tshegs grub par ni/ /rgyal ba mchog gis sngon gsungs so/ /sems can yid ni rnam gsum gyis/ /rgyal ba mchog gis grub par gsungs/ /sems can chen pos chen po 'grub/ /
241a8(rgyud 'bum): sems can 'bring gis 'bring dang ni/ /gsum pa skye bo phra mo yi/ /las ni phra mor nye bar bstan/ /sangs rgyas nyid du sems dang la/ /phun sum tshogs pa dam pa ni/ /nges par thob par 'gyur ba ste/ /sems can dkyil 'khor mthong
241b1(rgyud 'bum): bas so/ /de dus sems ni bar ma yis/ /rang rgyal byang chub thob par byed/ /gus pa med pas nyan thos nyid/ /tha mas nges par thob par byed/ /bdag nyid chen po don bcas 'bras/ /zhi ba'i 'gro bar nye bar bstan/ /dkyil 'khor
241b2(rgyud 'bum): mthong bas mtho ris su/ /nges par de ni 'gro bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin phyag rgya mchog kun dang / /sngags rnams kyang ni rgya cher bcas/ /rnam gsum nyid kyang rab sbyar ba/ /rnam gsum bde ba rab tu byed/ /phyag rgya dkyil
241b3(rgyud 'bum): 'khor gsungs pa dang / /sngags rnams bstan pa'ang phan pa'i don/ /de dag rnam pa gsum du 'gyur/ /sngags kyang rnam gsum mnyam par bstan/ /ji ltar dkyil 'khor bstan pa bzhin/ /phyag rgya sngags kyang
241b4(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin te/ /'di dag cho gar yang dag ldan/ /'jig rten 'dren pas nges par bstan/ /de bzhin de yang rnam gsum 'gro/ /stong phrag dag ni du ma nyid/ /rnam gsum rnam pa gsum dag kyang / /rnam pa gnyis dang grangs
241b5(rgyud 'bum): med pa'o/ /gang phyir sngags ni sems la ltos/ /sngags ni sems kyis spangs mi bya/ /sems dang sngags ni yang dag ldan/ /lhan cig tu ni bsgrub par bya/ /de bzhin gshegs kyi rigs sngags dang / /gang yang pad ma'i
241b6(rgyud 'bum): rigs dag dang / /gang yang rdo rje'i rigs gsungs dang / /mi yi rigs ni nyid dag dang / /'jig rten pa yi sngags rnams kun/ /de dag ma lus 'di las byung / /gang zhig rgyal dang rgyal sras sngags/ /sems can phyir ni gsungs pa
241b7(rgyud 'bum): rnams/ /gang zhig de zlos mngon brtson pa'ang / /de nas nges par sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /gang yang sngags ni bar ma dag /gang zhig zlos pa de zlo byed/ /rang sangs rgyas su yang dag bstan/ /nges par de yi rigs kyang yin/ /sngags
241b8(rgyud 'bum): ni tha mar rab zhugs pa/ /nyan thos dgra bcom gyis bshad dang / /'jig rten ma lus kun la yang / /sngags zlos pa la mngon brtson pa/ /nyan thos rdzu 'phrul chen po yis/ /nges par rigs su de gnas yin/ /mchog dang
242a1(rgyud 'bum): tha ma bar ma yi/ /der yang las ni rab sbyar bya/ /zhi bas sangs rgyas byang chub 'gyur/ /rgyas pa yis ni rang rgyal te/ /gzhan pa phran tshegs las kyis ni/ /nyan thos kyi ni byang chub brjod/ /de ni rnam gsum dbye ba ste/ /der yang
242a2(rgyud 'bum): sems ni blta bar bya/ /mang por yang ni dbye bya ste/ /grangs med par yang dbye bas so/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las phyag
242a3(rgyud 'bum): rgya dang / sngags dang / las thams cad dang nges par sdom pa'i le'u rab 'byam las sum bcu rtsa gnyis pa rdzogs s+ho// // de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon phyag na rdo rje 'khor der 'dus par gyur te/ 'dug pa de
242a4(rgyud 'bum): stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gang bcom
242a5(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje'i gshed ces bya bas bshad pa de'i cho ga rgya che ba bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la'ang bka'
242a6(rgyud 'bum): ma stsal bas/ bcom ldan 'das bdag dang phyi ma'i skye bo la gzigs nas/ bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das te/ bstan pa nub pa'i dus la bab ste/ 'jigs pa chen po rtsod pa'i dus tha ma la
242a7(rgyud 'bum): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dag med pa na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yang dag par bsrung ba'i phyir dang / chos kyi khams yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir dang / rgyal po ma rungs pa
242a8(rgyud 'bum): thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir dang / dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa byed pa dag tshar gcad pa'i phyir dang / gdul bya'i sems can la bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i thabs mkhas pa bstan pa'i phyir dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
242b1(rgyud 'bum): spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sems can yongs su smin pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i phyir dang / bcom ldan 'das phyi ma'i dus dang phyi ma'i dus su bstan pa rnam par 'jig
242b2(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ba na/ gang 'di khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed kyi cho ga ji lta ba bzhin gsungs pa rab tu sbyar na de la grub par 'gyur te/ nges par rgyal po ma rungs pa bstan pa la gnod pa byed pa dang /
242b3(rgyud 'bum): sems can phyogs chen po dang ldan pa dang spro ba chen po dang ldan pa rnams tshar gcad pa dang rjes su gzung ba la rab tu zhugs pa dang snying rje chen po dang bral ba de dag la khro bo'i rgyal po 'di rab tu sbyar
242b4(rgyud 'bum): bar bya'i gzhan dag la ni ma yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba'i byin gyis rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur
242b5(rgyud 'bum): gyur pa'ang cang mi smra bar gnas par gyur to/ /thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yang rnam pa drug tu rab tu 'gul bar gyur to/ /lha tshogs dag kyang 'jigs par gyur/ /byis pa kun kyang rab tu dngangs/ /
242b6(rgyud 'bum): lha rnams kun dang klu dag dang / /lha min dbang dang ma mor bcas/ /gza' rnams kun gyi gtso bo dang / /lha tshogs mi dang bcas pa dang / /ma rungs sems ldan srul po dag /rab 'gul yid ni mi brtan
242b7(rgyud 'bum): gyur/ /mi yi bdag po gdug ldan sems/ /de dag nyam thag 'jigs par gyur/ /chos kyi rgyal po'i bstan pa la/ /de tshe de dag skyabs su song / /gnod sbyin gsang ba'i bdag po ni/ /'od chen
242b8(rgyud 'bum): phyag na rdo rje dang / /gzhon nur gyur pa'i sngags rgyal dang / /'jam dpal dbyangs la'ang de 'jigs nas/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi drung du ni/ /de tshe de dag dam tshig blangs/ /ma rungs sngags ni mi bzad

243a2(rgyud 'bum): 'od chen byis pa'i gzugs/ /byang chub sems dpa' des smras pa/ /lha dang gnod sbyin srin po dang / /lha min thams cad ma 'jigs shig /mi dang mi ma yin pa dang / /'byung po ma lus lha rnams

243a4(rgyud 'bum): kyis gsung sngags dang ni/ /gtsug tor spyan la sogs pa'o/ /'jig rten gsum la 'khor lo rgyal/ /gzi brjid phung po dam pa rgyal/ /rnam rgyal gtsug tor gsang sngags dang / /phyag na pad ma rnam

243a7(rgyud 'bum): dran par gyis/ /gshin rje gshed ces bya ba yi/ /khro bo'i gtso bo de yang dran/ /mgon po spyan ras gzigs pa yi/ /thugs ni thugs rje byung ba dang / /thugs rje chen pos thugs brlan par/ /sangs rgyas snga
243a8(rgyud 'bum): mas gsungs pa'ang dran/ /sgrol ma skye bo sgrol bar ni/ /spyan ras gzigs kyis gsungs pa dang / /rtag dang ting 'dzin skyes 'phags ma/ /ming gi gzugs ni bstan pa'ang yin/ /byang chub sems bzhin spyod

243b2(rgyud 'bum): tshul gyis lus can la/ /de tshe sems can 'dul byed cing / /byang chub theg par sbyor bar byed/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ni/ /bsam zhing bstan par mi nus so/ /phyag na rdo rje dpa' bo ni/ /sngags rnams
243b3(rgyud 'bum): kun gyi bdag po'ang dran/ /bdag ma rig 'dzin lha mo ni/ /'jig rten gsum gyis rab mchod dang / /lu gu rgyud dang 'og bag ma/ /rdo rje khu tshur snyan ldan ma/ /khro dbang thig le dkar mo dang / /dbyug sngon 'jigs par
243b4(rgyud 'bum): byed dang bcas/ /'di dag khro mo pho nya'i tshogs/ /rigs ma'i spyan du rab tu bstan/ /rdo rje'i rigs la gtso bo ste/ /gang zhig dran na phan zhing srung / /byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che/ /'jig
243b5(rgyud 'bum): rten dag na spos glang dang / /byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che/ /blo ldan mthu chen thob dang ni/ /sras kyi thu bo gtso bo ni/ /kun tu bzang po dge ba ste/ /de tshe gang gis dran gyur pa/ /de la 'jigs pa yod
243b6(rgyud 'bum): ma yin/ /rtag tu de tshe nor bzang dang / /gnod sbyin dam pa dzam b+ha la/ /nyan thos rang rgyas ma lus pa/ /dran na 'jigs pa ga la yod/ /kun nas de dag mchod byas na/ /srung ba chen por rab tu bstan/ /
243b7(rgyud 'bum): de tshe 'bras bu che lha dang / /bsod nams skyes dang 'du shes med/ /gzugs med gzugs can lha dag dang / /rdzu 'phrul chen po 'dod chags bral/ /dkon mchog gsum la mchod byed dang / /rgyal ba'i bstan la
243b8(rgyud 'bum): rab dang ba/ /sngags dang dgra la rtag 'jigs pa/ /de dag la ni cung zad med/ /de ltar dam tshig rgyud gsungs pa/ /sngags pa kun gyis sgom min te/ /'di ni khro rgyal mchog ces pa/ /gshin
244a1(rgyud 'bum): rje gshed kyis brjod pa yin/ /sems can dam tshig la gnas na/ /mi ni ma lus gnod mi nus/ /lha dang lha min thams cad dag /de nas yid ni dga' gyur nas/ /rgyal ba'i sras kyis rab bskul nas/ /thams cad dam tshig bstan gnas

245b4(rgyud 'bum): bar bya/ /zhag chen po yi zhag dang ni/ /shin tu dmar ba'i tshon bsres bri/ /mtshon rtsi'i snod du thod pa bya/ /mi yi rus pas pir shing bya/ /shi ba'i skra las byas pa yis/ /pir dang pir ni bcing ba'ang bya/ /
