245b7(rgyud 'bum): med mi bya'o/ /mdor na dpa' bo'i rin du ni/ /ji ltar 'dod pa de la bya/ /bzo yi las ni 'bras bcas bya/ /kha zas med pa'ang rnam par spang / /ji ltar de ni yang dag dga'/ /de lta de ltar rab tu sbyar/ /srung ba chen po
245b8(rgyud 'bum): 'ang rab tu bya/ /gzhan du de ni 'chi 'gyur zhing / /bzo bo bza' dang bcas 'jigs pas/ /bdag gis kyang ni mngon par bsrung / /rigs pa bzlas nas bya ba ste/ /gzhan du cho gar brjod pa min/ /ras ris yongs su gsal byas pa'am/ /
246a1(rgyud 'bum): yid la 'dod pa byas mthong na/ /gdug pa'i dgra rnams 'joms byed pa'i/ /las ni thams cad byed par 'gyur/ /ras ris mchog blangs 'gro ba ni/ /ji ltar 'dod pa'am gar 'dod pa'o/ /phyogs chen rgyal po chen po dang / /
246a2(rgyud 'bum): sems can de ni dregs bcas dang / /mngon pa'i nga rgyal nga rgyal che/ /gdug dang gdug pa'i las rnams dang / /dkon mchog gsum la gnod byed dang / /chad par smra dang sngags spangs dang / /sngags rnams mchod par mi
246a3(rgyud 'bum): byed dang / /de la dad rten smod pa dang / /gang yang zlos pa smod byed dang / /de bzhin mchod rten khyad du gsod/ /cho ga mthong ba'i las kyis ni/ /de dag la ni sbyor ba bya/ /sems can kun dang skyob pa la/ /rtag tu de bzhin chos mi ldan/ /de dag
246a4(rgyud 'bum): la ni las rab sbyar/ /'phral du srog ni 'gag par byed/ /lung tang 'bras bu sngags bzlas blangs/ /rtsa ba dang ni shun pa'ang blang / /'bras bu'i rang skyur yang dag ldan/ /mi yi rus phye legs btags dang / /yungs mar dang ni
246a5(rgyud 'bum): dug nyid dang / /star bu dad ni lang tang tshe/ /ske tshe dang yang khrag nyid kyang / /mi las yang dag byung ba dag /thams cad blangs nas yang dag ldan/ /ras ris dben pa'i phyogs su bzhag /sgrub po lho phyogs mngon bltas nas/ /ris
246a6(rgyud 'bum): ris kyang ni byang du bstan/ /me thab ji 'dod byas nas ni/ /tsha zhing skam pa'i shing dag gis/ /me thab de la mnyam bzhag nas/ /dur khrod me yi sbar bar bya/ /thams cad ldan pas bsreg byas na/ /cho gar bstan pa'i sbyin
246a7(rgyud 'bum): sreg yin/ /khro bo'i rgyal po'i sngags kyis ni/ /me lha dag ni spyan drang bya/ /las rnams dag ni kun la'ang 'dir/ /mdung gi phyag rgya bcing bar bya/ /me thab la ni khror bcas pas/ /rtsa brgyad stong gis sreg blugs sbyin/ /dang por
246a8(rgyud 'bum): bu dag 'chi ba ni/ /sems can zhugs nas de bzhin 'gyur/ /gnyis pa la ni chung ma dang / /'khor dang gtso bor bcas pa'ang yin/ /de la gsum par 'chi ba ni/ /gang gi ched du de byas pa'o/ /gang tshe mtshan
246b1(rgyud 'bum): phyed bzlas pa ni/ /ras ris mdun du byed pa yang / /dgra rnams gsad par bya phyir te/ /de ni de dang mthun par 'gyur/ /de yi yul 'khor 'jig par 'gyur/ /dpung yang 'chi bar 'gyur ba ste/ /mes tshig rlung ni chen po dang / /
246b2(rgyud 'bum): char chen dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur/ /thams cad bsdus pa'i tshogs dag ni/ /pha rol tshogs kyis gnod par 'gyur/ /de la gnod pa sna tshogs dang / /nad chen dag gis yang dag khyab/ /rgyal po de yi lus kun kyang / /skam par
246b3(rgyud 'bum): 'di la the tshom med/ /de yi khyim ni thams cad kyang / /mi ma yin pas yang dag dkrugs/ /mal du brtan pa mi rnyed cing / /sa yi steng du'ang 'khor bar 'gyur/ /srin po yi dags sha rjen zas/ /de yi khyim ni yongs su bskor/ /
246b4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad du ni nyam thag 'jigs/ /sdug bsngal drag pos sdug bsngal 'gyur/ /sa steng lha yi dbang phyug sogs/ /de yi srung ba byed mi nus/ /'jig rten skyong ba tshangs sogs dang / /brgya byin sogs pa sum cu'i dbang / /
246b5(rgyud 'bum): sngags kun lha dang bcas pa dang / /'jig rten kun las byung ba'ang rung / /nga rgyal gyis 'khrugs ma rungs dgra/ /de yi 'tsho ba de mthar byed/ /mtshan phyed nyi ma gung dag la/ /gang du khros nas zlos byed pa/ /gshin rje khros pa
246b6(rgyud 'bum): mngon sum ltar/ /bsrung bar yang ni rung ma yin/ /mar ngo'i zla phyed ci 'dod par/ /sa steng ras ris bzhag nas ni/ /gtor ma mchod pa che bya ba/ /dur khrod dgon pa'i gnas dang ni/ /shing gcig de bzhin rtags dang ni/ /
246b7(rgyud 'bum): brag dang bas mtha' phug kyang rung / /gcig pu gnyis su med par yang / /rtag tu las rnams yang dag brtsams/ /dgon pa chen po dben pa dang / /lha yi khang pa stong pa dang / /khang stong dang ni chu bo dang / /rgya mtsho'i 'gram la brten pa dang / /grong khyer de dang
246b8(rgyud 'bum): nye ba dang / /der gnas yang na ci 'dod par/ /dpag tshad brgya yi tshad tsam nas/ /rtag tu las rnams bya ba yin/ /gtsang ba'i yul ni brgya dag dang / /tshad med yul du gnas pa'ang rung / /sngags kyi rdzu 'phrul bsam mi khyab/ /zlos
247a1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i grub pa bsam mi khyab/ /las ni bsam mi khyab par snang / /'bras bu'ang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /gshin rje gshed ni bdag nyid che/ /khro bo'i rgyal po bsam mi khyab/ /las dang rdzu 'phrul yul dang ni/ /rnam par 'phrul
247a2(rgyud 'bum): ba che 'byung ba/ /bsam gyis mi khyab zlos pa yis/ /sa steng 'di la grub pa snang / /byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che/ /kun gyis bsrung bar yong mi nus/ /'jig rten pa yi sngags rnams dang / /gza' dang ma mo smos ci dgos/ /dbang ldan
247a3(rgyud 'bum): dang ni khyab 'jug gam/ /skem byed dang ni brgya byin dang / /rgyal dang rgyal ba'i sras dag ni/ /dam tshig 'dzin par byed pa dang / /sa bcu la ni yang dag gnas/ /byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid che/ /gang zhig dgra bcom rang rgyal dang / /rdzu
247a4(rgyud 'bum): 'phrul chen po chags bral ba/ /dam tshig sngon byas de dag gis/ /bsrung bar yang ni mi nus so/ /mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya/ /'byor pa 'dod pas mnyan par gyis/ /zlos pa sems ni ma dang na/ /gzhan gyis nus par mi 'gyur ro/ /
247a5(rgyud 'bum): sngags pa mchog ni mi dga' na/ /de 'dir zhi ba ga la yod/ /bdag nyid chen po gshin rje gshed/ /khro bo'i rgyal po zlos pa po/ /gang tshe yid ni dang ba dang / /gang tshe snying rje brlan gyur pa/ /de tshe de ni zhi thob pa'am/ /brtan pa'am 'tsho
247a6(rgyud 'bum): ba 'dzin par 'gyur/ /bi rtsu marda yung mar dang / /rang skyur dug dang ldan pa ni/ /khrag dang mi yi sha dang ni/ /lan tshwa tsha ba gsum dang ni/ /ske tshe dug gi phye ma dang / /star bu dang ni sram gyi sha /lang tang tse yi rtsa ba dang / /de bzhin ko sha ta ka'i dang / /e ren da rtsa
247a7(rgyud 'bum): nas tshig thal/ /le brgan rtsi dang gze ma dang / /po son cha yi rtsa ba dang / /de bzhin sgog skya ke'u dang / /gzhan gyi zhag dang chu dang ni/ /kun dong chang ni btung bar bcas/ /'di kun cha mnyam byas nas ni/ /ras ris nye bar sbyin sreg bya/ /sbyin sreg stong
247a8(rgyud 'bum): rtsa brgyad byas na/ /zla ba phyed kyi nang du ni/ /bu dang gnyen sdug bcas pa yi/ /dgra rnams rtsad nas 'jig 'gyur te/ /'khor kun ma lus 'joms par byed/ /gnyis pa'i nang du sbyin sreg byas/ /de yi rtsad nas 'byin par byed/ /zlos pas me nang sbyin sreg
247b1(rgyud 'bum): byas/ /gsum pa'i dus su phyin pa na/ /de yi grong rdal bcas de la/ /mu ge dag ni 'byung ba dang / /char mi 'bab cing 'chi ba mang / /srin pos kun tu khyab pa dang / /mes tshig rdo yi char 'bab dang / /rdo rje dang ni thog kyang 'bab/ /ljongs dang phyogs dang
247b2(rgyud 'bum): yul dang ni/ /ji snyed rgyal po de la yod/ /'tshe ba mang po rab 'byung zhing / /de bzhin gzhan gyi dmag tshogs 'byung / /de yi yul du 'tshe ba ni/ /du ma mang po dag kyang 'byung / /dpal min mang po rab ston pa/ /rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung bar
247b3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ /lad tang rtsa bas sbyin sreg byas/ /de la rims nad 'byung bar 'gyur/ /tsha bas rtag tu sbyin sreg byas/ /tsha ba chen po skye bar 'gyur/ /shin tu skyur bas sbyin sreg byas/ /grang ba'i rims ni yang dag 'byung / /ma rungs rgyal po stobs kyis dregs/ /
247b4(rgyud 'bum): de yi lus la de dag 'gyur/ /phyogs che nor dang ldan pa dang / /gdug cing dpung chen yang dag gnas/ /de yi 'tsho ba tha ma ni/ /nub gnyis yang na bdun gyis so/ /gang zhig gang la dad lha'am/ /skyes pa'i skar ma ming yang rung / /ras ris
247b5(rgyud 'bum): mdun du gzugs bya ba/ /dur khrod sol bas bris pa la/ /mgo la rdog pas mnan nas ni/ /khro bas bzlas pa brtsam par bya/ /glo bur rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i/ /mi yi bdag po zug gzer 'byung / /nad chen pos ni thebs 'gyur te/ /de yi
247b6(rgyud 'bum): mod la'ang 'chi bar 'gyur/ /yang na dgra stas gcod pa'am/ /yan lag kyang ni mi tshang 'gyur/ /sdig can mi ma yin pa yi/ /srin po gdug pas za bar 'gyur/ /bdag gi 'khor dang bcas pa dag /sha rjen za dang srul po dang / /sha za yi
247b7(rgyud 'bum): dgas ma mo yis/ /de yi mod la'ang gsod par byed/ /de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang / /de tshe 'khor la 'di skad smras/ /sangs rgyas kun la phyag 'tshal nas/ /de nas cang mi smra bar gnas/ /'jig rten rnams la phan 'dod phyir/ /'di skad du ni
247b8(rgyud 'bum): yang smras pa/ /gnod sbyin mo ni thams cad dang / /gnod sbyin kun tshogs bos nas ni/ /de tshe gnod sbyin bdag po ste/ /byang chub sems dpa' smras pa ni/ /gnod sbyin rnams kyis ras ris smras/ /'dod pa kun dang nye bar ldan/ /'gugs par byed dang dbang
248a1(rgyud 'bum): byed kun/ /zug rngu ma lus yang dag 'byin/ /sngags pa gang tshe 'khrig pa 'dod/ /'dod chags ldongs pa'am rmongs pa'i blos/ /bder gshegs bkas kyang bzlog pa dang / /gnyen pos kyang ni mi nus so/ /thog ma med pa'i 'khor
248a2(rgyud 'bum): ba nas/ /shin tu sdug bsngal rgyu sngon byas/ /de dag sdug bsngal sdug bsngal bar/ /snying rje chen pos 'gro ba gdungs/ /tshangs spyod dbang po dul bas ni/ /bde 'gro dag ni thob par 'gyur/ /bzang po shis par bstan pa dang / /mthar ni zhi ba'ang thob
248a3(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ /theg pa gsum la brten nas ni/ /mya ngan 'das pa legs pa 'thob/ /bzlog pa blo ngan gyis zin pa/ /'dod chags kyis ldongs bka' thub med/ /'khor ba mi zad tshang tshing gi/ /'gro ba lngar ni 'khor bar 'gyur/ /de dag sdug bsngal
248a4(rgyud 'bum): ldan don du/ /'dod pa'i longs spyod rjod par byed/ /khro bo 'di ni mnyes byas na/ /sdig pa kun las ldog par 'gyur/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo
248a5(rgyud 'bum): las/ khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed kyi mngon spyod dang legs par sdom pa'i le'u rab 'byam las sum cu rtsa bzhi pa rdzogs s+ho// // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid
248a6(rgyud 'bum): du 'dus shing 'dug par gyur pa de stan las langs te/ sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal nas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug ste/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas
248a7(rgyud 'bum): zhabs gnyis la btud de/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje de la bltas nas tshig 'di smras so/ /phyag na rdo rje gang khyod sems can thams cad la gnod par byed pa dang / 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i sngags dang rgyud bshad na/ kye rgyal
248a8(rgyud 'bum): ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi nges par chos 'di ni ma yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gang gi phyir snying rje chen pos rab tu phye zhing / byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod cing sems can thams cad kyi don gyi
248b1(rgyud 'bum): phyir/ phan pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa la rab tu zhugs na 'khor ba'i 'ching ba las grol bar 'gyur ro/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang sems can la gnod par byed pa'i chos ston pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
248b2(rgyud 'bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ni sems can thams cad kyi ched du gsungs pa ma yin te/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i phyir sems can thams cad la phan pa'i lhag pa'i
248b3(rgyud 'bum): bsam pa la rab tu zhugs pa yin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros la smras pa/ ji ltar khyod smras pa dang ji ltar khyod rab tu ston pa de bzhin du zhi ba'i
248b4(rgyud 'bum): blo gros byang chub sems dpas bslab par bya/ de bzhin du bsgrub par bya/ ji ltar sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa de bzhin du bdag gis kyang bstan par bgyi'o/ /don dam par ni yang dag pa'i
248b5(rgyud 'bum): mtha' la yang dag par brten nas chos kyi mtha' las grol ba thob par 'gyur ro/ /sems can mtha' ni bsam mi khyab/ /rnam par smin pa'ang bsam mi khyab/ /sangs rgyas chos kyang bsam mi khyab/ /byang chub spyod pa
248b6(rgyud 'bum): 'ang bsam mi khyab/ /gdul ba'i sems can la brten nas/ /phan pa'i spyod pa bsam mi khyab/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnams/ /bsam mi khyab par yongs su bstan/ /rgyud rnams kun la rgyud 'di yi/ /mthu ni bsam gyis mi khyab yin/ /
248b7(rgyud 'bum): gshin rje gshed ni bdag nyid che/ /khro bo'i rgyal po'i sngags dag dang / /yul gsum dag kyang bsam mi khyab/ /rtogs pa'i bdag nyid bsam mi khyab/ /zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spyod pa ni
248b8(rgyud 'bum): bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rgyu mthun pa las byung ba'i sgrub pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /zhi ba'i blo gros byang chub sems dpa' sngags zlos pa na 'di ltar sems bskyed par bya ste/ 'phags pa ma yin pa'i
249a1(rgyud 'bum): s ems can 'dod pa la lhag par chags pas bsod nams ma yin pa shin tu rab tu mang por 'phel bas dmyal ba chen por skye zhing sems can 'di dag ni bsod nams kyi phung po shin tu mang po 'di
249a2(rgyud 'bum): 'phel bar mi 'gyur ro/ /sems can 'di dag byang chub rnam pa gsum gyi skal ba med par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir/ zhi ba'i blo gros de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sngags zlos pas sems nye bar gzhag par bya zhing
249a3(rgyud 'bum): thabs mkhas pa 'di la mngon spyod kyi las rab tu sbyar bar bya'o/ /las thams cad la yang mtshan mar 'dzin par mi bya'o/ /mi dge bar 'dzin par mi bya zhing snying rjes brlan pa'i sems kyis sems can gdul ba'i
249a4(rgyud 'bum): thabs la yang bslab par bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang chos dang chos ma yin pa dang / dkar po dang / nag po dang / dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / 'gro ba'i bdag nyid chen po sems can 'dul ba'i thabs sgrub
249a5(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / chos kyi dbyings sgrub pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu rtogs par 'gyur te/ de nyid chos ston pas sems can smin pa'i thabs kyang rab tu sgrub par byed do/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du bdag cag gis bslab
249a6(rgyud 'bum): par bya zhing / 'di lta ste/ sems can gdul ba dang sems can smin pa dang bstan par bya ba'i phyir dang de la rgyal ba'i sras khyed cag gang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'dir dam tshig chen po la zhugs pa de thams cad kyis mnyan par bya/ dad
249a7(rgyud 'bum): par bya de nyid dge ba dang mi dge ba tshol ba nyid du bya ste/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston pa la mngon par dga' bar bya'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo gros kyis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag
249a8(rgyud 'bum): na rdo rje la rnam par bltas nas cang mi smra bar gyur te/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo zhes yid la byas nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rnam par lta bzhin du rang gi stan la 'dug par gyur to/ /de nas
249b1(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la rnam par bltas nas khro bo'i rgyal po'i cho ga yang smras pa/ gang dag lha'i tshogs dang sems can gyi khams la brten pa'i 'byung po'i tshogs khyed cag
249b2(rgyud 'bum): nyon cig / dang por re zhig bsrung ba byas la khro bo'i rgyal po'i ras ris de yongs su blangs la/ gnas dben par song nas dbang phyug chen po'i rtags gcig pa'i gnas su rtags de la dug dang khrag dang ske tshe dang / rang skyur gyis gtor
249b3(rgyud 'bum): la shing bi tsu mar da'i me tog gis mchod cing mi'i rgyu ma rlon pa dag gis bdag nyid la mchod phyir thogs byas la/ mi'i mgo bo'i thod pa g.yas pa'i lag pa na thogs pas brdegs pa lta bur byas la/ lag pa g.yon pa'i sdigs
249b4(rgyud 'bum): mdzub kyis mtshon gcig po la sdigs pa bzhin du byed cing gtsor khro ba'i dbang du gyur pa dang rgyal po ma rungs pas brnyas pa chen po'i sems kyis byas pa'am/ gzhan skyon can gyi skyes bu phyogs chen po dang ldan pa dang nor chen po dang
249b5(rgyud 'bum): ldan pa dang rab tu gtum pa chen po dang gtso bo chen po dag gis khyad du gsod par 'gyur na/ sgo bcad pa byas la/ gcer bur byas shing skra bshig pas dbang phyug chen po'i mtshan la khro bo'i sngags ji srid dbang phyug chen po'i mtshan
249b6(rgyud 'bum): dkyil du gas par gyur pa de srid du bzlas pa bya'o/ /dum bu gnyis su gyur na yi ge hU~M gi sgra chen po yang thos par 'gyur te de la 'jigs par yang mi bya'o/ /de thos pa'i dbang gis rgyal po ma rungs pa'am gzhan gang la la dpung chen
249b7(rgyud 'bum): po dang ldan pa'i dgra de'i mod la rims chen pos zin par 'gyur ba'am/ srin po la sogs pa mi ma yin pas zin par 'gyur ro/ /de nyid du ji srid yud tsam du bzlas pa byas na de'i mod la dgra rnams kyi 'tsho ba ni tha mar 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /gal
249b8(rgyud 'bum): te mtshan mo bzlas na ni gza' 'khor dang bcas pa 'jig par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang las su 'gyur ba ni de bzhin du dbang phyug chen po'i gnas su nyi ma phyed la song ste/ nim pa'i lo mas mchod cing sha chen po'i spos kyis bdug la
250a1(rgyud 'bum): ji srid dgra'i khyim du mes tshig pa'i bar du bzlas pa byas na dgra yang 'dar ba'i rims chen pos thebs par 'gyur ro/ /yang na khros pas bzlas pa ma btang zhing g.yas phyogs su rtags kyang yod na dgra de 'chi bar 'gyur zhing rigs
250a2(rgyud 'bum): rgyud 'jig par 'gyur ro/ /ji ste slar gso bar byed na ni rtags de chus phyir yang rab tu bkrus la shin tu bsil ba'i 'o mas khrus byas na slar yang sos par 'gyur ro/ /las gzhan yang yod de dbang phyug chen po'i mtshan g.yas
250a3(rgyud 'bum): phyogs su bzhag la po son cha'i shing dang tsher ma can gyi shing gis me rab tu sbar la/ shing pA ka~M ta ka'i yam shing la dug dang khrag dang ske tshe la mngon par btags la stong rtsa brgyad kyi sbyin sreg byas na/ dgra thams cad nad chen
250a4(rgyud 'bum): pos thebs par 'gyur te/ las thams cad kyis kyang nus pa med par 'gyur ro/ /zhag gnyis pa la ni rims nad chen po dang zug gzer chen pos thebs pa'am nad rnam pa sna tshogs sam mi ma yin pas zin cing mthar 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /
250a5(rgyud 'bum): zhag gsum pa la grangs gsum gyis byas na ni 'tsho ba thams cad kyi thams cad du 'dor bar 'gyur ro/ /slar gso bar byed na ni 'o ma'i sbyin sreg byas na zhi bar 'gyur ba ni yul mi thams cad dang dgra thams cad kyang sos par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du lha thams cad dam lha mo
250a6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad dam 'byung po thams cad gang zhig gang gi lha la dad pa de rkang pas mnan pa'i las bya ba'am/ /yang na de'i rgyu skar ram sngags sam ming dag la rkang pas mnan la las bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rig pa ni ma gtogs te/ thams cad kyis
250a7(rgyud 'bum): kyang zhabs kyi mthe bo g.yon pa bzung ste las bya'i/ mnan par yang mi bya bgom par yang mi bya'o/ /gang yang 'jig rten pa thams cad kyi sngags ni mnan nas las bya'o/ /khro bo'i rgyal po'i bzlas pa ma grub pa nyid kyang bzlas pa tsam
250a8(rgyud 'bum): kho nas las rnams byed par 'gyur/ sngags thams cad rnam par 'jig par 'gyur/ dgra thams cad 'joms par 'gyur/ sngags thams cad nus pa med par 'gyur ro/ /mdor na 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sngags kyi cho gas kyang ji lta ji ltar rab
250b1(rgyud 'bum): tu sbyar ba de lta de ltar thams cad sgrub par 'gyur/ bzlas pa tsam gyis re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /khro bo'i rgyal po'i sngags 'di bzlas pa tsam kho nas grub pa nyid de grub pa dam pa'ang rjes su
250b2(rgyud 'bum): rab tu sbyin no/ /yid la 'dod pas dgra rnams 'joms par byed do/ /mdung rtse chen po'i phyag rgya dang ldan par byas na las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /las gzhan du'ang 'gyur ba ni nyi ma phyed la dur khrod du song ste/ sreg
250b3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sar mtshan gcig smyung ba byas te/ mar ngo'i bcu bzhi la dur khrod kyi shing gis me rab tu sbar la/ dug dang khrag gis btags pa'i ske tshes sbyin sreg byas na/ de las ha ha zhes pa'i sgra sgrogs shing / yi dags thams cad 'ong bar 'gyur na
250b4(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs par mi bya zhing dgra la gnod par gyis shig ces byas na/ de bzhin du bya'o zhes smras nas mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas yud tsam gyis dpag tshad stong du yang song nas/ dgra rnams 'joms par byed cing rigs rgyud kyang rlag par byed do/ /de la sogs pa'i
250b5(rgyud 'bum): las mang po byed par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang las su 'gyur ba ni dben pa'i phyogs gtsang mar gos gtsang ma bgos te/ /khang stong du rab tu zhugs nas mi'i rus pa'i sreg blugs kyis stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas te/ de nas
250b6(rgyud 'bum): thal ba de lag pa gnyi gas blangs la/ gos gtsang ma'i dum bu la so sor bcings te thum po gnyis su byas la/ kham por kha sbyar gnyis kyi nang du so sor bzhag la/ bdag nyid srung ba chen po byas nas rdzas de blangs
250b7(rgyud 'bum): la/ khyim du slar zhugs nas mtshan mo dur khrod chen por song nas/ mar ngo'i bcu bzhi'am tshes brgyad la mi sreg pa'i sar bzhag cing lho phyogs su bltas nas kham por kha sbyar gnyis blangs la langs shing gcer bur byas te skra
250b8(rgyud 'bum): bshig pa dang khro ba dang bcas pas 'jigs pa med par bya ste/ rig pa stong phrag bcu bzlas pa byas na thal ba de grub par 'gyur ro/ /mi gang su dag rdzas de slong bar gyur na sbyin par mi bya'o/ /gal te tshan khar slong bar byed na ni khro bo'i
251a1(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po dran nas yi ge hU~M rab tu sbyar ba byas na de'i mod la 'byer bar 'gyur ro/ /bgegs thams cad rnam par 'joms pa yang cho ga 'di nyid do/ /lag pa g.yon pa dang g.yas pas blangs pa'i thal bas ni rtags mtshan
251a2(rgyud 'bum): bya zhing bag yod pas bsrung ba yang bya la/ tho rangs nyi ma 'char ba'i dus su slar 'ong bar bya ba na khrus byas shing gtsang zhing gtsang ba'i gos bgos te rang gi khyim du 'jug par bya ste/ rang gi gnas sam ji ltar 'dod par
251a3(rgyud 'bum): 'gro bar bya'o/ /de nas lag pa g.yas pa gang gis blangs pa'i thal ba des mi dang rkang gnyis dang rkang bzhi dang srog chags 'byung po thams cad dang / lha dang bcas pa'i klu dang gnod sbyin rnams kyi spyi bor gtor na dbang du 'gyur ro/ /gang lag pa
251a4(rgyud 'bum): g.yon pas blangs pa'i thal ba des ni mi'i bud med thams cad kyi spyi bor gtor na dbang du 'gyur ro/ /lag pa g.yas pas blangs pa'i thal ba gang yin pa des mi rnams kyi lte ba'i phyogs sam/ pho mtshan gyi phyogs su gtor na grong pa'i chos
251a5(rgyud 'bum): bsten pa la nus pa med par 'gyur ro/ /gang zhig bud med la mngon par chags pa de'i gsang ba'i gnas su thal ba'i phye mas gtor na skyes bu gzhan brten pa la nus pa med par 'gyur ro/ /skyes bu gzhan brten pa na rma med par yang
251a6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ /ji srid rang gi skyes pa nyid thob na ni phyir yang de'i rma'i sgo de rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /'dod pas log par g.yem pa bsten pa la yang nus pa med par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du skyes pa la yang skyes pa'i dbang po la lag
251a7(rgyud 'bum): pa g.yas pas thal ba'i phye mas gtor na/ de yang gzhan gyi bud med la 'gro ba'i nus pa med par 'gyur te/ yongs su rnying pa bzhin du de'i de nyid 'byung zhing gnas par 'gyur ro/ /ji srid du rang gi chung ma de nyid dang yang phrad na phyir
251a8(rgyud 'bum): yang rnying pa med par 'gyur ro/ /skyes pa'am bud med gang la thal ba gtor bar gyur pa de med par 'gyur ba'am med par mi 'gyur ba'o/ /yang na ni ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du byed do/ /gal te nan gyis byed na ni gsang ba'i phyogs su srin bu
251b1(rgyud 'bum): rnams rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / de dag gis zos pa na 'tsho ba yang 'gag par 'gyur la/ zla ba gcig gi nang du rul par 'gyur te/ dri mi zhim zhing ro myags pa 'dra bar 'gyur ro/ /gcin sri ba'i nad la sogs pas skyes bu zin
251b2(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur la/ skrangs nad chen po yang 'byung bar 'gyur te/ gang de dag gi nad kyis dus byed par 'gyur ro/ /yang na gzhan gyi bud med la bsten par 'dod na yang nus pa med par 'gyur ro/ /ji lta ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa de dag
251b3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /gal te gtor ba tsam gyis thal ba dang phrad par ma gyur na/ mthong ba'am ma mthong ba la yang mthun pa'i rlung dang sbyar te thal ba gtor te/ de la thal ba cung zad kyang babs par 'gyur ba'am gtor
251b4(rgyud 'bum): bar byed pas yid kyis bsams te thal ba gtor na/ gang brtsams par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyi las rnams byed par 'gyur ro/ /bdag nyid dam gzhan gyi lag pas gtor na ji ltar 'dod pa de thams cad kyi las byed par 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma
251b5(rgyud 'bum): yin no/ /ji ste gnas mal la sogs pa dang stan dang gos la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs sam bzhon pa dang theg pa dang lham dang gdugs la sogs pa yo byad thams cad dang lhag ma ni bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / bca'
251b6(rgyud 'bum): ba la sogs pa dang lus thams cad la dgos pa'i cha byad thams cad dang / me tog dang so rtsi dang 'bras bu dang spos la sogs pa 'di dag thams cad la thal ba'i phye mas gtor na dgra de dag gi lus la shig dang ma ku ta'i srin bu rnams
251b7(rgyud 'bum): kyis kun nas khyab par 'gyur te/ shing ji lta ba bzhin du za bar 'gyur ro/ /rmi lam ngan pa yang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /zhag bdun gyis kyang 'chi bar 'gyur te/ sman pa thams cad dang lha thams cad kyis kyang bzlog par mi nus so/ /sngags thams cad
251b8(rgyud 'bum): kyis kyang bsrung bar mi nus te/ gang gis thal ba gtor bar byed pa ni ma gtogs so/ /ji ste slar gso ba byed na ni shing mngar dang ut+pa la sngon po dang tsan+dan dkar po gcig tu byas la chu grang mo la btags te/ de nas spyi bo nas
252a1(rgyud 'bum): bzung ste rkang pa'i mthil gyi bar du de'i lus la byugs shing 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i sngags bzlas na sos par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang bud med rnams la/ las su bya ba ni/ 'thun pa'i rlung gi phyogs
252a2(rgyud 'bum): gang du 'dod pa der song nas bud med mkha' 'gro ma ma rungs pa nga rgyal can thams cad la yang sbyor ba bya ste gzhan la ni ma yin no/ /mthun pa'i rlung yod pa de nyid la gnas nas/ bcom ldan 'das yid la bsams te thal bar
252a3(rgyud 'bum): gtor na mo mtshan dang nu ma thams cad mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /skyes pa la'ang kha spu dang ba spu med pa dang mo mtshan dang nu ma yang rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de lta bur rnam pa mang po du ma'i las kyang byed pa'am/ gzhan byed du bcug
252a4(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ /yang na gang dga' ba skye ba de byed du gzhug par 'gyur ro/ /bud med dam skyes pa gang la sems dga' ba skye ba de la thal ba de byin na ji ltar 'dod pa'i las byed du gzhug par 'gyur ro/ /sbyor ba'ang bslab par bya'o/ /
252a5(rgyud 'bum): de ltar nad chen po dag gis kyang 'debs su gzhug par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das yid la bsams nas/ thal ba'i lag pas spyi bor reg na klad pa zug gzer skye bar 'gyur ro/ /kha la reg par byas na kha'i nad 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /
252a6(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin du mthar gyis snying gi bar du rig par byas na snying gi nad dam/ lto ba'i nad 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du rkang pa gnyis dang rje ngar gnyis la reg par byas na'ang khrag las byung ba'i nad khrag khrug pa la sogs pa'i
252a7(rgyud 'bum): nad kyis 'debs par byed par 'gyur ro/ /mdor na 'chi bar byed pa dang dbang du byed par yang 'gyur te/ ji lta ji ltar rab tu sbyar ba de lta de ltar de thams cad byed par 'gyur zhing / gsad pa dang dgug pa dang dbang du byed par yang 'gyur ro/ /shin du
252a8(rgyud 'bum): thag ring po na gnas kyang las thams cad byed do/ /mkhar shin tu bgrod dka' ba dang nye ba mthun pa'i rlung yod par gnas par byas la/ lag pa gnyis kas thal ba de nyid blangs la yang dag par gtor na/ rab dang sgo khang dang yang thog kyang
252b1(rgyud 'bum): rab tu ltung bar 'gyur te/ mkhar srung ba yang ltung bar 'gyur zhing mes tshig pa chen po yang 'byung bar 'gyur/ dpung rnams kyang 'jig par 'gyur/ rnam par 'tshe ba chen pos kyang nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur/ thams cad
252b2(rgyud 'bum): bor nas rab tu 'byer bar yang 'gyur/ yang na skyabs su mngon par 'gro bar 'gyur/ de ltar gzhan gyi dpung la yang mthun pa'i rlung yod pa'i phyogs su thal ba gtor na/ dpung dang sde chen po yang 'jig par 'gyur zhing /
252b3(rgyud 'bum): tshig pa chen po'am/ nad kyis 'debs par 'gyur ba'am/ glang po dang / rta dang / shing rta dang / rkang thang la sogs pa'i sde dpon yang 'jig par 'gyur ba'am skyabs su mngon par 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /de ltar rnam pa du ma'i ci 'dod
252b4(rgyud 'bum): pa rnams kyi dgra rnams 'jig par bya ba'i phyir las byed par 'gyur ro/ /bdag nyid dang rang gi dpung ngam grogs po dag la yang srung ba chen po'i don du 'gyur ro/ /ji ste slar gso ba byed na ni thams cad du 'o ma'i zas kyis 'tsho zhing / thams cad la
252b5(rgyud 'bum): ras ris kyi mdun du 'o ma'i sreg blugs stong gis sbyin sreg byas na sos par 'gyur zhing mi snang bar yang 'gyur ro/ /ji ste gnod sbyin mo bsgrub par 'dod na/ gar byed 'dud ma rje btsun ma/ /nam gru mar yang rnam par grag /mdzes ma mun pa
252b6(rgyud 'bum): snang byed ma/ /'og pag ma dang 'og pag bzang / /brgyad po 'di dag gnod sbyin mo/ /'dod pa thams cad rab sgrub pa'o/ /gar byed ma'i sngags ni/ u0f00 na Ti ma hA na Ti A gats+tsha A gats+tsha/ di bya rU pa NI swA hA/ 'di'i cho ga ni spang leb bam ras la mngon par bris
252b7(rgyud 'bum): la sha'am 'o ma'i zas za zhing rig pa stong rtsa brgyad bzlas pa bya zhing / a mra'i shing gi rtsa bar gnas shing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa sngo sangs su gnas pa bri bar bya'o/ /ro smad gos gcig pa skra bshig pa mig gnyi ga dmar ba cung zad bzhin
252b8(rgyud 'bum): 'dzum pa lag pa g.yas pas sgrub pa po la sdigs mdzub byed pa/ lag pa g.yon pas shing gi yal ga 'dzin pa yan lag thams cad mdzes pa/ dar la rnam pa sna tshogs kyi gos bgos pa/ khro bo'i rgyal po de nyid kyi ras ris kyi mdun
253a1(rgyud 'bum): du bdag byang du mngon par bltas te 'dug la shing pa la shas me rab tu sbar la gu gul gyi ril bu dag la zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar dag gis btags la dus gsum du zhag bdun gyi bar du sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas la/ de nas zhag bdun pa
253a2(rgyud 'bum): la gtor ma rgya chen po byas la mar gyi mar me yang rab tu sbar la/ ji srid nam phyed pa de'i bar du bzlas pa byas te 'dug na/ de'i 'og tu gnod sbyin mo de rang nyid snang ba chen por byas te/ rang gi gzugs kyis 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /'ongs nas kyang smra bar bya
253a3(rgyud 'bum): ba ni ngas ci zhig bya zhes so/ /de nas sgrub pa pos brjod par bya ba ni/ khyod nga'i chung mar gyis shig ces bya'o/ /de ltar bgyi'o zhes byas nas mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas bzung nas chung mar gyur te rang gi gnas su khyer nas 'dod pa thams cad ster bar byed
253a4(rgyud 'bum): cing bcad kyis len yang rab tu ster bar byed de/ gang 'thungs pas lha'i gzugs su 'gyur zhing / gnod sbyin chen po dang rab tu 'gran par 'gyur ro/ /gal te ma 'ongs na ni lan gnyis pa la khro bo'i sngags dang lhan cig bzlas pa byas na

253a6(rgyud 'bum): ni 'di yin te/ b+had tre b+had tre a ba lo ki ni kiny+tsi rA ya si/ e h+ya hi A gats+tsha A gats+tsha ma ma kA r+yaM ku ru swA hA/ de nyid kyis ni ras ris med kyang 'grub par 'gyur te/ ri'i rtse mor dkyil 'khor byas la gu gul gyi du bas bdugs te/ gcig pu mi
253a7(rgyud 'bum): smra bar gnas shing gtsang sbra byas te sgo bcad la rig pa stong rtsa brgyad bzlas pa byas na/ zla ba gcig gi mtshan mo nges par 'ong bar 'gyur zhing 'ongs nas kyang 'dod pa spyod par byas na/ chung mar 'gyur zhing 'dod pa thams cad ster bar 'gyur ro/ /gal

253b1(rgyud 'bum): dang lhan cig gang du 'dod pa der 'gro zhing bcud kyis len rab tu sbyin par byed la/ sdug pa'i chung ma bzhin du phan pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa yang rab tu byed do/ /nam gru ma'i sngags ni/ na maHsarba yak+Shi NAM/ u0f00 rak+te rak+tA ba b+hA si rak+ta rak+ta le ba
253b2(rgyud 'bum): ni swA hA/ gnod sbyin mchog ni nam gru ma/ /sbyor ba la dga' rjod par byed/ /cung zad dmar ba'i gos gyon zhing / /sngo zhing 'khyil ba'i skra yang yod/ /yan lag kun mdzes gnod sbyin mo/ /'dod pa spyod la rtag tu dga'/ /'dod dang longs spyod rtag tu sbyin/ /mchog

253b5(rgyud 'bum): ma'i sngags ni/ u0f00 shrI Nu gu h+ya ke shrI Nu gu h+ya ke e h+ya hi gu h+yai hi gu h+ya ke swA hA/ 'di'i cho ga la ni ras ris kyi cho ga ni 'di la med do/ /dang por re zhig gtsang zhing gos gtsang ma bgos te/ zla ba nya ba la gnas dben par 'dug nas sgo bcad de snang ba med par

253b7(rgyud 'bum): mi snang zhing dben pa'i sa phyogs su gcig pu sgo bcad la/ dong ka dang bA na ka'i me tog legs par kha 'bus pa yungs mar dang bsres pas/ lag pa dang rkang pa la byugs la/ lag pa g.yas pa la brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags pa bya
253b8(rgyud 'bum): ste/ mi smra ba'i dka' thub kyis bzlas pa bya'o/ /de bzhin du nyin re zhing ma chad par zla ba nya'i bar du byas na de nas mtshan phyed tsam na nges par 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /'ongs nas kyang mi smra bar bya zhing / cang mi smra bar gyur pas 'dod pa bsten

254a8(rgyud 'bum): yongs su rgyu/ /cung zad kyi ni dus dag tu'ang / /lha'i gnas su yang 'gro bar byed/ /lha dang lha min g.yul dag tu'ang / /rdzu 'phrul chen pos 'thab par byed/ /chos ldan snying ni brtse ba dang / /sems can 'dod cing mnyes gshin bzang / /
254b1(rgyud 'bum): sems can phan pa'i 'dod don du/ /sa steng dag tu yongs su rgyu/ /de la bsgrub dka' cung zad med/ /dge ba'i las rnams ma lus byed/ /sems can longs spyod don du ni/ /byang chub sems dpas bshad pa yin/ /phug gnas ma'i sngags
254b2(rgyud 'bum): ni/ u0f00 gu hi li gu ha pa ti gu ha bA si ni A na ya b+ha ga ba ti ma mA ti ka~M sa ma ya ma nu smar swA hA/ seng ldeng gis me rab tu sbar la/ pri yang ku'i me tog la mar gyis btags te/ zla ba gcig gi bar du dus gsum du sbyin sreg
254b3(rgyud 'bum): stong rtsa brgyad byas na sngon du bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas de'i 'og tu sgrub pa brtsam par bya ste/ dang por re zhig byang bu'am ras sam rtsig pa la tshon ma 'dres pa snod sar pa dag gi nang du bcug pa'i
254b4(rgyud 'bum): pir dag gis ri'i rgyal po ri rab zur bzhi dang rtse mo bzhi dang ldan pa/ ri bdun gyi phreng bas yongs su bskor ba/ ri de dag gi mtha' mar ri bo dag la brten pa'i phug kun tu bri bar bya'o/ /der gnas pa lha'i gzugs dang ldan
254b5(rgyud 'bum): pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ gcig pu gnod sbyin ma phug gnas ma zhes bya ba ro smad dar la gon pa/ stod g.yogs dar la gyon pa/ gser gyi mdog can rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs mdzes pa bri bar bya ste/
254b6(rgyud 'bum): de lta bu'i ras ris bri bar bya'o/ /gtsang ba'i gnas su gtsang bas 'o ma'i zas kyis 'tsho zhing / rig pa stong phrag bcu bzlas par bya ste/ ci nus pa'i mchod pa chen po byas na bzlas pa'i tha mar lha'i gzugs
254b7(rgyud 'bum): dang ldan pa'i gnod sbyin mo snang ba chen po dang ldan par byas nas rang nyid 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /'ongs pa na sna ma'i me tog dang tsan+dan dkar po bsregs nas mchod yon dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas des bu ci zhig bya/
254b8(rgyud 'bum): zhes smra bar byed do/ /des smra bar bya ba ni bdag gi mar mdzod cig ces so/ /de bzhin du bya'o zhes byas nas mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /de la sems 'gyod par ni mi bya ste/ de la 'dod pa dang ldan pa yang don du gnyer bar yang
255a1(rgyud 'bum): mi bya'o/ /de la 'phags ma rdzu 'phrul che ba don du gnyer na 'grub par 'gyur te/ de phan cad de la ma dang 'dra bar bya ba thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /'khor brgyad brgya dang bcas pa la zas dang gos rab tu ster bar
255a2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ /gnas yang ba las kyang skyob par byed do/ /dgon pa chen po dang ri'i steng du gnas na yang las thams cad yang dag par sgrub par byed do/ /bza' ba ci 'dod pa yang rab tu sbyin no/ /ro dang bcud kyis len la sogs pa thams cad
255a3(rgyud 'bum): kyang rab tu sbyin zhing ci 'dod pa yang rjes su sgrub par byed do/ /khang pa dang khang pa rtseg ma yang mngon par sprul par byed do/ /gser stong phrag kyang nyin re zhing rab tu sbyin par byed do/ /de nyid kyi nyin par thams cad zad par byas te/ gal te mi byed
255a4(rgyud 'bum): na rnam par chad par 'gyur te/ thams cad kyi thams cad du med par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang 'di'i las ni ras ris 'di nyid kyi mdun du seng ldeng gi me rab tu sbar la/ 'bar ba dang du ba dang bral ba'i mdag ma la lag pa g.yas pa'i
255a5(rgyud 'bum): mthil du ldong ros kyis gzugs brnyan du bris te/ skyes pa'am bud med kyi ming lag pa g.yon pa'i mthil du bris la me mdag gi phung po de la bdugs shing sngags bzlas pa byas na dpag tshad brgya na gnas kyang 'ong bar 'gyur te/ gang smras pa de
255a6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad byed du gzhug par 'gyur ro/ /tho rangs ni de nyid du khyer bar 'gyur ro/ /las 'di nyid ni mtshan mo bya ba yin gyi nyin par ni ma yin no/ /mi dpa' mo'i sngags ni/ u0f00 na ra bI re swA hA/ de bzhin du 'di'i ras ris kyang bri bar bya ste/ phug gi gnas
255a7(rgyud 'bum): ni ma gtogs te/ shing mya ngan med la brten pa bri bar byas la 'di'i khyad par ni 'di'o/ /las gzhan thams cad ni phug gnas ma de bzhin du bya'o/ /'di la ni sring mo zhes kyang brjod par bya'o/ /'di la las gzhan yang yod de/ zla ba gzas zin pa la
255a8(rgyud 'bum): btsag yug snam gro ba la btums te khar bcug nas ji srid du zla ba gzas btang gi bar du bzlas na/ de nas btsag yug snam gyi bud med dam skyes pa gang gi ming bris pa de dpag tshad brgya na gnas kyang de nas
255b1(rgyud 'bum): 'ong bar byed do/ /tho rangs ni de nyid du khyer bar byed do/ /sring mo bzhin du bya ba rnams kyang byed do/ /phongs pa'i dus su yang srung ba chen po byed do/ /bzlas pa tsam gyis bud med thams cad dbang du byed par 'gyur ro/ /mi'i dbang mo'i cho ga ni 'di'o/ /gnod sbyin
255b2(rgyud 'bum): gzhon nu ma'i sngags ni/ u0f00 yak+Sha ku mA ri ke swA hA/ 'di'i cho ga ni gro ba la gi wang gis bri bar bya ste/ gzhon nu ma mgo'i skra phyed bcings pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ gos gcig pa lag pa g.yas pa na ma du lung ga'i 'bras bu 'dzin
255b3(rgyud 'bum): pa lag pa g.yon pas shing mya ngan med la 'dzin pa/ de lta bu'i gro ba'i 'dab ma mgo'i gnas kyi steng du gzhag par byas nas/ dgon pa'i phyogs su gcig pu nyal bar byas te/ tsan+dan dkar po'i lde gus dkyil 'khor byas la dus
255b4(rgyud 'bum): gsum du sna ma'i me tog gis gcal bkram par byas la gu gul gyi bdug pas bdugs nas/ rig pa stong rtsa brgyad zla ba gcig gi bar du bzlas te/ de nas zla ba nya ba la sna ma'i me tog gis mchod pa chen po byas la/ mar gyi mar me dang
255b5(rgyud 'bum): lha bshos kyang phul nas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug nas/ ji srid du rnam thos sras kyi bu mo rang gi gzugs nyid kyis gzhon nu ma lnga brgyas yongs su bskor ba 'ong zhing phyogs de thams cad snang bar byas nas/ rang gi gzugs
255b6(rgyud 'bum): kyi nam mkha' la 'dug par 'gyur zhing / de yang 'di skad du bdag gis ci zhig bya zhes smras pa dang / de nas sgrub pa pos smra bar bya ba ni/ mchog gsum las gang yang rung ba gcig don du gnyer bar bya ba ni/ ma nyid dang sring mo nyid
255b7(rgyud 'bum): dang chung ma nyid do/ /gal te mar gyur na ni sems la 'gyod par mi bya ste/ 'gyod na ni rnam par 'jig pa 'byung bar 'gyur bas ma bzhin du bsgrub par bya'o/ /ma des kyang bsams pa tsam gyis 'khor lnga brgya dang bcas pa'i zas dang /
255b8(rgyud 'bum): gos dang rgyan gyi khyad par thams cad kyang yang dag par sgrub par byed do/ /nyin re zhing yang ti na ra stong ster bar 'gyur zhing gal te 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad du rnam par rgyu na yang thams cad yang dag par sgrub par byed do/ /gang gi tshe
256a1(rgyud 'bum): sring mor gyur na yang de'i tshe dpag tshad brgya las kyang bud med 'gugs par byed cing de nyid du yang khyer bar byed de/ sring mo'i las thams cad kyang yang dag par sgrub par byed do/ /ci ste chung mar gyur na ni rang gi khyim du khyer zhing
256a2(rgyud 'bum): lo stong du 'tsho bar yang byed do/ /gang gi tshe 'chi bar gyur pa de'i tshe yang rigs bzang por skye bar 'gyur te/ ngag thams cad kyang chung ma bzhin du yang dag par sgrub par byed do/ /chung ma gnod sbyin ma'i sngags ni/ /niH/ chung ma gnod
256a3(rgyud 'bum): sbyin mo 'di'i cho ga ni tsan+dan dkar po'i lde gus lag pa g.yas pa dang g.yon pa gur gum gyi lde gus nye bar byugs la/ lan stong du mngon par bsngags pa byas nas/ mtshan mo gcig pu mi smra ba'i dka' thub dang dben pa'i
256a4(rgyud 'bum): sa phyogs su sgo bcad la/ ba ru ra'i 'bras bu lnga'am brgyad til mar gyi nang du bcug la btsos te/ til mar de las ba ru ra'i 'bras bu blangs nas de la yongs su bzlas te/ gser dang / dngul dang / zangs ma dang / sa las byas pa'i
256a5(rgyud 'bum): snod sar pa la bcug nas/ nyal ba'i rkang pa'i mthar bzhag la/ gnod sbyin 'di nyid kyi sngags yi ge gcig pa stong gis mngon par bsngags pa byas nas/ gnas dben zhing mun pa'i phyogs su me tog gis gcal
256a6(rgyud 'bum): bkram pa la nyal bar byas na/ mi ma yin pa 'ongs nas rkang pa gnyis la lha'i bde ba'i reg pa 'jam pa'i lag pa'i mthil gyis bsku zhing byug par byed de/ gang gis reg pa tsam gyi lha'i bde ba'i reg pas gnyid 'byung bar 'gyur te/
256a7(rgyud 'bum): gang gi nyi ma shar na yang mtshan mo'i mthar dka' ba'i gnyid sad par 'gyur te/ rab tu sad na yang de nyid sems par 'gyur te/ de dang lhan cig 'dod pa spyad par yang mi bya smra bar yang ma byas na zla ba drug gis 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /
256a8(rgyud 'bum): de nas de lha'i gzugs dang ldan pa'i bag ma sar pa 'dra ba/ g.yog 'khor gyis yongs su bskor ba/ lag na mar me thogs pa/ 'jig rten rnams 'od bzang po dag gis gsal bar byas pa/ mal stan yongs su
256b1(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin pa/ rgyan sna tshogs 'bar ba dang ldan pa 'ongs nas kyang tshig rjod par byed la/ 'dod pa la longs spyod pa'i yo byad yongs su 'dzin pa 'ongs nas kyang / sgrub pa po la mgul pa nas 'khyud par byed de/ de nas bzung nas
256b2(rgyud 'bum): chung ma sdug pa bzhin du rjes su mthun par byed do/ /'ongs na yang 'dod pa la brten par bya'o/ /mtshan mo yongs su spyad nas tho rangs mi snang bar 'gyur te/ gser srang stong ri ba'i mu tig gi phreng ba mal du nyin re zhing
256b3(rgyud 'bum): yongs su bor nas 'gro bar yang byed do/ /lhag ma ma lus par thams cad nyin re zhing zad par byas te/ gal te cung zad 'jog par byed na yang yod par mi 'gyur ro/ /su la yang brjod par mi bya ste/ gal te rjod par byed na
256b4(rgyud 'bum): phyir yang 'ong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /yang na 'chi ba'i mtha'i bar du phung khrol byed par 'gyur ro/ /'di dag ni mchog tu gsang zhing mchog tu sba bar bya ba ste/ sems can gnyis pa la brjod pa ni bzod pa ma yin te/ tha na ma dang pha dang /
256b5(rgyud 'bum): gnyen bshes dang bdag po la yang smra bar mi bya'o/ /dud 'gro'i skyes gnas su song ba'i phyugs kyi srog chags la yang brjod par mi bya ste/ 'di ni mchog tu gsang ba yin te gsang ba pa thams cad dang gnod sbyin mo thams cad
256b6(rgyud 'bum): kyi'ang mchog 'di nyid do/ /gal te gzhan la brjod na ni grub pa yang mi 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /bud med gzhan dang rang gi chung ma la yang 'gro ba rtag tu spang bar bya'o/ /yid du 'ong ma'i sngags ni/ u0f00 ma no ha re ma dod sa ba
256b7(rgyud 'bum): ka ri pi tsi tra/ ru bi Ne mai thu na pri ye swA hA/ de'i cho ga ni skyed mos tshal shing mya ngan med kyi rtsar shin tu dben par khang pa byed du bcug la shin tu rab tu dben par bya zhing / ra ba shin tu mtho ba la gser gyi sgo 'phar bya
256b8(rgyud 'bum): zhing gtsang mar byas la/ bzlas pa 'bum phrag gcig byas nas de nas las brtsam par bya ste/ zhag chen po blangs la dur khrod kyi skras snying po bya zhing sgo bcad la mar me sbar bar bya'o/ /ras kha tshar dang bcas shing
257a1(rgyud 'bum): skra dang bral bar ba tu gsar ba sgo'i phyi rol tu bzhag na/ mtshan mo de gcer bur 'ongs nas gos de bgos nas nang du 'jug cing / mi'i bud med kyi gzugs su byas shing de nas sgrub pa po de dang lhan cig ji srid mar
257a2(rgyud 'bum): me 'bar gyi bar du dga' bar byed do/ /mar me zad nas ni mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /de la gos gcig bcings te gos yongs su bzhag nas mal stan nas 'gro bar byed do/ /yang na sgrub pa pos lag pa'i sor gdub bzhag pa las
257a3(rgyud 'bum): sor gdub gnyis pa yang bzhag nas 'gro bar byed do/ /yang na gdu bu dang rked pa'i 'og pag dang rkang pa gnyis kyi rkang gdub dang mgo'i nor bu dang de bzhin du gzhan dang / gzhan lha'i rgyan gcig cig gang de khyer ba de dang de rjes
257a4(rgyud 'bum): su ster bar byed do/ /'gro ba dang 'ong ba yang don med par mi byed do/ /de bzhin du nyin re zhing yang ma lus par thams cad zad par bya'o/ /de bzhin du zla ba drug na smra bar byed na/ de'i tshe smra bar byas na chung mar 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu gnas na
257a5(rgyud 'bum): bcud kyis len yang rab tu sbyin zhing / gang 'thungs pas dus rings por 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /yid kyis bsgoms nas seng ldeng gi phur bus sa brkos na lha'i gzhal med khang 'byung bar 'gyur la phyung na ni mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /
257a6(rgyud 'bum): 'di'i sngags gnyis pa yod pa ni/ u0f00 ma hA nag+ni nag+ni dze swA hA/ de nyid kyis mar me rab tu sbar la/ sngags 'dis lan brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags pa byas na nges par 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /phur bus mngon par bsngags pa byas
257a7(rgyud 'bum): nas brko bar bya'o/ /phur bu phyung zhing mar me zad na mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /phur bu dang mi'i zhag gi mar dang ba'i rwa'am ma he nag po'i rwa dang dur khrod kyi ras kyi snying po 'chang na/ yul gzhan du gang ci 'dod pa de yang ster bar byed do/ /
257a8(rgyud 'bum): yang na rang nyid bya ste sngags kyang gzhan la mi sbyin no/ /ci ste byin na ni rig pa chad par 'gyur ro/ /gang la byin pa de'i phun sum tshogs par 'gyur te/ gang 'dod pa de yang gnas dben par byed na 'di'i grub pa don
257b1(rgyud 'bum): med par mi 'gyur ro/ /yang na gzhan dang rtse bar ni byed de/ 'on kyang de dang lhan cig smra bar ni mi byed do/ /bud med gzhan dang phrad par mngon par 'dod pa'am yid la sems na yang de'i tshe zlos pa de'i gan du 'ong bar mi 'gyur
257b2(rgyud 'bum): te/ bud med gzhan dang ma phrad pa de'i dbang du 'gyur ba yin no/ /lha mdzes ma'i sngags ni/ u0f00 su ra sun+da ri swA hA/ 'di'i cho ga ni seng ldeng gi shing gis me rab du sbar la/ mar gyi sreg blugs kyis zla ba gcig la dus gsum
257b3(rgyud 'bum): du sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad bya zhing / de nas yar ngo'i zla ba nya la bsang byed kyi khres la 'dug ste/ gtsang zhing gtsang ba'i sa phyogs dben par ji srid nam phyed pa de srid du sngags bzlas pa byas na nges par 'ong bar 'gyur zhing
257b4(rgyud 'bum): de nas ma dang sring mo dang chung ma sngar ji lta ba de thams cad byed par 'gyur te/ thams cad kyang rgya cher brjod par bya'o/ /bdun po 'di dag gnod sbyin ma/ /phyag na rdo rje'i bka' yis kyang / /lha dang lha min khams gsum du/ /sa rnams kun
257b5(rgyud 'bum): tu yongs su rgyu/ /mi yul dag na sbyor bar dga'/ /snying rjer ldan zhing rnam par rgyu/ /kha cig phag ma byis pa dang / /gnod sbyin ma gzhan blun pa'o/ /gzhan dag phan byed 'tshe ba yang / /de bzhin mtshan mo yongs su rgyu/ /byis pa'i 'tsho ba 'phrog pa'i phyir/ /bskam zhing sha ni za
257b6(rgyud 'bum): byed gzhan/ /gang phyir 'dzam gling 'ongs pa ni/ /de bzhin khrag la chags byed pa'o/ /rtag tu srog la gnod byed pa'i/ /khrag la dga' ba'i gnod sbyin mo/ /srung byed 'chi dang bcas gyur pa'i/ /khyim ni kun tu yongs su
257b7(rgyud 'bum): rgyu/ /de dag tshar bcad bsgrub don du/ /dam tshig 'di ni rab tu bstan/ /ji ltar 'dod chags 'ching ba la/ /byis pa rnams ni bsdus pa'i don/ /sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir/ /de ltar 'di kun gsungs pa yin/ /
257b8(rgyud 'bum): 'dod chags kyis ldongs sems rmongs pa'i/ /gang tshe sngags pa 'khrig don gnyer/ /sngags kyis bkug byas longs spyad pa/ /gnod sbyin mo'am srin mo'am/ /klu mo'am yang na dri za'am/ /mi'am ci'am
258a1(rgyud 'bum): lha min ma/ /lha min lha bas mchog gyur pa'i/ /sa 'og gnas ni nyams dga' bar/ /gang du bud med grangs med pa/ /sngags shes der ni rab tu 'jug /sngags shes sngags ni zlos pa dag /der song bskal par
258a2(rgyud 'bum): gnas par 'gyur/ /byams pa zhes bya'i rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /sangs rgyas chen po 'byung 'gyur te/ /de tshe de ni dam chos thos/ /thos nas rab tu grol bar 'gyur/ /lha dang lha min bu mo dang / /rig 'dzin bu mo dam
258a3(rgyud 'bum): pa dag / sngags kyis bkug nas spyod byed cing / /de tshe lha yi bde bas dga'/ /sngags pa 'dzam bu'i gling gnas pas/ /de nyid du ni rtag 'dren pa/ /gang tshe gtsang gnas gsang ba dang / /gtsang sbra spyod la rtag dga' ba'o/ /

258a5(rgyud 'bum): yang dag ldan/ /mi yi bud med reg mi bya/ /mi rtag sdug bsngal stong pa dang / /stong pa gsog dang ther zug med/ /byis pa rnams ni rjes brid dang / /kun tu rtogs las byung ba la/ /thog ma med las 'dod kun 'byung / /

258a8(rgyud 'bum): pa rnyed mi 'gyur/ /sngags shes sngags kyi gzugs can dang / /shes ldan dbang po thul ba dang / /dpa' bo gtsang ba'i spyod la dga'/ /rtag tu de yi sngags kyang 'grub/ /pad ma mtho ma rab dga' ma/ /mi pham ma dang rtag
258b1(rgyud 'bum): rgyal dang / /sngo bsangs ldan pa'i gnod sbyin mo/ /rdzu 'phrul che 'di gnod sbyin mo/ /pad ma mtho ma'i sngags ni/ u0f00 pad ma u ts+tshe swA hA/ 'di'i cho ga ni gang gA'i ngogs sam rgya mtsho'i ngogs sam skyed mos tshal gyi
258b2(rgyud 'bum): me tog gi ldum ra'i nang du lo ma'i spyil po byas te rab tu gtsang zhing bdag nyid kyang gtsang bar byas la/ rdo 'am sa'i sgo glegs byas la de nyid du mtshan mo sgo bcad nas 'dod pa'i yo byad kyi longs spyod rnams bsogs

259a1(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten kun gyis legs par mchod/ /cung zad dmar ba'i gos gyon pa/ /de ni rgyal mar mngon par ston/ /'di'i cho ga ni dang po 'bum phrag gcig bzlas pa byas na sngon du bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /
259a2(rgyud 'bum): de nas dgon pa chen por rab tu zhugs nas/ 'bras bu'i zas za zhing ji srid du rang nyid kyi gzugs kyis 'ong ba de'i bar du bzlas pa bya'o/ /'ongs nas kyang smra ba ni ci zhig bya zhes so/ /gal te mar gyur na ni ma bzhin du re ba

259a8(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du sha za mo dang sha za mo rdzu 'phrul che ba dang / klu'i bu mo dang / lha ma yin gyi bu mo dang / lha'i bud med dang / lha ma yin gyi bud med dang / de bzhin du rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi bud med dang mi dang mi ma yin pa
259b1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi sngags grangs med pa dag kyang yod do/ /de bzhin du gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / drang srong rnams dang / dri za rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / yi dags rnams dang / srin po rnams dang /
259b2(rgyud 'bum): tshangs pa chen po dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / khyab 'jug dang / ma mo rnams dang / dbang mo dang / rgan byad ma dang / phag mo la sogs pa'i sngags rnams kyang yod de/ so so so sor thams cad dam tshig gis 'dir bkug nas
259b3(rgyud 'bum): khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed kyis zos pa dang dam tshig la bzhag cing / 'jam pa'i dbyangs la nye bar gtad nas rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur te/ go rims bzhin du gnas shing bsnyen bkur yang byed do/ /
