259b5(rgyud 'bum): g.yo ba'am rdul 'byung ba'i bar du bzlas pa byas na rang nyid kyi gzugs kyis 'ong bar 'gyur te/ gang smras pa de thams cad yang dag par sgrub par byed do/ /de bzhin du gang gzhan yang gzhon nu ma bzhi gnod sbyin ma
259b6(rgyud 'bum): chen po'i ming po tum bu ru zhes bya ba yang dag par rten pa/ gru'i theg pa la yang dag par zhon pa/ 'jig rten thams cad kyis rab tu mchod pa/ sems can rnams rjes su 'dzin par byed pa de dag kyang cho ga 'di bzhin du
259b7(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ /dper na ras sam rtsig pa'am spang leb la mtsho'i dkyil du bri bar bya ste/ gru'i theg pa la zhon pa phu bo ming po'i rjes su 'gro ba bu mo bzhi po nyid kyang rgya mtsho'i nang du zhugs shing mnyam par 'dug
259b8(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ /de dag mi snang gnas bzhag nas/ /khro bo'i bzlas pa yang dag brtsam/ /de tshe g.yo 'gul rdul 'byung bar/ /de dag kun ni skye 'gyur bar/ /de tshe grub pa yin shes nas/ /sngags kyi bzlas pa yongs su btang / /
260a1(rgyud 'bum): mtshan mo'i tha mar rang tshul nyid/ /dge dang mi dge ston par 'gyur/ /skad cig gis ni zlos pa yis/ /don rnams thams cad sgrub par 'gyur/ /khro bos bkug cing rgyas byas nas/ /smras pa thams cad byed par 'gyur/ /rtag
260a2(rgyud 'bum): tu nyi ma sogs kyi gza'/ /de bzhin drang srong srin po dang / /nam mkha' lding dang sha zas kyang / /rdzu 'phrul chen po de dag mchod/ /dbang phyug che sogs 'byung pos kyang / /rdzu 'phrul chen po de dag mchod/ /de dag gis bshad cho ga
260a3(rgyud 'bum): dang / /sngags rgyud rgya che bcas pa yi/ /thams cad de dag khro rgyal gyi/ /'bad pa med par dbang du 'gyur/ /gang dag sngags ni ci yod pa/ /khro bo 'chol ba rnyog 'byung ba/ /de kun khro bo'i rgyal po yi/ /de dag bsgo ba mnyan par bstan/ /gang yang
260a4(rgyud 'bum): 'phags pa'i sngags dag ni/ /thams cad kun 'gro'i khyad par can/ /mchog dang rab mchog drag po dang / /gang yang de bzhin rgyal bas gsungs/ /de bzhin pad ma 'dzin sngags dang / /bdag nyid kyis kyang rab bshad dang / /
260a5(rgyud 'bum): gang yang gzhan gyi sngags mchog ni/ /rigs lnga dag gis gsungs pa dang / /rdzu 'phrul chen po 'jig rten pa'i/ /rgyal ba'i sras kyis gsungs pa dag /khro bo'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul ches/ /thams cad de dag yang dag
260a6(rgyud 'bum): 'gugs/ /sngags dang rgyud ni thams cad kun/ /bstan pa 'di la nges par 'brel/ /gang zhig gang dag cho gar bstan/ /de nyid 'dir ni nges par sbyar/ /gshin rje gshed ni khro rgyal gyi/ /las kun byed pa'i mchog yin no/ /
260a7(rgyud 'bum): sgrol ma khro gnyer can nyid dang / /de bzhin gos dkar mo dang ni/ /de bzhin dkar chen rigs ma dang / /rdo rje'i rigs 'byung mA ma kI/ /gtsug tor 'byung ba thams cad dang / /lha mo spyan ni nyid dag dang / /de bzhin gshegs kun rig pa dang / /
260a8(rgyud 'bum): mthu chen thob dang kun bzang dang / /pad ma 'dzin pa'i mnga' bdag dang / /bdag kyang 'jig rten gnod sbyin bdag /byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che/ /rgyal sras rmad du byung ba dang / /dpung bzang 'jig rten rnam par grags/ /
260b1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje'i sde dang sde bzang dang / /blo ldan chos kyis 'phags pa dang / /bdag gis kyang ni bshad pa'i sngags/ /zlos pas brnyas par mi bya'o/ /sngon du rtag tu mchod bya zhing / /legs gsungs de dag bgom mi bya/ /khro bo'i rgyal po legs
260b2(rgyud 'bum): mchod cing / /der ni zlos pas sbyar mi bya/ /dus rnams kun tu sngags dag la/ /de dag rig pa bcad mi bya/ /ji bzhin las ni kun la yang / /'jig rten sngags kyi lha dag ni/ /dka' zlog bde byed tshangs sogs dang / /lha chen la yang legs
260b3(rgyud 'bum): par mchod/ /ji ltar rgyud la sngags rnams ni/ /de bzhin nyid du'ang kun la bya/ /thams cad sngags ni kun la yang / /thams cad nyid du'ang yang dag bstan/ /sngags kun rab tu 'jug pa yang / /khro bo las ni yang dag 'byung / /sngags 'di khro bo
260b4(rgyud 'bum): chen po ni/ /gshin rje gshed ces bya ming gis/ /bdag nyid chen po gshin rje yang / /myur du bkug nas 'joms par byed/ /nyi ma'i bu ni gshin rje dang / /brgya byin bdag nyid chen po yang / /bkug nas dbang med mi bzad pa/ /gdul
260b5(rgyud 'bum): dka' 'dul byed mnga' bdag yin/ /sngags 'di sngags ni chen po ste/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis bshad pa yin/ /ma rungs las rnams thams cad byed/ /sngags kun rab tu sgrub par byed/ /de skad smras nas dpal ldan ni/ /
260b6(rgyud 'bum): lag na rdo rje rdzu 'phrul ches/ /shAkya seng ge mi yi mchog /dpa' chen sangs rgyas la btud nas/ /sngags 'khor rten pa'i rdo rje can/ /rdzu 'phrul can gyis sngags rnams gsungs/ /'byung po kun tshogs dge ba ni/ /sems can kun
260b7(rgyud 'bum): gyis mnyan pa yin/ /sngags rnams kun tshogs lha byed pa/ /sngags kyi mchog ni bdag gis bshad/ /blo dang ldan pa 'jam pa'i dbyangs/ /byang chub sems dpas bshad pa yin/ /mi bzad gdul dka' 'dul byed pa/ /ma rungs thams cad
260b8(rgyud 'bum): zlog par byed/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/ gnod sbyin mo sgrub pa'i cho ga rab 'byam las le'u sum cu
261a1(rgyud 'bum): rtsa lnga pa rdzogs s+ho/ / // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /sdug bsngal spang zhing bde bya ba/ /sdug bsngal spang zhes bstan pa ni/ /mdor bsdus na ni bzlog pa yin/ /de nyid theg pa rnam gsum du/ /nga yi 'di ni
261a2(rgyud 'bum): bstan pa yin/ /mi rtag sdug bsngal bdag med dang / /'dus byas thams cad skad cig nyid/ /gsob dang rtag tu kun stong par/ /'khor ba'i 'ching ba nges par bstan/ /de las chags bral rnam gsum 'gro/ /sems can dge la brten
261a3(rgyud 'bum): pa yin/ /byang chub sems dang sangs rgyas dang / /rang rgyal byang chub la brten dang / /'dod chags bral ba rdzu 'phrul che/ /de bzhin gzhan dag dgra bcom nyid/ /nyan thos byang chub la brten nas/ /rnam gsum zhi ba thob par
261a4(rgyud 'bum): byed/ /chos 'di dag ni mdor bsdu na/ /dge dang mi dge bstan pa yin/ /rtag tu mi dge spang bya ste/ /dus rnams kun tu dge ba spyad/ /'byung po kun la mi 'tshe bar/ /ngas ni chos kyang rab tu bstan/ /'gro ba lnga po'i lam nyid du/ /
261a5(rgyud 'bum): chos 'di nyid ni 'gyur ba yin/ /gang zhig zag med chos rnams ni/ /yang dag mtha' la yang dag brten/ /dang po'i sangs rgyas snga ma yis/ /'di nyid lam du gsungs pa yin/ /zhi ba mya ngan 'das 'gro bar/ /ngas kyang thams cad bstan
261a6(rgyud 'bum): pa yin/ /chos kyi mtha' la brten nas ni/ /yang dag mtha' ni thob pa yin/ /chos rnams kun gyi mtha' med pa/ /yang dag mtha' zhes brjod pa yin/ /chos 'di dag ni mdor bsdus nas/ /nyon cig lha ni thams cad dang / /byang chub
261a7(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che/ /dgra bcom nyan thos dag kyang nyon/ /nga ni sa steng mya ngan 'da'/ /kha ba can gyi nang dag tu/ /sA la'i nags ni yang dag 'byung / /gser dang ldan pa'i chu bo dang / /gyad rnams kyi ni nye 'khor du/ /sA la zung
261a8(rgyud 'bum): gi nags nang du/ /nga ni mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur/ /grong khyer ming ni sdig pa can/ /cod pan bcings pa'i mchod rten dang / /chu bo'i 'gram ni rtag nyams dga'/ /der ni sa steng mya ngan 'da'/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / /
261b1(rgyud 'bum): rdzu 'phrul che ldan nyan thos dang / /lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / /'jig rten skyong ba rdzu 'phrul che/ /brgya byin tshangs bcas 'dab bzang dang / /gzhan yang 'og min la sogs lha/ /der ni thams cad 'dus par ni/ /rab tu
261b2(rgyud 'bum): 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin/ /der ni gyad kyi nye 'khor dang / /gang gA'i byang phyogs 'gram dag ni/ /chu bo chen po de las gzhan/ /kha ba can ri'i lho phyogs char/ /sA la'i nags zhes bya ba 'byung / /de tshe nub phyogs
261b3(rgyud 'bum): bltas pa'i mal/ /de yi gnas su 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de tshe chu bo rab dga' ba/ /bzang po gser ldan 'gram dag tu/ /lha rnams kun gyi tshogs la sogs/ /'dus pa dag ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /mi dang rgyal po'i mchog
261b4(rgyud 'bum): rnams dang / /mi dang mi ma yin pa 'byung / /de tshe mi dang 'byung po kun/ /de tshe byis pa 'phags pa dang / /dga' ston chen po dga' chen ltar/ /gnas de la ni yang dag 'dus/ /rang lus zang zing bcas par ni/ /bzang po
261b5(rgyud 'bum): chen po'i bkod pa'ang byas/ /chos kyi mtha' ni yongs spangs nas/ /yang dag mthar ni yang dag zhugs/ /de tshe sngon gyi skye ba ni/ /ser skya'i grong khyer gzhi dag tu/ /shAkya'i rigs kyi gtso bo ni/ /nga ni 'khor ba'i
261b6(rgyud 'bum): btson rar skyes/ /bdag gi sdug bsngal bdag nyid kyis/ /khyim las nges 'byung yongs su spangs/ /de tshe mu stegs mang po bsten/ /bdud rtsi dag kyang thob ma gyur/ /dka' ba dag kyang bdag gis spyad/ /lus kyi gdung
261b7(rgyud 'bum): ba'ang yun ring ba/ /lo drug tu ni bsten pa yis/ /lus kyang zhig cing rnam par skams/ /shes dang shes bya gsal ba ni/ /ngas ni cung zad thob pa med/ /de nas nga ni langs nas kyang / /'bras chen dkar ba'i zas kyang zos/ /
261b8(rgyud 'bum): lha rnams kyis mchod lam dag ni/ /der ni sa steng nga yis bgrod/ /chu bo nai rany+dza na'i 'gram/ /shing gi rgyal po legs mdzes pa/ /me tog rnam pa du mas khyab/ /de 'gram sa ni nyams dga' ba/ /nags chen 'bras bu ldan pa
262a1(rgyud 'bum): dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs shing dag 'byung / /chu bo chen pos yongs bskor ba'i/ /shing gi rtsar ni nga yis phyin/ /sa yi cha ni mthong tsam gyis/ /bdag gi sems ni brtan pa thob/ /de lta'i shing ni bdag gis mthong / /
262a2(rgyud 'bum): yal ga lo ma nyer mdzes pa'i/ /shing chen grib ma chen po ni/ /rtsa ba mi mngon nyer spyad 'os/ /shing rtsa a shwat+thar 'dug nas/ /sems ni shin tu dang bar gyur/ /bsam gtan dang ni ting 'dzin dang / /der ni brtan pa'ang mngon
262a3(rgyud 'bum): par 'thob/ /mtshan mo'i mthar ni skye mthar byed/ /der ni snang ba med pa'ang 'thob/ /bdud kyi bgegs ni rnam mang po/ /rnam pa du ma rab tu sbyar/ /sde rnams bcom nas slar ldog cing / /rang gi gnas su'ang de dag song / /
262a4(rgyud 'bum): sngags dang rgyud ni 'di don du/ /rnam pa mang po'ang gsungs pa yin/ /rnam pa du ma'i sbyor ba dang / /bsam gtan shes pa'ang bstan pa yin/ /der ni theg pa gsum yang spyad/ /gzhan dag sems can rten la 'dzud/ /nyes pa
262a5(rgyud 'bum): rnam pa gsum nyid kyi/ /gnyen po dag kyang rab tu bstan/ /de nas langs nas yang song nas/ /grong khyer lteng rgyas chu bzang gis/ /khrus byas der gnas drang srong rnams/ /slob mar bcas pa'ang rab tu phyung / /sems can rnam
262a6(rgyud 'bum): mang don byas nas/ /de nas nga ni yang dag 'das/ /ka shi'i grong ni nyams dga' bar/ /mthar gyis su ni yang dag zhugs/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po sngar sangs rgyas/ /de yi gnas su'ang bzhugs pa yin/ /ka shi skye bo'i yul
262a7(rgyud 'bum): dag tu/ /der ni rang bdag nyid gnas 'gyur/ /zhi ba mya ngan 'das byed pa'i/ /dam chos chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/ /'jig rten lha dang lha min bcas/ /'gro ba lnga la yang dag brten/ /'byung po kun la bde ba'i phyir/ /der ni chos
262a8(rgyud 'bum): kyang rab tu bstan/ /der ni snga ma'i sangs rgyas kyis/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bla na med/ /de ni nga yis rab tu bstan/ /srid las grol zhing bde don dang / /sems can nyes pa bzlog pa'i
262b1(rgyud 'bum): phyir/ /bde zhing zhi bar gzhol ba'o/ /tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /srid pa'i lam ni gzhig don dang / /bden bzhi'i ting 'dzin las byung ba'i/ /'phags lam yan lag brgyad pa ni/ /tshangs pa'i gnas
262b2(rgyud 'bum): bzhis rnam par brgyan/ /rten cing 'brel bar 'byung dang bcas/ /rnam pa bcu gnyis byas pa yin/ /ma rig 'gag par yang dag ldan/ /rig pa bskyed pa'i rim las byung / /yang dag mtha' yi legs mthar skyes/ /
262b3(rgyud 'bum): de nyid mthar ni bstan pa yin/ /lugs su 'byung dang bzlog pa dag /tha mar bdag nyid rtogs chen skyes/ /sems can mang po thar don du/ /zhi ba'i 'khor lo yang dag ldan/ /nyams dga' ka shi'i grong spangs nas/ /de tshe bdag
262b4(rgyud 'bum): ni mnyan yod song / /de tshe mu stegs gdul bya'i phyir/ /cho 'phrul chen po'ang byas pa yin/ /mi yul dag tu rdzu 'phrul ni/ /de tshe yang dag bstan par byas/ /mu stegs mang po'i gnas dag tu'ang / /de tshe'ang rab tu
262b5(rgyud 'bum): dga' bar byas/ /yul ming me thab ces bya bar/ /lha las babs pa bzang po byas/ /sum cu rtsa gsum dag tu yang / /chos nyid la ni brgya byin sbyar/ /de nas 'og min lha sogs dang / /tshangs sogs brgya byin bcas pa
262b6(rgyud 'bum): dang / /rnam thos gnod sbyin dbang dang bcas/ /rgyal chen bzhi yi ris dag dang / /rtag tu myos dang gzhong thogs dang / /pi wang gsum pa phreng thogs dang / /lha dang gnod sbyin tshogs rnams kun/ /sa bla lha dang bar snang gnas/ /
262b7(rgyud 'bum): 'phags pa gnod sbyin tshogs bdag dang / /lha dang lha min thams cad kyang / /chos kyi 'bras bu ldan par byas/ /mya ngan 'das gsum rjes 'gro byas/ /sems can bsam gyis mi khyab pa'ang / /de tshe legs pa nyid la btsud/ /de dag rtsis kyi
262b8(rgyud 'bum): grangs med pa/ /'khor ba'i mtha' bzhin de mtha' med/ /stong chen po yi 'jig rten gyi/ /khams dang 'dra bar bsam mi khyab/ /rtag tu sems can mang po ni/ /bden pa'i don la yang dag sbyar/ /de tshe der ni nga 'ongs nas/ /gnas
263a1(rgyud 'bum): gtsang steng du gnas nas kyang / /theg pa gsum la rjes 'jug pa'i/ /dam chos sngags ni rab tu bskor/ /sems can gdul bya la brten nas/ /nga yis cho ga'i rgyal po 'di/ /'jig rten mang la rab bstan nas/ /
263a2(rgyud 'bum): 'jam pa'i dbyangs la'ang gtad pa yin/ /nga ni 'jig rten mya ngan 'das/ /sa steng stongs par gyur pa na/ /de nas 'jam dpal sems can la/ /sangs rgyas mdzad pa byed par 'gyur/ /thub dbang yongs su mya ngan
263a3(rgyud 'bum): 'das/ /dam pa'i chos ni bsrung ba'i phyir/ /de tshe rtag tu srung bar ni/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs ni 'gyur ba yin/ /sngags ni rab tu dbye don du/ /cho ga rgya chen bstan pa yin/ /de tshe dus kyi tha ma la/ /ma rungs mi bzad chen po
263a4(rgyud 'bum): yi/ /mi bdag gdug pa chen po ni/ /phan tshun gsod pa dag la dga'/ /sdig pa'i las can spyod pa ngan/ /de tshe longs spyod chung ba dang / /de tshe dus kyi tha ma la/ /'byung bar 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /sA la zhes bya'i nags
263a5(rgyud 'bum): su ni/ /de dag mchod don rtsom par byed/ /chu bo gser ldan 'gram dang ni/ /cod pan 'ching ba'i mchod rten du/ /zhi ba'i dbyings la brten pa'i phyir/ /nga ni mya ngan 'das mal 'cha'/ /lus ni sreg pa'i shing la bzhag /rdzogs
263a6(rgyud 'bum): longs spyod pa longs spyod spangs/ /de'i sngon mdzad pa nyid dang ni/ /nga yi rmad byung spyod mthong nas/ /nga yi gdul bya'i spyod yul dang / /sangs rgyas gdul bya'i mdzad pa dang / /spyod pa dge ba sna tshogs de/ /mi yi bdag po
263a7(rgyud 'bum): kun dran nas/ /thams cad mchod pa byed par 'gyur/ /lha dang lha min mir bcas pa/ /de nas sa bdag kun 'dus nas/ /de tshe nga yi drung du ni/ /dga' ston chen po mchod pa kun/ /byed par 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /sku ni shing
263a8(rgyud 'bum): la rab bteg nas/ /zang zing yon tan 'byung ba'i gnas/ /dge ba dang ni mi dge dang / /bsod nams bsod nams ma yin spangs/ /yang dag mtha' don stong nyid mtha'/ /phung po lnga ni 'byung ba che/ /sems can mang pos de rjes mthong / /
263b1(rgyud 'bum): bsod nams che ba'i don du sbyar/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po 'dod chags bral/ /nyan thos chen po bdag nyid che/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang / /sa bcu la ni yang dag gnas/ /yang dag mtha' ni rtogs nas
263b2(rgyud 'bum): kyang / /chos kyi mtha' la yang dag gnas/ /sems can kun la snying brtse bar/ /kun gyis yongs su bskor nas gnas/ /lha yi tshogs ni thams cad dang / /'phags dang so so'i skye bo dang / /'di kun bsod nams
263b3(rgyud 'bum): chen po'i gnas/ /mchod rten la ni 'dus par 'gyur/ /mi rtag sdug bsngal don gnas nas/ /dang ba'i sems ni rab tu thob/ /mchod rten mtha' yi nyen kor du/ /'byung po'i tshogs kyang 'dug pa yin/ /mchod pa chen po
263b4(rgyud 'bum): byas nas ni/ /smre sngags 'don cing ngu bar byed/ /dbugs 'byin snying rjes brlan nas ni/ /mchi ma'i thigs pa'ang rab tu 'dzag /smre sngags 'di ltar kun 'don pa/ /mi rtag sdug bsngal stong pa yi/ /sangs rgyas chos
263b5(rgyud 'bum): ni sngar ston mdzad/ /da ltar sa steng 'di la ni/ /de 'dir thub mchog dam pa ni/ /drang srong mchog gyur bdun pa dang / /sems can kun mchog shAkya'i rgyal/ /de mthong ba yi tha ma yin/ /sdug bsngal mi rtag ston pa yi/ /
263b6(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan de 'di gzims pa yi/ /mthong ba yi ni tha ma 'am/ /stong nyid don dam ston byed dang / /thog ma nas zhi don ston pa/ /lha yi tshogs dag ci yi phyir/ /kye ma mnga' bdag sad mi byed/ /rdzu 'phrul
263b7(rgyud 'bum): chen po lha yi bu/ /thams cad 'dir ni lhags par 'gyur/ /dpa' bo chen po chos don gnyer/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po nyan thos dang / /sems can kun ni sdug bsngal ba'i/ /mi dang lha dang lha ma yin/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rjes bskor ba'i/ /
263b8(rgyud 'bum): de yi dus ni 'di dag yin/ /bcom ldan khyod ni myur du bzhengs/ /sangs rgyas dus kyi rjes 'gro ba/ /rgya mtsho chen po'i dus bzhin du/ /thub pas de 'drar mi 'da' mdzod/ /yun ring dus nas brten mdzad pa'i/ /
264a1(rgyud 'bum): sems can mang po'i don mdzad stsol/ /zhi ba mya ngan 'das lam mam/ /bsam gtan rnam thar bstan du gsol/ /de ltar rnam pa du ma yi/ /smra ba mang po'i tshig brjod nas/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po'i lha yi
264a2(rgyud 'bum): tshogs/ /de nas thams cad cang mi smra/ /mtshungs med smre sngags byas nas ni/ /bdud dang bcas pas rab tu 'dug /yun ring ngu zhing smre byas nas/ /'gul nas mchi bcas sgra 'dzer bcas/ /mya ngan yid mi bde dang bcas/ /tshangs sogs
264a3(rgyud 'bum): lha dang lha min bcas/ /mi dang mi yi bdag po kun/ /sa steng de la gnas par 'gyur/ /gzhan yang shAkya'i rigs skyes pa/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po 'dod chags bral/ /bdag nyid chen po sangs rgyas ni/ /lha yi lha yi gnyen gyur pa/ /dge slong ma
264a4(rgyud 'bum): 'gags pa zhes bya/ /de gcung mi yi nang na dge/ /shin tu phra la mkhas shing gsal/ /chags bral lugs la mkhas pa dang / /dgra bcom gtso bo rgyal po ni/ /du ma'i 'khor gyis yongs su bskor/ /mya ngan gyis bskyed dbugs phyung
264a5(rgyud 'bum): nas/ /shin tu yun ring tshig kyang smras/ /snying rje yid mi bdes drangs pas/ /rgyal po dang bcas gyad rnams la/ /grogs po re zhig shing la ni/ /me ni 'jug par ma byed cig /ji srid bcom ldan sras po ni/ /mchog gyur chos nyid
264a6(rgyud 'bum): las byung ba/ /de ni nyan thos rdzu 'phrul che/ /'od srung chen po zhes bya ba/ /thub pa chen po blo yi mchog /bram ze'i rigs skyes zang zing med/ /ma ga d+hA yi mi nang skyes/ /ri bo der ni mnyam par bzhag /grong khyer rgyal po'i
264a7(rgyud 'bum): khab mchog tu/ /pi ba la yi khyim du gnas/ /de ni myur du 'dir 'ong bar/ /byed kyi gzhan du ma yin no/ /lha ni gang zhig der dang ba/ /sku la me 'bar nges bzlog pas/ /de bar sku la me gtong ba/ /ngal ba don med ma byed cig /
264a8(rgyud 'bum): ji srid rdzu 'phrul che ba'i mchog /nyan thos thub pa thugs dgyes des/ /'jig rten gsum mchod sangs rgyas dang / /ston pa 'jig rten gyis mchod la/ /zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ /bla ma g.yas su bskor byas pa/ /de tshe sku 'di
264b1(rgyud 'bum): sbar don du/ /der ni kun gyis rab byos shig /gang tshe sngar ni sbar gyur na/ /kun tu 'bar ba'ang don med 'gyur/ /thams cad don med ma byed cig /'dir ni ngal ba kho na 'byung / /blo dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas/ /kun la de skad smras nas ni/ /
264b2(rgyud 'bum): mi dang mi yi bdag po dang / /gyad rnams kun kyang 'dug par gyur/ /mi yi rigs su nga skyes shing / /mi rnams kyis kyang rab tu skyed/ /longs spyod rnam mang gzhan dang ni/ /bzo dang sgyu rtsal dge ba'ang bskyed/ /sa steng shing gi rtsa dag tu/ /mi yi gzugs
264b3(rgyud 'bum): kyis byang chub thob/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi mdzad pa ni/ /mi rnams la ni chos kyang bstan/ /de nyid phyir na mi rnams kyis/ /sku sbyang don phyir me yang sbar/ /nga ming 'byung po kun gyi ni/ /mchog nyid du ni gyur pa yin/ /mi yi 'jig rten
264b4(rgyud 'bum): zhi ba dang / /nga ni mya ngan 'das par brtags/ /gang dag sangs rgyas thams cad ni/ /'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar gyi/ /thams cad mi yi 'jig rten du/ /mi yi lus su yang dag 'byung / /skye dang byang chub de bzhin du/ /dam chos 'khor lo dge ba spyod/ /zhi ba
264b5(rgyud 'bum): yang dag kun gshegs par/ /de bzhin rang rgyal dgra bcom pa/ /mi yi lus la brten nas ni/ /bla med zhi bar gshegs pa yin/ /bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab par/ /de dag la ni ngas phan byas/ /nga ni phyi mar zhi ba dang / /bsil bar
264b6(rgyud 'bum): gyur cing 'gog par gyur/ /sa steng stongs par gyur pa na/ /der ni sku gdung rab bzhag pa/ /mi rnams la ni phan don du/ /mchod pa rjes su gzung 'dod pas/ /'jig rten lha dang lha min bcas/ /mi dang gnod sbyin mkha' lding bdag /srin po
264b7(rgyud 'bum): yi dags grul bum dang / /rdzu 'phrul chen po'i sha za rnams/ /'byung po dag ni thams cad dang / /gzar bcas ma mo rnams dang ni/ /de bzhin 'jig rten thams cad ni/ /grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab khams/ /srog chags thams cad nyid dag ni/ /
264b8(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa'i don phyir sku gdung dag /sa steng stongs par gyur pa na/ /de yi tshe na yang dag bzhag /kha cig sa steng mi dag dang / /lha yi rgyal po de bzhin gzhan/ /lha min dbang po rdzu 'phrul che/ /sa 'og gnas pa gzhan dag dang / /
265a1(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin klu rgyal lha min dag /sku gdung so so so sor ni/ /yon tan ldan pa rdzu 'phrul ches/ /phyogs nas thams cad bdag gir byas/ /rang gi gnas su khyer nas ni/ /de tshe mchod pa byed 'gyur zhing / /rdzu 'phrul chen po sangs
265a2(rgyud 'bum): rgyas su/ /thams cad the tshom med par 'gyur/ /mchog dang tha ma bar gnas pa'i/ /sems ni dad pa rnam gsum gyis/ /'jig rten rnam gsum 'gyur ba ni/ /sangs rgyas bse ru dgra bcom thob/ /theg pa rnam gsum 'jig
265a3(rgyud 'bum): rten gsum/ /rnam gsum yang dag bstan pa yin/ /theg chen la 'jug lam gyis ni/ /de la brten nas nges par 'byung / /rang rgyal byang chub la brten pa/ /de bzhin 'jig rten 'gyur ba yin/ /de las gzhan pa nyan thos
265a4(rgyud 'bum): kyang / /rdzu 'phrul chen po 'dod chags bral/ /de bzhin 'jig rten 'gyur ba yin/ /rnam gsum rigs kyis rnam par brgyan/ /sa bdag longs spyod chen po dang / /bde chen don du 'khor los sgyur/ /lha dang mi yi phun sum tshogs/ /
265a5(rgyud 'bum): yun ring de tshe rjes myong nas/ /mthar ni 'chi ba la brten nas/ /de dag zhi ba rnam gsum 'gro/ /dang por sngar ni sangs rgyas dang / /da ltar ma 'ongs pa dag kyang / /thams cad la ni 'di nyid de/ /'di ni yang dag ji bzhin bstan/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i
265a6(rgyud 'bum): sa de la/ /lha rnams thams cad 'dug nas ni/ /yid byung sems ni skyo nas kyang / /skad 'dzer bcas pas smra ba ni/ /de tshe thams cad 'di skad smra/ /kye ma'o kyi hud mi rtag pa/ /'jig rten sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul che/ /de 'dir yongs su mya ngan 'das/ /
265a7(rgyud 'bum): lha yi rgyal po rdzu 'phrul che/ /de dag kun gyis de smras nas/ /snying ni mya ngan bcas gyur nas/ /de nas cang mi smra bar gnas/ /ma ga d+hA yi skye bo mchog /ku sha'i mchog gi grong gnas pa/ /de dang nye ba'i ri bo ni/ /phag rgod ces bya'i ming du
265a8(rgyud 'bum): grags/ /dge slong bsam gtan der byed pa/ /pi pa li yi phug zhugs pa/ /'di ni nyan thos nga yi bu/ /thugs skyes chos las byung ba gang / /de ni 'od srung chen po yin/ /de tshe phug mchog la 'dug nas/ /de nas bsod snyoms la spyad de/ /
265b1(rgyud 'bum): 'dug nas rang nyid sems par byed/ /dus ring bdag gis sangs rgyas la/ /bdag gis kyang ni de phyag byas/ /rang byung gyur pa mi yi mchog /bdag gis da ltar de blta bya/ /shAkya'i rigs skyes thub pa mchog /bcom ldan de ni
265b2(rgyud 'bum): ga la bzhugs/ /bram ze'i rgyal po 'od srung che/ /der ni yang dag dgongs par gyur/ /thub pa'i thub pa kho na ni/ /sems kyis de ltar bsam par gyur/ /lha yi mig gis 'jig rten la/ /'jig rten ma lus lta bar byed/ /'og min
265b3(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin 'jig rten mtha'/ /srid rtse'i 'jig rten khams kyi bar/ /'jig rten ma lus thams cad dang / /stong chen sred pa las byung ba/ /nyan thos spyod yul ji tsam par/ /lha yi mig gis blta byas na/ /mya ngan 'das gzims
265b4(rgyud 'bum): zhi ba dang / /bsil bar gyur cing nad med pa/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po lha tshogs kyis/ /kun nas yongs su bskor ba dang / /mi dang mi yi bdag po dang / /lha min gnod sbyin srin po dang / /'byung po'i tshogs ni thams cad dang / /byang chub sems dpa'
265b5(rgyud 'bum): rdzu 'phrul che/ /grags chen nyan thos chen po yang / /shes rab gtsor ni gyur pa dang / /'dod chags bcas dang 'dod chags bral/ /lha dang bcas pa'i mi rnams kyis/ /dpa' bo shing la bteg pa ni/ /sangs rgyas nyi
265b6(rgyud 'bum): ma'i rigs las byung / /de bzhin lha yi lhar gyur gtso/ /thub pa dam pa'i mnga' bdag ni/ /sa bdag gling la gnas rnams kyis/ /kun nas yongs su bskor gyur nas/ /mi yi dbang mchog gyad dag gis/ /lag na rtswa sgron
265b7(rgyud 'bum): yang dag thogs/ /de dag me sbar mi nus par/ /lha rnams kyis ni bzlog 'gyur zhes/ /dge slong ma 'gags pa yang ni/ /brtul zhugs can gyis de skad smras/ /'chi mas brnangs shing smre sngags 'don/ /sa rnams sgra ni chen pos
265b8(rgyud 'bum): gang / /ha ha zhes bya'i sgra nyid dang / /rnga bo che yi sgra yang thos/ /lha dang drang srong tshogs kyis khyab/ /lha yi bu mo'i tshogs kyis bstod/ /grub pa rig 'dzin klu dang ni/ /mi 'am ci klu rgya che ba/ /snyan pa'i sgra ni sgrogs par
266a1(rgyud 'bum): byed/ /bya yi skad ni dge ba dang / /yid 'ong sna tshogs rol mo dang / /lha dang mi yis rjed pa dang / /lha yi bu mo'i tshogs kyis gang / /grub pa rig 'dzin dag dang ldan/ /de tshe sA la'i nags dag tu/ /rnal 'byor dag gis
266a2(rgyud 'bum): kun tu khyab/ /thub mchog gzims mal dam pa ni/ /kun nas yongs su bskor bar mthong / /rdzu 'phrul chen po mya ngan bral/ /de nas dbugs 'byin mya ngan bcas/ /de tshe bram ze 'od srung ni/ /
266a3(rgyud 'bum): mchi ma'i thigs pa'ang rab tu 'don/ /nga yi nyan thos mchog gyur pa/ /de tshe sa yi steng du 'gyel/ /tshig kyang myur du brjod pa ni/ /kye ma'o dka' ba rab tu byung / /gang du sangs rgyas zhes bya ba/ /
266a4(rgyud 'bum): zag med mya ngan 'das gyur tam/ /mi rtag sdug bsngal stong pa zhes/ /de nyid kyis ni 'dir gsungs pa/ /skye ba gzhan gyi rjes 'gro ba/ /bdag gis ston pa'i sku mi mthong / /de nas langs nas myur
266a5(rgyud 'bum): du ni/ /ma ga d+hA yi rgyal por song / /sdug bsngal nyam thag ma skyes dgra/ /pha yi mya ngan gyis non pa'i/ /de tshe de yi phug 'ongs nas/ /mi yi bdag po de la smras/ /rkang gnyis dam pa rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /
266a6(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po chen po mya ngan 'das/ /bzhon pa myur du sbyor mdzod dang / /nga ni ston pa'i drung 'gro ba/ /sA lar gzims mal bzhugs pa ni/ /nad med sems dang rnam par bral/ /
266a7(rgyud 'bum): bstan pa thams cad las 'das shing / /sku yi dam pa longs spyod rdzogs/ /ma rungs de tshig thos nas ni/ /rgyal po de yang sdug bsngal zhing / /nyam thag smre bar gyur pa yi/ /de tshe tshig ni rgyal po
266a8(rgyud 'bum): 'don/ /ston pa dang ni pha dag dang / /gnyi ga las kyang bdag nyams gyur/ /gnyen rnams kun gyis spangs pa ste/ /de tshe skye bo yid ches med/ /dmyal ba mi bzad ltung 'gyur na/ /bdag ni su yi skyabs la brten/ /
266b1(rgyud 'bum): nyan thos ston pa'i mchog gyur pa/ /dpa' bo chen po skyabs mdzod cig /nyan thos chen po gzi brjid che/ /bdag gi 'tsho ba 'di na med/ /ma ga d+hA yi mi yi bdag /de nas de skad smras pa dang / /nyan thos mchog
266b2(rgyud 'bum): gi rkang gnyis la/ /de yi mod la spyi bos gtugs/ /der ni sems med brgyal gyur pa/ /de yi tshe na gzhon nu ni/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po 'jam pa'i dbyangs/ /dbugs 'byin pa ni byed par 'gyur/ /
266b3(rgyud 'bum): sems can rjes su gzung 'dod pas/ /'jig rten kun tu rgyu bar gyis/ /gang tshe sA la'i nags su ni/ /nga lus shing gi steng bzhag pa/ /byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs bskor nas/ /de tshe khyod
266b4(rgyud 'bum): ni 'dug par 'gyur/ /gang phyir nga lus mchod pa'i phyir/ /sa steng 'dir ni khyod kyis byas/ /'jig rten kun tu bltas nas ni/ /su zhig sdug bsngal gang las drang / /gzhon nu zab pa'i
266b5(rgyud 'bum): blo ldan pa/ /de ltar sa la 'gyel bar gyur/ /'jam dpal gyis ni de yi tshe/ /sa bdag de ni sdug bsngal ba/ /der gnas pa la khyod kyis ni/ /khyod nyid kyis ni de 'dul 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpas rtogs 'gyur
266b6(rgyud 'bum): gyis/ /lha dang drang srong rnams dang ni/ /nyan thos rang rgyal gzhan dag dang / /rdzu 'phrul chen pos mi nus so/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis mi bdag ni/ /rmi lam gnas pa bzhin du mthong / /khyod kyi rdzu 'phrul
266b7(rgyud 'bum): byin rlabs kyis/ /rgyal po mya ngan gyis brgyal des/ /de tshe de ni rmi lam du/ /mngon sum byis pa lta bur mthong / /rdzu 'phrul chen po 'jam pa'i dbyangs/ /gzhon nu bdag nyid sna
266b8(rgyud 'bum): tshogs pa/ /de bzhin chos ni rnam par 'phrul/ /byang chub sems dpa' byis pa'i gzugs/ /sna tshogs rdzu 'phrul bsam mi khyab/ /'jam dpal gyis bstan sems dang byas/ /rgyal po mnar med 'gro ba las/ /
267a1(rgyud 'bum): myur du de las ldang bar 'gyur/ /rnam pa sna tshogs las dang ni/ /ngan song mtho ris bzang po dang / /'gro ba bdag nyid che yon tan/ /nyan thos thams cad rnam spangs pa/ /de nas rgya cher byas pa ni/ /mdo sde 'gyod pa sel ba
267a2(rgyud 'bum): ste/ /rgyal po ma skyes dgra yi ni/ /shin tu rgya cher gsal ba'o/ /rgya che don gyis brgyan pa yi/ /mdor bsdus nas ni 'di gsungs so/ /dang po bar ma tha ma yi/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung dag ni/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i
267a3(rgyud 'bum): phyir/ /cho ga rgya cher gsungs pa yin/ /de nas 'jam dpal dus kun tu/ /gzhon nu khyod ni de yi tshe/ /sdig pa'i las la rjes 'jug pa'i/ /sa bdag rnams ni 'dul bar 'gyur/ /khyod ni rdzu 'phrul bsam mi khyab/ /
267a4(rgyud 'bum): gdul bya dag kyang bsam mi khyab/ /'byung po'i tshogs rnams ma lus pa/ /khyod ni 'dul byed nyid du 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas dpa' bos de gsungs nas/ /'od chen ldan pa 'jam dbyangs la/ /gnas gtsang steng bzhugs de
267a5(rgyud 'bum): tshe gzigs/ /rkang gnyis dam pa rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /smra ba'i mchog gis de la gsungs/ /bskal pa mang po 'das pa na/ /khyod ni rdzogs sangs rgyas par 'gyur/ /grangs kyis mnyam med bsam mi khyab/ /mi yis
267a6(rgyud 'bum): grangs dang mnyam med par/ /'jam pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten 'byung bar 'gyur/ /rtag tu yang ni mthar gyis kyang / /sangs rgyas mdzad pa de tshe byed/ /sems can mang po rnam bkrol nas/ /mya ngan 'das
267a7(rgyud 'bum): pa nyid du 'gyur/ /gzhon nu'i gzugs can rdzu 'phrul che/ /gzhon nu la ni de gsungs nas/ /brtse bas brlan pa'i sems kyis ni/ /yun ring dbugs phyung rnam par skyo/ /yun ring rdzogs sangs rgyas bltas nas/ /
267a8(rgyud 'bum): mchi ma'i thigs pa'ang rnam 'dzag cing / /thal mo sbyar dang bcas nas ni/ /de nas kyang ni 'dug par gyur/ /de nas de ni sa gnas pa/ /mi yi dam pa ma skyes dgras/ /rmad byung 'od srung chen po ni/ /bram ze la ni mgos btud nas/ /dran pa
267b1(rgyud 'bum): rnyed cing sems sad nas/ /rkang gnyis skyil krung bcas nas 'dug /de nas yun ring dbugs phyung la/ /don ni rgya cher nges bstan byas/ /dbang phyug chen po ma skyes dgra/ /rgyal po'i bu ni 'dug par gyur/ /de nas 'od
267b2(rgyud 'bum): srung ches smras pa/ /nga ni spur sbyong gnas su 'gro/ /mi rnams la ni phan phyir dang / /mchod rten gzugs gnas mchod don du'o/ /nyan thos mchog ni gnas de ru/ /rdzu 'phrul nyid kyis nye bar lhags/ /de dang 'brel
267b3(rgyud 'bum): bar sems skye ba/ /bdag gi rdzu 'phrul rigs pa min/ /mchod rten chen po mthong bar ni/ /rkang gnyis bdag ni 'gro bar 'tshal/ /de nas lam gyi bar 'dug nas/ /'khor ba'i stegs ni rab tu bstan/ /ji tsam de nas 'ongs
267b4(rgyud 'bum): gyur pa/ /dge 'dun kun dga' rar gnas pa'i/ /dge slong rgan zhugs gsar bu ni/ /sdig pa nyid kyis rnam rmongs pas/ /mthong nas rgan zhugs rnams 'khrugs te/ /gang phyir de dang nye bar 'ongs/ /grags pa che zhing
267b5(rgyud 'bum): skal ba che/ /sems can dag pa rims nad med/ /bram ze de yi drung lhags nas/ /de tshe rkang gnyis phyag byas nas/ /de la smras pa skal ba che/ /legs 'ongs khyod ni ci phyir byon/ /myur du khyod ni gang du 'gro/ /yid byung ci phyir rab tu
267b6(rgyud 'bum): 'dug / de smras khro ldan byis pa la/ /tshe ldan khyod kyis ma thos sam/ /rkang gnyis dam pa rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /'jig rten kun gyi ston pa ni/ /sangs rgyas bdag gi pha zhes smra/ /mar me 'bar bzhin mya ngan 'das/ /
267b7(rgyud 'bum): dpa' bo chen po nub par gyur/ /sa yi steng ni stongs par gyur/ /de bzhin 'jig rten ma lus stongs/ /bdag gi phyogs rnams kun stongs gyur/ /byis de phyin ci log sems kyis/ /der ni rgan zhugs rab dga' nas/ /rab
267b8(rgyud 'bum): rgod tshig tu smras pa ni/ /rab tu ring de 'das gyur tam/ /phyag ring lus ni che ba dang / /mgo ni gdugs kyi rnam pa 'dra/ /bdag cag rnams kyi gtso bo mchog /bslab dang bslab min rjes su ston/ /da ltar de ni mya
268a1(rgyud 'bum): ngan 'das/ /ci 'dod bzhin du bdag cag spyod/ /rgan zhugs kyis ni de smras nas/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po rab 'khrugs nas/ /gdong la khro gnyer byas nas ni/ /yi ge hU~M ni rab tu sbyar/ /sdom brtson bag chags bslang nas ni/ /
268a2(rgyud 'bum): bram ze de mod rab 'khrugs nas/ /rkang pa'i mthe bos de ma thag /sa yi steng du rab bsnun pas/ /sa rnams dang ni ri rab kyang / /rab tu 'gul bar gyur pa dang / /rgya mtsho rnams dang shing rnams dang / /ri rab kun kyang 'khrugs
268a3(rgyud 'bum): par gyur/ /klu rgyal dang ni lha rnams dang / /ri sul phug kyang rnam par 'gyel/ /zla ba dang ni nyi ma dang / /sa steng de tshe snang ba nyams/ /rlung yang rgyu ba med par gnas/ /skar mda' dag kyang sa la ltung / /de nas de ni sngags zhes brjod/ /
268a4(rgyud 'bum): nyan thos rnams kyi rigs las byung / /yi ge hU~M de yi ge gcig /las rnams ma lus byed cing dge/ /sngags kyi rgyal po bzlas tsam gyis/ /'di ni bzlas pa tsam gyis byed/ /'gro dang gnas pa'i dug dang ni/ /de bzhin dgra
268a5(rgyud 'bum): kun rengs par byed/ /sems can gdug pa thams cad la/ /bzlas pa tsam gyis rengs par byed/ /rnam pa sna tshogs las byed cing / /khyad par du yang gzhan nyid byed/ /rgan zhugs tshig kyal rab smras pa/ /der ni mi smrar mthur bltas 'dug /
268a6(rgyud 'bum): de yi rdzu 'phrul la dad nas/ /de yi mod la rnam par btul/ /de tshe nyan thos mchog gi ni/ /gdung sbyong shing gi drung du khyer/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po 'dod chags bral/ /dge slong de ni rkang gis song / /der song des ni thub pa'i sku/ /shing la
268a7(rgyud 'bum): yod par rab tu mthong / /lha yi tshogs ni du mas kyang / /mchod pa chen po byed pa dang / /gau ta ma ni thub pa yi/ /sku ni shing gi steng bzhag mthong / /'od srung chen po rmad byung ba/ /skal ba chen po de mthong nas/ /rdzu 'phrul chen pos dge
268a8(rgyud 'bum): slong rnams/ /thams cad smre sngags 'don par byed/ /lha dang 'byung po'i tshogs kun ni/ /ha ha'i rnam pa rab 'don cing / /de ltar mya ngan skyes pa yi/ /nyam thag sgra ni shin tu che/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po lha dang klu/ /de nas kun gyis rab bsu nas/ /rkang
268b1(rgyud 'bum): gnyis mchog la phyag byos zhes/ /skal ba che la'ang rab tu smras/ /lha tshogs mi dang bcas pa dang / /'byung po kun gyi tshogs dag dang / /mi bdag drang srong gnod sbyin dag /khyod la sdod cing gzhol ba yin/ /shing la me gtong
268b2(rgyud 'bum): 'bad gyur kyang / /sku sbyong shing ni sbar mi nus/ /de nas de ni skyon bral ba/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po skal ba ches/ /gdung sbyong shing gi smad cha la/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po des phyag byas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rjes dran nas/ /bskor ba dag
268b3(rgyud 'bum): kyang mang du byas/ /de tshe lcags kyi sgrom dral nas/ /zhabs gnyis dag kyang rnam brkyang la/ /yang dang yang du zhabs byugs nas/ /zhabs gnyis spyi bos phyag byas nas/ /thub mchog mchog gi zhabs gnyis la/ /
268b4(rgyud 'bum): lan mang dag tu rnam par bltas/ /des ni zhabs gnyis yang zhugs te/ /lcags kyi sgrom la yang dag gnas/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po 'dod chags bral/ /de ni de nas langs 'dug pa/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po 'dod chags bral/ /dgra
268b5(rgyud 'bum): bcom rnams kyis yongs su bskor/ /ma ga d+hA gtso rgyal po yang / /sku sbyong shing gi thad 'ongs pa/ /glang po shing rta bzhon rta dang / /mthar gyis de nas theg pa yis/ /de nas dpung chen sa yi bdag /kun kyang stobs dang bzhon
268b6(rgyud 'bum): par bcas/ /de tshe thub pa shAka thub la/ /de ni phyag 'tshal don du lhags/ /sa steng zhi ba'i gzims mal du/ /bas mtha' dgon par mya ngan 'das/ /chu bo gser ldan 'gram dang ni/ /cod pan bcings pa'i mchod rten du/ /zhi ba'i
268b7(rgyud 'bum): dbyings la yang dag zhugs/ /yang dag mtha' la yongs su brten/ /ma ga d+hA yi rgyal po der/ /dpung chen ldan pas yang dag lhags/ /rnam pa sna tshogs spyod pa yis/ /de yang nga la stod par byed/ /phan yon che zhing stobs
268b8(rgyud 'bum): dang ldan/ /ngo mtshar sa yi rgyan gyur pa/ /thub pa'i sku sbyangs las byung ba'i/ /der ni sku gdung mchod rten byas/ /dge slong kun dga' bo zhes bya/ /slob pa nga yi bsnyen bkur ba/ /mi yi dam pa mnyes gshin pa/ /nga la rtag
269a1(rgyud 'bum): tu yongs su dad/ /yid ni zhum zhing mya ngan gdungs/ /de yi tshe na 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de nas 'od srung thad song nas/ /rkang pa gnyis la rab btud nas/ /sdug bsngal nyam thag 'dar ba yis/ /'di skad
269a2(rgyud 'bum): sgra ni 'dzer bas smras/ /deng 'dir nga yi ston pa 'das/ /da ltar bdag ni mgon med gyur/ /nga yi rten dang gnas dang skyabs/ /khyod nyid du ni rab tu bstan/ /thub pa'i zla ba de nyid kyis/ /nye gnas khyod kyir lung
269a3(rgyud 'bum): yang bstan/ /nyon mongs kun ni rnam spangs pa/ /khyod kyi nye gnas dgra bcom pa/ /thun gyi phyi ma mtshan mtha' la/ /rgyal ba des ni bstan pa yin/ /nga nyid mya ngan 'das pa na/ /rtag tu khyod ni yod par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas mdzad
269a4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i don du ni/ /phan par 'dod pas khyod byed 'gyur/ /sdug bsngal can bdag spangs nas kyang / /thub pa chen po zhi bar gshegs/ /blo ldan ma 'gags pa zhes pas/ /sdom chen de ni dbugs 'byin byed/ /khyod
269a5(rgyud 'bum): ni mya ngan du ma byed/ /mya ngan dag kyang ma byed cig /gnas ni gang du'ang 'gro ma byed/ /'di nyid du ni gnas par gyis/ /'jig rten mig ni 'das gyur nas/ /'di nyid ston par 'gyur ba yin/ /'dir ni ston pas lung
269a6(rgyud 'bum): bstan nas/ /sangs rgyas mdzad pa byed par 'gyur/ /nga yang bcom ldan lhan cig tu/ /'od srung rjes su 'gro bar bya/ /ston pa gnyis po dag gi yang / /sa yi steng na gzugs brnyan yin/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po'i nyan
269a7(rgyud 'bum): thos ni/ /'od srung chen po gtso bo ni/ /'tsho zhing yongs su gzhes pas na/ /khyod ni mya ngan ma byed cig /rdzu 'phrul chen po snying rjes non/ /rnal 'byor chen po 'dod chags bral/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po thub pa'i sras/ /thams cad
269a8(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin smre bar byed/ /gyad dang rgyal po dag gis ni/ /pur sbyong shing la me btang bas/ /'khor yug kun nas me 'bar nas/ /pur sbyong shing de thal bar gyur/ /de mthong lha yi tshogs dag dang / /gdengs can brang 'gro rnams
269b1(rgyud 'bum): kyis ni/ /pur sbyong shing gnas zhi ba'i phyir/ /tsan+dan chu yi rgyun dag gi/ /char chen rab tu gtong zhing gnas/ /de nas de yi mod la yang / /sa steng du yang de bzhin du/ /me tog tshogs kyi char yang btang / /rgyal ba'i ring bsrel
269b2(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa'i phyir/ /de yi mod la kun der lhags/ /thams cad phan tshun 'thab pa'i phyir/ /de yi mod la bya ba rtsom/ /tshangs sogs brgya byin 'thab bral dang / /lha tshogs kun kyang de bzhin no/ /nyan thos chen po
269b3(rgyud 'bum): 'dod chags bral/ /rdzu 'phrul chen pos zlog par byas/ /sku gdung rgyal ba'i ring bsrel ni/ /'od srung chen pos rnam bgos pa/ /mchod pa'i don du thams cad la/ /cung zad cung zad nges par byin/ /theg pa gsum las
269b4(rgyud 'bum): mi ldog dang / /zhi ba mthar phyin bya phyir ro/ /rnal 'byor de tshe 'od srung che/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po 'dod chags bral/ /rgan zhugs kyis ni smras pa'i tshig /de ni yongs su sems par byed/ /'dir ni gsung rab ma
269b5(rgyud 'bum): lus pa/ /yan lag bcu gnyis bde 'byung gnas/ /mdo dang 'dul ba mngon pa'i chos/ /nam mkha'i dud bzhin ma gyur tam/ /dpa' bo chen po nub gyur nas/ /bstan pa 'jig par 'gyur bas na/ /
269b6(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas gsung ba'i bka' 'di ni/ /ma lus bdag gis bsdu bar bya/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po 'dod chags bral/ /ma lus lhan cig bgro bar bya/ /ma ga d+hA yi grong mchog tu/ /grong khyer bzang po rgyal po'i
269b7(rgyud 'bum): khab/ /ku sha'i grong khyer nyams dga' dang / /ri ni rdo 'jog mtho ba dang / /yul bzang yangs pa can dang ni/ /mchod rten gnas ni legs mdzes pa/ /de bzhin rnam pa du ma'i gnas/ /bstan pa bsdu ba'i ched dag tu/ /'dus
269b8(rgyud 'bum): nas smra ba kun smra ba/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po byed par 'gyur/ /nga yang 'dir ni nub pa dang / /de tshe dus kyi tha ma la/ /phan tshun gsod par dga' ba yi/ /sa bdag rnams ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /las kyi mtha' mang dge slong rnams/ /
270a1(rgyud 'bum): sems can rnams ni chags pas rmongs/ /de bzhin dge bsnyen dge bsnyen ma/ /dus kyi mtha' la ma zhir 'gyur/ /phan tshun skyon ni 'tshol byed cing / /phan tshun gsod la
270a2(rgyud 'bum): mngon par zhen/ /rma ldan skyon ni ma rungs ltar/ /skyon la rtag tu rtog par byed/ /thub pa de dus nub pa na/ /dge slong rnams ni ma bsdams 'gyur/ /de tshe sa steng bstan pa ni/ /
270a3(rgyud 'bum): bsrung ba'i don du bzhag gyur pa/ /chags bral zag med 'jig rten du/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po rnam pa brgyad/ /de tshe dgra bcom thu bo yang / /sgra gcan 'dzin sogs
270a4(rgyud 'bum): rab tu bsgrags/ /de tshe dus kyi tha ma la/ /de dag kyang ni snang ba med/ /sngags pa grub pa'i dus su ni/ /de dag mthong ba don yod 'gyur/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing rdzu 'phrul che/ /
270a5(rgyud 'bum): ngas kyang thams cad bzhag pa yin/ /grags pa chen po chad pa'i las/ /de dag la ni ngas bstan pa/ /de dag bka' las 'das pa 'am/ /cung zad bslab las rnam 'das na'o/ /ji srid dam
270a6(rgyud 'bum): chos yang dag mtha'/ /zang zing med par gnas par gyis/ /nga yi gsung gi bsod nams 'di/ /ji srid bstan pa stobs dang ldan/ /des na bdag nyid zhir 'gyur zhing / /zag med mya ngan
270a7(rgyud 'bum): 'da' bar 'gyur/ /de tshe thub pa'i bstan pa ni/ /yongs su nub par 'gyur ba na/ /dge slong rnams dang dge tshul rnams/ /dge slong ma rnams ser snar bcas/ /rtag tu ngan spyod g.yo sgyu can/ /
270a8(rgyud 'bum): de tshe yongs su ma dag pa'o/ /nga yi bstan la mi gnas shing / /khyim dang chung ma tshol bar byed/ /de yi tshe na dge bsnyen rnams/ /gzhan gyi bud med la rtag dang / /lhag ma rnam pa bzhi po nyid/ /de tshe rtags dang ming tsam yod/ /'khon
270b1(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin thams cad goms byed cing / /gcig la gcig ni rnam 'tshe byed/ /phal cher mu stegs kyis non cing / /lha rnams kun kyang gnod par 'gyur/ /de tshe bram ze'i rigs la ni/ /skye bo rnams ni dga' bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin log
270b2(rgyud 'bum): spyod rmongs pa dang / /mi rnams srog chags 'tshe bar dga'/ /nga ni yongs su mya ngan 'das/ /rtsod dus 'di la lung bstan yin/ /mi ni rnam mang gzhan dag kyang / /rtag tu gzhan gyi bud med dga'/ /mi dge kun la
270b3(rgyud 'bum): dga' ba dang / /dge ba'i don ni rnam spangs pa/ /nga ni sa steng zhir gshegs nas/ /sems can mang po 'byung bar 'gyur/ /nga yi sku ni mchod pa'i phyir/ /gzi brjid chen po lha tshogs dang / /bdag nyid chen po
270b4(rgyud 'bum): mi rnams dang / /de bzhin gnod sbyin 'byung po'i tshogs/ /lha min dang ni dri za dang / /rdzu 'phrul chen po mi 'am ci/ /de nas mkha' lding klu dang ni/ /de bzhin srin po drang srong rnams/ /rnal 'byor pa dang grub pa dang / /gzi brjid chen po
270b5(rgyud 'bum): gza' rnams dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs skye gnas dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs sems can rnams/ /srid pa'i 'ching bas bcings pa dang / /blo ldan 'ching ba bcad pa dang / /sku gdung nad bral 'di la ni/ /de tshe mchod pa byed
270b6(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ /chu bo gser ldan 'gram dang ni/ /sA la zung gi tshal dang ni/ /cod pan bcings pa'i mchod rten dang / /gyad rnams kyi ni nyen 'khor du/ /nga ni der yang mya ngan 'da'/ /'jig med zhi bar yongs
270b7(rgyud 'bum): su 'gro/ /nga yi sku gdung de blangs nas/ /de bzhin gzhan gyis 'phrog par byed/ /lha dang lha ma yin rnams dang / /de tshe 'byung po'i tshogs kun gyis/ /so sor cha ni rnam phye nas/ /rnam par gzhag
270b8(rgyud 'bum): pa byas par gyur/ /mi yi rgyal po dpung chen ldan/ /ma ga d+hA yi ma skyes dgra/ /rdzu 'phrul che ldan nyan thos ni/ /kun la'ang gsol ba rab 'debs pa/ /bsod nams bdag gis ma byas pas/ /
271a1(rgyud 'bum): bdag gi pha yang shi bar gyur/ /bdag ni sdug bsngal ltung gyur pas/ /bdag nyid chen pos drang du gsol/ /de nas blo ldan nyan thos mchog /sangs rgyas thugs las skyes pa'i sras/ /'od srung chen po zhes grags
271a2(rgyud 'bum): pa/ /skye dgu rnams la phan byed pas/ /ma skyes dgra ni ngo tsha ldan/ /sems zhum gyur te mthong nas ni/ /rdzu 'phrul nyid la rab gnas nas/ /de yi dus su yang dag dgongs/ /rgyal ba'i ring bsrel sku gdung ni/ /cha gcig
271a3(rgyud 'bum): khyod kyis blang bar gyis/ /rgyal po gzhan ni stobs ldan gyis/ /gzhan dag rab tu khyer bar gyur/ /phan tshun bab col 'khrugs nas ni/ /gcig la gcig ni 'khon byas nas/ /de tshe nam mkhar sku gdung khyer/ /
271a4(rgyud 'bum): rang gi gnas su'ang bzhag par 'gyur/ /de tshe thub pa'i nyan thos mchog /dge slong 'od srung chen po de/ /kye ma'o kyi hud sems pa ni/ /sa steng 'dir ni rab stongs pa/ /sangs rgyas dang ni rang rgyal dang / /rdzu 'phrul chen po'i
271a5(rgyud 'bum): nyan thos kyis/ /sems can 'jigs par snang ba ste/ /srid pa'i btson rar spyod pa yin/ /rnam pa sna tshogs sdug bsngal drag /yun ring rjes su myong bar 'gyur/ /'jig rten mgon po skyob pa yi/ /ring bsrel yang dag
271a6(rgyud 'bum): mchod byas nas/ /de dag lha yi 'jig rten du/ /yun mi thung bar bde ba myong / /rgyal srid de nas longs spyod dang / /rnyed par dka' ba'i sngags rnams ni/ /'gro ba sna tshogs spyod pa yis/ /rnam pa sna tshogs
271a7(rgyud 'bum): thob par 'gyur/ /phun tshogs 'dod pa 'jig rten mchog /rnam thar gsum gyis rnam par brgyan/ /sku gdung rnams ni mchod byas na/ /grub pa mchog ni thob par 'gyur/ /'jig rten rnams grags bram ze zhes/ /thub pa mchog ni nyan thos gtso/ /'od srung zhes
271a8(rgyud 'bum): ni bya ba yis/ /'di ltar de ni bsams nas ni/ /de tshe sa las ma phye bar/ /de yi sku gdung blangs nas ni/ /ma ga d+hA bdag ma skyes dgras/ /'bad nas cung zad yongs su byin/ /de bzhin rgyal po kun la yang / /'od chen po ni ma mthong yang / /
271b1(rgyud 'bum): nyan thos bdag nyid chen po des/ /kun la'ang thams cad rab tu byin/ /kun la'ang mi rtag 'du shes kyis/ /de na yang ni gnas par gyur/ /snying rjes brlan pa'i sems kyis ni/ /sems can rnams la mya ngan byed/ /shAkya'i skyes mchog bstan pa ni/ /
271b2(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten dam chos nub pa na/ /bskal pa rnam pa mang por ni/ /yun ring sems can dud par 'gyur/ /'di dag dud bzhin mi 'gyur bar/ /'di dag gsung ni bsdu bar bya/ /dpa' bo de las langs nas ni/ /sems kyi stobs ni nyams
271b3(rgyud 'bum): pa med/ /rgyal po ma skyes dgrar gyur pa'i/ /mi yi dbang pos mgron du bos/ /ston pa'i bstan pa bya ba'i phyir/ /rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer 'dir/ /'bad pas sku gdung myur du ni/ /gser gyi snod kyi nang du bcug /de dag
271b4(rgyud 'bum): sngon du yang dag btang / /de tshe rgyal po'i khab myur 'gro/ /'od ma'i tshal du phyin nas ni/ /sku gdung dag ni yang dag bzhag /'jig rten mgon po skyob pa yi/ /mchod rten rmad byung chen po byas/ /mchod rten de ni mchod
271b5(rgyud 'bum): byed pa/ /rnam pa sna tshogs rgyan dang ni/ /phreng ba gos dang gdugs dang ni/ /dar la rol mo byug pa dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs du ma dang / /mar me me tog phreng ba yis/ /phyag 'tshal rjes song sems kyis ni/ /rgyal po rab tu
271b6(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa byed/ /mchod rten de la mgos btud nas/ /de yi tshe na smon lam btab/ /'jig rten mchog la mchod pa yis/ /bdag gi dge ba mang po gang / /de bzhin gshegs la mchod pa 'dis/ /bsam gyis mi khyab mchog
271b7(rgyud 'bum): thob shog / de nas rgyal po langs nas ni/ /'od srung che la rab tu smras/ /mig ni mchi mas kun khyab nas/ /mig gi mchi ma phyis nas ni/ /snying ni brtse bas rab brlan nas/ /de tshe pha ni yang dag dran/ /shes rab chen po 'phags
271b8(rgyud 'bum): pa khyod/ /khyod ni bdag gi dbang 'gyur mdzod/ /bdag gi sdig pa gang byas pa/ /nges par mnar med rab tu gzhol/ /ston pa'i bka' yi lam gnas pa/ /de 'dra'i chos kyi rgyal po yi/ /pha yi srog la gnod bcas pa'i/ /
272a1(rgyud 'bum): mya ngan bsal bar mi nus pas/ /'phags pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis/ /bdag la chos don bstan par rigs/ /de skad smras nas bdag nyid che/ /rgyal ba'i nyan thos mchog gyur pa/ /blo ldan 'od srung zhes
272a2(rgyud 'bum): bya bas/ /'di dag tshig ni rab tu smras/ /rgyal po chen po ma 'jigs shig /khyod kyi dge ba mang du byas/ /skye ba brgya phrag du mar yang / /khyod la goms pa rab tu yod/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba med pa na/ /rang rgyal gcig ni yang dag
272a3(rgyud 'bum): byung / /grong khyer bA rA Na sI ru/ /de tshe tshong dpon bu zhig byung / /mi shes byis pa g.yo ba yis/ /de tshe shing rta zhon nas byung / /bcom ldan de nyid de ru ni/ /rang rgyal yongs su byung ba ni/ /'jig rten rjes su gzung 'dod pas/ /
272a4(rgyud 'bum): der ni slong mo'i don du rgyu/ /byis pa des ni de mthong nas/ /sems ni yang dag dang gyur nas/ /rkang gnyis la gtugs dris pa ni/ /dge slong khyod ni ci zhig byed/ /bse ru lta bur skye ba med/ /bcom ldan de ni mi smrar 'dug /
272a5(rgyud 'bum): de tshe byis pa de yi ni/ /gos la bzung nas yang dag gnas/ /'deng ngo 'deng ngo khyim bzang 'dir/ /rgyal mtshan gyis ni rab mtshan pa'o/ /'di ni bdag gi khyim yin te/ /zhabs bkrus nas ni bshos gsol te/ /
272a6(rgyud 'bum): ji ltar dus bzhin myur gsol nas/ /ci 'dod par ni rtse bar bgyi'o/ /de nas nyes dang bral ba de/ /nyes gsum mthar byed 'joms pa po/ /gzhan dag rjes gzung de dag gtsor/ /mthar gyis kyang ni rab 'gro zhing / /song
272a7(rgyud 'bum): nas sgo yi rtsa ba la/ /'od chen der ni 'dug par gyur/ /de nas byis pa nang zhugs nas/ /ma la yang ni 'di skad smras/ /ma ni bdag la 'bras chan stsol/ /bza' ba rnam mang dag kyang stsol/ /yun ring sa rdul la rtse ba'i/ /
272a8(rgyud 'bum): bdag gi grogs po 'dir 'ongs gyur/ /yun ring bdag ni dgar 'gyur ba/ /sgor ni 'ongs nas 'dug pa yin/ /de tshe de ni rab rings par/ /de yi mod la sgor yang byung / /rdzu 'phrul chen po zhi ba'i gzugs/ /bdag nyid
272b1(rgyud 'bum): chen po de yang mthong / /de tshe de ni myur 'ongs nas/ /snod ni bzang po blangs nas kyang / /lag pa legs par rab bkrus nas/ /me tog spos sogs sngon 'gro bas/ /'bras chan gtsang ma blangs nas ni/ /du ma'i
272b2(rgyud 'bum): ro yis rnam brgyan pa'i/ /rnam pa sna tshogs bza' ba dang / /dngul gyi snod du rab tu bcug /de tshe myur du phyir byung ste/ /de yi lhung bzed la blugs nas/ /khyor bcas chos la dad pa yis/ /de yi rkang pa gnyis
272b3(rgyud 'bum): la gtugs/ /de yis bsod snyoms blangs nas ni/ /nam mkha' la ni mngon par song / /de nas de ni rab 'bar zhing / /mar me'i phreng ba bzhin du snang / /bse ru ltar spyod gang yin pa/ /de dag ngag gis chos ston min/ /
272b4(rgyud 'bum): rdzu 'phrul 'od kyis sems can la/ /bdag nyid chen po ston par byed/ /de yang lhag par snying rje can/ /sems can 'gro ba ser snar ldan/ /pha rol don du sems can la/ /de nas rdzu 'phrul ston par byed/ /de yi rnam smin las kyis ni/ /ma dang
272b5(rgyud 'bum): lhan cig byis pa yang / /stong phrag lnga yi skye bar ni/ /lha nyid kyang ni byas par gyur/ /lha rnams kyi ni lha rgyal der/ /ma de nyid ni yang dag gyur/ /'khor los sgyur nyid mi rnams kyi/ /mi yi bdag por de tshe gyur/ /yun ring
272b6(rgyud 'bum): bde ba rjes myong nas/ /gzugs can snying po'i bur 'di gyur/ /gang gi bcom ldan de smras dang / /gos kyi tha ma la bzung dang / /tshig ngan smra ba smras pa ni/ /dge slong smra bas smras pa dang / /sa rdul bdag
272b7(rgyud 'bum): dang rtse ba zhes/ /de tshe sngon ni khyod ces smras/ /tshig gi las ni de yis ni/ /mi 'dod pa dang tsha ba yi/ /drag cing rab tsha'i sdug bsngal ba/ /yun ring mang po rjes myong ba/ /mi 'dod sdug bsngal bzod dka' ba/ /mi bzad
272b8(rgyud 'bum): dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur/ /las kyi zhags pas bcings nas ni/ /sems can ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur/ /rgod pas las ni byed pa yis/ /du bas rjes su myong bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin byis pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ /nyan thos
273a1(rgyud 'bum): rgyal ba skyob pa la/ /tshig ni ma rungs rgya che ba/ /de yi las ni 'di 'dra'o/ /dmyal ba las ni thar nas kyang / /mi nyid du ni 'dir yang 'ongs/ /rnam smin skyes pa mi yi bdag /dmyal ba yang ni dran par gyur/ /de yi
273a2(rgyud 'bum): khro ba bdo ba yis/ /khyod kyis pha yi srog kyang bcad/ /rang rgyal dag gi spyod pa yang / /sngon gyi bag chags kyis dran pas/ /sangs rgyas mngon sum mthong nas ni/ /skye dgu dag kyang de bzhin byas/ /de nyid rgyu ni
273a3(rgyud 'bum): dran byas pas/ /'dir ni rgyal thabs nyid kyang byas/ /de ltar 'od ma'i tshal du ni/ /phan tshun de dag sa steng smra/ /nga yi slob ma mchog 'di dang / /gnyis pa mi yi bdag po yis/ /mchod rten lan brgyar phyag 'tshal
273a4(rgyud 'bum): nas/ /de tshe rang gi khyim du song / /de nas slob ma'i mchog gyur pa/ /pi pal phug na gnas pa de/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po 'dod chags bral/ /thub pa ma lus 'dus nas ni/ /gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis dang / /
273a5(rgyud 'bum): 'dul ba ma lus sdud par byed/ /gang zhig chos ni ngas bstan dang / /de bzhin sngon gyi rgyal ba mchog /de nas slob ma'i mchog des kyang / /rnam pa gsum du yang dag bstan/ /'dul ba dang ni mngon pa
273a6(rgyud 'bum): dang / /mdo sde'i dbye bas gzhung du byas/ /sems can 'ching ba gsum las bkrol/ /nyes pa gsum yang skem par byed/ /dpa' bo sdug bsngal gsum las 'grol/ /rtag tu theg pa gsum la dgod/ /
273a7(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas rnams kyis bstan pa'i don/ /blo yi mchog ni byed par 'gyur/ /rgyal chen ma skyes dgra zhes pa'i/ /ma ga d+hA pa mi yi bdag /ang ga ma ga d+hA dang ni/ /bA rA Na sI de las gzhan/ /byang du yangs pa can dang ni/ /
273a8(rgyud 'bum): rgyal chen stobs po che bar ni/ /the tshom med par 'gyur ba yin/ /bstan pa'i don ni byed par 'gyur/ /gzhon nu khyod ni 'dul byed cing / /zhi ba dam pa ston par 'gyur/ /de yi bu yang rgyal po ni/ /yi ge u zhes bya bar
273b1(rgyud 'bum): bsgrags/ /de tshe 'byung bar 'gyur ba ni/ /myur du bstan pa'i don la brtson/ /des ni ston pa'i gsung rab 'dir/ /rgya cher 'dri bar byed 'jug 'gyur/ /mchod pa chen po'ang byas nas ni/ /phyogs rnams kun tu
273b2(rgyud 'bum): rgyas par byed/ /phyir yang ngan song 'di mi 'gro/ /lhar skye bar ni de 'gyur ro/ /lo ni nyi shu sum cur ni/ /pha dang lhan cig 'grogs par 'gyur/ /grong khyer stobs ldan mtshan phyed du/ /rigs las skyes pa'i nad kyis ni/ /mngon
273b3(rgyud 'bum): par zil gyis non par 'gyur/ /nyin zhag sum cu rtsa drug tu/ /nad chen dag gis nyam thag 'gyur/ /nad rnams kun gyis btab nas de/ /rnam pa sna tshogs brgyal nas ni/ /rgyal po de myur shi 'phos nas/ /lha rnams su ni skye bar
273b4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ /de ni mthar gyis 'bad nas ni/ /nges par byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /'di dang gzhan yang mang po ni/ /'das pa dang ni ma 'ongs par/ /rang rgyal skyob pa dag la ni/ /rnam pa sna tshogs byas pa yis/ /de bzhin lha dang mi rnams
273b5(rgyud 'bum): kyis/ /'dod dang khyad par phun tshogs 'thob/ /de dag mthar gyis 'gro 'gyur ba/ /zhi ba nad med go 'phang 'thob/ /rgyal po mchog dang dman pa dang / /mi yi bdag po bar ma rnams/ /rgyal po na hu sha la sogs/ /dang po'i dus su
273b6(rgyud 'bum): bstan pa dag / des kyang de bzhin gshegs mchod dang / /rjes yi rang bas mtho ris song / /nges par de dag sangs rgyas gyur/ /kha cig nyan thos theg pa la/ /nges par kha cig nyan thos nyid/ /de kun thar la mngon par
273b7(rgyud 'bum): gzhol/ /dus kyi rnam gzhag rjes mthun par/ /tshe yang rnam par brtag pa yin/ /dam pa tshe yang ring ba ste/ /de bzhin bar ma bar ma yin/ /shin tu dka' ba'i dus mtha' la/ /dus kyi tha ma rtsod dus la/ /rgyal po rtsod pa
273b8(rgyud 'bum): la dga' bas/ /gzhan ni tha mar bstan pa yin/ /phan tshun khon du 'dzin chags pas/ /gcig la gcig ni rnam 'tshe byed/ /dman pa'i skye ba thob pa dang / /mtshon gyi reg pas 'chi bar 'gyur/ /mtshon gyis 'tsho bas yang dag dga'/ /
274a1(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gzhan gyi bud med chags/ /rgyal po 'jig rten smod par ni/ /the tsom med par 'gyur ba yin/ /g.yon can las ngan can dang ni/ /de bzhin 'phags min ser sna can/ /de yi tshe na 'byung bar 'gyur/ /cha
274a2(rgyud 'bum): gnyis ldan dang rtsod dus bar/ /mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya/ /gzhon nu de ni rtogs par gyis/ /dus gang 'byung bar 'gyur ba na/ /sa steng rgyal po 'byung ba yi/ /de dag gzugs dang mtshan ma dang / /kha dog kyang ni rtogs
274a3(rgyud 'bum): par gyis/ /ko sa'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dang / /gzugs can snying po de bzhin gzhan/ /rgyal rigs gtso bo 'char ba dang / /dmag brgya pa ni yang dag 'byung / /lag bzang gzhu bzang zhes bya dang / /de bzhin dbang chen
274a4(rgyud 'bum): tsa ma sha / de bzhin li ts+tsha bIr skyes pa'i/ /shAkya'i rigs skyes seng ge dang / /cher ldan gsal dang rab gsal dang / /sde chen du yang bstan pa'o/ /de bzhin 'phags rgyal gtum po dang / /ser skya'i grong gi rgyal po ni/ /
274a5(rgyud 'bum): zas gtsang zhes ni bya ba dang / /dpa' bo zhes bya stobs chen dag /'di dag rgyal po'i rigs su gsungs/ /sa srung ston pa mchod byed pa'o/ /shAkya seng ge mi yi mchog /sangs rgyas mngon du lta bar 'gyur/ /de yang de nas
274a6(rgyud 'bum): chos thos nas/ /yun ring phun sum tshogs pa 'thob/ /nges par byang chub 'dod nas kyang / /shi nas zhi ba 'thob par 'gyur/ /sa bdag sa yi dkyil 'khor du/ /'di dag 'jig rten rnam par grags/ /rigs ni rgyal
274a7(rgyud 'bum): rigs dag tu bstan/ /'du shes ming gis mtshon pa yin/ /sa steng nga yis bstan pa'i tshig /de dag mchod pa byed par 'gyur/ /gzhon nu byis pa'i gzugs can gyis/ /khyod kyis 'jig rten lung bstan pa/ /ma skyes zhes
274a8(rgyud 'bum): bya'i rgyal po de/ /nges par byang chub gzhol bar 'gyur/ /nga ni sa steng mya ngan 'das/ /lo brgya dag ni 'das pa na/ /snang ba med cing nyes par bcas/ /mi shes mun pas rab tu bsgribs/ /de tshe sa ni stongs pa ste/ /rgyal ba
274b1(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyis spangs pa yin/ /de tshe mi bzad chen po yi/ /grong khyer me tog can du ni/ /mya ngan med ces bya ba yi/ /rgyal po sa ni skyong byed pa/ /khro bcas las ni drag po byed/ /de tshe de ni snying rje med/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po 'dod chags
274b2(rgyud 'bum): bral/ /nad med ser sna bral ba dang / /dge slong tshul khrims ldan pa yi/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen thad du lhags/ /sngon gyi bag chags rgyu dang ni/ /sa rdul byin pa'i byin rlabs kyis/ /rigs ni nges par 'gyur ba
274b3(rgyud 'bum): dang / /rgyal po nor chen ldan par 'gyur/ /chos dang chos min rnam dpyod cing / /brtse ldan snying rje ldan pa dang / /chags bral rdzu 'phrul chen po des/ /rgyu ni phye zhing bstan par byas/ /sngon ni khyod kyang rgyal po ste/ /mi shes byis
274b4(rgyud 'bum): pa g.yo ba yi/ /rgyal ba shAkya seng ge la/ /sa yi rdul ni snyim gang phul/ /zhing de la ni rab phul bas/ /lha yul phun sum tshogs pa thob/ /lha yi 'jig rten shi 'phos nas/ /sa yi 'jig rten 'dir 'ongs gyur/ /'dzam
274b5(rgyud 'bum): gling nags tshal phun sum tshogs/ /rgyal po yi ni rgyal thabs spyod/ /bdag nyid chen po dzam b+ha la/ /gnod sbyin gyi ni sngags kyang bsgrubs/ /bdag nyid chen po sa yi bdag /de nas gnod sbyin shing rta grub/ /de la gnod
274b6(rgyud 'bum): sbyin 'dug pa ni/ /bka' dang mthun par yid kyang 'jug /klu rnams kyang ni 'dug pa ste/ /bran dang bka' bzhin byed pa'i rgyu/ /de ltar rdzu 'phrul che bdag nyid/ /de tshe stobs kyi 'khor sgyur 'byung / /ci 'dod de ni 'gro ba na/ /gang du
274b7(rgyud 'bum): 'ang 'gog pa med par 'gyur/ /rgyal ba'i sku gdung mchog sa la/ /gang yang sngon ni rab bzhag pa/ /rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer gyi/ /de tshe 'od ma'i tshal du'o/ /sku gdung mchog ni blangs nas kyang / /dge ba la dmigs
274b8(rgyud 'bum): yid can gyis/ /ji ltar sngon gyi byas pa bzhin/ /mchod rten de la mchod pa byas/ /sku gdung bum pa de blangs nas/ /de ni de bzhin rnam bgos nas/ /blo ldan des ni skad cig gis/ /de nas gnod sbyin la yang smras/ /'dzam bu'i
275a1(rgyud 'bum): gling 'di ma lus pa/ /mchod rten rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / /sa rnams sku gdung snying por ni/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rab tu bya/ /'bad pa yis ni mtshan phyed du/ /gnod sbyin gyis ni bka' yang blangs/ /mi ma yin pa'i bya ba byas/ /
275a2(rgyud 'bum): sa steng rdo yi srog shing bsgreng / /ka ba stong phrag du ma ni/ /de tshe yongs su btsugs par gyur/ /mchod rten rnams la mchod don du/ /lus can rnams la mtshon par gyur/ /'jig rten mgon po skyob pa yis/ /mchod rten sna tshogs
275a3(rgyud 'bum): byas nas ni/ /skad cig gcig gis gnod sbyin rnams/ /rgyal po yi ni drung du lhags/ /de nas gnod sbyin rab btud nas/ /dben par tshig ni rab tu smras/ /ji skad bka' stsal ma lus byas/ /sa bdag ji ste gzigs mi mdzad/ /de nas myur
275a4(rgyud 'bum): du sa bdag de/ /de tshe shing rta de la zhon/ /rnam pa sna tshogs mchod don du/ /rnam pa sna tshogs mdzes pa'i phyir/ /gser dang de bzhin dngul dag dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs mchod rten brgyan/ /de nas gnod sbyin shing rta dang / /myur du
275a5(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po rab tu song / /gang na rgyal ba'i mchod rten yod/ /skad cig gis ni de yul du'o/ /rnam pa sna tshogs mchod pa yis/ /rgyal po des ni de la mchod/ /de tshe rgyal ba'i mchod rten gyis/ /sa rnams ma lus mdzes par byas/ /
275a6(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid chos rgyal mya ngan med/ /smon lam dag ni 'debs par brtson/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di don gyis/ /bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas shog /de bzhin des kyang rig nas ni/ /rgyal po chos ni ston par byed/ /de ni shi nas lha ru 'gro/ /
275a7(rgyud 'bum): nges par byang chub gzhol bar 'gyur/ /lo ni brgyad cu rtsa bdun du/ /sa steng mchod rten mchod par 'gyur/ /lo ni brgya dang lnga bcur 'tsho/ /gnod pa med pa'i rgyal thabs byed/ /de rang las las byung ba yi/ /lus la nad ni yongs su
275a8(rgyud 'bum): 'byung / /nad des gnod cing sdug bsngal nas/ /shi nas mtho ris 'gro bar 'gyur/ /lha yi phun sum tshogs pa che/ /thob nas rjes su myong bar byed/ /de ni yid gzhungs rim gyis su/ /rnyed par dka' ba'i byang chub thob/ /rdo rje pad
275b1(rgyud 'bum): ma'i rigs dag ni/ /sngags kyang de tshe 'grub par 'gyur/ /dzam b+ha la sogs gnod sbyin yang / /'di yi bstan pa'i rjes su 'jug /rdzu 'phrul chen po 'phrog ma sogs/ /gnod sbyin mo yang yang dag 'grub/ /'khor
275b2(rgyud 'bum): los sgyur bas bskyed pa yi/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i sngags kyang grub/ /gang dag rgyal bas bstan pa'i sngags/ /rig pa'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul che/ /gtsug tor la sogs thams cad dang / /gang gzhan rgyal bas gsungs pa'ang
275b3(rgyud 'bum): yin/ /de yi dus ni rab bzang la/ /sgrub pa dam pa dag kyang bya/ /dam pas tha ma bsgrub mi bya/ /dam pa thob par bya phyir ro/ /di lI pa dang na hu sha /nga las nu dang dug chen mtsho/ /rgyal bas bshad pa'i 'khor los sgyur/ /sngags ni
275b4(rgyud 'bum): de dag sgrub par byed/ /bdag nyid chen po na hu sha /de tshe gzi brjid phung po grub/ /rgyal po chen po dug chen pa/ /gdugs dkar po yang grub pa yin/ /de bzhin rgyal po di lI pa/ /yi ge gcig pa'i sngags
275b5(rgyud 'bum): kyang grub/ /nga las nu ni 'jig rten dang / /de bzhin gtsug tor dam pa grub/ /rgyal mchog d+hun du ma ra ni/ /de bzhin rgyal ba'i gtsug tor grub/ /de bzhin 'dam gyi rgyal po ni/ /rnam rgyal gtsug tor grub pa'o/ /
275b6(rgyud 'bum): de bu skye dgu'i bdag po ste/ /de yang sa steng spyan sngags grub/ /skye dgu'i bdag po skye ba ste/ /de yang mdzod spu'i sngags kyang grub/ /lte ba'i bu ni khyu mchog ste/ /de ni las grub brtul zhugs brtan/ /kha ba can gyi
275b7(rgyud 'bum): ri dag tu/ /de yang nor spyod gnod sbyin grub/ /khyu mchog bu ni rgyas pa ste/ /de yang de tshe sngags bzlas byed/ /de tshe sa steng de mthar gyis/ /dpa' bo chen po'ang rab tu grub/ /'di dag gzhan yang mang po yi/ /rgyal pos
275b8(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten rnam grags pas/ /sngags rnams rab tu bsgrubs nas ni/ /rgyal srid byas nas lha yul 'gro/ /rig pa'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul che/ /rgyal ba'i dbang pos gang gsungs pa/ /de kun dus ni bzang po ste/ /
276a1(rgyud 'bum): lo ni stong phrag brgyad cu pa/ /sngags dang rgyud kyi don mkhas pas/ /grub pa dag ni sgrub par 'gyur/ /'di dag gzhan yang rab mang ba'i/ /sa bdag 'jig rten rnam grags pa/ /de nas stong phrag brgyad cu
276a2(rgyud 'bum): 'i sngags/ /de bzhin yang dag bsgrubs nas ni/ /rgyal srid byas nas mtho ris 'gro/ /nges par byang chub gzhol bar 'gyur/ /de tshe bar ma'i dus dag tu/ /lha mo rdzu 'phrul chen mo dang / /lha rnams kyi ni sngags
276a3(rgyud 'bum): dang ni/ /pad ma'i rigs kyi sngags dang ni/ /blon po mi yi gtso bo dang / /sa bdag sa kun bdag po'o/ /bA rA Na sI grong khyer na/ /rgyal po tshangs pas byin pa yang / /'jig rten 'jig rten dbang phyug grags/ /phyag na pad ma rab tu grub/ /bdag nyid chen po
276a4(rgyud 'bum): brtson 'grus che/ /lhag par snying rje chen po de/ /sems can rnams la sngags tshul gyis/ /chos rnams ston pa byin pa yin/ /rgyal po yang ni tshangs byin gyis/ /mi yi bde ba rjes myong nas/ /de nas de ni sngags grub
276a5(rgyud 'bum): ste/ /lus dang bcas pas mtho ris song / /de yi bu yang blo ldan ni/ /bsod nams las ni brtul zhugs brtan/ /brtson 'grus chen po rta mgrin zhes/ /rnam par grags pa de yang grub/ /de yis sngags kyis
276a6(rgyud 'bum): mthu yis ni/ /de tshe brgya byin las rgyal gyur/ /de bu dkar po zhes bya ba'i/ /rgyal po thams cad gtong ba 'byung / /de yang nor ni sbyin pa'i sngags/ /dkar mo che zhes bya ba yang / /sngags ni rab tu bsgrubs pas kyang / /lo ni sum
276a7(rgyud 'bum): brgya dag tu 'tsho/ /de yi sngags kyi mthu yis ni/ /bde ba can tu yang dag 'gro/ /nges par byang chub 'di nges thob/ /de bzhin gzhan yang ngas lung bstan/ /de tshe bar ma'i dus dag tu/ /bar ma'i sngags ni rab tu 'grub/ /
276a8(rgyud 'bum): dka' ba tha ma'i dus dag tu/ /nga ni sangs rgyas nyid thob nas/ /rdo rje pad ma'i rigs dag gi/ /sngags kyang rab tu 'grub par 'gyur/ /gzhon nu khyod kyi sngags dag ni/ /gang zhig sa steng sngon bstan pa/ /sngags
276b1(rgyud 'bum): ni longs spyod rgyu nyid du/ /de yang rab tu grub par 'gro/ /'jig rten rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i/ /phal pa dag gi sngags dag ni/ /mi sdug gzugs can rnyog par ldan/ /bar snang dang ni nam mkhar spyod/ /sa blar gnas
276b2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i gnod sbyin mo/ /de bzhin sna tshogs sha za mo/ /mi 'am ci dang mkha' lding dang / /yi dags srin pos bshad pa rnams/ /sha za lto 'phye gnod sbyin dang / /rdzu 'phrul chen po klu rnams kyi/ /dus ngan de tshe tha ma la/ /
276b3(rgyud 'bum): sngags ni rab tu grub par 'gyur/ /gzhon nu'i gzugs kyi sngags dang ni/ /gzhon nu ma yi gzugs kun yang / /dus ni 'jigs rung de yi tshe/ /de yang grub par rab tu 'gro/ /de bzhin sngags ni rnam pa gsum/ /
276b4(rgyud 'bum): sgrub pa'ang rnam pa gsum yin no/ /rnam gsum nyid kyis dus kyi ni/ /rnam gsum grub pa 'dod pa yin/ /rgya che'i gtam dang ldan pa dag /mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya/ /gtso bo mya ngan med pa yi/ /de 'og
276b5(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po byung ba ni/ /mya ngan bral zhes rnam par grags/ /'jig rten chos kyis spyod par ldan/ /lha mo gos dkar mo yi ni/ /de yi sngags 'di yongs su 'grub/ /mya ngan rnam bral gyis bsgrubs nas/ /lha yi gnas
276b6(rgyud 'bum): su rab tu song / /yun ring bde ba mtho ris su/ /rgyal po chen po rjes su myong / /phyir yang mi yul phyin nas ni/ /blo ldan chos kyi ngang tshul ldan/ /rgyal thabs rnam pa sna tshogs ldan/ /'od chen pos ni
276b7(rgyud 'bum): rjes su myong / /lo ni bdun cu rtsa drug tu/ /dpal ldan mchod rten mchod pa byed/ /de nas de ni nad btab nas/ /lus zhig nas ni lha ris 'gro/ /de yi 'og tu rgyal po ni/ /dpa' bo'i sde zhes rab tu brjod/ /chos la spyod cing
276b8(rgyud 'bum): rnam par grags/ /bstan pa 'di la mnyam par bzhag /lha mo mchod rten dpal chen ma/ /de yi sngags kyang rab tu bsgrubs/ /des kyang ston pa'i khang chen ni/ /de yi tshe na byas par 'gyur/ /sa rnams rgyal mtsho'i mthar thug par/ /ma lus
277a1(rgyud 'bum): mchod rten rnams kyis brgyan/ /de la rnam smin las kyis ni/ /lus las skyes pa'i nad kyang 'byung / /zla phyed gcig tu sdug bsngal nas/ /de nas shi 'phos lus zhig 'gyur/ /lo ni bdun cu dag tu yang / /mi
277a2(rgyud 'bum): yi nang du rgyal thabs byas/ /shi 'phos de ni mtho ris 'gro/ /nges par byang chub gzhol bar 'gyur/ /de yi 'og tu rgyal po ni/ /dga' bo zhes bya 'byung bar 'gyur/ /dpal ldan grong khyer me tog ces/ /sde chen
277a3(rgyud 'bum): stobs ni che bar gnas/ /sha za pi lu zhes bya ba'i/ /sngags kyang des ni bsgrubs pa yin/ /de yi sngags kyi mthu yis ni/ /longs spyod chen po yod par 'gyur/ /rgya yi gtso bo zhes bya ba/ /'jig rten 'dir ni 'byung bar
277a4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ /de nor thob pas blon por 'gyur/ /'jig rten rgyal po nyid du'ang 'gyur/ /de yi dus su 'byung ba ni/ /bram ze tshad ma shes pa'o/ /log pa'i nga rgyal dag la zhen/ /ma ga d+hA yi grong khyer gnas/ /log pa'i nga
277a5(rgyud 'bum): rgyal gyis dregs rnams/ /'byung ba nyid du the tshom med/ /de dag gis ni rgyal po bskor/ /de dag la ni des nor byin/ /nor ni mang po de dag gis/ /dge ba'i bshes la rab mchod nas/ /de yi nor ni zad par byed/ /ma 'dres de la
277a6(rgyud 'bum): goms pa dang / /sbyin la zhum med rgyu yis ni/ /blo ldan de yi lha khang ni/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi byed du bcug /grong khyer me tog ces bya bar/ /bdag nyid chen po blon po'i gtso/ /bram ze bzang po snying rjer ldan/ /de yi tshe na 'byung bar
277a7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ /rgyal po dang ni rab mdza' ba'i/ /chos kyi bdag nyid 'byung bar 'gyur/ /gnod sbyin ma ni dpa' mo ldan/ /sa steng de yi sngags kyang 'grub/ /des kyang sa steng dag tu ni/ /mchod rten bzang po byed du bcug /
277a8(rgyud 'bum): gnod sbyin ma yi mthu yis ni/ /shes rab rab tu che bar 'gyur/ /de yi bag chags las kyis ni/ /sngon gyi bag chags yong bskul nas/ /blo dang ldan pas mthar gyis ni/ /rnyed par dka' ba'i byang chub 'thob/ /
277b1(rgyud 'bum): mchog sred ces ni rnam grags pa'i/ /de tshe 'dod chags shas che 'byung / /bud med byas pa'i skyon gyis ni/ /bram ze'i khye'us 'chi ba thob/ /dpal ldan rgyal po dga' bo yang / /snga ma'i las kyi nyes pa yis/ /
277b2(rgyud 'bum): me tog ces bya'i grong khyer gyi/ /mi rnams 'chad pas gnod par byed/ /blon po'i tshogs kyang ma dad gyur/ /stobs chen bden par smra ba yang / /sngon gyi las kyi nyes pa yis/ /nad chen dag gis thebs 'gyur
277b3(rgyud 'bum): te/ /rims nad chen pos sdug bsngal gdung / /nam phyed tsam na shi bar 'gyur/ /rgyal po de yi tshe tshad ni/ /de bzhin lnga bcu rtsa drug go/ de ni nyan thos byang chub tu/ /rgyal po nges par 'gyur ba yin/ /de yi grogs po gzhan gyur
277b4(rgyud 'bum): pa/ /bram ze'i khye'u pa Ni ni/ /nges par nyan thos byang chub tu/ /nga yis lung bstan byas pa yin/ /'jig rten dbang phyug bdag nyid che/ /de yang de yi sngags grub pa'o/ /bram ze shes rab 'dod pas kyang / /khro bo ha la ha la bsgrubs/ /
277b5(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po de las gzhan pa yang / /zla ba sbas zhes bya ba 'byung / /gnod sbyin chu dbang grub pa ste/ /rgyal srid gnod pa med par byed/ /longs spyod che zhing bden par smra/ /chos kyi bdag nyid sa yi bdag /mi dge'i bshes gnyen rab brten
277b6(rgyud 'bum): nas/ /srog chags mang po gsod par byed/ /las kyi rnam smin de yis ni/ /'brum bu'i nad 'byung rab tu brgyal/ /de ni mtshan phyed sad nas ni/ /rgyal srid la ni bu bzhag pa/ /snying po thig le zhes bya ba/ /blon po la sdang byis pa de/ /de nas
277b7(rgyud 'bum): zla ba sbas pa de/ /shi 'phos sa steng dus las 'das/ /mi yi 'gro ba spangs pa yi/ /de tshe yi dags 'jig rten song / /'gro ba las grol sngags goms pas/ /de nas lha yi gnas su song / /dge ba'i sems kyis dmigs nas
277b8(rgyud 'bum): ni/ /sngags kyi rgyus ni yang dag bskyed/ /rgyal po des ni mthar gyis kyang / /nyan thos kyi ni byang chub 'gro/ /snying po thig le rgyal po yis/ /byis pa mi gsal blo yis ni/ /bye ma las byas srid gzhan du/ /sngon ni mchod rten dag kyang
278a1(rgyud 'bum): byas/ /de yi rnam smin mthu yis ni/ /ma smad lha yi gnas su song / /skye ba stong phrag lnga brgyar ni/ /lha yi nang du bde ba myong / /mtho ris 'jig rten shi 'phos nas/ /mi yi nang du rab skyes pa/ /blo ldan zla ba sbas pa yi/ /rgyal po
278a2(rgyud 'bum): dga' ba'i rigs su skyes/ /byis pa nyid nas rgyal por 'gyur/ /yun mi thung bar bde ba myong / /'jigs med bstan dang yang dag rig /spyi brtsan pa dang snyan par smra/ /de nyid rang dbang rgyal srid ni/ /lo ni bdun cur yongs su byas/ /skra can
278a3(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya'i sngags dag kyang / /rgyal po de la rab tu grub/ /khyod nyid kyi ni sngags nyid kyang / /de tshe grub par byed par 'gyur/ /khyod nyid kyis bshad sngags dag kyang / /de yi tshe na grub par 'gyur/ /byis pa'i tshul can sna tshogs gzugs/ /
278a4(rgyud 'bum): byis pa rnams la mthu dang ldan/ /sngags kyi gzugs kyis lus can la/ /the tshom med par 'byung bar 'gyur/ /sems can rnams la phan 'dod pas/ /gang zhig khyod kyis bstan pa'i sngags/ /de tshe de yi dus dag tu/ /brjod
278a5(rgyud 'bum): pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur/ /blo ldan snying po thig le yi/ /rgyal po de yi blon po ni/ /tsa nag kya zhes rnam bsgrags pa/ /bram ze'i khye'us khro bo 'grub/ /gshin rje gshed ces bya ba ni/ /blo ngan des ni de yang 'grub/ /des ni khro bas
278a6(rgyud 'bum): zil non nas/ /srog chags dag gi 'tsho ba bcad/ /de tshe rgyal po gsum gyi bar/ /shin tu mi bzad sdig pa byas/ /de ni dus ring 'tsho ba yi/ /bram ze ngan pa 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de yi sngags kyi mthu yis ni/ /lus des
278a7(rgyud 'bum): lha min brten par byed/ /lha min lus la zhugs nas ni/ /de ni dus ring 'tsho bar byed/ /de nas lus de zhig nas kyang / /mnar med dmyal bar yang dag 'gro/ /de nas dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de/ /blo ngan des ni rjes su myong / /
278a8(rgyud 'bum): dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal sna tshogs pa/ /mi 'dod de tshe las las byung / /las gcig sdug bsngal des zad nas/ /khro bo'i sngags kyis rab bskul te/ /dmyal ba las ni de 'chi 'phos/ /dud 'gro dag tu nye bar skyes/ /
278b1(rgyud 'bum): klu yi skye gnas brten nas ni/ /'jigs pa'i gzugs can dag tu 'gyur/ /khro ldan chen po klu yi rgyal/ /gdengs can dug gis dregs byed dang / /mi bzad las ni rab byed pas/ /ma rungs las las de 'chi 'phos/ /
278b2(rgyud 'bum): rdzu 'phrul chen po yi dags kyi/ /gshin rje'i rgyal por rab tu 'gyur/ /de ltar sdug bsngal stong phrag ni/ /yang dang yang du rjes su myong / /blo ngan de ni mthar gyis su/ /bram ze'i khye'ur sa steng 'ongs/ /mi yi skye
278b3(rgyud 'bum): bar 'ongs nas ni/ /'jigs pa yi ni gzugs can 'gyur/ /khro ba dang ni dbul ba nyid/ /grags pa chung ba nyid du 'gyur/ /gang yang 'jig rten rang sangs rgyas/ /'dod med bse ru lta bur spyod/ /dman pa la ni
278b4(rgyud 'bum): rjes brtse ba/ /sa yi steng na rnam par rgyu/ /sems can rnams la phan 'dod phyir/ /bsod snyoms spyod la rab tu zhugs/ /de tshe gzhan sems rig pa des/ /blo ngan de ni rab tu mthong / /snying rjes yin gyis gzhan min des/ /
278b5(rgyud 'bum): de yi thad du byon par 'gyur/ /des ni zan dron gsol ched du/ /bse ru lta bu la ni khyer/ /des ni sngags la rab brnyas nas/ /de tshe rgyu ni yang dag bstan/ /de las gcig gi bdag nyid la/ /bsod snyoms de ni yang
278b6(rgyud 'bum): dag bstabs/ /kye 'di rab byung ma lus pa/ /ji ltar bde ba bzhin du gsol/ /de la rjes brtse rang sangs rgyas/ /de tshe rdzu 'phrul bstan par 'gyur/ /de yi mthu yis yid bskyod nas/ /de nas ngo mtshar rab skyes te/ /sangs rgyas
278b7(rgyud 'bum): bse ru lta bu la/ /spyi bos kun la rab tu btud/ /ji ltar 'dod par nyes bral rnams/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba de yi mthus/ /rang rgyal byang chub smon lam btab/ /bdag nyid chen po ci 'dra ba/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po zhi ba'i gzugs/ /sdug
278b8(rgyud 'bum): bsngal blo ngan mi 'gyur bar/ /de 'dra bdag ni 'jig rten shog /las kyi lhag ma zad pa dang / /'chi 'phos de tshe mtho ris song / /chos kyi bdag nyid de mthar gyis/ /nyan thos de ni byang chub thob/ /de bas sngags kyi sgrub pa
279a1(rgyud 'bum): ni/ /mngon spyod dag ni yong mi bya/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis/ /mngon spyod rab tu bkag pa yin/ /snying rje mchog ldan sangs rgyas dang / /byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che/ /sngags rnams mthu bstan
279a2(rgyud 'bum): don du ni/ /las rnams thams cad bstan pa yin/ /de bzhin nor bu lta bu'i sngags/ /gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs/ /khro dang chags pas zil mnan pa'i/ /byis pa rmongs pa'i sems dag gis/ /de dag sngags ni
279a3(rgyud 'bum): mngon spyod la/ /phan tshun rab tu sbyor bar byed/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' ni/ /blo dang ldan pas de bzhin bkag /rnam pa thams cad sngags rnams ni/ /sems can longs spyod 'phel ba dang / /de nas rgyal po dam pa dang / /srung ba che
279a4(rgyud 'bum): dang dbang phyir dang / /skye gnas sna tshogs la gnas pa'i/ /sems can rnams ni dgug don du/ /sngags kyang bsgrub par bya ba ste/ /'tsho ba dgag phyir ma yin no/ /dge slong mang du thos pa ni/ /de yi tshe na 'byung 'gyur ba/ /ma khol zhes
279a5(rgyud 'bum): kyang bya ba ste/ /nga nyid kyi ni stod byed pa/ /ji bzhin yon tan bzang po ni/ /ji lta bzhin du brjod par 'gyur/ /kun nas sems ni rab dang zhing / /sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan la dad/ /sgrub dka'i sngags ni rab
279a6(rgyud 'bum): bsgrub cing / /'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi de bzhin no/ /yon tan ldan zhing tshul khrims ldan/ /mang du thos shing chos kyang smra/ /dud 'gror sngon ni gyur pa na/ /nga yi bstod pa yongs su smra/ /nyams dga' grong khyer rgyal po'i khab/ /
279a7(rgyud 'bum): 'od ma'i tshal gyi sa steng du/ /slob ma'i tshogs dang lhan cig tu/ /ji ltar bde bar bzhugs pa na/ /der ni bya rog cig yod pas/ /nga la sems ni rab dad byas/ /sems ni nga la dad byas pas/ /lus zhig nas ni mtho
279a8(rgyud 'bum): ris song / /lha rnams las ni shi 'phos nas/ /mi rnams nang du nye bar skyes/ /mi yi nang du skyes nas kyang / /nga yi bstan la rab tu 'byung / /rab byung bdag nyid chen po de/ /ji bzhin de tshe 'byung bar 'gyur/ /ma khol zhes bya'i brtul
279b1(rgyud 'bum): zhugs can/ /de ni de tshe 'byung bar 'gyur/ /ji bzhin don ni bstod pas mchod/ /rnam pa sna tshogs dpe dag gis/ /'byung po kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /legs par spyod pa rab byed pa'o/ /sems can rjes su gzung ba'i phyir/ /bstod
279b2(rgyud 'bum): pa brjod pa de gtsor byed/ /dus mtha'i 'jig rten smad pa la/ /de yi tshe na 'byung bar 'gyur/ /rnam par smin pa de yis ni/ /lus zhig nas ni bde 'gror 'gro/ /blo ldan de ni mthar gyis kyang / /rnam pa sna tshogs bde myong nas/ /bsam
279b3(rgyud 'bum): gyis mi khyab mchog gsungs pa'i/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i byang chub thob/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nga 'das nas/ /lo ni bzhi brgya lon pa na/ /dge slong klu zhes de 'bod 'byung / /bstan pa la ni dad cing phan/ /rab tu dga' ba'i sa
279b4(rgyud 'bum): thob pa/ /lo ni drug brgya dag tu 'tsho/ /rig pa rma bya chen mo ni/ /bdag nyid chen po des kyang grub/ /bstan bcos sna tshogs don dang ni/ /dngos po med pa'i don de rigs/ /gang tshe lus de bor ba na/ /bde ba can du'ang skye bar 'gyur/ /
279b5(rgyud 'bum): de nas mthar gyis sangs rgyas nyid/ /nges pa kho nar yang dag 'thob/ /thogs med ces bya'i dge slong ni/ /bstan bcos de ni don la mkhas/ /mdo sde des don drang ba'i don/ /rnam pa mang po'ang rab tu 'byed/ /'jig rten rig pa
279b6(rgyud 'bum): ston bdag nyid/ /gzhung byed ngang tshul can du 'gyur/ /de yi rig pa grub pa 'di/ /sA la'i pho nya mo zhes rjod/ /de yi sngags kyi mthu yis ni/ /blo ni bzang po skye bar 'gyur/ /bstan pa yun ring gnas pa'i phyir/ /mdo yi de nyid don
279b7(rgyud 'bum): sdud byed/ /lo ni brgya dang lnga bcur 'tsho/ /de lus zhig nas lha yul 'gro/ /'khor ba rnams su 'khor ba na/ /yun ring bde ba rjes myong nas/ /bdag nyid chen po mthar gyis de/ /byang chub thob par 'gyur ba yin/ /de ltar rnam pa mang po yi/ /
279b8(rgyud 'bum): nga yi bstan la dge slong rnams/ /shes rab ldan nyid chos kyang spyod/ /dus kyi mtha' la de tshe 'byung / /phyi ma de tshe dus dag tu/ /dge slong dgra bcom zhes bya ba/ /de ni sngags don bdag nyid ldan/ /rgyud shes de bzhin mang du thos/ /
280a1(rgyud 'bum): gnod sbyin sngags ni rab brjod pas/ /de la bum pa bzang po 'grub/ /sngon ni ngas ni gang bshad pa'i/ /theg pa chen po'i mdo sde yang / /de yi tshe na bum pa las/ /dka' thub chen po 'dren par byed/ /glegs bam de la des
280a2(rgyud 'bum): bltas nas/ /de la sngags ni zlos pa na/ /gnod sbyin bsgrub pa'i bum pa la/ /der ni bsrung ba ma byas pa'i/ /bag med dran pa nyams pa yis/ /gtsug spyod kyis ni bum pa phrogs/ /de ni de nas sngags grub pa'i/ /
280a3(rgyud 'bum): dge slong sngags ni zlos byed pa'i/ /bum pa dag ni bltas pa na/ /der ni mngon par mthong ma gyur/ /de nas khro bas mig dmar zhing / /rnam g.yo tshig tu smra ba ni/ /tshangs pa dka' ba'i mthar gyur par/ /brgya byin sogs
280a4(rgyud 'bum): bcas dbang phyug che/ /sngags kyis ma bkug ma 'ongs na/ /sngags pa bdag min sngags rgyal min/ /gang zhig sangs rgyas sras sngags dang / /rgyal ba mchog gis sngags dag ni/ /tshar gcod don du gang gsungs
280a5(rgyud 'bum): pa'am/ /gdul dka' 'dul bar byed pa'ang rung / /gal te kun rnams ma bkug na/ /sa steng ma lus de dag med/ /de nas sngags pa chen po langs/ /brtul zhugs brtan zhing las rnams grub/ /ji ltar sngags ni
280a6(rgyud 'bum): byas pa yi/ /sbyor ba mthong bas rgyud dag kyang / /rkun ma dgug pa de don gtsor/ /sbyor ba rab tu byas par gyur/ /skad cig dran pa tsam gyis ni/ /sdom brtson de ni las myur byed/ /yi ge hU~M gi sngags gcig gis/ /tshangs
280a7(rgyud 'bum): sogs sa steng 'dren par byed/ /lha rnams ma lus rab bkug pa/ /tshangs sogs brgya byin dang yang bcas/ /ha ha zhes bya'i sgra 'don cing / /nyam thag 'jigs pa'i sgra yang sgrogs/ /
280a8(rgyud 'bum): ci bgyi zhes bya'i blo byed cing / /bdag cag 'dir ni nyes med smra/ /myur zhing rab tu rings par yangs/ /blo ldan dge slong 'jigs med pas/ /lha rnams la ni rab smras pa/ /'dir ni bum pa slar byin zhes/ /lha rnams phan tshun
280b1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad la/ /dge slong des ni rab tu smras/ /gang gis bum pa bzang po khyer/ /khyod kyis myur du rab tu smros/ /lha rnams kun gyis bltas pa na/ /kun tu yang ni ma mthong gyur/ /bum pa 'di ni su yis khyer/ /lha yi dbang
280b2(rgyud 'bum): pos yang dag dgongs/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'od chen po/ /dpal ldan lag na rdo rje can/ /de yi bu ni mi bzad yod/ /khro ba che zhing shin tu gdug /bgegs kyi gzugs kyis sngags pa la/ /'gro ba kun la rnam par
