280b4(rgyud 'bum): bdag pos de smras nas/ /phyir yang lha yi gnas su song / /de tshe rang nyid sngags kyis ni/ /lha rnams ma lus slar gshegs gsol/ /skad cig yud tsam nyid kyis ni/ /shin tu legs par yang dag bkug /de tshe
280b5(rgyud 'bum): dbang med bum par bcas/ /bgegs de nyid dang bcas par 'ongs/ /de nas de ni bgegs de yis/ /yi dags rnams la bum pa byin/ /de nas de yi bgegs des ni/ /tshig 'di dag ni rab tu smras/ /yi dags 'jig
280b6(rgyud 'bum): rten bum pa khyer/ /nga ni de la dga' ba med/ /sngags pa des ni dka' ba dang / /dka' bas btud de bgegs la smras/ /song shig song shig bgegs chen po/ /phyin cad 'di ltar ma byed cig /de nas des ni yi dags
280b7(rgyud 'bum): dag / de yi mod la bkug par gyur/ /ltogs shing ngal ba'i sems dang ni/ /dman zhing de dag khab tsam kha/ /shin tu mi bzad chen po de/ /nyam thag skad kyang rab tu 'don/ /snying rje'i tshig tu smra ba ni/ /bdag nyid chen po

281a1(rgyud 'bum): dag rab tu smras/ /khyod kyi 'jig rten sdug bsngal ci/ /yun mi ring par rab tu smon/ /dman pa'i yid kyis de smras pa/ /bkres pas yang dag gdungs par gyur/ /yi dags 'jig rten skom pa yis/ /
281a2(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid chen po yin yang rung / /dge slong snying rje chen pos ni/ /de dag la ni bum pa byin/ /de nas de dag yid dga' nas/ /myur bar rang gi gnas su song / /de dag bsam pa tsam gyis ni/ /bum pa las ni bza' btung
281a3(rgyud 'bum): byung / /dge slong dga' bo'i 'og tu ni/ /tsan+dan skyong ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de tshe dus ni tha ma la/ /lo ni sum brgya dag tu 'tsho/ /bdag nyid chen po byang chub ni/ /bgegs med myur du rnyed dka' thob/ /rgyal po btsun pa zhes bya ba/ /nga yi
281a4(rgyud 'bum): bstan pa nub byed pa/ /dus kyi tha ma de yi tshe/ /the tshom med par 'byung bar 'gyur/ /shar phyogs nas ni brtsams nas su/ /kha che'i yul gyi bar dag tu/ /rmongs pas lha khang mchod rten rnams/ /de tshe de bzhin 'jig par 'gyur/ /

281a6(rgyud 'bum): bus bcom par 'gyur/ /blo ngan de ni sa 'og 'gro/ /de ni 'og nas 'og tu 'gro/ /dmyal las dmyal ba rab drag par/ /sdug bsngal sdug bsngal drag par ni/ /mi bzad par ni yang dag ltung / /mnar med zhes ni bya ba
281a7(rgyud 'bum): yi/ /sdig pa'i las kyis dmyal ba ni/ /de nas bskal ba cher 'tshed pa/ /bdag nyid ngan pa go mi shan/ /mi dge'i bshes gnyen la brten nas/ /sdig pa shin tu mi bzad byas/ /de ni nga yi bstan pa la/ /rnam pa
281a8(rgyud 'bum): kun gyis 'bad nas ni/ /sems ni ma lus rab btang nas/ /phun sum tshogs dang de nas spyod/ /nges par sangs rgyas nyid lam ni/ /yan lag brgyad kyi theg pas ni/ /de tshe de ni rab 'gro zhing / /mya ngan nad
281b1(rgyud 'bum): med dam pa thob/ /de yi 'og tu sa srung ba/ /sangs rgyas phyogs zhes rnam par grags/ /phyogs che gtong ba che ba dang / /sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan la dad/ /de tshe dus kyi tha ma la/ /'byung bar 'gyur bar the
281b2(rgyud 'bum): tshom med/ /thams cad mngon dga'i rgyal po ste/ /ston pa'i bstan pa de gtsor byed/ /kun dga' ra ba mchod rten gnas/ /ston pa'i gzugs brnyan bla na med/ /mtshe'u rdzing dang khron pa dang / /mtsho rnams dag ni du ma
281b3(rgyud 'bum): dag / rgyal po chen pos byas nas ni/ /tshe zad lha yi gnas su song / /des kyang sa steng grub pa ni/ /pad ma 'chang ba brtson 'grus che/ /bdag nyid chen po sems dpa' la/ /sa yi bdag por don du gnyer/ /de yi sngags kyi mthu yis ni/ /

281b5(rgyud 'bum): nyid rgyal po de'ang / /de yi tshe na 'byung bar 'gyur/ /gtsug lag khang dang gnas khang dang / /mchod rten rdzing dang khron pa ni/ /'od chen sa yi bdag po de/ /du ma byed par the tshom med/ /blo dang ldan pa 'jam dbyangs kyi/ /sngags kyang

281b8(rgyud 'bum): pa/ /li ts+tsha bI rnams rigs su byung / /de yang sngags kyi don bsgrubs te/ /longs spyod che dang ldan par 'gyur/ /rig pa longs spyod ldan zhes bya/ /mi yi bdag pos de yang grub/ /lo ni brgyad cur rgyal srid byas/ /des ni rkun

282a3(rgyud 'bum): ston pa mchod byed pa'o/ /khyu mchog khyu mchog bzang po dang / /sa 'od de bzhin sa 'od bzang / /de bzhin pha rol gnon nyid dang / /rkang pa'i 'gros zhes bstan pa yin/ /sa srung dang ni be'u dang / /'od ldan nyid ni phyi ma yin/ /

282b8(rgyud 'bum): che/ /de yi sngags kyang rab tu bsgrubs/ /des kyang sngags ni rab bsgrubs pa/ /sa steng rgyal po'i ched du'o/ /phyogs che dpung ni chen po dang / /rgyal po grags pa chen po ste/ /gnyen dang rigs dang rgyal pos kyang / /de ni bkur ba nyid du 'gyur/ /
283a1(rgyud 'bum): rtsa brgyad stong gi gtsug lag khang / /de yi dus su yod par 'gyur/ /de yi sngags kyi mthus yis ni/ /lo ni nyis brgya dag tu 'tsho/ /gang tshe de lus zhig pa na/ /dga' ldan du ni skye bar 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' rdzu

283a4(rgyud 'bum): rten skyong ba dang / /gnod sbyin bstan pa srung byed dang / /sa steng dam chos srung byed pa/ /de yi tshe na 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de ltar rnam pa mang po bstan/ /sa bdag 'jig rten rnam grags pa/ /bstan dang ston par 'gyur ba yin/ /

283a7(rgyud 'bum): brnyan yid 'ong la/ /rnam pa sna tshogs mchod pa byed/ /'jig rten mgon po grags chen gyi/ /mchod rten mchog la'ang mchod pa byed/ /des na de ni sngags kyang grub/ /rgyal po las skyes kho na ni/ /de yi yul du yang dag
283a8(rgyud 'bum): grags/ /dge slong bsod snyoms byed pa ni/ /tshul khrims ldan zhing blo dang ldan/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan la dad/ /bdag nyid chen po dus su rgyu/ /de ni bsod snyoms rab zhugs rgyu/ /rgyal po'i khab bzang rab mthong ba/ /
283b1(rgyud 'bum): rgya che skye bos gang ba la/ /bslang ba'i don du der yang zhugs/ /bkres pa dang yang yang dag ldan/ /ngal zhing ltogs pa'i yid gyur kyang / /de tshe bsod snyoms rnyed ma gyur/ /rgyal po'i skyes bus de myur bzung / /khyim de las ni phyung
283b2(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur/ /de nas de ni yid byung nas/ /rgyal po'i mi la rab khros te/ /grong khyer de las nges byung nas/ /mod la de yi rang gnas phyin/ /ltogs shing skom pa nyid gyur pas/ /sdug bsngal yid mi bde bar gyur/ /de nas de ni zas chad
283b3(rgyud 'bum): nas/ /mtshan phyed du ni langs gyur nas/ /sdom brtson de ni sems chud pas/ /de tshe srog ni gtang bar rtsom/ /de tshe smon lam byed pa ni/ /la da'i yul gyi bdag por shog /de nas dge slong dus las 'das/ /spu gri zhes
283b4(rgyud 'bum): bya'i rgyal rigs su/ /bdag nyid chen po de skyes gyur/ /ston pa'i bstan pa mchod par byed/ /lo ni sum cu dag tu yang / /rgyal srid gnod pa med par byas/ /brkam chags rang mi'i sbyor ba yis/ /ma zhu'i nad kyis
283b5(rgyud 'bum): btab par gyur/ /de tshe rgyal po lus zhig nas/ /dus byas lha yi gnas song ba/ /byams pa gang du bzhugs pa yi/ /dga' ldan lha yi gnas mchog tu/ /bdag nyid chen pos chos 'chad par/ /de nyid du ni skye bar 'gyur/ /
283b6(rgyud 'bum): 'od chen byams pa chen po la/ /bsnyen bkur byed cing chos kyang nyan/ /bdag nyid chen po de mthar gyis/ /rnyed par dka' ba'i byang chub thob/ /tshul khrims zhes bya'i rgyal po'i 'og /g.yo ba zhes bya 'byung bar 'gyur/ /lo ni lnga bcu rtsa lnga dang / /
283b7(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin zla ba lnga ru 'tsho/ /de srid rgyal srid des byas nas/ /mtshon chas 'tsho bas rab bsad pa/ /bud med byas pa'i skyon nyid kyis/ /de ni mtshon chas bsad par 'gyur/ /de yi nu bo brtan zhes bya/ /brtan pa chos ni brtan
283b8(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ /sngon ni bkren pa zham ring gyur/ /yul ni la da'i bdag por gyur/ /lhag ma rgyal po thams cad dang / /skye dgu kun kyang zham ring pa'o/ /tshul khrims zhes bya rab 'das nas/ /de ni de dag kun gyi sngar/ /sa bdag thams cad 'byung 'gyur
284a1(rgyud 'bum): ba/ /dpa' bo rgya mtsho'i pha rol 'gro/ /rgyal po dbang po zla mdzes dang / /de bzhin du ni gzhu dang tog /me tog gzhu dang rgyal po'i bu/ /res ldan grong las byung ba yin/ /dang po'i dang po snga ma dag /ba la'i grong du 'byung ba
284a2(rgyud 'bum): yin/ /'od ces bya ba stod rnams dang / /de bzhin khyab 'jug ces bya ba/ /rgyal po mtha' yas gsungs pa ni/ /ya nga ba yi rigs su 'byung / /de dag phyi ma'i rgyal po ni/ /khyab 'jug ces ni bya ba 'byung / /grong dang skye bo gnyen dang bcas/ /
284a3(rgyud 'bum): drang srong dmod pas gnod gyur pas/ /blo ldan rgyal po med par 'gyur/ /grong khyer chu yis rab tu gang / /de tshe de yi res ldan grong / /rgya mtsho chen pos rab tu gang / /byang gi phyogs ni thams cad du/ /rtsom pa sna tshogs ri zhol brtan/ /sna tshogs rigs la
284a4(rgyud 'bum): gnas pa yi/ /rgyal po rnams ni mtha' yas gsungs/ /nyi shu gcig dang sum cu yi/ /mi yi rgyal por shes par bya/ /bcwa brgyad sa yi bdag po zhes/ /bar ma'i sa kun bdag po yin/ /mtha' yas klu yi sde la sogs/ /de las tha
284a5(rgyud 'bum): ma rnam par zhig / de nas khyab 'jug 'phrog byed dang / /mdung zhes bya ba 'phrog byed gzhan/ /dbang ldan dang ni phreng kun dang / /bza' dang brtul zhugs bzang po gzhan/ /dus kun chos lugs rnam par nyams/ /rgyal po de dag dus las 'das/ /
284a6(rgyud 'bum): des ni bram ze rigs byung ba/ /de tshe longs spyod che nor dang / /bar mthar yi ge dang po b+ha/ /de tshe blon po gnyi ga gtso/ /gnyi ga nor ldan dpal ldan grags/ /bstan pa la ni phan par dga'/ /gzhon nu khyod kyi sngags rgyal po/ /blon pos de tshe
284a7(rgyud 'bum): sngags kyang bzlas/ /de nas bzung nas sa yi bdag /gnyi ga mi yi dbang phyug gyur/ /bdun dang brgyad dang de bzhin gsum/ /de tshe dpal mgrin gnas na 'dug /ston pa nyi ma zhes bya ba'i/ /gnas na dbang phyug rab tu gnas/ /
284a8(rgyud 'bum): thams cad gnas su sa yi bdag /'byung bar 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /yi ge ha zhes rab gsungs pa/ /sa rnams kun la mi yi bdag /de yi yul du sngags 'di dag /de tshe grub par 'gro ba yin/ /zhi dang rgyas pa'i rig pa rnams/ /
284b1(rgyud 'bum): gang zhig chos rgyal gyis gsungs pa/ /longs spyod rnam pa sna tshogs tshogs/ /de bzhin rnam pa sna tshogs ldan/ /sna tshogs gzugs kyi gzungs dang ni/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po gnod sbyin mo/ /de tshe dus kyi tha ma la/ /der ni grub par

284b3(rgyud 'bum): spyod skra bzang skra zhes su/ /lho yi phyogs su rnam par grags/ /bkra shis dang ni rnyed sla dang / /ba lang rnyed dang khyu nyid dang / /gru bzang de bzhin gru dag dang / /dbang chen dang ni zla ba nyid/ /ba lang srung dbang zla ba'i sde/ /'dod lha de bzhin ma ga d+hA/
284b4(rgyud 'bum): /grong byed bde byed nyid dang ni/ /stag dang seng ge gza' lhag dang / /sangs rgyas dag pa bum pa dang / /bum pa ma lus nyid du brjod/ /mnyam dang legs par 'jam pa dang / /skra bzang skra ni ldan pa dang / /lho yi phyogs su sa yi bdag /

285b2(rgyud 'bum): la zhugs pa'ang mchod par byed/ /rgyal srid sa yi bdag po byed/ /gnod pa med cing 'gran zla med/ /lo ni sum brgya dag tu'ang 'tsho/ /zhag ni sum cur rab byung nas/ /pha rol rgol bas pham byas te/ /de nas rgyal pos rang srog bcad/ /

288a5(rgyud 'bum): gzhan/ /ston pa'i bstan pa 'di la dad/ /zla ba zhes bya'i rgyal mchog des/ /gcer bu'i rigs gyur rgyal po ni/ /da yang rab tu bsad par gyur/ /yi ge ha ming de'i nu bo/ /dpa' bo gcig pu 'byung bar 'gyur/ /dpung ni chen por yang dag
288a6(rgyud 'bum): ldan/ /dpa' zhing zil gnon rnam par gnon/ /rgyal po yi ge ha bya bas/ /zla bar rnam grags gnas las bton/ /de nas rgyal po rje'u rigs spyod/ /sde chen stobs ni che ba dang / /de tshe shar gyi phyogs dag ni/ /bsod nams che ba'i
288a7(rgyud 'bum): grong mchog song / /rgyal rigs chos la gnas nas ni/ /chos kyi don shes brtser ldan pas/ /de ni nga rgyal khro tshul gyis/ /srog chags mang po gsod byed cing / /sems can gnod pa byed pa dang / /chad pa byed la rab dga' zhing / /
288a8(rgyud 'bum): las ngan rjes su spyod byed pa'i/ /zla ba zhes bya pham par byas/ /zla ba zhes bya de phyung nas/ /rang gi gnas na rab tu 'dug /yi ge ha ming slar log nas/ /kla klo'i rgyal pos rab tu mchod/ /yi ge ha bya dge dang ldan/ /dge ba'i
288b1(rgyud 'bum): don gyi las kyis ni/ /ji ltar 'dod pa'i 'gros dag gis/ /rang gi yul ni nyid du phyin/ /de nyid kyis ni las byas pas/ /rgyal srid dga' dang ldan pa thob/ /yang na rgyal srid spyod gnas pas/ /longs spyod rab tu
288b2(rgyud 'bum): thob ldan pa/ /snga mar rang sangs rgyas la ni/ /bza' dang gos ni byin pa dang / /de tshe lham ni byin pa dang / /gos kyis brgyan pa'i gdugs kyang byin/ /de yi las kyi mthu yis ni/ /lha mi'i rgyal srid chen po thob/ /lha dang mi yi phun sum tshogs/ /longs spyod phun
288b3(rgyud 'bum): sum tshogs ldan spyod/ /zla ba zhes bya'i bram ze'i rigs/ /longs spyod cher ldan gang phyir de/ /bram ze dag la longs spyod byin/ /de tshe rgyal thabs byed pa ni/ /lo ni bcu dang bdun dag dang / /de bzhin gzhan ni zla ba gcig /nyin zhag bdun dang
288b4(rgyud 'bum): brgyad dag tu/ /kha yi nad kyis yang dag btab/ /srin bu rnams kyis zos nas ni/ /dus byas nas ni 'og tu 'gro/ /mi ma yin pas zil mnan nas/ /de tshe grong de bshig par 'gyur/ /mi ma yin pas nyen pa yi/ /rims kyis nyam
288b5(rgyud 'bum): thag nad kyis brgyal/ /sngags kyi sbyor bas 'chi ba ste/ /de tshe rgyal po dus las 'das/ /mnar med pa zhes bya ba yi/ /dmyal bar sdig pa'i las byed rnams/ /sdig pa'i las rnams rjes spyod pa/ /de ni de ru skye bar
288b6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ /dmyal bar de tshe bskal chen du/ /ma rungs sems ldan 'tshed par 'gyur/ /de nas so thams kyi hud zer/ /yang sos dang ni thig nag dang / /mi bzad ral gri'i nags tshal yang / /yang dang yang du myong bar 'gyur/ /yi
288b7(rgyud 'bum): dgas 'jig rten dud 'gro nyid/ /de bzhin gshin rje'i 'jig rten du'ang / /de ltar skye ba stong rnams su/ /'khor bar yang ni 'khor 'gyur yang / /des ni bde ba mi thob cing / /rtag tu sdug bsngal bsten par 'gyur/ /de bzhin
288b8(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa'i bstan pa la/ /de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis/ /sems ni kun gyis dad byas te/ /nad med phun sum tshogs par song / /sangs rgyas phan 'dogs byed pa yis/ /'bras bu mtha' yas
289a1(rgyud 'bum): 'byung 'gyur bas/ /sangs rgyas la ni dang bar bya/ /chos dang dge 'dun de bzhin no/ /rgyal pos dkon mchog gsum mchod na/ /'jig rten gyi ni mchog tu 'gyur/ /rgyal thabs chen po'i grags pa thob/ /nor gyi dbang
289a2(rgyud 'bum): phyug longs spyod che/ /rgyal pos phun tshogs rgya che ba'i/ /bde ba rnam pa sna tshogs 'thob/ /'jig rten mchog ni mchod byas na/ /'jig rten dbang phyug nyid du 'gro/ /de nas brgya byin 'thab bral nyid/ /tshangs pa nyid du'ang yang
289a3(rgyud 'bum): dang yang / /nyan thos rang rgyal nyid dang ni/ /sa steng sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur/ /theg pa gsum gyi mchog thob cing / /theg pa la ni chags med 'gyur/ /de ltar sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab/ /sangs rgyas ye shes bsam
289a4(rgyud 'bum): mi khyab/ /de dag 'bras bus bsam mi khyab/ /rnam par smin pa'ang bsam mi khyab/ /de nas gzhan yang rgyal po ni/ /zla ba sa steng med pa na/ /phan tshun 'khrug pa'i ngang tshul du/ /go DA'i rgyud ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /phan tshun ltos pa med
289a5(rgyud 'bum): par ni/ /de tshe mtshon ni 'debs par 'gyur/ /zhag ni bdun po gcig dang ni/ /de bzhin gzhan ni zla ba gcig /de tshe tshogs kyi rgyal srid rgyud/ /de tshe sa steng byed par 'gyur/ /gang gA'i 'gram gyi grong der ni/ /gtsug lag khang gi
289a6(rgyud 'bum): gnas kyang byas/ /de nas zla ba zhes bya ba'i/ /bram ze'i khye'u de yi bu/ /zla ba brgyad dang zhag lnga dang / /phyed dang gnyis zhag 'das nas 'chi/ /de'i mthar rgyal po 'dug pa ni/ /klu yi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ /go DA'i yul
289a7(rgyud 'bum): gyi rgyal po 'byung / /dang por dza ma'i rigs bram ze/ /kun nas rje'u rigs kyis bskor ba'i/ /klu zhes bya ba de yang 'byung / /de yang mu ges gnod pa dang / /de bzhin pha rol dmag tshogs gnod/ /de dag rgyal srid thob pa
289a8(rgyud 'bum): na/ /chom rkun chen pos kun tu khyab/ /des kyang de yi lugs nyams te/ /der ni lo ni lnga dang gcig /rgyal srid kun nas 'khrugs bzhin spyod/ /srog gcod mang po byas nas ni/ /de tshe srog la gnod par byed/ /snga ma'i
289b1(rgyud 'bum): las kyi nyes pa yis/ /rje'u rigs spyod pa de dag byed/ /phan tshun 'khrugs pa'i ngang tshul du/ /de tshe de ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de dag de tshe nus ldan tshul/ /rgyal rigs spyod la gnas pa yi/ /go DA'i rgyud kyi mi yi
289b2(rgyud 'bum): bdag / 'byung bar 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /kha cig de tshe mtshon gyis 'chi/ /nad rnams kyis kyang yang dag 'debs/ /de nas dus byas rgyal po rnams/ /dmyal ba rnams su 'gro bar 'gyur/ /bud med gtso bo'i
289b3(rgyud 'bum): byis pa ni/ /de yang phyis ni rgyal por 'gyur/ /de dag de bzhin zla phyed nas/ /mtshon gyis bsnun nas de nyid bsad/ /mu ge chen po yang dag 'byung / /pha rol dmag tshogs dag gis dkrugs/ /yid ni skrag par gyur pa
289b4(rgyud 'bum): yis/ /shar phyogs yul mi nyams par gyur/ /de yi yul du mi bdag ni/ /the tshom med par 'byung 'gyur ba/ /bcom brlag skyes pa'i rgyal po mchog /yangs pa can gyi tshong pa sngon/ /de yang lus la mchod
289b5(rgyud 'bum): pa yi/ /ma ga d+hA yi rgyal por 'gyur/ /de'i yang nu bo yi ge b+ha/ /shar gyi phyogs la yang dag gnas/ /de bu yi ge pra zhes bya/ /shar phyogs nyid du yang dag skyes/ /rgyal rigs mchog tu skyes par bstan/ /legs par spyod
289b6(rgyud 'bum): pas byis par bcings/ /lo ni bcu dang bdun dag tu/ /'ching ba dag la yang dag bzhag /glang rdzi zhes bya'i rgyal pos bcings/ /bcom ldan zhes bya des ni bkrol/ /yi ge ha zhes rgyal chen ni/ /nub kyi phyogs na yang dag
289b7(rgyud 'bum): 'ongs/ /shar gyi phyogs ni mtha' med par/ /gang gA'i 'gram du gnas par gyur/ /dmangs rigs gzi brjid che ba dang / /sde chen stobs ni che ba dang / /de ni de yul 'gram gnas nas/ /kun tu yang ni rab tu gnas/ /
289b8(rgyud 'bum): go DA'i skye bo zhes grags grong / /mu stegs zhes kyang rnam par grags/ /rgyal pos de ni rnam mnan nas/ /stobs chen de ni 'dug par gyur/ /der ni rgyal rigs byis pa de/ /tshong pa dang ni lhan cig 'ongs/ /
290a1(rgyud 'bum): der ni nam phyed zhugs nas ni/ /nam gyi mthar ni de yang mchod/ /dmangs rigs rgyal po zhes bya bas/ /slar nyid du ni ldog par byed/ /gang gA'i 'gram gyi mthar thug par/ /grong khyer dga' ba zhes bya bar/ /de tshe
290a2(rgyud 'bum): rgyal srid ma ga d+hAr/ /byis pa de ni bzhag par gyur/ /bA rA Na sI'i pha rol tu/ /kA shi yul gyi mir yang phyin/ /stobs chen sa yi bdag po ni/ /dmangs rigs der ni zhugs par gyur/ /sdug bsngal nyam thag nad chen pos/ /de tshe bu
290a3(rgyud 'bum): ni dbang yang bskur/ /byis pa khye'u phug ces pa/ /de tshe rgyal thabs dbang yang bskur/ /chen po'i nad kyis zil mnan nas/ /de tshe sa yang 'khor bar mthong / /de nas 'bad pas shugs nar phyung / /lus zhig nas ni dud 'gror song / /
290a4(rgyud 'bum): de tshe zla ba bdun dang brgyad/ /dud 'gro dag tu gnas par gyur/ /de yi skye ba las grol nas/ /lha rnams kyi ni nang du skyes/ /de tshe skye ba nyi shur ni/ /lha yi phun sum tshogs pa thob/ /chos kyi bdag nyid de mthar gyis/ /rang rgyal byang chub
290a5(rgyud 'bum): thob par byed/ /sngon gyi skye ba'i dus dag tu/ /'di nyid las ni nye bar bsags/ /bdag nyid chen po rang rgyal la/ /gos kyis kun nas bkab pa dang / /glang po rta dang shing rta'i rgyur/ /lham ni rab tu phul bar gyur/ /de las blo ldan
290a6(rgyud 'bum): sems dang bas/ /de tshe de la bza' ba byin/ /rnam par smin pa de yis ni/ /lha yi rgyal po brgya byin du/ /skye ba bye ba phrag dgur ni/ /lha yi 'jig rten dag tu gyur/ /sa steng 'ong nas rgyal po ni/ /de nas skye ba 'di la gyur/ /gzhan
290a7(rgyud 'bum): gyis rjes bsgrubs rgyal thabs ni/ /rjes su spyod par 'gyur ba yin/ /de yi bu yang rgyal po ni/ /bA rA Na sIr rab tu gnas/ /chags 'og rgyal phran gyis bcom pa'i/ /rgyal thabs rnam 'jig 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de yi
290a8(rgyud 'bum): rgyal srid dgra dang ni/ /bram zes phal chen gnod par 'gyur/ /bag med 'dod pa spyod pa dang / /rgyal po de ni gdon gyis 'dzin/ /phyi ma yi ni dus dag tu/ /de nas mtshon gyi brgyab nas 'chi/ /ma ga d+hA rgyal de dag ni/ /phan tshun
290b1(rgyud 'bum): du ni gnod byed pas/ /zla ba zhes bya'i rgyal po 'das/ /shar gyi phyogs kyi kun nas kyang / /gang gA'i 'gram gyi mthar thug par/ /bA rA Na sI de las gzhan/ /yi ge pra zhes rgyal rigs ni/ /de yi tshe na rgyal po 'byung / /gang zhig
290b2(rgyud 'bum): dmangs rigs gyur pa ni/ /yi ge ha yis yongs su mchod/ /grong khyer dga' ba zhes bya bar/ /gang gA'i 'gram la yang dag rten/ /sngon gyi las kyis yongs bskul nas/ /rgyal rigs rgyal por 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de nyid las
290b3(rgyud 'bum): byas byed bcug dang / /rjes su yang ni yi rang byas/ /de tshe dus ni 'das pa na/ /gser thub ces bya'i ston pa 'byung / /bA rA Na sI'i grong khyer du/ /nor chen ldan pa'i tshong dpon yod/ /tshong dpon bu ni byis pa de/ /byis pa dag gis yang
290b4(rgyud 'bum): dag bskor/ /sa rdul dag la rtse ba'i phyir/ /lam chen dag tu zhugs par gyur/ /rang khyim mchod rten mchog mthong la/ /pha dang ma ni mchod byed pa/ /de nyid yid la bzung byas nas/ /sa rdul gyi ni mchod rten byas/ /de tshe me tog
290b5(rgyud 'bum): sman mas ni/ /mchod pa yang ni byed par gyur/ /sangs rgyas dad pa'i dran pa yis/ /sangs rgyas de la'ang bstod pa byas/ /byis pa rnams kyis yongs bskor nas/ /der ni byis pa rtse bar gyur/ /ston pa gser thub rgyal ba yi/ /
290b6(rgyud 'bum): nyan thos mchog de gcig pu zhig /skyon bral bdag nyid grol ba dang / /khams gsum las ni rnam grol blo/ /de tshe dang por skyon bral ba/ /bsod snyoms la ni rgyu bar gyur/ /bA rA Na sI legs mdzes pa'i/ /de tshe grong
290b7(rgyud 'bum): khyer rab tu zhugs/ /gang du sa steng byis pa yod/ /de tshe chags bral phyogs der phyin/ /der ni byis pa de kun gyis/ /kun nas yongs su bskor bar gyur/ /'dir gshegs dge slong 'dir spyon cig /ston pa'i mchod
290b8(rgyud 'bum): rten phyag byos mdzod/ /bdag cag gis ni 'bad byas na/ /bzang po 'di la mi gzigs sam/ /de nas tshong dpon bu khye'us/ /rtsa yi thag pa blangs nas ni/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po'i 'dod chags bral/ /rtse ba'i tshul
291a1(rgyud 'bum): gyis de bcings khrid/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po chags bral bas/ /der gnas rnams la yang dag dgongs/ /sa steng dag tu gzigs pa na/ /de dag gis ni mchod rten byas/ /byis pa'i spyi bor lag byugs nas/ /blo ldan
291a2(rgyud 'bum): de la 'di skad smras/ /gang du khyod kyi mchod rten byas/ /thong shig khye'u bdag cag 'deng / /gang du sa steng mchod rten ni/ /der yang thams cad 'ong gyur nas/ /de tshe byis pa dang lhan cig /bdag nyid chen po des phyag byas/ /bsod
291a3(rgyud 'bum): snyoms don du ci 'dod par/ /dpa' bo de ni phyir yang chas/ /de nas tshong dpon byis pa yis/ /chos gos mtha' nas bzung nas ni/ /dge slong de ni bzung khyer ba/ /bshos gsol bya ba'i ched du'o/ /de nas tshong
291a4(rgyud 'bum): dpon gtso bo des/ /byis pa khye'u de mthong nas/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po chags bral ba'i/ /chos gos mtha' la 'dzin byed la/ /'jigs shing ba spu ldang ba dang / /nga yi khyim du mchog kyang gshegs/ /myur du rkang

291a6(rgyud 'bum): yis/ /lhung bzed dag ni bkang byas nas/ /bu la bos nas smras pa ni/ /yang dag long la 'di la byin/ /de nas byis pa shes ldan pas/ /'bad pas lag gnyis bkrus nas ni/ /lhung bzed gang ba blangs nas su/ /'dod chags
291a7(rgyud 'bum): bral ba la ni phul/ /phul nas myur ba nyid du ni/ /rkang pa gnyis la phyag kyang byas/ /'dod chags bral bas blangs nas ni/ /gtsug lag khang song zas la spyad/ /bde bar rig pa'i sems kyis ni/ /de tshe 'dod chags
291a8(rgyud 'bum): bral bar gyur/ /de las byis pa gzhan zhig ni/ /phrag dog sems su gyur nas ni/ /mu stegs rnams la rab dad nas/ /bstan pa la ni de mi mchod/ /khro ba'i sems ni kho na yis/ /'dod chags bral la nyin zhag
291b1(rgyud 'bum): gzhan/ /bza' ba bca' ba rnam mang po/ /khyer nas de la rab tu byin/ /khyod la byin pa'i bsod snyoms kyis/ /dge ba cung zad gang yod pa/ /tshong dpon bu ni de bas kyang / /sa steng bdag ni dam par shog /de nas mu
291b2(rgyud 'bum): stegs de kun dang / /de tshe bram ze'i chung ma rnams/ /de nas thams cad 'dus nas ni/ /tha dad par ni 'thab mo'ang byas/ /byis pa khyed cag yong mi shes/ /ci phyir mgo reg gam du 'gro/ /'di dag bdag la'ang gnas med na/ /
291b3(rgyud 'bum): gzhan dag gang du mya ngan zlo/ /byis pa de yi sems can la/ /de lta bu yi zhe sdang skyes/ /ston pas nye bar bsngags pa yi/ /chos kyi zam pa grags pa dang / /sa steng lha khang mchod rten mchog /mu stegs rnams kyis de dag bshig /tshong dpon mchog
291b4(rgyud 'bum): gi bu de la/ /kun nas 'khrug pa'i sems kyang byas/ /mgo reg 'di la byin pa yi/ /sbyin pa'i 'gro ba gang du 'gro/ /ngan 'gro'i 'gro bas zin sems la/ /rnam par gnod pa bdag gis bya/ /gnyis pa byis pa gang yin de/ /
291b5(rgyud 'bum): zla ba zhes bya'i rgyal po yin/ /rnam smin de yis mi 'dod pa/ /yun ring sdug bsngal rjes su myong / /tshong dpon mchog gi bu de ni/ /lus zhig nas ni bde 'gror song / /de dang der ni lha gnas su/ /yun ring bde ba rjes su myong / /
291b6(rgyud 'bum): de tshe de tshe de dang der/ /shi 'phos lha yi 'jig rten gnas/ /de tshe tha ma'i skye ba la/ /thams cad du ni 'ching ba gcod/ /tha ma'i skye ba thob pa na/ /mir gyur sa yi bdag por 'gyur/ /las kyis de tshe tshe 'phos na'ang / /de tshe de tshe de dang der/ /
291b7(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten dag tu skyes gyur pa/ /sa steng mi yi bdag por byed/ /gang zhig me tog dman ma ni/ /byis pa g.yo ba des phul ba/ /des na longs spyod nyon mongs can/ /de 'di'i 'bras bu nyon mongs ldan/ /sdug bsngal longs spyod

292a1(rgyud 'bum): byis pa rgyal po'i dbang phyug byed/ /med par rgyal po byed par 'gyur/ /yod pa rab tu 'jig par 'gro/ /byang dang nub kyi bar dag tu/ /de ni rgyal po byed par 'gyur/ /blo gros gang de bcings pa dang / /byis pas yang ni rab dang
292a2(rgyud 'bum): ba/ /byis pas bcings dang grol ba yi/ /rnam smin las ni de yis su/ /skye ba dag ni lnga brgyar yang / /byis pa bcings dang bkrol bar 'gyur/ /tha ma'i skye ba de yi tshe/ /thams cad du ni 'ching ba bcad/ /lo ni lnga bcu lnga dag gam/ /bdun cu rtsa bdun dag
292a3(rgyud 'bum): tu 'gyur/ /shar phyogs rgya mtsho'i mthar thug par/ /sa steng de ni rgyal por 'gyur/ /'bigs byed ri yi nang gnas pa/ /mtha' 'khob kla klo'i rkun ma rnams/ /de dag kun la dbang sgyur ba'i/ /yi ge ba ming rgyal por 'gyur/ /
292a4(rgyud 'bum): gangs can ri yi nang gnas pa/ /byang gi phyogs la brten pa yi/ /de tshe rgyal rigs rgyal po de/ /yul mi kun la spyod par 'gyur/ /mi shes byis par gyur pa yi/ /mchod rten sa rdul gyis byas pas/ /'gran zla med cing
292a5(rgyud 'bum): gnod med par/ /ma ga d+hA yi rgyal por 'gyur/ /shar phyogs rgya mtshor brten nas ni/ /de 'di 'brog gi mthar thug par/ /blo ldan lo hi ta las gzhan/ /byang du de bzhin kha ba can/ /nub tu kA shi'i nyams dga'i grong / /rtse mo zhes
292a6(rgyud 'bum): bya'i grong de bzhin/ /'di yi nang du rgyal po ni/ /ston pa'i bstan pa gsal byed pa/ /de ni seng ge lnga zhes bya/ /pham nas rgyal pos gzhan yang pham/ /seng ge las skyes thams cad de'ang / /de tshe rtsa nas rnam par bshig /gangs can nang dang
292a7(rgyud 'bum): shar phyogs dang / /rgya mtsho bcu yi 'gram gnas nas/ /de tshe rgyal rigs brgyad po de/ /yul mi dag ni kun la spyod/ /lha sogs seng ge rgyal po ni/ /g.yon can gzhan la brten pa dang / /'bigs byed nang na gnas pa la/ /des kyang
292a8(rgyud 'bum): rang gi rgyal po byas/ /bgrod dka' zhes bya'i yul dbus su/ /dug chen rgyal bas rnam rgyal byas/ /byang shar kun la gnas pa yi/ /seng ge zhes bya de bzhin gzhan/ /zla ba zhes bya'i rgyal po 'das/ /de tshe go DA'i skye bo'ang
292b1(rgyud 'bum): 'jig / de tshe rgyal rigs sa yi bdag /'byung bar 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /rgyal po mngon 'phel skye zhes bya/ /de yi longs spyod 'phel bar 'gyur/ /de tshe rgan por gyur pa na/ /de yang g.yo ba med par song / /lo ni brgyad cur 'tsho ba ste/ /de bzhin
292b2(rgyud 'bum): gzhan ni bdun dang bdun/ /de nas 'khogs pas zil mnan nas/ /dus byas lha yi gnas su song / /yun ring lha yi bde ba ni/ /de tshe rgyal pos rjes su myong / /sngon ni kun nas nyon mongs pas/ /las kyi yang ni shi 'phos te/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po
292b3(rgyud 'bum): klu yi rgyal/ /blo ldan dud 'gro'i nang du gnas/ /tshong pa sngags ni grub pa ste/ /ji ltar 'dod pa'i blo byed cing / /de tshe rig pa'i rgyal po dang / /de tshe bde 'gro dag tu gyur/ /de yi tshe na 'khor los sgyur/ /sna tshogs tog ces rgyal por 'gyur/ /
292b4(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin du ni blo ldan de/ /de tshe rig 'dzin chos kyang 'chad/ /lo ni bye ba brgyad cu dang / /de tshe dgu dang bdun du 'gyur/ /lha dang mi yi bde ba yis/ /'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ba yin/ /de yi 'khor du bu mo ni/ /bye ba drug cu skye bar 'gyur/ /
292b5(rgyud 'bum): de nas de ni lus zhig nas/ /lha mo sgrol ma mnyes byas te/ /lha rnams bdag por song nas ni/ /der ni chos kyang ston par byed/ /rgyal po de ni mthar gyis su/ /myur du byang chub gzhol bar 'gyur/ /de yang lo ni gsum dag tu/ /rgyal po'i dbang phyug
292b6(rgyud 'bum): byas nas ni/ /yi ge pa yi rgyal po 'das/ /de tshe dus kyi tha ma la/ /phan tshun rgyud ni byas nas su/ /rtsod pa chen po la yang gnas/ /de yi nu bo yig pa zhes/ /brtul zhugs can du rnam par gnas/ /lo ni gsum dang gcig dag tu/ /rgyal srid
292b7(rgyud 'bum): yongs su 'phel bar byas/ /de ma thag tu 'khru bas btab/ /'di dag gnyi ga 'chi bar gyur/ /'jig rten dus 'das shi nas ni/ /gnod sbyin dag gi nang du skyes/ /de gnyis mthar gyis chos ldan pas/ /rang rgyal byang chub thob par
292b8(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ /de'i yang nu bo yig pa zhes/ /rgyal rigs kyi ni chos la dga'/ /de yang rgyal po lo gsum du/ /mi yi bdag po byed par 'gyur/ /de'i yang nu bo rgyal po ni/ /yi ge dza zhes rnam par bsgrags/ /de yang yul ni 'di dag tu/ /sa kun
293a1(rgyud 'bum): gyi ni bdag por 'gyur/ /rta dang shing rta glang po dmag /kun nas gru dang theg pa yis/ /g.yul du nye bar gnas nas ni/ /dgra yi tshogs ni kun las rgyal/ /des ni yul 'di ma lus dang / /sa rnams thams cad nyid la ni/ /ston pa'i gzugs
293a2(rgyud 'bum): brnyan lha khang dang / /de bzhin rgyal ba'i mchod rten dang / /sa rnams dag ni thams cad la/ /thams cad mdzes par byas par gyur/ /de tshe sngon gyi rgyal po de'i/ /bram ze de bzhin shAg rigs skye/ /nga rgyal shes rab ldan zhing rno/ /byang chub mthar byed nga rgyal blo/ /de tshe

297a8(rgyud 'bum): tshar bcad byas/ /khro rgyal gshin rje gshed de yi/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis 'dir gsungs pa/ /sems can ma rungs rnams dang ni/ /gdul dka' 'dul bar byed pa dang / /phan pa min las bzlog don dang / /phan pa nye bar
297b1(rgyud 'bum): 'phel phyir dang / /sems can rnams ni rjes gzung dang / /sems can srog 'chad dgag phyir ro/ /bram ze'i khye'u rmongs pa de/ /dbul ba khro ba chags pa yis/ /rgyal po'i srog la gnod pa'i phyir/ /khro bo'i sngags ni zlos par byed/ /
297b2(rgyud 'bum): de 'og rnam par grags pa ni/ /bram ze yi ge dang po a/ /chos don dge ba ldan bdag nyid/ /bden par smra zhing dbang po thul/ /mnga' bdag mang pos bkur ces pa/ /de tshe sngags ni zlos par 'gyur/ /sngags
297b3(rgyud 'bum): ni bsgrub par gyur pa la/ /dbang 'gyur yin gyis gzhan ma yin/ /'byung po dbang du gyur pa na/ /de tshe nor dang ldan par 'gyur/ /de 'og rnam par grags pa ni/ /bram ze chos don sems byed pa/ /de nas mthar ni dang yig sha /ma la'i
297b4(rgyud 'bum): yul du de ni 'byung / /sa steng sngags ni zlos par grags/ /bstan pa mchog la'ang rab tu dad/ /rig pa rjes bzung ma rungs dang / /tshangs pa'i srin po srin po dang / /'byung po shin tu ma rungs bcas/ /rnam pa sna tshogs sha za dang / /
297b5(rgyud 'bum): bstan dang 'gro ba sna tshogs ni/ /de dag ma lus de dbang 'gyur/ /de bzhin bram ze'i mtshan ldan pa/ /thams cad de yi dbang du 'gyur/ /de 'og rnam par grags pa ni/ /lho yi phyogs su bram ze ni/ /yi ge dang por ba bstan pa/ /ston pa'i
297b6(rgyud 'bum): bstan la de gtsor byed/ /mchod rten kun dga' ra ba gnas/ /ston pa'i gzugs brnyan yid 'ong gis/ /sa ni rgya mtsho gnyis mthar thug /thams cad kyi ni rgyan du byas/ /de 'og rnam par grags pa ni/ /bram ze gtso bo nor chen ldan/ /
297b7(rgyud 'bum): dang po'i yi ge na zhes pa/ /lho yi phyogs su yang dag bstan/ /bdag nyid chen po sngags zlos ldan/ /nges par byang chub gzhol bar 'gyur/ /dbus kyi yul du bstan pa ni/ /bram ze gang ba bzang zhes pa/ /'dul ba dang ni
297b8(rgyud 'bum): tshul bzang nyid/ /gang ba bcom brlag dag tu gnas/ /dang yig b+ha ni nor gyi spyan/ /rgyal po rnams ni sngags mchod byed/ /bram ze 'di dag bstan pa ni/ /ston pa'i bstan pa mchod byed pa'o/ /thog ma bar mthar gtso bo ste/ /rnam pa
298a1(rgyud 'bum): sna tshogs gnas dang rigs/ /sna tshogs phyogs kyi bram ze rnams/ /bram ze gzhan gyis mchod par byed/ /mu stegs sna tshogs rigs dang ni/ /rnam pa sna tshogs spyod yul spyod/ /gnas ni kun tu gsungs pa ste/ /bram ze'i
298a2(rgyud 'bum): khye'u mang thos yin/ /rang byung sangs rgyas chos kyi rgyal/ /sems can kun gyi don sgrub pa/ /sems can rnams ni ma lus dang / /lha gnas kyis kyang mchod pa'o/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi po yang / /'jig rten kun la grags pa
298a3(rgyud 'bum): ste/ /'phags skyes po dang mig mi bzang / /yul 'khor srung dang gnod sbyin rgyal/ /brgya byin de nas lha rnams kyi/ /nges pa'i tshig ni rab tu bsgrags/ /'thab bral lha yi bu dang ni/ /'phrul dga' gzhan 'phrul dbang
298a4(rgyud 'bum): byed dang / /rgyal po dga' ldan gsungs pa dang / /'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug mchog /gcig gi ming ni brgya byin sogs/ /de bzhin 'dod khams dbang phyug yin/ /de yang rtag tu gcig gnas te/ /rdzu 'phrul
298a5(rgyud 'bum): chen po gcig gi gzugs/ /de yang mtha' yas dag tu bstan/ /rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs 'chang lha/ /de las gong du thams cad mnyam/ /de yang thams cad rdzu 'phrul che/ /lha yi gtso bo ming gcig ste/ /'du shes med pa'i
298a6(rgyud 'bum): mthar yang bstan/ /de dag gtso bo med pa ste/ /mnyam pa'i tshul du yang dag gnas/ /'og tu mnar med mthar thug par/ /der ni rgyal po yod ma yin/ /'jam dpal de bas na/ de ltar phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus su rigs
298a7(rgyud 'bum): kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la las de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi mdzod 'di glegs bam du chud par byas te/ 'dri bar 'gyur/ klog par 'gyur/ kha ton du byed par 'gyur ba'am glegs bam du byas te 'chang bar
298a8(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ /gus par byas te yid la byed par 'gyur/ /gos rnam pa sna tshogs dang / phye ma dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / dril bu dang / rol mo dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / spos dang / dri dang / dri zhim po dag gis mchod par byed
298b1(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ /ri mor byed par 'gyur/ yang dag par 'dzin par byed par 'gyur/ /yid rtse gcig pa'i sems kyis chos byed par 'gyur ba de la ni/ /phan yon bcu po 'di dag tu 'gyur te/ /bcu gang zhe na/ der 'di la pha rol
298b2(rgyud 'bum): gyi dmag tshogs kyi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ /char 'bab pa mi mkhas pa dang gza' dang 'ching ba chen po'i 'tshe ba 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ /mi ma yin pa'i 'jigs pa'am/ der 'di la mi'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar
298b3(rgyud 'bum): mi 'gyur/ /phyir rgol ba thams cad kyi 'jigs pa'am/ der 'di la nad kyi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa'am/ der 'di la dus ma yin pa'i char gyi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /char ches pa'i 'jigs
298b4(rgyud 'bum): pa'am/ der 'di la rlung chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /sha za thams cad kyi 'jigs pa'am/ der 'di la dgra'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du g.yon can rkun po'i 'jigs pa'am/ der 'di la 'chi
298b5(rgyud 'bum): ba'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /gshin rje'i rgyal pos khyer ba'i 'jigs pa'am/ der 'di la chom rkun gyi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /lha thams cad dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za'i 'jigs pa'am/ der 'di la gzhan gyi sngags kyi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi
298b6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ /sbyar ba'i dug thams cad kyi 'jigs pa'am/ der 'di la nad kyi 'jigs pa dang / rims dang / tshad par 'khru ba dang / ma zhu ba dang / yan lag dang / nying lag gi nad kyi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ phan yon bcu po 'di dag tu shes par bya'o/ /gang du de bzhin gshegs
298b7(rgyud 'bum): pa rnams kyi cho ga chen po rab 'byam chos kyi mdzod 'di glegs bam du byas te/ bzhag la 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / mchod pa dang / 'dzin pa dang kha ton du byed na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis shin tu bzung zhing chos kyi mdzod mngon du 'gyur ro/ /dam tshig gi
298b8(rgyud 'bum): spyod pa la rjes su ma zhugs pa dang dam tshig mi shes pa gzhan dag la ni rnam pa thams cad du bstan par mi bya ste/ gang gi phyir 'di ni gsang ba yin pa'i phyir te/ 'dis ni thams cad mtshon pa yin na sems can rnams kyi dran pa med par ma byed cig /'on kyang
299a1(rgyud 'bum): khyod kyis shes par 'gyur mchod pa byed par 'gyur yang dag par 'dzin par 'gyur zhing bsod nams chen po yang rab tu skye bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can skal ba med pa rnams la bstan par mi bya ste/ gzhan du na dbul ba dang / nad dang /
299a2(rgyud 'bum): mdze dang / 'tshe ba dang / 'go ba'i nad nyid byed par 'gyur ro/ /de bas na gzhan dag la yang bstan par mi bya'o/ /dam tshig dang gsang ba pa dang gsang ba'i sngags kyi spyod pa la rjes su zhugs pa'i sems can rnams dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i
299a3(rgyud 'bum): bstan pa la legs par bslab pa rnams dang legs par rnam par bzhag pa'i dran pa dang ldan pa rnams dang / chos kyi don la mkhas pa rnams dang bsam gtan la rab tu zhugs pa dang chos la gnas pa dang bden par smra ba dang sems can gyi spyod pa la rab tu
299a4(rgyud 'bum): gnas shing snying rje'i spyod pa dang rab tu ldan pa rnams te/ sems can 'di dag la bstan par bya'i gzhan dag la ni ma yin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar
299a5(rgyud 'bum): nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ /thal mo sbyar ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci zhes bya/ /'di bdag gis ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan
299a6(rgyud 'bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ces bya bar yang zung shig / ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi man ngag legs par bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya bar yang
299a7(rgyud 'bum): zung shig / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rjes su 'jug pa rgyud thams cad kyi mdzod ces bya bar yang zung shig /theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa nges par bstan pa nyams pa med pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig /byang chub
299a8(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa'i sde snod ces bya bar yang zung shig / 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga zhes bya bar yang zung shig /chos thams cad kyi don rdzogs pa nges par bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig /'jig rten
299b1(rgyud 'bum): ma lus thams cad la/ /chos dang chos min rnam spyod cing / /byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che/ /gang khyod kun tu rnam par rgyu/ /de bzhin chos kyi dam pa mchog /gsang ba gzhan ni ma mthong ngo / /sngags rgyud
299b2(rgyud 'bum): don dang mdo rnams dang / /'gro ba yul ni skyon med dang / /byang chub chos la rab gzhol ba/ /dpa' bo gzhan ni ma mthong ngo / /gang 'di bla ma gsang ba dang / /drang don mdo yis yongs su brgyan/ /rnam pa sna tshogs
299b3(rgyud 'bum): mdo don dang / /sngags dang rgyud kyi rjes 'jug pa/ /cho ga rab 'byam 'di las gzhan/ /ma byung gang yang yod ma yin/ /rgyal srid chen po longs spyod che/ /lha gnas dag tu'ang phun sum tshogs/ /de bzhin lha
299b4(rgyud 'bum): dang mi rnams kyi/ /grags pa rgyas pa'ang thob par 'gyur/ /mi khom brgyad ni spong byed cing / /dal ba dag ni thob par byed/ /theg pa rnam gsum bdag po dang / /de nges sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur/ /
299b5(rgyud 'bum): mdo 'di 'dzin pa'i bsod nams dang / /de bzhin du ni phan yon 'di/ /'di yi lus la mtshon mi 'byung / /dug dang mes kyang ma yin no/ /ro langs dang ni gdon dang ni/ /de bzhin srul po ma mo dang / /
299b6(rgyud 'bum): srin po sha zas 'tshe byed pa'ang / /gang zhig mdo 'di 'don la min/ /'chang ba dang ni klog pa dang / /yang dang yang du mchod byed dang / /'jigs pa med pas mchod byed dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs
299b7(rgyud 'bum): mchod byed de/ /phan yon 'di ni rab bstan pa/ /'jig rten 'dir ni thob 'gyur ba/ /nad pa rnams ni nad las grol/ /sdug bsngal can ni bde bar 'gyur/ /dbul pos nor ni rnyed 'gyur te/ /bcings pa
299b8(rgyud 'bum): rnams ni 'ching las grol/ /'gro ba lnga dang ldan pa yi/ /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal ltung ba rnams/ /bde ba zhi ba mya ngan 'das/ /mi g.yo go 'phang 'thob par 'gyur/ /rang rgyal sangs rgyas
300a1(rgyud 'bum): nyid dang ni/ /nyan thos mthar ni phyin par 'gyur/ /mdo sde 'di ni bklag pa yis/ /sangs rgyas sku mdog thob par 'gyur/ /gang gA'i bye ma mnyam pa yis/ /rgyal ba mchog ni mtha' yas pa/ /
300a2(rgyud 'bum): mchod pas thob pa'i bsod nams dang / /mdo 'di bton pa'i bsod nams mnyam/ /'jig rten ji snyed gang su dag /zhing ni bye ba mtha' yas pa/ /de srid phra rab rdul snyed kyi/ /
300a3(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas rnams la rtag mchod pa/ /rnam pa sna tshogs bza' btung dang / /na ba rnams kyi gso sman dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs gnas mal rnams/ /rtag tu thams cad rab sbyin dang / /rnam pa
300a4(rgyud 'bum): sna tshogs gos dang ni/ /phye ma dag ni kun gyis kyang / /bsod nams skye bos thob gang yin/ /'di dag 'chang dang klog pas so/ /gang zhig rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / /'jig rten nyan thos rdzu 'phrul
300a5(rgyud 'bum): che/ /byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid che/ /sa bcu la gnas de las gzhan/ /de rnams tshad ni de mnyam la/ /de dag mchod pa'ang de bzhin te/ /gang gi lag par glegs bam chud/ /mi yis de mnyam
300a6(rgyud 'bum): bsod nams thob/ /'jig rten ji snyed bstan pa yang / /'jig rten khams na gnas pa yi/ /grangs med sems can ma lus pa/ /thams cad nad ni med byas te/ /skye bo gang zhig yang dang yang / /bkur stir
300a7(rgyud 'bum): byas nas de mchod pa/ /chos mchog 'di la mchod na ni/ /blo ldan de yis bsod nams 'thob/ /bskal pa bye ba mtha' yas par/ /rgyal ba mchog gis rtag par yang / /'jig rten mgon
300a8(rgyud 'bum): chos mdzad mchog 'di/ /mchod par yang ni mi nus so/ /chos mchog 'di ni sa steng du/ /yid bzhin nor bu rin chen 'dra/ /'jam pa'i cho ga 'dir gsungs pa/ /bklags pa dang ni 'chang ba yis/ /
300b1(rgyud 'bum): des ni 'dod 'jo'i ba 'drar 'gyur/ /longs spyod che nor phun sum tshogs/ /yid ni skyo ba med byas nas/ /sa steng 'di ni rab tu sgrub/ /sngags dang rgyud don drang ba'i don/ /don yod tshig ni rab bshad pa/ /bya ba dus la brten nas
300b2(rgyud 'bum): ni/ /sa steng rig pa 'dzin bsgrub na/ /rin chen phun tshogs rab gang ba/ /de yi phyogs kun dag tu gsungs/ /'bras bcas 'gro ba'i bdag nyid che/ /spyod pa bzang bar brjod pa yin/ /gang zhig cho ga mchog 'di las/ /
300b3(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po sngags gcig 'chang byed pa/ /rgyal srid phun sum tshogs don bcas/ /tshe ring phun sum tshogs par 'gyur/ /rnam pa sna tshogs longs spyod tshogs/ /rgyal mchog dam pas 'thob par 'gyur/ /
300b4(rgyud 'bum): 'gro dang gnas pa'i dug dag dang / /gzhan gyis byas pa'i rig pa dang / /ro langs sngags kyis sgrub pa dang / /mtshon gyis kyang ni gnod mi 'gyur/ /gzhan gyi gnod byed gtsor byed pas/ /sa steng 'jig rten gnod mi byed/ /chom
300b5(rgyud 'bum): rkun nad ni gzhan dag dang / /me yi 'jigs pa de la med/ /rgyal po skye bo dag kyang rung / /su zhig de la mchod mi byed/ /gang zhig mdo sde dkon mchog 'di/ /'chang dang klog pa'ang de bzhin no/ /rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas/ /dbang bskur
300b6(rgyud 'bum): yul du nyer gnas tshe/ /mdo sde mgo la nges bcings nas/ /yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal na/ /de la rkun pos mi gnod cing / /mtshon gyis de la phog mi 'gyur/ /gzhon nu'i gzugs su yang dag byung / /rma bya'i
300b7(rgyud 'bum): gdan la legs bkod pa/ /glang po'i mtshog ma'i steng bzhag nas/ /g.yul du yang dag zhugs byas na/ /skye bo rnams sdang de dag kun/ /mthong ba tsam gyis ldog par byed/ /byis pa'i gzugs can bzang po ni/ /gzhon nu'i
300b8(rgyud 'bum): rgyan gyis yongs su brgyan/ /gser dang dngul dang ra gan gyis/ /rgyal mtshan yu ba bsgreng ba la/ /rgyal mtshan ba dan btags nas ni/ /legs dgod legs par mnyam par bzhag /g.yul du dgras ni legs gang
301a1(rgyud 'bum): ba/ /mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs byed pa/ /thams cad g.yul du 'dus pa la/ /de yi tshe na 'jug par bya/ /rgyal mtshan sgreng la gnas pa yi/ /gzhon nu las ni sna tshogs pa/ /rnam pa du ma'i gzugs dang ldan/ /bdag nyid chen
301a2(rgyud 'bum): po 'jam pa'i dbyangs/ /sa bcu'i bdag po'i bdag po ni/ /mthong ba tsam gyis 'jigs par byed/ /rgyal rigs rgyal po chen po ni/ /'jig rten sa srung sa gnas pa/ /dad ldan yid gnyis the tshom ni/ /rnam bral chos la
301a3(rgyud 'bum): mnyes gshin pa/ /bde bar gshegs la dad bskyed nas/ /snying rjes brlan pa'i yid kyis ni/ /'dir bshad 'di dag bya ba ni/ /grub par 'dod pas rab tu bya/ /cho ga'i sbyor ba'i sngags dang ni/ /rgyud dang ldan pa sa steng du/ /chos
301a4(rgyud 'bum): dbyings tshogs pa'i rgyal ba yis/ /gsung rab 'di dag nges par bstan/ /chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam gnas pa'i/ /rgyal mchog snga ma grangs med pas/ /sa yi steng gi mi rnams la'ang / /chos kyi mdzod ni gsungs pa yin/ /lha dang
301a5(rgyud 'bum): lha min sngon g.yul 'thab/ /pha rol 'jigs pa byung ba na/ /gang tshe brgya byin sngon gyur pa/ /dpung ni pham byas zhe sdang bas/ /de tshe gcig tu song nas ni/ /sa steng rnam par du bar gyur/ /rgyal mchog 'od srung de la
301a6(rgyud 'bum): ni/ /thub pa mchog la de tshe zhus/ /ji ltar bya zhes tshig tu ni/ /bde sogs bdag pos rnam par smras/ /mi bzad lha min gyis pham nas/ /bdag kyang 'dir ni yang dag lhags/ /de skad bcom ldan gsol nas ni/ /lha yi dbang po brgya byin
301a7(rgyud 'bum): gyis/ /de tshe thub mchog zhabs gnyis la/ /spyi bo'i gtsug gis rab btud nas/ /mig stong kau shi ka ni/ /de yi spyan sngar 'dug par gyur/ /de skad gsol nas thub mchog ni/ /bram zer gyur pa 'od srung gis/ /de tshe gsung du bka' stsal pa/ /
301a8(rgyud 'bum): ka la ping ka'i sgra skad du/ /rgyal ba mchog gis sngon gsungs pa/ /gzhon nu sna tshogs yang dag byung / /bdag nyid chen po 'jam dpal ni/ /rnyed dka' sku ni 'bum gyur pa/ /yang dag mtha' la gnas nas ni/ /zab mo'i don
301b1(rgyud 'bum): gyi don ston byed/ /spros med rnam pa med pa dang / /gnas med pa las gzugs byas nas/ /shin tu don ldan chos kyang ston/ /lha yi dbang phyug de ni dran/ /de nas de ni de dran pas/ /byang chub sems dpa' dran tsam gyis/ /gzhon nu sna tshogs
301b2(rgyud 'bum): gzugs can ni/ /der ni de yi mod la lhags/ /der ni bcom ldan 'das dang ni/ /bcom ldan lha yi dbang phyug bcas/ /lhags nas byang chub sems dpa' des/ /de tshe rgyal ba mchog la btud/ /rgyal ba mchog kun phyag 'tshal nas/ /'od
301b3(rgyud 'bum): chen 'od srung la yang btud/ /de tshe thub pas rjes gnang nas/ /sngags kyi tshig ni 'di smras so/ /na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwe b+h+yaH/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa ne b+h+yaH/ ha na ha na/ sarba b+ha yot+sA da ya trA sa ya/ mo Ta ya/ tshin+da/
301b4(rgyud 'bum): b+hin+da/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas sngags 'di smras ma thag tu sa chen po 'di ri dang rgya mtsho'i mthar thug pa dang bcas pa rnam pa drug tu
301b5(rgyud 'bum): g.yos te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi zhing mtha' yas pa 'jig rten gyi khams kyi phyogs kyi mthar thug pa thams cad dang bcas pa yang rab tu 'gul bar gyur to/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis kyang
301b6(rgyud 'bum): sngags kyi tshig 'di dag byin gyis brlabs so/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'jigs pa dang bral nas ba spu langs te ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba thob nas/ mig gnyis phye ste/ stan las langs nas/ bcom
301b7(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la btud nas lan gsum bskor ba byas shing / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la mngon du bltas nas sngags kyi tshig de dag bzung ste/ yid la byas nas phyir yang
301b8(rgyud 'bum): shing rta la zhon te/ lha ma yin gang yin pa de logs su phyin par gyur to/ /de nas lha ma yin thams cad rgya mtsho chen po'i mtha'i 'gram du gang rang gi grong khyer gang yin pa der mngon du phyogs shing song bar gyur te/ sems
302a1(rgyud 'bum): zhum zhing nyams la dpung gi 'jigs pas sems dkrugs shing gdong gi mdog nyams shing nga rgyal dang dregs pa la sogs pa dang bral bar gyur la/ /mtshon cha dang bral zhing ri 'bigs byed 'bar ba bzhin du lha'i dbang phyug de mthong
302a2(rgyud 'bum): nas byer bar gyur to/ /de nas lha yi dbang po brgya byin gyis sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams la smras pa/ grogs po dag ma 'jigs shig /ma 'jigs shig /sangs rgyas kyi mthus lha ma yin las bdag cag nges par rgyal
302a3(rgyud 'bum): bas rang gi gnas su 'gro bar bya'o/ /rang rang gi gnas ci lta ba bzhin du song nas khyod cag rtse ba dang dga' ba yongs su spyod par gyis shig /de nas lha de dag thams cad yid shin tu dga' nas phyir yang rang gi gnas su
302a4(rgyud 'bum): log par gyur to/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ gang bdag gis gzhon nu'i gzugs can gyi gzugs brnyan gyi rnam pa de byas la rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la'ang
302a5(rgyud 'bum): btags na/ des na gang gi lha ma yin gyi 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo / /zhes bstan to/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis chen po la 'os pa'i nor bu rin po che nang 'od dang ldan zhing gsal ba'i phreng ba blangs nas/
302a6(rgyud 'bum): gzhon nu'i cha byad kyi gzugs brnyan byas te/ steng gi khang bzang du grong khyer chen po blta na sdug pa'i dbus na/ lha rnams kyi 'dun sa chos bzang kyi rtse mor rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba legs par bkod pa byas nas
302a7(rgyud 'bum): bzhag par gyur to/ /de nas lha ma yin de dag rab tshim byed dang / thags bzangs ris la sogs pa de dag lha rnams kyi steng du mi 'gro zhing / lha de dag kyang zil gyis gnon par mi 'gyur la/ rdzu 'phrul las rnam
302a8(rgyud 'bum): par 'phrul pa'am/ g.yul mngon du phyogs par 'gro bar mi nus so/ /de ltar lo bye ba khri phrag du ma mi ma yin pa'i grangs kyis bgrang bar yang lha ma yin gyi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du phan
302b1(rgyud 'bum): yon dpag tu med pa bstan pa dang / tshe dang / nad med pa 'phel bar/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang sngon du gsungs pa yin no/ /de bzhin du phan
302b2(rgyud 'bum): yon gyi yon tan mchog 'di dag rgya che ba dang / mtha' yas shing mu med pa sngon gsungs pa yin no/ /gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spangs sam/ rnam par rtog par byed na/ bsod nams ma yin pa
302b3(rgyud 'bum): dpag tu med pa 'phel bar 'gyur zhing / dmyal bar yang skye bar 'gyur la/ dud 'gro dang / yi dags dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi skye ba ngan par yang 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /sman dang / sngags rnams med
302b4(rgyud 'bum): do/ /byang chub sems dpa' med do/ /de rnams kyi bdag nyid chen po rdzu 'phrul che ba dang / rnam par 'phrul ba yang med do/ /cho ga rgya che ba yang med do/ /'phags pa ma yin pas bshad do/ /zhes byas nas spong
302b5(rgyud 'bum): ba'am/ /yang na 'gro zhing 'di nyan par mi nus so/ /zhes gnas de las gzhan du 'gro na/ de dag la bsod nams ma yin pa chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /ci ste blo chung ba gang gis chos 'di ni thub pa mchog dang /
302b6(rgyud 'bum): thub pa'i sras blo dang ldan pa ma yin no/ /zhes rab tu spong bar byed do/ /mi de dmyal bar 'gro 'gyur zhing / /de nyams nas ni dud 'gror 'gro/ /thig nag dang ni yang sos dang / /spu gri so dang me ma mur/ /ro myags
302b7(rgyud 'bum): chu bo rab med skye/ /de nas phyir yang spu gri sor/ /lo ma ral gri lta bu'i nags/ /yang na kyi hud zer de bzhin/ /'jig rten grags pa so thams thams/ /sdig pa'i las kyi dmyal ba ru/ /gang gis
302b8(rgyud 'bum): chos ni sun byed pa/ /de ni skye ba de dag 'gro/ /'jig rten smad par rab bstan pa/ /mi bzad mnar med pa zhes bya/ /ma dad sems kyis chos spangs pa/ /sdig pa'i las can gnas yin te/ /gang zhig
303a1(rgyud 'bum): chos ni 'di 'jigs pa/ /de la skye bo de 'tshed 'gyur/ /kun gyi mthar thug mnar med pa/ /de nyams de bzhin dmyal chen skye/ /dmyal ba'i sa mtha' mtha' yas par/ /rtag tu blo med de ni 'gro/ /mdo sde
303a2(rgyud 'bum): de ni rgya cher bcas/ /chos kyi nor kun rab spangs nas/ /de ni 'jig rten ngan par 'gro/ /dbang med rtag par dbang du 'gro/ /gang zhig mdo sde'i cho ga 'di/ /sngags dang rgyud kyis legs par brgyan/ /
303a3(rgyud 'bum): grub pa sna tshogs brgya rnams 'thob/ /yang dag mtha' ni sgrib pa med/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi sku nyid yin/ /dmigs su med pa'i ngo bo nyid/ /cho ga cho ga rgya chen bcas/ /le'u rab 'byam 'dis 'dren byed/ /
303a4(rgyud 'bum): 'jam pa'i dbyangs ni legs dgod pa/ /phun tshogs dpal dang blo gros mchod/ /rtsa ba'i cho ga mi nyung ba/ /rgya che mang por bstan pa yin/ /rtag dang chad dang thog mtha' ni/ /gnyi ga'i mtha' don rnam par spangs/ /
303a5(rgyud 'bum): rim bcas rim ni nges par bstan/ /sngags kyi lus ni btus pa yin/ /me dang rlung dang nam mkha' dang / /stong pa'i de nyid legs gsungs pa/ /spangs pa rtag tu 'gro ba ni/ /'og nas 'og tu de tshe
303a6(rgyud 'bum): 'gro/ /bskal pa rnam mang gsum gyi grangs/ /de tshe bsod nams yongs bsags nas/ /de tshe byang chub thob nas ni/ /bdag dang rgyal ba mchog rnams kyis/ /sngags dang rgyud kyi don gsungs pa/ /'gro ba
303a7(rgyud 'bum): yul ni sdig med la'o/ /rtsa ba'i cho ga dag byed dang / /sdig pa med cing bkra shis pa'i/ /le'u rab 'byam rab gsungs pa/ /nges pa'i mdo sde bzang po yin/ /sa bdag yon tan bdag nyid che/ /yul dang dus
303a8(rgyud 'bum): kyi sbyor ba dang / /rgyal sras mi ru skyes pa yis/ /sa steng dam pa'i chos bstan ces/ /'jig rten gtso bo thub pa ni/ /rgyal ba bdun pas bstan pa yin/ /cho ga rgya cher gsungs pa ni/ /blo dang dpal ni mngon par 'phel/ /
303b1(rgyud 'bum): rtsa ba rab 'byam le'u zhes/ /sngags dang rgyud dang ldan pa de/ /gang zhig mdo mchog gtso bo 'di/ /rgyal bas mchod pa'i chos kyi mdzod/ /sa steng mis ni spong byed pa/ /de ni mnar med dmyal bar 'gro/ /bskal pa
303b2(rgyud 'bum): chen por de 'tshed ces/ /rnam pa du mar dbye bar bstan/ /nam zhig gang du 'byung ba ni/ /mi yi lus su skyes na yang / /dbul zhing nad mang glen pa dang / /kla klo dag tu skye bar 'gyur/ /'jig rten smad par 'gro ba ste/ /de ni
303b3(rgyud 'bum): mdze can nad par 'gyur/ /lkugs shing 'on pa yan lag nyams/ /blo nyams long ba nyid dang ni/ /rtsub cing rtag tu 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /sa steng yi dags lta bur snang / /gos ngan sems ni zhan pa dang / /sen mo dang
303b4(rgyud 'bum): ni lus kyang ngan/ /srin bu rnams kyis zos pa dang / /shu ba g.yan par yang dag ldan/ /mdo sde 'di ni rab spangs na/ /gang dang gang gis 'gro bar 'gro/ /de dang der ni skye ba na/ /blo ngan rmongs par skye bar 'gyur/ /de
303b5(rgyud 'bum): nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ mig
303b6(rgyud 'bum): phye zhing mi 'dzums par thams cad dang ldan pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang na gnas pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang / 'byung po'i tshogs du ma chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dus par shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das
303b7(rgyud 'bum): shAkya thub pa la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni ngo mtshar te/ mchog tu legs par gsungs pa lags na/ de la bcom ldan 'das ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sems
303b8(rgyud 'bum): can mi rigs pa'i chags pas zil gyis non pa slu bar byed pa nga rgyal can ma dad pa gya gyu can dmu rgod tshul khrims 'chal pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag sngags rnams kyi rtog pa'i bdag nyid chen po rgyas pa
304a1(rgyud 'bum): grub pa dang / dus dang / yul dang / nges par sdom pa dang / sngags dang / spyod pa dang / /sbyin sreg dang / bzlas pa nges par sdom pa dang / cho ga rab 'byam dag la ma dad par 'gyur/ yid la mi byed par 'gyur te/
304a2(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas kyi bka' ma yin no/ /zhes byas nas spong bar 'gyur te/ de dag nyon mongs pa'i sems su gyur nas dus byed par 'gyur zhing / sdug bsngal drag cing tsha ba'i tshor ba myong zhing de dag dmyal ba chen por
304a3(rgyud 'bum): skye bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal ba'i sems can de dag la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam
304a4(rgyud 'bum): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la spyi bor byugs nas bka' stsal pa/ /'jam dpal khyod sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir rab tu zhugs pa khyod yang legs so legs so/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa khyod de bzhin
304a5(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa la don 'di yongs su zhu bar sems pa de khyod yang legs so/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de'i phyir legs par shin tu rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / sems can thams cad kyi don dang / phan pa
304a6(rgyud 'bum): dang / bde ba'i phyir zhugs pa dang / lha dang / mi rnams dang / 'jig rten la rab tu brtse ba'i phyir ngas khyod la bshad do/ /spyod pa thams cad la zhugs pa dang / byang chub kyi lam dang / thams cad shes pa dang / chos kyi dbyings la
304a7(rgyud 'bum): 'jug pa dang / 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi sku la gnas par 'dod pa rnams kyis rig pa'i rgyal po mchog tu gsang ba/ gzhon nu khyod kyi rtsa ba'i cho ga'i le'u rab 'byam 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe yang 'di dran par bya'o/ /de gang zhe
304a8(rgyud 'bum): na/ na ma s+t+rai ya d+h+wa ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ ar had b+h+yaH/ samya k+sa~M bu b+h+yaH/ ku mA ra rU pi Ne/ bi shwa sa~M b+ha ba/ A gats+tsha/ A gats+tsha/ la hu la hu/ b+h+rU~M b+h+rU~M/ dzi na dzi ka many+dzu shri ye/ su shri ye/ tA ra ya / sarba duHkhe b+h+yaH/ phaT phaT/ sha ma ya sha ma ya/
304b1(rgyud 'bum): a mrI tod+b+ha ba/ pA paM me nA sha ya swA hA/ 'jam dpal 'di ni khyod kyi snying po dam pa yin te/ zhi ba thams cad byed pa/ sdig pa thams cad zad par byed pa/ sdug bsngal thams cad las rab tu grol bar byed pa/ tshe dang / nad med
304b2(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / dbang phyug dang / skal ba bzang po mchog dang / ngag gi dbang phyug skyed par byed pa/ rig pa'i rgyal po thams cad gzengs stod par byed pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas 'di gsungs ma thag tu sa chen po ri
304b3(rgyud 'bum): dang rgya mtsho dang bcas pa/ sems can dang snod nye ba'i mthar thug pa rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos par gyur to/ /'gro ba thams cad de yi dags kyi 'gro ba dang / dud 'gro dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / dmyal ba'i sems can thams
304b4(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi sdug bsngal rab tu sbyangs shing / bde ba rnams kyang rab tu thob par 'gyur la/ 'jam dpal rig pa'i rgyal po 'di yang yid la byed cing / de'i tshe dam pa'i chos spong ba'i sems kyang med par 'gyur na/ bdud sdig to
304b5(rgyud 'bum): can gyis kyang glags rnyed par mi 'gyur la/ bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad kyang 'byer bar 'gyur ro/ /'di ltar yang sems bskyed par bya ste/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sangs rgyas dang / chos ni bsam gyis mi
304b6(rgyud 'bum): khyab ste/ bsam pa'am/ gzhal ba'am/ spang bar ni bdag gis ci zhig nus te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis mkhyen par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i
304b7(rgyud 'bum): cho ga byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/ phan yon dang nyes dmigs kyi nus pa rab 'byam bstan pa'i le'u sum cu rtsa drug pa rdzogs s+ho// //
304b8(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / gnas gtsang ma'i steng na
305a1(rgyud 'bum): gnas pa'i lha'i bu'i tshogs rnams dang / sems can bye ba khri phrag brgya stong du ma dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang /
305a2(rgyud 'bum): grub pa dang / rig 'dzin dang / drang srong mchog dam pa du ma dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / spyan ras gzigs dang / byams pa dang / mthu chen thob dang / mthu chen gnas dang /
305a3(rgyud 'bum): phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa dang / chos kyi dbyings mtha' yas pa na bzhugs pa'i
305a4(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi 'khor dang bcas pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i ngo bo dang 'dra bar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /
305a5(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams thugs rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa
305a6(rgyud 'bum): 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i rgyud rdzogs s+ho/ / //dpal lha btsan po lha btsun pa byang chub 'od kyi bkas/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po dge bsnyen chen po ku mA
305a7(rgyud 'bum): ra ka la sha dang / sgra sgyur gyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAkya blo gros kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o/ /bkra shis par gyur cig /
